text: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly , nor standeth in the way of sinners , nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful .
text2: DICHOSO y taotao , ni ti mamomocat gui pinagat y manaelaye , ni y ti sumasaga gui chalan manisao , ni y ti matatachong gui siyan ayo sija y manmanmofefea .

text: But his delight is in the law of the LORD ; and in his law doth he meditate day and night .
text2: Lao guiya lay Jeova , ayo y minagofña , ya y layña jajaso , jaane yan puenge .

text: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water , that bringeth forth his fruit in his season ; his leaf also shall not wither ; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper .
text2: Ya taegüijeja y trongcon jayo ni y matanme gui oriyan sadog , ya guaja tinegchaña gui tiempoña , ya y jagonña ti umalayo ; ya todo y finatinasña mumemegae .

text: The ungodly are not so : but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away .
text2: Lao ti taegüine y manaelaye ; lao parejo yan y paja ni y güinaefe ni y manglo .

text: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment , nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous .
text2: Sa enao na ti mangajujulo y manaelaye gui sentensia ; ni y manisao gui y inetnon manunas .

text: For the LORD knoweth the way of the righteous : but the way of the ungodly shall perish .
text2: Sa si Jeova jatungo y chalan manunas : lao y chalan manaelaye ufanmalingo .

text: Why do the heathen rage , and the people imagine a vain thing ?
text2: SA jafa na manlalalo y nasion sija , ya y taotao sija manmanjaso y banida ?

text: The kings of the earth set themselves , and the rulers take counsel together , against the LORD , and against his anointed , saying ,
text2: Manotojgue y ray sija gui tano , ya y prinsipe sija manafaesen entalo sija contra si Jeova , yan contra y pinalaeña , ilegñija :

text: Let us break their bands asunder , and cast away their cords from us .
text2: Nita yulang y guinideña , ya nasuja guiya jita y godeña .

text: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh : the Lord shall have them in derision .
text2: Ya y sumasaga gui langet uchumachaleg : ya y Señot jamofefea sija .

text: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath , and vex them in his sore displeasure .
text2: Ayo nae cumuentos yan sija yan y linalaloña : ya y binibuña ninafañatsaga sija .

text: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion .
text2: Lao guajo japolo y rayjo gui jilo Sion , gui santos na egsojo .

text: I will declare the decree : the LORD hath said unto me , Thou art my Son ; this day have I begotten thee .
text2: Guajo bae jusangan y tinagojo : si Jeova ilegña nu guajo : Lajijo jao ; ya guajo julilis jao pago na jaane .

text: Ask of me , and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance , and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession .
text2: Gagaoyo ya guajo junaejao ni y nasion sija pot y erensiamo ya y uttimon patte y tano , uiyomo .

text: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron ; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter ' s vessel .
text2: Ya unyulang sija ni y baran lulog ; taegüije y bason y yero unyogyog sija .

text: Be wise now therefore , O ye kings : be instructed , ye judges of the earth .
text2: Ya pago , tingo , O ray sija : resibe finanagüe , jamyo man jues gui tano .

text: Serve the LORD with fear , and rejoice with trembling .
text2: Setbe si Jeova ni y minaañao , yan fanmagof ni minayengyong .

text: Kiss the Son , lest he be angry , and ye perish from the way , when his wrath is kindled but a little . Blessed are all they that put their trust in him .
text2: Chico y laje , no sea ulalálalo , ya unfanmalingo jamyo gui chalan , sa gusisija y linalaloña sinenggue . Mandichoso todos y umangoco sija guiya güiya .

text: LORD , how are they increased that trouble me ! many are they that rise up against me .
text2: JEOVA , jafa muna manlajyan y enimigujo ! Megae mangajulo contra guajo .

text: Many there be which say of my soul , There is no help for him in God . Selah .
text2: Megae umaalog ni y antijo : Taya inayuda para güiya , gui as Yuus . Sila .

text: But thou , O LORD , art a shield for me ; my glory , and the lifter up of mine head .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , jago y patang gui oriyajo ; y minalagjo yan ayo ni y janacajulo y ilujo .

text: I cried unto the LORD with my voice , and he heard me out of his holy hill . Selah .
text2: Ya y inagangjo juagang si Jeova , ya güiyaja umopeyo gui santos na ogsoña . Sila .

text: I laid me down and slept ; I awaked ; for the LORD sustained me .
text2: Bae juason ya maegoyo ; ya magmatayo ; sa si Jeova gumuguutyo .

text: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people , that have set themselves against me round about .
text2: Ti maañaoyo nu y dies mit na taotao , ni y mapolo sija gui oriyajo contra guajo .

text: Arise , O LORD ; save me , O my God : for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone ; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly .
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova ; nalibre yo , O Yuusso : sa jago manalamen todo y enimigujo ni y guijadas ; y nifen y manaelaye unyamag .

text: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD : thy blessing is upon thy people . Selah .
text2: Gui as Jeova nae gaegue y satbasion : ya y taotaomo nae gaegue y bendisonmo . Sila .

text: Hear me when I call , O God of my righteousness : thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress ; have mercy upon me , and hear my prayer .
text2: ANAE juagangjao , opeyo , O Yuus y tininasso : anae chatsagayo jago munadangculoyo : maase nu guajo ya jungog y tinaetaejo .

text: O ye sons of men , how long will ye turn my glory into shame ? how long will ye love vanity , and seek after leasing ? Selah .
text2: Jamyo , famaguon taotao , asta ñgaean nae innanalo y onraco gui minamajlao ? Asta ñgaean yanmiyo y banida ya inaliligao y dinague ? Sila .

text: But know that the LORD hath set apart him that is godly for himself : the LORD will hear when I call unto him .
text2: Tingoja , na si Jeova japolo apatte y deboto para güiya namaesa : si Jeova jajungog yo , anae juagang güe .

text: Stand in awe , and sin not : commune with your own heart upon your bed , and be still . Selah .
text2: Fangalamten ya chatmiyo faniisao : fanmanjaso nu y corasonmiyo gui jilo camanmiyo , ya famacaca . Sila .

text: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness , and put your trust in the LORD .
text2: Nae y tunas na inefresen ya angoco si Jeova .

text: There be many that say , Who will shew us any good ? LORD , lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us .
text2: Megae umaalog : Jaye ufanuejit jafa minauleg ? Jatsa gui jilonmame , O Jeova , y minalag y matamo .

text: Thou hast put gladness in my heart , more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased .
text2: Jago numae minagof y corasonjo , megaeña qui uguaja sija anae umemegae y maeisñija yan y binoñija .

text: I will both lay me down in peace , and sleep : for thou , LORD , only makest me dwell in safety .
text2: Ya y pas nae umason yo ya taegüijeja maegoyo : sa jagoja Jeova , unnasagayo seguro .

text: Give ear to my words , O LORD , consider my meditation .
text2: JUNGOG , O Jeova , y sinanganjo , ecungog y jinasoco .

text: Hearken unto the voice of my cry , my King , and my God : for unto thee will I pray .
text2: Ecungog y vos y inagangjo , Ray jo , yan Yuusso : sa jago jutaetaetaye .

text: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning , O LORD ; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee , and will look up .
text2: O Jeova , y egaan unjungog y vosso ; y egaan juguaguato y tinaetaejo guiya jago , ya jubébela .

text: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness : neither shall evil dwell with thee .
text2: Sa ti jago na Yuus ni y gumaeya y tinaelaye : y taelaye ti usaga guiya jago .

text: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight : thou hatest all workers of iniquity .
text2: Ti manasaga y mangaduco gui menan matamo : ya ti yamo todo y fumatitinas y taelaye .

text: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing : the LORD will abhor the bloody and deceitful man .
text2: Jago yumulang y manguecuentos mandague : ya y taotao cajâgâ yan y dinague , si Jeova jaguefchatlie .

text: But as for me , I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy : and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple .
text2: Ya guajoja , yan y megagae y minaasemo , bae jalom gui guimamo : ya juadora anae juatan y santo templomo ni y ninamaañaomo .

text: Lead me , O LORD , in thy righteousness because of mine enemies ; make thy way straight before my face .
text2: O Jeova , esgaejonyo gui tininasmo , pot causa ya enimigujo ; natunas gui menajo y chalanmo .

text: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth ; their inward part is very wickedness ; their throat is an open sepulchre ; they flatter with their tongue .
text2: Sa taya finitme gui pachotñija ; ya sanjalomñija senmanaelaye : naftan mababa y agagañija ; yan y jilañija finande :

text: Destroy thou them , O God ; let them fall by their own counsels ; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions ; for they have rebelled against thee .
text2: Condena sija , O Yuus , polo y ufamodong pot y pinagatñija : gui minegae y isaoñija nasuja sija sa managuaguat contra jago .

text: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice : let them ever shout for joy , because thou defendest them : let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee .
text2: Nafanmagof todos y umangngocojao , polo para taejinecog ya ufanagang pot y minagofñija sa undefiende sija , polo ya ufanmagof ni jago , y gumaeya y naanmo .

text: For thou , LORD , wilt bless the righteous ; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield .
text2: Sa jago bumendise y manunas ; O Jeova , parejoja yan un patang unpolo gui oriyaña y finaborese .

text: O LORD , rebuke me not in thine anger , neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure .
text2: JEOVA chamoyo lumalalatde ni y binibumo : chamoyo cumastitiga nu y dangculo na linalalomo .

text: Have mercy upon me , O LORD ; for I am weak : O LORD , heal me ; for my bones are vexed .
text2: Gaease nu guajo , O Jeova , sa estagüe yo namasogsog : amte yo , O Jeova , sa y tolangjo esta mananatchatsaga .

text: My soul is also sore vexed : but thou , O LORD , how long ?
text2: Ya y antijo esta senchatsaga : Ya jago , O Jeova , asta ngaean ?

text: Return , O LORD , deliver my soul : oh save me for thy mercies ' sake .
text2: Nanalo , O Jeova , nalibre y antijo : satbayo pot causa y minaasemo .

text: For in death there is no remembrance of thee : in the grave who shall give thee thanks ?
text2: Sa y finatae nae taya jinaso guiya jago : ya y naftan nae jaye numannae jao grasias ?

text: I am weary with my groaning ; all the night make I my bed to swim ; I water my couch with my tears .
text2: Yayasyo nu y todo y siningonjo : todo y puenge junamamaya y camajo ni lagojo : junafotgon y catreco nu y lagojo .

text: Mine eye is consumed because of grief ; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies .
text2: Y atadogjo esta magasta nu y pinite : ninafanbijo pot todo ayo y munachachatsaga yo .

text: Depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity ; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping .
text2: Nafanjanao guiya guajo todo ayo y fumatitinas y taelaye : sa si Jeova jajungog y vos y casaojo .

text: The LORD hath heard my supplication ; the LORD will receive my prayer .
text2: Si Jeova jajungog y guinagaojo : si Jeova uresibe y tinaetaejo .

text: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed : let them return and be ashamed suddenly .
text2: Manmamajlao ya ninafañatsaga megae , todo y enimigujo : sija manalo , sija manmamajlao gusise .

text: O Lord my God , in thee do I put my trust : save me from all them that persecute me , and deliver me :
text2: O Jeova , Yuusso , yya jago nae gaegue y inangococo : Satbayo todo gui pumetsisigue yo , ya nalibre yo .

text: Lest he tear my soul like a lion , rending it in pieces , while there is none to deliver .
text2: Para chaña pumedasitos y antijo taegüije y leon , ni jayulang , anae taya jaye uninalibre .

text: O LORD my God , if I have done this ; if there be iniquity in my hands ;
text2: O Jeova , Yuusso , yaguin jufatinas este : yaguin guaja gui canaejo taelaye ;

text: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me ; ( yea , I have delivered him that without cause is mine enemy : )
text2: Yan juapase taelaye y sumaga guiya guajo yan pas , ( magajet na junalibre y pumetsisigue yo pot taya causa : )

text: Let the enemy persecute my soul , and take it ; yea , let him tread down my life upon the earth , and lay mine honour in the dust . Selah .
text2: Japetsisigue y enimigujo y antijo , ya jachule ; magajet , na jagacha gui tano y jaanijo : ya y onraco japolo gui eda . Sila .

text: Arise , O LORD , in thine anger , lift up thyself because of the rage of mine enemies : and awake for me to the judgment that thou hast commanded .
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova , yan y linalalomo ; jatsa namaesa contra y binibon y munachachatsagayo : ya magmata pot guajo untago y sentensia .

text: So shall the congregation of the people compass thee about : for their sakes therefore return thou on high .
text2: Polo ya y inetnon taotao unineriyaye jao : ya gui san jiloñija natalo jao guato gui san jilo .

text: The LORD shall judge the people : judge me , O LORD , according to my righteousness , and according to mine integrity that is in me .
text2: Si Jeova jajusga y taotao : jusgayo , O Jeova , taemanoja y tininasso : taemanoja y minaulegmo ni y gaegue guiya guajo .

text: Oh let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end ; but establish the just : for the righteous God trieth the hearts and reins .
text2: Polo ya ujocog y taelayen manaelaye , lao nafitme y manunas : sa si Yuus , ni tinas , jachachague y corason yan y jinaso gui sanjalom .

text: My defence is of God , which saveth the upright in heart .
text2: Y patangjo gaegue gui as Yuus , güiya munalibre y manunas gui corason .

text: God judgeth the righteous , and God is angry with the wicked every day .
text2: Si Yuus y tinas na jues : magajet na si Yuus lalalalo todo na jaane .

text: If he turn not , he will whet his sword ; he hath bent his bow , and made it ready .
text2: Yaguin y taotao ti jabira güe , güiya janamalagtos y espadaña : janaregla y atcosña ya janalisto .

text: He hath also prepared for him the instruments of death ; he ordaineth his arrows against the persecutors .
text2: Ya jafatinas para güiya y atmas y finatae : janafañila y flechaña .

text: Behold , he travaileth with iniquity , and hath conceived mischief , and brought forth falsehood .
text2: Estagüe na uguaja piniten mañago tinaelaye : magajet na mapotgue y inacacha ya mañago dinague .

text: He made a pit , and digged it , and is fallen into the ditch which he made .
text2: Jaguadog y tipo , ya janatadong : ya esta podong gui joyo na y finatinasñaja .

text: His mischief shall return upon his own head , and his violent dealing shall come down upon his own pate .
text2: Polo ya y inacachaña ubira güi jilo y iluña : ya y binibuña upodong gui jilo cácagongña .

text: I will praise the LORD according to his righteousness : and will sing praise to the name of the LORD most high .
text2: Bae junae si Jeova gracias taemanoja y tininasña : ya jucantaye ni y tinina y naan Jeova Gueftaquilo .

text: O LORD our Lord , how excellent is thy name in all the earth ! who hast set thy glory above the heavens .
text2: O Jeova , Señotmame , jafa muna mauleg y naanmo gui todo y tano : ni y unpolo y minalagmo gui jilo y langet .

text: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies , that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger .
text2: Guinin pachot y mandiquique yan y mañususo nae unpolo y minetgot ? Pot y enimigumo sija : sa para unnasuja y enimigo yan y umeemog .

text: When I consider thy heavens , the work of thy fingers , the moon and the stars , which thou hast ordained ;
text2: Anae julie y langetmo , ni y checho y calolotmo , y pilan yan y pution , ni jago pumolo ;

text: What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? and the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Jaye y taotao , para uguaja guiya güiya jinaso ? yan lajin taotao para ubinesita güe .

text: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels , and hast crowned him with glory and honour .
text2: Sa unfatinas didide diquiqueña qui y angjeles , ya uncorona güe ni y minalag yan inenra .

text: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands ; thou hast put all things under his feet :
text2: Unnafanmagas todo ni checho y canaemo : todo unpolo gui papa y adengña .

text: All sheep and oxen , yea , and the beasts of the field ;
text2: Y quinilo yan y nobiyo todo ayo : taegüenaoja y gâgâ ni gaegue gui fangualuan .

text: The fowl of the air , and the fish of the sea , and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas .
text2: Y pajaro gui langet , yan y güijan gui tase : ya jafaja ni manmalolofan gui chalan y tase .

text: O LORD our Lord , how excellent is thy name in all the earth !
text2: O Jeova , Señotmame : jafa muna mauleg y naanmo gui todo y tano .

text: I will praise thee , O LORD , with my whole heart ; I will shew forth all thy marvellous works .
text2: BAE junae grasias si Jeova contodo y corasonjo : bae jufanue todo ni ninamanman na chechomo .

text: I will be glad and rejoice in thee : I will sing praise to thy name , O thou most High .
text2: Bae jumagof , ya unnasenmagofyo guiya jago : jucantaye ni y tinina y naanmo O jago Gueftaquilo .

text: When mine enemies are turned back , they shall fall and perish at thy presence .
text2: Anae y enimiguja unnabira sija tate : manbasnag , ya manmalingo gui menamo .

text: For thou hast maintained my right and my cause ; thou satest in the throne judging right .
text2: Sa jago fumatinas y jinasoco yan y causaco : unfatachong gui trono , ya unjusga y tinas .

text: Thou hast rebuked the heathen , thou hast destroyed the wicked , thou hast put out their name for ever and ever .
text2: Guinin unlalatde y nasion sija , guinin unyulang y manaelaye , guinin unfunas y naanñija para siempre taejinecog .

text: O thou enemy , destructions are come to a perpetual end : and thou hast destroyed cities ; their memorial is perished with them .
text2: Esta malachae y enimigo ; esta mayulang para siempre : yan y siuda ni y inyilang , y jinasoñija manachamalingo yan sija .

text: But the LORD shall endure for ever : he hath prepared his throne for judgment .
text2: Ya si Jeova sumaga calang ray para siempre , ya janalisto y tronuña para usentensia .

text: And he shall judge the world in righteousness , he shall minister judgment to the people in uprightness .
text2: Ya güiya jumusga y tano ni tininas , ujajusga y taotao sija yan y minagajet .

text: The LORD also will be a refuge for the oppressed , a refuge in times of trouble .
text2: Ya si Jeova locue y taquilo na tore para y manmachiguit , y taquilo na tore gui tiempon chinatsaga .

text: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee : for thou , LORD , hast not forsaken them that seek thee .
text2: Ya jaangoco sija guiya jago y tumungo y naanmo ; sa jago , Jeova , ti unyute ayo y umaliligao jao .

text: Sing praises to the LORD , which dwelleth in Zion : declare among the people his doings .
text2: Cantaye si Jeova ni y tinina ni sumasaga gui Sion : namatungo gui entalo taotao sija y checoña .

text: When he maketh inquisition for blood , he remembereth them : he forgetteth not the cry of the humble .
text2: Sa anae jacocobla y jâgâ jajaso sija : ya ti malefa ni inagang y mamoble .

text: Have mercy upon me , O LORD ; consider my trouble which I suffer of them that hate me , thou that liftest me up from the gates of death :
text2: Gaease nu guajo , O Jeova ; atan y pinitejo ni jususungonja y chumatlie yo , jago y munacajulo yo gui pettan finatae :

text: That I may shew forth all thy praise in the gates of the daughter of Zion : I will rejoice in thy salvation .
text2: Para jufamanue todo ni y tininamo gui trangcan y jagan Sion : ya umagof yo gui satbasionmo .

text: The heathen are sunk down in the pit that they made : in the net which they hid is their own foot taken .
text2: Unnafanmafondo y nasion gui joyo ni y finatinasñija : ya y casiyas nae ni janaaatog , y patasñija esta mangodon .

text: The LORD is known by the judgment which he executeth : the wicked is snared in the work of his own hands . Higgaion . Selah .
text2: Si Jeova janamatungo güe ni y sentensia ni jafatinas ; ya jalaso y taelaye ni y checho y canaena : Jinaso . Sila .

text: The wicked shall be turned into hell , and all the nations that forget God .
text2: Ufanmanalo guato y manaelaye gui sasalaguan : yan todo y taotao ni manmalefa as Yuus .

text: For the needy shall not alway be forgotten : the expectation of the poor shall not perish for ever .
text2: Sa ti para siempre umamalefanñaejon y nesesitao : ni y ninanggan y mamoble ufanmalingo para siempre .

text: Arise , O LORD ; let not man prevail : let the heathen be judged in thy sight .
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova : chamo munamametgot y taotao : ya ufanmajusga y nasion gui menamo .

text: Put them in fear , O LORD : that the nations may know themselves to be but men . Selah .
text2: Polo , O Jeova , y minaañao guiya sija : polo ya utungo y nasion na sija taotaoja .

text: Why standest thou afar off , O LORD ? why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble ?
text2: JAFA na tumojgue jao na chago , O Jeova ? jafa na umatogjao gui tiempon chinatsaga .

text: The wicked in his pride doth persecute the poor : let them be taken in the devices that they have imagined .
text2: Sa pot sobetbia y taelaye na japetsisigue y pebble ; ufanmachule gui finababa y manmajajaso .

text: For the wicked boasteth of his heart ' s desire , and blesseth the covetous , whom the LORD abhorreth .
text2: Sa enao mina jatunanmaesagüe y taelaye , ni y minalago y antiña : ya y manlagga jarechasa ; junggan , jadespresia si Jeova .

text: The wicked , through the pride of his countenance , will not seek after God : God is not in all his thoughts .
text2: jasangan : Taya Yuus .

text: His ways are always grievous ; thy judgments are far above out of his sight : as for all his enemies , he puffeth at them .
text2: Y chalanña chatsaga todo y tiempo ; y juisiomo goschago gui linieña : ya todo y enimiguña , güiya jaguaefe sija .

text: He hath said in his heart , I shall not be moved : for I shall never be in adversity .
text2: Ilegña gui corasonña : Ti jucalamten : gui todo y generasion sija , ti jufalag y chinatsaga .

text: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and fraud : under his tongue is mischief and vanity .
text2: Y matdision bula y pachotña yan dinague yan chiniguit : y papa y jilaña inacacha yan tinaelaye .

text: He sitteth in the lurking places of the villages : in the secret places doth he murder the innocent : his eyes are privily set against the poor .
text2: Gaegue matatachong y lugat ti matungo gui sengsong : ya y umatog na lugat japupuno y taeisao : y atadogña manaatanja contra y pebble .

text: He lieth in wait secretly as a lion in his den : he lieth in wait to catch the poor : he doth catch the poor , when he draweth him into his net .
text2: Jananangga gui lugat ti matungo , taegüije y leon gui liyangña : jananangga para ucone y pebble : jacone y pebble anae jayotte ni y lasoña .

text: He croucheth , and humbleth himself , that the poor may fall by his strong ones .
text2: Jacojajatgüe , janatunog , megae na manaeninasiña mamodong gui gaesisiña na iyoña .

text: He hath said in his heart , God hath forgotten : he hideth his face ; he will never see it .
text2: Ylegña gui corasonña : Si Yuus esta malefa : janaatog y mataña ; taya nae jalie .

text: Arise , O LORD ; O God , lift up thine hand : forget not the humble .
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova ; O Yuus , jatsa y canaemo : chamo malelefa ni y mamoble .

text: Wherefore doth the wicked contemn God ? he hath said in his heart , Thou wilt not require it .
text2: Pot jafa jadespresia y taelaye si Yuus ; ya ilegña gui corasonño : Jago ti ugagao .

text: Thou hast seen it ; for thou beholdest mischief and spite , to requite it with thy hand : the poor committeth himself unto thee ; thou art the helper of the fatherless .
text2: Jago lumie : sa jago umatan y inacacha yan y minattrata , para uchule gui canaemo : yya jago nae mandaña y mamoble : y manaesaena , jago umayuyuda .

text: Break thou the arm of the wicked and the evil man : seek out his wickedness till thou find none .
text2: Yulang y canae y manaelaye : ya ayo y taelaye , aliligao jao y tinailayeña asta qui ti unsoda .

text: The LORD is King for ever and ever : the heathen are perished out of his land .
text2: Si Jeova Ray na para taejinecog yan taejinecog : ya y nasion esta manmalachae gui tanoña .

text: LORD , thou hast heard the desire of the humble : thou wilt prepare their heart , thou wilt cause thine ear to hear :
text2: Y minalago y manumitde jago jumungog , O Jeova : jago dumespopone y corasonñija , ungueguesecungog ni y talangamo :

text: To judge the fatherless and the oppressed , that the man of the earth may no more oppress .
text2: Para unjusga y manaesaena yan y mamoble : para chamo tumatalo munamaañao y taotao gui tano .

text: In the LORD put I my trust : How say ye to my soul , Flee as a bird to your mountain ?
text2: AS Jeova nae juangocoyo : jafa na ilegmo ni antijo : Gupo gui egsomo calang pajaro ?

text: For , lo , the wicked bend their bow , they make ready their arrow upon the string , that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart .
text2: Sa , estagüe , y manaelaye na jaaregla y atcos : jafamauleg y flecha gui taliña para uflecha gui jinemjom y manunas na corason .

text: If the foundations be destroyed , what can the righteous do ?
text2: Yaguin y plinanta sija esta mayulang : jafa siña y manunas ujafatinas .

text: The LORD is in his holy temple , the LORD ' s throne is in heaven : his eyes behold , his eyelids try , the children of men .
text2: Si Jeova gaegue gui santos na temploña ; si Jeova , y tronuña gaegue gui langet ; y atadogña manlilie yan y babaliña jachachague y famaguon y taotao .

text: The LORD trieth the righteous : but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth .
text2: Si Jeova jachachague y manunas : lao y manaelaye , ya y gumaeya mandague , y antiña chumatlie .

text: Upon the wicked he shall rain snares , fire and brimstone , and an horrible tempest : this shall be the portion of their cup .
text2: Uuchan y casiyas gui jilo y manaelaye : guafe yan asufre ya y manglo na mañila y patteña gui basuña .

text: For the righteous LORD loveth righteousness ; his countenance doth behold the upright .
text2: Sa y tinas Jeova ; yaña y tinas : ya jaatan y manunas y mataña .

text: Help , LORD ; for the godly man ceaseth ; for the faithful fail from among the children of men .
text2: AYUDA , O Jeova , sa jocog mandeboto : sa jocog y manmauleg gui entalo y famaguon taotao .

text: They speak vanity every one with his neighbour : with flattering lips and with a double heart do they speak .
text2: Masasangang taebale cada uno gui tiguangña : yan labios na jaande , yan doble na corason jasasangan .

text: The LORD shall cut off all flattering lips , and the tongue that speaketh proud things :
text2: Si Jeova uutut todo y labios na jaande , yan y jila ni cumuecuentos mandangculo :

text: Who have said , With our tongue will we prevail ; our lips are our own : who is lord over us ?
text2: Ayo na ujaalog : Pot y jilata na utagana ; y labiosta iyota : jaye siña señot gui jilota ?

text: For the oppression of the poor , for the sighing of the needy , now will I arise , saith the LORD ; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him .
text2: Sa y chiniguit y mamoble y an y inigong y mannesesitao : pago bae cajulo , ilegña si Jeova : guajo jupolo güi na seguro , ni y jaguaefeye .

text: The words of the LORD are pure words : as silver tried in a furnace of earth , purified seven times .
text2: Sa y finijo Jeova , gasgas na finijo : calang salape na managasgas gui jotno gui jilo y tano : managasgas siete biaje .

text: Thou shalt keep them , O LORD , thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever .
text2: Jago , O Jeova , ni umadadaje sija , jago umantiene para taejinecog , guine este na generasion .

text: The wicked walk on every side , when the vilest men are exalted .
text2: Jijot gui oriya manjajanao y manaelaye : anae esta nacajulo y tinaelaye gui entalo y famaguon taotao .

text: How long wilt thou forget me , O LORD ? for ever ? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me ?
text2: ASTA ngaean , O Jeova , nae , umalefa jao guajo para taejinecog ? asta ngaean nae unnaatog y matamo guiya guajo .

text: How long shall I take counsel in my soul , having sorrow in my heart daily ? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me ?
text2: Asta ngaean nae jujaso y pinagat gui antijo , anae guaja pinite gui corasonjo todo y jaane ? Asta ngaean nae ufangajulo y enimigujo guiya guajo ?

text: Consider and hear me , O LORD my God : lighten mine eyes , lest I sleep the sleep of death ;
text2: Jaso ya jungogyo , O Jeova , Yuusso : ina y atadogjo sija para mungayo maego gui maego finatae .

text: Lest mine enemy say , I have prevailed against him ; and those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved .
text2: Sa chaña umaalog y enimigujo : Jugana güe : sa chaña y enimigujo fanmamagof yaguin calamtenyo .

text: But I have trusted in thy mercy ; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation .
text2: Lao guajo , y minaasemo nae juangocoyo : ya umagof y corasonjo gui satbasionmo .

text: I will sing unto the LORD , because he hath dealt bountifully with me .
text2: Bae cantaye si Jeova : sa jafatinas y mauleg guiya guajo .

text: The fool hath said in his heart , There is no God . They are corrupt , they have done abominable works , there is none that doeth good .
text2: YLEGÑA y taetiningo gui corasonña : Taya Yuus : sija manpotlilo , jafatinas y chatliion na chocho : taya ni uno ni y fumatitinas y mauleg .

text: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men , to see if there were any that did understand , and seek God .
text2: Si Jeova jaaatan desde y langet y jilo y famaguon taotao , para ulie cao guaja uno malate , yan jaaliligao si Yuus .

text: They are all gone aside , they are all together become filthy : there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Todos manlache ; manjuyong potlilo todo ; taya jaye fumatitinas y mauleg , taya ni uno .

text: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge ? who eat up my people as they eat bread , and call not upon the LORD .
text2: Ada ti jatungo todo y fumatitinas y taelaye ? ni y jacacano y taotaojo , taegüije y chumochocho pan ? ya si Jeova ti jaaagang .

text: There were they in great fear : for God is in the generation of the righteous .
text2: Ayo nae manlaolao ni minaañao : sa si Yuus gaegue gui rasan y manunas .

text: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor , because the LORD is his refuge .
text2: Ya y pinagat y pebble innamamajlao , sa si Jeova guinegüeña .

text: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion ! when the LORD bringeth back the captivity of his people , Jacob shall rejoice , and Israel shall be glad .
text2: Malago , y satbasion Israel mato guinin Sion ! Anae jatalo si Jeova quinautiba y taotaoña , ayo nae magof si Jacob yan magof Israel .

text: LORD , who shall abide in thy tabernacle ? who shall dwell in thy holy hill ?
text2: JEOVA , jaye usaga gue tabernaculumo ? jaye usaga gui santos na ogsomo .

text: He that walketh uprightly , and worketh righteousness , and speaketh the truth in his heart .
text2: Y jumanao gui minauleg , ya y fumatitinas y tininas , yan y cumuecuentos magajet gui jalom corasonña .

text: He that backbiteth not with his tongue , nor doeth evil to his neighbour , nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour .
text2: Y ti fafajiyunge ni jilaña , ni ti jafatitinas taelaye gui amiguña , ni usigue sumangan y minamajlao contra y tiguangña .

text: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned ; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD . He that sweareth to his own hurt , and changeth not .
text2: Gui atadogña ninadespresiao ni y taotao áplacha , lao y maañao as Jeova jaonra : y manjula para dañoña namaesa ya ti jatolaeca .

text: He that putteth not out his money to usury , nor taketh reward against the innocent . He that doeth these things shall never be moved .
text2: Y salapeña ti mannanae para ufangana , ni uchule y apas contra y taeisao : ya y fumatinas estesija ti siña cumalamten .

text: Preserve me , O God : for in thee do I put my trust .
text2: ADAJE yo , O Yuus : sa iya jago nae gaegue y inangococo .

text: O my soul , thou hast said unto the LORD , Thou art my Lord : my goodness extendeth not to thee ;
text2: Ylegmo , O antijo , as Jeova : jago Señotto : taya minaulegco yaguin taegüe guiya jago .

text: But to the saints that are in the earth , and to the excellent , in whom is all my delight .
text2: Ya y mañantos ni mangaegue gui tano , sija manmagas ya todo y minalagojo gaegue guiya sija .

text: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god : their drink offerings of blood will I not offer , nor take up their names into my lips .
text2: Mumegae y piniteñija ni tumolaeca si Jeova pot otro Yuus : ti juofrese ni y inefreseñija na jâgâ , ni juchule y naanñija gui labiosso .

text: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup : thou maintainest my lot .
text2: Si Jeova y patten ni y ineredajo , yan y basujo : jago mumantietiene y fottunajo .

text: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places ; yea , I have a goodly heritage .
text2: Ya , y fottunajo upodong gui lugat na magof : magajet na bonito na ineredajo .

text: I will bless the LORD , who hath given me counsel : my reins also instruct me in the night seasons .
text2: Jubendise si Jeova , ni y japagat yo : ya an puenge nae jafananagüe yo y jinasoco gui san jalomjo .

text: I have set the LORD always before me : because he is at my right hand , I shall not be moved .
text2: Si Jeova jupolo gui menajo para siempre : sa yaguin gaegue güe gui agapajo , ti siña yo manacalamten .

text: Therefore my heart is glad , and my glory rejoiceth : my flesh also shall rest in hope .
text2: Enao mina magof y corasonjo ya magof y inenrajo : locue y catneco sumaga seguro .

text: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell ; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Sa ti undingo y antijo gui naftan : ni unnae y santosmo para ulie y minitong .

text: Thou wilt shew me the path of life : in thy presence is fulness of joy ; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore .
text2: Unnatungoyo ni y chalan y linâlâ : binilan minagof y gaegue gui menamo : ya y agapa na canaemo guaja minagof para siempre .

text: Hear the right , O LORD , attend unto my cry , give ear unto my prayer , that goeth not out of feigned lips .
text2: JUNGOG , O Jeova , y taotao tunas : atituye y casaojo ; guefecungog y tinaetaejo , na ti jumajanao gui labios dinagüe .

text: Let my sentence come forth from thy presence ; let thine eyes behold the things that are equal .
text2: Polo y menamo nae ya ujuyong y sentensiajo : lie ni y atadogmo y tininas .

text: Thou has proved mine heart ; thou hast visited me in the night ; thou has tried me , and shalt find nothing ; I am purposed that my mouth shall not transgress .
text2: Jago guinin chumague y corasonjo ; guinin unbisitayo gui puenge ; guinin unchagueyo ya taya sinedamo : y jinasoco na ti manisagüe y pachotto .

text: Concerning the works of men , by the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer .
text2: Para y finatinas y taotao , pot y finijo ni guinin y labiosmo , jumantiene yo gui san juyong y chalan ni y manyuyulang .

text: Hold up my goings in thy paths , that my footsteps slip not .
text2: Y pinecatto guiniut gui chalanmo , ya y adengjo ti susulong .

text: I have called upon thee , for thou wilt hear me , O God : incline thine ear unto me , and hear my speech .
text2: Jagasja juagang jao , sa jago unope yo , O Yuus : naegueng guiya guajo y talangamo , ya jungog y sinanganjo .

text: Shew thy marvellous lovingkindness , O thou that savest by thy right hand them which put their trust in thee from those that rise up against them .
text2: Fanue ni y minaasemo ni namanman , jago na unnalibre y umangoco sija guiya jago , guinin y ayosija ni mangajulo contra y agapa na canaemo .

text: Keep me as the apple of the eye , hide me under the shadow of thy wings ,
text2: Adaje yo , taegüije y atilong y niñon mata , naatog yo gui papa y anineng papamo ,

text: From the wicked that oppress me , from my deadly enemies , who compass me about .
text2: Y menan y manaelaye ni y jumojoño yo : y gostaelaye y enimigujo ni majijujute yo .

text: They are inclosed in their own fat : with their mouth they speak proudly .
text2: Manmaafuyot ni y linedoñija : ya y pachotñija cumuecuentos sobetbio .

text: They have now compassed us in our steps : they have set their eyes bowing down to the earth ;
text2: Y pinecatmame nae maoriyayejam pago : japolo y atadogñija para ujayutejam gui tano .

text: Like as a lion that is greedy of his prey , and as it were a young lion lurking in secret places .
text2: Taegüije y león ni y gosmalago ni y naña : ya y león diquique ni y gaegue gui saga na umaalog .

text: Arise , O LORD , disappoint him , cast him down : deliver my soul from the wicked , which is thy sword :
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova , polo jao gui menaña , yute papa : libre y antijo gui manaelaye nu y espadamo .

text: From men which are thy hand , O LORD , from men of the world , which have their portion in this life , and whose belly thou fillest with thy hid treasure : they are full of children , and leave the rest of their substance to their babes .
text2: Gui taotao sija nu y canaemo , O Jeova , gui taotao ni y iyon tano , ayo na güinajaña gaegue gui estisija na jaane : ayo y tiyanña unabula nu y tesorumo : sija manjaspog y famaguon , ya polo y sebla y güinaja gui mandiquique na patgonñija .

text: As for me , I will behold thy face in righteousness : I shall be satisfied , when I awake , with thy likeness .
text2: Guajo , yan y tininas julie y matamo : najong yo anae magmata yo gui pinarejumo .

text: I will love thee , O LORD , my strength .
text2: JUGUAEYAJAO , O Jeova , y minetgotto .

text: The LORD is my rock , and my fortress , and my deliverer ; my God , my strength , in whom I will trust ; my buckler , and the horn of my salvation , and my high tower .
text2: Si Jeova y achojo , y castiyujo , yan y nanalibrijo : Yuusso , metgot y achojo , juangoco yo guiya güiya ; patangjo yan y cánggilon y satbasionjo , y leca na torijo .

text: I will call upon the LORD , who is worthy to be praised : so shall I be saved from mine enemies .
text2: Bae juagang si Jeova , ni combiene na mannae todo ni y alabansa : taegüije bae julibre gui enimigujo .

text: The sorrows of death compassed me , and the floods of ungodly men made me afraid .
text2: Mato guiya guajo y piniten finatae , ya y minilalag y tinaelaye janamaañaoyo .

text: The sorrows of hell compassed me about : the snares of death prevented me .
text2: Y piniten naftan gaegue gui oriyajo , y lason finatae mato guiya guajo .

text: In my distress I called upon the LORD , and cried unto my God : he heard my voice out of his temple , and my cry came before him , even into his ears .
text2: Y chinatsagaco nae juagang si Jeova , ya juagang y Yuusso : güiya jajungog gui temploña y vosso , ya y inagangjo gui menaña , jumalom y talangaña .

text: Then the earth shook and trembled ; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken , because he was wroth .
text2: Ayo nae y tano calamten ya mayengyong , ya y simiento sija y egso manmanyengyong yan mangalamten , sa güiya lalalo .

text: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils , and fire out of his mouth devoured : coals were kindled by it .
text2: Cajulo aso gui güiingña , ya guinin pachotña guafe manonggue y pinigan mañila pot este .

text: He bowed the heavens also , and came down : and darkness was under his feet .
text2: Y janamangag y langet ya tumunog : ya teog na jinemjom gaegue gui sampapa y adengña .

text: And he rode upon a cherub , and did fly : yea , he did fly upon the wings of the wind .
text2: Ya maudae güe gui jilo un querubin , ya gumupo güe ; magajet na gumupo güe gui jilo y papan y manglo .

text: He made darkness his secret place ; his pavilion round about him were dark waters and thick clouds of the skies .
text2: Japolo jinemjom para fanatuganña ; para y tabernaculuña gui oriyaña ; jinemjom y janom , teog na mapagajes guinin y langet .

text: At the brightness that was before him his thick clouds passed , hail stones and coals of fire .
text2: Pot y minalag gui menaña y teog na mapagajesña malofan : graniso yan pinigan guafe .

text: The LORD also thundered in the heavens , and the Highest gave his voice ; hail stones and coals of fire .
text2: Jajulo locue si Jeova gui langet , ya y Gueftaquilo jasangan ni y inagangña : graniso yan pinigan guafe .

text: Yea , he sent out his arrows , and scattered them ; and he shot out lightnings , and discomfited them .
text2: Ya jatago y flechaña ya manchinalapon : ya magajet , megae na lamlam ya manyinilang .

text: Then the channels of waters were seen , and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke , O LORD , at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils .
text2: Ayonae esta malie y tinadong y janom , ya janamababa y simiento y tano sija pot y linalatdemo , O Jeova , pot y güinaefen y jinagong gui güiingmo .

text: He sent from above , he took me , he drew me out of many waters .
text2: Jatago desde sanjilo , jachuleyo ; ya jaatoyo guinin y megae na janom .

text: He delivered me from my strong enemy , and from them which hated me : for they were too strong for me .
text2: Janalibrego gui manmetgot na enimigujo , yan y chumatliéyo , sa sija mas manmetgot qui guajo .

text: They prevented me in the day of my calamity : but the LORD was my stay .
text2: Sija manmato guiya guajo gui un jaanen y chinatsagaco : lao si Jeova , güiya y fanapojo .

text: He brought me forth also into a large place ; he delivered me , because he delighted in me .
text2: Ya jachuleyo locue gui anae ancho na lugat : janalibreyo sa ninamagof ni guajo .

text: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness ; according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me .
text2: Si Jeova jaapaseyo taemanoja y y tininasso : taemanoja y guinasgas y canaejo unaeyo .

text: For I have kept the ways of the LORD , and have not wickedly departed from my God .
text2: Sa juadaje y chalan Jeova : ya ti taelaye yo na juapattayo gui as Yuusso .

text: For all his judgments were before me , and I did not put away his statutes from me .
text2: Sa todo y jinasoña mangaegue gui menajo : ya ti junajanao guiya guajo y tinagoña .

text: I was also upright before him , and I kept myself from mine iniquity .
text2: Ya guajo cabales guiya güiya : ya juadaje yo guinin y tinaelayeco .

text: Therefore hath the LORD recompensed me according to my righteousness , according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight .
text2: Pot este jaapaseyo si Jeova taemanoja y tininasso : taemanoja y guinasgas y canaejo gui menan atadogña .

text: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful ; with an upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright ;
text2: Ya y gaemaase unfanue na gaemaasejao : ya y taotao ni y cabales , unfanue na cabales jao .

text: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure ; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself froward .
text2: Ya y gasgas unfanue na gasgasjao : ya y camten unfanue na camtenjao .

text: For thou wilt save the afflicted people ; but wilt bring down high looks .
text2: Sa jago munalibre y mangaepinite na taotao ; ya y sobetbio na atadog jago munatunog .

text: For thou wilt light my candle : the LORD my God will enlighten my darkness .
text2: Sa jago munamalag y candetto : si Jeova , Yuusso , namanana y jemjom guiya guajo .

text: For by thee I have run through a troop ; and by my God have I leaped over a wall .
text2: Sa pot jago na jufalagüe y inetnon sendalo : ya pot y Yuusso jugope y quelat .

text: As for God , his way is perfect : the word of the LORD is tried : he is a buckler to all those that trust in him .
text2: Ya si Yuus , cabales y chalanña : y fino Jeova esta machague : patang güe para todo y numanangga güe .

text: For who is God save the LORD ? or who is a rock save our God ?
text2: Jaye si Yuus yaguin ti si Jeova güe ? ya jaye y acho , jaguin ti si Yuusta ?

text: It is God that girdeth me with strength , and maketh my way perfect .
text2: Si Yuus jagogode yo ni y minetgot : ya jafatitinas cabales y chalanjo ?

text: He maketh my feet like hinds ' feet , and setteth me upon my high places .
text2: Jafatitinas y adengjo taegüije y adeng y benado : ya janasagayo gui taquilo na sagajo sija .

text: He teacheth my hands to war , so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms .
text2: Jafanagüe y canaejo para y guera : ya enaomina y canaejo judobla y atcas bronse .

text: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation : and thy right hand hath holden me up , and thy gentleness hath made me great .
text2: Ya unnaeyo locue ni y patang gui satbasionmo : ya y agapa na canaemo mumantietieneyo ; ya y minansomo munamegaeyo .

text: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me , that my feet did not slip .
text2: Unnadangculo y pinecatto gui papajo ; ya y adengjo ti usulong .

text: I have pursued mine enemies , and overtaken them : neither did I turn again till they were consumed .
text2: Judulalag y enimigujo sija , ya jugâchâ : ya ti jubirago talo asta que jocog .

text: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise : they are fallen under my feet .
text2: Junafanmañetnot , ya ti siña mangajulo : mamodong sija gui papa adengjo .

text: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle : thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me .
text2: Sa guinin ungode yo ni y minetgot para y guera : unnafanecon y enimigujo gui papajo .

text: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies ; that I might destroy them that hate me .
text2: Guinin unfatinas ni y enimigujo na unaeyo ni y tataloñija , para juyulang y chumatliiyo .

text: They cried , but there was none to save them : even unto the LORD , but he answered them not .
text2: manaagangesi Jeova ya ti manjiningog .

text: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind : I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets .
text2: Ayonae juguleg sija taegüije y petbos gui menan y manglo ; taegüije y fache gui chalan ni y manmachalapon .

text: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people ; and thou hast made me the head of the heathen : a people whom I have not known shall serve me .
text2: Guinin unnalibre yo gui y inaguaguat y taotao : guinin unadaje yo para jumagas gui nasion sija : y taotao sija ni ti jutungo ujasesetbeyo .

text: As soon as they hear of me , they shall obey me : the strangers shall submit themselves unto me .
text2: Ya anae jajungog guiya guajo ujaosgueyo : ya y taotao juyong ujaosgueyo ni y dinague .

text: The strangers shall fade away , and be afraid out of their close places .
text2: Ya taotao juyong manlinachae ya manmamamaela ya manlalaolao guinin manmapongle .

text: The LORD liveth ; and blessed be my rock ; and let the God of my salvation be exalted .
text2: Lâlâ si Jeova ; ya ubendito y achojo : ya umanataquilo na Yuus y satbasionjo .

text: It is God that avengeth me , and subdueth the people under me .
text2: Si Yuus ni y numae yo y inemog , ya jasujeta y taotao gui papajo .

text: He delivereth me from mine enemies : yea , thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me : thou hast delivered me from the violent man .
text2: Janalibre yo gui enimigujo : magajet na unnasanjiloyo gui ayo sija y mangajulo contra guajo : ya janalibre yo gui taotao ni y matatnga .

text: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee , O LORD , among the heathen , and sing praises unto thy name .
text2: Pot este junae jao grasias gui entalo y nasion sija , O Jeova ; ya jucanta y alabansa para y naanmo .

text: Great deliverance giveth he to his king ; and sheweth mercy to his anointed , to David , and to his seed for evermore .
text2: Dangculo na linibre janae y rayña ; ya jafanue minaase ni y pinalaeña ; as David ya y semiyaña para taejinecog .

text: The heavens declare the glory of God ; and the firmament sheweth his handywork .
text2: Y langet munaclaro y minalag Yuus ; ya y fineda mamanue y checho canaeña .

text: Day unto day uttereth speech , and night unto night sheweth knowledge .
text2: Y un jaane yan y otro jaane masangang y finijo , ya y un puenge ya y otro puenge mamanue tiningo .

text: There is no speech nor language , where their voice is not heard .
text2: Taya sinangan , ni finijo ; ti siña umajungog y vosñija .

text: Their line is gone out through all the earth , and their words to the end of the world . In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun ,
text2: Ya gui todo y tano jumanao y rayaña , ya asta uttimon y tano y finoña : ya japolo tabernaculo para atdao guiya sija .

text: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber , and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race .
text2: Ya güiya taegüije y nobio ni jumujuyong guinin y cuattoña , ya jamagof taegüije y matatnga na taotao , para ufalago gui finalago .

text: His going forth is from the end of the heaven , and his circuit unto the ends of it : and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof .
text2: Y jinanaoña guinin un punta gui langet , ya y linilicoña asta y uttimoña : ya taya jaye uatog ni y minaepeña .

text: The law of the LORD is perfect , converting the soul : the testimony of the LORD is sure , making wise the simple .
text2: Y lay Jeova cabales , jafamauleg y ante ; y testimonion Jeova seguro , janafanmalalate y manaeisao .

text: The statutes of the LORD are right , rejoicing the heart : the commandment of the LORD is pure , enlightening the eyes .
text2: Y finañagüe Jeova tunas , janafanmamagof y corason : y tinago Jeova claro , janafanmalag y atadogsija .

text: The fear of the LORD is clean , enduring for ever : the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether .
text2: Y minaañao as Jeova gasgas , sumaga para taejinecog ; y sentensian Jeova magajet , ya todo tunas .

text: More to be desired are they than gold , yea , than much fine gold : sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb .
text2: Na malago mas que y oro , magajet mas que y megae na oro ni y manfino : mames mas que y miet , que y titijo gui sagan miet .

text: Moreover by them is thy servant warned : and in keeping of them there is great reward .
text2: Y tentagomo locue mapagat yan sija : ya yaguin jaadaje sija y uguaja dangculo na apas .

text: Who can understand his errors ? cleanse thou me from secret faults .
text2: Ya y linachiña jaye utiningo ? ya y linache na ti jutungo , nalibreyo .

text: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins ; let them not have dominion over me : then shall I be upright , and I shall be innocent from the great transgression .
text2: Unmantiene locue y tentagomo guinin y sobetbio na isao : ya munga mangae ninasiñañija guiya guajo : ayo nae cabalesyo ya gasgas yo guinin y dangculo na quinebrantan y tinago .

text: Let the words of my mouth , and the meditation of my heart , be acceptable in thy sight , O LORD , my strength , and my redeemer .
text2: Polo ya y sinangang y pachotto ya y jinason y corasonjo umauleg gui menamo , O Jeova , minetgotto yan y munalilibreyo .

text: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble ; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee ;
text2: SI Jeova uninepejao y jaanen chinatsaga : y naan y Yuus Jacob ninacajulojao .

text: Send thee help from the sanctuary , and strengthen thee out of Zion ;
text2: Utago y para uinayudajao guinin y santuario , ya guinin y Sion unninametgotjao .

text: Remember all thy offerings , and accept thy burnt sacrifice ; Selah .
text2: Ujaso todo y ninaemo , ya uchajlao y inefresimo sinenggue .

text: Grant thee according to thine own heart , and fulfil all thy counsel .
text2: Nae jao taemanoja y minalago y corasonmo , ya cumple todo y pinagatmo .

text: We will rejoice in thy salvation , and in the name of our God we will set up our banners : the LORD fulfil all thy petitions .
text2: Utafangana gui satbasionmo , ya y naan y Yuusmame injatsa julo y banderanmame : ucumple si Jeova todo y guinagaomo .

text: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed ; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand .
text2: Pago jutungo na si Jeova jaadadaje y pinalaeña : güiya uinepe gue guinin santos y langetña yan y minetgot y satbasion gui agapaña .

text: Some trust in chariots , and some in horses : but we will remember the name of the LORD our God .
text2: Estesija gui caretasija , ya ayosija gui cabayosija nae jaangocosija : lao jita y naan Jeova , ni y Yuusta , utajajasoja .

text: They are brought down and fallen : but we are risen , and stand upright .
text2: Estesija mandimo ya mamodong : lao jita tafangajulo ya tafanogue tunas .

text: Save , LORD : let the king hear us when we call .
text2: Jeova , nalibre : polo y Ray ya uopejam anae inagang .

text: The king shall joy in thy strength , O LORD ; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice !
text2: O Jeova , gui minetgotmo ninamagof y ray ; ya gui satbasionmo ninamagof megae !

text: Thou hast given him his heart ' s desire , and hast not withholden the request of his lips . Selah .
text2: Y minalago y corasonña , jago numae : ya ti unpune ni y guinagao y labiosña .

text: For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness : thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head .
text2: Sa untagam güe nu y bendision y minauleg : y coronan oro nu y fino , unpolo gui jilo y iluña .

text: He asked life of thee , and thou gavest it him , even length of days for ever and ever .
text2: Linâlâ na guinagaoña unnae : y anaco na jaane , para siempre taejinecog .

text: His glory is great in thy salvation : honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him .
text2: Dangculo y minalagña gui satbasionmo : onra yan minagas unpolo gui jiloña .

text: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever : thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance .
text2: Sa jago bumendise para taejinecog : unnamagof güe yan minagof gui menamo .

text: For the king trusteth in the LORD , and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved .
text2: Sa y ray jaangongoco si Jeova : ya pot y minaase y Gueftaquilo ti calamten .

text: Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies : thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee .
text2: Y canaemo usoda todo y enimigumo : y agapa na canaemo usoda todo y chumatlie jao .

text: Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger : the LORD shall swallow them up in his wrath , and the fire shall devour them .
text2: Jago pumolo sija taegüije y jetnon guafe gui tiempon binibumo : si Jeova yumulang sija anae lalalo , ya y guafe ufanlinachae .

text: Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth , and their seed from among the children of men .
text2: Ya y tinegchaña unyulang gui jilo y tano , ya y semiyaña gui entalo y famaguon y taotao .

text: For they intended evil against thee : they imagined a mischievous device , which they are not able to perform .
text2: Sa jagasja majasuye y taelaye contra jago : jagasja majaso y dinague ni y ti siña mafatinas .

text: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back , when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them .
text2: Sa jago fumatinas na jabira y tataloñija ya unnalisto y jalon y atcosmo contra y matañija .

text: Be thou exalted , LORD , in thine own strength : so will we sing and praise thy power .
text2: Taquilo jao , O Jeova , yan y minetgotmo : incantaye yan inalabaye y ninasiñamo .

text: My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ? why art thou so far from helping me , and from the words of my roaring ?
text2: YUUSSO , Yuusso , sa jafa na undingo yo ? sa jafa chago jao gui inayudajo yan y finijo gui inigongjo .

text: O my God , I cry in the daytime , but thou hearest not ; and in the night season , and am not silent .
text2: O Yuusso , juagang gui jaane ya ti unope : ya gui puenge lao jusoda y descanso .

text: But thou art holy , O thou that inhabitest the praises of Israel .
text2: Ya y santos jao , O jago ni y sumasaga gui alabansan Israel .

text: Our fathers trusted in thee : they trusted , and thou didst deliver them .
text2: Yya jago nae manangoco y tatanmame : manangoco ya unnafanlibre sija .

text: They cried unto thee , and were delivered : they trusted in thee , and were not confounded .
text2: Maaagang jao ya ninafanlibre : manmanangoco nu jago ya ti manmamajlao .

text: But I am a worm , and no man ; a reproach of men , and despised of the people .
text2: Ya guajo y gâgâ ilo ya ti taotao : namamajlao gui lalaje ya madespresia gui taotao .

text: All they that see me laugh me to scorn : they shoot out the lip , they shake the head saying ,
text2: Todo y lumiiyo manatchatgue pot guajo mamuyuyueyo ya jayeyengyong y ilonñija .

text: He trusted on the LORD that he would deliver him : let him deliver him , seeing he delighted in him .
text2: Angoco jao as Jeova ; polo ya ulibre gue : polo ya ulibre güe sa güinaeya güe .

text: But thou art he that took me out of the womb : thou didst make me hope when I was upon my mother ' s breasts .
text2: Sa jago y chumule yo gui tiyan : ya unnafanangoco anae gaegue yo gui jaof nanajo .

text: I was cast upon thee from the womb : thou art my God from my mother ' s belly .
text2: Gui jilomo mayute yo guinin y tiyan : desde y tiyan nanajo jago Yuusso .

text: Be not far from me ; for trouble is near ; for there is none to help .
text2: Chamo chachago guiya guajo ; sa y chinatsagaco esta jijot , sa taya jaye yo uayuda .

text: Many bulls have compassed me : strong bulls of Bashan have beset me round .
text2: Megae na toro jaoriyayeyo : manmetgot na toron Básan jumijujuteyo .

text: They gaped upon me with their mouths , as a ravening and a roaring lion .
text2: Ya jabababa y pachotñija guiya guajo taegüije y león ni tegcho yan cumate .

text: I am poured out like water , and all my bones are out of joint : my heart is like wax ; it is melted in the midst of my bowels .
text2: Janamachuda yo taegüije y janom , todo y telangjo manápula : y corasonjo taegüije y danges ; esta madirite gui talo gui sanjalomjo .

text: My strength is dried up like a potsherd ; and my tongue cleaveth to my jaws ; and thou hast brought me into the dust of death .
text2: Anglo y minetgotto taegüije y pedason an mafag : ya y jilajo cheton gui paladatto : ya gui petbos finatae nae unpoloyo .

text: For dogs have compassed me : the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me : they pierced my hands and my feet .
text2: Sa maoriyayayeyo y galago sija : majijujuteyo y inetnon y manaelaye ; ya manadochon gui canaejo yan y adengjo .

text: I may tell all my bones : they look and stare upon me .
text2: Mojon jusangan todo ni y telangjo : sija jaatanyo ya jaconsidedera .

text: They part my garments among them , and cast lots upon my vesture .
text2: Maipe gui entaloñija todo y bestidujo : ya y magagujo marifa .

text: But be not thou far from me , O LORD : O my strength , haste thee to help me .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , chamo chachago : O jago , minetgotto , chadig yan unayudayo .

text: Deliver my soul from the sword ; my darling from the power of the dog .
text2: Nalibre gui espada y antijo : y beyan corasonjo , guinin y ninasiñan y galago .

text: Save me from the lion ' s mouth : for thou hast heard me from the horns of the unicorns .
text2: Nalibreyo gui pachot y león ; magajet , guinin y canggilon y nubiyo ni titogcha , unope yo .

text: I will declare thy name unto my brethren : in the midst of the congregation will I praise thee .
text2: Bae jusaasgane y mañelujo y naanmo : ya gui entalo gui inetnon taotao bae jualalabajao .

text: Ye that fear the LORD , praise him ; all ye the seed of Jacob , glorify him ; and fear him , all ye the seed of Israel .
text2: Ya y manmaañao as Jeova , fanmanalaba nu güiya : todo y semiyan Jacob fanmanonra nu güiya : ya fanmaañao nu güiya todo y semiyan Israel .

text: For he hath not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted ; neither hath he hid his face from him ; but when he cried unto him , he heard .
text2: Sa ti guinin jadespresia ni jachatlie y pinadesen y pebble ; ni unaatog y mataña guiya güiya : ya anae jaagang guiya güiya , jajungog .

text: My praise shall be of thee in the great congregation : I will pay my vows before them that fear him .
text2: Ya iya jago nae mamaela y alabansajo gui dangculon inetnon : ya y promesajo juapase gui menan y manmaañao güe .

text: The meek shall eat and be satisfied : they shall praise the LORD that seek him : your heart shall live for ever .
text2: Ufañocho y manmanso ya ufanjaspog : ufanmanalaba as Jeova y umaliligao güe : polo ya ufanmanlâlâ y corasonmiyo para taejinecog .

text: All the ends of the world shall remember and turn unto the LORD : and all the kindreds of the nations shall worship before thee .
text2: Ujajaso ya ufanalo guato as Jeova todo y uttimon y tano : ya ufamnanadora gui menamo todo y familian y nasion sija .

text: For the kingdom is the LORD ' s : and he is the governor among the nations .
text2: Sa as Jeova y raeno : ya güiya umagas gui todo nasion .

text: All they that be fat upon earth shall eat and worship : all they that go down to the dust shall bow before him : and none can keep alive his own soul .
text2: Ufañocho ya ufanmanadora todo y yinemog y tano : gui menanña ufandimo , todo y manunog gui eda : güiyaja ni y tisiña unalala y antiña .

text: A seed shall serve him ; it shall be accounted to the Lord for a generation .
text2: Un semiya usinetbe güe : ya umasangan si Jeova asta y uttimo generasion .

text: They shall come , and shall declare his righteousness unto a people that shall be born , that he hath done this .
text2: Ufanmato ya ufanmasangan y tininasña ni y taotao na umafañago , na güiya fumatinas este .

text: The LORD is my shepherd ; I shall not want .
text2: SI Jeova güiya y pastotjo : tayayo unafatta .

text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures : he leadeth me beside the still waters .
text2: Y manbetde na chaguan nae janaason yo : ya y quieto na janom nae jaosgaejon yo .

text: He restoreth my soul : he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name ' s sake .
text2: Jananalo y antijo : jaosgaejon yo gui chalan tininas pot y naanña .

text: Yea , though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death , I will fear no evil : for thou art with me ; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me .
text2: Yaguin jufamocat gui chalan y anineng y finatae , ti maañao yo ni jafa na taelaye , sa jago gaegue guiya guajo : y baramo yan y bastonmo unnae yo minagof .

text: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies : thou anointest my head with oil ; my cup runneth over .
text2: Unfamauleg y lamasa gui menajo yan y menan y enimigujo sija : naye laña y ilujo , ya y copajo esta machúchuda .

text: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life : and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever .
text2: Sen magajet y minauleg yan y minaase madalalagyo todo nu sija gui jaanen linâlâjo : ya y guima Jeova jusaga para taejinecog na jaane .

text: The earth is the LORD ' s , and the fulness thereof ; the world , and they that dwell therein .
text2: Y tano iyon Jeova yan y binilaña : y tano yan y manasaga gui sanjalomña .

text: For he hath founded it upon the seas , and established it upon the floods .
text2: Sa güiya fumatinas gui jilo y tase : ya gui jilo y janom nae japolo fitme .

text: Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD ? or who shall stand in his holy place ?
text2: Jaye ucajulo gui egso Jeova ? ya jaye ugaegue gui sagan y sinantosña .

text: He that hath clean hands , and a pure heart ; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity , nor sworn deceitfully .
text2: Ayo y gasgas canaeña yan y gasgas corasonña : ni ti pumopolo gui taebale y antiña ni ufanjula ni y dinague .

text: He shall receive the blessing from the LORD , and righteousness from the God of his salvation .
text2: Güiya uresibe y bendision Jeova : yan y tininas guine as Yuus satbasionña .

text: This is the generation of them that seek him , that seek thy face , O Jacob . Selah .
text2: Este na generasion y umaliligao güe : y umaliligao y matamo , O Yuus Jacob . Sila .

text: Lift up your head , O ye gates ; and be ye lift up , ye everlasting doors ; and the King of glory shall come in .
text2: Jatsa julo y ilonmiyo , O jamyo trangco sija ya umajatsa julo y taejinecog na potta sija , ya y Ray langet ujalom .

text: Who is this King of glory ? The LORD strong and mighty , the LORD mighty in battle .
text2: Jaye este na Ray langet ? Si Jeova , metgot yan matatnga : si Jeova matatnga gui guera .

text: Lift up your heads , O ye gates ; even lift them up , ye everlasting doors ; and the King of glory shall come in .
text2: Jatsa julo y ilonmiyo , O jamyo trangca sija ya umajatsa julo y taejinecog na potta sija ya y Ray langet ujalom .

text: Who is this King of glory ? The LORD of hosts , he is the King of glory . Selah .
text2: Jaye este na Bay langet ? Si Jeova gui inetnon sendalo , güiya ayo y Ray langet . Sila .

text: Unto thee , O LORD , do I lift up my soul .
text2: YYAJAGO , O Jeova , nae jujatsa y antijo .

text: O my God , I trust in thee : let me not be ashamed , let not mine enemies triumph over me .
text2: O Yuusso , iyajago nae juangocoyo : chamo yo munamamamajlao ; chamo pumopolo y enimigujo na ugana gui jilojo .

text: Yea , let none that wait on thee be ashamed : let them be ashamed which transgress without cause .
text2: Magajet , na todo y mumananggajao ti ufanmamajlao : sija ufanmamajlao ni y chumogüe dinague sin jafa .

text: Shew me thy ways , O LORD ; teach me thy paths .
text2: Y chalanmo , O Jeova , fanueyo ; fanagüe yo , ni y chalanmo .

text: Lead me in thy truth , and teach me : for thou art the God of my salvation ; on thee do I wait all the day .
text2: Osgaejonyo gui minagajetmo ya unfanagüeyo ; sa jago y Yuus ni y satbasionjo : iyajago nae jufannangga todotdia .

text: Remember , O LORD , thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses ; for they have been ever of old .
text2: Jaso , O Jeova , y mauleg na minaasemo ; yan y mauleg na güinaeyamo , sa sija guinin apmam na tiempo .

text: Remember not the sins of my youth , nor my transgressions : according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness ' sake , O LORD .
text2: Chamo jumajaso y isao y pinatgonjo , ni y quinebrantaco ni y tinago : segun y güinaeyamo jasoyo , pot y minauleg y naanmo , O Jeova .

text: Good and upright is the LORD : therefore will he teach sinners in the way .
text2: Mauleg yan tunas si Jeova : pot enao na jafanagüe y maniisao ni y chalan .

text: The meek will he guide in judgment : and the meek will he teach his way .
text2: Y manmanso ufanfinanagüe gui juisio : yan y manmanso ufanguinia gui chalan .

text: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies .
text2: Todo y chalan Jeova güinaeya yan minagajet ni y ayo y umadadaje y tratuña yan y testimoniuña .

text: For thy name ' s sake , O LORD , pardon mine iniquity ; for it is great .
text2: Pot y naanmo , O Jeova , asie y isaojo sa gosdangculo .

text: What man is he that feareth the LORD ? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose .
text2: Jaye ayo na taotao y maañao as Jeova ? güiya ufinanagüe ni y chalan mano y inayegña .

text: His soul shall dwell at ease ; and his seed shall inherit the earth .
text2: Y antiña usaga gui mauleg : ya y semiyaña uereda y tano .

text: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him ; and he will shew them his covenant .
text2: Y secreton Jeova gaegue guiya sija y mumaañaogüe güe ; ya güiya ufanagüe sija ni y tratuña .

text: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD ; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net .
text2: Y atadogjo siempre juatan si Jeova ; sa güiya ujala y adengjo juyong gui laso .

text: Turn thee unto me , and have mercy upon me ; for I am desolate and afflicted .
text2: Atanyo , ya gaease ni guajo : sa guajo taeconsueloyo yan piniteyo .

text: The troubles of my heart are enlarged : O bring thou me out of my distresses .
text2: Y chinatsagan y corasonjo lumalamegae : najuyongyo gui pinitijo .

text: Look upon mine affliction and my pain ; and forgive all my sins .
text2: Atan y trinesteco yan y pinitijo ; ya unasie todo y isaojo .

text: Consider mine enemies ; for they are many ; and they hate me with cruel hatred .
text2: Atan y enimigujo , sa sija manmegae , ya sija chumatliiyo ni y fejman na chinatlie .

text: O keep my soul , and deliver me : let me not be ashamed ; for I put my trust in thee .
text2: Adaje y antijo ya nalibreyo : ya chajo mamamajlao , sa iyajago nae juangocoyo .

text: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me ; for I wait on thee .
text2: Y minauleg yan y tininas juadádajeyo : sa jago junanangga .

text: Redeem Israel , O God , out of all his troubles .
text2: Nalibre , O Yuus , y iya Israel gui todo y chinatsagaña .

text: Judge me , O LORD ; for I have walked in mine integrity : I have trusted also in the LORD ; therefore I shall not slide .
text2: JUSGAYO , O Jeova , sa guajo jumajanao yo gui tininasso : juangocoyo locue gui as Jeova : pot enao na ti jusulong .

text: Examine me , O LORD , and prove me ; try my reins and my heart .
text2: Ecsamina yo , O Jeova , ya chagueyo : chague y jinasojo gui jinalomjo yan y corasonjo .

text: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes : and I have walked in thy truth .
text2: Sa y güinaeyamo gaegue gui menan atadogjo ; ya gui minagajetmo nae jumajanaoyo .

text: I have not sat with vain persons , neither will I go in with dissemblers .
text2: Ti jagasja matachongyo yan y ti manmagajet na taotao ; ni jujalom yan y lumilipa .

text: I have hated the congregation of evil doers ; and will not sit with the wicked .
text2: Juchatlie y inetnon y chumogüe taelaye : ya ti jufatachong yan y manaelaye .

text: I will wash mine hands in innocency : so will I compass thine altar , O LORD :
text2: Jufagase y canaejo ni y tinaeisao : taegüije juoriya gui attatmo , O Jeova .

text: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving , and tell of all thy wondrous works .
text2: Para junajungog y inagang y grasias yan para jusangan todo y ninamanmanmo .

text: LORD , I have loved the habitation of thy house , and the place where thine honour dwelleth .
text2: Jeova , yajo y sagan y guimamo : yan y lugat nae sumasaga minalagmo .

text: Gather not my soul with sinners , nor my life with bloody men :
text2: Chamo na fandadaña yan y maniisao y antijo , ni y jaanijo yan y taotao cájaga .

text: In whose hands is mischief , and their right hand is full of bribes .
text2: Sa ayosija na canaeñija mangaegue y nacacha : ya y agapa y canaeñija bula ni y catnada .

text: But as for me , I will walk in mine integrity : redeem me , and be merciful unto me .
text2: Lao guajo jumajanao yo yan y tininasso : nalibreyo , ya gaease ni guajo .

text: My foot standeth in an even place : in the congregations will I bless the LORD .
text2: Y adengjo gaegue gui lugat ni yano : ya gui inetnon taotao nae jubendise si Jeova .

text: The LORD is my light and my salvation ; whom shall I fear ? the LORD is the strength of my life ; of whom shall I be afraid ?
text2: SI Jeova y candetto yan y satbasionjo ? ya jaye jumaañagüeyo ? si Jeova y minetgot y linâlâjo , ya jaye yo nae jumaañao ?

text: When the wicked , even mine enemies and my foes , came upon me to eat up my flesh , they stumbled and fell .
text2: Anae manmato guiya guajo y chumogüe taelaye para u jacano y catneco , y contrariojo yan y enimigujo , sija manmatompo ya manmatomba .

text: Though an host should encamp against me , my heart shall not fear : though war should rise against me , in this will I be confident .
text2: Achogja ujapolo un inetnon sendalo contra guajo ti maañao y corasonjo : achogja ucajulo y guera contra guajo , este nae juangocoyo .

text: One thing have I desired of the LORD , that will I seek after ; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life , to behold the beauty of the LORD , and to inquire in his temple .
text2: Unoja na güinaja jugagao gui as Jeova , este jualiligao ; na jugaegue gui guima Jeova todo y jaanen linâlâjo , para julie y guinatbon Jeova ya para jualigao gui temploña .

text: For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion : in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me ; he shall set me up upon a rock .
text2: Sa güiya munaatogyo gui tabernacoluña gui jaanen pinite : ya janaatogyo gui fanatog y tabernacoluña : ya japoloyo julo gui jilo y acho .

text: And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me : therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy ; I will sing , yea , I will sing praises unto the LORD .
text2: Ya pago janataquiloyo y ilujo gui jilo y enimigujo gui oriyajo : ya junae gui tabernacoluña inefresen minagof ; bae jucantae , magajet , jucantaye alabansa sija si Jeova .

text: Hear , O LORD , when I cry with my voice : have mercy also upon me , and answer me .
text2: Jungog , O Jeova , anae juagang ni inagangjo , gaease locue ni guajo ya unopeyo .

text: When thou saidst , Seek ye my face ; my heart said unto thee , Thy face , LORD , will I seek .
text2: Anae ilegmo : Aligao jamyo y matajo ; y corasonjo ilegña nu jago : O Jeova , y matamo jualiligao .

text: Hide not thy face far from me ; put not thy servant away in anger : thou hast been my help ; leave me not , neither forsake me , O God of my salvation .
text2: Chamo munaaatog y matamo guiya guajo ; chamo munasusuja yan y binibumo y tentagomo : jago guinin ayudajo ; chamoyo yumuyute ya chamoyo dumidingo , O Yuus gui satbasionjo .

text: When my father and my mother forsake me , then the LORD will take me up .
text2: Anae si tatajo yan nanajo yumuteyo : si Jeova jumocayo .

text: Teach me thy way , O LORD , and lead me in a plain path , because of mine enemies .
text2: Fanagüeyo , O Jeova , ni y chalanmo : ya osgaejonyo , gui chalan yano , pot rason y enimigujo .

text: Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies : for false witnesses are risen up against me , and such as breathe out cruelty .
text2: Chamoyo pumopolo gui minalago y contrariojo : sa mangajujulo contra guajo mandacon na testigo , ya jaye usinangang y taease .

text: I had fainted , unless I had believed to see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living .
text2: Guinin lalangoyo yaguin ti jujonggue na guaja nae julie y minauleg Jeova gui tano ni y manlâlâlâ .

text: Wait on the LORD : be of good courage , and he shall strengthen thine heart : wait , I say , on the LORD .
text2: Nangga si Jeova : nametgotjao ya polo ya unamatatnga y corasonmo : magajet , na nangga jao si Jeova .

text: Unto thee will I cry , O LORD my rock ; be not silent to me : lest , if thou be silent to me , I become like them that go down into the pit .
text2: YYAJAGO , O Jeova , juaagang ; achojo , chamo fatilúluye yo : yaguin infatiluye yo , guajo uparejo yan y manútunog gui tadong y joyo .

text: Hear the voice of my supplications , when I cry unto thee , when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle .
text2: Jungog y inagang y guinagaojo anae juagang jao : anae jujatsa y canaejo gui sinantos templomo .

text: Draw me not away with the wicked , and with the workers of iniquity , which speak peace to their neighbours , but mischief is in their hearts .
text2: Chamoyo cumocone guato gui manaelaye yan y chumogüe y taelaye : ya jasasangan y pas gui tiguangña ya y inacacha gaegue gui corasonñija .

text: Give them according to their deeds , and according to the wickedness of their endeavours : give them after the work of their hands ; render to them their desert .
text2: Nae sija taemanoja y chechoñija : ya taemanoja y taelayen chechoña . Nae sija taemanoja y finatinas y canaeñija : apase ni y para ujamarese .

text: Because they regard not the works of the LORD , nor the operation of his hands , he shall destroy them , and not build them up .
text2: Sa timanmalago jalie y checho Jeova , ni y finatinas y canaeña , ufanyinilang sija ya ti uninafangajulo .

text: Blessed be the LORD , because he hath heard the voice of my supplications .
text2: Bendito si Jeova , sa jajungong y inagang y guinagaojo .

text: The LORD is my strength and my shield ; my heart trusted in him , and I am helped : therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth ; and with my song will I praise him .
text2: Si Jeova y minetgotto yan y patangjo ; y iyagüiya nae manangoco y corasonjo , ya guajo uayuda : Enao mina senmagof y corasonjo ; ya y quinantaco nae jualabagüe .

text: The LORD is their strength , and he is the saving strength of his anointed .
text2: Si Jeova y minetgotñija : ya güiya y minetgot y satbasion para y pinalaeña .

text: Save thy people , and bless thine inheritance : feed them also , and lift them up for ever .
text2: Nalibre y taotaomo ya bendise y erensiamo : ya nafañocho sija ya unmantiene sija para taejinecog .

text: Give unto the LORD , O ye mighty , give unto the LORD glory and strength .
text2: NAE si Jeova , O famaguon manmetgot , nae si Jeova ni inenra yan y minetgot .

text: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name ; worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness .
text2: Nae si Jeova y inenra ni mauleg para y naanña : adora si Jeova ni guinatbon y sinantosña .

text: The voice of the LORD is upon the waters : the God of glory thundereth : the LORD is upon many waters .
text2: Y inagang Jeova gaegue gui jilo y janomsija : ya y Yuus langet janajujulo : junggan , si Jeova , gui jilo y megae na janom .

text: The voice of the LORD is powerful ; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty .
text2: Y inagang Jeova y ninasiña : y inagang Jeova bula y minagas .

text: The voice of the LORD breaketh the cedars ; yea , the LORD breaketh the cedars of Lebanon .
text2: Y inagang Jeova yumuyulang y trongcon y sedrosija : magajet na jayulang si Jeova y trongcon sedrosija y Líbano .

text: He maketh them also to skip like a calf ; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn .
text2: Ya janafanayog sija locue taegüije y tatnero : y Líbano yan y Sirion taegüije y patgon y dadao na nubiyo .

text: The voice of the LORD divideth the flames of fire .
text2: Y inagang Jeova umuutut y mañila y guafe .

text: The voice of the LORD shaketh the wilderness ; the LORD shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh .
text2: Y inagang Jeova munamayengyong y jalomtano : janameyeyengyong si Jeova y jalomtano guiya Cades .

text: The voice of the LORD maketh the hinds to calve , and discovereth the forests : and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory .
text2: Y inagang Jeova munafanmañañago y binado sija ya janafanquesnuda y jalomtano : ya y temploña nae todo y güinaja ilegña : Minalag .

text: The LORD sitteth upon the flood ; yea , the LORD sitteth King for ever .
text2: Si Jeova anae guaja delubio matachong calang un ray ; magajet na matatachong si Jeova calang ray na taejinecog .

text: The LORD will give strength unto his people ; the LORD will bless his people with peace .
text2: Si Jeova unae minetgot y taotaoña : si Jeova jabendise y taotaoña ni y pas .

text: I will extol thee , O LORD ; for thou hast lifted me up , and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me .
text2: JUNATAQUILO jao , O Jeova ; sa jago unnajatsa yo julo : ya ti unnafanmagof y enimigujo guiya guajo .
