text: O LORD my God , I cried unto thee , and thou hast healed me .
text2: O Jeova , Yuusso , juagangjao ya unnajomloyo .

text: O LORD , thou hast brought up my soul from the grave : thou hast kept me alive , that I should not go down to the pit .
text2: O Jeova , jago munacajulo y antijo gui naftan : unadajeyo na lâlâyo para mungayo tumunog gui naftan .

text: Sing unto the LORD , O ye saints of his , and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness .
text2: Cantaye si Jeova , O jamyo mañantosña : ya innae grasias y santos na naaña .

text: For his anger endureth but a moment ; in his favour is life : weeping may endure for a night , but joy cometh in the morning .
text2: Sa pot didideja guaja linalaloña ; gui finaboreseña nae guaja linâlâ : yaguin y pupuenge majon sumaga y tinanges ; y egaan mato y minagof .

text: And in my prosperity I said , I shall never be moved .
text2: Ya guajo jagas ileco anae lumálaguaja yo : ti jucalamten talo taejinecog .

text: LORD , by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong : thou didst hide thy face , and I was troubled .
text2: Sa jago , Jeova , pot y finaboresemo jagasja unnafitme y egsojo : lao unnana y matamo , ya guajo chumatsaga .

text: I cried to thee , O LORD ; and unto the LORD I made supplication .
text2: Yya jago , O Jeova , juaagangjao : ya si Jeova jutayuyut .

text: What profit is there in my blood , when I go down to the pit ? Shall the dust praise thee ? shall it declare thy truth ?
text2: Jafayo probechoco gui jâgâjo , anae tumunog yo gui naftan ? Ada uinalabajao ni y petbos ? Ada usangan y minagajetmo ?

text: Hear , O LORD , and have mercy upon me : LORD , be thou my helper .
text2: Jungog , O Jeova , ya gaease ni guajo : Jeova , jago para inayudajo .

text: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing : thou hast put off my sackcloth , and girded me with gladness ;
text2: Jago bumira y inigongjo gui baela : ya unpula y lutojo ya unnaquinereasyo ni y minagof ;

text: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee , and not be silent . O LORD my God , I will give thanks unto thee for ever .
text2: Para jucantaye jao inenra ya ti jufamatquilo : O Jeova , Yuusso , junaejao grasias para taejinecog .

text: In thee , O LORD , do I put my trust ; let me never be ashamed : deliver me in thy righteousness .
text2: YYAJAGO , O Jeova , nae juangoco : chamoyo munamamamajlao para taejinecog : nalibreyo gui tininasmo .

text: Bow down thine ear to me ; deliver me speedily : be thou my strong rock , for an house of defence to save me .
text2: Egueng papa guiya guajo y talangamo , nalibreyo guse : jago y para guajo acho ni y fitme , pot y guima lumijing nae para unnalibreyo .

text: For thou art my rock and my fortress ; therefore for thy name ' s sake lead me , and guide me .
text2: Sa jago y achojo yan y castiyujo ; enao mina pot y naanmo esgaejonyo ya chachalalaneyo .

text: Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me : for thou art my strength .
text2: Chuleyo gui lagua ni y munanaaatogyo gui ti umatungo : sa jago y seguro na sagajo .

text: Into thine hand I commit my spirit : thou hast redeemed me , O LORD God of truth .
text2: Y canaemo nae , junae ni y espiritujo : unnalibreyo , O Jeova , jago Yuus minagajet .

text: I have hated them that regard lying vanities : but I trust in the LORD .
text2: Juchatlie ayo sija y numanangga y taebale na dinague : lao guajo si Jeova juangongoco .

text: I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy : for thou hast considered my trouble ; thou hast known my soul in adversities ;
text2: Jumagof ya jusenmagof gui minaasemo : sa jagas unlie y pinitijo : ya jagas untungo y antijo gui chinatsaga .

text: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy : thou hast set my feet in a large room .
text2: Ya jago ti jumujuchomyo gui canae y enimigujo : jagas unpolo y adengjo gui dangculo na sagayan .

text: Have mercy upon me , O LORD , for I am in trouble : mine eye is consumed with grief , yea , my soul and my belly .
text2: Gaease ni guajo , O Jeova , sa estagüe yo gui chinatsaga : sa y atadogjo linachae ni y pinite , junggan , y antijo yan y tataotaojo .

text: For my life is spent with grief , and my years with sighing : my strength faileth because of mine iniquity , and my bones are consumed .
text2: Sa y jaanijo linachae ni y trinestico , ya y sacanjo ni y suspiros : linalachae y minetgotto pot y tinaelayeco : ya y telangjo mananglo .

text: I was a reproach among all mine enemies , but especially among my neighbours , and a fear to mine acquaintance : they that did see me without fled from me .
text2: Pot todo y enimigujo , jumuyongyo mamajlao , magajet na sentaegüijeja a para y tiguangjo yan y minaañao ni y manatungoyo : ya y lumiliiyo gui sanjiyong mañuja guiya guajo .

text: I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind : I am like a broken vessel .
text2: Sa esta malefayo taegüije y matae ni ti manjaso : taegüijeyo y an mafag baso .

text: For I have heard the slander of many : fear was on every side : while they took counsel together against me , they devised to take away my life .
text2: Sa jujungog y dinisonran y lajyayan : minaañao sija gui todo oriya : anae manafaesen entresija contra guajo , ya majasusuye para umacone y antijo .

text: But I trusted in thee , O LORD : I said , Thou art my God .
text2: Lao guajo , iya jago nae juangocoyo , O Jeova : ileco : Jago y Yuusso .

text: My times are in thy hand : deliver me from the hand of mine enemies , and from them that persecute me .
text2: Y canaemo nae gaegue y tiempoco : nalibre yo gui canae y enimigujo yan y pumetsisigueyo .

text: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant : save me for thy mercies ' sake .
text2: Nafanina y matamo gui jilo y tentagomo : nalibreyo ni y güinaeyamo .

text: Let me not be ashamed , O LORD ; for I have called upon thee : let the wicked be ashamed , and let them be silent in the grave .
text2: O Jeova , chamo yo munamámamajlao ; sa jagasja juaagangjao : polo y manaelaye ya ufanmamajlao : polo sija ya ufanmamatquilo gui naftan .

text: Let the lying lips be put to silence ; which speak grievous things proudly and contemptuously against the righteous .
text2: Nafanmamatquilo y labios ni y manmandadague ; sa manguecuentos saguat contra y manunas , yan sobetbia yan despresio .

text: Oh how great is thy goodness , which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee ; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men !
text2: Jafa muna dangculo y minaulegmo ni unadadaje para y mumaañaogüe jao , na unfatinas para y umangocojao gui menan y famaguon y taotao .

text: Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man : thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues .
text2: Jago nae ufanatog sija na ti umatungo gui menamo guinin y taelaye na contraton taotao ; jago unadaje sija gui guima lumijing guinin y inaguaguat y jila sija .

text: Blessed be the LORD : for he hath shewed me his marvellous kindness in a strong city .
text2: Bendito si Jeova : sa jafanueyo ninamanman gui minaaseña gui siudan manmetgot .

text: For I said in my haste , I am cut off from before thine eyes : nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee .
text2: Ya guajo ileco y nalulajo : Juutut yo gui menan atadogmo ; lao magajet na jago jumungog y vos y guinagaojo anae juagangjao .

text: O love the LORD , all ye his saints : for the LORD preserveth the faithful , and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer .
text2: Guaeya si Jeova todo jamyo mañantos ; ya y manmauleg adaje si Jeova , ya apase megagae y fumatitinas ni y sobetbia .

text: Be of good courage , and he shall strengthen your heart , all ye that hope in the LORD .
text2: Nafanmetgot jamyo , ya inafanmatatnga y corasonmiyo , todo y numanangga si Jeova .

text: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven , whose sin is covered .
text2: DICHOSO y maasie ni y taelayen finatinasña , ya y isaoña matampe .

text: Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity , and in whose spirit there is no guile .
text2: Dichoso y taotao ni y ti jacatgaye si Jeova ni tinaelaye , ni uguaja gui espirituña dinague .

text: When I kept silence , my bones waxed old through my roaring all the day long .
text2: Anae mamatquiloyo , y telangjo ninafanbijo , ni y inigongjo todotdia .

text: For day and night thy hand was heavy upon me : my moisture is turned into the drought of summer . Selah .
text2: Sa y jaane yan y puenge y canaemo macat guiya guajo ; ya y finetgonjo mabira para y inanglo gui tiempon maepe . Sila .

text: I acknowledged my sin unto thee , and mine iniquity have I not hid . I said , I will confess my transgressions unto the LORD ; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin . Selah .
text2: Y isaojo junatungo jao ya y tinaelayeco ti junaatog ; ya ileco : Guajo bae juconfesatñaejon y tinaelayen finatinasso as Jeova ; ya jago unasie y taelayen y isaojo . Sila .

text: For this shall every one that is godly pray unto thee in a time when thou mayest be found : surely in the floods of great waters they shall not come nigh unto him .
text2: Sa este nae umatayuyut jao y mandeboto todos gui tiempo anae mojon siña ujasoda : senmagajet anae machuchuda inetnon y janom , ti ufato guiya güiya .

text: Thou art my hiding place ; thou shalt preserve me from trouble ; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance . Selah .
text2: Jago y fanatugco ; ya gui chinatsaga jago unadajeyo : ya nu y cantan linibre , jago unoriyayeyo .

text: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go : I will guide thee with mine eye .
text2: Junatungo jao ya jufanagüe jao ni y chalan anae jumajanao : jupagat jao nu y atadogco .

text: Be ye not as the horse , or as the mule , which have no understanding : whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle , lest they come near unto thee .
text2: Chamo pumarérejo yan y cabayo , pat y mula ni taya tiningoñija : na nesesita y modasa yan y freno para umantiene ; yaguin taya estesija ti malago guaguato guiya jago .

text: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked : but he that trusteth in the LORD , mercy shall compass him about .
text2: Megae na triniste para y manaelaye : lao y numaangongoco si Jeova , minaase umoriyayayegüe .

text: Be glad in the LORD , and rejoice , ye righteous : and shout for joy , all ye that are upright in heart .
text2: Fanmagof as Jeova , ya infansenmagof , O jamyo manunas ; ya fanagang ni y minagof , todo y manunas na corason .

text: Rejoice in the LORD , O ye righteous : for praise is comely for the upright .
text2: FANMAGOF gui as Jeova jamyo manunas : sa y manunas bonito na alabansa .

text: Praise the LORD with harp : sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings .
text2: Fanmannae grasias indandane si Jeova ni atpa : cantaye güe ni alabansa nu y guitala ni y gaecuetdas dies .

text: Sing unto him a new song ; play skilfully with a loud noise .
text2: Cantaye güe ni y nuebo na canta : dandan mauleg ni y agang .

text: For the word of the LORD is right ; and all his works are done in truth .
text2: Sa y fino Jeova tunas : ya todo y chechoña esta mafatinas ni y minagajet .

text: He loveth righteousness and judgment : the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD .
text2: Güiya yaña y tininas yan y juisio ; ya cariño na güinaeya gui as Jeova , bula y tano .

text: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made ; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth .
text2: Pot y fino Jeova esta mafatinas y langetsija : ya pot y jajaja ni y pachotña , todo y inetnonñija .

text: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap : he layeth up the depth in storehouses .
text2: Güiya munadaña gui un monton y janom gui tase : güiya pumolo gui atmasén y tinadongsija .

text: Let all the earth fear the LORD : let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him .
text2: Manmaañao as Jeova todo y tano : manmaañao nu güiya todo mañasaga gui tano .

text: For he spake , and it was done ; he commanded , and it stood fast .
text2: Sa güiya umalog ya jumuyong : güiya manago ya sumaga fitme .

text: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought : he maketh the devices of the people of none effect .
text2: Si Jeova munataesetbe y pinagat y nasion ; ya güiya munataebale y jinaso y taotao .

text: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever , the thoughts of his heart to all generations .
text2: Y pinagat Jeova sumaga para taejinecog : y jinason y corasonña para todo y generasion .

text: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD : and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance .
text2: Dichoso y nasion ni si Jeova Yuusña : yan y taotao ni y jaayeg pot erensia para güiya .

text: The LORD looketh from heaven ; he beholdeth all the sons of men .
text2: Desde y langet jaatan si Jeova : jalilie todos y famaguon Adam .

text: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth .
text2: Desde y sagaña na lugat jaatan ; jaatitutuye todo y mañasaga gui jilo y tano .

text: He fashioneth their hearts alike ; he considereth all their works .
text2: Güiya fumatinas y corasonñija todos : yan jaatitutuye todo y chechoñija .

text: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host : a mighty man is not delivered by much strength .
text2: Y ray ti umalibre pot y dangculon inetnon sendaloña : y matatnga na taotao ti umasatba pot y dangculon minetgotña .

text: An horse is a vain thing for safety : neither shall he deliver any by his great strength .
text2: Y cabayo taebale para useguro : sa güiya ti unalibre ni uno nu y dangculon jinilatña .

text: Behold , the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him , upon them that hope in his mercy ;
text2: Estagüeja , y atadog Jeova gui jilo y manmaañagüe güe : gui jiloñija y numanangga y minaaseña .

text: To deliver their soul from death , and to keep them alive in famine .
text2: Para unalibre gui finatae y antiñija : ya para unae linâlâ gui ñinalang .

text: Our soul waiteth for the LORD : he is our help and our shield .
text2: Y antita jagas jananangga si Jeova : y ayudata yan y patangta güiya .

text: For our heart shall rejoice in him , because we have trusted in his holy name .
text2: Pot güiya manmagof y corasonta , sa y sinantos naanña nae jagas taangocojit .

text: Let thy mercy , O LORD , be upon us , according as we hope in thee .
text2: Polo y minaasemo , O Jeova , ugaegue guiya jame , según ninangganmamame guiya jago .

text: I will bless the LORD at all times : his praise shall continually be in my mouth .
text2: JUBENDISE si Jeova gui todo y tiempo : y alabansaña siésiempreja sumaga gui pachotto .

text: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD : the humble shall hear thereof , and be glad .
text2: Si Jeova umalaba y antijo : man manjungog y manmanso ya ninafanmagof .

text: O magnify the LORD with me , and let us exalt his name together .
text2: Junadangculo si Jeova guiya guajo : ya nita tanataquilo y naanña gui un vos .

text: I sought the LORD , and he heard me , and delivered me from all my fears .
text2: Jualigao si Jeova ya güiya jajungogyo : ya todo y minaañaojo janalibreyo .

text: They looked unto him , and were lightened : and their faces were not ashamed .
text2: Sija inatangüe ya infaninina : ya y matañija ti ufanmamajlao .

text: This poor man cried , and the LORD heard him , and saved him out of all his troubles .
text2: Este y namase na taotao umagang , ya si Jeova jumungog , ya ninalibre todo gui chinatsagaña .

text: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him , and delivereth them .
text2: Y angjet Jeova jaoriyaye sija y manmaañao nu güiya ya janalibre sija .

text: O taste and see that the LORD is good : blessed is the man that trusteth in him .
text2: Chague ya unlie na mauleg si Jeova : dichoso y taotao ni umangocogüe guiya güiya .

text: O fear the LORD , ye his saints : for there is no want to them that fear him .
text2: Fanmaañao as Jeova , jamyo mañantosña : sa taya ufatta para y manmaañao nu güiya .

text: The young lions do lack , and suffer hunger : but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing .
text2: Y mandiquique na león mannamase ya manñalang ; ya y umaliligao si Jeova ti ufatta ni jafa na minauleg .

text: Come , ye children , hearken unto me : I will teach you the fear of the LORD .
text2: Maela jamyo famaguon , ecungog yo : ya jufanagüe jamyo ni y minaañao as Jeova .

text: What man is he that desireth life , and loveth many days , that he may see good ?
text2: Jaye enao na taotao y tumátana y linâlâ , ya yaña megae na jaane para ulie y minauleg ?

text: Keep thy tongue from evil , and thy lips from speaking guile .
text2: Adaje y jilamo gui taelaye , yan y labiosmo na ucuentos mandague .

text: Depart from evil , and do good ; seek peace , and pursue it .
text2: Suja gui taelaye ya fatinas y mauleg ; aligao y pas ya dalalag .

text: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous , and his ears are open unto their cry .
text2: Y atadog Jeova gaegue gui jilo y manunas : ya y talangaña esta mababa pot y inagangñija .

text: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil , to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth .
text2: Y matan Jeova contra y fumatitinas y taelaye para uutut gui tano y jinasoñija .

text: The righteous cry , and the LORD heareth , and delivereth them out of all their troubles .
text2: Managang y manunas ya si Jeova jumungog : ya todo y chinatsagañija ninafanlibre .

text: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart ; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit .
text2: Jijot esta si Jeova gui manmaque branta na corason : yan y manmañetnot na espiritu janalibre .

text: Many are the afflictions of the righteous : but the LORD delivereth him out of them all .
text2: Megae y pinitiñiñija y manunas : lao todo ayo si Jeova munafanlibre .

text: He keepeth all his bones : not one of them is broken .
text2: Jaadaje todo y telangñija : ya ni uno guiya sija umayamag .

text: Evil shall slay the wicked : and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate .
text2: taotaoni taelaye : ya y chumatlie y manunas ufansinentensia .

text: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants : and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate .
text2: Janalilibre si Jeova y linâlâ y tentagoña : ya taya ni uno ni umangoco güe usinentensia .

text: Plead my cause , O LORD , with them that strive with me : fight against them that fight against me .
text2: AGUAGUATE , O Jeova , ayo y umaguaguaguateyo ; mumo yan ayo y amumumujo .

text: Take hold of shield and buckler , and stand up for mine help .
text2: Mantiene y patang yan guinegüe , ya tojgue para unayudayo .

text: Draw out also the spear , and stop the way against them that persecute me : say unto my soul , I am thy salvation .
text2: Ya chule y lansa ya patang y chalan contra ayo y pumetsisigueyo : alog ni antijo : Guajo y satbasionmo .

text: Let them be confounded and put to shame that seek after my soul : let them be turned back and brought to confusion that devise my hurt .
text2: Polo ya ufanmamajlao , ya ufanquinenfunde y umaliligao y antijo : polo ya ufanalo tate ya ufanmamajlao y jumajaso y taelayejo .

text: Let them be as chaff before the wind : and let the angel of the LORD chase them .
text2: Polo sija ya calang y paja gui menan y manglo : ya y angjet Jeova ufanchineneg sija .

text: Let their way be dark and slippery : and let the angel of the LORD persecute them .
text2: Polo y chalanñija ya jomjom yan palagse : ya y angjet Jeova ufanpinetsigue sija .

text: For without cause have they hid for me their net in a pit , which without cause they have digged for my soul .
text2: Sa sin causa manatog para guajo y lagua gui joyo : ya sin causa manmanguadog joyo para y antijo .

text: Let destruction come upon him at unawares ; and let his net that he hath hid catch himself : into that very destruction let him fall .
text2: Polo ya ufato guiya güiya ya yinilang ni ti jatungo : polo ya y lagua ni janaaatog , ucone maesagüe : yan y jalom yinilang nae upodong güe .

text: And my soul shall be joyful in the LORD : it shall rejoice in his salvation .
text2: Ya umagof y antijo gui as Jeova : ya umagof gui satbasionña .

text: All my bones shall say , LORD , who is like unto thee , which deliverest the poor from him that is too strong for him , yea , the poor and the needy from him that spoileth him ?
text2: Todo y telangjo y ilegñija : Jeova , jaye parejumo ? ni unalibre y mamoble gui mas manmetgot qui güiya : magajet na y mamoble yan y mannesesitao , guinin y jachulelejguan ?

text: False witnesses did rise up ; they laid to my charge things that I knew not .
text2: Mangajulo testigon mandague : ya jafaesenyo ni y ti jutungo .

text: They rewarded me evil for good to the spoiling of my soul .
text2: Manaeyo ni taelaye pot y mauleg , ya manataelaye y antijo .

text: But as for me , when they were sick , my clothing was sackcloth : I humbled my soul with fasting ; and my prayer returned into mine own bosom .
text2: Lao guajo anae manmalango sija , magagojo y luto : junatriste y antijo yan umayunat : y tinaetaejo tumalo jalom gui pechoco .

text: I behaved myself as though he had been my friend or brother : I bowed down heavily , as one that mourneth for his mother .
text2: Mamomocat yo ya ileleco : Güiya buente y gachongjo , pat y chelujo : ya tumecon yo triste calang uno ni y umuugung pot si nanaña .

text: But in mine adversity they rejoiced , and gathered themselves together : yea , the abjects gathered themselves together against me , and I knew it not ; they did tear me , and ceased not :
text2: Lao anae desgrasiaoyo , sija manmagof ya mandaña : ya y gosnamaase mandaña contra guajo ya guajo ti jutungo : sija matitegyo ya ti manbasta .

text: With hypocritical mockers in feasts , they gnashed upon me with their teeth .
text2: Parejo yan y áplacha na minefea gui fandango , janachéchegcheg y nifenñija guiya guajo .

text: Lord , how long wilt thou look on ? rescue my soul from their destructions , my darling from the lions .
text2: Jeova , asta ngaean nae unatan ? nalibre y antijo gui yinilangña , yan y beya y corasonjo gui león .

text: I will give thee thanks in the great congregation : I will praise thee among much people .
text2: Junae jao grasias gui dangculon y inetnon taotao : ya jualaba jao gui entalo linajyan taotao .

text: Let not them that are mine enemies wrongfully rejoice over me : neither let them wink with the eye that hate me without a cause .
text2: Chamo pumopolo na ufanmamagof guiya guajo y enimigujo sin jafa ? ni ayo y chumatlieyo sin causa jaachetgue yo nu y atadog .

text: For they speak not peace : but they devise deceitful matters against them that are quiet in the land .
text2: Sa ti manguecuentos pas : ya contra y manmanso gui tano jajajaso y finijo dinague .

text: Yea , they opened their mouth wide against me , and said , Aha , aha , our eye hath seen it .
text2: Magajet na jabababa y pachotñija contra guajo ; ilegñija : Ja , ja y atadogmameja lumie .

text: This thou hast seen , O LORD : keep not silence : O Lord , be not far from me .
text2: Unlie este , O Jeova ; chamo famatquiquilo : O Jeova , chamo chachago guiya guajo .

text: Stir up thyself , and awake to my judgment , even unto my cause , my God and my Lord .
text2: Jaso ya fagmata para y juisioco ; junggan , para y causaco Yuusso yan y Señotto .

text: Judge me , O LORD my God , according to thy righteousness ; and let them not rejoice over me .
text2: Jusgayo taemanoja y tininasmo , O Jeova , Yuusso , ya chamo pumopolo na ufanmamagof guiya guajo .

text: Let them not say in their hearts , Ah , so would we have it : let them not say , We have swallowed him up .
text2: Chamo pumopolo na ujaalog gui corasonñija : Ja , taegüije manmalagojit ; chamo pumopolo na ujaalog : Jita jagas tacalamot güe .

text: Let them be ashamed and brought to confusion together that rejoice at mine hurt : let them be clothed with shame and dishonour that magnify themselves against me .
text2: Polo ya ufanmamajlao ya ufañatsaga ayo sija y manmagof pot y manadañujo : polo ya ufanminagago ni y minamajlao yan y disonra y munadangculo sija contra guajo .

text: Let them shout for joy , and be glad , that favour my righteous cause : yea , let them say continually , Let the LORD be magnified , which hath pleasure in the prosperity of his servant .
text2: Polo ya ufanagang ni minagof ya ufanmagof y gumaeya y tinas na causaco : junggan , polo ya ujaalog siempre : innadangculo si Jeova , ni y yaña na memegae y tentagoña .

text: And my tongue shall speak of thy righteousness and of thy praise all the day long .
text2: Ya y jilajo usangan ni y tininasmo , yan todotdia ni y alabansamo .

text: The transgression of the wicked saith within my heart , that there is no fear of God before his eyes .
text2: YINEMBESTE y taelaye , ilegña gui corasonjo , taya minaañao as Yuus gui menan atadogña .

text: For he flattereth himself in his own eyes , until his iniquity be found to be hateful .
text2: Sa pot enao jafaande maesa güe gui atadogña , ya ti usoda y taelayeña ya umachatlie gue .

text: The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit : he hath left off to be wise , and to do good .
text2: Y finijo gui pachotña manaelaye yan finababa : basta güe ni utungo yan ufatinas y mauleg .

text: He deviseth mischief upon his bed ; he setteth himself in a way that is not good ; he abhorreth not evil .
text2: Y tinaelaye jajajaso gui jilo camaña : japolo maesa güe gui un chalan ni y ti mauleg : ti jachatlie y inacacha .

text: Thy mercy , O LORD , is in the heavens ; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds .
text2: O Jeova , asta y langet y güinaeyamo ; y minagajetmo inataca asta y mapagajes .

text: Thy righteousness is like the great mountains ; thy judgments are a great deep : O LORD , thou preservest man and beast .
text2: Y tininasmo taegüije y egso Yuus ; y juisiomo sija dangculoña tinadong : y taotao yan y gâgâ , jago umadadaje , O Jeova .

text: How excellent is thy lovingkindness , O God ! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings .
text2: Gosdangculo y balotña y güinaeyamo , O Yuus ! ya y famaguon taotao ufanmagogue gui papa y anineng y papamo .

text: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house ; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures .
text2: Ufansennajong ni y minegae y guimamo : ya jago unnafanguimen ni y sadog y minagofmo .

text: For with thee is the fountain of life : in thy light shall we see light .
text2: Sa iyajago nae gaegue y bebô y linâlâ : ya y ininamo nae infanmalie inina .

text: O continue thy lovingkindness unto them that know thee ; and thy righteousness to the upright in heart .
text2: Sisigueja y güinaeyamo para y tumungo jao ; ya y tininasmo para manunas na corason .

text: Let not the foot of pride come against me , and let not the hand of the wicked remove me .
text2: Chamo pumopolo ya ufato contra guajo y patas y sobetbio : ni y canae y manaelaye unasuja yo .

text: There are the workers of iniquity fallen : they are cast down , and shall not be able to rise .
text2: Ayo nae mamodong y manmamatitinas ni y taelaye : sija manmachoneg ya ti siña ufangajulo .

text: Fret not thyself because of evildoers , neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity .
text2: CHAMO umestotban mamaesa jao ni y chumogüe daño , ni unguaja embidia , ni y fumatitinas y taelaye .

text: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass , and wither as the green herb .
text2: Sa ufanmautut guse taegüijeja y chaguan , ya ufanmalayo taegüije y chaguan betde .

text: Trust in the LORD , and do good ; so shalt thou dwell in the land , and verily thou shalt be fed .
text2: Angocojao as Jeova , ya fatinas y mauleg : saga gui tano ya unchogüe minauleg .

text: Delight thyself also in the LORD ; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart .
text2: Magofjao as Jeova : ya güiya unninae ni guinagao y corasonmo .

text: Commit thy way unto the LORD ; trust also in him ; and he shall bring it to pass .
text2: Bira y chalanmo para as Jeova : ya angocogüe locue , ya güiya unajuyong este .

text: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light , and thy judgment as the noonday .
text2: Ya janajanao y tininasmo taegüije y manana : ya y juisiomo taegüije y taloane .

text: Rest in the LORD , and wait patiently for him : fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way , because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass .
text2: Quieto jao as Jeova , ya nanggagüe nu y siningon : chamo umestotban mamaesa jao ni y mumegae , gui chalanña ni y taotao ni fumatitinas y dinague .

text: Cease from anger , and forsake wrath : fret not thyself in any wise to do evil .
text2: Basta y binibo , ya polo y linalalo ; chamo umestotban mamaesa jao para unfatinas y dano .

text: For evildoers shall be cut off : but those that wait upon the LORD , they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Sa y chumogüe dano ufanmautut : lao y numanangga si Jeova , sija ujaereda y tano .

text: For yet a little while , and the wicked shall not be : yea , thou shalt diligently consider his place , and it shall not be .
text2: Ya desde este didide ti utaegüe y taelaye : magajet na jaguefjajaso y sagaña ya utaegüe güe .

text: But the meek shall inherit the earth ; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace .
text2: Lao y manmanso ujaereda y tano : ya ufanmagof maesa sija ni megae na pas .

text: The wicked plotteth against the just , and gnasheth upon him with his teeth .
text2: Y taelaye man jajaso dinague contra y manunas ya janachechegcheg y nifenñija guiya güiya .

text: The Lord shall laugh at him : for he seeth that his day is coming .
text2: Si Jeova chumachaleg pot güiya : sa jalilie na ufato gui jaaniña .

text: The wicked have drawn out the sword , and have bent their bow , to cast down the poor and needy , and to slay such as be of upright conversation .
text2: Y manaelaye jalagnos y espada , yan janadilog y atcosñija para uyute papa y mamoble yan y mannesesitao : para ujapuno sija y manunas gui chalan .

text: Their sword shall enter into their own heart , and their bows shall be broken .
text2: Y espadañija jumalom gui corasonñijaja ya y atcosñija umayamag .

text: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked .
text2: Maulegñaja y didide gui manunas , qui y minegae gui megae na manaelaye .

text: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken : but the LORD upholdeth the righteous .
text2: Sa y canae y manaelaye ufanmayamag : lao si Jeova jamantietene y manunas .

text: The LORD knoweth the days of the upright : and their inheritance shall be for ever .
text2: Jatungo si Jeova y jaanen y manunas : ya y erensiañija usaga para taejinecog .

text: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time : and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied .
text2: Sija , ti ufanmamajlao gui taelaye na tiempo : ya y jaanen ñinalang ufanjaspog .

text: But the wicked shall perish , and the enemies of the LORD shall be as the fat of lambs : they shall consume ; into smoke shall they consume away .
text2: Lao y manaelaye ufanmalingo : yan y enimigon Jeova ufanparejo y sebon cotdero sija : sija ufanlinachae , calang aso ufanguelinachae .

text: The wicked borroweth , and payeth not again : but the righteous sheweth mercy , and giveth .
text2: Y manaelaye mañuñule inayao ya ti jaapapasetalo : ya y manunas guaja minaaseñija ya mannae .

text: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth ; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off .
text2: Sa ayosija y manbendise pot güiya ujaereda y tano : ya ayosija y manmatdise pot güiya ufanmautut .

text: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD : and he delighteth in his way .
text2: Sa y jinanao y mauleg na taotao si Jeova mumantietene ; ya güiya yaña y chalanña .

text: Though he fall , he shall not be utterly cast down : for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand .
text2: Yaguin matomba , ti uguefpodong : sa si Jeova mumantietene nu y canaeña .

text: I have been young , and now am old ; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken , nor his seed begging bread .
text2: Guine patgon yo ya estayo bijo ; lao tatnae julie y mauleg madingo , ni y semiyaña manegagao nengcanoñija .

text: He is ever merciful , and lendeth ; and his seed is blessed .
text2: Todotdia guaja minaase yan ninaayao : ya y simiyaña para bendision .

text: Depart from evil , and do good ; and dwell for evermore .
text2: Suja gui taelaye , ya fatinas y mauleg ; ya sumasasaga jao para taejinecog .

text: For the LORD loveth judgment , and forsaketh not his saints ; they are preserved for ever : but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off .
text2: Sa si Jeova yaña y juisio , ya ti jadingo y mañantosña : sija ufanmaadaje para siempre : ya y semiyan y manaelaye ufanmautut .

text: The righteous shall inherit the land , and dwell therein for ever .
text2: Y manunas ujaereda y tano ya usaga para taejinecog gui jiloña .

text: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom , and his tongue talketh of judgment .
text2: Y pachot y manunas manguecuentos minalate , ya y jilaña cumuecuentos juisio .

text: The law of his God is in his heart ; none of his steps shall slide .
text2: Y lay y Yuusña gaegue gui corasonña , pot enao na y adengña ti usulong .

text: The wicked watcheth the righteous , and seeketh to slay him .
text2: Y taelaye jaespipia y tinas ya jaegaga para upuno .

text: The LORD will not leave him in his hand , nor condemn him when he is judged .
text2: Si Jeova ti upinelo gue gui canaeña : ni usinentensia güe yan manjusga .

text: Wait on the LORD , and keep his way , and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land : when the wicked are cut off , thou shalt see it .
text2: Nangga si Jeova ya adaje y chalanña , ya güiya unninataquilo para unereda y tano : anae y manaelaye ufanmautut , jago siempre unlie .

text: I have seen the wicked in great power , and spreading himself like a green bay tree .
text2: Guajo jagas julie y taelaye na dangculo ninasiñaña , ya janamayao güe , calang y atbot ni betde gui edaña .

text: Yet he passed away , and , lo , he was not : yea , I sought him , but he could not be found .
text2: Ya jumalofan ya estagüe , na taegüe : magajet na jualigao ya tisiña masoda .

text: Mark the perfect man , and behold the upright : for the end of that man is peace .
text2: Jaso y cabales , ya atan y tinas na taotao : sa y uttimoña ayo na taotao y pas .

text: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together : the end of the wicked shall be cut off .
text2: Lao y manaelaye todo manmayulang : ya y uttimon y manaelaye ufanmautut .

text: But the salvation of the righteous is of the LORD : he is their strength in the time of trouble .
text2: Lao y satbasion y manunas gui as Jeova : güiya y minetgotñija gui tiempon y chinatsaga .

text: And the LORD shall help them and deliver them : he shall deliver them from the wicked , and save them , because they trust in him .
text2: Ya si Jeova ufaninayuda ya uninafanlibre gui manaelay : ya uninafansatba sa sija numananggagüe .

text: O LORD , rebuke me not in thy wrath : neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure .
text2: O Jeova , chamoyo lumalálatde nu y lalalomo , ni uncastigayo nu y binibumo .

text: For thine arrows stick fast in me , and thy hand presseth me sore .
text2: Sa y flechamo cheton guiya guajo : ya y canaemo macat gui jilojo .

text: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger ; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin .
text2: Taya jinemlo gui catneco pot y binibumo : ya taya pas gui telangjo pot causa y isaojo .

text: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head : as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me .
text2: Sa y tinaelayeco malofan gui jilo ilujo : sija sen macat guiya guajo taegüije y catga macat .

text: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness .
text2: Y chetnotto manmutung yan manpotlilo , pot causa y binabajo .

text: I am troubled ; I am bowed down greatly ; I go mourning all the day long .
text2: Pinite yo yan gostumecon yo : todotdia jumajanaoyo yan umuugong yo .

text: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease : and there is no soundness in my flesh .
text2: Sa y atayojo bula sinenggue : ya taya jinemlo gui catneco .

text: I am feeble and sore broken : I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart .
text2: Manyafaeyo yan gosmamuteyo : cumate yo pot y atboroto gui corasonjo .

text: Lord , all my desire is before thee ; and my groaning is not hid from thee .
text2: Jeova , y menamo nae gaegue todo y tinangajo : ya y inigongjo tiunaatog guiya jago .

text: My heart panteth , my strength faileth me : as for the light of mine eyes , it also is gone from me .
text2: Y corasonjo bobongbong , y minetgotto malingo : ya y minalag y atadogjo fatta esta .

text: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore ; and my kinsmen stand afar off .
text2: Y gumaeya yo yan y mangachongjo manotojgue chago gui chetnotto ; ya parientesso manotojgue gui chago .

text: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me : and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things , and imagine deceits all the day long .
text2: Ayosija ni y umaliligao y antijo manmaplanta laso para guajo ; ya y umaliligao y dañujo manguecuentos tinaelaye : ya todotdia manmanajaso ni y finababa .

text: But I , as a deaf man , heard not ; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth .
text2: Lao guajo , calang tanga , ti jujungog : ya guajo calang udo ni ti ubaba y pachotña .

text: Thus I was as a man that heareth not , and in whose mouth are no reproofs .
text2: Magajet na guajo calang un taotao ni ti manjujungog : ya taya linalatde gui pachotña .

text: For in thee , O LORD , do I hope : thou wilt hear , O Lord my God .
text2: Sa iya jago , O Jeova , junanangga : jago unfanope , O Jeova , Yuusso .

text: For I said , Hear me , lest otherwise they should rejoice over me : when my foot slippeth , they magnify themselves against me .
text2: Sa ileco : Chañija fanmamagof guiya guajo : anae sulong y adengjo manladangculon sija guiya guajo .

text: For I am ready to halt , and my sorrow is continually before me .
text2: Sa guajo cana na ugadon : ya y pinitijo gaegue siesiempre gui menajo .

text: For I will declare mine iniquity ; I will be sorry for my sin .
text2: Sa bae jusangan y tinaelayeco ; bae jutriste pot y isaojo .

text: But mine enemies are lively , and they are strong : and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied .
text2: Sa y enimigujo manlâlâ ya manmetgot : ya mumemegaeja y chumatlieyo sin jafa .

text: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries ; because I follow the thing that good is .
text2: Ayosija locue ni y jaapapase y mauleg pot y taelaye , sija contrarionjo , sa judadalalag y mauleg .

text: Forsake me not , O LORD : O my God , be not far from me .
text2: Chamo dumidingoyo , O Jeova : O Yuusso , chamo chachago guiya guajo .

text: Make haste to help me , O Lord my salvation .
text2: Laguse ya unayudayo , O Jeova y satbasionjo .

text: I said , I will take heed to my ways , that I sin not with my tongue : I will keep my mouth with a bridle , while the wicked is before me .
text2: GUAJO ileco bae juadaje y chalanjo , para chajo umiisao pot y jilajo : bae juadaje y pachotto ni freno , anae y manaelaye mangaegue gui menajo .

text: I was dumb with silence , I held my peace , even from good ; and my sorrow was stirred .
text2: Jugueffamatquilo ya juquieto gui minauleg : ya y pinitijo manatbororota .

text: My heart was hot within me , while I was musing the fire burned : then spake I with my tongue ,
text2: Y corasonjo maepe gui sanjalomjo : anae jujajaso , y guafe mañoñonggue : ayo nae cumuentos yo yan y jilajo .

text: LORD , make me to know mine end , and the measure of my days , what it is ; that I may know how frail I am .
text2: Natungo yo , Jeova , ni uttimoco , yan y medidan y jaanijo cuanto guaja ; natungoyo jafa na checayo .

text: Behold , thou hast made my days as an handbreadth ; and mine age is as nothing before thee : verily every man at his best state is altogether vanity . Selah .
text2: Estagüe na un atafja unnae y jaanijo ; ya y sacanjo calangja taya gui menamo : sen magajet na todo y taotao taebale anae guaja mas balotña .

text: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew : surely they are disquieted in vain : he heapeth up riches , and knoweth not who shall gather them .
text2: Senmagajet na calang anineng jumajanao todo y taotao : senmagajet na taesetbe y atborotoñija : Sa manrecocoje y güinaja ya ti jatungo jaye y chinile .

text: And now , Lord , what wait I for ? my hope is in thee .
text2: Ya pago , Jeova , jafa junangga ? y ninanggaco gaegue guiya jago .

text: Deliver me from all my transgressions : make me not the reproach of the foolish .
text2: Nalibre yo gui todo y tinaelayeco , chamoyo pumopolo na jumanamamajlao gui taetiningo .

text: I was dumb , I opened not my mouth ; because thou didst it .
text2: Guajo mamatquilo , ti jubaba y pachotto : sa jago fumatinas .

text: Remove thy stroke away from me : I am consumed by the blow of thine hand .
text2: Najanao guiya guajo y sinaulagmo : sa pot y tinetpen y canaemo lumachaeyo .

text: When thou with rebukes dost correct man for iniquity , thou makest his beauty to consume away like a moth : surely every man is vanity . Selah .
text2: Anae unnatunas y taotao nu y linalatde , pot y tinaelaye , ninalachae y bonituña taegüije y puliya : senmagajet na todo y taotao taebale .

text: Hear my prayer , O LORD , and give ear unto my cry ; hold not thy peace at my tears : for I am a stranger with thee , and a sojourner , as all my fathers were .
text2: Jungog y tinaetaejo , O Jeova , ecungog y inagangjo : chamo famatquilo gui menan y lagojo : sa taotao tumano yo guiya jago : pago finatoyo taegüeje y mañaenajo todos .

text: O spare me , that I may recover strength , before I go hence , and be no more .
text2: Poloyo ya jufañule minetgot , antes de jujanao ya ti jutalo .

text: I waited patiently for the LORD ; and he inclined unto me , and heard my cry .
text2: JUNANGGA nu y siningon as Jeova ; ya janaegueng maesa güe guiya guajo , ya jajungog y inagangjo .

text: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit , out of the miry clay , and set my feet upon a rock , and established my goings .
text2: Ya güiya chumule yo guinin un joyo chatliion , guinin fache na tadong : ya japolo y adengjo gui jilo acho , ya janafitme y jinanaojo .

text: And he hath put a new song in my mouth , even praise unto our God : many shall see it , and fear , and shall trust in the LORD .
text2: Ya japolo gui pachotto canta na mannuebo , junggan , y alabansa gui Yuusta . Megae lumie ya manmaañao , ya ufanangoco as Jeova .

text: Blessed is that man that maketh the LORD his trust , and respecteth not the proud , nor such as turn aside to lies .
text2: Dichoso y taotao ni jaangoco gui as Jeova : ya ti jaaatan y mansobetbio ni y manabag manmalag y mandague .

text: Many , O LORD my God , are thy wonderful works which thou hast done , and thy thoughts which are to us - ward : they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee : if I would declare and speak of them , they are more than can be numbered .
text2: Megae O Jeova , y ninamanmanmo ni unfatinas : yan y jinasomo para jame ; ti siña maaregla sija gui menamo : yaguin guajo judeclara ya jusangang sija , tisiña matufong sa gosmegae .

text: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire ; mine ears hast thou opened : burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required .
text2: Y inefresen ninae ti yamo : y talangajo jagasja unbaba : inefresen sinenggue ya y ninae pot y isao , ti jagasja ungagao .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come : in the volume of the book it is written of me ,
text2: Ayo nae ileco : Estagüe na matoyo : gui finalulon y leblo nae esta matugue pot guajo .

text: I delight to do thy will , O my God : yea , thy law is within my heart .
text2: Yajo para jufatinas y minalagomo , O Yuusso : magajet na y laymo gaegue gui jalom corasonjo .

text: I have preached righteousness in the great congregation : lo , I have not refrained my lips , O LORD , thou knowest .
text2: Guajo jagas jusangan y tininas gui jalom y dangculo na inetnon taotao : estagüe , na ti junaquiequeto y labiosso , O Jeova , jago tumungo .

text: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart ; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation : I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation .
text2: Ti junaatog y tininasmo gui jalom corasonjo ; y minagajetmo yan satbasionmo jagas jusangan : ti jupune y minaasemo yan y minaulegmo gui dangculon inetnon taotao .

text: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me , O LORD : let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me .
text2: Jago , O Jeova , chamo dumitietietene y minaasemo para guajo : sa y minaasemo yan y minagajetmo juadadaje yo para taejinecog .

text: For innumerable evils have compassed me about : mine iniquities have taken hold upon me , so that I am not able to look up ; they are more than the hairs of mine head : therefore my heart faileth me .
text2: Sa gaegue gui oriyajo y tinaelaye asta ti tufungon : jajiguef yo y tinaelayeco sija , ya ti siña juatan julo ; megaeña mas que y gapotulo gui ilujo , ya y corasonjo yafae esta .

text: Be pleased , O LORD , to deliver me : O LORD , make haste to help me .
text2: Malagojao , O Jeova , unnalibreyo : O Jeova , laguse para unayudayo .

text: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it ; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil .
text2: Polo ya ufanmamajlao ya ufaninestotba ayo y umaliligao y antijo para uyulang : polo ya ufanalo tate ya ufanmamajlao , ni y yañija y munataelaye yo .

text: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me , Aha , aha .
text2: Polo ya ufanlapoble sija , pot y minamajlaoñija , ni y umaalog ni guajo : Ja , ja .

text: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee : let such as love thy salvation say continually , The LORD be magnified .
text2: Polo ya ufanmagof ya ufansemagof ni jago , todo y umaliligao jao : ya polo ya siesiempreja ujaalog , y gumaeya y satbasionmo : Ladangculo Jeova .

text: But I am poor and needy ; yet the Lord thinketh upon me : thou art my help and my deliverer ; make no tarrying , O my God .
text2: Ya guajo pobleyo ya nesesitaoyo ; lao si Jeova jajajasoyo . Jago y umayuyudayo yan y munalibre yo : O Yuusso , chamo atrasasao .

text: Blessed is he that considereth the poor : the LORD will deliver him in time of trouble .
text2: DICHOSO ayo y maase ni y mamoble ; sa y jaanen y tinaelaye nae , si Jeova ulinibre .

text: The LORD will preserve him , and keep him alive ; and he shall be blessed upon the earth : and thou wilt not deliver him unto the will of his enemies .
text2: Si Jeova uinadajegüe , yan umantiene güe lâlâ ; ya güiya udichoso gui tano ; ya tiuenentrega güe gui minalago y enemiguña .

text: The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing : thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness .
text2: Si Jeova uinayuda güe jilo camaña ni y pinitiña ; unfatinas todo y camaña anae malango .

text: I said , LORD , be merciful unto me : heal my soul ; for I have sinned against thee .
text2: Guajo ilegco : Jeova gaease nu guajo : najomlo y antijo ; sa umisaoyo contra jago .

text: Mine enemies speak evil of me , When shall he die , and his name perish ?
text2: y enemigujo jasangan y taelaye contra guajo ilegñija : Ngaean umatae , ya ufalingo y naanña ?

text: And if he come to see me , he speaketh vanity : his heart gathereth iniquity to itself ; when he goeth abroad , he telleth it .
text2: Anae mato para uliiyo , jasangan y taebale ; y corasonña nae mandaña y tinaelaye pot güiyaja ; anae jumanao juyong jasangan ayo .

text: All that hate me whisper together against me : against me do they devise my hurt .
text2: Todo y chumatliiyo manañangon entre sija contra guajo ; contra guajo nae majaso y tinaelayeco .

text: An evil disease , say they , cleaveth fast unto him : and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more .
text2: Ti mauleg na chetnot , ilegñija , sumaga guiya güiya ; sa anae umason gui cama ti siña ninacajulo talo .

text: Yea , mine own familiar friend , in whom I trusted , which did eat of my bread , hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Ya ayo y güinaeyaco nae juangocoyo , güiya y cumano y najo pan , jajatsa y dedegoña contra guajo .

text: But thou , O LORD , be merciful unto me , and raise me up , that I may requite them .
text2: Lao jago Jeova , gaease nu guajo , ya unacajuloyo , para juapase sija .

text: By this I know that thou favourest me , because mine enemy doth not triumph over me .
text2: Pot este jutungo , na unmagof guiya guajo , sa y enemigujo ti ujagana yo .

text: And as for me , thou upholdest me in mine integrity , and settest me before thy face for ever .
text2: Ya guajo , gui quinabalesso unmantieneyo ; ya unpoloyo gui menamo para taejinecog .

text: Blessed be the LORD God of Israel from everlasting , and to everlasting . Amen , and Amen .
text2: Bendesido si Jeova ni y Yuus Israel , ni y taejinecog , yan taejinecog . Amen , Amen .

text: As the hart panteth after the water brooks , so panteth my soul after thee , O God .
text2: TAEGÜIJE y benabo ni y guija , ni y malago ni y minilalag y janom : taegüijeja locue y antijo sumospípiros pot jago , O Yuus .

text: My soul thirsteth for God , for the living God : when shall I come and appear before God ?
text2: Y antijo majo pot si Yuus , pot y lalâlâ na Yuus ; ngaean nae jufato , ya juanog gui menan Yuus ?

text: My tears have been my meat day and night , while they continually say unto me , Where is thy God ?
text2: Y lagojo guinin nengcanojo , jaane yan puenge , ya todo y jaane ilegñiñijaja nu guajo : Manggue y Yuusmo ?

text: When I remember these things , I pour out my soul in me : for I had gone with the multitude , I went with them to the house of God , with the voice of joy and praise , with a multitude that kept holyday .
text2: Anae jujaso estesija , machuda juyong y antijo guiya guajo , anae manmalofan y linajyan taotao , maposyo , ya jucone sija asta y guimayuus ; yan y minagof , yan y tinina ; un linajyan na umadadaje y guipot na jaane .

text: Why art thou cast down , O my soul ? and why art thou disquieted in me ? hope thou in God : for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance .
text2: Jafa na dumilogjao , O antijo ? yan jafa na estotbajao gui jinalomjo ? Nangga jao si Yuus , sa guajo bae jutuna güe pot y ayudo gui menaña .

text: O my God , my soul is cast down within me : therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan , and of the Hermonites , from the hill Mizar .
text2: Yuusso , y antijo esta dumilog gui jinalomjo ; pot enao na jujajasojao desde y tano guiya Jordan , yan Hermonitas , desde y egso Misar .

text: Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts : all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me .
text2: Un tinadong , jaagang y otro tinadong , pot palangpang y janommo sija : todo y napomo , yan y langatmo , manmalofan gui jilojo .

text: Yet the LORD will command his lovingkindness in the daytime , and in the night his song shall be with me , and my prayer unto the God of my life .
text2: Jatago si Jeova y minaaseña gui jaane , ya y puenge y cantaña guiya guajo , ya y tinaetae para y Yuus a linâlâjo .

text: I will say unto God my rock , Why hast thou forgotten me ? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy ?
text2: Jualog as Yuus , y achojo : Jafa na malefajao nu guajo ? Jafa mina na tristeyo pot y chiniguit y enemigo ?

text: As with a sword in my bones , mine enemies reproach me ; while they say daily unto me , Where is thy God ?
text2: Parejoja yan y espada gui telangjo , y enemigujo mamofeayo , anae ilegñija cada jaane nu guajo : Mano nae gaegue y Yuusmo ?

text: Why art thou cast down , O my soul ? and why art thou disquieted within me ? hope thou in God : for I shall yet praise him , who is the health of my countenance , and my God .
text2: Jafa na dumilog jao , O antijo ? yan jafa na , estotbajao gui jinalomjo ? Nangga si Yuus , sa bae jutuna güe , ni y ayuda nu y matajo , yan y Yuusso .

text: Judge me , O God , and plead my cause against an ungodly nation : O deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man .
text2: JUSGAYO , O Yuus , ya unsangan y mumujo contra y nasion ni y ti manjonggue : O coneyo gui manmandadague , yan y manaelaye na taotao .

text: For thou art the God of my strength : why dost thou cast me off ? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy ?
text2: Sa jago Yuus y ninasiñajo ; jafa na unrechasa ? ya fafa mina tristeyo pot y chiniguit y enemigo ?

text: O send out thy light and thy truth : let them lead me ; let them bring me unto thy holy hill , and to thy tabernacles .
text2: O tago y mananamo , yan y minagajetmo ; ya uesgaejonyo : ya uchuleyo asta y santos na egsomo , yan y tabetnaculumo .

text: Then will I go unto the altar of God , unto God my exceeding joy : yea , upon the harp will I praise thee , O God my God .
text2: Sa bae jujalom gui attat Yuus , y as Yuus nae gaegue y dangculon minagofjo ; Ja jutuna jao yan y atpa , O Yuus , Yuusso .

text: Why art thou cast down , O my soul ? and why art thou disquieted within me ? hope in God : for I shall yet praise him , who is the health of my countenance , and my God .
text2: Jafa na dumilog jao , O antijo ? yan jafa na estotba jao gui jinalomjo ? Nangga si Yuus ; sa bae jutuna güe , ni y inayuda nu y matajo , yan y Yuusso .

text: We have heard with our ears , O God , our fathers have told us , what work thou didst in their days , in the times of old .
text2: JAME injingog ni y talanganmame , O Yuus , na jasanganejam y tantanmane , ni y finatinasmo gui tiemponñija , gui antiguo na tiempo .

text: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand , and plantedst them ; how thou didst afflict the people , and cast them out .
text2: Nu y canaemoja unyute y nasion , ya unpolo sija ; unnafantriste y taotao sija , ya unnafanjanao .

text: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword , neither did their own arm save them : but thy right hand , and thine arm , and the light of thy countenance , because thou hadst a favour unto them .
text2: Sa ti inchile y tano pot espadanñija para iyonñija , ni ti unnafanlibre pot y canaeñija ; lao y agapa na canaemo yan y canaemo , yan y minalag y matamo , sa unguaeya sija .

text: Thou art my King , O God : command deliverances for Jacob .
text2: Jago y Rayjo , O Yuus : fanago linibre para si Jacob .

text: Through thee will we push down our enemies : through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us .
text2: Pot jago na inyite papa y enemigonmame : pot y naanmo , na ingacha y mangajulo contra jame .

text: For I will not trust in my bow , neither shall my sword save me .
text2: Sa ti juangocoyo ni y flechaco , ni y espadajo ti ulibreyo .

text: But thou hast saved us from our enemies , and hast put them to shame that hated us .
text2: Sa jago umadadajejam gui enemigonmame ; ya y chumatliijam unnafanmamajlao .

text: In God we boast all the day long , and praise thy name for ever . Selah .
text2: Ya gui as Yuus tatunanmaesa jit todot dia ; ya para taejinecog , intina y naanmo .

text: But thou hast cast off , and put us to shame ; and goest not forth with our armies .
text2: Lao pago unyute jam , ya unnafanmamajlaojam ; ya ti jumanaojao yan y inetnon sendalonmame .

text: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy : and they which hate us spoil for themselves .
text2: Unbirajam tate guinin y enemigonmame ; ya ayo sija y chumatliijam , manmañaque para sija namaesa .

text: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat ; and hast scattered us among the heathen .
text2: Unpolojam taegüije y quinilo ni y para umacano ; ya janafanmachalaponjam gui entalo y nasion .

text: Thou sellest thy people for nought , and dost not increase thy wealth by their price .
text2: Unbende y taotaomo pot taya ; ya ti mumegae y güinajamo pot y balenñija .

text: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours , a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us .
text2: Unnafanmamajlaojam ni y tiguangmame ; pot y manmanmofefea , yan manmanbotlelea ni y mangaegue gui oriyanmame .

text: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen , a shaking of the head among the people .
text2: Unnafanmafa y sinanganjam gui entalo y nasion , pot y yinengyong y ilonñija gui entalo y taotao sija .

text: My confusion is continually before me , and the shame of my face hath covered me ,
text2: Y desenrajo gaegueja gui menajo todot dia ; ya y minamajlao y matajo jatampe yo .

text: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth ; by reason of the enemy and avenger .
text2: Sa y inagang ayo y numanamamajlao , yan y chumatfino contra si Yuus ; pot y enemigo yan y taotao ni y maneemog .

text: All this is come upon us ; yet have we not forgotten thee , neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant .
text2: Todo este manmato guiya jame ; lao ti manmalelefajam nu jago , ni ti manmatinasjam mandague ni y tratumo .

text: Our heart is not turned back , neither have our steps declined from thy way ;
text2: Y corasonmame ti inbira tate ; ni y pinecatmame ti sumuja gui chalanmo .

text: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons , and covered us with the shadow of death .
text2: Masqueseaja unyamagjam gui sagan y jacal sija , ya untampejam ni y aninen y finatae .

text: If we have forgotten the name of our God , or stretched out our hands to a strange god ;
text2: Yanguin manmalefajam ni y naan Yuusmame , ya inestira y canaemame pot y otro Yuus ;

text: Shall not God search this out ? for he knoweth the secrets of the heart .
text2: Ada ti ualigaojam si Yuus ? Sa jatungoja y secreton y corason .

text: Yea , for thy sake are we killed all the day long ; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Junggan , pot y jago manmapunojam todo y inanaco y jaane ; manmatufongjam taegüije y quinilo ni y para umapuno .

text: Awake , why sleepest thou , O Lord ? arise , cast us not off for ever .
text2: Fagmata , jafajao na mamaego , Señot ? Cajulo , chamojam yumuyute para siempre .

text: Wherefore hidest thou thy face , and forgettest our affliction and our oppression ?
text2: Pot jafa nae unnaatog y matamo , ya malefajao ni y pinitenmame yan y chiniguitmame .

text: For our soul is bowed down to the dust : our belly cleaveth unto the earth .
text2: Y antenmame esta dumilog gui petbos ; ya y tiyanmame cheton papa gui tano .

text: Arise for our help , and redeem us for thy mercies ' sake .
text2: Cajulo ya unayudajam , ya unnafanlibrejam gui minaasemo .

text: My heart is inditing a good matter : I speak of the things which I have made touching the king : my tongue is the pen of a ready writer .
text2: Y corasonjo machúchuda nu y mauleg na güinaja ; jusangan ayo sija y para y ray ; y jilajo , calang y pluman y chadeg mangue .

text: Thou art fairer than the children of men : grace is poured into thy lips : therefore God hath blessed thee for ever .
text2: Guefpaguñajao qui y famaguon y taotao sija : y grasia machúchuda jalom gui labiosmo ; enaomina binendisejao as Yuus , para taejinecog .

text: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh , O most mighty , with thy glory and thy majesty .
text2: Gode y espadamo gui cháchagamo , O gosbalente jao , yan y langetmo yan y minagasmo .

text: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness ; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things .
text2: Ya y minagasmo sigue di mumegae , sa pot y minagajet , yan y minanso , yan tininas : ya y agapa na canaemo unfinanagüe ni y mannamaañao na güinaja .

text: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king ' s enemies ; whereby the people fall under thee .
text2: Y flechamo manacadedog ; mamodong y taotao gui papamo ; sija gaegue gui corason y enemigon y ray .

text: Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre .
text2: Y tronumo taejinecog , yan taejinecog , O Yuus : y bariyan y raenomo , tunas na bariya .

text: Thou lovest righteousness , and hatest wickedness : therefore God , thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Unguaeya y tininas , ya unchatlie y tinaelaye ; enaomina si Yuus ni y Yuusmo , pinalaejao ni y lañan minagof , mas qui y mangachongmo .

text: All thy garments smell of myrrh , and aloes , and cassia , out of the ivory palaces , whereby they have made thee glad .
text2: manjuyonggui palasyon matfit , anae guinatbon musica manamagofjao .

text: Kings ' daughters were among thy honourable women : upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir .
text2: Y jaga sija y ray , mangaegue gui entalo y manonrada na famalaoanmo ; ya y rayna matátachong gui agapamo yan y magaguña y oron Ofir .

text: Hearken , O daughter , and consider , and incline thine ear ; forget also thine own people , and thy father ' s house ;
text2: Jungog O jaga , jaso ya tecon y talangamo ; ya unmalefa ni y mañataotaomo , yan y guima tatamo .

text: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty : for he is thy Lord ; and worship thou him .
text2: Ya ugosmalago y ray ni y bonitamo ; sa güiya y Señotmo yanguin unadora güe .

text: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift ; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour .
text2: Ya y jagan Tiro yan y ninae ugaegue güije ; asta y manrico gui entalo y taotao unmagaogao ni y fabotmo .

text: The king ' s daughter is all glorious within : her clothing is of wrought gold .
text2: Y jagan y ray , gui palasyo gosbonita güe : y magaguña maadotna ni y oro .

text: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework : the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee .
text2: Macone guato gui as ray , yan y magaguña ni y mabotda : y bitgen sija mangachongña ni y tumattitiye , sija unquinenie guato .

text: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought : they shall enter into the king ' s palace .
text2: Sija machulilie guato yan minagof yan alegria : ufanjalom gui palasyon y ray .

text: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children , whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth .
text2: Gui lugat si tatamo , y ugaegae y famaguonmo ; unnafanprinsipe gui todo y tano .

text: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations : therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever .
text2: Guajo junamajaso y naanmo gui todo y generasion sija : enaomina y taotao sija mannaejao grasias para taejinecog yan taejinecog .

text: God is our refuge and strength , a very present help in trouble .
text2: SI Yuus , güiya y guinegüeta yan y minetgotta , enseguidas manayuda gui chinatsaga .

text: Therefore will not we fear , though the earth be removed , and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea ;
text2: Enaomina mungajit manmaañao , achogaja ucalamten y tano , yan y egso umachule asta y talo gui tase sija ;

text: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled , though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof . Selah .
text2: Achogaja manapangpang y janom ya chatsaga ; achogaja umayeyengyong y egso sija , pot causa y minatatgaña . Sila .

text: There is a river , the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God , the holy place of the tabernacles of the most High .
text2: Ayogüeja y sadog yan y minilalagña sija janamamagof y siuda Yuus ; y santos na sagan y tabetnaculo guiya Gueftaquilo .

text: God is in the midst of her ; she shall not be moved : God shall help her , and that right early .
text2: Si Yuus gaegue gui entaloña ; ti ucalamten ; si Yuus uinayuda y ininan y egaan .

text: The heathen raged , the kingdoms were moved : he uttered his voice , the earth melted .
text2: Manlalalo y nasion sija , ya mangalamten y raeno sija ; umagang , ya maderite y tano .

text: The LORD of hosts is with us ; the God of Jacob is our refuge . Selah .
text2: Manjijita yan y Señot y inetnon sendalo . Y Yuus Jacob , güiya y guinegüeta . Sila .

text: Come , behold the works of the LORD , what desolations he hath made in the earth .
text2: Maela ya inlie y checho Jeova ; Jafa na yinilang jafatinas gui jilo tano ?

text: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth ; he breaketh the bow , and cutteth the spear in sunder ; he burneth the chariot in the fire .
text2: Güiya munabasta y guera , asta y uttimon y tano ; jayulang y atcos , ya jautut y lansa ; güiya sumonggue y caretan guera gui guafe .

text: Be still , and know that I am God : I will be exalted among the heathen , I will be exalted in the earth .
text2: Quieto , ya untungo na guajo si Yuus : jutaquilo gui entalo y nasion sija , jutaquilo gui tano .

text: The LORD of hosts is with us ; the God of Jacob is our refuge . Selah .
text2: Manjijita yan y Señot y inetnon sendalo . Y Yuus Jacob , güiya y guinegüeta . Sila .

text: O clap your hands , all ye people ; shout unto God with the voice of triumph .
text2: NAFAMAGPAG y canaemiyo todo jamya na taotao ; agang si Yuus ni y inagang guinana .

text: For the LORD most high is terrible ; he is a great King over all the earth .
text2: Sa si Jeova sentaquilo yan namaañao ; Güiya mas dangculo na ray gui jilo todo y tano .

text: He shall subdue the people under us , and the nations under our feet .
text2: Güiya ugana todo y taotao ya upolo gui papata ; yan y nasion sija gui papa adengta .

text: He shall choose our inheritance for us , the excellency of Jacob whom he loved . Selah .
text2: Güiya umayig y erensiata ni y para jita : y minagas gui as Jacob ni y güinaeyaña . Sila .

text: God is gone up with a shout , the LORD with the sound of a trumpet .
text2: Si Yuus mapos julo yan y inagang , si Jeova yan y sonidon y trompeta .

text: Sing praises to God , sing praises : sing praises unto our King , sing praises .
text2: Fanganta tinina sija para si Yuus ; fanganta tinina sija ; fanganta tinina sija para y rayta , fanganta tinina sija .

text: For God is the King of all the earth : sing ye praises with understanding .
text2: Sa si Yuus güiya ray todo y tano : fanganta y tinina sija , yan y tiningo .

text: God reigneth over the heathen : God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness .
text2: Si Yuus mangobiebietna gui jilo y nasion sija ; si Yuus matatachong gui tronon y sinantosña .

text: The princes of the people are gathered together , even the people of the God of Abraham : for the shields of the earth belong unto God : he is greatly exalted .
text2: Sa y prinsipen y taotao sija mandaña ufantaotao y Yuus Abraham ; sa y patang y tano , iyon Yuus : Güiya y sentaquilo .

text: Great is the LORD , and greatly to be praised in the city of our God , in the mountain of his holiness .
text2: DANGCULO si Yuus , ya para umagueftuna , gui siuda y Yuusta , gui egso y sinantosña .

text: Beautiful for situation , the joy of the whole earth , is mount Zion , on the sides of the north , the city of the great King .
text2: Bonito na sagayan , y minagof todo gui tano , y egso Sion gui sumanlago na banda , siuda y dangculo na ray .

text: God is known in her palaces for a refuge .
text2: Si Yuus esta matungo gui jalom y palasyoña , na para y guinegüe .

text: For , lo , the kings were assembled , they passed by together .
text2: Sa estagüe y ray sija na mandaña , manmalofan ya mandadañaja .

text: They saw it , and so they marvelled ; they were troubled , and hasted away .
text2: Manmalie , ya luego ninafanmanman ; ninafañatsaga , ya maninalulula manjanao .

text: Fear took hold upon them there , and pain , as of a woman in travail .
text2: Y mayengyong gumote sija güije ; yan y pinite taegüije y palaoan yan para ufañago .

text: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind .
text2: Jago yumamag y batcon Tarsis , ni y manglo sancatan .

text: As we have heard , so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts , in the city of our God : God will establish it for ever . Selah .
text2: Jaftaemanoja y jiningogmame , taegüijeja liniimame gui siuda y Señot y inetnon sendalo ; gui siuda y Yuusmame : si Yuus plumanta para taejinecog . Sila .

text: We have thought of thy lovingkindness , O God , in the midst of thy temple .
text2: Injaso y güinaeyamo , O Yuus , gui talo gui templomo .

text: According to thy name , O God , so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth : thy right hand is full of righteousness .
text2: Jaftaemanoja y naanmo , O Yuus , taegüijeja y tininamo asta y uttimon y tano : y agapa na canaemo , bula ni y tininas .

text: Let mount Zion rejoice , let the daughters of Judah be glad , because of thy judgments .
text2: Namagof y egso Sion , yan sija jagan Juda ufanmagof ; pot y jinisgamo sija .

text: Walk about Zion , and go round about her : tell the towers thereof .
text2: Famocat gui Sion , ya unjanagüe y oriyaña ; ya untufong y tore güije .

text: Mark ye well her bulwarks , consider her palaces ; that ye may tell it to the generation following .
text2: Matca y colatña ni y munaseguguro , ya injaso y palasyoña ; para usiña jamyo insangane y generasion ni y mamamaela .

text: For this God is our God for ever and ever : he will be our guide even unto death .
text2: Sa este na Yuus , y Yuusta para taejinecog , yan taejinecog : güiya uesgaejonjit , asta y finataeta .

text: Hear this , all ye people ; give ear , all ye inhabitants of the world :
text2: JINGOG este todo jamyo ni y taotao ; ecungog jamyo todos ni y mañasaga . gui tano :

text: Both low and high , rich and poor , together .
text2: Jamyo todo mandaña , y managpapa , y managquilo , y manrico , yan y mamoble .

text: My mouth shall speak of wisdom ; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding .
text2: Y pachotto usangan y minalate ; ya y jinason y corasonjo y tiningo .

text: I will incline mine ear to a parable : I will open my dark saying upon the harp .
text2: Bae juecungog y parabola ; ya jubaba y jemjom sinanganjo gui atpa .

text: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil , when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about ?
text2: Sajafa na maañaoyo gui jaanen y tinaelaye , anae y tinaelayen y dedegoco jaoriyayayeyo ?

text: They that trust in their wealth , and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches ;
text2: Ayo y umangongoco sija ni y güinajañija , yan jatunanmaesaja ni y minegae y riniconñija ;

text: None of them can by any means redeem his brother , nor give to God a ransom for him :
text2: Taya guiya sija siña umapasiye y cheluña , ni unae si Yuus ni y rumescata güe ;

text: ( For the redemption of their soul is precious , and it ceaseth for ever : )
text2: ( Sa y ninálibre y antinñija , dangculo presiuña , ya para upolu para siempre . )

text: That he should still live for ever , and not see corruption .
text2: Para ulâlâ asta y taejinecog , ya ti ulie minitong .

text: For he seeth that wise men die , likewise the fool and the brutish person perish , and leave their wealth to others .
text2: Sa jalie na y manmalate na taotao sija manmamataeja , y manaejinaso yan y manbababa , manmalingo , ya japolo y güinajañija para y palo .

text: Their inward thought is , that their houses shall continue for ever , and their dwelling places to all generations ; they call their lands after their own names .
text2: Y jinason y sumanjalomñija , na y guimañija usaga para taejinecog , ya y anae mañasaga na lugat para y todo generasion sija ; ya jafanaan y tanoñija , ni y naanñijaja .

text: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not : he is like the beasts that perish .
text2: Lao y taotao ti sumaga gui onraña , parejoja yan y gâgâ na matae .

text: This their way is their folly : yet their posterity approve their sayings . Selah .
text2: Este y jinanaoñiñija , y binabanñiñijaja ; ya anae esta manmapos , manmagof y taotao nu y sinanganñija . Sila .

text: Like sheep they are laid in the grave ; death shall feed on them ; and the upright shall have dominion over them in the morning ; and their beauty shall consume in the grave from their dwelling .
text2: Sija ufanquinano gui naftan parejoja yan y manadan quinilo y finatae upinasto sija ; ya y manunas mangaeninasiña gui jiloñija gui egaan ; ya y boninituñija , para ulachae gui jalom naftan , sa taya sagaña .

text: But God will redeem my soul from the power of the grave : for he shall receive me . Selah .
text2: Lao si Yuus unalibre y antijo gui ninasiñan y naftan ; sa uresibeyo . Sila .

text: Be not thou afraid when one is made rich , when the glory of his house is increased ;
text2: Chamo maaañao , yanguin guaja taotao urico ; yanguin y güinaja , y guimaña mumémegae ;

text: For when he dieth he shall carry nothing away : his glory shall not descend after him .
text2: Sa yanguin matae , taya uchule ; y güinajaña , ti udinalalaggüe .

text: Though while he lived he blessed his soul : and men will praise thee , when thou doest well to thyself .
text2: Achogaja anae lalâlâ , dichoso y antiña ; sa matutunajao ni y taotao sija , yanguin unfamauleg mamaesajao .

text: He shall go to the generation of his fathers ; they shall never see light .
text2: Ujanao para y generasion tataña ; ti ufanmanlie manana .

text: Man that is in honour , and understandeth not , is like the beasts that perish .
text2: Y taotao ni y maoonra , ya ti matungo ; parejoja yan y gâgâ ni y umatae .

text: The mighty God , even the LORD , hath spoken , and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof .
text2: SI Yuus , junggan , si Yuus , si Jeova sumangan , ya jaagang y tano desde y quinajulo y atdao asta y tumunogña papa güije .

text: Out of Zion , the perfection of beauty , God hath shined .
text2: Y sumanjiyong Sion , gosbonito , sí Yuus umiina .

text: Our God shall come , and shall not keep silence : a fire shall devour before him , and it shall be very tempestuous round about him .
text2: Y Yuusta ufato , ya ti ufamatquilo : y guafe ufanlinachae gui menaña , ya uguaja dangculon pinagyo gui oriyaña .

text: He shall call to the heavens from above , and to the earth , that he may judge his people .
text2: uagang gui taquilo na langet yan y tano , para ujusga y taotaoña .

text: Gather my saints together unto me ; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice .
text2: Nafandaña y mañantos guiya guajo ; ayo sija y fumatinas y tratujo pot y inefrese .

text: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness : for God is judge himself . Selah .
text2: Y langet udineclara y tininasña : sa si Yuus güiyaja y jues . Sila .

text: Hear , O my people , and I will speak ; O Israel , and I will testify against thee : I am God , even thy God .
text2: Jingog , O taotaojo , ya jusangan ; O Israel , ya bae jusangan testimonio contra jago : guajo si Yuus , ni si Yuusmo .

text: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices or thy burnt offerings , to have been continually before me .
text2: Ti julalatde jao pot y inefresimo , ya y inefresimo sinenggue , para todo y jaane gui menajo .

text: I will take no bullock out of thy house , nor he goats out of thy folds .
text2: Sa ti jufangone nubiyo gui guimamo , ni laje na chiba gui quelatmo .

text: For every beast of the forest is mine , and the cattle upon a thousand hills .
text2: Sa todo y gâgâ gui jalom tano , gâjo , yan y gâgâ sija gui jilo y mit na sabana .

text: I know all the fowls of the mountains : and the wild beasts of the field are mine .
text2: Sa jutungo todo y pajaro gui jalom tano ; y manmachaleg na gâgâ sija gui jalomtano ; todo gâjo .

text: If I were hungry , I would not tell thee : for the world is mine , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Yanguin ñalangyo , ti jusanganejao ; sa iyoco y tano , yan y sinajguanña .

text: Will I eat the flesh of bulls , or drink the blood of goats ?
text2: Juchoco catnen nubiyo , pat jugui . men jâgâ chiba ?

text: Offer unto God thanksgiving ; and pay thy vows unto the most High :
text2: Nae si Yuus inefresen grasia ; ya unapase y promesamo gui Gueftaquilo .

text: And call upon me in the day of trouble : I will deliver thee , and thou shalt glorify me .
text2: Ya unagangyo gui jaanen y chinatsaga : junalibrejao , ya siempre unonrayo .

text: But unto the wicked God saith , What hast thou to do to declare my statutes , or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth ?
text2: Lao ilegña si Yuus ni y manaelaye ; Jafa unfatinas para undeclara y tina . gojo , pat jagas unchule y tratujo gui pachotmo ?

text: Seeing thou hatest instruction , and castest my words behind thee .
text2: Sa jago unchatlie y finanagüe , ya unyute y sinanganjo gui tatemo .

text: When thou sawest a thief , then thou consentedst with him , and hast been partaker with adulterers .
text2: Anae unlie y saque , undalalag güe ; yan jagas gaepattejao yan y manábale .

text: Thou givest thy mouth to evil , and thy tongue frameth deceit .
text2: Sa unnasetbe y pachotmo gui tae laye , ya y jilamo fumatitinas ocodon dinague .

text: Thou sittest and speakest against thy brother ; thou slanderest thine own mother ' s son .
text2: Matátachongjao , ya cumuecuentosjao contra y chelumo ; undesonra y lajin nanamo .

text: These things hast thou done , and I kept silence ; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself : but I will reprove thee , and set them in order before thine eyes .
text2: Estesija finatinasmo , lao mamatquiquilojayo : jinasomo na parejojitja : lao bae julalatdejao , ya jupolo tinaelayemo sija gui menan matamo .

text: Now consider this , ye that forget God , lest I tear you in pieces , and there be none to deliver .
text2: Pago jaso este , jamyo ni y manmalefa as Yuus ; na noseaja jusisi jamyo ya jufapidasos , ya taya unalibre .

text: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me : and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God .
text2: Y numaeyo inefresen tinina , jaonrayo ; ya ayo y munatutunas y sinanganña , jufanue ni y satbasion Yuus .

text: Have mercy upon me , O God , according to thy lovingkindness : according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions .
text2: GAEASE nu guajo , O Yuus , jaftaemanoja y minauleg güinaeyamo , jaftaemanoja y minegae y minaasemo ; fuñas y tinaelayeco .

text: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity , and cleanse me from my sin .
text2: Gosfagaseyo todo ni y tinaelayeco , ya unnagasgasyo ni y isaojo .

text: For I acknowledge my transgressions : and my sin is ever before me .
text2: Sa jutungoja y tinaelayeco : ya y isaojo gaegueja siempre gui menajo .

text: Against thee , thee only , have I sinned , and done this evil in thy sight : that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest , and be clear when thou judgest .
text2: Sa contra jago , jagoja , juisagüe , ya jufatinas y daño gui menan matamo : para utunas yanguin cumuentosjao , ya utaefatta yanguin manjusgajao .

text: Behold , I was shapen in iniquity ; and in sin did my mother conceive me .
text2: Estagüeja , na mafatinasyo gui tinaelaye , yan y isao nae si nanajo mumapotguenaejonyo .

text: Behold , thou desirest truth in the inward parts : and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom .
text2: Estagüeja , na unguaeya y magajet guiya jalolom ; ya y umatog na lugat nae unnatungoyo ni y tiningo .

text: Purge me with hyssop , and I shall be clean : wash me , and I shall be whiter than snow .
text2: Nagasgasyo ni hisopo , ya jumuyong gasgas : fagaseyo ya jumuyong apacaña , qui y niebe .

text: Make me to hear joy and gladness ; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice .
text2: Nafanjungogyo minagof yan y alegria para ufanmagof y telangjo ni y unyamag .

text: Hide thy face from my sins , and blot out all mine iniquities .
text2: Naatog y matamo gui isaojo ; ya unfunas todo y inechongjo .

text: Create in me a clean heart , O God ; and renew a right spirit within me .
