text2: Fatinas gui sumanjalomjo y gasgas na corason , O Yuus ; ya unnanuebo y tinas na espiritu gui sumanjalomjo .

text: Cast me not away from thy presence ; and take not thy holy spirit from me .
text2: Chamo yumuyuteyo gui menamo ; yan chamo chumuchule y santos na Espiritumo guiya guajo .

text: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation ; and uphold me with thy free spirit .
text2: Natalo mague guiya guajo y minagof y satbasionmo : ya unmantieneyo ni y libre na Espiritumo .

text: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways ; and sinners shall be converted unto thee .
text2: Ayo nae jufanagüe y manaelaye ni y chalanmo : ya y maniisao ufanmañotsot guiya jago .

text: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness , O God , thou God of my salvation : and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness .
text2: Nalibreyo gui isao gui jâgâ , O Yuus , jago Yuus y satbasinojo ; ya y jilajo ucanta agang ni y tininasmo .

text: O Lord , open thou my lips ; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise .
text2: O Jeova , baba y labiosso : ya y pachotto ufamanue ni y matunamo .

text: For thou desirest not sacrifice ; else would I give it : thou delightest not in burnt offering .
text2: Sa ti yamo inefrese para junaejao ; ti magofjao ni y inefresen sinenggue .

text: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit : a broken and a contrite heart , O God , thou wilt not despise .
text2: Y inefrese para si Yuus , manmayamag na espiritu : y mayamag yan y pinite na corason , O Yuus , jago siempre ti undespresia .

text: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion : build thou the walls of Jerusalem .
text2: Fatinas mauleg , ni y minauleg minagofmo , guiya Sion ; fatinas y quelat Jerusalem .

text: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness , with burnt offering and whole burnt offering : then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar .
text2: Ayo nae unmagof ni y inefresen tininas , y inefresen sinenggue yan y cabales na inefresen sinenggue : Ayo nae unmaofrese nubiyo gui attatmo .

text: Why boastest thou thyself in mischief , O mighty man ? the goodness of God endureth continually .
text2: JAFA na tunanmaesajao gui inacacha , O matatnga na taotao ? y minaasen Yuus sumasagaja cada jaane siempre .

text: Thy tongue deviseth mischiefs ; like a sharp rasor , working deceitfully .
text2: Y jilamo fumatitinas ocodon y taelaye : parejo yan y malagtos na inabajan batbas , machochoeho dinague .

text: Thou lovest evil more than good ; and lying rather than to speak righteousness . Selah .
text2: Unguaeyaña y daño mas qui y mauleg ; yan y mandague , mas qui cumuentos ni y tininas . Sila .

text: Thou lovest all devouring words , O thou deceitful tongue .
text2: Unguaeya todo y mannanataelaye na sinangan : O , dacon na jula .

text: God shall likewise destroy thee for ever , he shall take thee away , and pluck thee out of thy dwelling place , and root thee out of the land of the living . Selah .
text2: Si Yuus unyinilang locue para taejinecog ; unquinene , ya unjinala juyong gui guimamo magago ; ya unjinale juyong gui tano y lalâlâ . Sila .

text: The righteous also shall see , and fear , and shall laugh at him :
text2: ilegñija :

text: Lo , this is the man that made not God his strength ; but trusted in the abundance of his riches , and strengthened himself in his wickedness .
text2: Estagüe , yuje na taotao y ti japolo si Yuus para minetgotña : lao jaangoco güe ni y manadan güinajaña , ya janametgot güe ni y tinaelayeña .

text: But I am like a green olive tree in the house of God : I trust in the mercy of God for ever and ever .
text2: Lao guajo , parejoyo yan y betde na troncon oliba gui jalom guimayuus ; juangongocoyo ni y minaase Yuus para taejinecog , yan taejinecog .

text: I will praise thee for ever , because thou hast done it : and I will wait on thy name ; for it is good before thy saints .
text2: Junaejao grasias , para taejinecog , sa unfatinas este ; ya junangga y naanmo , sa este mauleg ; gui menan y mañantosmo .

text: The fool hath said in his heart , There is no God . Corrupt are they , and have done abominable iniquity : there is none that doeth good .
text2: ILEGÑA y taetiningo gui corasonña : Taya Yuus . Manpotlilo sija , mafatinas y chatliion na tinaelaye ; taya ni uno ni fumatitinas mauleg .

text: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men , to see if there were any that did understand , that did seek God .
text2: Si Yuus gui langet tumalag pápapa y famaguon taotao sija ; para ulie cao guaja gaetiningo , ni y umaliligao si Yuus .

text: Every one of them is gone back : they are altogether become filthy ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Todos sija manalo tate ; ya manjuyong potlilo sija ; taya ni uno ni fumatitinas y mauleg , aje , taya ni uno .

text: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge ? who eat up my people as they eat bread : they have not called upon God .
text2: Taya tiningoñija ni chumogüe inechong ? ni y macano y taotaojo sija , taegüije yan mañochocho pan : ya ti maagang si Yuus .

text: There were they in great fear , where no fear was : for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee : thou hast put them to shame , because God hath despised them .
text2: Mangosmanmaañao sija gui anae taya minaañao : sa si Yuus janafanmachapon adisapatta y telang ayo y tumotojgue contra jago ; jago jagas unnafanmamajlao , sa si Yuus manrenechasa sija .

text: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion ! When God bringeth back the captivity of his people , Jacob shall rejoice , and Israel shall be glad .
text2: O , na y satbasion Israel mojon ujuyong guiya Sion ! anae si Yuus janatalo y quinautiba y taotaoña ; ayo nae umagof si Jacob , yan ufanmagof y Israel .

text: Save me , O God , by thy name , and judge me by thy strength .
text2: SATBAYO , O Yuus , pot y naanmo , ya unjusgayo pot y minetgotmo .

text: Hear my prayer , O God ; give ear to the words of my mouth .
text2: Jungog y tinaetaejo , O Yuus ; ecungog y sinangan y pachotto .

text: For strangers are risen up against me , and oppressors seek after my soul : they have not set God before them . Selah .
text2: Sa y taotao juyong sija mangajulo contra guajo , yan y taotao ni y fijon y minatatgañija maaliligao y antijo ; sija jagasja ti japopolo si Yuus gui menanñija . Sila .

text: Behold , God is mine helper : the Lord is with them that uphold my soul .
text2: Estagüe na si Yuus umayuyudayo ; si Jeova mañisija yan ayo y mumantietene y antijo .

text: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies : cut them off in thy truth .
text2: Güiya uapase taelaye y enemigujo sija ; yulang sija gui minagajetmo .

text: I will freely sacrifice unto thee : I will praise thy name , O LORD ; for it is good .
text2: Sa inefresijo ni y minalagojo bae junaejao ; bae jualaba y naanmo , O Jeova , sa mauleg .

text: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble : and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies .
text2: Sa güiya munalibreyo todo gui chinatsaga : sa y atadogjo jagasja jalie y minalagojo contra y enemigujo .

text: Give ear to my prayer , O God ; and hide not thyself from my supplication .
text2: JUNGOG y tinaetaejo , O Yuus : ya chamo umaatog maesa jao gui guinagaojo .

text: Attend unto me , and hear me : I mourn in my complaint , and make a noise ;
text2: Atituyeyo , ya opeyo : sa inestotbayo gui trinistieco , ya umugongyo ;

text: Because of the voice of the enemy , because of the oppression of the wicked : for they cast iniquity upon me , and in wrath they hate me .
text2: Sa pot y inagang y enemigo : sa pot y chiniguit y manaelaye ; sa mayute y tinaelaye gui jilojo , ya pot y biniboñija , na machatliiyo , japetsigueyo .

text: My heart is sore pained within me : and the terrors of death are fallen upon me .
text2: Y corasonjo gospute gui sumanjalomjo : yan y minaañao y finatae podong gui jilojo .

text: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me , and horror hath overwhelmed me .
text2: Minaañao yan linaolao , manmato guiya guajo ; y linijan ñumoñoyo .

text: And I said , Oh that I had wings like a dove ! for then would I fly away , and be at rest .
text2: Ya ilegco : O mojon yanguin gaepapayo , taegüije y paluma ! ayo nae jugupo chago , ya judescansa .

text: Lo , then would I wander far off , and remain in the wilderness . Selah .
text2: Estagüe , ayo nae jujanao chago , ya jusaga gui jalomtano . Sila .

text: I would hasten my escape from the windy storm and tempest .
text2: Mojon bae jualula malag y guinegüe , guinin y duron manglo yan y pinagyo .

text: Destroy , O Lord , and divide their tongues : for I have seen violence and strife in the city .
text2: Yulang , O Jeova , ya ipe y jilañija ; sa jagasja julie y fijom na manaelaye , ya y manmanpotfifia gui siuda .

text: Day and night they go about it upon the walls thereof : mischief also and sorrow are in the midst of it .
text2: Jaane yan puenge manjajanao gui sumanjilo y quelatña : inechong yan inacacha mangaegue gui entaloña .

text: Wickedness is in the midst thereof : deceit and guile depart not from her streets .
text2: Manaelaye mangaegue gui entaloña ; chiniguit yan dinague ti usuja gui chalanña .

text: For it was not an enemy that reproached me ; then I could have borne it : neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me ; then I would have hid myself from him :
text2: Sa ti y enemigo lumalatdeyo ; ayo nae siña jusungon ; ni ti ayo y chumatliiyo ni y munadangculo güe contra guajo : ayo nae junaatog maesayo guiya güiya .

text: But it was thou , a man mine equal , my guide , and mine acquaintance .
text2: Lao jagoja , un taotao , ni y parejujo , yan y gachongjo , yan y senjuguflie na amigujo .

text: We took sweet counsel together , and walked unto the house of God in company .
text2: Sa y mamis na inangoco manasangane jam y jinasonmame ; ya tafanmamocat yan linajyan taotao gui guimayuus .

text: Let death seize upon them , and let them go down quick into hell : for wickedness is in their dwellings , and among them .
text2: Polo sija ya derepente ufanchinile ni y finatae : polosija ya ufansinetta papa manlalâlâ guiya sasalaguan ; sa guaja y manaelaye gui sagañija yan y sanjalomñija .

text: As for me , I will call upon God ; and the LORD shall save me .
text2: Lao guajo , bae juagang si Yuus ; ya si Jeova usatbayo .

text: Evening , and morning , and at noon , will I pray , and cry aloud : and he shall hear my voice .
text2: Pupuenge , ogaan , yan taloane , jufanjaso ya juagang duro , ya güiya ujungog y inaganjo .

text: He hath delivered my soul in peace from the battle that was against me : for there were many with me .
text2: Güiya jagasja munalibre y antijo qui pas , guinin y guera ni y comontrayo : sa megae pumotfifia yo .

text: God shall hear , and afflict them , even he that abideth of old . Selah . Because they have no changes , therefore they fear not God .
text2: Si Yuus ufaninjingog , ya ufaninepe sija ; asta ayo y mañasaga desde y apmam na tiempo . Sila . Ti taotao sija ni siempre jatulaeca , ya ti manmaañao as Yuus .

text: He hath put forth his hands against such as be at peace with him : he hath broken his covenant .
text2: Jaestira mona y canaeña contra ayo sija ni y manpas guiya güiya : jayulang y tratuña .

text: The words of his mouth were smoother than butter , but war was in his heart : his words were softer than oil , yet were they drawn swords .
text2: Y sinangan y pachotña palagseña qui y mantica , lao guera gui jalom corasonña ; y sinanganña mananana qui y laña ; lao puro ayo sija espada in malagnos .

text: Cast thy burden upon the LORD , and he shall sustain thee : he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved .
text2: Polo y catgamo gui as Jeova , ya güiya uminantiene ; sa taya nae jasotta y manunas ya umanacalamten .

text: But thou , O God , shalt bring them down into the pit of destruction : bloody and deceitful men shall not live out half their days ; but I will trust in thee .
text2: Lao jago , O Yuus , ufansinetta sija papa gui joyon finatae ; sa y manmejgá , yan manfáfababa na taotao sija , ti ufanlâlâ ni lamita gui jaaniñija ; lao guajo juangocoyo nu jago .

text: Be merciful unto me , O God : for man would swallow me up ; he fighting daily oppresseth me .
text2: GAEASE nu guajo , O Yuus ; sa y taotao malago na ujapañotyo ; mumumo todot dia , ya jachichiguityo .

text: Mine enemies would daily swallow me up : for they be many that fight against me , O thou most High .
text2: Todot dia y enemigujo manmalago na ujapañotyo ; sa megae mamumujo ya mansobetbio .

text: What time I am afraid , I will trust in thee .
text2: Jafaja na tiempo nae maañaoyo , juangocojayo guiya jago .

text: In God I will praise his word , in God I have put my trust ; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me .
text2: Gui as Yuus jualaba y finoña ; gui as Yuus nae jagasja jupolo y inangococo , ti maañaoyo ; jafa ufatinas y catne guiya guajo ?

text: Every day they wrest my words : all their thoughts are against me for evil .
text2: Todot dia mabira y sinanganjo ; sa todo y jinasoñija contra guajo para tinaelaye .

text: They gather themselves together , they hide themselves , they mark my steps , when they wait for my soul .
text2: Mandaña ya manatog maesasija ; ya magueguesatituye y pinecatjo , anae jagas mananangga sija y antijo .

text: Shall they escape by iniquity ? in thine anger cast down the people , O God .
text2: Ufanescapa nu y tinaelaye ? gui binibo nae unyute papa y taotao sija , O Yuus .

text: Thou tellest my wanderings : put thou my tears into thy bottle : are they not in thy book ?
text2: Jago sumangan y jinanaojo ; polo gui jalom boteyamo y lagojo : manaegüe sija gui leblomo ?

text: When I cry unto thee , then shall mine enemies turn back : this I know ; for God is for me .
text2: Ayo nae , ujabira sija tate y enemigujo y jaane nae juagangjao ; este jutungo , na si Yuus para guajo .

text: In God will I praise his word : in the LORD will I praise his word .
text2: Gui as Yuus jualaba y finoña : gui as Jeova jualaba y finona .

text: In God have I put my trust : I will not be afraid what man can do unto me .
text2: Gui as Yuus nae jagasja jupolo y inangococo ; ya siempre ti jumaañao ; jafa y taotao ufatinas guiya guajo ?

text: Thy vows are upon me , O God : I will render praises unto thee .
text2: Y promesamo gaegue guiya guajo , O Yuus : ya juapasejao siempre ni y inefresen grasias .

text: For thou hast delivered my soul from death : wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling , that I may walk before God in the light of the living ?
text2: Sa jagasja unnalibre y antijo gui finatae ; ti siempre unnalibre y adengjo an podong ? para jufamocat gui menan Yuus gui candet y manlálâlâ .

text: Be merciful unto me , O God , be merciful unto me : for my soul trusteth in thee : yea , in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge , until these calamities be overpast .
text2: GAEASE nu guajo , O Yuus , gaease nu guajo ; sa y antijo guinegüe güe guiya jago : magajet , y anineng y papamo ugogüeyo asta qui manmalofan y chinatsaga .

text: I will cry unto God most high ; unto God that performeth all things for me .
text2: Bae juagang si Yuus Gueftaquilo ; si Yuus ni y jafatinas todo y güinaja para guajo .

text: He shall send from heaven , and save from the reproach of him that would swallow me up . Selah . God shall send forth his mercy and his truth .
text2: Ufanago guinin y langet ya unalibreyo ; anae jalalatde ayo y malago pumañotyo . Sila . Si Yuus utago y minaaseña yan y minagajetña .

text: My soul is among lions : and I lie even among them that are set on fire , even the sons of men , whose teeth are spears and arrows , and their tongue a sharp sword .
text2: Y antijo gaegue gui entalo y león sija : ya umaasonyo gui entalo ayo sija y minañila guafe , junggan , yan y lalajin taotao sija ni y nifenñija y lansa sija , yan flecha sija , ya y jilañija malagtos na espada .

text: Be thou exalted , O God , above the heavens ; let thy glory be above all the earth .
text2: Nadangculojao gui jilo y langet , O Yuus ; polo y inenramo todo gui sanjilo tano .

text: They have prepared a net for my steps ; my soul is bowed down : they have digged a pit before me , into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves . Selah .
text2: Jagas mamatinas laso , para y pinecatto ; y antijo tumecon papa ; jagas manmaguadog joyo gui menajo ; ya sija mamodong maesaja gui taloloja . Sila .

text: My heart is fixed , O God , my heart is fixed : I will sing and give praise .
text2: Y corasonjo , esta meton , O Yuus , y corasonjo esta meton ; bae jucanta , magajetja , jucanta alabansa sija .

text: Awake up , my glory ; awake , psaltery and harp : I myself will awake early .
text2: Fagmata , inenrajo ; fagmata , guitala yan atpa ; guajoja na maesa magmatayo taftaf .

text: I will praise thee , O Lord , among the people : I will sing unto thee among the nations .
text2: Bae junaetjao grasias , O Jeova , gui entalo y taotao sija ; jucantayejao alabansa sija gui entalo y nasion sija .

text: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens , and thy truth unto the clouds .
text2: Sa asta y langet , dangculo y minaasemo , yan asta y mapagajes y minagajetmo .

text: Be thou exalted , O God , above the heavens : let thy glory be above all the earth .
text2: Nadangculojao gui jilo y langet , O Yuus ; polo y minalagmo todo gui sanjilo y tano .

text: Do ye indeed speak righteousness , O congregation ? do ye judge uprightly , O ye sons of men ?
text2: anae debe deunfanguentos jamyo tininas ? manmanjujusga jamyo tunas , O jamyo , ni y lalajin taotao sija ?

text: Yea , in heart ye work wickedness ; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth .
text2: Magajet , na y jalom corason nae manmachochocho jamyo tinaelaye ; intajlang gui canaenmiyo y tinaelaye gui tano .

text: The wicked are estranged from the womb : they go astray as soon as they be born , speaking lies .
text2: Y manaelaye , manaotao juyong desde y jalom tuyan : enseguidas qui manmafañago , manabag manguecuentos ni y mandague .

text: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent : they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear ;
text2: Y binenoñija , parejo yan y binenon y culebbla : sija parejo yan y tangan y serpiente , ni y jajuchum talangaña ;

text: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers , charming never so wisely .
text2: Ya ti jaecungog y inagang y encantador , ni y gosfaye manencanta .

text: Break their teeth , O God , in their mouth : break out the great teeth of the young lions , O LORD .
text2: Yamag y nifenñija gui jalom pachotñija , O Yuus : yamag juyong y dangculo na nifen y patgon leon , O Jeova .

text: Let them melt away as waters which run continually : when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows , let them be as cut in pieces .
text2: Polo ya ufanmadirite taegüije y janom ni y malalagoja gui iyoña : anae jaachechetgüe y flechaña , polo ya calang manutut .

text: As a snail which melteth , let every one of them pass away : like the untimely birth of a woman , that they may not see the sun .
text2: Polo ya utaegüije y acaleja ni y madirite ya umalofan : taegüije y taetiempo na mañagon palaoan , ni y ti guinin lumilie y atdao .

text: Before your pots can feel the thorns , he shall take them away as with a whirlwind , both living , and in his wrath .
text2: guafen ytituca , uchule sija ya unajanao , nu y remulinon manglo , ayo manbetde taegüije mansinenggue ,

text: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance : he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked .
text2: Y manunas ufanmagof yanguin jalilie y inemog ; ufagase y adengña gui jâgâ y taelaye .

text: So that a man shall say , Verily there is a reward for the righteous : verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth .
text2: Para ualog y taotao : Magajet na guaja apasñija y manunas : magajet guaja si Yuus ni y manjujusga gui tano .

text: Deliver me from mine enemies , O my God : defend me from them that rise up against me .
text2: NALIBREYO gui enemigujo sija , O Yuusso ; polo yo gui jilo guinin ayosija ni y mangajujulo contra guajo .

text: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity , and save me from bloody men .
text2: Nalibreyo gui chumogüe y tinaelaye , ya satbayo gui manmejga na taotao sija .

text: For , lo , they lie in wait for my soul : the mighty are gathered against me ; not for my transgression , nor for my sin , O LORD .
text2: Sa , estagüe , na mananangga y antijo : y manmetgot mandaña contra guajo ; ti pot y tinaelayeco , ni ti pot y isaojo , O Jeova .

text: They run and prepare themselves without my fault : awake to help me , and behold .
text2: Manmalago ya japrepara sija , sin y linachijo ; fagmata , ya unayudayo , ya unlie .

text: Thou therefore , O LORD God of hosts , the God of Israel , awake to visit all the heathen : be not merciful to any wicked transgressors . Selah .
text2: Jago Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo , si Yuus Israel ; fagmata ya unbisita todo y nasion sija ; chamo gagaease ni y manaelaye . Sila .

text: They return at evening : they make a noise like a dog , and go round about the city .
text2: Manalo guato yan pupuenge : ya manboruruca taegüije y galago , ya malilicucue y siuda .

text: Behold , they belch out with their mouth : swords are in their lips : for who , say they , doth hear ?
text2: Liija , sa mannutugap juyong guinin y pachotñija : espada sija guaja gui jalom labiosñija ; jaye , ilegñiñija , cao jajungog ?

text: But thou , O LORD , shalt laugh at them ; thou shalt have all the heathen in derision .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , siempre unchatgue sija ; siempre unmofea todo y nasion .

text: Because of his strength will I wait upon thee : for God is my defence .
text2: O minetgotto , junanangga jao ; sa si Yuus y guimajo lumijing .

text: The God of my mercy shall prevent me : God shall let me see my desire upon mine enemies .
text2: Si Yuusso nu y minaaseña , ugaegue gui menajo : si Yuus unaliiyo y minalagojo , gui jilo y enemigujo sija .

text: Slay them not , lest my people forget : scatter them by thy power ; and bring them down , O Lord our shield .
text2: Chamo pumupuno sija , sa trabia ti manmalelefa y taotaojo ; chalapon sija pot y ninasiñamo ; ya unchule sija papa , O Jeova , patangmame .

text: For the sin of their mouth and the words of their lips let them even be taken in their pride : and for cursing and lying which they speak .
text2: Pot y isao y pachotñija , yan pot y sinangan y labiosñija , polo ya ufanmacone , pot y sobetbioñija : yan pot y matdision , yan manmandadague ni y sinanganñija .

text: Consume them in wrath , consume them , that they may not be : and let them know that God ruleth in Jacob unto the ends of the earth . Selah .
text2: Lachae sija ni y binibumo , lachae sija , para sija ti ufangaegue talo : ya ujatungo na si Yuus mangobiebietna gui as Jacob , asta y uttimon y tano . Sila .

text: And at evening let them return ; and let them make a noise like a dog , and go round about the city .
text2: Ya an pupuenge , polo ya ufanalo guato , ya unfanboruca taegüije y galago ya umalilicue y siuda .

text: Let them wander up and down for meat , and grudge if they be not satisfied .
text2: Nafanjajanao julo yan papa , ya ufanmanaliligao nañija ; ya usaga todo puenge yanguin ti manjaspog .

text: But I will sing of thy power ; yea , I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning : for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble .
text2: Lao guajo , jucanta ni y ninasiñamo ; magajet , na jucanta agang ni y minaasemo yan ogaan ; sa guinin jago y guimajo lumijing , yan y guinegüeco gui jaanen chinatsagaco .

text: Unto thee , O my strength , will I sing : for God is my defence , and the God of my mercy .
text2: Jago , O minetgotjo , jucantaye y alabansa sija ; sa si Yuus y guimajo lumijing , yan y Yuus y minaasejo .

text: O God , thou hast cast us off , thou hast scattered us , thou hast been displeased ; O turn thyself to us again .
text2: O Yuus , jago yumutejam , jago gumapotjam papa ; guinin lalalojao ; O , natalojam guato .

text: Thou hast made the earth to tremble ; thou hast broken it : heal the breaches thereof ; for it shaketh .
text2: Jago jagasja munamayengyong y tano ; jago yumulang ; nafanjomlo y yinilangña sija , sa manmayeyengyong .

text: Thou hast shewed thy people hard things : thou hast made us to drink the wine of astonishment .
text2: Unfanue y taotaomo sija ni y manmajetog na güinaja ; unnafanguimenjam ni y binon na matulalaejon .

text: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee , that it may be displayed because of the truth . Selah .
text2: Unnae ayo sija ni y manmaañao nu jago , un bandera para ujatsa pot y minagajet . Sila .

text: That thy beloved may be delivered ; save with thy right hand , and hear me .
text2: Sa para ufanlibre y güinaeyamo ; satba ni y agapa na canaemo , yan opejam .

text: God hath spoken in his holiness ; I will rejoice , I will divide Shechem , and mete out the valley of Succoth .
text2: Si Yuus sumangan y sinantosña ; siempre jumagof ; ya siempre judibide iya Siquem , ya jumide y bayen Sucot .

text: Gilead is mine , and Manasseh is mine ; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head ; Judah is my lawgiver ;
text2: Iyoco Galaad , ya iyoco Manases : Efraim y guinegüe y ilujo ; Juda y baston minagasso .

text: Moab is my washpot ; over Edom will I cast out my shoe : Philistia , triumph thou because of me .
text2: Moab , y palanggana para jufagagaseyo ; y jilo Edom nae juyute y sapatosso : Filistia , agangjao pot guajo .

text: Who will bring me into the strong city ? who will lead me into Edom ?
text2: Jaye uchinileyo guato gui fitme na siuda ? jaye uesgaejonyo guato Edom ?

text: Wilt not thou , O God , which hadst cast us off ? and thou , O God , which didst not go out with our armies ?
text2: Mungajao , O Yuus , ni y guinin yumutejam ? yan jago , O Yuus , ti jumanao yan y inetnon sendalonmame .

text: Give us help from trouble : for vain is the help of man .
text2: Naejam inayuda contra y contrario gui chinatsaga ; sa taebale y inayudan taotao .

text: Through God we shall do valiantly : for he it is that shall tread down our enemies .
text2: Guinin as Yuus nae infatinas y minatatnga ; sa güiyaja ni ugacha papa y contrarionmame .

text: Hear my cry , O God ; attend unto my prayer .
text2: JUNGOG y inaganjo , O Yuus ; atituye y tinaetaejo .

text: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee , when my heart is overwhelmed : lead me to the rock that is higher than I .
text2: Desde y uttimon y tano juagang jao , anae taeninasiña y corasonjo : chalaneyo asta y acho ni y mas taquilo qui guajo .

text: For thou hast been a shelter for me , and a strong tower from the enemy .
text2: Sa jago guinin y guinegüeco , yan y guiman lumijing guinin y enemigo .

text: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever : I will trust in the covert of thy wings . Selah .
text2: Jusaga gui jalom y tabetnaculumo para taejinecog : ya jugogüeyo gui tinampen y papamo . Sila .

text: For thou , O God , hast heard my vows : thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name .
text2: Sa jago O Yuus guinin jumungog y promesajo ; jago guinin numaeyo ni y erensian ayo sija y manmaañao ni y naanmo .

text: Thou wilt prolong the king ' s life : and his years as many generations .
text2: Jago munaanaco y jaanin y ray ; y sacanña taegüije y megae na generasion sija .

text: He shall abide before God for ever : O prepare mercy and truth , which may preserve him .
text2: Usaga gui menan Yuus para taejinecog : O , nalisto y güinaeya yan y minagajet , para ufanadaje güe .

text: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever , that I may daily perform my vows .
text2: Pot este jucantaye y naanmo para taejinecog , para jufatinas y prinimetijo cada jaane .

text: Truly my soul waiteth upon God : from him cometh my salvation .
text2: Y antijo janananggaja si Yuus ; sa guinin güiya nae mamaela y satbasionjo .

text: He only is my rock and my salvation ; he is my defence ; I shall not be greatly moved .
text2: Güiyaja y achojo yan y satbasionjo , güiya y torejo taquilo : ya ti megae jumanacalamten .

text: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man ? ye shall be slain all of you : as a bowing wall shall ye be , and as a tottering fence .
text2: Asta ngaen nae intigong contra unoja taotao ? todos jamyo infanmapuno ; taegüije y padet ni y cumba , yan taegüije y matomba na colat .

text: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency : they delight in lies : they bless with their mouth , but they curse inwardly . Selah .
text2: Manafaesenja gui entaloñija na umayute papa gui ninasiñaña : manmagof ni y dinague sija : manmanbendidise ni y pachotñija , lao manmanmatdidise qui sumanjalomñija .

text: My soul , wait thou only upon God ; for my expectation is from him .
text2: Si Yuus nanggajao , O antijo ; sa guinin güiya y ninanggaco .

text: He only is my rock and my salvation : he is my defence ; I shall not be moved .
text2: Güiyaja y achojo yan y satbasionjo ; güiya y torejo taquilo , ya ti jumanacalamten .

text: In God is my salvation and my glory : the rock of my strength , and my refuge , is in God .
text2: Gui as Yuus nae gaegue y satbasionjo yan y minalagjo ; y acho y minetgotjo yan y guinegüeco mangaegue gui as Yuus .

text: Trust in him at all times ; ye people , pour out your heart before him : God is a refuge for us . Selah .
text2: Angoco gue todo y tiempo , jamyo ni y taotao sija ; chuda y corasonmiyo gui menaña : si Yuus y guinegüe para jita . Sila .

text: Surely men of low degree are vanity , and men of high degree are a lie : to be laid in the balance , they are altogether lighter than vanity .
text2: Seguro todo y taotao sija ni y umitde condisioñija manjinaja ; ya y managquilo condisioñija , un dinague ; yanguin manmapolo gui balansa , todos manñajlalangña qui y jinaja .

text: Trust not in oppression , and become not vain in robbery : if riches increase , set not your heart upon them .
text2: Chamo umangongoco jao gui inamot , yan chamo na gagaebale y sinaque : yanguin y güinaja manlalamegae ; chamo pumópolo y corasonmo guiya sija .

text: God hath spoken once ; twice have I heard this ; that power belongeth unto God .
text2: Guinin jasangan si Yuus un biaje ; ya dos biaje jagasja jujungog este ; na y ninasiña iyon Yuus .

text: Also unto thee , O Lord , belongeth mercy : for thou renderest to every man according to his work .
text2: Sa iyomoja locue Jeova y minaase : sa unapapaseja cada taotao jaftaemano y chechonâ .

text: O God , thou art my God ; early will I seek thee : my soul thirsteth for thee , my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land , where no water is ;
text2: O Yuus , jago y Yuusso ; taftaf jualigao jao ; y antijo majo pot jago , y catneco majalang nu jago , gui anglo an majo na tano , anae taya janom ;

text: To see thy power and thy glory , so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary .
text2: Taegüije juatan jao gui templo para julie y ninasiñamo yan y minlagmo .

text: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life , my lips shall praise thee .
text2: Sa y mauleg güinaeyamo maulegña qui y linâlâ ; y labiosso ualabajao .

text: Thus will I bless thee while I live : I will lift up my hands in thy name .
text2: Taegüine jubendise jao gui linâlâjo ; ya jujatsa julo y canaejo ni y naanmo .

text: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness ; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips :
text2: Y antijo ujaspog taegüije y ujaspog ni y titanos an montica ; ya y pachotjo ualabajao yan y minagof y labiosso .

text: When I remember thee upon my bed , and meditate on thee in the night watches .
text2: Yanguin jujaso jao gui jilo camajo ; ya y jinasoco nu jago gui ora nae bumebelayo an puenge .

text: Because thou hast been my help , therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice .
text2: Sa jago guinin umayudayo ; enaomina y anineng y papamo nae jumagof .

text: My soul followeth hard after thee : thy right hand upholdeth me .
text2: Y antijo dangculo na tinatitiye jao : y agapa na canaemo mumantieteneyo .

text: But those that seek my soul , to destroy it , shall go into the lower parts of the earth .
text2: Lao ayo sija y umaliligao y antijo , para umayulang , sija ufanjanao para y mas tadong na joyo gui tano .

text: They shall fall by the sword : they shall be a portion for foxes .
text2: Ufanmaentrega gui jinilat y espada ; sija ugüinaja para y sora sija .

text: But the king shall rejoice in God ; every one that sweareth by him shall glory : but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped .
text2: Lao y ray umagof gui as Yuus ; ya todo y manmanjula pot güiya unfanmagof : sa y pachot ayo sija y manmandadague ufanmajuchom .

text: Hear my voice , O God , in my prayer : preserve my life from fear of the enemy .
text2: JUNGOG y inagangjo , O Yuus , gui quejaco : adaje y linâlâjo ni y minaañaoña ni y enemigo .

text: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked ; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity :
text2: Naatogyo gui secreto na pinagat y manaelaye ; yan y inatborota ni y chumogüe y taelaye .

text: Who whet their tongue like a sword , and bend their bows to shoot their arrows , even bitter words :
text2: Ni y janafanmalagtos y jilañija taegüije y espada , yan janafanapunta y flechañija , ni manmalaet na sinangan .

text: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect : suddenly do they shoot at him , and fear not .
text2: Para ujaflecha gui secreto y cabales ; ya derepente manflecha güe , ya ti maañao .

text: They encourage themselves in an evil matter : they commune of laying snares privily ; they say , Who shall see them ?
text2: Janafanfitmeja sija gui na jinasuye taelaye : manmanafaesen para ujananaplinanta y laso ; ya ilegñija : Jaye ufanlinie ?

text: They search out iniquities ; they accomplish a diligent search : both the inward thought of every one of them , and the heart , is deep .
text2: Manmanaliligao ni y tinaelaye ; ilegñija na tacumple guse y inaligaota : cada uno guiya sija manacjalom jinasonñija yan corasonñija manadong .

text: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow ; suddenly shall they be wounded .
text2: Lao si Yuus flumecha sija , ya enseguidas ninafanlamen nu y flecha .

text: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves : all that see them shall flee away .
text2: Ya taegüije ninafanmatompo ; y jilañija contra sija ; ya todo y lumie sija ujayengyong y ilonñija .

text: And all men shall fear , and shall declare the work of God ; for they shall wisely consider of his doing .
text2: Ya todo y taotao sija ufanmaañao ; ya ujasangan y checho Yuus : sa ujaguesjaso y finatinasña .

text: The righteous shall be glad in the LORD , and shall trust in him ; and all the upright in heart shall glory .
text2: Y manunas ufanmagof sija gui as Jeova , ya ujaangoco nu güiya ; yan todo y manunas na corason , ufanmalag .

text: Praise waiteth for thee , O God , in Sion : and unto thee shall the vow be performed .
text2: Y tinina unanangga jao guiya Sion , O Yuus ; iya jago nae umapase y promesa .

text: O thou that hearest prayer , unto thee shall all flesh come .
text2: O jago ni y jumungog y utinaetae , todo y catne ufanmato guiya jago .

text: Iniquities prevail against me : as for our transgressions , thou shalt purge them away .
text2: Jaganayo y tinaelaye sija ; lao y isaomame , jago umasie .

text: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest , and causest to approach unto thee , that he may dwell in thy courts : we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house , even of thy holy temple .
text2: Dichoso y taotao ni y unayeg , ya unnaguaguato guiya jago , para usaga gui sagamo : manjaspogjam ni y minauleg y guimamo , asta y santos na lugat gui templomo .

text: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us , O God of our salvation ; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth , and of them that are afar off upon the sea :
text2: Pot y namaañao na güinaja nae unopejam gui tininas ; O Yuus y satbasionmame ; jago y ninangga gui uttimon puntan tano todo , yan asta todo ayo sija y manlachago , ni y mangaegue gui jilo y tase .

text: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains ; being girded with power :
text2: Ayo y pot ninasiñaña japlanta seguro y egso , madudog ni y ninasiñaña ;

text: Which stilleth the noise of the seas , the noise of their waves , and the tumult of the people .
text2: janafanbastamanaguaguat y taotao sija .

text: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens : thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice .
text2: Ya ayo sija ni y mañasaga gui uttimon tano , manmaañao ni señatmo : unnamagof y jumuyong y egaan yan y pupuenge .

text: Thou visitest the earth , and waterest it : thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God , which is full of water : thou preparest them corn , when thou hast so provided for it .
text2: Jago bumisita y tano yan unriega ; unnagosrico ; y sadog Yuus bula janom : unnafanmauleg y maies para sija yanguin esta unnalisto y tano taegüije .

text: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly : thou settlest the furrows thereof : thou makest it soft with showers : thou blessest the springing thereof .
text2: Unnafangosbula janom y sutcoñija : unnafitme a pujañija güije ; ya unnamañaña ni y ichan ; ya unbendise y sinisoñija .

text: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness ; and thy paths drop fatness .
text2: Uncorona y sacan sija ni y minaulegmo ; ya y finaposmo manutujo y mantica .

text: They drop upon the pastures of the wilderness : and the little hills rejoice on every side .
text2: Manutujo gui jilo y pastaje sija gui desierto : ya y mandiquique na sabana madudog ni y minagof .

text: The pastures are clothed with flocks ; the valleys also are covered over with corn ; they shout for joy , they also sing .
text2: Y pastaje sija manminagago ni y manadan gâgâ ; y baye sija locue mantinampe ni y maies ; manesalao ni y minagofñija , ya mangacanta locue .

text: Make a joyful noise unto God , all ye lands :
text2: FATINAS y minagof na inagang gui as Yuus todo y tano .

text: Sing forth the honour of his name : make his praise glorious .
text2: Canta y minagof gui naanña : namalag y tininaña .

text: Say unto God , How terrible art thou in thy works ! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee .
text2: Alog as Yuus : jafa na manámaañao y chechomo : pot y dinangculon y ninasiñamo uninaseja y contrarionmo papa .

text: All the earth shall worship thee , and shall sing unto thee ; they shall sing to thy name . Selah .
text2: Todo y tano umadodorajao yan macantatayejao : yan macantataye y naanmo . Sila .

text: Come and see the works of God : he is terrible in his doing toward the children of men .
text2: Maela ya inlie y checho Yuus : na ninámaañao y chechoña gui jilo y famaguon y taotao .

text: He turned the sea into dry land : they went through the flood on foot : there did we rejoice in him .
text2: Jatolaeca y tase y anglo na tano : ya japocacate y sadog : ya ayo nae manmagofjam nu güiya .

text: He ruleth by his power for ever ; his eyes behold the nations : let not the rebellious exalt themselves . Selah .
text2: Güiya jagobiebietna ni y minetgotña para taejinecog : y atadogña pumupulan y nasion sija : ya munga y managuaguat na ujajatsa sija . Sila .

text: O bless our God , ye people , and make the voice of his praise to be heard :
text2: Fanmanbendise ni y Yuusta jamyo ni y taotao ya namajungog y inagang y tininaña :

text: Which holdeth our soul in life , and suffereth not our feet to be moved .
text2: Ayo y mumantiene y antita gui linâlâ : ya ti japolo y adengta na usulong .

text: For thou , O God , hast proved us : thou hast tried us , as silver is tried .
text2: Sa jago chumaguejam , O Yuus ; jagasja unchague jam taegüije y salape an machague .

text: Thou broughtest us into the net ; thou laidst affliction upon our loins .
text2: Jago chumulejam gui jalom y laso : unpolo chinatsaga na catga gui sinturanmame .

text: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads ; we went through fire and through water : but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place .
text2: Jago namaudae y taotao guijilomame : jame infaposgüe y guafe an y janom : lao unchulejam asta y jalom y rico na sagayan .

text: I will go into thy house with burnt offerings : I will pay thee my vows ,
text2: Jujalom gui jalom guimamo yan y sinenggue na inefrese sija : ya bae juapase jao ni y promesajo ,

text: Which my lips have uttered , and my mouth hath spoken , when I was in trouble .
text2: Ni y labiosso sumangan , yan y pachotto jagas cumuentos anae estabayo gui chinatsaga .

text: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings , with the incense of rams ; I will offer bullocks with goats . Selah .
text2: Bae junaejao sinenggue na inefrese ni y yemog yan paopao na tatneron quinilo : bae junaejao nobiyo yan chiba sija . Sila .

text: Come and hear , all ye that fear God , and I will declare what he hath done for my soul .
text2: Maela ya injingong , todo ayo y manmañao as Yuus , ya bae jusangane jamyo jafa finatinasña ni y antijo .

text: I cried unto him with my mouth , and he was extolled with my tongue .
text2: Guajo juagang güe ni y pachotto : ya güiya umaalaba ni y jilajo .

text: If I regard iniquity in my heart , the Lord will not hear me :
text2: Yaguin jumantiene y tinaelaye gui corasonjo , si Jeova ti ujungogyo .

text: But verily God hath heard me ; he hath attended to the voice of my prayer .
text2: Lao magajet na si Yuus jajungog : güiya umadaje y inagang y tinaetaejo .

text: Blessed be God , which hath not turned away my prayer , nor his mercy from me .
text2: Bendito si Yuus , sa ti jabira y tinaetaejo ni y minaaseña guiya guajo .

text: God be merciful unto us , and bless us ; and cause his face to shine upon us ; Selah .
text2: O Yuus , gaease ni jame ya unbendisejam : yan janafanmalag y mataña gui jilomame . Sila .

text: That thy way may be known upon earth , thy saving health among all nations .
text2: Para usiña matungo y chalanmo gui jilo y tano yan y satbasionmo gui nasion todos :

text: Let the people praise thee , O God ; let all the people praise thee .
text2: Polo y taotao ya umatuna jao , O Yuus : polo y taotao todo ya umatuna .

text: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy : for thou shalt judge the people righteously , and govern the nations upon earth . Selah .
text2: O , polo y nasion sija ya ufanmagof yan ufanganta ni y minagof : sa jago siempre jumusga y taotao gui tininas yan ungobietna y nasion sija gui jilo y tano . Sila .

text: Let the people praise thee , O God ; let all the people praise thee .
text2: Polo y taotao ya umatuna jao , O Yuus : polo y taotao todo ya umatuna .

text: Then shall the earth yield her increase ; and God , even our own God , shall bless us .
text2: Ya y tano jagasja unajuyong megae tinegchaña : ya si Yuus ni y Yuusta ubendisejit .

text: God shall bless us ; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him .
text2: Si Yuus ubendisejit : yan todo y uttimon y tano umaañao nu güiya .

text: Let God arise , let his enemies be scattered : let them also that hate him flee before him .
text2: POLO si Yuus ya ucajulo , polo y enimiguña ya ufanmachalapon : polo ayo sija y chumatlie güe ya ufanmalago gui menaña .

text: As smoke is driven away , so drive them away : as wax melteth before the fire , so let the wicked perish at the presence of God .
text2: Taegüije y manajanao y aso , taegüijeja yute sija : taegüije y maderite y danges gui menan guafe , taegüijeja manmalingoñija y manaelaye gui menan Yuus .

text: But let the righteous be glad ; let them rejoice before God : yea , let them exceedingly rejoice .
text2: Lao y manunas ufansénmagof : ufansenalegre gui menan Yuus : magajet ya usendangculo y minagofñija .

text: Sing unto God , sing praises to his name : extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH , and rejoice before him .
text2: Cantaye si Yuus , cantaye alabansa sija y naanña : nacajulo y chalan para ayo na maudae y inanaco y desierto sija ; y naanña , si Yah ya fansenmagof gui menaña .

text: A father of the fatherless , and a judge of the widows , is God in his holy habitation .
text2: Tatan y manaetata ya y jues para y manbiuda , si Yuus gui sinantos na sagaña .

text: God setteth the solitary in families : he bringeth out those which are bound with chains : but the rebellious dwell in a dry land .
text2: Si Yuus munafañaga y taeparientes gui familia sija : güiya chumule juyong preso para umegae : lao y managuaguat mañagaja gui anglo na tano .

text: O God , when thou wentest forth before thy people , when thou didst march through the wilderness ; Selah :
text2: O Yuus , mientras unjanao gui menan y taotao ; mientras na unfamocat gui inanaco desierto . Sila .

text: The earth shook , the heavens also dropped at the presence of God : even Sinai itself was moved at the presence of God , the God of Israel .
text2: Y tano mayeyengyong , y langet locue manutujo gui menan Yuus : ayo iya Sinae mayengyong gui menan Yuus , ni si Yuus guiya Israel .

text: Thou , O God , didst send a plentiful rain , whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance , when it was weary .
text2: Jago , O Yuus , tumago megae na uchan , yan jago munafitme y erensiamo na taotao anae yayas .

text: Thy congregation hath dwelt therein : thou , O God , hast prepared of thy goodness for the poor .
text2: Y inetnon taotaomo mañaga güije : jago , O Yuus , fumamauleg y minaulegmo para y mamoble .

text: The Lord gave the word : great was the company of those that published it .
text2: Si Jeova jananae ni finijo : yan mandangculo ayo na inetnon famalaoan ni y munamatungo :

text: Kings of armies did flee apace : and she that tarried at home divided the spoil .
text2: Ray sija y inetnon sendalo falago chadig : ya güiya palaoan ni y sumasaga iya sija mafacae y inamot na güinaja .

text: Though ye have lien among the pots , yet shall ye be as the wings of a dove covered with silver , and her feathers with yellow gold .
text2: Yaguin manmalago jamyo dumescansa gui quelat quinilo ; calang y papan y paluma nii platiao , yan y piluña nii amariyo calang oro .

text: When the Almighty scattered kings in it , it was white as snow in Salmon .
text2: Anae ayo todo janasiña manafanmachalapon y ray sija guiya güiya : taegüije anae mamodong nieve guiya Salmón .

text: The hill of God is as the hill of Bashan ; an high hill as the hill of Bashan .
text2: Y egso Yuus y egso Basán : y gostaquilo na ogso y egso Basán .

text: Why leap ye , ye high hills ? this is the hill which God desireth to dwell in ; yea , the LORD will dwell in it for ever .
text2: Sa jafa na manaatansegüet , jamyo nii manaquilo na osgo guato gui egso güinaeyan Yuus para sagaña : magajet na si Jeova sumaga güije para taejinecog .

text: The chariots of God are twenty thousand , even thousands of angels : the Lord is among them , as in Sinai , in the holy place .
text2: Y caretan Yuus y viente mil , junggan , miyares yan miyares ya si Jeova gui entaloñija taegüije iya Sinae , iya santos na sagaña .

text: Thou hast ascended on high , thou hast led captivity captive : thou hast received gifts for men ; yea , for the rebellious also , that the LORD God might dwell among them .
text2: Jagasja jao cajulo iya jululo , jagas uncone y mamacautiba na megae : jagas unresibe ninae sija entre taotao sija : magajet entre y managuaguat locue , para si Jeova Yuus usiña sumaga gui entaloñija .

text: Blessed be the Lord , who daily loadeth us with benefits , even the God of our salvation . Selah .
text2: Bendito si , Jeova nii todo y jaane jaencatga y catgata , junggan , ayo y Yuus y satbasionta . Sila .

text: He that is our God is the God of salvation ; and unto God the Lord belong the issues from death .
text2: Si Yuus güiya si Yuus satbasion para jita : ya y jinanao guinin y finatae iyon Jeova , Señot .

text: But God shall wound the head of his enemies , and the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses .
text2: Lao si Yuus janafanlamen y ilon y enimiguña yan y cácagong y manmipe ayo y sisigueja gui isaoña .

text: The Lord said , I will bring again from Bashan , I will bring my people again from the depths of the sea :
text2: Ya si Jeova ilegña : Bae chule talo guinin Basán , bae chule sija talo , guinin y tádodong na tase .

text: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies , and the tongue of thy dogs in the same .
text2: Ya y adengmo siña umanaatunog gui jâgâ ya y jila y gamo galago siña patten y enimigumo .

text: They have seen thy goings , O God ; even the goings of my God , my King , in the sanctuary .
text2: Sija jalie y jinanaomo , O Yuus ; magajet y jinanao y Yuusso , Rayjo gui sinantos na sagaña .

text: The singers went before , the players on instruments followed after ; among them were the damsels playing with timbrels .
text2: Y mangacanta manjajanao gui menan , y mandadangdang yan y dandanñija jatatituye ; y entaloñija y donseya sija ni y mandadangdang nii pandireta .

text: Bless ye God in the congregations , even the Lord , from the fountain of Israel .
text2: Fanbendise si Yuus gui jalom y inetnon taotao ; junggan , jamyo y tutujonña guiya Israel .

text: There is little Benjamin with their ruler , the princes of Judah and their council , the princes of Zebulun , and the princes of Naphtali .
text2: Ayonae estaba y diquique as Benjamin y magasñija , y prinsipen Juda yan y compañia apapagat , y prinsipen Sabulon yan y prinsipen Neftali .

text: Thy God hath commanded thy strength : strengthen , O God , that which thou hast wrought for us .
text2: Y Yuusmo tumago y minetgotmo ; O Yuus , nametgot y chechomo para jame .

text: Because of thy temple at Jerusalem shall kings bring presents unto thee .
text2: Pot causa y templomo guiya Jerusalem , y ray sija manmañuñule ninae sija para jago .

text: Rebuke the company of spearmen , the multitude of the bulls , with the calves of the people , till every one submit himself with pieces of silver : scatter thou the people that delight in war .
text2: Lalatde y dadao na gâgâ gui piao , y manadan nobiyo yan y tatneron gataotao , nii guinocha papa adengñija y pedason salape sija : jochalapon ayosija taotao nii manmalago manguera .

text: Princes shall come out of Egypt ; Ethiopia shall soon stretch out her hands unto God .
text2: Ufanmato y prinsipe sija guinin Egipto : Etiopia guse ujaestira y canaeña gui as Yuus .

text: Sing unto God , ye kingdoms of the earth ; O sing praises unto the Lord ; Selah :
text2: Cantaye si Yuus jamyo nii raenon tano ; O canta tinina para y Señot . Sila .

text: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens , which were of old ; lo , he doth send out his voice , and that a mighty voice .
text2: Para ayo y maudae gui jilo y langet y langet sija , nii guinin ampman na tiempo ; estagüe na güiya masangan nii inagang ; nii gaeninasiña na inagang .

text: Ascribe ye strength unto God : his excellency is over Israel , and his strength is in the clouds .
text2: Sangan y minetgot Yuus : y minagasña gaegue gui jilo Israel , yan y minetgotña gaegue gui jalom y mapagages .

text: O God , thou art terrible out of thy holy places : the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people . Blessed be God .
text2: O Yuus , ninamaañaojao gui santos na sagamo sija : y Yuus Israel , güiya numae minetgot yan ninasiña y taotaoña : Bendito si Yuus .

text: Save me , O God ; for the waters are come in unto my soul .
text2: NALIBREYO , O Yuus ; sa y janom manjalom asta y antijo .

text: I sink in deep mire , where there is no standing : I am come into deep waters , where the floods overflow me .
text2: Magñoyo gui tadong na luño ; anae ti siñayo tumojgue : guajo mato y jalom tadong na janom anae y milag malofan gui jilojo .

text: I am weary of my crying : my throat is dried : mine eyes fail while I wait for my God .
text2: Yayasyo ni y inagangjo : y agagajo ninaanglo : y atadogco linálachae mientras junanangga si Yuusso .

text: They that hate me without a cause are more than the hairs of mine head : they that would destroy me , being mine enemies wrongfully , are mighty : then I restored that which I took not away .
text2: Ayosija y chumatliiyo pot taya , megaeña qui y gapotulo gui ilujo : ayosija y manmalago umututyo nii enemigujo sin jafa na linache , mangaeninasiña : ayo nae guajo junatalo guato ayo y taya nae juchuleguan .

text: O God , thou knowest my foolishness ; and my sins are not hid from thee .
text2: O Yuus , jago tumungo y taetiningojo : yan y isaojo sija ti junaatog guiya jago .

text: Let not them that wait on thee , O Lord GOD of hosts , be ashamed for my sake : let not those that seek thee be confounded for my sake , O God of Israel .
text2: Chamo ayo sija y numananggajao munafanmamamajlao pot guajo , O Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo : chamo ayo sija y umaliligaojao umadesonra pot guajo , O Yuus Israel .

text: Because for thy sake I have borne reproach ; shame hath covered my face .
text2: Sa pot jago jupadese y linalatde : minamajlao tumampe y matajo .

text: I am become a stranger unto my brethren , and an alien unto my mother ' s children .
text2: Guinin manataotao juyong yo nii mañelujo ; yan taotao juyongyo gui famaguon nanajo .

text: For the zeal of thine house hath eaten me up ; and the reproaches of them that reproached thee are fallen upon me .
text2: Sa y inigo y guimamo cumanoyo : ya y linalatdeñija y ayo sija nii lumalatde jao manbasnag guiya guajo .

text: When I wept , and chastened my soul with fasting , that was to my reproach .
text2: Anae tumangesyo ya junamajalang y antijo pot ti chumocho , este y para malalatdeco .

text: I made sackcloth also my garment ; and I became a proverb to them .
text2: Anae jufatinas y luto para magagujo , jumuyongyo un cuentos nu sija .

text: They that sit in the gate speak against me ; and I was the song of the drunkards .
text2: Ya ayo y manmatatachong gui petta , manadingan contra guajo : ya guajo y cantasionñija anae mangacanta y manbulacho .

text: But as for me , my prayer is unto thee , O LORD , in an acceptable time : O God , in the multitude of thy mercy hear me , in the truth of thy salvation .
text2: Lao guajoja , y tinaetaejo guiya jago , O Jeova , gui tiempon y finaboresemo : O Yuus , pot y minegae y minaasemo opeyo gui minagajet y satbasionmo .

text: Deliver me out of the mire , and let me not sink : let me be delivered from them that hate me , and out of the deep waters .
text2: Nalibreyo gui liño ya chajo mamagño : polo ya ulibreyo güije sija nii chumatliiyo , yan gui y tinadong y janom sija .

text: Let not the waterflood overflow me , neither let the deep swallow me up , and let not the pit shut her mouth upon me .
text2: Chamo pumopolo y minilalag na janom na ufalofan gui jilojo , ni unpolo y tinadong na upañotyo ; chamo pumopolo y joyo na ujuchom y pachotña gui jilojo .

text: Hear me , O LORD ; for thy lovingkindness is good : turn unto me according to the multitude of thy tender mercies .
text2: Opeyo , O Jeova ; sa y minaasemo gosmauleg : taemanoja y minegae y minaasemo , birajao guiya guajo .

text: And hide not thy face from thy servant ; for I am in trouble : hear me speedily .
text2: Chamo na aatog y matamo gui tentagomo ; sa gaegue yo gui chinatsaga : opeyo guse .

text: Draw nigh unto my soul , and redeem it : deliver me because of mine enemies .
text2: Najijot jao gui antijo ya unnalibre : rescatayo sa juguaja y enimigujo sija .

text: Thou hast known my reproach , and my shame , and my dishonour : mine adversaries are all before thee .
text2: Jago tumungo y malalatdeco , yan y minamajlaojo yan y madesonraco : y contrariojo mangaegue todo gui menamo .

text: Reproach hath broken my heart ; and I am full of heaviness : and I looked for some to take pity , but there was none ; and for comforters , but I found none .
text2: Y linalatde yumulang y corasonjo : yan bulayo y pinite : ya manaliligaoyo jaye upinite , lao taya ni uno : yan y numamagofyo lao ti jusoda ni uno .

text: They gave me also gall for my meat ; and in my thirst they gave me vinegar to drink .
text2: Sija numaeyo locue lalaet para nengcanojo : yan anae majoyo , sija numaeyo binagle para juguimen .

text: Let their table become a snare before them : and that which should have been for their welfare , let it become a trap .
text2: Polo ya lamasañija mamalaso gui menanñija : polo ya yaguin gaegue sija gui pas , este para ocodo .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they see not ; and make their loins continually to shake .
text2: Polo ya ujomjom y atadogñija para chañija fanmalilie ; yan janayeyengyong nii sinturanñija para todo y tiempo .

text: Pour out thine indignation upon them , and let thy wrathful anger take hold of them .
text2: Basija gui jiloñija y binibumo , ya polo y dangculon linalalomo ya ufanjeniguif sija .

text: Let their habitation be desolate ; and let none dwell in their tents .
text2: Polo y sagañija ya umayulang : yan taya ni uno siña sumaga gui tiendañija .

text: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten ; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded .
text2: Sa sija pumetsigue ayo sija y sinaolagmo : ya sija sumangan y pinitinja ni y ninafanlamenmo .

text: Add iniquity unto their iniquity : and let them not come into thy righteousness .
text2: Naye mas taelaye y tinaelayeñija , ya chamo munafanjajalom gui tininasmo .

text: Let them be blotted out of the book of the living , and not be written with the righteous .
text2: Palo ya umafunas sija gui leblon linâlâ : ya munga manmatugue sija yan y manunas .

text: But I am poor and sorrowful : let thy salvation , O God , set me up on high .
text2: Lao guajo pobleyo yan tristeyo : polo y satbasionmo , O Yuus , ya upoloyo guiya jululo .

text: I will praise the name of God with a song , and will magnify him with thanksgiving .
text2: Guajo bae jualaba y naan Yuus nu y cantasion , ya junadangculo güe nu y inefresen grasias .

text: This also shall please the LORD better than an ox or bullock that hath horns and hoofs .
text2: Ya este munaguefmagof si Jeova mas qui y nobiyo , pat y toro nii mangaecángjilon yan papaquis .

text: The humble shall see this , and be glad : and your heart shall live that seek God .
text2: Y manmanso , jalie este ya ninafanmagof : ya y corasonmiyo ufanlâlâ y unaaliligao si Yuus .

text: For the LORD heareth the poor , and despiseth not his prisoners .
text2: Sa si Jeova jajungog y mannesesitao ya ti jachatlie y prenesuña sija .

text: Let the heaven and earth praise him , the seas , and everything that moveth therein .
text2: Polo y langet yan tano ya umaalaba güe , yan y tase sija yan todo y güinaja nii mangalalamten gui sanjalomña .

text: For God will save Zion , and will build the cities of Judah : that they may dwell there , and have it in possession .
text2: Sa si Yuus ujasatba y Sion yan ujafatinas y siuda sija guiya Juda : para usiña sija mañaga güije yan uguaja para y iyonñija .

text: The seed also of his servants shall inherit it : and they that love his name shall dwell therein .
text2: Ya y semiya locue gui tentagoña uereda ni ayo : ya ayo sija y gumaeya y naanña unafañaga güije .

text: Make haste , O God , to deliver me ; make haste to help me , O LORD .
text2: NACHADIG , O Yuus , para unalibreyo : nachadig umayudayo , O Yuus .

text: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul : let them be turned backward , and put to confusion , that desire my hurt .
text2: Polo sija ya ufanmamajlao yan ufaninistotba ni y umaliligao y antijo : polo sija ya ufanalo tate yan ufanmamajlao ni y manmagof nii desonraco .

text: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say , Aha , aha .
text2: Polo sija ya ufanalo tate para apas y minamajlaoñija ja ni y ilegñija : Aha , Aha .

text: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee : and let such as love thy salvation say continually , Let God be magnified .
text2: Polo ayo todo y umaliligaojao ya unfanmagof yan ufansenmagof ni jago : ya polo ya ayo y gumaeya y satbasionmo ya ilelegñija siésiempreja : Umanasendangculo si Yuus .

text: But I am poor and needy : make haste unto me , O God : thou art my help and my deliverer ; O LORD , make no tarrying .
text2: Lao guajo pobleyo yan nesesitaoyo : nachadig jao guiya guajo , O Yuus : sa jago umayuyudayo , yan y munalibreyo ; O Jeova , chamo umatrasasao .

text: In thee , O LORD , do I put my trust : let me never be put to confusion .
text2: YYAJAGO , O Jeova , nae jupolo y inangococo : ya chajo mamámajlao para taejinecog .

text: Deliver me in thy righteousness , and cause me to escape : incline thine ear unto me , and save me .
text2: Nalibreyo , nii tininasmo ya rescatayo : naapo y talangamo guiya guajo ya unsatbayo .

text: Be thou my strong habitation , whereunto I may continually resort : thou hast given commandment to save me ; for thou art my rock and my fortress .
text2: Jago y acho y saga para guajo , anae mafatoyo todo y tiempo : jago mannae tinago na jumasatbayo : sa jago y finitmeco yan y castiyujo .

text: Deliver me , O my God , out of the hand of the wicked , out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man .
text2: Rescatayo , O Yuusso , juyong gui canae y manaelaye yan y canae y ti manunas yan y manrecto na taotao .

text: For thou art my hope , O Lord GOD : thou art my trust from my youth .
text2: Sa jago y ninanggaco , O Jeova Yuus : jago y inangococo desde y pinatgonjo .

text: By thee have I been holden up from the womb : thou art he that took me out of my mother ' s bowels : my praise shall be continually of thee .
text2: Sa jago mumantieneyo desde y jalom tuyan , jago chumuleyo juyong guinin y tiyan nana : ya y tininajo todo y tiempo guiya jago .

text: I am as a wonder unto many ; but thou art my strong refuge .
text2: Guajo taegüije y ninamanman gui linajyan ; lao jago y megot na guinegüeco .

text: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day .
text2: Y pachotto ubula nii tininamo , an y inenramo todot dia .

text: Cast me not off in the time of old age ; forsake me not when my strength faileth .
text2: Chamoyo yumuyute gui tiempo y inamcojo : yaguin minetgotto esta jocog chamoyo dumidingo .

text: For mine enemies speak against me ; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together ,
text2: Sa y enimigujo manadingan contra guajo ; yan ayo sija y numanangga y antijo , manafaesen entre sija .

text: Saying , God hath forsaken him : persecute and take him ; for there is none to deliver him .
text2: Ylegñija : Diningogüe as Yuus : petsigue ya enchilegüe ; sa taya para ulinibregüe .

text: O God , be not far from me : O my God , make haste for my help .
text2: O Yuus , chamo chachago guiya guajo ; Yuusso , nachadig yan para unayudayo .

text: Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul ; let them be covered with reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt .
text2: Polo sija ya ufanmamajlao yan ufanlinachae , ayo y contrarion y antijo ; polo sija ya ufantinampe nii minamajlao yan y sinala , y umaliligao y dañujo .

text: But I will hope continually , and will yet praise thee more and more .
text2: Lao guajo juananangga todo y tiempo , yan junalala megae y tininajo guiya jago .

text: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day ; for I know not the numbers thereof .
text2: Y pachotto usinangan y tininasmo , yan y satbasionmo todot dia : sa ti jutungo y minegaeña .

text: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD : I will make mention of thy righteousness , even of thine only .
text2: Bae jufalag y minetgot gui as Yuus , Jeova ; ya jusangan y tininasmo , magajet , iyomoja namaesa .

text: O God , thou hast taught me from my youth : and hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works .
text2: O Yuus , jago jagasja fumanagüe yo desde y pinatgonjo ; yan asta pago jusangan claro nii ninamanman y chechomo .

text: Now also when I am old and grayheaded , O God , forsake me not ; until I have shewed thy strength unto this generation , and thy power to every one that is to come .
text2: Pago locue anae estayo bijo ya chungeyo , O Yuus chamoyo dumidingo : asta que jusangan claro nii minetgotmo y manmámamaela na generasion , yan y ninasiñamo cada uno ni ayo y ufanmato .

text: Thy righteousness also , O God , is very high , who hast done great things : O God , who is like unto thee !
text2: Yan y tinasmo locue , O Yuus , sumentaquilo ; jagasja unfatinas y mandangculo na güinaja sija : O Yuus , jaye uparejumo ?

text: Thou , which hast shewed me great and sore troubles , shalt quicken me again , and shalt bring me up again from the depths of the earth .
text2: Sa jago y fumanuejam mandangculo na pinite yan chinatsaga , siempre unnalâlâjam talo , yan unchulejam talo julo guinin y tinadong y tano .

text: Thou shalt increase my greatness , and comfort me on every side .
text2: Aumenta y dinangculoco ; yan birajao ya unamamagofyo .

text: I will also praise thee with the psaltery , even thy truth , O my God : unto thee will I sing with the harp , O thou Holy One of Israel .
text2: Ya guajo locue bae jualaba jao yan y guitala : magajet , y minagajetmo , O Yuusso : yyajago nae jucantaye yan y atpa , O jagoja na Santos guiya Israel .

text: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee ; and my soul , which thou hast redeemed .
text2: Y labiosso sendangculo minagofña anae jucantayejao tinina ; yan y antijo ni jago munalilibre .

text: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long : for they are confounded , for they are brought unto shame , that seek my hurt .
text2: Y jilajo locue jasasangan y tininasmo todot dia : sa innafanmamajlao yan innafaninestotba ayo y umaliligao y dañujo .

text: Give the king thy judgments , O God , and thy righteousness unto the king ' s son .
text2: NAE y ray ni juisiomo , O Yuus , yan y tininasmo gui lajin y ray .

text: He shall judge thy people with righteousness , and thy poor with judgment .
text2: Ya güiya ufanjusga y taotaomo gui tininas , yan y mamoblemo gui juisio .

text: The mountains shall bring peace to the people , and the little hills , by righteousness .
text2: Ya y beca sija chumule y pas gui taotao yan y mandiquique na ogso sija pot y tininas .

text: He shall judge the poor of the people , he shall save the children of the needy , and shall break in pieces the oppressor .
text2: Güiya ufanjusga y mamoble na taotao , güiya ufañatba y famaguon y mannesesitao , yan ufanyinamag y manmachaleg .

text: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure , throughout all generations .
text2: Sija ufanmaañao ni jago mientras gagaegue y atdao , yan y pilan gui todo y generasion yan y generasion .

text: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass : as showers that water the earth .
text2: Güiya tumunog papa taegüije y ichan gui jilo y manmautot na chaguan : taegüije minatmon janom ni y nafotgon y tano .

text: In his days shall the righteous flourish ; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth .
text2: Ya y jaaniña sija , mumamta y tininas ; ya y pas sumenmegae asta qui jocog y pilan .

text: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea , and from the river unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Güiya uguaja minagasña locue guinin y tase asta y tase , yan guinin y sadog asta y uttimon y tano .

text: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him ; and his enemies shall lick the dust .
text2: Ya ayo y mañasaga gui desierto , manecon gui menaña ; ya y enimiguña sija mamanjojoflag gui eda .

text: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents : the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts .
text2: Y ray sija guiya Tarsis yan isla sija ufanmañuñule ninae : yan y ray sija guiya Sabá yan iya Seba ufanmannae ninae .

text: Yea , all kings shall fall down before him : all nations shall serve him .
text2: Magajet , y ray todos ujatomba sija gui menaña : yan y nasion todos usinetbe güe .

text: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth ; the poor also , and him that hath no helper .
text2: Sa güiya unalibre y nesesitao an jumagang ; yan ayo locue y peble an ni y taya uinayuda .

text: He shall spare the poor and needy , and shall save the souls of the needy .
text2: Güiya unafanmañotbla y mamoble yan y mannesesitao yan ujasatba y anten y mannesesitao .

text: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence : and precious shall their blood be in his sight .
text2: Güiya unafanlibre y antiñija guinin y chiniguit yan y finijom : yan ugagaebale y jâgâñija gui menan atadogña .

text: And he shall live , and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba : prayer also shall be made for him continually ; and daily shall he be praised .
text2: Ya güiya lumala , ya para güiya umanae ni y oron Sabá ; ya y tinayuyut locue mafatitinas pot güiya todo y tiempo ; sa sija ufanbendise güe todot dia .

text: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains ; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon : and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth .
text2: Sa uguaja megae na maies gui jalom y eda gui sanjilo y puntan y beca sija ; ya y tinegchaña ufanmayengyong taegüije y Libano . ; ya sija gui siuda ninafangatbo taegüije y chaguan gui eda .

text: His name shall endure for ever : his name shall be continued as long as the sun : and men shall be blessed in him : all nations shall call him blessed .
text2: Y naanña gagaegue para taejinecog : y naanña sisigueja taegüije y siniguen y atdao : yan todo y taotao ufandichoso guiya güiya ; yan todo y nasion umafanaan güe dichoso .

text: Blessed be the LORD God , the God of Israel , who only doeth wondrous things .
text2: Bendito si Jeova Yuus , ni si Yuus Israel , sa güiyaja na maesa fumatinas y mannamanman na güinaja .

text: And blessed be his glorious name for ever : and let the whole earth be filled with his glory ; Amen , and Amen .
text2: Yan bendito y minalag y naanmo para taejinecog : ya polo todo y tano ya ufanbula ni y minalagmo . Amen yan Amen .

text: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended .
text2: Magpo y tinayuyut David ni y lajin Isai .

text: Truly God is good to Israel , even to such as are of a clean heart .
text2: SENMAGAJET si Yuus na mauleg para Israel , ni ayo sija y mangasgas na corason .

text: But as for me , my feet were almost gone ; my steps had well nigh slipped .
text2: Ya guajo cánaja sumuja y adengjo ; didideja tentenjan sulon y pinecatta .

text: For I was envious at the foolish , when I saw the prosperity of the wicked .
text2: Sa jumalatgue y mangaduco , anae julie y minauleg y manaelaye .

text: For there are no bands in their death : but their strength is firm .
text2: Sa taya pinite gui finataeñija : lao y minetgotñija fitme .

text: They are not in trouble as other men ; neither are they plagued like other men .
text2: Taya chinatsagañija taegüije y otro taotao sija ; ni ufanmasapet taegüije y palo na taotao sija .

text: Therefore pride compasseth them about as a chain ; violence covereth them as a garment .
text2: Enaomina na sobetbia y cadena nii lisayon y cueyoñija ; y finijom tumampe sija taegüije y magago .

text: Their eyes stand out with fatness : they have more than heart could wish .
text2: Y atadogñija mamachom ni y yinemog ; guajañija mas qui y corason siña umalatgue .

text: They are corrupt , and speak wickedly concerning oppression : they speak loftily .
text2: Sija manmanbotlelea , yan jasasangan chiniguit gui tinaelaye : jasasangan y mansentaquilo .

text: They set their mouth against the heavens , and their tongue walketh through the earth .
text2: Japolo y pachotñija gui langet , yan y jilañija janafanmamocat gui inanaco y tano .

text: Therefore his people return hither : and waters of a full cup are wrung out to them .
text2: Enao mina y taotaoña manalo mague : yan y binilan y janom gui posuelo umafugo nu sija .

text: And they say , How doth God know ? and is there knowledge in the most High ?
text2: Ya ilegñija : Jaftaemano tungoña si Yuus ? Ada guaja tiningo gui Gueftaquilo ?

text: Behold , these are the ungodly , who prosper in the world ; they increase in riches .
text2: Sa estagüe ya sija y manaelaye ; ya sija manmegae gui tano , sa taya chinatsagañija todo y jaane .

text: Verily I have cleansed my heart in vain , and washed my hands in innocency .
text2: Senmagajet na taebale y junagasgas y corasonjo : yan jufagase y canaejo gui guinasgas .

text: For all the day long have I been plagued , and chastened every morning .
text2: Sa todo y inanaco y jaane chatsagayo , yan y castigojo cada ogaan .

text: If I say , I will speak thus ; behold , I should offend against the generation of thy children .
text2: Yaguin jagasja jualog , bae jusangan este ; este na jagasja judague y generasion : y famaguonmo .

text: When I thought to know this , it was too painful for me ;
text2: Yaguin jujaso jaftaemano na jutungo este , sumenmacat para guajo ;

text: Until I went into the sanctuary of God ; then understood I their end .
text2: Asta que jujalom gui sinantos na sagayan gui as Yuus ; ya jujaso y uttimoñija .

text: Surely thou didst set them in slippery places : thou castedst them down into destruction .
text2: Magajet na jago pumolo sija gui palagse na sagayan ; jago yumute sija papa gui jalom y yinilang .

text: How are they brought into desolation , as in a moment ! they are utterly consumed with terrors .
text2: Sa jaftaemano na ufanyinilang , gui un rato ! sija chadig malimachae ni y minaañao sija .

text: As a dream when one awaketh ; so , O Lord , when thou awakest , thou shalt despise their image .
text2: Taegüije güinife an magmata ; taegüenaoja , O Señot , yaguin magmatajao , unchatlie y jechurañija .

text: Thus my heart was grieved , and I was pricked in my reins .
text2: Sa y corasonjo estaba triste , ya matogchayo gui sumanjalom .

text: So foolish was I , and ignorant : I was as a beast before thee .
text2: Na taegüije taejinasoyo , yan taetiningoyo : taegüijeyo y gâgâ gui menamo .

text: Nevertheless I am continually with thee : thou hast holden me by my right hand .
text2: Masqueseaja gagaegueyo siempre guiya jago ; jago mumantiene y agapa na canaejo .

text: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel , and afterward receive me to glory .
text2: Jago umesgaejonyo ni y consejumo , ya despues unresibeyo gui langet .

text: Whom have I in heaven but thee ? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee .
text2: Ya jayeyo guajayo gui langet sino jagoja ? ya taya gui jilo y tano güinaeyaco , na jagoja .

text: My flesh and my heart faileth : but God is the strength of my heart , and my portion for ever .
text2: Y catneco yan y corasonjo malachae : lao si Yuus y minetgot y corasonjo , yan y güinajajo para taejinecog .

text: For , lo , they that are far from thee shall perish : thou hast destroyed all them that go a whoring from thee .
text2: Sa , estagüe ya ayo sija y mañago guiya jago , na ufanmalingo : jago yumulang todo ayo sija y manjanao guiya jago para inábale .

text: But it is good for me to draw near to God : I have put my trust in the Lord GOD , that I may declare all thy works .
text2: Lao mauleg para guajo y juguaguato jijot gui as Yuus : sa jupolo y inangococo gui Señot Jeova , para usiña jusangan todo y chechomo .

text: O God , why hast thou cast us off for ever ? why doth thine anger smoke against the sheep of thy pasture ?
text2: O Yuus , sajafa na unyutejam para taejinecog ? sajafa na y linalomo umasgon contra y quinilo sija gui pastajimo ?

text: Remember thy congregation , which thou hast purchased of old ; the rod of thine inheritance , which thou hast redeemed ; this mount Zion , wherein thou hast dwelt .
text2: Jaso y inetnonmo ni y unfajan gui ampmam na tiempo ; y tribon y erensiamo , ni y jago sumatba ; yan y egso Sion , anae sumasagajao .

text: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations ; even all that the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary .
text2: Jatsa y adengmo para taejinecog na yinilang : sa y enimigo jafatinas y tinaelaye todo gui jalom y sinantos na sagamo .

text: Thine enemies roar in the midst of thy congregations ; they set up their ensigns for signs .
text2: Y contrariumo sija manaagang gui entalo y inetnonmo ; ya japolo julo y banderañija para señat sija .

text: A man was famous according as he had lifted up axes upon the thick trees .
text2: Parejo yan y taotao y jajatsa julo y gachae sija gui jilo y chemchom na trongco jayo sija .

text: But now they break down the carved work thereof at once with axes and hammers .
text2: Lao pago sija yumute papa y binetda na chocho un biajeja , ni y gachae yan y mattiyo sija .

text: They have cast fire into thy sanctuary , they have defiled by casting down the dwelling place of thy name to the ground .
text2: Sa sija sumanggüe y sinantos na sagamo , yan munainale y sagan y naanmo , sanpapa gui tano .

text: They said in their hearts , Let us destroy them together : they have burned up all the synagogues of God in the land .
text2: Ylegñija gui corasonñija : Nije tayulang sija ni mandaño : ya sija sumonggue todo y sinagogan Yuus gui tano .

text: We see not our signs : there is no more any prophet : neither is there among us any that knoweth how long .
text2: Ti talie y señatta sija : ya taya ni uno profeta mas : ni uguaja sija ni utiningo asta ngaean .

text: O God , how long shall the adversary reproach ? shall the enemy blaspheme thy name for ever ?
text2: Asta ngaean , O Yuus , nae y contrario ulalatde ? ya y enimigo ufañatfino contra y naanmo para taejinecog ?

text: Why withdrawest thou thy hand , even thy right hand ? pluck it out of thy bosom .
text2: Sajafa na unjedo y canaemo , junggan y agapa na canaemo ? jala juyong gui pechomo ya unyulang .

text: For God is my King of old , working salvation in the midst of the earth .
text2: Sa si Yuus y Rayjo gui ampmam na tiempo , jafatitinas y satbasion gui entalo y tano .

text: Thou didst divide the sea by thy strength : thou brakest the heads of the dragons in the waters .
text2: Jago dumibide y tase ni y ninasiñamo : jago yumamag y ilon y alo sija gui tase .

text: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces , and gavest him to be meat to the people inhabiting the wilderness .
text2: ni y dadao na güijan , an pidasito ; yan unnae güe para nengcano y taotao ni y mañasaga gui desierto .

text: Thou didst cleave the fountain and the flood : thou driedst up mighty rivers .
text2: Jago bumaba y matan janom yan y minilalag : jago munafananglo y manmetgot na sadog sija .

text: The day is thine , the night also is thine : thou hast prepared the light and the sun .
text2: Y jaane iyomo , y puenge locue iyomo : jago fumamauleg y inina yan y atdao .

text: Thou hast set all the borders of the earth : thou hast made summer and winter .
text2: Jago pumolo todo y oriyan y tano : jago fumatinas y tiempon maepe yan y tiempom manengjeng .

text: Remember this , that the enemy hath reproached , O LORD , and that the foolish people have blasphemed thy name .
text2: Jaso este , na y enimigo manmalalatde , O Jeova , ya ayo y mangaduco na taotao jachatfino y naanmo .

text: O deliver not the soul of thy turtledove unto the multitude of the wicked : forget not the congregation of thy poor for ever .
text2: O , chamo umintrerega y anten y gamo paluma gui dadao na gâgâ : chamo malelefa ni y dinaña y mamoblemo para taejinecog .

text: Have respect unto the covenant : for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty .
text2: Respeta y trato : sa y jemjom na sagayan sija gui tano manbula y sagan y manmalamaña .

text: O let not the oppressed return ashamed : let the poor and needy praise thy name .
text2: O , Chamo munafanatalo manmamajlao y manmachichiguit : polo y mamoble yan y mannesesitao ya umalalaba y naanmo .

text: Arise , O God , plead thine own cause : remember how the foolish man reproacheth thee daily .
