text2: Cajulo , O Yuus , gogüe y causamo : jaso jaftaemano y manaejinaso na taotao ni y lumalatdejao cada jaane .

text: Forget not the voice of thine enemies : the tumult of those that rise up against thee increaseth continually .
text2: Chamo malelefa ni y inangang y contrariumo sija ; y borucan ayo sija y mangajulo contra jago , lumala cajuloja siesiempre .

text: Unto thee , O God , do we give thanks , unto thee do we give thanks : for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare .
text2: YYAJAGO , O Yuus , innae grasia ; iyajago innae grasia sa y naanmo esta jijot : sa y ninamanman na chechomo masasangan .

text: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly .
text2: Ngaean nae jusoda y tiempo na mamatca , bae jujusga ni y tinas .

text: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved : I bear up the pillars of it . Selah .
text2: Y tano yan todo y mañasaga mamalachae : guajo chumuchule julo y jaliguiña . Sila .

text: I said unto the fools , Deal not foolishly : and to the wicked , Lift not up the horn :
text2: Ya ileco ni y mansobetbio : Chamiyo fumatitinas y sinebetbio : yan ni y manaelaye , chamiyo jumajatsa julo y canggelon .

text: Lift not up your horn on high : speak not with a stiff neck .
text2: Chamiyo jumajatsa y canggelonmiyo gui taquilo ; chamiyo fanguecuentos ni y tiso na tongjo .

text: For promotion cometh neither from the east , nor from the west , nor from the south .
text2: Sa y jinatsa ni y ufato ni y guinin y sancatan , ni y guinin y sanlichan , ni y guinin y sajaya .

text: But God is the judge : he putteth down one , and setteth up another .
text2: Lao si Yuus y jues : güiya pumolo papa uno , yan jajatsa julo otro .

text: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup , and the wine is red ; it is full of mixture ; and he poureth out of the same : but the dregs thereof , all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out , and drink them .
text2: Sa gaegue gui canae Jeova y copa , yan y bino ni lalálalo ; bula dinaña , ya jachuda juyong taeguijeja ; lao y asiento gui fondoña , todo y manaelaye gui tano jafufugo ya jaguiguimen sija .

text: But I will declare for ever ; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob .
text2: Lao guajo bae jusangan claro para taejinecog ; ya bae jucantaye si Yuus Jacob , y alabansa sija .

text: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off ; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted .
text2: Todo y canggelon y manaelaye locue bae juutot : lao y canggelon y manunas umanafangajulo .

text: In Judah is God known : his name is great in Israel .
text2: MATUNGO si Yuus esta guiya Juda : y naanña manadangculo guiya Israel .

text: In Salem also is his tabernacle , and his dwelling place in Zion .
text2: Yya Salem nae gaegue y tabetnacoluña , ya y sagaña gaegue guiya Sion .

text: There brake he the arrows of the bow , the shield , and the sword , and the battle . Selah .
text2: Ayo nae jayamag sija y flechan y atcos ; yan y patang yan y espada , yan y guera . Sila .

text: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey .
text2: Malagjao yan magas jao mas qui y tadong na jalomtano .

text: The stouthearted are spoiled , they have slept their sleep : and none of the men of might have found their hands .
text2: Ya y manmajetog na corason manmayulang manafanaelaye ; esta jamaego y minaegoñija ; ya taya ni un taotao ni y gaeninasiña jasoda y canaeñija .

text: At thy rebuke , O God of Jacob , both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep .
text2: Pot y chinemamo , O Yuus Jacob , todo careta yan y cabayo manmayute gui minaego y finatae .

text: Thou , even thou , art to be feared : and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry ?
text2: Jago , junggan jago , para unamaañao : ya jaye siña tumogue gui menamo yan lalalojao ?

text: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven ; the earth feared , and was still ,
text2: Jago munamajungog y sentensia guinin y langet ; ya y tano manmaañao , ya manmamatquilo .

text: When God arose to judgment , to save all the meek of the earth . Selah .
text2: Anae si Yuus jacajulo gui juisio , para usatba todo y manmanso gui tano . Sila .

text: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee : the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain .
text2: Magajet na y binibon y taotao uinalabajao : yan y seblan y binibo , jago sumoma .

text: Vow , and pay unto the LORD your God : let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared .
text2: Promete ya inapase si Jeova ni y Yuusmiyo : todo ayo y mangaegue gui oriyaña manmañuñule ninae para güiya ni y namaañao .

text: He shall cut off the spirit of princes : he is terrible to the kings of the earth .
text2: Güiya munamautut y espiriton y prinsipe sija : sa güiya y namaañao para y ray sija gui tano .

text: I cried unto God with my voice , even unto God with my voice ; and he gave ear unto me .
text2: BAE juagang si Yuus ni y inagangjo ; magajet na si Yuus ni y inagangjo ; ya güiya jumungogyo .

text: In the day of my trouble I sought the Lord : my sore ran in the night , and ceased not : my soul refused to be comforted .
text2: Y jaane y chinatsagaco jualigao y Señot : y canaejo maestira gui puenge ya pumapara : y antijo ti malago manamagof .

text: I remembered God , and was troubled : I complained , and my spirit was overwhelmed . Selah .
text2: Jujajaso , si Yuus ya janaestotbayo : umuugongyo , sa y espiritujo lalalango . Sila .

text: Thou holdest mine eyes waking : I am so troubled that I cannot speak .
text2: Jago unadaje y atadogjo ni taemaego : sa taegüije chatsagayo na ti siñayo cumuentos .

text: I have considered the days of old , the years of ancient times .
text2: Sa guajo jujajaso y jaane ni y ampmam manmalofan , yan y sacan ni y ampmam na tiempo .

text: I call to remembrance my song in the night : I commune with mine own heart : and my spirit made diligent search .
text2: Jujajaso y cantaco gui puenge : jujajaso ni y corasonjo ; ya y espiritujo guine guefaligao ?

text: Will the Lord cast off for ever ? and will he be favourable no more ?
text2: Ada uyute y Señot para taejinecog ? ya ti utalo y finaboresiña ?

text: Is his mercy clean gone for ever ? doth his promise fail for evermore ?
text2: Cao y minaaseña usenjanaoja para taejinecog ? ya y promesaña ufanlingo para taejinecog ?

text: Hath God forgotten to be gracious ? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies ? Selah .
text2: Ya malefa si Yuus na uyóase ? ya pot y linalaloña na jajuchom y güinaeyaña ? Sila .

text: And I said , This is my infirmity : but I will remember the years of the right hand of the most High .
text2: Ya guajo ileco : Este y dinafejo : lao bae jujaso y sacan sija gui agapa na canae y Gueftaquilo .

text: I will remember the works of the LORD : surely I will remember thy wonders of old .
text2: Bae jusangan y checho Jeova : sa bae jujaso y ninamanmanmo gui ampmam na tiempo .

text: I will meditate also of all thy work , and talk of thy doings .
text2: Bae jujaso locue todo y chechomo , yan jusangan sumanjalomjo y finatinasmo .

text: Thy way , O God , is in the sanctuary : who is so great a God as our God ?
text2: Y chalanmo , O Yuus , gague gui sinantos na sagayan : jaye dangculo na yuus calang y Yuusta ?

text: Thou art the God that doest wonders : thou hast declared thy strength among the people .
text2: Jago y Yuus ni y fumatinas y mannamanman : jago munamatungo y minetgotmo gui taotao sija .

text: Thou hast with thine arm redeemed thy people , the sons of Jacob and Joseph . Selah .
text2: Jago yan y canaemo munafanlibre y taotaomo ; ni y famaguon Jacob yan José . Sila .

text: The waters saw thee , O God , the waters saw thee ; they were afraid : the depths also were troubled .
text2: Y janom malie jao , O Yuus , y janom malie jao , ya sija ninafanmaañao : ya y tinadong locue ninafanmayengyong .

text: The clouds poured out water : the skies sent out a sound : thine arrows also went abroad .
text2: Y mapagajes sija manmañuñuda janom : ya y langet mannae y inagang : ya y flechamo locue manjanao juyong .

text: The voice of thy thunder was in the heaven : the lightnings lightened the world : the earth trembled and shook .
text2: Ya y palampan y jilumo estaba gui remolino ; ya y lamlam maniiina gui tano : ya y tano manmayengyong yan manlalaolao .

text: Thy way is in the sea , and thy path in the great waters , and thy footsteps are not known .
text2: Y chalanmo gui tase , ya y finaposmo gui mandangculo na janom , ya y guinachamo ti matungo .

text: Thou leddest thy people like a flock by the hand of Moses and Aaron .
text2: Jago umesgaejon y taotaomo taegüije y manadang quinilo pot y canae Moises yan Aaron .

text: Give ear , O my people , to my law : incline your ears to the words of my mouth .
text2: ECUNGOG , O taotaojo , y tinagojo : na inecungog ni y talanganmo y sinangan y pachotto .

text: I will open my mouth in a parable : I will utter dark sayings of old :
text2: Bae jubaba y pachotto gui acomparasion : bae jusangan sinangan na gui jemjom gui ampmam na tiempo .

text: Which we have heard and known , and our fathers have told us .
text2: Ayosija ni y injingog yan y intingo , yan y tatanmame ni jasanganejam .

text: We will not hide them from their children , shewing to the generation to come the praises of the LORD , and his strength , and his wonderful works that he hath done .
text2: Ti innafanatog sija guinin y famaguonñija , masangangane y generasion ni y manmamamaela ni y tinina sija gui Señot , yan y minetgotña yan y mannamanman na chechoña ni y jachogüe .

text: For he established a testimony in Jacob , and appointed a law in Israel , which he commanded our fathers , that they should make them known to their children :
text2: Sa güiya munacajulo y testimonio gui as Jacob , yan japolo tinago guiya Israel , ni y janatungo sija y famaguonñija .

text: That the generation to come might know them , even the children which should be born ; who should arise and declare them to their children :
text2: Para ujatungo y generasion ni y manmamamaela , y famaguonja ni y finañagonñija ; ni y ufangajulo ya ujasangane y famaguonñija .

text: That they might set their hope in God , and not forget the works of God , but keep his commandments :
text2: Para usiña japolo y ninanggañija gui as Yuus , ya ti ufanmalefa ni y checho Yuus , lao jaadaje y tinagoña sija .

text: And might not be as their fathers , a stubborn and rebellious generation ; a generation that set not their heart aright , and whose spirit was not stedfast with God .
text2: Ya chañija fanaegüigüije y tatañija ; un generasion ni managuaguat yan ti manmalago manmanosgue : y generasion ni y ti japolo y corasonñija gui tinas , yan ayo na espirituñija y ti manfitme gui as Yuus .

text: The children of Ephraim , being armed , and carrying bows , turned back in the day of battle .
text2: Y famaguon Efraim , guaja atmas yan manmañule y atcos sija , manalo tate gui jaanen y guera .

text: They kept not the covenant of God , and refused to walk in his law ;
text2: Ti jaadaje y traton Yuus , ya ti manmalago na ufanmamocat gui tinagoña .

text: And forgat his works , and his wonders that he had shewed them .
text2: Ya manmalefa ni y chechoña , yan y ninamanmanña ni y manfinanue sija .

text: Marvellous things did he in the sight of their fathers , in the land of Egypt , in the field of Zoan .
text2: Namanman na güinaja finatinasña gui menan y tatañija , gui tano Egipto , gui fangualuan Soan .

text: He divided the sea , and caused them to pass through ; and he made the waters to stand as an heap .
text2: Jadebide y tase ya janafanmalofan gui inanaco sija todo ; yan janafañaga y janom taegüije y monton .

text: In the daytime also he led them with a cloud , and all the night with a light of fire .
text2: Ya y jaane janafanenesgaegaejonja ni y mapagajes ; yan todo puenge y finañila y guafe .

text: He clave the rocks in the wilderness , and gave them drink as out of the great depths .
text2: Japanag y acho gue desierto , ya janae sija na ufanguinem taegüije na jumuyong guinin y dangculon tinadong .

text: He brought streams also out of the rock , and caused waters to run down like rivers .
text2: Ya mañule minilalag locue guinin y acho , yan janafalalago y janom taegüije y sadog .

text: And they sinned yet more against him by provoking the most High in the wilderness .
text2: Lao trabia sisigueja mas isagüegüe , ya manmanembeste contra Gueftaquilo gui desierto .

text: And they tempted God in their heart by asking meat for their lust .
text2: Ya sija jatienta si Yuus gui corasonñija , yan mangagagao catne pot y güinaeyañija .

text: Yea , they spake against God ; they said , Can God furnish a table in the wilderness ?
text2: Magajet na sija manguentos contra si Yuus ; ilegñija : Ada siña si Yuus jafamaulequejit lamasa gui desierto ?

text: Behold , he smote the rock , that the waters gushed out , and the streams overflowed ; can he give bread also ? can he provide flesh for his people ?
text2: Sa , estagüe , na anae japanag y acho , manjuyong y janom , ya y minilalag manmachuchuda . Ada siña güe manae pan locue ? umafamauleg catne para y taotaoña ?

text: Therefore the LORD heard this , and was wroth : so a fire was kindled against Jacob , and anger also came up against Israel ;
text2: Enao mina anae jajungog este , y Señot ninabubo : ya umasonggue y guafe contra as Jacob , yan y linalalo locue cajulo contra Israel ;

text: Because they believed not in God , and trusted not in his salvation :
text2: Sa ti jajonggue si Yuus , yan ti jaangoco sija gui satbasionña .

text: Though he had commanded the clouds from above , and opened the doors of heaven ,
text2: Lao güiya tumago y mapagajes guinin y sanjilo ; yan jababa y pettan langet .

text: And had rained down manna upon them to eat , and had given them of the corn of heaven .
text2: Yan janauchan papa y mana gui jiloñija para ujacano , yan janae sija ni y maies y langet .

text: Man did eat angels ' food : he sent them meat to the full .
text2: Y taotao cumano y na y manmetgot : güiya numae sija catne para ufanjaspog .

text: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven : and by his power he brought in the south wind .
text2: Jatago y manglo sancatan na ufanguaefe gui jalom y langet : yan pot y ninasiñaña jachachalane y manglo sanjaya .

text: He rained flesh also upon them as dust , and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea :
text2: Janauchan catne locue gui jiloñija taegüije y petbos ; yan y pajaro ni gaepapa taegüije inae gui tase ;

text: And he let it fall in the midst of their camp , round about their habitations .
text2: Ya japolo ayo sija na ufanbasnag gui entalo y campoñija , ya gui oriyan y sagañija .

text: So they did eat , and were well filled : for he gave them their own desire ;
text2: Ya sija jacano , ya mangosjaspog sija ; sa güiya numae sija ni y tinangañiñija .

text: They were not estranged from their lust . But while their meat was yet in their mouths ,
text2: Lao ti janajanao guiya sija y tinangañija ; lao estabaja trabia y catneñija gui jalom y pachotñija ,

text: The wrath of God came upon them , and slew the fattest of them , and smote down the chosen men of Israel .
text2: Ya y binibon Yuus mato gui jiloñija , ya japuno y mas manyomog guiya sija , yan jayute papa y patgon na taotao sija guiya Israel .

text: For all this they sinned still , and believed not for his wondrous works .
text2: Lao contodo este , sigueja di maaiisao trabia : yan ti majonggue y mamnamanman na chochoña .

text: Therefore their days did he consume in vanity , and their years in trouble .
text2: Ya pot este na y jaaneñija janafanlinachae ni y banidá ; yan y sacanñija gui minaañao .

text: When he slew them , then they sought him : and they returned and inquired early after God .
text2: Ya anae japuno sija , ayo nae manafaesen pot güiya yan jabira sija ya maaligao guse si Yuus .

text: And they remembered that God was their rock , and the high God their redeemer .
text2: Yan jajaso na si Yuus y achoñija , yan y Gueftaquilo na Yuus y Satbadotñija .

text: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth , and they lied unto him with their tongues .
text2: Achogja ujafaande güe ni y pachotñija yan ujadague ni y jilañija .

text: For their heart was not right with him , neither were they stedfast in his covenant .
text2: Sa y corasonñija ti tunas guiya güiya : ni ufanfitme gui tratuña .

text: But he , being full of compassion , forgave their iniquity , and destroyed them not : yea , many a time turned he his anger away , and did not stir up all his wrath .
text2: jajatsajulo y binibuña .

text: For he remembered that they were but flesh ; a wind that passeth away , and cometh not again .
text2: Sa jajaso na sija catneja ; y manglo na malofan ya mapos ya ti mamaela talo .

text: How oft did they provoke him in the wilderness , and grieve him in the desert !
text2: Cuanto biaje manmanembeste contra güiya gui jalomtano yan manatriste güe gui desierto !

text: Yea , they turned back and tempted God , and limited the Holy One of Israel .
text2: Ya manalo tate ya matienta si Yuus ; ya macase y Santosgüe guiya Israel .

text: They remembered not his hand , nor the day when he delivered them from the enemy .
text2: Ya ti jajaso y canaeña ; ni jaane anae ninafanlibre gui contrario .

text: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt , and his wonders in the field of Zoan :
text2: Ni y pineloña na señatña guiya Egipto : yan y ninamanmanña gui fangualuan Soan :

text: And had turned their rivers into blood ; and their floods , that they could not drink .
text2: Yan jatulaeca y Sadog janajâgâ ; yan y minilalag para chañija fanguiguimen .

text: He sent divers sorts of flies among them , which devoured them ; and frogs , which destroyed them .
text2: Janae megae na lalo para ufanquinano ; yan rana sija para ufanyinilang .

text: He gave also their increase unto the caterpiller , and their labour unto the locust .
text2: Janae y ilo oruga ni y aumentan tano ; ya y finachochoñija y apacha .

text: He destroyed their vines with hail , and their sycomore trees with frost .
text2: Jayulang y fangualuanñija ubas ni y ichan grano ; yan y trongco igos sija ni y hielo .

text: He gave up their cattle also to the hail , and their flocks to hot thunderbolts .
text2: Japolo y gañija gâgâ locue gui papa y ichan grano , ya y manadan gañija gui minaepen lamlam .

text: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger , wrath , and indignation , and trouble , by sending evil angels among them .
text2: Jayute gui jiloñija y fijom na binibuña ; binibo , linalalo , yan chinatsaga ; y manadan manaelaye na angjet sija .

text: He made a way to his anger ; he spared not their soul from death , but gave their life over to the pestilence ;
text2: Mamatinas chalan para y linalaloña ; ya ti jachoma y antiñija guinin y finatae , lao japolo y linâlâñija gui peste .

text: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt ; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of Ham :
text2: Ya japuno todo y finenena na finañagon guiya Egipto , y mas magas naminetgotñija gui jalom y tiendan Cam !

text: But made his own people to go forth like sheep , and guided them in the wilderness like a flock .
text2: Lao chalane juyong y taotaoña taegüije y quinilo sija , yan jaesgagaejon sija gui desierto taegüije y manadan , gâgâ .

text: And he led them on safely , so that they feared not : but the sea overwhelmed their enemies .
text2: Ya jachule sija gui seguro , ya sija ti manmaañao : lao y tase tumampe y enimigoñija .

text: And he brought them to the border of his sanctuary , even to this mountain , which his right hand had purchased .
text2: Ya jacone sija asta y oriyan y sinantos na sagaña , güineja na ogso ni y guinanan y agapa na canaeña .

text: He cast out the heathen also before them , and divided them an inheritance by line , and made the tribes of Israel to dwell in their tents .
text2: Jayute juyong y nasion locue gui menañija , yan jafacae guiya sija y erensiañija ya jaraya , ya janafañaga y tribon Israel gui jalom y tiendañija .

text: Yet they tempted and provoked the most high God , and kept not his testimonies :
text2: Lao sija trabia jatietentaja , yan manmanembebesteja contra y Gueftaquilo na Yuus , yan ti jaadaje y tinagoña .

text: But turned back , and dealt unfaithfully like their fathers : they were turned aside like a deceitful bow .
text2: Lao manalo tate , yan manmafatinas dinague taegüije y tatañija : ya manmabira sija gui un banda taegüije y dacon na atco .

text: For they provoked him to anger with their high places , and moved him to jealousy with their graven images .
text2: Sa macase güe ya mannalalalo pot y sagañija ni taquilo ya masuog güe ya manafanugo ni y imageñija ni tinaga .

text: When God heard this , he was wroth , and greatly abhorred Israel :
text2: Anae jajungog este si Yuus , ninabubo , yan jagoschatlie iya Israel .

text: So that he forsook the tabernacle of Shiloh , the tent which he placed among men ;
text2: Ya pot ayo na jadingo y tabetnaculo guiya Silo , yan y tienda ni y japolo gui entalo taotao sija .

text: And delivered his strength into captivity , and his glory into the enemy ' s hand .
text2: Ya janae ni y minetgotña y cautibo , ya y minalagña gui canae y contrario .

text: He gave his people over also unto the sword ; and was wroth with his inheritance .
text2: Janae y espada ni y taotaoña : yan ninabubo ni y erensiaña .

text: The fire consumed their young men ; and their maidens were not given to marriage .
text2: Linachae ni y guafe y manpatgon na lalaje ; ya y manpatgon na famalaoan taya cantan umasagua .

text: Their priests fell by the sword ; and their widows made no lamentation .
text2: Ya y mamaleñija manmodong gui espada ; ya y manbiuda sija ti ninafantriste .

text: Then the Lord awaked as one out of sleep , and like a mighty man that shouteth by reason of wine .
text2: Ya y Señot magmata taegüije y uno ni y guinin mamaego , yan taegüije y matatñga na taotao ni y ninaaagang pot rason di y bino .

text: And he smote his enemies in the hinder parts : he put them to a perpetual reproach .
text2: Ya japuno y enimiguña sija ni y mañasaga gui santate : yan japolo sija güi taejinecog na minamajlao .

text: Moreover he refused the tabernacle of Joseph , and chose not the tribe of Ephraim :
text2: Ademas jarechasa y tabetnaculo gui as José , ya ti jaayeg y tribon Efraim .

text: But chose the tribe of Judah , the mount Zion which he loved .
text2: Lao jaayeg tribon Juda , ayo ogso Sion ni y güinaeyaña .

text: And he built his sanctuary like high palaces , like the earth which he hath established for ever .
text2: Ya jafatinas y sinantos na sagaña taegüije y manaquilo na sagayan sija , taegüije y tano na japlanta para taejinecog .

text: He chose David also his servant , and took him from the sheepfolds :
text2: Jaayeg si David locue na tentagoña , yan jacone güe guinin y quelat y quinilo ,

text: From following the ewes great with young he brought him to feed Jacob his people , and Israel his inheritance .
text2: jaconepara unafañocho y taotaoña gui as Jacob yan y erensiaña guiya Israel .

text: So he fed them according to the integrity of his heart ; and guided them by the skilfulness of his hands .
text2: Ya taegüije janafañocho sija segun y tininas y corasonña ; yan jaesgaejon sija pot y tiningon y canaeña .

text: O God , the heathen are come into thine inheritance ; thy holy temple have they defiled ; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps .
text2: mayulangya mapolo y Jerusalem pot montón sija .

text: The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven , the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth .
text2: Ya y tataotao y manmatae na tentagomo manmanae nañija y pajaro gui langet : ya y catnen y mañantosmo y gâgâ gui tano .

text: Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem ; and there was none to bury them .
text2: Y jâgâñija manmachuda taegüije y janom , gui oriyan Jerusalem ; sa taya jaye ufanjinafog .

text: We are become a reproach to our neighbours , a scorn and derision to them that are round about us .
text2: Manafanmamamajlaojam ni y tiguangmame : manmamofeajam yan manmabotleajam ni y mañasaga gui oriyanmame .

text: How long , LORD ? wilt thou be angry for ever ? shall thy jealousy burn like fire ?
text2: Asta ngaean , O Señot , unlalalo para taejinecog ? ya y inigomo sinenggue taegüije y guafe ?

text: Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee , and upon the kingdoms that have not called upon thy name .
text2: Chuda juyong y binibumo gui jilo y nasion ni y ti tumungojao , yan y jilo y raeno sija ni y ti umaagan y naanmo .

text: For they have devoured Jacob , and laid waste his dwelling place .
text2: Sa sija lumachae si Jacob , yan jayulang y sagañija .

text: O remember not against us former iniquities : let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us : for we are brought very low .
text2: Chamo jumajaso contra jame y tinaelayen y tatamname : Polo y minauleg minaasemo ya uchadig insedajam ; sa manafangostagpapjamam .

text: Help us , O God of our salvation , for the glory of thy name : and deliver us , and purge away our sins , for thy name ' s sake .
text2: Ayudajam , O Yuus , gui satbasionmame pot y minalag y naanmo ; yan nafanlibrejam , yan fagase y isaomame pot y naanmo .

text: Wherefore should the heathen say , Where is their God ? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed .
text2: Sa jafa ilegñija y nasion ni ti manmanjonggue : Mangue y Yuusñija ? Polo y inemog y jâgâ y tentagomo sija ni y manmachuda ya umatungo ni y nasion ni ti manmanjonggue , gui menan y matanmame .

text: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee ; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die ;
text2: Polo ya y inigon y manmapreso mato gui menamo ; segun y dinangculo y ninasiñamo adaje ayo sija y esta manmatancho para ufanmatae .

text: And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom their reproach , wherewith they have reproached thee , O Lord .
text2: Ya apase gui tiguangmame siete mas gui jalom y pechoñija , y linalatdeñija , sa sija lumalatdejao , O Señot .

text: So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever : we will shew forth thy praise to all generations .
text2: Ayo nae jame y taotaomo yan y quinilo gui pastajimo , bae inalaba jao para taejinecog ; ya infanmamanue ni y alabansamo para todo y generasion .

text: Give ear , O Shepherd of Israel , thou that leadest Joseph like a flock ; thou that dwellest between the cherubims , shine forth .
text2: ECUNGOG , O Pastot guiya Israel , jago ni y umesgagaejon si José taegüije y manadan quinilo ; jago ni y sumasaga gui entalo y querubin sija manina mona .

text: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength , and come and save us .
text2: Y menan Efraim , yan Benjamin , yan Manases , nacajulo y minatatngamo , ya maelajao para usatbajam .

text: Turn us again , O God , and cause thy face to shine ; and we shall be saved .
text2: Birajam talo , O Yuus ; ya nafanina y matamo ya infansatbo .

text: O LORD God of hosts , how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people ?
text2: O Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo , asta ngaean unlálalaloja contra y tinayuyut y taotaomo ?

text: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears ; and givest them tears to drink in great measure .
text2: Unafañochocho sija ni y pan lago ; yan unnae sija ni y lago para ujaguinem gui dangculo na medida .

text: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours : and our enemies laugh among themselves .
text2: Unnafanmumojam yan y tiguangmame : yan y enimigonmame manmachachatgue jam gui entaloñija .

text: Turn us again , O God of hosts , and cause thy face to shine ; and we shall be saved .
text2: Birajam talo , O Yuus y inetnon sendalo , ya nafanina y matamo ; ya infansatbo .

text: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt : thou hast cast out the heathen , and planted it .
text2: Jago chumule juyong y trongcon ubas guiya Egipto : ya jagasja unyute juyong y nasion , ya untanme güe .

text: Thou preparedst room before it , and didst cause it to take deep root , and it filled the land .
text2: Jago fumamauleg y saga gui menaña , ya güiya y natadodong y jaleña , yan nabula y tano .

text: The hills were covered with the shadow of it , and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars .
text2: Ya sabana sija mantinampe ni y aninengña , yan y ramasña taegüije y sedro Yuus na trongcon jayo .

text: She sent out her boughs unto the sea , and her branches unto the river .
text2: Jatago juyong y ramasña gui tase ; yan y manlodo na siniso gui sadog .

text: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges , so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her ?
text2: Sa jafa unjulog papa y quelatña : ya todo y manmalolofan gui chalan matitife güe ?

text: The boar out of the wood doth waste it , and the wild beast of the field doth devour it .
text2: Y balaco guinin y jalomtano machuchule ya mayúyulang , yan y manmachaleg na gâgâ gui fangualuan cumacano .

text: Return , we beseech thee , O God of hosts : look down from heaven , and behold , and visit this vine ;
text2: Birajao talo , O Yuus inentnon sendalo , ingagagao jao : ya talag papa guinin y langet ya unlie yan unbisita este na trongcon ubas ,

text: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted , and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself .
text2: Ya y fangualuan ni y tinanom y agapa na canaemo , yan y ramas ni jago munafitme para jagoja namaesa ,

text: It is burned with fire , it is cut down : they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance .
text2: Masinenggue ni y guafe , ya mautut papa esta ; ya manmalingo pot y chinema gui menamo .

text: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand , upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself .
text2: Polo y canaemo gui jilo y taotao gui agapa na canaemo , gui jilo y lajin y taotao ni unnametgot para jago .

text: So will not we go back from thee : quicken us , and we will call upon thy name .
text2: Ayo nae ti infanalo tate guinin jago : nafanlâlâjam ya bae inagang y naanmo .

text: Turn us again , O LORD God of hosts , cause thy face to shine ; and we shall be saved .
text2: Birajam talo , O Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo , ya nafanina y matamo ; ya infansatbo .

text: Sing aloud unto God our strength : make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob .
text2: FANGANTA agang gui as Yuus ni y minetgotta : fatinas y magof na boruca gui as Yuus Jacob .

text: Take a psalm , and bring hither the timbrel , the pleasant harp with the psaltery .
text2: Entona y salmo , yan chule mague y pandireta ; yan y magof na atpa yan y guitala .

text: Blow up the trumpet in the new moon , in the time appointed , on our solemn feast day .
text2: Guaefe y trompeta gui tiempo y nuebo na pulan , gui tiempon gualafon na pulan , gui jaanen y guipot magas .

text: For this was a statute for Israel , and a law of the God of Jacob .
text2: Sa este lay guiya Israel : yan y tinago Yuus Jacob .

text: This he ordained in Joseph for a testimony , when he went out through the land of Egypt : where I heard a language that I understood not .
text2: Jafatinas este as José para untestimonio anae jumanao juyong gui inanaco y tano Egipto : anae jujungog y finijo na ti siña jutungo .

text: I removed his shoulder from the burden : his hands were delivered from the pots .
text2: Janajanao y apagaña guinin y catga : yan y canaeña manalibre guinin y lauya .

text: Thou calledst in trouble , and I delivered thee ; I answered thee in the secret place of thunder : I proved thee at the waters of Meribah . Selah .
text2: Jago umaagan gui chinatsaga , ya guajo munalibrejao : guajo umopejao gui umatog na sagayan julo : ya juchaguejao gui oriyan janom guiya Meriba . Sila .

text: Hear , O my people , and I will testify unto thee : O Israel , if thou wilt hearken unto me ;
text2: Jungog , O taotaojo , ya guajo junae jao testimonio , O Israel , yaguin malagojao unecungogyo !

text: There shall no strange god be in thee ; neither shalt thou worship any strange god .
text2: Munga otro yuus , guiya jago ; ni unadora otro yuus .

text: I am the LORD thy God , which brought thee out of the land of Egypt : open thy mouth wide , and I will fill it .
text2: Sa guajo y Jeova Yuusmo , ni y chumule jao juyong gui tano Egipto : baba y pachotmo , ya bae nabula .

text: But my people would not hearken to my voice ; and Israel would none of me .
text2: Lao y taotaojo ti jajungog y inagangjo ; ya iya Israel ti malago ni guajo .

text: So I gave them up unto their own hearts ' lust : and they walked in their own counsels .
text2: Ayo nae jupolo sija ya jumanao ni y minajetog y corasonñija : para ufanmamomocat ni y pinagatñija .

text: Oh that my people had hearkened unto me , and Israel had walked in my ways !
text2: O yaguin y taotaojo majungog yo , ya iya Israel manmamocat gui chalanjo !

text: I should soon have subdued their enemies , and turned my hand against their adversaries .
text2: Siña guse juchoma y enimigoñija , ya jubira y canaejo contra y contrarioñija .

text: The haters of the LORD should have submitted themselves unto him : but their time should have endured for ever .
text2: Ya y umanmachatlie ni y Jeova , mojon mansujeto sija guiya güiya : y tiempoñija usaga para taejinecog .

text: He should have fed them also with the finest of the wheat : and with honey out of the rock should I have satisfied thee .
text2: Güiya unafañocho sija locue ni y mas mauleg na trigo : yan y miet ni jumujuyong gui acho anae junajaspog jao .

text: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty ; he judgeth among the gods .
text2: SI Yuus tumotojgue gui inetnon Yuus ; ya jajusga gui entalo yuus sija .

text: How long will ye judge unjustly , and accept the persons of the wicked ? Selah .
text2: Asta ngaean nae unjusga ti tunas , yan unresibe y taotao sija ni y manaelaye ? Sila .

text: Defend the poor and fatherless : do justice to the afflicted and needy .
text2: Jusga y mamoble yan y manaesaena : ya nafanunas y manpinite yan y mannesesitao .

text: Deliver the poor and needy : rid them out of the hand of the wicked .
text2: Rescata mamoble yan y mannesesitao : nafanlibre sija gui canae y manaelaye .

text: They know not , neither will they understand ; they walk on in darkness : all the foundations of the earth are out of course .
text2: Sa ti jatungo ni ujaquetungo : manmamomocatja gui jalom jomjom : ya todo y plinantan tano manalamten .

text: I have said , Ye are gods ; and all of you are children of the most High .
text2: Guajo ileco : Jamyo yuus ; yan todo jamyo y famaguon y Gueftaquilo .

text: But ye shall die like men , and fall like one of the princes .
text2: Lao infanmataeja taegüije y taotao sija , yan infanbasnag taegüije y uno gui prinsipe sija .

text: Arise , O God , judge the earth : for thou shalt inherit all nations .
text2: Cajulo , O Yuus , jusga y tano : sa jago umerensia todo y nasion .

text: Keep not thou silence , O God : hold not thy peace , and be not still , O God .
text2: CHAMO famatquiquilo , O Yuus : ya chamo tiumaagan yan chamo quequeto , O Yuus .

text: For , lo , thine enemies make a tumult : and they that hate thee have lifted up the head .
text2: Sa , estagüe , enimigumo na manpalalangpang : yan ayo sija y chumatlie jao jajatsa y iloñija .

text: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people , and consulted against thy hidden ones .
text2: Sa manpinagat ni y dinague consejo contra y taotaomo , yan manafaesen entre sija contra y ninafanatogmo .

text: They have said , Come , and let us cut them off from being a nation ; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance .
text2: Sa guinin ilegñija : Maela , ya nije tautut sija ni y guinin y nasion ; para y naan Israel munga majaso mas .

text: For they have consulted together with one consent : they are confederate against thee :
text2: Sa sija manafaesen entre sija ni y unoja corason ; ya managogüe contra jago .

text: The tabernacles of Edom , and the Ishmaelites ; of Moab , and the Hagarenes ;
text2: Y tiendan Edom yan Ismaelita sija : Moab yan Agareno sija .

text: Gebal , and Ammon , and Amalek ; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre ;
text2: Gebal yan Ammon yan Amaleg ; Filistia yan y mañasaga guiya Tiro .

text: Assur also is joined with them : they have holpen the children of Lot . Selah .
text2: Asur locue mandaña yan sija : sa maninayuda ni y famaguon Lot . Sila .

text: Do unto them as unto the Midianites ; as to Sisera , as to Jabin , at the brook of Kison :
text2: Fatinas guiya sija taegüije unfatinas iya Madian yan taegüije iya Sisara taegüije iya Jabin jijot gui sadog Sison :

text: Which perished at Endor : they became as dung for the earth .
text2: Ni y manmalingo guiya Endor : manjuyong manaegüije y estiecot para y tano .

text: Make their nobles like Oreb , and like Zeeb : yea , all their princes as Zebah , and as Zalmunna :
text2: Fatinas y magasñija ya parejo yan Oreb yan Seeb ; magajet na todo y prinsipeñija parejo yan Sebah yan Salmuna :

text: Who said , Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession .
text2: Ni y ilegñija : Nije jitaja tachule y sagayan para iyotaja .

text: O my God , make them like a wheel ; as the stubble before the wind .
text2: O Yuusso , fatinas sija ya ufanparejo yan y petbos ni y remolílino ; parejo yan y ngasan trigo gui menan y manglo ;

text: As the fire burneth a wood , and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire ;
text2: Taegüije y guafe anae jasonggue y jalomtano , yan taegüije y mañila anae finaliñagüe y sabana .

text: So persecute them with thy tempest , and make them afraid with thy storm .
text2: Taegüijija petsigue sija ni y pagyomo , yan nafanmaañao sija ni y dangculon pinagyomo .

text: Fill their faces with shame ; that they may seek thy name , O LORD .
text2: Nabula y matañija ni y dinesonra : para sija ujaaligao y naanmo , O Jeova .

text: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever ; yea , let them be put to shame , and perish :
text2: Polo sija ya ufanmamajlao yan ufanmaañao para taejinecog : magajet na sija ufandesonrao , ya ufanmalingo .

text: That men may know that thou , whose name alone is JEHOVAH , art the most high over all the earth .
text2: Para ujatungo na jagoja y naanmo si Jeova , na jagoja y Gueftaquilo gui jilo todo y tano .

text: How amiable are thy tabernacles , O LORD of hosts !
text2: NAGÜINAEYAYON y sagamo , O Señot y inetnon sendalo !

text: My soul longeth , yea , even fainteth for the courts of the LORD : my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God .
text2: Y antijo tumatanga , magajet na asta ninamalango pot y sagan y Jeova : y corasonjo yan y catneco agagange y lâlâlâ na Yuus .

text: Yea , the sparrow hath found an house , and the swallow a nest for herself , where she may lay her young , even thine altars , O LORD of hosts , my King , and my God .
text2: Magajet y gorrión mañoda gumaña , yan y golondrina chenchonña para güiya , anae siña mapolo y famaguonña , esta y jalom y attatmo , O Señot y inetnon sendalo , Rayjo yan Yuusso .

text: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house : they will be still praising thee . Selah .
text2: Mandichoso ayo sija y mañasaga gui jalom y guimamo ; sa sigueja di malabajao :

text: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee ; in whose heart are the ways of them .
text2: Dichoso y taotao ni y minetgotña gaegue guiya jago : yan y chalan para jago gaegue gui corasonña .

text: Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well ; the rain also filleth the pools .
text2: Ni y anae janafanmalofan gui inanaco bayen tinangis jafatinase tupo sija ; ya y taftaf na ichan locue tinampe ni y bendision .

text: They go from strength to strength , every one of them in Zion appeareth before God .
text2: otrominetgot cada uno guiya sija manmalie gui menan Yuus guiya Sion .

text: O LORD God of hosts , hear my prayer : give ear , O God of Jacob . Selah .
text2: O Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo , jungog y tinayuyutto : ecungog , O Yuus Jacob . Sila .

text: Behold , O God our shield , and look upon the face of thine anointed .
text2: Lie , O Yuus , patangmame : ya atan y matan y pinalaemo .

text: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand . I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God , than to dwell in the tents of wickedness .
text2: Sa y un jaane gui sagamo mas mauleg qui un mit . Gañacoja na jupottero gui guima y Yuusso , qui jusaga gui jalom y sagan y manaelaye .

text: For the LORD God is a sun and shield : the LORD will give grace and glory : no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly .
text2: Sa y Jeova Yuus , güiya y atdao yan y patang : si Jeova unfannae grasia yan minalag : ti jachoma y manmauleg na güinaja ni y mammamomocat gui tininas .

text: O LORD of hosts , blessed is the man that trusteth in thee .
text2: O Señot y inetnon sendalo , dichoso y taotao ni y umangoco güe guiya jago .

text: LORD , thou hast been favourable unto thy land : thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob .
text2: JEOVA , jago guinin ninamagof jao ni y tanomo : sa unnafanalo mague y manmacautiba sija gui as Jacob .

text: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people , thou hast covered all their sin . Selah .
text2: Jago guinin umasie y tinaelayen y taotaomo : yan untampe todo y isaoñija . Sila .

text: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath : thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger .
text2: Guinin unnajanao todo y binibumo : ya unbirajao talo guinin y finijom y binibumo .

text: Turn us , O God of our salvation , and cause thine anger toward us to cease .
text2: Birajam , O Yuus , gui satbasionmame , yan nabasta y binibumo guiya jame .

text: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever ? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations ?
text2: Ada unlalalaloja nu jame para taejinecog ? Ada unnajujuyong y linâlâlomo para todo y generasion ?

text: Wilt thou not revive us again : that thy people may rejoice in thee ?
text2: Ada ti unnalâlâjam talo : para y taotaomo ufanmagof ni jago ?

text: Shew us thy mercy , O LORD , and grant us thy salvation .
text2: Fanuejam ni y minaasemo , O Jeova , ya unnaejam ni y satbasionmo .

text: I will hear what God the LORD will speak : for he will speak peace unto his people , and to his saints : but let them not turn again to folly .
text2: Guajo jujungog jafa usangan si Yuus Jeova : sa güiya usangan y pas gui taotaoña , yan y mañantos sija : lao chañija natalo guato gui binaba .

text: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him ; that glory may dwell in our land .
text2: Magajet na y satbasionña esta jijot güije sija ni manmaañao nu güiya : para y minalag usaga gui tanomame .

text: Mercy and truth are met together ; righteousness and peace have kissed each other .
text2: Minaase yan minagajet manásoda ya mandaña : y tininas yan y pas manachico .

text: Truth shall spring out of the earth ; and righteousness shall look down from heaven .
text2: Y minagajet lacho julo gui tano ; yan y tininas jaatan papa guinin y langet .

text: Yea , the LORD shall give that which is good ; and our land shall yield her increase .
text2: Magajet na si Jeova numae ni y minauleg : ya y tanota manae minegaeña .

text: Righteousness shall go before him ; and shall set us in the way of his steps .
text2: Tininas jumajanao gui menaña ; yan japolo y pinecatña y chalan para ufamocat .

text: Bow down thine ear , O LORD , hear me : for I am poor and needy .
text2: NAEGUENG papa y talangamo , O Jeova , ya unopeyo : sa pobleyo yan nesesitaoyo .

text: Preserve my soul ; for I am holy : O thou my God , save thy servant that trusteth in thee .
text2: Adaje y antijo ; sa debotoyo : O jago ni y Yuusso , nalibre y tentagomo sa jaangoco gue guiya jago .

text: Be merciful unto me , O Lord : for I cry unto thee daily .
text2: Gaease nu guajo , O Jeova : sa juaagang jao todot dia .

text: Rejoice the soul of thy servant : for unto thee , O Lord , do I lift up my soul .
text2: Namagof y anten y tentagomo ; sa iya jago , O Jeova , nae jujatsa julo y antijo .

text: For thou , Lord , art good , and ready to forgive ; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee .
text2: Sa jago , Jeova , y mauleg yan y chadig manasie ; yan dangculo y minaasemo güije todo gui umaagangjao .

text: Give ear , O LORD , unto my prayer ; and attend to the voice of my supplications .
text2: Jungog , O Señot y tinayuyutto : yan ecungog y inagang y guinagagaojo .

text: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee : for thou wilt answer me .
text2: Sa y jaanen y chinatsagaco juagangjao : ya jago y unopeyo .

text: Among the gods there is none like unto thee , O Lord ; neither are there any works like unto thy works .
text2: Sa y entalo y yuus sija , taya taegüenao iya jago , O Jeova ; ni jafa na chocho parejo yan y chechomo .

text: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee , O Lord ; and shall glorify thy name .
text2: Todo y nasion sija ni y finatinasmo , manmato y manmanadora gui menamo , O Jeova ; yan ufanalaba y naanmo .

text: For thou art great , and doest wondrous things : thou art God alone .
text2: Sa jago dangculojao yan unfatitinas y manmaman na güinaja : jagoja na maesa Yuus .

text: Teach me thy way , O LORD ; I will walk in thy truth : unite my heart to fear thy name .
text2: jinasoncorasonjo para umaañao ni y naanmo .

text: I will praise thee , O Lord my God , with all my heart : and I will glorify thy name for evermore .
text2: Sa bae jualaba jao , O Jeova , Yuusso , contodo y corasonjo : yan junamalag y naanmo para taejinecog .

text: For great is thy mercy toward me : and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell .
text2: Sa sendangculo y minaasemo para guajo ; sa guinin unnalibre y antijo guinin iya papapa guiya sasalaguan .

text: O God , the proud are risen against me , and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul ; and have not set thee before them .
text2: O Yuus , y mansobetbio mangajulo contra guajo , yan y inetnon y managuaguat na taotao jagasja maaliligao y antijo : yan ti mapolo jao gui menañija .

text: But thou , O Lord , art a God full of compassion , and gracious , longsuffering , and plenteous in mercy and truth .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , si Yuus jao ni y bila minaase yan cariñoso , ñateng para binibo yan dangculo na minaase yan minagajet .

text: O turn unto me , and have mercy upon me ; give thy strength unto thy servant , and save the son of thine handmaid .
text2: O birajao , guiya guajo ya gaease nu guajo : nae ni y minetgotmo y tentagomo , yan nalibre y lajin y tentagomo palaoan .

text: Shew me a token for good ; that they which hate me may see it , and be ashamed : because thou , LORD , hast holpen me , and comforted me .
text2: Fanueyo ni y señat para y mauleg : para ujalie ayo sija y chumatliiyo ya ufanmamajlao : sa jago , Jeova , y umayudayo yan cumonsuelayo .

text: His foundation is in the holy mountains .
text2: YPLINANTAÑA gaegue gui santos na ogso .

text: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob .
text2: Jaguaeyaña si Jeova y trangca Sion mas que todo y saga sija gui as Jacob .

text: Glorious things are spoken of thee , O city of God . Selah .
text2: Manmalag na güinaja y manmasasangan guiya jago , O siuda Yuus . Sila .

text: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me : behold Philistia , and Tyre , with Ethiopia ; this man was born there .
text2: Guajo bae jusangan ni y Rahab yan Babilonia gui entalo ayo sija ni y tumunogyo : Sa , estagüe , Palestina yan Tiro yan Etiopia : este na taotao mafañagon güije .

text: And of Zion it shall be said , This and that man was born in her : and the highest himself shall establish her .
text2: Yan iya Sion ualog : Este yan ayo na taotao mafañagon iya güiya : yan y Gueftaquilo namaesa unafitmegüe .

text: The LORD shall count , when he writeth up the people , that this man was born there . Selah .
text2: Si Jeovaja tumufong anae jatugue sija y taotao , na esta na taotao mafañagon güije . Sila .

text: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there : all my springs are in thee .
text2: ufangaegue güije : ya todo y bebôco gaegue guiya jago . Sila .

text: O LORD God of my salvation , I have cried day and night before thee :
text2: O Jeova , Yuus satbasionjo , güajo guinin umaagan jaane yan puenge gui menamo :

text: Let my prayer come before thee : incline thine ear unto my cry ;
text2: Polo y tinayuyutto ya ufato gui menamo : naegueng y talangamo gui inagangjo .

text: For my soul is full of troubles : and my life draweth nigh unto the grave .
text2: Sa y antijo bula chinatsaga sija : ya y linâlâjo esta jijot gui para y naftan .

text: I am counted with them that go down into the pit : I am as a man that hath no strength :
text2: Estayo matufong yan ayo sija y manjajanao papa gui joyo : sa taegüije yo y taotao ni y taya ayudaña .

text: Free among the dead , like the slain that lie in the grave , whom thou rememberest no more : and they are cut off from thy hand .
text2: Mayute esta gui entalo y manmatae , taegüije y manmapuno ni y manaason jalom y naftan ; ni y ti unjajaso mas : ni y manmautut guinin y canaemo .

text: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit , in darkness , in the deeps .
text2: Jago pumoloyo guiya papapa na joyo , gui jalom jomjom na lugat gui jalom y tinadong .

text: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me , and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves . Selah .
text2: Y binibumo sumasaga macat guiya güajo , ya unachatsagayo nu y todo napomo . Sila .

text: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me ; thou hast made me an abomination unto them : I am shut up , and I cannot come forth .
text2: Jago munafanjanao lachago y manatungojo guiya guajo ; unpoloyo na jumachatlie nu sija : mapongleyo ya ti siñayo manajanao .

text: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction : LORD , I have called daily upon thee , I have stretched out my hands unto thee .
text2: Y atadogjo ninalachae pot y pinitijo : ya juagangjajao , O Jeova , cada jaane , jujuto juyong y canaejo guiya jago .

text: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead ? shall the dead arise and praise thee ? Selah .
text2: Ada unnamalie y ninamanman gui manmatae ? Siña y manmatae mangajulo ya unmaalaba ? Sila .

text: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave ? or thy faithfulness in destruction ?
text2: Siña y minauleg güinaeyamo masangan gui jalom y naftan ? pat y minagajetmo gui yinilang ?

text: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark ? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness ?
text2: Siña y ninamanmanmo matungo gui jalom jomjom ? yan y tininasmo gui jalom tano ni y manmalefa ?

text: But unto thee have I cried , O LORD ; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee .
text2: Lao guajo iya jago , O Jeova , umaagangyo : yan ogaan tinayuyutto ufato gui menamo .

text: LORD , why castest thou off my soul ? why hidest thou thy face from me ?
text2: Sajafa , O Jeova , na unyute y antijo ? Sajafa na unnaatog y matamo guinin iya guajo ?

text: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up : while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted .
text2: Gofchatsaga tristeyo yan cana yo matae , desde y pinatgonjo : mientras jususungon y minamaañaomo , ya janagosestotbayo .

text: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me ; thy terrors have cut me off .
text2: Ya y fijom na binibumo malofan guiya guajo : ya y minamaañaomo umututyo .

text: They came round about me daily like water ; they compassed me about together .
text2: Sa manmato gui oriyajo todot dia taegüije y janom : mandaña gui oriyajo .

text: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me , and mine acquaintance into darkness .
text2: Y güinaeyaco yan y amigujo unnafañago guiya guajo , yan y manatungojo gui jalom jomjom .

text: I will sing of the mercies of the LORD for ever : with my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations .
text2: BAE jucanta y minaase Jeova para taejinecog : ya y pachotto nae junamatungo y minagajetmo gui todo y generasion .

text: For I have said , Mercy shall be built up for ever : thy faithfulness shalt thou establish in the very heavens .
text2: Sa ileco : Y minaase umanacajulo para taejinecog : ya y minagajetmo unnafitme todo gui langet .

text: I have made a covenant with my chosen , I have sworn unto David my servant ,
text2: Ya jufatinas y trato gui inayegco , yan manjulayo gui as David ni y tentagojo .

text: Thy seed will I establish for ever , and build up thy throne to all generations . Selah .
text2: Ya y semiyamo junafitme para taejinecog : ya jufatinas julo y tronumo gui todo y generasion . Sila .

text: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders , O LORD : thy faithfulness also in the congregation of the saints .
text2: Ya y langet sija ufanmanalaba ni y ninamanmanmo , O Jeova : y minagajetmo locue gui inetnon y mañantos .

text: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD ? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD ?
text2: Sa jaye gui langet sija siña parejuña si Jeova ? Jaye gui lajin y gaeninasiña uparejuña si Jeova ?

text: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints , and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him .
text2: Si Yuus , gosnamaañao gui pinagat y mañantos , yan umamaanaogüe güe mas qui todo ni ayo sija y mangaegue gui oriyaña .

text: O LORD God of hosts , who is a strong LORD like unto thee ? or to thy faithfulness round about thee ?
text2: O Jeova , Yuus y inetnon sendalo , jaye matatnga parejo yan jago , O YAH ? ya y minagajetmo ni y gaegue gui oriyamo ?

text: Thou rulest the raging of the sea : when the waves thereof arise , thou stillest them .
text2: Jago umaregla y sobetbian tase : anae y napo mangajulo , jago pumoca sija .

text: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces , as one that is slain ; thou hast scattered thine enemies with thy strong arm .
text2: Jago yumamag iya Rahab ya unfapidaso taegüije y uno ni y mapuno ; jago chumalapon y enimigumo ni y canae y minetgotmo .

text: The heavens are thine , the earth also is thine : as for the world and the fulness thereof , thou hast founded them .
text2: Y langet sija iyomo , yan yo tano locue iyomo : y tano yan y binilan sinajguanña ni y plinantamo sija .

text: The north and the south thou hast created them : Tabor and Hermon shall rejoice in thy name .
text2: Y sanlago yan y sanjaya , jago fumatinas sija : Tabor yan Hermon manmagof ni y naanmo .

text: Thou hast a mighty arm : strong is thy hand , and high is thy right hand .
text2: Gaegue guiya jago y canae ni y matatnga : sa y canaemo metgot , ya taquilo y agapa na canaemo .

text: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne : mercy and truth shall go before thy face .
text2: Y tininas yan y juisio y plinantan tronumo : minaase yan minagajet manjajanao gui menan metamo .

text: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound : they shall walk , O LORD , in the light of thy countenance .
text2: Mandichoso ayo na taotao y tumungo y magof na inagang : sa manmamocat gui mananan y matamo , O Jeova .

text: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day : and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted .
text2: Sa y naanmo nae manmamagof todot dia : yan y tininasmo nae munafangajulo .

text: For thou art the glory of their strength : and in thy favour our horn shall be exalted .
text2: Sa jago y minalag y minetgotñija : yan pot y finaboresimo na injatsajulo y canggelonmame .

text: For the LORD is our defence ; and the Holy One of Israel is our king .
text2: Sa iyon Jeova y patangta : yan y rayta iyon Ayo na Santos guiya Israel .

text: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one , and saidst , I have laid help upon one that is mighty ; I have exalted one chosen out of the people .
text2: Ayonae unsangan gui guinigüife gui mañantosmo , ya ilegmo : guajo jupolo y inayuda gui jilo y uno ni y matatnga : yan junacajulo y uno na y maayeg gui taotao .

text: I have found David my servant ; with my holy oil have I anointed him :
text2: Jusoda si David na tentagojo ; ya jupalae güe nu y santos na lañajo .

text: With whom my hand shall be established : mine arm also shall strengthen him .
text2: Guiya y canaejo munafitme : yan y canaejoja locue munametgot güe :

text: The enemy shall not exact upon him ; nor the son of wickedness afflict him .
text2: Ya y enimigo taeinamot guiya güiya : ni y lajin y manaelaye ti umanalamen güe .

text: And I will beat down his foes before his face , and plague them that hate him .
text2: Sa bae juyute papa y contrarioña gui menaña yan jucastiga ayo sija y chumatlie güe .

text: But my faithfulness and my mercy shall be with him : and in my name shall his horn be exalted .
text2: Lao y minagajetto yan y minaasejo usaga guiya güiya : yan pot y naanjo na umanacajulo y canggelonña .

text: I will set his hand also in the sea , and his right hand in the rivers .
text2: Ya bae jupolo y canaeña locue gui jalom tase , yan y agapa na canaeña gui jalom sadog .

text: He shall cry unto me , Thou art my father , my God , and the rock of my salvation .
text2: Sa güiya umalog ni guajo : Jago y tatajo , Yuusso , yan y acho gui satbasionjo .

text: Also I will make him my firstborn , higher than the kings of the earth .
text2: Bae jupolo güe locue pot finenana na finañagujo , mas taquiloña qui y ray sija gui tano .

text: My mercy will I keep for him for evermore , and my covenant shall stand fast with him .
text2: Y minaasejo bae juadaje pot güiya para taejinecog , yan y tratujo ufitme guiya güiya .

text: His seed also will I make to endure for ever , and his throne as the days of heaven .
text2: Y semiyaña locue junasaga para ugaegue taejinecog , yan y tronuña taegüije y jaanen y langet .

text: If his children forsake my law , and walk not in my judgments ;
text2: Yaguin famaguonña dumingo y tinagojo , yan ti manmamomocat gui juisioco ,

text: If they break my statutes , and keep not my commandments ;
text2: Yaguin maquebranta y layjo yan ti maadaje y tinagojo ;

text: Then will I visit their transgression with the rod , and their iniquity with stripes .
text2: Ayo nae jufatoegüe gui inaguaguatñija yan y bara , ya jusaulag gui tinaelayeñija .

text: Nevertheless my lovingkindness will I not utterly take from him , nor suffer my faithfulness to fail .
text2: Lao y minaasejo ti junajanao todo guiya güiya : ya ti jupolo na ufatta y minagajetto .

text: My covenant will I not break , nor alter the thing that is gone out of my lips .
text2: Y tratujo ti juquebranta ni jutolaeca y sinanganjo ni jumuyong gui labiosso .

text: Once have I sworn by my holiness that I will not lie unto David .
text2: Un biajeja jufanjula pot y sinantosso ya ti judague si David .

text: His seed shall endure forever , and his throne as the sun before me .
text2: Y semiyaña gagaegue para taejinecog , yan y tronuña taegüijeja y atdao gui menajo .

text: It shall be established for ever as the moon , and as a faithful witness in heaven . Selah .
text2: Ya maplanta para taejinecog taegüije y pilan , ya taegüije y gosmagajet na testigo gui langet . Sila .

text: But thou hast cast off and abhorred , thou hast been wroth with thine anointed .
text2: Lao jago jagasja unyute yan unrechasa , jago jagasja lalalojao ni y pinalaemo .

text: Thou hast made void the covenant of thy servant : thou hast profaned his crown by casting it to the ground .
text2: Sa unchatlie y traton y tentagomo ; ya unnaale y coronaña asta papa gui jilo oda .

text: Thou hast broken down all his hedges ; thou hast brought his strong holds to ruin .
text2: Unyamag papa todo y quelatña ; yan unyulang y minetgot na castiyaña .

text: All that pass by the way spoil him : he is a reproach to his neighbours .
text2: Ya todo y manmalolofan gui ayo na chalan mayuteñaeñaejon : güiya manamamamajlao ni y tiguangña .

text: Thou hast set up the right hand of his adversaries ; thou hast made all his enemies to rejoice .
text2: Jago jumatsa julo y agapa na canae y contrariuña sija ; yan jago munafanmagof todo y enimiguña .

text: Thou hast also turned the edge of his sword , and hast not made him to stand in the battle .
text2: Magajet na jago locue bumira y filon y espadaña , ya ti unnafitme güe gui guera .

text: Thou hast made his glory to cease , and cast his throne down to the ground .
text2: Jago jagasja munabasta y minalagña , yan unyute y tronuña papa gui jilo oda .

text: The days of his youth hast thou shortened : thou hast covered him with shame . Selah .
text2: Ya y jaanen y pinatgonña jago jagasja munacadada : jago jagasja tumampe güe ni y minamajlao . Sila .

text: How long , LORD ? wilt thou hide thyself for ever ? shall thy wrath burn like fire ?
text2: Asta ngaeanufañila y binibumo taagüije y guafe ?

text: Remember how short my time is : wherefore hast thou made all men in vain ?
text2: O , jaso na quinadada y tiempoco esta : pot jafa na taesetbe jagas unfatinas todo y famaguan taotao ?

text: What man is he that liveth , and shall not see death ? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the grave ? Selah .
text2: Jaye na taotao enao y lalâlâ ya ti ulie finatae , ni y ujanalibre y antiña gui ninasiñan y naftan ? Sila .

text: Lord , where are thy former lovingkindnesses , which thou swarest unto David in thy truth ?
text2: Jeova , mangue y minaasemo sija ni y ampmam , ni y jinilamo as David gui minagajetmo ?

text: Remember , Lord , the reproach of thy servants ; how I do bear in my bosom the reproach of all the mighty people ;
text2: Jaso , Jeova , y minamajlao y tentagomo sija : ni y jucatgaja gui jalom pechoco , y minamamajlao y taotao todo ni y matatnga :

text: Wherewith thine enemies have reproached , O LORD ; wherewith they have reproached the footsteps of thine anointed .
text2: Ni y enimigumo mannanamamajlao , O Jeova : ni y enimigumo munamamajlao y pinecat y pinalaemo .

text: Blessed be the LORD for evermore . Amen , and Amen .
text2: Bendito si Jeova para taejinecog : Amen yan Amen .

text: LORD , thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations .
text2: JEOVA jago guinin saganmamame yan todo y generasion .

text: Before the mountains were brought forth , or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world , even from everlasting to everlasting , thou art God .
text2: Antes de najuyong y egso sija ya unfatinas y tano todo yan y mañasaga : sa desde y tutujonña yan asta y taejinecog , jagoja si Yuus .

text: Thou turnest man to destruction ; and sayest , Return , ye children of men .
text2: Jago bumira y taotao para y yinilang ; ya ilelegmo : Fanalo guato , jamyo famaguon taotao .

text: For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past , and as a watch in the night .
text2: Sa y mit años gui menamo taegüijeja y nigapja anae malofan esta , yan taegüijeja y ora gui bumebela gui puenge .

text: Thou carriest them away as with a flood ; they are as a sleep : in the morning they are like grass which groweth up .
text2: Jago chumule sija taegüije y minilag y janom ; manaegüije y minaego : ya y egaan manaeguije y chaguan ni y manlacho julo .

text: In the morning it flourisheth , and groweth up ; in the evening it is cut down , and withereth .
text2: Ya y egaan , mumegae ya manlacho julo ; lao y pupuenge manmautut yan ufanmalayo .

text: For we are consumed by thine anger , and by thy wrath are we troubled .
text2: Sa y linalalomo nae lumachaejam , yan y binibumo nae munafañatsagajam .

text: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee , our secret sins in the light of thy countenance .
text2: Sa unpolo y tinaelayenmame gui menamo , yan y ti matungo na isaomame gui minananan y matamo .

text: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath : we spend our years as a tale that is told .
text2: Sat odo y jaaninmame manmalofan gui binibumo : inlachae y sacanmame ni y taegüijeja cuentos ni y masangan esta .

text: The days of our years are threescore years and ten ; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years , yet is their strength labour and sorrow ; for it is soon cut off , and we fly away .
text2: Y jaanen y sacanmame setenta años , ya y pot y minetgot siña gagaegue asta ochenta años ; lao y sobetbiañija y checho yan y trineste ; sa munaguse manmapos : yan jame mangupo .

text: Who knoweth the power of thine anger ? even according to thy fear , so is thy wrath .
text2: Jaye tumungo y ninasiñan y linalalomo , ya y binibumo segun y ninamaañao guiya jago .

text: So teach us to number our days , that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom .
text2: Ya fanagüejam tumufong y jaaninmame , para mojon usiña guajajam un corason ni y malate .

text: Return , O LORD , how long ? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants .
text2: Talo mague , O Jeova : asta ngaean ? ya polo ya unfañotsot pot y tentagomo .

text: O satisfy us early with thy mercy ; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days .
text2: O nafannajong jam taftaf ni y minaasemo : ya insiña manmagof yan infansenmagof todo gui jaaninmame .

text: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us , and the years wherein we have seen evil .
text2: Nafanmagof jam , segun na jaane anae unnafanpinite jam , yan y sacan anae inlie y taelaye :

text: Let thy work appear unto thy servants , and thy glory unto their children .
text2: Polo y chechomo umalie gui tentagomo sija , yan y minalagmo gui famaguonña .

text: And let the beauty of the LORD our God be upon us : and establish thou the work of our hands upon us ; yea , the work of our hands establish thou it .
text2: Ya y guinatbon Jeova ni y Yuusta ugaegue guiya jame ; ya unnafitme guiya jame y checho y canaeta : magajet , y checho y canaemame unnafitme .

text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty .
text2: YA y sumasaga gui umatog na sagayan y Gueftaquilo , güiya usaga gui papa y anineng y Todojajanasiña .

text: I will say of the LORD , He is my refuge and my fortress : my God ; in him will I trust .
text2: Bae jusangan as Jeova , güiya y umamparayo yan y castiyujo : Yuusso , iya güiya nae juangocoyo .

text: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler , and from the noisome pestilence .
text2: Sa güiya unninalibre guinin y lason y tiradot , yan guinin y yinilang peste .

text: He shall cover thee with his feathers , and under his wings shalt thou trust : his truth shall be thy shield and buckler .
text2: Güiya untinampe ni y piluña , yan y papa y papaña nae unangoco jao : y minagajetña uguinogüemo yan upatangmo .

text: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night ; nor for the arrow that flieth by day ;
text2: Jago ti unmaañao ni y minamaañao y puenge ; ni y flecha ni mangugupo gui jaane ;

text: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness ; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday .
text2: Ni pot y peste ni manmamomocat gui jalom jomjom ; ni pot y yinilang ni y lumachae y taloane .

text: A thousand shall fall at thy side , and ten thousand at thy right hand ; but it shall not come nigh thee .
text2: Y mit ufanbasnag gui oriyamo , yan y dies mit gui agapa na canaemo : lao ti siña mato jijot guiya jago .

text: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked .
text2: Sa y atadogmoja umatan , yan lumie y apas y manaelaye .

text: Because thou hast made the LORD , which is my refuge , even the most High , thy habitation ;
text2: Jagoja , O Jeova , y umamparayo ! Sa jagasja unfatinas y Gueftaquilo na sagamo .

text: There shall no evil befall thee , neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling .
text2: Taya taelaye ufato guiya jago , ni jafa na chetnot ujijot gui sagamo .

text: For he shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee in all thy ways .
text2: Sa jaencatga y angjetña sija nu jago , para uninadaje todo gui jinanaomo .

text: They shall bear thee up in their hands , lest thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Ya unmajatsa julo ni y canaeñija , ya ti umanafannotpe acho y adengmo .

text: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder : the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet .
text2: Ya unfamgacha gui jilo y leon yan y culebla : y patgon leon yan y serpiente ungagacha gui papa adeng sija .

text: Because he hath set his love upon me , therefore will I deliver him : I will set him on high , because he hath known my name .
text2: Sa japolo y güinaeyaña guiya guajo , enao mina junalibre güe : guajo pumolo güe gui taquilo , sa güiya guinin tumungo y naanjo .

text: He shall call upon me , and I will answer him : I will be with him in trouble ; I will deliver him , and honour him .
text2: Güiya umagangyo ya guajo umopegüe : sa jumajame gui chinatsaga ; junalibre güe yan juonra güe .

text: With long life will I satisfy him , and shew him my salvation .
text2: Ya y inanaco y linâlâña junanajong güe , yan jufanue güe ni y satbasionjo .

text: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD , and to sing praises unto thy name , O most High :
text2: MAULEG para umannae grasias si Jeova ya umacanta y alabansa sija gui naanmo , O Jago , Gueftaquilo :

text: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning , and thy faithfulness every night ,
text2: Para infamamanue ni y minauleg güinaeyamo gui egaan yan y minagajetmo cada puenge .

text: Upon an instrument of ten strings , and upon the psaltery ; upon the harp with a solemn sound .
text2: Gui dandan ni y dies cuetdasña ; yan gui guitala ; yan gui atpa yan y mames na inagang .

text: For thou , LORD , hast made me glad through thy work : I will triumph in the works of thy hands .
text2: Sa jago , Jeova , unnamagofyo nu y chechomo : ya bae junagana pot y checho y canaemo .

text: O LORD , how great are thy works ! and thy thoughts are very deep .
text2: O Jeova , namandinangculo sija y chechomo ! yan jinasomo mansentadong :

text: A brutish man knoweth not ; neither doth a fool understand this .
text2: Sa y taotao ni y aguaguat ti jatungo : ni y caduco ti jatutungo este .

text: When the wicked spring as the grass , and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish ; it is that they shall be destroyed for ever :
text2: Anae y manaelaye lachog taegüije y chaguan , yan anae todo y chumogüe y tinaelaye manlajyan : ayo mina ufanmayulang para taejinecog :

text: But thou , LORD , art most high for evermore .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , para taejinecog gagaegue y tinaquilo .

text: For , lo , thine enemies , O LORD , for , lo , thine enemies shall perish ; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered .
text2: Sa , estagüe , y enimigumo , O Jeova , sa , estagüe , y enimigumo na ufanmalingo ; yan todo y chumochogüe y tinaelaye ufanmachalapon .

text: But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of an unicorn : I shall be anointed with fresh oil .
text2: Lao y canggelonjo , jago munacajulo taegüije y canggelon y titogcha na nubiyo : ya mapalaeyo ni y lañan nuebo .

text: Mine eye also shall see my desire on mine enemies , and mine ears shall hear my desire of the wicked that rise up against me .
text2: Sa y atadogcoja lumie y güinaeyaco gui enimigujo sija yan y talangajoja jumungog y güinaeyaco ni chumogüe y taelaye ni y mangajulo contra guajo .

text: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree : he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon .
text2: Sa y tinas lâlâ taegüije y trongcon palma : lumadangculo güe taegüije y trongcon sedro gui Libano .

text: Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God .
text2: Ayo sija y manmatanme gui guima Jeova , manlâlâ gui jalom y sagan y Yuusta .

text: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age ; they shall be fat and flourishing ;
text2: Sigueja di manmanogcha asta que manbijo : manmesgo yan manbetde .

text: To shew that the LORD is upright : he is my rock , and there is no unrighteousness in him .
text2: Para ufanmamanue na si Jeova goftunas : güiya y achojo ya taya tinaelaye guiya güiya .

text: The LORD reigneth , he is clothed with majesty ; the LORD is clothed with strength , wherewith he hath girded himself : the world also is stablished , that it cannot be moved .
text2: SI Jeova jagobiebietna mabeste güe ni y ninasifia ; si Jeova numabeste güe , ni y minetgot dinidog güe : y tano locue ninafitme ya ti siña manacalamten .

text: Thy throne is established of old : thou art from everlasting .
text2: Y tronumo mafatinas desde di ampmam na tiempo : jago guinin y taejinecog .

text: The floods have lifted up , O LORD , the floods have lifted up their voice ; the floods lift up their waves .
text2: Mangajulo y minalag sija , O Jeova , ya y minalag sija mangajulo y inangangñija ; y minalag sija mangajulo y napoñija .

text: The LORD on high is mightier than the noise of many waters , yea , than the mighty waves of the sea .
text2: Mastaquilo y inagang sija y minegae y janom sija , yan y fijom na napo gui tase , si Jeova gui sanjilo gaesisiña .

text: Thy testimonies are very sure : holiness becometh thine house , O LORD , for ever .
text2: Y testimoniomo sija mansenmagajet : sinantosja conbiene gui jalom guimamo , O Jeova , para taejinecog .

text: O LORD God , to whom vengeance belongeth ; O God , to whom vengeance belongeth , shew thyself .
text2: O Jeova , Yuus Jao , ni y inemog iyomo ; O Yuus Jao , ni y inemog iyomo , famanuen maesajao ni y minalag .

text: Lift up thyself , thou judge of the earth : render a reward to the proud .
text2: Jatsa jao julo , jago y jues y tano : nae ni y apasñija y mansobetbio .

text: LORD , how long shall the wicked , how long shall the wicked triumph ?
text2: Jeova , asta ngaean y manaelaye , asta ngaean y manaelaye nae ufanmagana ?

text: How long shall they utter and speak hard things ? and all the workers of iniquity boast themselves ?
text2: Sija manmefno , sija sumangan sinaguat yan todo y chumochogüe y tinaelaye manbanidoso .

text: They break in pieces thy people , O LORD , and afflict thine heritage .
text2: Sa sija yumamag ya japedasitos y taotaomo , O Jeova , yan janafanpinite y erensiamo .

text: They slay the widow and the stranger , and murder the fatherless .
text2: Sija pumuno y biuda yan taotao juyong , yan japuno y manaetata .

text: Yet they say , The LORD shall not see , neither shall the God of Jacob regard it .
text2: Sa ilegñija : Si Jeova ti ujalie , ni si Yuus Jacob ti ufanatituye .

text: Understand , ye brutish among the people : and ye fools , when will ye be wise ?
text2: Fanatituye , jamyo managuaguat gui taotao : yan jamyo mangaduco , ngaean nae infanmalate ?

text: He that planted the ear , shall he not hear ? he that formed the eye , shall he not see ?
text2: Ya ayo y plumanta y talanga , ada ti ujungog ? ya ayo y fumatinas y atadog , ada ti ulie ?

text: He that chastiseth the heathen , shall not he correct ? he that teacheth man knowledge , shall not he know ?
text2: Ya ayo y cumastiga y taotao sija ada ti ujanafanunas ? ayoja y fumanagüe y taotao ni y tiningo ?

text: The LORD knoweth the thoughts of man , that they are vanity .
text2: Si Jeova jatungo y jinason y taotao , na sija puro jinaja .

text: Blessed is the man whom thou chastenest , O LORD , and teachest him out of thy law ;
text2: Dichoso y taotao ni y unnaregla güe , O Jeova , yan ufanagüe güe ni y tinagomo ;

text: That thou mayest give him rest from the days of adversity , until the pit be digged for the wicked .
text2: Sa jago siña numae gui descanso guinin y jaanin y chinatsaga , asta qui y joyo maguadog para y manaelaye .

text: For the LORD will not cast off his people , neither will he forsake his inheritance .
text2: Sa si Jeova ti janasuja y taotaoña , ni ti udingo y erensiaña .

text: But judgment shall return unto righteousness : and all the upright in heart shall follow it .
text2: Lao y jinisga utalo guato gui tininas : yan todo y manunas na corason ujadalalag .

text: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers ? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity ?
text2: Jaye malago cajulo para guajo contra y chumochogüe y daño ? Jaye malago tumojgue julo para guajo contra y chumochogüe y taelaye ?

text: Unless the LORD had been my help , my soul had almost dwelt in silence .
text2: Yanguin si Jeova guinin ti umayudayo , y antijo gusija guinin sumaga gui finatquilo .

text: When I said , My foot slippeth ; thy mercy , O LORD , held me up .
text2: Anae ileco : Sulong y adengjo : y minaasemo , O Jeova , mumantieneyo .

text: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul .
text2: Anae juguaja y manadan jinasoco gui sanjalomjo , y quinensuelamo sija ninasenmagof y antijo .

text: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee , which frameth mischief by a law ?
text2: Y tronon tinaelaye uguaja comunion yan jago , ni y fumatinas daño pot y tinago ?

text: They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous , and condemn the innocent blood .
text2: Sija mandaña contra y anten y manunas , yan ja sentensia y jâgâ y taeisao .

text: But the LORD is my defence ; and my God is the rock of my refuge .
text2: Lao si Jeova guinin y leca na torijo : yan Yuusso y achon y guinegüeco .

text: And he shall bring upon them their own iniquity , and shall cut them off in their own wickedness ; yea , the LORD our God shall cut them off .
text2: Ya güiya chumule gui jiloñija y isaoñija , yan ujautut sija gui dañoñijaja ; ya si Jeova , ni y Yuusta , umutut sija .

text: O come , let us sing unto the LORD : let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation .
text2: O maela , ya tacantaye si Jeova : nije tafatinas y minagof na inagang para y acho y satbasionta .

text: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving , and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms .
text2: Nije taufanmato gui menaña yan y grasias , ya tafatinas y minagof na inagang nu y salmos .

text: For the LORD is a great God , and a great King above all gods .
text2: Sa si Jeova y dangculo na Yuus , yan y dangculo na Ray gui jilo todo yuus .

text: In his hand are the deep places of the earth : the strength of the hills is his also .
text2: Y jalom y canaeña nae mangaegue y manadong na sagayan gui tano : y minetgot y beca sija iyoña locue .

text: The sea is his , and he made it : and his hands formed the dry land .
text2: Y tase iyoña yan güiya fumatinas : yan y canaeñaja fumatinas y anglo na tano .

text: O come , let us worship and bow down : let us kneel before the LORD our maker .
text2: O maela nije taadora ya tafanecon papa , nije tafandimo gui menan Jeova ni y fumatinasjit .

text: For he is our God ; and we are the people of his pasture , and the sheep of his hand . To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Sa güiya y Yuusta ; yan jita y taotao gui pastajiña , yan y quinilo gui canaeña . Pago na jaane yaguin injingog y inagangña ,

text: Harden not your heart , as in the provocation , and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: Chamiyo munafanmajejetog y corasonmiyo , taegüije guiya Meriba , taegüije y jaanin y tentasion gui desierto .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my work .
text2: Anae y tatanmiyo tumientayo , machagueyo , yan malie y chechojo .

text: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation , and said , It is a people that do err in their heart , and they have not known my ways :
text2: Cuarenta años inapmamña nae tristeyo pot este na generasion , ya ileco : Sija na taotao ni y manlache gui corasonñija , yan jagasja ti jatungo y chalanjo .

text: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest .
text2: Pot ayo na manjulayo gui binibujo , ya sija ti siña majalom gui descansoco .

text: O sing unto the LORD a new song : sing unto the LORD , all the earth .
text2: O cantaye si Jeova ni y nuebo na canta : cantaye si Jeova todo y tano .

text: Sing unto the LORD , bless his name ; shew forth his salvation from day to day .
text2: Cantaye si Jeova , bendise y naanña ; fanmamanue ni y satbasionña guinin y jaane yan y jaane .
