text: Declare his glory among the heathen , his wonders among all people .
text2: Sangan claro y minalagña gui nasion sija ya y ninámanmanña gui entalo todo y taotao sija .

text: For the LORD is great , and greatly to be praised : he is to be feared above all gods .
text2: Sa si Jeova dangculo , yan sendangculo para umaalaba : güiya umamaañaogüe mas qui todo yuus .

text: For all the gods of the nations are idols : but the LORD made the heavens .
text2: Sa todo y yuus y nasion sija manidolo : lao si Jeova fumatinas y langet sija .

text: Honour and majesty are before him : strength and beauty are in his sanctuary .
text2: Onra yan minagas mangaegue gui menaña : minetgot yan guinatbo mangaegue gui jalom y santos na sagaña .

text: Give unto the LORD , O ye kindreds of the people , give unto the LORD glory and strength .
text2: Nae si Jeova , O familian gui taotao sija , nae si Jeova minalag yan minetgot .

text: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name : bring an offering , and come into his courts .
text2: Nae si Jeova ni y minalag sa uiyon y naanña : chule y ninae ya maela sanjalom gui sagaña .

text: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness : fear before him , all the earth .
text2: O adora si Jeova gui guinatbon y sinantosña : fanlaolao gui menaña todo y tano .

text: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth : the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved : he shall judge the people righteously .
text2: Sangan gui nasion sija na si Jeova jagobiebietna : y tano maplanta locue ni y ti siña manacalamten : guiya jumusga y taotao gui tininas .

text: Let the heavens rejoice , and let the earth be glad ; let the sea roar , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Manmagof y langet sija , yan senmagof y tano ; ya y tase palalangpang , yan y binilaña .

text: Let the field be joyful , and all that is therein : then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
text2: Ya y fangualuan senmagof yan todo y mangaegue gui sanjalomña : ayonae todo y trongco sija gui jalomtano mangantapot y minagof .

text: Before the LORD : for he cometh , for he cometh to judge the earth : he shall judge the world with righteousness , and the people with his truth .
text2: Gui menan Jeova , sa güiya umamamaela ; sa guiya umamamaela para ujusga y tano : ujusga y tano gui tininas , yan y taotao sija gui minagajetña .

text: The LORD reigneth ; let the earth rejoice ; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof .
text2: SI Jeova jagobiebietna , polo ya y tano umagof ; polo ya y minegae y isla ufansenmagof .

text: Clouds and darkness are round about him : righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne .
text2: Y mapagajes yan y jemjom sija mangaegue gui oriyaña : tininas yan juisio y plinantan y tronuña .

text: A fire goeth before him , and burneth up his enemies round about .
text2: Y guafe manjanao gui menaña , yan mausinesenggue y enimiguña gui oriya .

text: His lightnings enlightened the world : the earth saw , and trembled .
text2: Y lamlamña maninina y tano : ya y tano malie ya ninalaolao .

text: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD , at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth .
text2: Y egso sija manmadirite taegüije y danges gui menan Jeova , gui menan y Señot y tano todo .

text: The heavens declare his righteousness , and all the people see his glory .
text2: Y langet sumangan claro y tininasña , yan todo y taotao guinin malie y minalagña .

text: Confounded be all they that serve graven images , that boast themselves of idols : worship him , all ye gods .
text2: Nafanmamajlao todo ayo sija y sumesetbe y imagen sija ni tinaga , ni y tunanmaesaja sija y ídolo sija : Adora güe todo jamyo ni y yuus .

text: Zion heard , and was glad ; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments , O LORD .
text2: Yya Sion jajungog ya ninamagof , yan y jagan Juda sija ninafansenmagof ; sa pot y juisiomo sija , O Jeova .

text: For thou , LORD , art high above all the earth : thou art exalted far above all gods .
text2: Sa jago Jeova , mas taquilo gui jilo todo y tano : ya jago umanacajulo chago gui jilo todo y yuus .

text: Ye that love the LORD , hate evil : he preserveth the souls of his saints ; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked .
text2: O jamyo y gumaeya si Jeova , jachatlie y daño : güiya umadaje y anten y mañantosña : güiya munafanlibre sija juyong gui canae y manaelaye .

text: Light is sown for the righteous , and gladness for the upright in heart .
text2: Manana matanme para y manunas , yan minagof para y manunas na corason .

text: Rejoice in the LORD , ye righteous ; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness .
text2: Fanmagof as Jeova jamyo ni y manunas ; nae grasias y santos na naaña .

text: O sing unto the LORD a new song ; for he hath done marvellous things : his right hand , and his holy arm , hath gotten him the victory .
text2: CANTAYE si Jeova ni y nuebo na canta ; sa güiya fumatinas y mannamanman na güinaja : sa y agapa na canaeña , yan y santos na canaeña fumatinas y satbasion para güiya .

text: The LORD hath made known his salvation : his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen .
text2: Si Jeova janamatungo y satbasionña : y tininasña jafanue gui menan y nasion sija .

text: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel : all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God .
text2: Jagasja jajaso y minaaseña yan y minagajetña para y guima Israel : ya todo sija y uttimon y tano , guinin malie y satbasion y Yuusta .

text: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD , all the earth : make a loud noise , and rejoice , and sing praise .
text2: Fatinas y minagof na inagang as Jeova , todo y tano : agang yan fanganta , nu y minagof , junggan , fanganta alabansa sija .

text: Sing unto the LORD with the harp ; with the harp , and the voice of a psalm .
text2: Cantayo si Jeova y alabansa sija , nu y atpa ; y atpa yan y inagang y guinatbon musica .

text: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD , the King .
text2: Yan y trompeta sija yan y sonidon y cotneta ; fatinas y minagof na inagang gui menan y Ray Jeova .

text: Let the sea roar , and the fulness thereof ; the world , and they that dwell therein .
text2: Polo ya y tase upalalangpang yan y binilaña ; y tano yan y mañasaga gui sanjalomña ;

text: Let the floods clap their hands : let the hills be joyful together
text2: Polo ya y manadan janom ujanafamapagpag canaeñija : polo ya y egso sija manganta pot y minagof .

text: Before the LORD ; for he cometh to judge the earth : with righteousness shall he judge the world , and the people with equity .
text2: Gui menan Jeova : sa güiya umamamaela para ujusga y tano : ujusga y tano , gui tininas yan y taotao sija gui minagajet .

text: The LORD reigneth ; let the people tremble : he sitteth between the cherubims ; let the earth be moved .
text2: SI Jeova jagobiebietna ; polo ya y taotao sija ufanlaolao ; matatachong güe guijilo y querubin : polo ya y tano ufangalamten .

text: The LORD is great in Zion ; and he is high above all the people .
text2: Si Jeova dangculo guiya Sion : yan güiya mas taquilo gui jilo todo y taotao .

text: Let them praise thy great and terrible name ; for it is holy .
text2: Polo ya sija ufanalaba y dinagculon yan y namaañao na naanmo ; sa santos güe .

text: The king ' s strength also loveth judgment ; thou dost establish equity , thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob .
text2: Y ninasiñan y ray locue jaguaeya y juisio : jago pumolo y tininas ; jago fumatinas y juisio yan y tininas gui as Jacob .

text: Exalt ye the LORD our God , and worship at his footstool ; for he is holy .
text2: Nacajulo si Jeova ni y Yuusta , yan adora gui fañajangan y adengña ; sa santos güe .

text: Moses and Aaron among his priests , and Samuel among them that call upon his name ; they called upon the LORD , and he answered them .
text2: Si Moises yan Aaron gui entalo mamale , yan si Samuel manisija yan ayo y umaagang y naanña ; sija umaagang si Jeova , ya güiya umope sija .

text: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar : they kept his testimonies , and the ordinance that he gave them .
text2: Güiya cumuentutuse sija gui jalom y jaliguen y mapagajes : sija umadaje y tinagoña , yan y otden ni y mannae sija .

text: Thou answeredst them , O LORD our God : thou wast a God that forgavest them , though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions .
text2: Jago umope sija , O Jeova Yuusmame : jago si Yuus ni y umasie sija , achogja jago chumule y inemog gui chechoñija .

text: Exalt the LORD our God , and worship at his holy hill ; for the LORD our God is holy .
text2: Nacajulo si Jeova ni y Yuusta , yan adora güe gui santos na ogsoña : sa si Jeova , ni y Yuusta , santos güe .

text: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD , all ye lands .
text2: FATINAS y minagof na inagang as Jeova : jamyo tano todos .

text: Serve the LORD with gladness : come before his presence with singing .
text2: Setbe si Jeova ni y minagof : maela gui menaña ya fanganta .

text: Know ye that the LORD he is God : it is he that hath made us , and not we ourselves ; we are his people , and the sheep of his pasture .
text2: Tingo na si Jeova , güiya si Yuus : güiyaja y fumatinas jit , yan jita iyoña ; jita y taotaoña yan y quinilo sija gui pastajiña .

text: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving , and into his courts with praise : be thankful unto him , and bless his name .
text2: Fanjalom gui trangcaña yan y inefresen grasias , ya y jalom y sagaña yan y alabansa : nae güe grasias , yan bendise y naanña .

text: For the LORD is good ; his mercy is everlasting ; and his truth endureth to all generations .
text2: Sa si Jeova mauleg ; y minaaseña ugagaegue para taejinecog ; yan y minagajet para todo y generasion sija .

text: I will sing of mercy and judgment : unto thee , O LORD , will I sing .
text2: BAE jucanta y minaase yan y juisio : iyajago nae O Jeova , bae jucanta .

text: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way . O when wilt thou come unto me ? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart .
text2: Bae juadajeyo ni y malate gui cabales na jinanao . O ngaean nae unfato jao guiya guajo ? bae jufamocat gui jalom guimajo yan y cabales na corason .

text: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes : I hate the work of them that turn aside ; it shall not cleave to me .
text2: Mungayo pumolo y taelaye na güinaja gui menan atadogjo : juchatlie y chechoñija ayo y manabag sija : tiucheton guiya guajo .

text: A froward heart shall depart from me : I will not know a wicked person .
text2: Y chatpayon na corason junafanjanao guiya guajo ; ti yajo tumungo y manaelaye na güinaja .

text: Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour , him will I cut off : him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer .
text2: Ayo y secreto na finajiyunge y tiguangña , güiya bae juyulang : ya ayo y taquilo y inatanña yan y sobetbio na corason ti siña jusungon .

text: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land , that they may dwell with me : he that walketh in a perfect way , he shall serve me .
text2: Y atadogjo bae janameton y manmanjonggue gui tano , para ufañaga sija guiya guajo : ya ayo y mamomocat gui cabales na jinanao , güiya siempre sumesetbeyo .

text: He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house : he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight .
text2: Ya ayo y chumochogüe y dinague ti siña sumaga gui jalom guimajo : ya ayo y sumasagan y mandague ti siña numafitme gui menan y atadogjo .

text: I will early destroy all the wicked of the land ; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the LORD .
text2: Y egaan yan y egaan bae juyulang todo y manaelaye gui tano ; para uutot todo y chumochogüe ni y taelaye gui siuda Jeova .

text: Hear my prayer , O LORD , and let my cry come unto thee .
text2: JUNGOG y tinayuyutto , O Jeova , polo y inagangjo ya ufato guiya Jago .

text: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble ; incline thine ear unto me : in the day when I call answer me speedily .
text2: Chamo munaatog y matamo guiya guajo gui jaanen anae chatsagayo : naegueng y talangamo guiya guajo ; y jaane anae juagangjao , opeyo guse .

text: For my days are consumed like smoke , and my bones are burned as an hearth .
text2: Sa y jaanijo linachae taegüije y aso , ya y telangjo janon taegüije y falot .

text: My heart is smitten , and withered like grass ; so that I forget to eat my bread .
text2: Y corasonjo manetnot , yan anglo taegüije chaguan ; sa malefayo jucano y najo pan .

text: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin .
text2: Ya pot y inagang y inigongjo y telangjo mafachet yan y catneco .

text: I am like a pelican of the wilderness : I am like an owl of the desert .
text2: Parejoyo yan y pelicano na pájaro gui desierto : yan taegüijeyo y memo gui lugat na mayulang .

text: I watch , and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top .
text2: Jupulan , yan jumuyong yo taegüije y gorrion na pajaro güigüiyaja gui jilo y atof y guima .

text: Mine enemies reproach me all the day ; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me .
text2: Y enimigujo lumalatdeyo todot dia ; yan ayo sija y manlalalo contra guajo manmanjula pot guajo .

text: For I have eaten ashes like bread , and mingled my drink with weeping ,
text2: Sa jagasja jucano y apo taegüije y pan , yan manadaña y guimenjo yan y tanges .

text: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath : for thou hast lifted me up , and cast me down .
text2: Sa pot y linalalomo yan y binibumo : sa jago jumatsayo yan yumuteyo .

text: My days are like a shadow that declineth ; and I am withered like grass .
text2: Y jaanijo taegüije y anineng ni y umaso ; yan angloyo taegüije y chaguan .

text: But thou , O LORD , shalt endure for ever ; and thy remembrance unto all generations .
text2: Lao jago , O Jeova , gagaegue jao para taejinecog : yan y memoriasmo asta todo y generasion .

text: Thou shalt arise , and have mercy upon Zion : for the time to favour her , yea , the set time , is come .
text2: Jago ucajulo , yan umaase ni iya Sion : sa y tiempo para unmaase nu güiya , magajet na mato y tiempo ni y matancho .

text: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones , and favour the dust thereof .
text2: Sa y tentagomo ninafanmagof ni y achoña : yan ninafanmaase ni y petbosña .

text: So the heathen shall fear the name of the LORD , and all the kings of the earth thy glory .
text2: Enao mina y nasion sija ufanmaañao ni y naan Jeova , yan todo y ray sija gui tano ni y minalagmo .

text: When the LORD shall build up Zion , he shall appear in his glory .
text2: Sa si Jeova jafatinas y Sion , umanog güe gui jalom y minalagña .

text: He will regard the prayer of the destitute , and not despise their prayer .
text2: Jagoflamen y tinayuyut y mannesesitao ; yan ti jachatlie y tinayuyutñija .

text: This shall be written for the generation to come : and the people which shall be created shall praise the LORD .
text2: Utugue este para y generasion ni y manmámamaela : yan y taotao ni y ufanmafatinas ujaalaba si Jeova .

text: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary ; from heaven did the LORD behold the earth ;
text2: Sa güiya jagasja jaatan papa gui y tinaquilo y santos na sagaña ; guinin y langet nae si Jeova jaatan y tano .

text: To hear the groaning of the prisoner ; to loose those that are appointed to death ;
text2: Para ujungog y inigong y manmaprereso : yan para upula ayo sija y manmatancho para ufanmapuno .

text: To declare the name of the LORD in Zion , and his praise in Jerusalem ;
text2: Para umasangan claro y naan Jeova guiya Sion , yan y alabansaña guiya Jerusalem ;

text: When the people are gathered together , and the kingdoms , to serve the LORD .
text2: Anae y taotao sija manetnon ya mandaña , yan y raeno sija para ujasetbe si Jeova .

text: He weakened my strength in the way ; he shortened my days .
text2: Janadafe y minetgotto gui chalan ; güiya munacadada y jaanijo .

text: I said , O my God , take me not away in the midst of my days : thy years are throughout all generations .
text2: Guajo ileco : O Yuusso chamo yo chumuchule gui lamita na jaanijo : y sacanmo sija para todoja y generasion .

text: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth : and the heavens are the work of thy hands .
text2: Sa desde y ampmam na tiempo jago pumolo y plinantan tano : yan y langet sija y checho y canaemo .

text: They shall perish , but thou shalt endure : yea , all of them shall wax old like a garment ; as a vesture shalt thou change them , and they shall be changed :
text2: Sija ufanmalingo , lao jago ungagaegueja : magajet na todo sija ufanguesbijo taegüije y magago : taegüije y bestido untolaeca sija , ya sija manmatalaeca .

text: But thou art the same , and thy years shall have no end .
text2: Lao jago y mismojajao , yan y sacanmo sija ti ufanjocog .

text: The children of thy servants shall continue , and their seed shall be established before thee .
text2: Y famaguon y tentagomo ufangagaegue , yan y semiyanñija ufanmaplanta gui menamo .

text: Bless the LORD , O my soul : and all that is within me , bless his holy name .
text2: BENDISE si Jeova , O antijo : yan todo y sanjalomjo , bendise y santos na naanña .

text: Bless the LORD , O my soul , and forget not all his benefits :
text2: Bendise si Jeova , O antijo , yan chamo malelefa todo ni y minaulegña :

text: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities ; who healeth all thy diseases ;
text2: Ni y umasie todo tinaelayemo ; ni y munamagong todo y chetnotmo ;

text: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction ; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies ;
text2: Ni y munalibre y linâlâmo guinin y yinilang : ni y comorona jao ni güinaeyan mauleg yan y manadan minaase :

text: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things ; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle ' s .
text2: Ni y munanajong y pachotmo ni y manmauleg na güinaja : ya y pinatgonmo jananuebo taegüije y aguila .

text: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed .
text2: Si Jeova fumatinas y tinas na chocho sija , yan y juisio sija para todo ayo sija y manmachiguet .

text: He made known his ways unto Moses , his acts unto the children of Israel .
text2: Güiya munatungo si Moises ni y chalanña , ya y chechoña gui famaguon Israel .

text: The LORD is merciful and gracious , slow to anger , and plenteous in mercy .
text2: Si Jeova bula y minaase yan cariñoso , ñateng y binibuña yan gofmegae y minaaseña .

text: He will not always chide : neither will he keep his anger for ever .
text2: Güiya ti ufanlalatde para siempre : ni umantiene y binibuña para taejinecog .

text: He hath not dealt with us after our sins ; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities .
text2: Ti guinin jafatinas guiya jita segun y isaota ; ni uapasejit segun y tinaelayeta .

text: For as the heaven is high above the earth , so great is his mercy toward them that fear him .
text2: Sa taegüije y langet goftaquilo gui jilo y tano , taegüijeja sendangculo y minaaseña para ayo sija y manmaañao nu güiya .

text: As far as the east is from the west , so far hath he removed our transgressions from us .
text2: Taemanoja chinagoña desde y sancatan , yan asta y sanlichan , taegüijeja chinagoña nae janajanao guiya jita y isaota .

text: Like as a father pitieth his children , so the LORD pitieth them that fear him .
text2: Parejoja yan y tata ni jaguaeya y famaguonña , taegüenaoja si Jeova jaguaeya ayo sija y manmaañao nu güiya .

text: For he knoweth our frame ; he remembereth that we are dust .
text2: Sa güiya tumungo y jechurata ; jajaso na jita y petbos .

text: As for man , his days are as grass : as a flower of the field , so he flourisheth .
text2: Sa y taotao , y jaaniña taegüijeja y chaguan ; taegüijeja y flores gui fangualuan lalachog .

text: For the wind passeth over it , and it is gone ; and the place thereof shall know it no more .
text2: Sa y manglo manmalofan gui jiloña , yan güiya mapos : yan y sagayan ti siña jatungo mas .

text: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him , and his righteousness unto children ' s children ;
text2: Lao y minaase Jeova , guinin taejinecog asta taejinecog guijilo ayo sija y manmaañao nu güiya , yan y tininasña gui famaguon y famaguon ;

text: To such as keep his covenant , and to those that remember his commandments to do them .
text2: Yya sija y umadadaje y tratuña , yan ayo sija y jumajaso y finanagüeña para ufatinas .

text: The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens ; and his kingdom ruleth over all .
text2: Si Jeova japlanta y tronuña gui langet sija ; yan y raenoña y naregla y jilo todoja .

text: Bless the LORD , ye his angels , that excel in strength , that do his commandments , hearkening unto the voice of his word .
text2: Bendise si Jeova , jamyo ni angjetña sija , ni y manmatatnga gui minetgot , ni y cumumple y sinanganña , ni y umecungog y inagang y finoña .

text: Bless ye the LORD , all ye his hosts ; ye ministers of his , that do his pleasure .
text2: Bendise si Jeova todo jamyo ni y inetnon sendaloña : jamyo ni y ministroña ni y fumatitinas y minalagoña .

text: Bless the LORD , all his works in all places of his dominion : bless the LORD , O my soul .
text2: Bendise si Jeova , todo y finatinasña , gui todo y sagayan anae jagobiebietna : bendise si Jeova , O antijo .

text: Bless the LORD , O my soul . O LORD my God , thou art very great ; thou art clothed with honour and majesty .
text2: BENDISE si Jeova , O antijo : O Jeova Yuusso , jago y sendangculo ; jago minagagago ni y onra , yan y minagas .

text: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment : who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain :
text2: Ni y untampen maesajao ni y manana taegüije y bestido : ni y jumuto juyong y langet sija taegüije y cottina .

text: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters : who maketh the clouds his chariot : who walketh upon the wings of the wind :
text2: Ni y plumanta y jayo y aposentuña gui jalom janom : ni y fumatinas y mapagajes para caruajeña : ni y mamomocat gui jilo y papan y manglo .

text: Who maketh his angels spirits ; his ministers a flaming fire :
text2: Ni y fumatinas y manglo sija para tentagoña : y ministroña y mañila y guafe .

text: Who laid the foundations of the earth , that it should not be removed for ever .
text2: Ni y pumolo y plinantan tano , ya ti siña manacalamten para taejinecog .

text: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment : the waters stood above the mountains .
text2: Ya tumampe güe ni y tinadong taegüije y bestido : y janom sija manotojgue gui sanjilo y beca sija .

text: At thy rebuke they fled ; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away .
text2: Ya pot y linalatdemo , sija manjanao ; ya pot y inagang y julumo mañadig manjanao .

text: They go up by the mountains ; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them .
text2: Sija manjanao julo gui beca sija , sija apan papa gui oriyan y bayesija , gui sagayan ni y jago fumamauleg para sija .

text: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over ; that they turn not again to cover the earth .
text2: Jago pumolo y uttimonñija ya ti siña manmalofan guato ; para ti siña jabira sija talo para utampe y tano .

text: He sendeth the springs into the valleys , which run among the hills .
text2: Jatago y tutujon y janom gui jalom y bayesija ; ni y manmalalago gui entalo y egso sija .

text: They give drink to every beast of the field : the wild asses quench their thirst .
text2: Sija numae guimenñija y todo gâgâ sija gui fangualuan : y manmachaleg na asno sija manmagong y majoñija .

text: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation , which sing among the branches .
text2: Ya iya sija nae y pajaron y langet guaja sagañija ya mangacanta gui entalo y ramas sija .

text: He watereth the hills from his chambers : the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works .
text2: Güiya numaye janom y egso sija guinin y aposentuña sija : y tano jaspog ni y tinegcha y chechomo .

text: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle , and herb for the service of man : that he may bring forth food out of the earth ;
text2: Güiya y chaguan munafanlâlâ para y guaca sija , yan y tinanom para usinetbe y taotao : para ufañule nengcano gui tano ;

text: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man , and oil to make his face to shine , and bread which strengtheneth man ' s heart .
text2: Yan y bino ni y munamamagof y corason y taotao , yan y laña para ulamlam y mataña , yan y pan ni y munamemetgot y corason y taotao .

text: The trees of the LORD are full of sap ; the cedars of Lebanon , which he hath planted ;
text2: Y trongcon jayo Jeova manbula chugo ; y sedro sija gui Libano ni y tinanomña ;

text: Where the birds make their nests : as for the stork , the fir trees are her house .
text2: Anae y pajaro jafatitinas y chechoñija ; ya y chuchuco , y trongcon pino guimaña .

text: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats ; and the rocks for the conies .
text2: Y taquilo na ogso sija para y manmachaleg na chiba : yan y acho sija guinegüe para y conejo .

text: He appointed the moon for seasons : the sun knoweth his going down .
text2: Jatancho y pilan para y tiempo : y atdao tumungo y jinanaoña papa .

text: Thou makest darkness , and it is night : wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth .
text2: Jago fumatinas y jemjom yan puenge ; anae todo y gâgâ gui jalomtano mangucunanaf mona .

text: The young lions roar after their prey , and seek their meat from God .
text2: Y manfamaguon na leon sija manaagang ni y manmaconeñija yan jaaliligao y nañija guinin as Yuus .

text: The sun ariseth , they gather themselves together , and lay them down in their dens .
text2: Y atdao cajulo , sija manmapos , yan manason sija papa gui jalom y liyangñija .

text: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening .
text2: Y taotao jumajanao mona gui finatinasña yan gui chechoña , asta qui puenge .

text: O LORD , how manifold are thy works ! in wisdom hast thou made them all : the earth is full of thy riches .
text2: O Jeova , manminegae sija y chechomo ! y minenajlom , jago fumatinas sija todo : y tano senbula ni y rinicumo .

text: So is this great and wide sea , wherein are things creeping innumerable , both small and great beasts .
text2: Ayo guato gaegue y tase , dangculo yan ancho , anae y sanjalomña sija y güinaja na mangucunanaf ni ti siña matufong , todoja mandangculo yan mandiquique sija na gâgâ .

text: There go the ships : there is that leviathan , whom thou hast made to play therein .
text2: Ayo nae manjajanao y batco sija : ayo nae gaegue y lebiatan ni y finatinasmo para y jumugando gui sanjalomña .

text: These wait all upon thee ; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season .
text2: Este sija todo mumananggajao ; sa jago siña unnae sija nañija gui tiempo ni matancho .

text: That thou givest them they gather : thou openest thine hand , they are filled with good .
text2: Sa ayo y jago numae , sija naufandaña : unbaba y canaemo ya sija mannajong ni y minauleg .

text: Thou hidest thy face , they are troubled : thou takest away their breath , they die , and return to their dust .
text2: Unnaatog y matamo , sija mañatsaga : unchule y jinagonñija , sija manmatae , yan manalo guato gui petbosñija .

text: Thou sendest forth thy spirit , they are created : and thou renewest the face of the earth .
text2: Untago mona y espiritumo , sija manfinatinas : yan jago munanuebo y inatan gui sanjilo y tano .

text: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever : the LORD shall rejoice in his works .
text2: Polo ya y minalag Jeova ugagaegue para taejinecog : Polo ya si Jeova umagof gui chechona :

text: He looketh on the earth , and it trembleth : he toucheth the hills , and they smoke .
text2: Ni y jaatan y jilo y tano yan jayengyong : ni y japacha y egso sija yan janaasgon .

text: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live : I will sing praise to my God while I have my being .
text2: Bae jucantaye si Jeova taemenoja y inanaco y linâlâjo : bae jucantaye tinina y Yuusso mientras lalâlâyo .

text: My meditation of him shall be sweet : I will be glad in the LORD .
text2: Polo ya y jinasoco iya güiya usenmames : bae jugofmagof as Jeova .

text: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth , and let the wicked be no more . Bless thou the LORD , O my soul . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Polo y manisao ya ufanlinachae gui tano , polo y manaelaye ya utaya . Bendise si Jeova , O antijo . Alaba si Jeova .

text: O give thanks unto the LORD ; call upon his name : make known his deeds among the people .
text2: O nae grasias si Jeova ; agang y naanña ; namatungo y chechoña gui entalo taotao sija .

text: Sing unto him , sing psalms unto him : talk ye of all his wondrous works .
text2: Cantaye güe , cantaye güe ni y alabansa sija ; fanadingan ni y todo y chechoña ni y mannamanman .

text: Glory ye in his holy name : let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD .
text2: Manmalag jamyo ni y santos na naanña : umanmagof ayo sija na corason y umaliligao si Jeova .

text: Seek the LORD , and his strength : seek his face evermore .
text2: Aligao si Jeova yan y minetgotña : Aligao y mataña para taejinecog .

text: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done ; his wonders , and the judgments of his mouth ;
text2: Jaso y ninamanman checho ni y monjayan jachogüe ; ninamanmanña yan y juision y pachotña ;

text: O ye seed of Abraham his servant , ye children of Jacob his chosen .
text2: O Jamyo , ni y semiyan Abraham tentagoña , jamyo ni y famaguon Jacob inayegña sija .

text: He is the LORD our God : his judgments are in all the earth .
text2: Güiya si Jeova Yuusta : y juisioñasija mangaegue todo gui tano .

text: He hath remembered his covenant for ever , the word which he commanded to a thousand generations .
text2: Jagasja jaso y tratuña para taejinecog , y finijo ni y tinagoña para mit na generasion .

text: Which covenant he made with Abraham , and his oath unto Isaac ;
text2: Ayo na trato ni y jafatinas gui as Abraham , yan y jinilaña gui as Ysaac .

text: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law , and to Israel for an everlasting covenant :
text2: Yan ayoja janafitme gui as Jacob para otden , yan as Israel para taejinecog na trato .

text: Saying , Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan , the lot of your inheritance :
text2: Ylelegña : Yya jago guajo junaejao y tano Cananea , y facae y erensiamo .

text: When they were but a few men in number ; yea , very few , and strangers in it .
text2: Anae sija mandidideja na numeron taotao : junggan , senmandidide yan taotao juyong güije ;

text: When they went from one nation to another , from one kingdom to another people ;
text2: Ya sija manjanao guinin y un nasion asta y otro nasion , guinin y un raeno asta otro taotao ;

text: He suffered no man to do them wrong : yea , he reproved kings for their sakes ;
text2: Ti japolo ni un taotao na ujafatinas daño guiya sija : magajet na jalalatde y ray sija pot causañija :

text: Saying , Touch not mine anointed , and do my prophets no harm .
text2: Ylegña : Chamo pumapacha y pinalaejo , yan chamo munafanlalamen y profetajo sija .

text: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land : he brake the whole staff of bread .
text2: Ya jatago y ñinalang gui jilo y tano : ya jayulang todo y minetgot y agon .

text: He sent a man before them , even Joseph , who was sold for a servant :
text2: Ya jatago un taotao gui menañija , si José ni y mabende para tentago .

text: Whose feet they hurt with fetters : he was laid in iron :
text2: Ayo sija na adengña y ninafanlamen ni y cadena : güiya mapolo guientalo y lilog .

text: Until the time that his word came : the word of the LORD tried him .
text2: Asta y tiempo anae macumple y finoña : ya y fino Jeova chumague güe ,

text: The king sent and loosed him ; even the ruler of the people , and let him go free .
text2: Y ray matago ya pinila güe , ayo y magas taotao sija yan pinelo güe na ujanao libre .

text: He made him lord of his house , and ruler of all his substance :
text2: Pinelo güe magas gui guimaña yan gobietnon todo y güinajaña :

text: To bind his princes at his pleasure ; and teach his senators wisdom .
text2: Para upreso y prinsipeña ni y minagofña ; yan ufanagüe y manamco ni y manpápagat .

text: Israel also came into Egypt ; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham .
text2: Si Israel locue jumalom guiya Egipto ; yan si Jacob taotao juyong sumasaga gui tano Cam .

text: And he increased his people greatly ; and made them stronger than their enemies .
text2: Yan janafansenmegae y taotaoña ; yan janafanmetgot mas que y enimigoñija .

text: He turned their heart to hate his people , to deal subtilly with his servants .
text2: Jabira y corasonñija para ujachatlie y taotaoña sija , para ufanmatinas ni y finaye gui tentagoña sija .

text: He sent Moses his servant ; and Aaron whom he had chosen .
text2: Jatago si Moises ni y tentagoña ; yan si Aaron ni y guinin inayegña .

text: They shewed his signs among them , and wonders in the land of Ham .
text2: Sija japolo ni y señatña guiya sija , yan ninamanman gui tano Cam .

text: He sent darkness , and made it dark ; and they rebelled not against his word .
text2: Jatago y jemjom , ya ninajomjom ; yan sija ti ninafanaguaguat contra y finoña .

text: He turned their waters into blood , and slew their fish .
text2: Jatolaeca y janomñija jafajâgâ , yan japuno y güijanñija .

text: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance , in the chambers of their kings .
text2: Y tanoñija janae manadan ranas , ya megae gui jalom y aposenton y rayñija sija .

text: He spake , and there came divers sorts of flies , and lice in all their coasts .
text2: Güiya sumasangan , yan manmato manadan dinaña lalo , yan juto sija gui todo y oriyan y tanoñija .

text: He gave them hail for rain , and flaming fire in their land .
text2: Güiya numae sija uchan graniso , yan mañila guafe gui tanoñija .

text: He smote their vines also and their fig trees ; and brake the trees of their coasts .
text2: Jasaolag y trongcon ubasñija locue , yan y trongcon ygosñija ; yan jajulog y trongcon jayo sija gui oriyan tanoñija .

text: He spake , and the locusts came , and caterpillers , and that without number ,
text2: Güiya y sumangan , yan y apacha sija manmato , yan uruga na ulo sija yan ayo taya numeroñija ,

text: And did eat up all the herbs in their land , and devoured the fruit of their ground .
text2: Ya sija jacano todo y tinanom gui jalom y tanoñija , yan jalachae sija y tinegcha gui tanoñija .

text: He smote also all the firstborn in their land , the chief of all their strength .
text2: Ya japuno locue todo y finenana na finañagon laje gui tanoñija , y magas todo y ninasiñañija .

text: He brought them forth also with silver and gold : and there was not one feeble person among their tribes .
text2: Ya jacone sija juyong locue yan y salape yan y oro ; yan taya ni un taotao malango gui triboñija .

text: Egypt was glad when they departed : for the fear of them fell upon them .
text2: Yya Egipto manmagof anae sija manjanao : pot minaañaoñija guinin podong guiya sija .

text: He spread a cloud for a covering ; and fire to give light in the night .
text2: Jajuto y mapagajes para ufantinampe ; yan y guafe janae para ufaninina gui puenge .

text: The people asked , and he brought quails , and satisfied them with the bread of heaven .
text2: Manmangagao y taotao , yan jaconie pajaro ni calang palumo sija ; yan ninafanjaspog ni y pan langet .

text: He opened the rock , and the waters gushed out ; they ran in the dry places like a river .
text2: Jababa y acho yan y janom milalag juyong ; manmalalago gui anglo na sagayan taegüije y sadog .

text: For he remembered his holy promise , and Abraham his servant .
text2: Sa jajaso y santos na sinanganña , yan Abraham ni y tentagoña .

text: And he brought forth his people with joy , and his chosen with gladness :
text2: Ya jacone juyong y taotaoña yan y minagof , yan y inayegña gui cantasion sija .

text: And gave them the lands of the heathen : and they inherited the labour of the people ;
text2: Yan janae sija ni y tano y nasion sija : yan sija jachule para iyoñija ni y checho y taotao sija :

text: That they might observe his statutes , and keep his laws . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Para usiña adaje y otdenña , yan ufatinas y layña . Alaba jamyo si Jeova .

text: Praise ye the LORD . O give thanks unto the LORD ; for he is good : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: ALABA jamyo si Jeova . O nae grasias si Jeova ; sa güiya mauleg : sa y minaaseña gagaegueja para taejinecog .

text: Who can utter the mighty acts of the LORD ? who can shew forth all his praise ?
text2: Jaye siña sumangan y gaesisiñan y checho Jeova ? pot mamanue todo ni y alabansaña ?

text: Blessed are they that keep judgment , and he that doeth righteousness at all times .
text2: Dichoso ayo sija y umadadaje y juisio , yan ayo y fumatitinas y tininas todo y tiempo .

text: Remember me , O LORD , with the favour that thou bearest unto thy people : O visit me with thy salvation ;
text2: Jasoyo , O Jeova , nu y finaborese ni y unnae y taotaomo ; O bisitayo nu y satbasionmo ;

text: That I may see the good of thy chosen , that I may rejoice in the gladness of thy nation , that I may glory with thine inheritance .
text2: Para jusiña lumie y minauleg gui inayegmo , para jusiña mumagof gui minagof y nasionmo , para jusiña mumalag gui erensiamo .

text: We have sinned with our fathers , we have committed iniquity , we have done wickedly .
text2: Guinin manisaojam yan y tatanmame , infatinas y tinaelaye yan inchegüe y inechong .

text: Our fathers understood not thy wonders in Egypt ; they remembered not the multitude of thy mercies ; but provoked him at the sea , even at the Red sea .
text2: Y tatanmame ti jatungo y ninamanmanmo guiya Egipto ; ti jajaso y manadan y minaasemo ; lao manmanembeste gui tase , junggan gui Tasen Agaga .

text: Nevertheless he saved them for his name ' s sake , that he might make his mighty power to be known .
text2: Lao jasatbaja sija pot y naanña , para usiña janamatungo y dangculon y ninasiñaña .

text: He rebuked the Red sea also , and it was dried up : so he led them through the depths , as through the wilderness .
text2: Jalalatde y Tasen Agaga locue yan janaanglo : lao jaesgaejon sija inanaco y todo gui tinadong , taegüije todo inanaco y desierto .

text: And he saved them from the hand of him that hated them , and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy .
text2: Yan janafanlibre sija guinin y canae ayo y chumatlie sija , yan jarescata sija guinin y canae y enimigo .

text: And the waters covered their enemies : there was not one of them left .
text2: Yan y janom sija tumampe y contrarioñija : ya taya ni uno guiya sija sebla .

text: Then believed they his words ; they sang his praise .
text2: Ayo nae jajonggue y sinanganña sija ; jacanta y tininaña .

text: They soon forgat his works ; they waited not for his counsel :
text2: Ya guse manmalefa ni y chechoña : ti janangga y pinagatña :

text: But lusted exceedingly in the wilderness , and tempted God in the desert .
text2: Lao manmalago megae gui jalomtano , yan matienta si Yuus gui desierto .

text: And he gave them their request ; but sent leanness into their soul .
text2: Ya güiya numae sija ni y guinagaoñija ; lao janamanae ni y minasogsog gui jalom y anteñija .

text: They envied Moses also in the camp , and Aaron the saint of the LORD .
text2: Ya manmanugo as Moises gui fangualuan ; yan si Aaron ni y santos Jeova .

text: The earth opened and swallowed up Dathan , and covered the company of Abiram .
text2: Y tano mababa ya pinañot si Datan , yan mantinampe y mangachong Abirom .

text: And a fire was kindled in their company ; the flame burned up the wicked .
text2: Yan y guafe manafañila gui mangachongñija ; ya y mañila sumonggue y manaelaye .

text: They made a calf in Horeb , and worshipped the molten image .
text2: Ya manmamatinas tatnero guiya Horeb , yan maadora y diniriten y imagen .

text: Thus they changed their glory into the similitude of an ox that eateth grass .
text2: Taegüije , jatulaeca y minalagñija para nu jechuran guaca ni y chumochocho chaguan .

text: They forgat God their saviour , which had done great things in Egypt ;
text2: Manmalefa as Yuus ni y satbadotñija , ni y fumatinas y mandangculo na güinaja guiya Egipto ;

text: Wondrous works in the land of Ham , and terrible things by the Red sea .
text2: Mannamanman na checho gui tano Cam , yan mannamaañao na güinaja gui Tasen Agaga .

text: Therefore he said that he would destroy them , had not Moses his chosen stood before him in the breach , to turn away his wrath , lest he should destroy them .
text2: Enao mina ilegña güiya , na uyunilang sija , yaguin ti si Moises ni y inayegña ti tumogue gui menaña gui finapetta , para ubira y binibuña para chaña yumuyulang sija .

text: Yea , they despised the pleasant land , they believed not his word :
text2: Magajet na jachatlie y güaeyayon na tano , ya ti jajonggue y finoña .

text: But murmured in their tents , and hearkened not unto the voice of the LORD .
text2: Lao mangonggong gui sa tiendañíja ; ya ti jaecungog y inagang Jeova .

text: Therefore he lifted up his hand against them , to overthrow them in the wilderness :
text2: Enao mina jajatsa y canaeña contra sija ; para uyute sija gui jalom y desierto :

text: To overthrow their seed also among the nations , and to scatter them in the lands .
text2: Para uyute y semiyañija locue gui nasion sija , yan para uchalapon sija gui jalom y tano sija .

text: They joined themselves also unto Baal - peor , and ate the sacrifices of the dead .
text2: Ya mandaña sija gui Baal - peor ; ya jacano y inefresen y manmatae .

text: Thus they provoked him to anger with their inventions : and the plague brake in upon them .
text2: Taegüine sija mannalalalo güe nu y chechoñija : ya derepente mato gui jiloñija sija chetnot .

text: Then stood up Phinehas , and executed judgment : and so the plague was stayed .
text2: Ya janatojgue julo si Finees , ya jafatinas y juisio : ya y chetnot pumara .

text: And that was counted unto him for righteousness unto all generations for evermore .
text2: Yan ayo nae jatufong iya güiya y tininas , gui todo y generasion sija para taejinecog .

text: They angered him also at the waters of strife , so that it went ill with Moses for their sakes :
text2: Ya sija mannalalalo güe locue gui janom guiya Meriba : ya jumuyong daño para si Moises pot causañija .

text: Because they provoked his spirit , so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips .
text2: Sa sija chumoma y espirituña ; sa jasangan sin jinaso pot labiosña .

text: They did not destroy the nations , concerning whom the LORD commanded them :
text2: Ya ti jayulang y nasion sija , taegüije si Jeova ni y mantinago sija .

text: But were mingled among the heathen , and learned their works .
text2: Lao mandaña sija yan y nasion sija , yan jaeyag y chechoñija :

text: And they served their idols : which were a snare unto them .
text2: Yan jasetbe y idolosñija : jumuyong un laso para sija .

text: Yea , they sacrificed their sons and their daughters unto devils ,
text2: Magajet na jaofrese y lajeñija yan y jagañija gui anite ,

text: And shed innocent blood , even the blood of their sons and of their daughters , whom they sacrificed unto the idols of Canaan : and the land was polluted with blood .
text2: Yan jachuda y jâgâ y manaeisao , magajet na y jâgâ y lajeñija yan y jagañija ni jaofrese gui idolos guiya Cananea : yan y tano ni y ninaáplacha ni y jâgâ .

text: Thus were they defiled with their own works , and went a whoring with their own inventions .
text2: Ya taegüije munafanáplacha pot y chechoñijaja , yan ninafanábale ni y finatinasñija .

text: Therefore was the wrath of the LORD kindled against his people , insomuch that he abhorred his own inheritance .
text2: Enao mina y binibon Jeova sinenggue contra y taotaoña , ya jaguefchatlie y erensiañija .

text: And he gave them into the hand of the heathen ; and they that hated them ruled over them .
text2: Ya janae nu sija gui canae y nasion sija ; yan ayo y chumatlie sija janafanmagas gui jiloñija .

text: Their enemies also oppressed them , and they were brought into subjection under their hand .
text2: Ya y enimigoñija locue chumiguet sija , yan sija chumule asta y jalom inesgue gui papa y canaeñija .

text: Many times did he deliver them ; but they provoked him with their counsel , and were brought low for their iniquity .
text2: Megae na biaje nae janafanlibre sija ; lao sija maembeste güe ni y pinagatñija , yan manmachile papa gui tatpapa ni y tinaelayeñija .

text: Nevertheless he regarded their affliction , when he heard their cry :
text2: Lao jaatan y pinitiñija , anae jajungog y inagangñija .

text: And he remembered for them his covenant , and repented according to the multitude of his mercies .
text2: Ya jajaso para sija y tratuña , yan ninafanmañotsot según y minegae y minaaseña .

text: He made them also to be pitied of all those that carried them captives .
text2: Janafangaease locue ni ayo y cumone sija preso .

text: Save us , O LORD our God , and gather us from among the heathen , to give thanks unto thy holy name , and to triumph in thy praise .
text2: Nafanlibrejam , O Jeova , Yuusmame , yan nafandañajam gui entalo y nasion sija , para unae grasias y santos na naanmo , yan ufangana gui alabansamo .

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel from everlasting to everlasting : and let all the people say , Amen . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Bendito si Jeova ni Yuus Israel guinin y taejinecog para y taejinecog . Polo ya todo taotao ilegñija . Amen . Alaba jamyo si Jeova .

text: O give thanks unto the LORD , for he is good : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae grasias si Jeova , sa güiya mauleg : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so , whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy ;
text2: Polo y ninafanlibre as Jeova ya ujasangan , anae janafanlibre guinin y canae y contrario ;

text: And gathered them out of the lands , from the east , and from the west , from the north , and from the south .
text2: Yan janafandaña sija juyong gui tano sija , guinin y sancatan , yan guinin y sanlichan , guinin y san lago , yan guinin y san jaya .

text: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way ; they found no city to dwell in .
text2: Manaabag gui jalomtano gui chalan desierto ; ya ti manmañoda siuda para ufañaga .

text: Hungry and thirsty , their soul fainted in them .
text2: Manñalang yan minajo sija , y anteñija manlalango gui sanjalomñija .

text: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble , and he delivered them out of their distresses .
text2: Ayo nae maagang si Jeova gui chinatsagañija , ya güiya munalibre sija gui pinadeseñija .

text: And he led them forth by the right way , that they might go to a city of habitation .
text2: Ya maninesgaejon sija mona , gui tinas na chalan , para usiña manjanao para y siuda anae mañasaga .

text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness , and for his wonderful works to the children of men !
text2: O , para y taotao sija mojon ufanmanalaba si Jeova pot y minaulegña , yan pot y ninamanman na chechoña gui famaguon taotao sija .

text: For he satisfieth the longing soul , and filleth the hungry soul with goodness .
text2: Sa jananajong y malago na ante , yan janabula y ñalang na ante ni y minauleg .

text: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , being bound in affliction and iron ;
text2: Ayo sija y manmatatachong gui jemjom yan y jalom y anineng y finatae , ni y guinin jagode nu y pinite yan lulog ;

text: Because they rebelled against the words of God , and contemned the counsel of the most High :
text2: Sa manembeste contra y fino Yuus , yan jachatlie y pinagat y Gueftaquilo :

text: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour ; they fell down , and there was none to help .
text2: Enao mina jachule papa y corasonñija gui checho ; manbasnag papa ya taya para ufaninayuda .

text: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble , and he saved them out of their distresses .
text2: Ayo nae maagang si Jeova gui chinatsagañija , ya güiya munalibre sija gui pinadeseñija .

text: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death , and brake their bands in sunder .
text2: Jachule sija juyong gui jemjom yan y anineng y finatae , yan jagutos y manmagodeñija .

text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness , and for his wonderful works to the children of men !
text2: O para y taotao sija mojon ufanmanalaba si Jeova pot y minaulegña , yan pot y ninamanman na chechoña gui famaguon y taotao sija !

text: For he hath broken the gates of brass , and cut the bars of iron in sunder .
text2: Sa güiya yumamag y trangcan bronse , yan janapedaso y rejas lulog .

text: Fools because of their transgression , and because of their iniquities , are afflicted .
text2: Mangaduco , sa pot y tinaelayeñija yan pot y inechongñija fanmanmamadese .

text: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat ; and they draw near unto the gates of death .
text2: Y anteñija jachatlie todo y clasen nengcano ; yan manjijot gui trangcan y finatae .

text: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble , and he saveth them out of their distresses .
text2: Ya maagang si Jeova gui chinatsagañija ya güiya munalibre sija gui pinadeseñija .

text: He sent his word , and healed them , and delivered them from their destructions .
text2: Manninae y finoña ya manninajomlo sija , yan manninalibre sija guinin y yinilangñija .

text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness , and for his wonderful works to the children of men !
text2: O para y taotao sija mojon ufanmanalaba si Jeova pot y minaulegña , yan pot y ninamanman na chechoña gui fumaguon y taotao sija !

text: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving , and declare his works with rejoicing .
text2: Ya polo sija ya ujaofrese y inefresen grasias sija , yan jasangan claro y chechoña gui cantan minagof .

text: They that go down to the sea in ships , that do business in great waters ;
text2: Sija ni manjanao papa gui tase gui jalom y batco , ni y fumatinas chechoñija gui jilo manadan janom sija ;

text: These see the works of the LORD , and his wonders in the deep .
text2: Estesija lumie y checho Jeova , yan y ninamanmanña gui jalom y tinadong .

text: For he commandeth , and raiseth the stormy wind , which lifteth up the waves thereof .
text2: Sa jatagoña , ya janacajulo y pagyon manglo , ni y jumatsa julo y napo sija .

text: They mount up to the heaven , they go down again to the depths : their soul is melted because of trouble .
text2: Mangajulo para y langet , manjanao talo papa para y tinadong : y anteñija manmaderite pot y chinatsaga .

text: They reel to and fro , and stagger like a drunken man , and are at their wits ' end .
text2: Manmatulaejon mona an tate , yan manmamangag taegüije y bulacho na taotao , yan manmalingo y jinasoñija .

text: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble , and he bringeth them out of their distresses .
text2: Ya maagang si Jeova gui chinatsagañija , ya güiya munalibre sija gui pinadeseñija .

text: He maketh the storm a calm , so that the waves thereof are still .
text2: Janabasta y pagyo , yan y napo sija manmamatquilo .

text: Then are they glad because they be quiet ; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven .
text2: Ayo nae manmagof sa mangieto , ya taegüije jacone sija asta y minalagoñija na puetto .

text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness , and for his wonderful works to the children of men !
text2: O para y taotao sija mojon ufanmanalaba si Jeova pot y minaulegña , yan pot y ninamanman na checoña gui famaguon y taotao sija !

text: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people , and praise him in the assembly of the elders .
text2: Polo ya sija umanacajulo güe locue gui y inetnon y taotao yan ufanmanalaba nu güiya gui tachong y manamco .

text: He turneth rivers into a wilderness , and the watersprings into dry ground ;
text2: Jafasadog y desierto , yan jafaanglo na oda y tutujon janom ;

text: A fruitful land into barrenness , for the wickedness of them that dwell therein .
text2: Jafadesierton asiga y mauleg na tano , pot y tinaelayen ayo sija y mañasaga gui sanjalom .

text: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water , and dry ground into watersprings .
text2: Jafajagoen janom y desierto , yan janafamimichao y janom y anglo na oda .

text: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell , that they may prepare a city for habitation ;
text2: Yan ayo na janafañaga y manñalang , ya sija siña jafamauleg y siuda para ufañaga ;

text: And sow the fields , and plant vineyards , which may yield fruits of increase .
text2: Yan matanme y fangualuan , yan manmananom gui fangualuan ubas , ya ufanmarecoge y tinegchan y aumento .

text: He blesseth them also , so that they are multiplied greatly ; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease .
text2: Jabendise sija locue , para ufangosmegae ; yan ti upolo y gañija gâgâ na udidide .

text: Again , they are minished and brought low through oppression , affliction , and sorrow .
text2: Tumalo sija mandidide yan mannecon papa , pot y chiniguet , chinatsaga , yan triniste .

text: He poureth contempt upon princes , and causeth them to wander in the wilderness , where there is no way .
text2: Jachuda sinala gui jilo y prinsepe sija , yan janafanabag sija gui jalomtano anae taya chalan .

text: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction , and maketh him families like a flock .
text2: Lao japolo y mannesesitao julo guinin y pinadese , yan mandaña gui familia sija taegüije y inetnon quinilo .

text: The righteous shall see it , and rejoice : and all iniquity shall stop her mouth .
text2: Y manunas ujalie ayo yan ufanmagof ; yan todo y tinaelaye ujinichom y pachotña .

text: Whoso is wise , and will observe these things , even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD .
text2: Masquesea jaye na manmalate , ujaadaje este sija na güinaja ; ya sija ujajaso y minaase gui as Jeova .

text: O God , my heart is fixed ; I will sing and give praise , even with my glory .
text2: O Yuus , y corasonjo esta meton ; bae jucanta , magajetja na jucanta alabansa sija yan todo y minalagjo .

text: Awake , psaltery and harp : I myself will awake early .
text2: Fatmata guitala , yan atpa : guajoja na maesa magmatayo taftaf .

text: I will praise thee , O LORD , among the people : and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations .
text2: Bae junae jao grasias , Jeova gui entalo y taotao sija : yan jucantaye alabansa , sija gui entalo y nasion sija .

text: For thy mercy is great above the heavens : and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds .
text2: Sa y dangculon y minaasemo gui san jilo y langet : yan y minagajetmo tinacaja y mapagajes sija .

text: Be thou exalted , O God , above the heavens : and thy glory above all the earth ;
text2: Nadangculojao , O Yuus , gui jilo y langet : yan y minalagomo gui san jilo todo y tano .

text: That thy beloved may be delivered : save with thy right hand , and answer me .
text2: Para usiña ayo y güinaeyamo manlibre ni y agapa na canaemo , yan opejam .

text: God hath spoken in his holiness ; I will rejoice , I will divide Shechem , and mete out the valley of Succoth .
text2: Si Yuus ilegña gui sinantosña : Guajo jumagof , guajo jupatte Siquem , yan jumide juyong y bayen Sucot .

text: Gilead is mine ; Manasseh is mine ; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head ; Judah is my lawgiver ;
text2: Yyoco Gilaad ; iyoco Manases : Efrain locue y minetgot y ilujo ; Juda y bastonjo ;

text: Moab is my washpot ; over Edom will I cast out my shoe ; over Philistia will I triumph .
text2: Moab y palanganajo anae jufagase adeng sija : y jilo Edom nae juyute y sapatoso : y jilo Filistia nae juagang .

text: Who will bring me into the strong city ? who will lead me into Edom ?
text2: Jaye uconeyo asta y jalom y fitme na siuda ? Jaye uinesgaejonyo asta y jalom Idumea ?

text: Wilt not thou , O God , who hast cast us off ? and wilt not thou , O God , go forth with our hosts ?
text2: Ti jago , O Yuus , ni y yumute jam ? yan jago , O Yuus , ti jumanao yan y inetnon sendalonmame .

text: Give us help from trouble : for vain is the help of man .
text2: Naejam linibre gui chinatsaga : sa taesetbe y inayudan y taotao .

text: Through God we shall do valiantly : for he it is that shall tread down our enemies .
text2: As Yuus nae utafanmatatnga : sa güiyaja uguinacha papa y enimiguta .

text: Hold not thy peace , O God of my praise ;
text2: CHAMO famatquiquilo , O Yuus , gui alabansajo ;

text: For the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of the deceitful are opened against me : they have spoken against me with a lying tongue .
text2: Sa y pachot y manaelaye yan y pachot y dinague manmababa contra guajo : sa manguecuentos contra guajo yan y mandacon na jula .

text: They compassed me about also with words of hatred ; and fought against me without a cause .
text2: Sija umoriyayayeyo locue ni y finijo chinatlie ; yan manmumo contra guajo sin jafa .

text: For my love they are my adversaries : but I give myself unto prayer .
text2: Sa y apas y güinaeyaco , sija contrariujo : lao guajo siempre manayuyutyo .

text: And they have rewarded me evil for good , and hatred for my love .
text2: Yan sija jaapaseyo taelaye pot mauleg , yan chinatlie pot y guinaeyaco .

text: Set thou a wicked man over him : and let Satan stand at his right hand .
text2: Polo jao y taelaye na taotao guiya güiya : ya polo un contrario ya utojgue gui agapa na canaeña .

text: When he shall be judged , let him be condemned : and let his prayer become sin .
text2: Yaguin majusga güe , polo ya umasentensia : yan y tinaetaeña ufamaisao .

text: Let his days be few ; and let another take his office .
text2: Ya y jaaniña udidide : yan otro uchinile ofisioña .

text: Let his children be fatherless , and his wife a widow .
text2: Y famaguonña ufanaetata yan y asaguaña ubiuda .

text: Let his children be continually vagabonds , and beg : let them seek their bread also out of their desolate places .
text2: Polo ya y famaguonña ufanlaong yan ufanmangagao : ya polo sija ya umaliligao y nañija güije gui chago gui sagañija na mayulang .

text: Let the extortioner catch all that he hath ; and let the strangers spoil his labour .
text2: Polo ya umaamot ya unnachule todo y güinajaña , yan y taotao juyong chumoleguan ni y finachochoña .

text: Let there be none to extend mercy unto him : neither let there be any to favour his fatherless children .
text2: Polo ya taya ni jaye umaase ni güiya ; yan ni uno ufinaborese y manaetata na famaguonña .

text: Let his posterity be cut off ; and in the generation following let their name be blotted out .
text2: Polo ya y famaguonña ufanmautut ; yan gui generasion ni y jadalalalag , umafagasñaejon y naanñija .

text: Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered with the LORD ; and let not the sin of his mother be blotted out .
text2: Poly ya y tinaelayen y tataña sija umajaso gui as Jeova : ya y isao nanaña ti umafagasñaejon .

text: Let them be before the LORD continually , that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth .
text2: Polo ya sija siempre ufangaegue gui menan Jeova , sa güiya siña umutut y jinasoñija guinin y tano .

text: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy , but persecuted the poor and needy man , that he might even slay the broken in heart .
text2: Sa ti jajaso mamanue minaase , lao japetsigue y peble yan y nesesitao na taotao , yan y mayulang na corason ujapuno sija .

text: As he loved cursing , so let it come unto him : as he delighted not in blessing , so let it be far from him .
text2: Magajet na jaguaeya y matdision , ya ayo na mato guiya güiya ; ya ti ninamagof ni y bendision , ya ayo na chago guiya güiya .

text: As he clothed himself with cursing like as with his garment , so let it come into his bowels like water , and like oil into his bones .
text2: Ya güiya mumagago güe ni y matdision taegüije y bestiduña , ya ayo na jumalom gui jalom y tiyanña taegüije y janom , yan taegüije y laña gui jalom tolangña .

text: Let it be unto him as the garment which covereth him , and for a girdle wherewith he is girded continually .
text2: Polo ya ayo guiya güiya , taegüije y magago ni y jatatampegüe , yan para sinturon ni y jadudog güe siempre .

text: Let this be the reward of mine adversaries from the LORD , and of them that speak evil against my soul .
text2: Ya este apas y contrariujo sija guinin as Jeova , yan ayo sija ni y manguecuentos taelaye contra y antijo .

text: But do thou for me , O GOD the Lord , for thy name ' s sake : because thy mercy is good , deliver thou me .
text2: Lao fatinas para guajo , O Yuus Jeova , pot y naanmo : sa mauleg na minaasemo , enao mina nalibreyo .

text: For I am poor and needy , and my heart is wounded within me .
text2: Sa pobleyo , yan nesesitaoyo , yan y corasonjo mañetnot gui sanjalomjo .

text: I am gone like the shadow when it declineth : I am tossed up and down as the locust .
text2: Mapos yo taegüije y anineng yaguin malofan : matafye yo julo yan papa taegüije y apacha .

text: My knees are weak through fasting ; and my flesh faileth of fatness .
text2: Y timoco mandafe pot y inayunat ; yan y catneco manmasogsog , sa ti jataca y iinemog .

text: I became also a reproach unto them : when they looked upon me they shaked their heads .
text2: Jumuyong yo locue taegüije linalatde guiya sija : anae maaatanyo jayeyengyong y iloñija .

text: Help me , O LORD my God : O save me according to thy mercy :
text2: Ayudayo , O Jeova Yuusso ; O satbayo segun y minaasemo :

text: That they may know that this is thy hand ; that thou , LORD , hast done it .
text2: Para sija ujatungo na este y canaemo : na jago , Jeova , fumatinas este .

text: Let them curse , but bless thou : when they arise , let them be ashamed ; but let thy servant rejoice .
text2: Polo ya sija manmamatdise , lao jago manbendise : yaguin sija mangajulo , ufanmamajlao ; lao y tentagomo umagof .

text: Let mine adversaries be clothed with shame , and let them cover themselves with their own confusion , as with a mantle .
text2: Ya y contrariojo ufanminagago ni y desonra ; yan ufantinampe sija ni y minamajlaoñija taegüije y capa .

text: I will greatly praise the LORD with my mouth ; yea , I will praise him among the multitude .
text2: Jeova bae junae sendangculo na grasias nu y pachotto ; junggan , jualabagüe gui linajyan taotao .

text: For he shall stand at the right hand of the poor , to save him from those that condemn his soul .
text2: Sa güiya utojgüe gui agapa na canae y nesesitao , para usinatba güe guinin ayo sija y jumusga y antiña .

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou at my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: SI Jeova ilegña ni y señotto , fatachong gui agapa na canaejo , asta qui jupolo y enimigo para fañajangan adengmo .

text: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion : rule thou in the midst of thine enemies .
text2: Si Jeova uninamannae y baran minetgotmo guinin Sion : gobietna gui entalo y enimigumo sija .

text: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power , in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning : thou hast the dew of thy youth .
text2: Y taotaomo ufanmalago na ufanmanofrese nu sija gui jaanen y ninasiñamo : gui guinatbon sija y sinantos , guinin y tiyan y agaan , ungae serenon y pinatgonmo .

text: The LORD hath sworn , and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek .
text2: Si Jeova manjula ya timañotsot , jago y pale para taejinecog segun y otden Melquisedec .

text: The Lord at thy right hand shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath .
text2: Si Jeova , gui agapa na canaemo , upanag todo y ray sija gui jaanin y binibuña .

text: He shall judge among the heathen , he shall fill the places with the dead bodies ; he shall wound the heads over many countries .
text2: Güiya ufanjusga gui entalo y nasion sija , janabula y sagayan sija ni y tataotao y manmatae ; unamagomgom y ilo gui jilo y megae na tano sija .

text: He shall drink of the brook in the way : therefore shall he lift up the head .
text2: Unaguimen y sadog gui chalan : enaomina güiya jumatsa julo y ilo .

text: Praise ye the LORD . I will praise the LORD with my whole heart , in the assembly of the upright , and in the congregation .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Guajo junae si Jeova grasias contodo y corasonjo , gui jalom y pinagat manunas , yan y jalom y inetnon taotao .

text: The works of the LORD are great , sought out of all them that have pleasure therein .
text2: Y checho Jeova mansendangculo , ya maaliligao ni ayo sija todo y ninafanmamagof nu estesija .

text: His work is honourable and glorious : and his righteousness endureth for ever .
text2: Y chechoña y onra yan minagas : yan y tininasña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered : the LORD is gracious and full of compassion .
text2: Jafatinas y mannamanman na chechoña para umajajaso : si Jeova cariñoso yan bula ni y minaase .

text: He hath given meat unto them that fear him : he will ever be mindful of his covenant .
text2: Güiya guinin munae nengcano ayo sija y manmaañao nu güiya : ya güiya siempre jajasoja tratuña .

text: He hath shewed his people the power of his works , that he may give them the heritage of the heathen .
text2: Jagasja jafanue y taotaoña ni y ninasiñan y chechoña , anae janae sija ni y erensian y nasion sija .

text: The works of his hands are verity and judgment ; all his commandments are sure .
text2: Y checho sija y canaeña y minagajet yan juisio ; ya todo y sinanganña sija manseguro .

text: They stand fast for ever and ever , and are done in truth and uprightness .
text2: Manfitme sija para taejinecog yan taejinecog , yan mamafatinas gui minagajet yan y tininas .

text: He sent redemption unto his people : he hath commanded his covenant for ever : holy and reverend is his name .
text2: Janamannae y linibre para y taotaoña ; ya jatago y tratuña para taejinecog : sinantos yan inenra y naanña .

text: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom : a good understanding have all they that do his commandments : his praise endureth for ever .
text2: tinagoña : y alabansaña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD , that delighteth greatly in his commandments .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Dichoso y taotao ni maañao as Jeova , yan ninasendangculo y minagofña ni y tinagoña sija .

text: His seed shall be mighty upon earth : the generation of the upright shall be blessed .
text2: Ya y semiyaña manmatatnga gui jilo y tano : ya y generasion manunas ufandichoso .

text: Wealth and riches shall be in his house : and his righteousness endureth for ever .
text2: Güinaja yan rinico mangaegue gui guimaña : ya y tininasña gagaegueja para taejinecog .

text: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness : he is gracious , and full of compassion , and righteous .
text2: Ya y manunas nae cajulo y manana gui jalom jomjom : güiya cariñoso güe yan bula minaase , yan tunasgüe .

text: A good man sheweth favour , and lendeth : he will guide his affairs with discretion .
text2: Y mauleg para ayo na taotao ni y fumatitinas y cariño , yan numanaayao : güiya umantiene y causaña gui juisio .

text: Surely he shall not be moved for ever : the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance .
text2: Sa güiya ti umanacalamten para taejinecog : y manunas para taejinecog : ufanmajajasoja .

text: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings : his heart is fixed , trusting in the LORD .
text2: Güiya ti umaañao ni y manaelaye na notisia sija : y corasonña meton ya jaangoco si Jeova .

text: His heart is established , he shall not be afraid , until he see his desire upon his enemies .
text2: Y corasonña fitme ya güiya ti umaañao , asta qui jalie y diniseaña gui jilo y contrariuña sija .

text: He hath dispersed , he hath given to the poor ; his righteousness endureth for ever ; his horn shall be exalted with honour .
text2: Guiya tumalapon , güiya numae ni y mamoble ; ya y tininasña gagaegue para taejinecog , y canggelonña umajatsa ni y inenra .

text: The wicked shall see it , and be grieved ; he shall gnash with his teeth , and melt away : the desire of the wicked shall perish .
text2: Y taelaye na taotao jalie ayo yan ninapinite : yan janachechegcheg y nifenña , yan maderite ya mapos : ya y diniseaña y taelaye umalingo .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Praise , O ye servants of the LORD , praise the name of the LORD .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Fanmanalaba , O tentago Jeova sija . Fanmanalaba y naan Jeova .

text: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore .
text2: Bendito y naan Jeova , desde este na tiempo yan para taejinecog .

text: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD ' s name is to be praised .
text2: Desde y quinajulo y atdao asta y minachomña papa , y naan Jeova para umaalaba .

text: The LORD is high above all nations , and his glory above the heavens .
text2: Si Jeova gueftaquilo gui jilo todo y nasion yan y minalagña gui jilo y langet sija .

text: Who is like unto the LORD our God , who dwelleth on high ,
text2: Jaye parejuña si Jeova ni y Yuusta , ni y japolo y tachongña gui sanjilo .

text: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven , and in the earth !
text2: Ni y muna umitde güe para uatan y güinaja sija ni y mangaegue gui langet yan y tano .

text: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust , and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill ;
text2: Güiya jumatsa julo y mamoble gui petbos , yan jajatsa y mananesitao gui monton estietcot .

text: That he may set him with princes , even with the princes of his people .
text2: Para unafanmatachong yan y prinsepe sija magajet , yan y prinsepen y taotaoña sija .

text: He maketh the barren woman to keep house , and to be a joyful mother of children . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Ya janafamulan guma y ti fafañago na palaoan , ya jumuyong gofmagof na nanan famaguon . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: When Israel went out of Egypt , the house of Jacob from a people of strange language ;
text2: ANAE si Israel jumanao juyong Egipto , y guima Jacob guinin y taotao y finijo na ti matungo .

text: Judah was his sanctuary , and Israel his dominion .
text2: Juda jumuyong y santos na sagaña , yan Israel y gobietnoña .

text: The sea saw it , and fled : Jordan was driven back .
text2: Y tase jalie ayo , yan malago ; Jordan masugon tate .

text: The mountains skipped like rams , and the little hills like lambs .
text2: Y beca sija manayog taegüije y quinilo laje yan y mandiquique ogso sija taegüije y manpatgon na quinilo sija .

text: What ailed thee , O thou sea , that thou fleddest ? thou Jordan , that thou wast driven back ?
text2: Jafa guaja guiya jago , O tase , na malagojao ? Jago Jordan ni y masugon tate ?

text: Ye mountains , that ye skipped like rams ; and ye little hills , like lambs ?
text2: Jamyo ni y beca sija ni y manayog taegüije y quinilo laje ; yan jamyo di quique na ogso sija taegüije y manpatgon na quinilo sija ?

text: Tremble , thou earth , at the presence of the Lord , at the presence of the God of Jacob ;
text2: Mayeyengyong , jago tano , gui menan Jeova , gui menan y Yuus Jacob ;

text: Which turned the rock into a standing water , the flint into a fountain of waters .
text2: Ni y jafaacho y jagoe janom , ya jafagagot y tutujon janom sija .

text: Not unto us , O LORD , not unto us , but unto thy name give glory , for thy mercy , and for thy truth ' s sake .
text2: AJE ti iyajame , O Jeova , aje ti iyajame , lao iya naanmo , nae uminalag pot y minaasemo , yan pot y minagajetmo .

text: Wherefore should the heathen say , Where is now their God ?
text2: Pot jafa mojon y nasion ilegñija : Mangue pago y Yuusñija ?

text: But our God is in the heavens : he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased .
text2: Lao si Yuusmame gaegue gui langet : guinin jafatinas jafaja y minalagoña .

text: Their idols are silver and gold , the work of men ' s hands .
text2: Y idolosñija sija salape yan oro , finatinas y canae y taotao sija .

text: They have mouths , but they speak not : eyes have they , but they see not :
text2: Guaja pachotñija lao ti manguecuentos : guaja atadogñija lao ti manmanlilie ;

text: They have ears , but they hear not : noses have they , but they smell not :
text2: Guaja talangañija lao ti manmanjujungog : guaja güiengñija lao ti manmannginginge :

text: They have hands , but they handle not : feet have they , but they walk not : neither speak they through their throat .
text2: Guaja canaeñija lao ti manmangogote : guaja adengñija lao ti manmamomocat : ni ufanguentos ni y güetgüeroñija .

text: They that make them are like unto them ; so is every one that trusteth in them .
text2: Ya ayo y fumatinas sija manparejoja yan sija : magajet na jayeja y umangoco güe guiya sija ,

text: O Israel , trust thou in the LORD : he is their help and their shield .
text2: O Israel , angoco si Jeova : sa güiya y ayudañija yan y patangñija .

text: O house of Aaron , trust in the LORD : he is their help and their shield .
text2: O guma Aaron , angoco si Jeova : sa güiya y ayudañija yan y patangñija .

text: Ye that fear the LORD , trust in the LORD : he is their help and their shield .
text2: Jamyo ni y manmaañao as Jeova , angoco si Jeova : sa güiya y ayudañija yan y patangñija .

text: The LORD hath been mindful of us : he will bless us ; he will bless the house of Israel ; he will bless the house of Aaron .
text2: Si Jeova guinin jajaso jita : guiya bumendisijit ; güiya bumendise y guima Israel ; güiya bumendise y guima Aaron .

text: He will bless them that fear the LORD , both small and great .
text2: Güiya bumendise ayo sija y manmaañao as Jeova , todo y mandiquique yan y mandangculo .

text: The LORD shall increase you more and more , you and your children .
text2: Si Jeova unninamegae mas yan mas , jago yan y famaguonñija .

text: Ye are blessed of the LORD which made heaven and earth .
text2: Jamyo manbinendise as Jeova ni y fumatinas y langet yan y tano .

text: The heaven , even the heavens , are the LORD ' s : but the earth hath he given to the children of men .
text2: Y langet sija ni y langet Jeova sija : lao y tano mannae para y famaguon y taotao sija .

text: The dead praise not the LORD , neither any that go down into silence .
text2: Y manmatae ti manmanalaba as Jeova , ni jaye güije gui manjajanao papa gui jalom y manmamatquiquiloja .

text: But we will bless the LORD from this time forth and for evermore . Praise the LORD .
text2: Lao jita , tabendise si Jeova , desde pago na tiempo mona yan para taejinecog . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: I love the LORD , because he hath heard my voice and my supplications .
text2: JUGUAEYA si Jeova sa jajungog y inagangjo yan y tinayuyutto sija .

text: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me , therefore will I call upon him as long as I live .
text2: Sa janaegueng y talangaña guiya guajo , enao mina na juaagangja güe mientras lâlâlâyo .

text: The sorrows of death compassed me , and the pains of hell gat hold upon me : I found trouble and sorrow .
text2: Y cuetdas y finatae umoriyayeyo , yan y piniten y naftan sumoda yo : ya jusoda chinatsaga yan triniste .

text: Then called I upon the name of the LORD ; O LORD , I beseech thee , deliver my soul .
text2: Ayo nae juagang y naan Jeova ; O Jeova , jugagagaojao , nalibre y antijo .

text: Gracious is the LORD , and righteous ; yea , our God is merciful .
text2: Guaeyayon si Jeova yan tunas ; junggan , y Yuusta senyoase .

text: The LORD preserveth the simple : I was brought low , and he helped me .
text2: Si Jeova jaadadaje y taeisao : guajo estaba macone tagpapa , yan güiya sumatbayo .

text: Return unto thy rest , O my soul ; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee .
text2: Talo guato gui descansomo , O antijo ; sa si Jeova uchalapon megae guiya jago .

text: For thou hast delivered my soul from death , mine eyes from tears , and my feet from falling .
text2: Sa unalibre y antijo guinin y finatae , y atadogco guinen y lagosija , yan y adengjo guinin y pinedong .

text: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living .
text2: Bae jufamocat gui menan Jeova gui tano y manlalala .

text: I believed , therefore have I spoken : I was greatly afflicted :
text2: Jujojonggue , enao mina jusangan sa estaba gosdangculo y pinitijo .

text: I said in my haste , All men are liars .
text2: Yleco gui chinadigco , todo y taotao sija mandacon .

text: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me ?
text2: Jafa juapase si Jeova pot todo y minaulegña guiya guajo .

text: I will take the cup of salvation , and call upon the name of the LORD .
text2: Bae juchule y copan satbasion , yan juagang y naan Jeova .

text: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people .
text2: Bae juapase y promesajo as Jeova , pago gui menan todo y taotaoña sija .

text: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints .
text2: Guaelaye gui linie Jeova , y finatae y mañantosña .

text: O LORD , truly I am thy servant ; I am thy servant , and the son of thine handmaid : thou hast loosed my bonds .
text2: O Jeova , magajet na guajo tentagomo ; guajo y tentagomo , yan y lajin y tentagomo palaoan : jago pumula y magodeco .

text: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving , and will call upon the name of the LORD .
text2: Bae juofrese jao ni y inefresen grasias , yan juaagang y naan Jeova .

text: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people ,
text2: Bae juapase y promesajo as Jeova , pago gui menan todo y taotaoña sija .

text: In the courts of the LORD ' s house , in the midst of thee , O Jerusalem . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Gui jalom y páteo y guima Jeova , gui talo guiya jago , O Jerusalem . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: O praise the LORD , all ye nations : praise him , all ye people .
text2: O fanmanalaba as Jeova , jamyo todo y nasion sija : fanmanalaba nu güiya jamyo todo y taotao sija .

text: For his merciful kindness is great toward us : and the truth of the LORD endureth for ever . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Sa y minaaseña dangculo guiya jita ; yan y minagajet Jeova gagaegue para taejinecog . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: O give thanks unto the LORD ; for he is good : because his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae gracias si Jeova ; sa güiya mauleg : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Let Israel now say , that his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Polo ya si Israel ilegña pago , na y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Let the house of Aaron now say , that his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Polo ya y guima Aaron ilegña pago , na y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Let them now that fear the LORD say , that his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Polo ya ayo sija y manmaañao pago as Jeova ilegñija , na minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: I called upon the LORD in distress : the LORD answered me , and set me in a large place .
text2: Juagang si Jeova gui chinatsagaco : ya si Jeova umopeyo , yan japoloyo güi dangculo na sagayan .

text: The LORD is on my side ; I will not fear : what can man do unto me ?
text2: Si Jeova para guajo ; ya ti jumaañao : jafa siña y taotao ufatinas guiya guajo .

text: The LORD taketh my part with them that help me : therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me .
text2: Si Jeova para guajo gui entalo güije sija y umayuyudayo : enao mina julie y dineseajo güije sija ni y chumatliiyo .
