text: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man .
text2: Mas mauleg umaangoco si Jeova qui umapolo y inangoco gui taotao .

text: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes .
text2: Mas mauleg umaangoco si Jeova qui umapolo y inangoco y prinsipe sija .

text: All nations compassed me about : but in the name of the LORD will I destroy them .
text2: Todo y nasion umoriyayeyo : lao pot y naan Jeova juutut sija .

text: They compassed me about ; yea , they compassed me about : but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them .
text2: Sija umoriyayeyo ; junggan , sija umoriyayeyo : lao pot y naan Jeova juutut sija .

text: They compassed me about like bees ; they are quenched as the fire of thorns : for in the name of the LORD I will destroy them .
text2: Sija umoriyayeyo taegüije y obeja sija ; sija manmapuno taegüije y guafen tituca : pot y naan Jeova na juutut sija .

text: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall : but the LORD helped me .
text2: Jago chumonegyo para jupodongyo , lao si Jeova umayudayo .

text: The LORD is my strength and song , and is become my salvation .
text2: Si Jeova y minetgotto yan y cantaco , yan güiya jumuyong y satbasionjo .

text: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous : the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly .
text2: Y inagang y minagof yan y satbasion gaegue gui jalom y tiendan y manunas : y agapa na canae Jeova fumatitinas y minatatnga .

text: The right hand of the LORD is exalted : the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly .
text2: Y agapa na canae Jeova majatsa julo ; y agapa na canae Jeova fumatitinas y minatatnga .

text: I shall not die , but live , and declare the works of the LORD .
text2: Ti jumatae , lao bae julâlâ , yan jusangan claro y checho Jeova sija .

text: The LORD hath chastened me sore : but he hath not given me over unto death .
text2: Si Jeova jacastigayo megae : lao ti janaeyo guato gui finatae .

text: Open to me the gates of righteousness : I will go into them , and I will praise the LORD :
text2: Babayeyo ni y trangcan tininas sija : ya bae jujalom guiya sija , bae junae grasias si Jeova .

text: This gate of the LORD , into which the righteous shall enter .
text2: Este na trangcan Jeova ; anae , manjajalom y manunas .

text: I will praise thee : for thou hast heard me , and art become my salvation .
text2: Guajo junae jao grasias : sa jago jagasja umopeyo , yan jago jumuyong y satbasionjo .

text: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner .
text2: guima , jumuyong mumagas na acho gui esquina .

text: This is the LORD ' s doing ; it is marvellous in our eyes .
text2: Este si Jeova chechoña ; ya namanman gui atadogta .

text: This is the day which the LORD hath made ; we will rejoice and be glad in it .
text2: Este na jaane si Jeova fumatinas ; tafanmagof yan tafansenmagof ni ayo .

text: Save now , I beseech thee , O LORD : O LORD , I beseech thee , send now prosperity .
text2: Satba pago , jugagagaojao , O Jeova : O Jeova , jugagagaojao , pago namannae minegae .

text: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the LORD : we have blessed you out of the house of the LORD .
text2: Dichoso ayo y mamamaela gui naan Jeova ; inbendisijao guinin y guima Jeova .

text: God is the LORD , which hath shewed us light : bind the sacrifice with cords , even unto the horns of the altar .
text2: Yuus si Jeova , guinin fumanuejit ny y inina : funot y inefresen ni y cuetdas asta gui canggelon y attat .

text: Thou art my God , and I will praise thee : thou art my God , I will exalt thee .
text2: Jago y Yuusso , yan bae junaejao grasias : jago y Yuusso , bae jujatsajao julo .

text: O give thanks unto the LORD ; for he is good : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae grasias si Jeova ; sa güiya mauleg : sa y minaaseña gagaegueja para taejinecog . Amen .

text: Blessed are the undefiled in the way , who walk in the law of the LORD .
text2: ALEPHMANDICHOSO ayo sija y mangabales gui chalan ni y manmamomocat segun y lay Jeova .

text: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies , and that seek him with the whole heart .
text2: Mandichoso ayo sija y umadadaje y testimonioña , yan y umaliligao güe contodo y corasonñija .

text: They also do no iniquity : they walk in his ways .
text2: Magajet na sija ti manmatitinas jafa ni ti tunas ; sija manjajanao gui jinanaoña sija .

text: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently .
text2: Guinin untagojamja ni y finanagüemo para inguesadaje sija .

text: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes !
text2: O mojon ya ufitme y jinanaojo sija , para juadaje y laymo .

text: Then shall I not be ashamed , when I have respect unto all thy commandments .
text2: Ya ayonae ti jumamajlao , yanguin esta jurespeta todo y tinagomo .

text: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart , when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments .
text2: Bae junaejao grasias , yan y tininas y corason , yanguin jueyag y tinas na juisiomo .

text: I will keep thy statutes : O forsake me not utterly .
text2: Bae juadaje y laymo ; chamoyo sumesendingo .

text: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way ? by taking heed thereto according to thy word .
text2: BETHPot jafa y patgon na laje nae unagasgas y jinanaoña ? Yanguin jaguesadaje jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: With my whole heart have I sought thee : O let me not wander from thy commandments .
text2: Jagasja jualiligaojao contodo y corasonjo ; chamoyo munaabag gui tinagomo sija .

text: Thy word have I hid in mine heart , that I might not sin against thee .
text2: Y sinanganmo junaatog gui jalom y corasonjo , para chajo umiisao contra jago .

text: Blessed art thou , O LORD : teach me thy statutes .
text2: Dichosojao O Jeova ; fanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth .
text2: Contodo y labiosso jagasja jusangan claro todo y juisio sija y pachotmo .

text: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies , as much as in all riches .
text2: magofyogui todo y güinaja sija .

text: I will meditate in thy precepts , and have respect unto thy ways .
text2: Bae jujaso y finanagüemo , ya jurespeta y jinanaomo sija .

text: I will delight myself in thy statutes : I will not forget thy word .
text2: Bae jumagofyo ni y laymo sija : ti jumalefa ni y sinanganmo .

text: Deal bountifully with thy servant , that I may live , and keep thy word .
text2: GIMELGuefayuda y tentagomo , para julâlâ ; ayonae juadaje y sinanganmo .

text: Open thou mine eyes , that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law .
text2: Baba y atadogco , ya julie y mannamanman sija gui tinagomo .

text: I am a stranger in the earth : hide not thy commandments from me .
text2: Guajo taotao juyongyo gui tano : chamo naaatog y tinagomo sija guiya guajo .

text: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times .
text2: Y antijo mayamag pot y minalagoña ni y guaja gui juisiomo sija todo y tiempo .

text: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed , which do err from thy commandments .
text2: Unlalatde y sobetbio sija ni y manmatdito , ni y manabag gui tinagomo sija .

text: Remove from me reproach and contempt ; for I have kept thy testimonies .
text2: Nafañuja guiya guajo y minamajlao , yan y dinespresia ; sa jagasja juadaje y testimoniomo .

text: Princes also did sit and speak against me : but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes .
text2: Y prinsipe sija locue manmatachong yan manguecuentos contra guajo : lao y tentagomo jajajasoja y laymo sija .

text: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors .
text2: Y testimoniomo y minagofjo sija yan y taotaojo na pápagat sija .

text: My soul cleaveth unto the dust : quicken thou me according to thy word .
text2: DALETHY antijo mafachet yan y petbos : nalâlâyo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: I have declared my ways , and thou heardest me : teach me thy statutes .
text2: Jusangan claro y jinanaojo sija , ya unopeyo : fanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts : so shall I talk of thy wondrous works .
text2: Natungoyo ni y chalan y finanagüemo sija ; ayo nae jusangan y namanman y chechomo sija .

text: My soul melteth for heaviness : strengthen thou me according unto thy word .
text2: Y antijo maderite sa macat ; nametgotyo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: Remove from me the way of lying : and grant me thy law graciously .
text2: Nasuja guiya guajo y chalan mandacon ; ya naeyo , pot y grasiasmo , y tinagomo .

text: I have chosen the way of truth : thy judgments have I laid before me .
text2: Jagasja juayeg y chalan y minagajet : y juisiomo jagasja jupolo gui menajo .

text: I have stuck unto thy testimonies : O LORD , put me not to shame .
text2: Jusisigue y testimoniomo sija : O Jeova , chamo namamamajlaoyo .

text: I will run the way of thy commandments , when thou shalt enlarge my heart .
text2: Bae jufalalagüe y chalan tinagomo sija , yanguin unnadangculo y corasonjo .

text: Teach me , O LORD , the way of thy statutes ; and I shall keep it unto the end .
text2: HEFanagüeyo , O Jeova , ni y chalan y laymo sija ; ya juadaje asta y uttimo .

text: Give me understanding , and I shall keep thy law ; yea , I shall observe it with my whole heart .
text2: Naeyo tiningo , ya bae juadaje y laymo : junggan bae juadaje contodo y corasonjo .

text: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments ; for therein do I delight .
text2: Nafalofanyo gui chalan y tinagomo , sa ayoyo nae mamagof .

text: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies , and not to covetousness .
text2: Namangag guato y corasonjo gui testimoniomo , ya munga gui linatga .

text: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity ; and quicken thou me in thy way .
text2: Bira y atadogco ni guinin manlilie banida ; ya nalâtâyo gui jinanaomo sija .

text: Stablish thy word unto thy servant , who is devoted to thy fear .
text2: Nafitme y sinanganmo gui tentagomo , ni y deboto nu jago .

text: Turn away my reproach which I fear : for thy judgments are good .
text2: Bira y minamajlaojo ni y janamaaañaoyo ; sa y juisiomo sija manmauleg .

text: Behold , I have longed after thy precepts : quicken me in thy righteousness .
text2: Liija na minajalangyo ni y finanagüemo sija : nalâlâyo gui tininasmo .

text: Let thy mercies come also unto me , O LORD , even thy salvation , according to thy word .
text2: VAUNamamaela locue y minaasemo guiya guajo , O Jeova , asta y satbasionmo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me : for I trust in thy word .
text2: Ayo nae uguaja para juope y munamamamajlaoyo ; sa juangocoyo ni y sinanganmo .

text: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth ; for I have hoped in thy judgments .
text2: Ya chamo todo chumuchule gui pachotto y sinangan y minagajetmo ; sa jagasja junangga y juisiomo .

text: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever .
text2: Ayo nae juadaje y laymo todo y tiempo , para taejinecog yan taejinecog .

text: And I will walk at liberty : for I seek thy precepts .
text2: Ya julibre jumanao ; sa jagasja jualigao y finanagüemo sija .

text: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings , and will not be ashamed .
text2: Ya bae jusangan locue y testimoniomo sija gui menan y ray sija , ya ti jumamajlao .

text: And I will delight myself in thy commandments , which I have loved .
text2: Ya bae jumagofyo gui tinagomo sija , ni y juguaeya .

text: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments , which I have loved ; and I will meditate in thy statutes .
text2: Bae jujatsa julo locue y canaejo sija gui tinagomo sija , ni y juguaeya ; ya bae jujaso y laymo sija .

text: Remember the word unto thy servant , upon which thou hast caused me to hope .
text2: ZAINJaso y sinangan gui tentagomo , ni y unfatinasyo na junangga .

text: This is my comfort in my affliction : for thy word hath quickened me .
text2: Este munamamagofyo gui trinisteco ; sa y sinanganmo jagasja munalâlâyo .

text: The proud have had me greatly in derision : yet have I not declined from thy law .
text2: Gogosmachatgüeyo ni y mansobetbio : lao trabia ti juabag guinin y laymo .

text: I remembered thy judgments of old , O LORD ; and have comforted myself .
text2: Jagasja jujajaso y juisiomo sija ni y guinin ampmam na tiempo , O Jeova , ya jagasja juconseulan maesayo .

text: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law .
text2: Jaguotyo y maepe na binibo , sa pot y manaelaye ni y madingo y laymo .

text: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage .
text2: Y lay sija cantaco sija gui guima anae taotao tumanoyo .

text: I have remembered thy name , O LORD , in the night , and have kept thy law .
text2: Jagasja jujajaso y naanmo , O Jeova qui puenge , ya juadadajeja y laymo .

text: This I had , because I kept thy precepts .
text2: Este guajayo , sa juadaje y finanagüemo .

text: Thou art my portion , O LORD : I have said that I would keep thy words .
text2: CHETHSi Jeova y patteco guinin jusangan na juadaje y sinanganmo sija .

text: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart : be merciful unto me according to thy word .
text2: Jugagao y finaboresemo contodo y corasonjo : magaease nu guajo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: I thought on my ways , and turned my feet unto thy testimonies .
text2: Jujaso gui jinanaojo sija , ya jubira y adengjo guato gui testimoniomo sija .

text: I made haste , and delayed not to keep thy commandments .
text2: Inalululayo , ya ti sumagayo , para juadaje y tinagomo sija .

text: The bands of the wicked have robbed me : but I have not forgotten thy law .
text2: Y cuetdas manaelaye jafunutyo ; lao ti malefayo ni y laymo .

text: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments .
text2: Bae jucajulo gui tatalopuenge , ya junaejao grasias , sa pot y tinas na juisiomo .

text: I am a companion of all them that fear thee , and of them that keep thy precepts .
text2: Guajo gachong ayo sija y manmaañao nu jago , yan ayo sija y umadadaje y finanagüemo .

text: The earth , O LORD , is full of thy mercy : teach me thy statutes .
text2: Y tano , O Jeova , bula ni y minaasemo : fanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant , O LORD , according unto thy word .
text2: TETHMauleg finatinasmo ni y tentagomo , O Jeova , jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: Teach me good judgment and knowledge : for I have believed thy commandments .
text2: Fanagüeyo mauleg na juisio yan tiningo : sa jagasja jujonggue y tinagomo .

text: Before I was afflicted I went astray : but now have I kept thy word .
text2: Antes di jutriste , umabagyo ; lao pago juadaje y sinanganmo .

text: Thou art good , and doest good ; teach me thy statutes .
text2: Jago maulegjao , ya unfatinas mauleg ; fanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: The proud have forged a lie against me : but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart .
text2: Y sobetbio jafatinas un dinague contra guajo : bae juadadajeja y finanagüemo sija contodo y corasonjo .

text: Their heart is as fat as grease ; but I delight in thy law .
text2: Y corasonñija , manmantica calang sebo : lao jumagofyo ni y laymo .

text: It is good for me that I have been afflicted ; that I might learn thy statutes .
text2: Mauleg para guajo , na guinin ninatristeyo ; para jueyag y laymo sija .

text: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver .
text2: Y lay y pachotmo , maulegña para guajo , qui ni mit na oro yan salape .

text: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me : give me understanding , that I may learn thy commandments .
text2: JODY canaemo sija fumatinasyo yan fumajechurayo ; naeyo tiningo , para jueyag y tinagomo sija .

text: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me ; because I have hoped in thy word .
text2: Ayo sija y manmaañao nu jago ujalieyo ya ufanmagof ; sa jagasja junangga y sinanganmo .

text: I know , O LORD , that thy judgments are right , and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me .
text2: O Jeova , jutungoja na y juisiomo tunas , yan pot y minagajetmo na unnatristeyo .

text: Let , I pray thee , thy merciful kindness be for my comfort , according to thy word unto thy servant .
text2: Polo jutayuyutjao ya y minauleg y minaasemo unamagofyo , jaftaemano y sinanganmo gui tentagomo .

text: Let thy tender mercies come unto me , that I may live : for thy law is my delight .
text2: Polo ya ufato guiya guajo y cariñoso na minaasemo sija , para ulâlâyo ; sa y tinagomo y minagofjo .

text: Let the proud be ashamed ; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause : but I will meditate in thy precepts .
text2: Polo ya manmamajlao y mansobetbio ; sa manapodong yo nu y dinague : lao jujajasoja y finanagüe sija .

text: Let those that fear thee turn unto me , and those that have known thy testimonies .
text2: Polo ya umabira iyaguajo ayo sija y manmaañao nu jago , yan sija ujatungo y testimonio sija .

text: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes ; that I be not ashamed .
text2: Polo ya fitme y corasonjo gui laymo , ya chajo mamamajlao .

text: My soul fainteth for thy salvation : but I hope in thy word .
text2: CAPHY antijo lalango pot y satbasionmo , lao junananggaja y sinanganmo .

text: Mine eyes fail for thy word , saying , When wilt thou comfort me ?
text2: Y atadogco ninalachae pot y sinanganmo mientras ileleco : Ngaean nae unconsuelayo .

text: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke ; yet do I not forget thy statutes .
text2: Sa jumuyongyo calang y boteya gui jalom aso ; lao trabia ti malelefayo ni y laymo sija .

text: How many are the days of thy servant ? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me ?
text2: Cuanto sija y jaanen y tentagomo ? Asta ngaean nae unjusga ayo sija y pumetsisigueyo ?

text: The proud have digged pits for me , which are not after thy law .
text2: Y mansobetbio manmanguadog joyo para guajo , ni y ti taegüije laymo .

text: All thy commandments are faithful : they persecute me wrongfully ; help thou me .
text2: Todo y tinagomo sija manunas : ayudayo sa sija mapetsisigueyo ni y dinague .

text: They had almost consumed me upon earth ; but I forsook not thy precepts .
text2: Canaja malalachaeyo gui jilo y tano ; lao ti judingo y finanagüemo sija .

text: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness ; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth .
text2: Nalâlâyo pot y cariñoso na güinaeyamo , ayo nae juadaje y testimonion pachotmo .

text: For ever , O LORD , thy word is settled in heaven .
text2: LAMEDO Jeova , para taejinecog y sinanganmo fitme gui langet .

text: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations : thou hast established the earth , and it abideth .
text2: Y minagajetmo gagaegue asta todo y generasion sija ; jago plumanta y tano ya sumaga .

text: They continue this day according to thine ordinances : for all are thy servants .
text2: Sija jasisigueja asta pago na jaane jaftaemano y otdenmo ; sa todos sija tentagomo .

text: Unless thy law had been my delights , I should then have perished in mine affliction .
text2: Yaguin ti jagas janamagofyo y laymo , jagas malingo ni y trinisteco .

text: I will never forget thy precepts : for with them thou hast quickened me .
text2: Ti jumalefa ni y finanagüemo sija para taejinecog : sa pot sija na unnalâlâyo .

text: I am thine , save me ; for I have sought thy precepts .
text2: Guajo iyomoyo , satbayo ; sa jualiligao y finanagüemo sija .

text: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me : but I will consider thy testimonies .
text2: Y manaelaye manananggayo para umayulang ; lao jugueguesjasoja y testimoniomo sija .

text: I have seen an end of all perfection : but thy commandment is exceeding broad .
text2: Guinin julie y uttimon y todo quinabales ; ya y tinagomo gosfeda .

text: O how love I thy law ! it is my meditation all the day .
text2: MEMO jafa muna juguaeyo y tinagomo ! esteja jinasosoco todot dia .

text: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies : for they are ever with me .
text2: Y tinagomo janafanungoñayo qui enemigujo sija ; sa sija siempre infanjajameja .

text: I have more understanding than all my teachers : for thy testimonies are my meditation .
text2: Megaeña tiningojo qui todo y maestronomo sija : sa y testimoniomo sija , y jinasojo .

text: I understand more than the ancients , because I keep thy precepts .
text2: Manungoñayo qui y manbijo ; sa juadadaje y finanagüemo sija .

text: I have refrained my feet from every evil way , that I might keep thy word .
text2: Junapara y adengjo guato gui todo chalan tinaelaye , para juadaje y sinangan .

text: I have not departed from thy judgments : for thou hast taught me .
text2: Ti jubirayo gui juisiomo : sa jagasja unfanagüeyo .

text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste ! yea , sweeter than honey to my mouth !
text2: Na minames y sinanganmo ni y chinaguijo , junggan mamesña qui y miet para y pachotto .

text: Through thy precepts I get understanding : therefore I hate every false way .
text2: Guinin y finanagüemo sija nae mañuleyo tiningo : enaomina juchatlie todo y chalan mandacon .

text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet , and a light unto my path .
text2: NUNY sinanganmo y candet para y adengjo , yan manana gui chalanjo .

text: I have sworn , and I will perform it , that I will keep thy righteous judgments .
text2: Manjulayo ya junafitme na juadaje y tinas na juisiomo sija .

text: I am afflicted very much : quicken me , O LORD , according unto thy word .
text2: Gospiniteyo ; nalâlâyo , O Jeova , jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: Accept , I beseech thee , the freewill offerings of my mouth , O LORD , and teach me thy judgments .
text2: O Jeova , jutatayuyut jao : chajlao y libren y inefresen pachotto sija , ya fanagüeyo ni y juisiomo .

text: My soul is continually in my hand : yet do I not forget thy law .
text2: Antijo siempre gaegue güi canaejo ; lao ti malelefayo ni y laymo .

text: The wicked have laid a snare for me : yet I erred not from thy precepts .
text2: Y manaelaye maplantayeyo laso ; lao ti sumujayo gui finanagüemo .

text: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever : for they are the rejoicing of my heart .
text2: Juchule erensiaco para siempre y testimoniomo sija ; sa sija y minagof y corasonjo .

text: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway , even unto the end .
text2: Jumangag y corasonjo para jucumple y laymo sija ; para taejinecog asta y uttimo .

text: I hate vain thoughts : but thy law do I love .
text2: SAMECHJuchatlie y mangaejinaso dobble : lao y tinagomo juguaeya .

text: Thou art my hiding place and my shield : I hope in thy word .
text2: Jago y fanatogco na lugat yan y patangjo : junanangga , y sinanganmo .

text: Depart from me , ye evildoers : for I will keep the commandments of my God .
text2: Fañuja guiya guajo jamyo ni y chumogüe manaelaye : para juadadaje y tinago Yuusso .

text: Uphold me according unto thy word , that I may live : and let me not be ashamed of my hope .
text2: Mantieneyo jaftaemano y sinanganmo , para julâlâ : ya chamoyo na mamamajlao ni y ninanggaco .

text: Hold thou me up , and I shall be safe : and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually .
text2: Mantieneyo ya juseguro : ya jurespeta y tinagomo sija siempre .

text: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes : for their deceit is falsehood .
text2: Unpolo pot taya todo ayo sija y manaba gui laymo : sa y finababañija taebale .

text: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross : therefore I love thy testimonies .
text2: Unnafañuja todo ayo sija y manaelaye gui tano calang basula : enao mina juguaeya y testimoniomo sija .

text: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee ; and I am afraid of thy judgments .
text2: Y catneco lalaolao pot y maañaoña nu jago : ya maañaoyo ni y juisiomo sija .

text: I have done judgment and justice : leave me not to mine oppressors .
text2: AINJufatinas juisio yan tininas : chamoyo dumidingo gui minafañatsagayo .

text: Be surety for thy servant for good : let not the proud oppress me .
text2: Jago unaseguro y tentagomo para mauleg ; chamo pumópolo y sobetbio na unachatsagayo .

text: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation , and for the word of thy righteousness .
text2: y atadogco yafae pot y satbasionmo , yan pot y tinas na sinanganmo .

text: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy , and teach me thy statutes .
text2: Fatinas gui tentagomo jaftaemano y minaasemo , yan fanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: I am thy servant ; give me understanding , that I may know thy testimonies .
text2: Guajo tentagomoyo ; naeyo tiningo , ya jutungo y tinagomo sija .

text: It is time for thee , LORD , to work : for they have made void thy law .
text2: Esta tiempo para si Jeova ufachocho : na sija manataebale y laymo .

text: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold ; yea , above fine gold .
text2: Enao mina juguaeya y tinagomo sija , mas qui y oro , junggan , mas qui y fino na oro .

text: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right ; and I hate every false way .
text2: Enao mina junaguaelaye todo y finanagüemo sa tunas pot todo güinaja : ya juchatlie y cada chalan dacon .

text: Thy testimonies are wonderful : therefore doth my soul keep them .
text2: PEY tinagomo sija mannámanman : enao mina maninadadaje ni y antijo .

text: The entrance of thy words giveth light ; it giveth understanding unto the simple .
text2: Y binaban y sinanganmo numae manana : jananae tinagoña y manaetiningo .

text: I opened my mouth , and panted : for I longed for thy commandments .
text2: Juguefbaba y pachotto , ya sumuspirosyo : sa majalangyo ni y tinagomo sija .

text: Look thou upon me , and be merciful unto me , as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name .
text2: Birajao guiya guajo , y unmaase nu guajo , taegüije y costumbremo ni unfatinas ni ayo sija ni gumaeya y naanmo .

text: Order my steps in thy word : and let not any iniquity have dominion over me .
text2: Naregla y pinecatto ni y sinanganmo : ya chamo na fangagae ninasiña y jafa na isao guiya guajo .

text: Deliver me from the oppression of man : so will I keep thy precepts .
text2: Nalibreyo gui chiniguet y taotao , ayo nae juadaje y finanagüemo .

text: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant ; and teach me thy statutes .
text2: Nafanina y matamo gui jilo y tentagomo ; ya unfanagüeyo ni y laymo .

text: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes , because they keep not thy law .
text2: Janom sadog manmalalago papa gui atadogco sija sa sija ti maadaje y tinagomo .

text: Righteous art thou , O LORD , and upright are thy judgments .
text2: TZADETunasjao , O Jeova , yan tunas y juisiomo sija .

text: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful .
text2: Jagasja untago y testimoniomo sija gui tininas , yan minagajetja .

text: My zeal hath consumed me , because mine enemies have forgotten thy words .
text2: Y inigojo jalachaeyo , sa y contrariujo sija manmalefa ni y sinanganmo sija .

text: Thy word is very pure : therefore thy servant loveth it .
text2: Y sinanganmo sengasgas : enao mina jaguaeya y tentagomo .

text: I am small and despised : yet do not I forget thy precepts .
text2: Diquiqueyo , ya madespresiayo , lao ti malelefayo ni y finanagüemo sija .

text: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness , and thy law is the truth .
text2: Y tininasmo taejinecog na tininas ya y tinagomo minagajet .

text: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me : yet thy commandments are my delights .
text2: Chinatsaga yan pinite sumodayo : lao y tinagomo sija minagofjo .

text: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting : give me understanding , and I shall live .
text2: Y testimoniomo sija manunas para taejinecog : naeyo tiningo ya julâlâ .

text: I cried with my whole heart ; hear me , O LORD : I will keep thy statutes .
text2: KOPHUmaagangyo contodo y corasonjo ; opeyo , O Jeova ; bae juadaje y laymo sija .

text: I cried unto thee ; save me , and I shall keep thy testimonies .
text2: Jagasja juagangjao ; satbayo , ya juadaje y testimoniomo sija .

text: I prevented the dawning of the morning , and cried : I hoped in thy word .
text2: Taftafñayo qui y egaan ya umagangyo : junangga guiya jago .

text: Mine eyes prevent the night watches , that I might meditate in thy word .
text2: Y atadogco taftaña qui y bumela gui puenge para jujajasoja y sinanganmo .

text: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness : O LORD , quicken me according to thy judgment .
text2: Jungog y inagangjo jaftaemano y minauleg güinaeyamo : O Jeova , nalâlâyo , jaftaemano y juisiomo .

text: They draw nigh that follow after mischief : they are far from thy law .
text2: Manjijot ayo sija y tumatitiye y tinaelaye : sija mañago gui tinagomo .

text: Thou art near , O LORD ; and all thy commandments are truth .
text2: Jago jijot jao , O Jeova ; yan todo y tinagomo sija minagajet .

text: Concerning thy testimonies , I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever .
text2: Pot guinin ampmam na tiempo jutungo y testimoniomo sija , ni y unplanta sija para siempre .

text: Consider mine affliction , and deliver me : for I do not forget thy law .
text2: RESHJaso y trinisteco , ya nalibreyo ; sa ti malefayo ni y laymo .

text: Plead my cause , and deliver me : quicken me according to thy word .
text2: Plaitea y causaco , ya nalibreyo ni apasmo : nalâlâyo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: Salvation is far from the wicked : for they seek not thy statutes .
text2: Chago y satbasion gui manaelaye , sa ti maaliligao y laymo sija .

text: Great are thy tender mercies , O LORD : quicken me according to thy judgments .
text2: Dangculo y cariñoso na minaasemo , O Jeova , nalâlâyo jaftaemano y juisiomo sija .

text: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies ; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies .
text2: Megae pumetsisigueyo yan contrariujo ; lao ti sumususujayo gui testimoniomo sija .

text: I beheld the transgressors , and was grieved ; because they kept not thy word .
text2: Julie y fumatinas dinague , ya tristeyo , sa ti maadaje y sinanganmo .

text: Consider how I love thy precepts : quicken me , O LORD , according to thy lovingkindness .
text2: Jaso jafa muna juguaeya y finanagüemo sija : nalâlâyo , O Jeova , jaftaemano y munamauleg güinaeyamo .

text: Thy word is true from the beginning : and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever .
text2: Y resumen sinanganmo minagajet ; ya cada uno tunas na juisiomo sija gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Princes have persecuted me without a cause : but my heart standeth in awe of thy word .
text2: SHINY prinsipe sija mapetsisigueyo sin causa : lao y corasonjo maaañaoja ni y sinanganmo .

text: I rejoice at thy word , as one that findeth great spoil .
text2: Jumagofyo ni y sinanganmo , taegüije y manmañoda dangculo na inamot .

text: I hate and abhor lying : but thy law do I love .
text2: Jugoschatlie ya juingin y dinague ; lao y laymo juguaeya .

text: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments .
text2: Siete maje gui un jaane jualabajao , sa pot y tinas na juisiomo .

text: Great peace have they which love thy law : and nothing shall offend them .
text2: Dangculo na pas guaja para ayo sija y gumaeya y laymo , ya taya lugatñija para ufanmatompo .

text: LORD , I have hoped for thy salvation , and done thy commandments .
text2: O Jeova , jagasja junangga y satbasionmo , ya esta juchogüe y tinagomo sija .

text: My soul hath kept thy testimonies ; and I love them exceedingly .
text2: Y antijo esta jaadaje y tinagomo sija : ya sija mangosyajo .

text: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies : for all my ways are before thee .
text2: Esta juadaje y finanagüemo sija yan y testimoniomo sija ; sa todo y jinanaojo mangaegue gui menamo .

text: Let my cry come near before thee , O LORD : give me understanding according to thy word .
text2: TAUPolo ya y inagangjo ufato jijot gui menamo , O Jeova : naeyo tiningojo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: Let my supplication come before thee : deliver me according to thy word .
text2: Polo y tinayuyutto ya ufato gui menamo : nalibreyo jaftaemano y sinanganmo .

text: My lips shall utter praise , when thou hast taught me thy statutes .
text2: Polo y labiosso ya umasangan alabansa sija ; sa unfanagüeyo ni y laymo sija .

text: My tongue shall speak of thy word : for all thy commandments are righteousness .
text2: Polo ya y jilajo ucanta y sinanganmo : sa todo y tinagomo manunas .

text: Let thine hand help me ; for I have chosen thy precepts .
text2: Polo ya ulisto y canaemo para uinayudayo ; sa y tinagomo jagasja juayeg .

text: I have longed for thy salvation , O LORD ; and thy law is my delight .
text2: Jagasja majalangyo ni y satbasionmo , O Jeova : ya y laymo minagofjo .

text: Let my soul live , and it shall praise thee ; and let thy judgments help me .
text2: Palo ya ulâlâ y antijo , ya ualabajao : polo ya juisiomo sija uinayudayo .

text: I have gone astray like a lost sheep ; seek thy servant ; for I do not forget thy commandments .
text2: Juabagyo , parejo yan y malingo na quinilo : aligao y tentagomo ; sa ti malelefayo ni y tiningomo sija .

text: In my distress I cried unto the LORD , and he heard me .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . JUAGANG si Jeova gui anae chatsagayo , ya jaopeyo .

text: Deliver my soul , O LORD , from lying lips , and from a deceitful tongue .
text2: Nalibre y antijo , O Jeova , gui mandacon na labios , yan y mafáfababa na jula .

text: What shall be given unto thee ? or what shall be done unto thee , thou false tongue ?
text2: Jafa unmannae jao , pat jafa mas unmafatinas guiya jago y dacon : na jula ?

text: Sharp arrows of the mighty , with coals of juniper .
text2: Y cadidug y flechan y matatnga , yan y pinigan gago .

text: Woe is me , that I sojourn in Mesech , that I dwell in the tents of Kedar !
text2: Ae ae guajo , ni taotao tumanoyo guiya Meseg , ya sumagayo gui tiendan Kedar .

text: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace .
text2: Y antijo sumaga apmam , yan ayo y chumatlie y pas .

text: I am for peace : but when I speak , they are for war .
text2: Guajo para pas , lao , anae cumuentosyo , sija para guera .

text: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills , from whence cometh my help .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . JUJATSA julo y atadogco gui sabana : guinin mamano mague y umayuyudayo ?

text: My help cometh from the LORD , which made heaven and earth .
text2: Y umayuyudayo guinin as Jeova , ni y fumatinas y langet yan y tano .

text: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved : he that keepeth thee will not slumber .
text2: Ti upolo y adengmo na umanacalamten : ayo y umadadajejao ti umatujog .

text: Behold , he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep .
text2: Estagüe , y umadadaje Israel ti umatujog ni ti umaego .

text: The LORD is thy keeper : the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand .
text2: Si Jeova y umadadajejao : si Jeova nujongmo gui agapa na canaemo .

text: The sun shall not smite thee by day , nor the moon by night .
text2: Y atdao ti unninasague gui jaane , ni y pilan gui puenge .

text: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil : he shall preserve thy soul .
text2: Si Jeova uninadaje gui todo tinaelaye : güiya uadaje y antimo .

text: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth , and even for evermore .
text2: Si Jeova uninadaje yan jumujuyongjao yan jumajalomjao , desde pago na tiempo yan para taejinecog .

text: I was glad when they said unto me , Let us go into the house of the LORD .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . MAGOFYO anae ilegñija nu guajo , nije tafanmalag y guima Jeova .

text: Our feet shall stand within thy gates , O Jerusalem .
text2: Y adengta ufanojgue gui jalom y trangcamo , O Jerusalem .

text: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together :
text2: Jerusalem , mafatinas jago calang y siuda ni y mafatinas mafnot :

text: Whither the tribes go up , the tribes of the LORD , unto the testimony of Israel , to give thanks unto the name of the LORD .
text2: Sa ayo nae mangajulo y tribosija , magajet na y tribon y Jeova , pot y testimonio guiya Israel , para ujanae grasias y naan Jeova .

text: For there are set thrones of judgment , the thrones of the house of David .
text2: Sa ayonae mapolo y trono sija para ufanmanjusga , y trono sija gui guima David .

text: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem : they shall prosper that love thee .
text2: Fanmanayuyut para upas iyon Jerusalem : sa mumegae ayo sija y gumaeyajao .

text: Peace be within thy walls , and prosperity within thy palaces .
text2: Pas ugaegue gui jalom y quelatmo , yan guinefsaga gui jalom palasyomo .

text: For my brethren and companions ' sakes , I will now say , Peace be within thee .
text2: Pot causan y mañelujo yan y mangachongjo , jualog pago : Pas ugaegue gui sanjalommo .

text: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good .
text2: Pot causan guma Jeova Yuusso nae jualigao y minaulegmo .

text: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes , O thou that dwellest in the heavens .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . YYAJAGO nae jujatsa y atadogco , O jago ni y matatachong gui langet sija .

text: Behold , as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters , and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress ; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God , until that he have mercy upon us .
text2: Estagüe , parejo yan y atadog tentago sija ni y jaaatan y canae y amuñija , yan y atadog sija y palaoan jaaatan y canae y amafia ; parejoja y atadogmame jaaatan locue si Jeova Yuusmame , asta qui ugaemaase nu jame .

text: Have mercy upon us , O LORD , have mercy upon us : for we are exceedingly filled with contempt .
text2: Gaease nu jame , O Jeova , gaease nu jame : sa guesmanbulajam ni y iningen .

text: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease , and with the contempt of the proud .
text2: Y antita senbula ni y binitlean ayo sija y taepinite , yan y denespresian y mansobetbio .

text: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side , now may Israel say ;
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo ; iyon David . YANGUIN si Jeova ti guinin estaba gui bandata , pago Israel ualog ;

text: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side , when men rose up against us :
text2: Yanguin si Jeova ti guinin estaba gui bandata , anae y taotao sija mangajulo contra jita :

text: Then they had swallowed us up quick , when their wrath was kindled against us :
text2: Ayo nae japañotjit lalâlâ , yanguin mangosbubu contra jita .

text: Then the waters had overwhelmed us , the stream had gone over our soul :
text2: Ayo nae janafanmachuchudajit y janom , yan y diquique na sadog malofan gui jilo y antita :

text: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul .
text2: Ayo nae y mansobetbio na janom manmalofan gui jilo y antita .

text: Blessed be the LORD , who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth .
text2: Dichoso si Jeova , sa ti mannae nu jita para güinaja y nifenñija .

text: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers : the snare is broken , and we are escaped .
text2: Y antijo umescapa taegüije y pajaro yan umescapa güe gui lason y tiradot : magtos y laso , ya manescapajam .

text: Our help is in the name of the LORD , who made heaven and earth .
text2: Y naan Jeova umayuyudajam , ni y fumatinas y langet yan y tano .

text: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion , which cannot be removed , but abideth for ever .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . TODO ayo y umangogoco sija gui as Jeova ufanaegüije y egso Sion , ni y ti siña manacalamten , ya usaga para taejinecog .

text: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem , so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever .
text2: Taemanoja y egso sija gui oriyan Jerusalem , taegüijeja si Jeova gui oriyan y taotaoña sija , desde pago para taejinecog .

text: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous ; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity .
text2: Sa y baran y manaelaye ti usaga gui jilo y fottuna y manunas ; sa noseaja ujajuto mona canaeñija y manunas gui tinaelaye .

text: Do good , O LORD , unto those that be good , and to them that are upright in their hearts .
text2: Fatinas mauleg güije sija gui manmauleg , O Jeova , yan ayo sija y manunas corasonñija .

text: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways , the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity : but peace shall be upon Israel .
text2: Lao ayo sija y bumira sija ya malag y echong na chalanñija , si Yuus ufaninesgaejon yan ayo sija y manmamatitinas tinaelaye . Pas ugaegue guiya Israel .

text: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion , we were like them that dream .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . ANAE jabira talo si Jeova y quinautiba iyon Sion , manparejojit yan ayo sija y manmangüife .

text: Then was our mouth filled with laughter , and our tongue with singing : then said they among the heathen , The LORD hath done great things for them .
text2: Ayonae y pachotto bula chinaleg , ya y jilata canta : ya ayonae ujaalog gui entalo y nasion sija : si Jeova jafatinas dangculo na güinaja para sija .

text: The LORD hath done great things for us ; whereof we are glad .
text2: Si Jeova jafatinas dangculo na güinaja para jita ; enaomina tafanmagof .

text: Turn again our captivity , O LORD , as the streams in the south .
text2: Bira talo y quinautibanmame , O Jeova , taegüije y sadog gui sumanjaya .

text: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy .
text2: Ayo sija y manmananom yan lago : ufanmangoco yan minagof .

text: He that goeth forth and weepeth , bearing precious seed , shall doubtless come again with rejoicing , bringing his sheaves with him .
text2: Achogja jumajanao mona ya tuma tanges , mañuñule bonito na semiya ; ufato talo yan y minagofña , jachuchuleja y manojon quinecoña .

text: Except the LORD build the house , they labour in vain that build it : except the LORD keep the city , the watchman waketh but in vain .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo ; iyon Salomon . YANGUIN ti si Jeova y jumatsa y guima , taebale y finatinasñija y manmachocho : yanguin ti si Jeova y umadaje y siuda , y guatdia magmamataja lao taebale .

text: It is vain for you to rise up early , to sit up late , to eat the bread of sorrows : for so he giveth his beloved sleep .
text2: Taebale y uncajulo taftaf , ya undescansa atrasao , ya uncano y pan pinite : sa jananaeja ni y güinaeyaña y mamaego .

text: Lo , children are an heritage of the LORD : and the fruit of the womb is his reward .
text2: Estagüe , y famaguon erensian Jeova : ya yi tinegcha y tiyan , apasiña .

text: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man ; so are children of the youth .
text2: Jaftaemanoja y flecha gui canae y matatnga na taotao ; taegüijeja locue y famaguon y manpatgon .

text: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them : they shall not be ashamed , but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate .
text2: Magof y taotao yanguin bula y questat y flechaña nu sija : ti ufanmamajlao , lao ufanguentos yan y enemigo sija gui trangca .

text: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD ; that walketh in his ways .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . DICHOSO ayo y maañao as Jeova ; ni y mamomocat , gui chalanña sija .

text: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands : happy shalt thou be , and it shall be well with thee .
text2: Sa uncano y finachocho y canaemo : siempre unmagof yan umauleg para jago .

text: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house : thy children like olive plants round about thy table .
text2: Y asaguamo utaegüije y trongcon ubas ni y bula tinegcha gui jalom guimamo : y famaguonmo manparejo yan y tinanom olibo gui oriyan y lamasamo .

text: Behold , that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD .
text2: Estagüe , taegüijeja y bendisionña ni y maañao as Jeova .

text: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion : and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life .
text2: Si Jeova ubinendisejao gui Sion ; ya unlie y minauleg guiya Jerusalem todo y jaanin y linâlâmo .

text: Yea , thou shalt see thy children ' s children , and peace upon Israel .
text2: Magajet na unlie y famaguon y famaguonmo . Pas ugaegue guiya Israel .

text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth , may Israel now say :
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . MEGAE na tiempo nae manapiniteyo desde y pinatgonjo : polo ya ualog Israel pago :

text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth : yet they have not prevailed against me .
text2: Megae na tiempo nae manapiniteyo desde y pinatgonjo : lao trabia ti mangana ni y ninasiñañija contra guajo .

text: The plowers plowed upon my back : they made long their furrows .
text2: Y manmanalado jaalado gui jilo y tatalojo : janafananaco y sutcoñija .

text: The LORD is righteous : he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked .
text2: Si Jeova tunaegüe : güiya umutut y cuetdas y manaelaye .

text: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion .
text2: Polo ya ufanmamajlao todo ayo y bumira sija tate , todo sija y chumatlie Sion .

text: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops , which withereth afore it groweth up :
text2: Polo ya ufantaegüije y chaguan gui jilo guma , ni y anglo antes di udoco :

text: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand ; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom .
text2: Ya chaña y manuutut chaguan munabubula y canaeña , ni y pechonña y manmanonojo .

text: Neither do they which go by say , The blessing of the LORD be upon you : we bless you in the name of the LORD .
text2: Ni ujaalog ayo sija y manmalolofan , Y bendision Jeova usaga gui jilomo ; jame bumendise jao pot y naan Jeova .

text: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee , O LORD .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . Y sumanjiyong y tinadong nae juagang jao , O Jeova .

text: Lord , hear my voice : let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications .
text2: Jeova , ecungog y inagangjo : polo ya talangamo sija uegueng gui inagang y guinagaojo .

text: If thou , LORD , shouldest mark iniquities , O Lord , who shall stand ?
text2: Yanguin mojon unmatca y tinaelaye sija ; Jeova , jaye utojgüe ?

text: But there is forgiveness with thee , that thou mayest be feared .
text2: Lao guaja inasie guiya jago , para unmamaañagüe .

text: I wait for the LORD , my soul doth wait , and in his word do I hope .
text2: Junanangga si Jeova , y antijo mannanangga , ya y sinanganña junanangga .

text: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning : I say , more than they that watch for the morning .
text2: Y antijo jananangga si Jeova , mas qui y guatdia sija ni manmannanangga y egaan : magajet na mas qui y guatdia sija manmannananangga y egaan .

text: Let Israel hope in the LORD : for with the LORD there is mercy , and with him is plenteous redemption .
text2: O Israel nangga si Jeova ; sa gui as Jeova guaja minaase , ya iya guiya nae megae na inalibre .

text: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities .
text2: Ya güiya unalibre Israel todo gui tinaelayeña .

text: LORD , my heart is not haughty , nor mine eyes lofty : neither do I exercise myself in great matters , or in things too high for me .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo ; iyon David . JEOVA , ti sobetbio y corasojo , ni ti taglajiyon y atadogco : ni comequegaechecho yo ni y dangculo na güinaja ; ni mas ninámanman para guajo .

text: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself , as a child that is weaned of his mother : my soul is even as a weaned child .
text2: Magajet na jufamatquilo yo yan junaquietoyo ; taegüije y patgon yan ninasusu as nanaña : y antijo guiya guajo parejo yan y patgon ni y sumususu .

text: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever .
text2: O Israel nangga si Jeova , desde pago ya para taejinecog .

text: LORD , remember David , and all his afflictions :
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . JEOVA jaso para si David , todo y trinisteña ;

text: How he sware unto the LORD , and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob ;
text2: Jaftaemano na manjula gui as Jeova yan japromete y Gaesisiña gui as Jacob ;

text: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house , nor go up into my bed ;
text2: Magajet na ti jujalom gui tabetnaculon y guimajo , ni jufalag gui camajo :

text: I will not give sleep to mine eyes , or slumber to mine eyelids ,
text2: Ti junamatujog y atadogco ; ni junamaego y lasas y atadogco ,

text: Until I find out a place for the LORD , an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob .
text2: Asta qui jusodayo y lugat para si Jeova , y tabetnaculo para y Gaesisiña gui as Jacob .

text: Lo , we heard of it at Ephratah : we found it in the fields of the wood .
text2: Estagüe na injingog masangangüe guiya Efrata ya inseda gui fangualuan qui jalomtano .

text: We will go into his tabernacles : we will worship at his footstool .
text2: Infanjalom gui tabetnaculuña : inadora gui menan y fañajangan adengña .

text: Arise , O LORD , into thy rest ; thou , and the ark of thy strength .
text2: Cajulo , O Jeova , gui lugat y descansomo : jago yan y atcan y minetgotmo .

text: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness ; and let thy saints shout for joy .
text2: Polo y mamalemo sija ya ufanminagago ni y tininas : ya y mañantosmo sija ufanagang ni y minagof .

text: For thy servant David ' s sake turn not away the face of thine anointed .
text2: Pot y naan y tentagomo as David , chamo bumibira y matan y pinalaemo .

text: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David ; he will not turn from it ; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne .
text2: Si Jeova manjula minagajet gui as , David ; ti ubira güe ; y tinegcha y tataotaomo , juplanta gui jilo tronumo .

text: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them , their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore .
text2: Yaguin jaadaje y famaguonmo y tratujo , yan y testimoniojo ni y jufanagüe sija , asta y famaguonñija locue ufanmatachong gui tronumo para taejinecog .

text: For the LORD hath chosen Zion ; he hath desired it for his habitation .
text2: Sa si Jeova guinin jaayeg Sion ; este jadesea para sagaña .

text: This is my rest for ever : here will I dwell ; for I have desired it .
text2: Este y lugat y descansoco para taejinecog : este nae jusaga ; sa este judesea .

text: I will abundantly bless her provision : I will satisfy her poor with bread .
text2: Bae jubendise dangculo y prebensionña : ya bae junafannajong y mamobleña ni y pan .

text: I will also clothe her priests with salvation : and her saints shall shout aloud for joy .
text2: Junafanminagago locue y mamaleña sija ni y satbasion : yan y mañantosña sija ufanagang managang ni y minagof .

text: There will I make the horn of David to bud : I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed .
text2: Ayonae junadoco y canggelon David : guinin jufamauleg y candit para y pinalaejo .

text: His enemies will I clothe with shame : but upon himself shall his crown flourish .
text2: Bae junafanminagago y enemiguña sija ni y minamajlao ; lao y jiloña nae unamagas y coronaña .

text: Behold , how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity !
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo ; iyon David . ESTAGÜE , jafa munamauleg , yan jafa munamagof y mañelo ufañaga mañisija gui unoja .

text: It is like the precious ointment upon the head , that ran down upon the beard , even Aaron ' s beard : that went down to the skirts of his garments ;
text2: Este parejo yan y mauleg na laña gui ilo , ni y mimilalag gui batbas , asta y batbas Aaron ; ya jumajnanao papa asta y cueyon magaguña ;

text: As the dew of Hermon , and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion : for there the LORD commanded the blessing , even life for evermore .
text2: Taegüije serenon Hermon , ni y mamopodong gui jilo ogso guiya Sion ; sa ayo nae mañago si Jeova y bendision , güiya taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: Behold , bless ye the LORD , all ye servants of the LORD , which by night stand in the house of the LORD .
text2: Y Cantan Quinajulo . ESTAGÜE , fanmanbendise as Jeova , todo jamyo ni y tentago Jeova , ni y manotojgue gui jalom y guima Jeova gui puenge .

text: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary , and bless the LORD .
text2: Jatsa julo y canaemiyo gui sinantos na sagayan , ya fanmanbendise jamyo as Jeova .

text: The LORD that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion .
text2: Si Jeova ni y fumatinas y langet yan y tano , bumendise jao guiya Sion .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Praise ye the name of the LORD ; praise him , O ye servants of the LORD .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Fanmanalaba jamyo y naan Jeova : fanmanalaba güe , O jamyo , ni y tentago Jeova sija .

text: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD , in the courts of the house of our God ,
text2: Jamyo ni y manotojgue gui jalom guma Jeova , y jalom pateo y guimayuus .

text: Praise the LORD ; for the LORD is good : sing praises unto his name ; for it is pleasant .
text2: Fanmanalaba as Jeova ; sa si Jeova mauleg güe : fanganta y alabansa sija ni y naanña ; sa magof este .

text: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself , and Israel for his peculiar treasure .
text2: Sa si Jeova jaayeg si Jacob para güiya , ya Israel para y güinajañaja namaesa .

text: For I know that the LORD is great , and that our Lord is above all gods .
text2: Sa jutungo na si Jeova dangculo güe : ya y Señotta taquiloña qui todo y Yuus .

text: Whatsoever the LORD pleased , that did he in heaven , and in earth , in the seas , and all deep places .
text2: Jafaja y malagoña si Jeova , esteja jafatinas , gui langet yan y tano , yan y tase , yan todo y manadong na lugat .

text: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth ; he maketh lightnings for the rain ; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries .
text2: Janafangajujulo y asgon sija guinin y uttimon y tano ; janalalamlam para uuchan ; janachinile y manglo gui güinajaña .

text: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt , both of man and beast .
text2: Ni y janalamen y finenana na finañago guiya Egipto , todo y taotao yan y gâgâ .

text: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee , O Egypt , upon Pharaoh , and upon all his servants .
text2: Ya manago señat sija yan mannamanman gui talo guiya jago , O Egipto : gui as Faraon yan todo y tentagoña .

text: Who smote great nations , and slew mighty kings ;
text2: Ya janalamen y mandangculo na nasion , yan japuno y manmatatñga na ray sija .

text: Sihon king of the Amorites , and Og king of Bashan , and all the kingdoms of Canaan :
text2: Si Sehón ray y Amorreo yan si Og ray Basán , yan todo y raeno sija guiya Cananea :

text: And gave their land for an heritage , an heritage unto Israel his people .
text2: Ya mannae para erensia ni y tanoñija : para erensian y taotao na guiya Israel .

text: Thy name , O LORD , endureth for ever ; and thy memorial , O LORD , throughout all generations .
text2: Y naanmo O Jeova , gagaegue para taejinecog ; y majasomo , O Jeova , para todo y generasion sija .

text: For the LORD will judge his people , and he will repent himself concerning his servants .
text2: Sa si Jeova ujusga y taotaoña , ya ugaease ni y tentagoña sija .

text: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold , the work of men ' s hands .
text2: Y idolos y nasion sija , salape yan oro , y checho y canae y taotao sija .

text: They have mouths , but they speak not ; eyes have they , but they see not ;
text2: Guaja pachotñija , lao ti manguecuentos : guaja atadogñija , lao ti manmanlilie ;

text: They have ears , but they hear not ; neither is there any breath in their mouths .
text2: Guaja talangañija ; lao ti manmanjujungog ; ni uguaja jinagong gui pachotñija .

text: They that make them are like unto them : so is every one that trusteth in them .
text2: Ayo sija y fumatinas estesija ujafanparejoja yan sija : magajet na cada uno ni y umangoco sija ni ayosija .

text: Bless the LORD , O house of Israel : bless the LORD , O house of Aaron :
text2: O guma Israel , bendise si Jeova : O guma Aaron , bendise si Jeova .

text: Bless the LORD , O house of Levi : ye that fear the LORD , bless the LORD .
text2: O guma Levi , bendise si Jeova : jamyo ni y manmaañao as Jeova , bendise si Jeova .

text: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion , which dwelleth at Jerusalem . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Bendito si Jeova guinin Sion ni y sumaga guiya Jerusalem . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: O give thanks unto the LORD ; for he is good : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae si Jeova grasias ; sa güiya mauleg : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: O give thanks unto the God of gods : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae grasias y Yuus y yuus sija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: O give thanks to the Lord of lords : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae grasias y Señot y señot sija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him who alone doeth great wonders : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Para ayo y güiyaja namaesa fumatinas y dangculo namanman : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him that by wisdom made the heavens : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Para güiya ni y pot y tiningo jafatinas y langet : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Para güiya ni y jajuto y tano gui jilo janom sija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him that made great lights : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Para guiya ni y jafatinas y mandangculo na candet sija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: The sun to rule by day : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Y atdao para ufangobietna gui jaane : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: The moon and stars to rule by night : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Y pilan yan y pution sija para ufanmangobietna gui puenge : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Para güiya ni y munalamen Egipto gui finenana na finañagoñija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And brought out Israel from among them : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Ya jacone juyong Israel gui entaloñija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: With a strong hand , and with a stretched out arm : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Yan y metgot na jataf canae yan y canae na majala : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him which divided the Red sea into parts : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Para güiya ni y japatten dos y Tasen Agaga : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Ya janafalofan Israel gui entaloña : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Ya jayute si Faraon yan todo y sendaluña sija gui Tasen Agaga : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him which led his people through the wilderness : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Para güiya ni y jaosgaejon y taotaoña y inanaco y desierto : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: To him which smote great kings : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Para güiya ni y janalamen y mandangculo na ray sija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And slew famous kings : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Yan japuno y mangaeninasiña sija na ray : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Sihon king of the Amorites : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Si Sehón ray y Amorreo : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And Og the king of Bashan : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Yan si Og ray Basán : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And gave their land for an heritage : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Ya mannae erensia ni y tanoñija : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Magajet na para erensian y tentagoña guiya Israel : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Who remembered us in our low estate : for his mercy endureth for ever :
text2: Ni y jajasojit gui managpapata : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: And hath redeemed us from our enemies : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Ya janalibrejit gui coutrariuta : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: Who giveth food to all flesh : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: Ni y mannae nengcano para todo y catne : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: O give thanks unto the God of heaven : for his mercy endureth for ever .
text2: O nae grasias y Yuus y langet : sa y minaaseña gagaegue para taejinecog .

text: By the rivers of Babylon , there we sat down , yea , we wept , when we remembered Zion .
text2: Y oriyan y sadog Babilonia nae infanmatachong , magajet na manangesjit yanguin injaso Sion .

text: We hanged our harps upon the willows in the midst thereof .
text2: Incana y atpanmame gui trongcon sauses gui entaloña güije .

text: For there they that carried us away captive required of us a song ; and they that wasted us required of us mirth , saying , Sing us one of the songs of Zion .
text2: Sa güije ayo sija y cumonejit , jatagojit na tafanganta : ya ayo sija y lumachaejit , jatagojit na tafanmagof , ilegñija : Cantayejit uno ni y cantan Sion .

text: How shall we sing the LORD ' s song in a strange land ?
text2: Jaftaemano incanta y cantan Jeova gui ti tanomame ?

text: If I forget thee , O Jerusalem , let my right hand forget her cunning .
text2: Yanguin malefayo nu jago , O Jerusalem ! polo ya umalefa y agapa na canaejo ni y tiningoña .

text: If I do not remember thee , let my tongue cleave to the roof of my mouth ; if I prefer not Jerusalem above my chief joy .
text2: Yanguin ti jujaso jao , polo ya unacheton y jilajo gui paladatto ; yanguin ti juguaeyajao , Jerusalem , mas qui y prinsipat na minagofjo .

text: Remember , O LORD , the children of Edom in the day of Jerusalem ; who said , Rase it , rase it , even to the foundation thereof .
text2: Jaso O Jeova contra y famaguon Edom gui jaanin Jerusalem ; ni ilegñija : Funas , funas asta y simientoña .

text: O daughter of Babylon , who art to be destroyed ; happy shall he be , that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us .
text2: O jagan Babilonia ni y para unmayulang ; umagof ayo y para uninapase taegüije ni y unsetbejam .

text: Happy shall he be , that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones .
text2: Umagof ayo , y uquenene na uyinite y famaguonmo contra y acho .

text: I will praise thee with my whole heart : before the gods will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Y Salmon David . BAE junae jao grasias contodo y corasonjo : gui menan yuus sija , jucantaye jao ni y alabansa sija .

text: I will worship toward thy holy temple , and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth : for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name .
text2: Jufanadora para y santos na templomo , ya junae y naanmo grasias pot y cariñoso na güinaeyamo , yan pot y minagajetmo : sa unnadangculo y sinanganmo mas qui y naanmo .

text: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me , and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul .
text2: Y jaane anae juagang , jago umopeyo , ya unanimayo , ni y minetgot y antijo .

text: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee , O LORD , when they hear the words of thy mouth .
text2: Todo y ray gui tano unmannae jao grasias , O Jeova , sa jagasja majungog y sinangan y pachotmo .

text: Yea , they shall sing in the ways of the LORD : for great is the glory of the LORD .
text2: Magajet na ufanganta ni y chalan Jeova ; sa dangculo y minalag Jeova .

text: Though the LORD be high , yet hath he respect unto the lowly : but the proud he knoweth afar off .
text2: Masquesea taquilo si Jeova , lao jarespetaja y managpapa : lao y sobetbio jatungoja desde y chago .

text: Though I walk in the midst of trouble , thou wilt revive me : thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies , and thy right hand shall save me .
text2: Masquesea mamocatyo gui entalo y chinatsaga , unnalâlâyo : unestira mona y canaemo contra y binibun y enimigujo sija , ya y agapa na canaemo usatbayo .

text: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me : thy mercy , O LORD , endureth for ever : forsake not the works of thine own hands .
text2: Si Jeova unacabales y gaegue guiya guajo : y minaasemo , O Jeova , gagaegue para taejinecog : chamo dumidingo y checo y canaemo .

text: O LORD , thou hast searched me , and known me .
text2: Y Salmon David . O Jeova , guinin unrejistrayo , ya guinin untungoyo .

text: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising , thou understandest my thought afar off .
text2: Untutungoja y finatachongjo yan y quinajulojo ; untutungoja y jinasoco desde y chagogo .

text: Thou compassest my path and my lying down , and art acquainted with all my ways .
text2: Unlilicue y finaposo yan y fanasonjo , ya untutungo todo y chalanjo .

text: For there is not a word in my tongue , but , lo , O LORD , thou knowest it altogether .
text2: Sa taya ni un sinangan gui jilajo : jao , estagüe , na untungoja todo , O Jeova .

text: Thou hast beset me behind and before , and laid thine hand upon me .
text2: Unoriyayeyo gui menajo , yan y tateco : yan unpolo y canaemo gui jilojo .

text: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me ; it is high , I cannot attain unto it .
text2: Gosnámanman este na tiningo para guajo ; gostaquilo , ti siña jucomprende .

text: Whither shall I go from thy spirit ? or whither shall I flee from thy presence ?
text2: Manoyo guato taegüe y espiritumo ? pat manoyo jufalagüe taegüe yo gui menamo ?

text: If I ascend up into heaven , thou art there : if I make my bed in hell , behold , thou art there .
text2: Yaguin cumajuloyo gui langet gaegueja jao güije ; yanguin jujuto y camajo guiya sasalaguan , gaegueja jao locue güije .

text: If I take the wings of the morning , and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea ;
text2: Yanguin juchule y papan y egaan , ya jusaga gui uttimon y tase ;

text: Even there shall thy hand lead me , and thy right hand shall hold me .
text2: Asta ayo gaegueja y canaemo na jaosgagaejonyo , ya y agapa na canaemo umantieneyo .

text: If I say , Surely the darkness shall cover me ; even the night shall be light about me .
text2: Yanguin jualog : Magajet na utampeyo y jemjom : asta y puenge uinayo .

text: Yea , the darkness hideth not from thee ; but the night shineth as the day : the darkness and the light are both alike to thee .
text2: Asta y jemjom ti uninatogüe : lao y puenge ufanina taegüije y jaane : y jemjom yan y mananana manparejoja para jago .

text: For thou hast possessed my reins : thou hast covered me in my mother ' s womb .
text2: Jago tumungo yo , sa jago magas y sumanjalomjo ; guinin untampeyo gui jalom tiyan nanajo .

text: I will praise thee ; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made : marvellous are thy works ; and that my soul knoweth right well .
text2: Junae jao grasias : sa gosnamaañao yan gosnamanman y mafatinasso : mannamanman y chechomo ; ya y antijo jagostungo este .

text: My substance was not hid from thee , when I was made in secret , and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth .
text2: Y tataotaojo ti umatog guiya jago , anae mafatinasyo gui secreto ; ya matufog yo ni namanman , gui mas tagpapa na lugat gui tano .

text: Thine eyes did see my substance , yet being unperfect ; and in thy book all my members were written , which in continuance were fashioned , when as yet there was none of them .
text2: Y atadogmo lumie y tataotaojo ya ti cabales : ya y lebblomo nae manmatugue todo y pedason tataotaojo , ya taya ufatta .

text: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me , O God ! how great is the sum of them !
text2: Jafa muna guaguan y jinasomo guiya guajo , O Yuus ! Jafa muna megae sumaña !

text: If I should count them , they are more in number than the sand : when I awake , I am still with thee .
text2: Yanguin jutufong sija , manmegaeña y numeroña qui y inae : yanguin magmatayo , gaeguejayo trabia guiya jago .

text: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked , O God : depart from me therefore , ye bloody men .
text2: Seguro na unpuno y taelaye , O Yuus : enaomina mañuja guiya guajo y manmejga na taotao sija .

text: For they speak against thee wickedly , and thine enemies take thy name in vain .
text2: Sa manguentos taelaye contra jago , ya y enimigumo sija machule y naanmo pot taya .

text: Do not I hate them , O LORD , that hate thee ? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee ?
text2: Ada ti juchatlie ayo sija , O Jeova , y chumatlie jao ? yan ada ti unatristeyo pot ayo sija y mangajulo contra jago ?

text: I hate them with perfect hatred : I count them mine enemies .
text2: Juchatlie sija ni y cabales na chinatlie : jutufong sija pot y enemigujo .

text: Search me , O God , and know my heart : try me , and know my thoughts :
text2: Rejistrayo O Yuus , ya untungo y corasonjo : chagueyo ya untungo y jinasoco sija .

text: And see if there be any wicked way in me , and lead me in the way everlasting .
text2: Ya unlie cao guaja taelaye gui sumanjalomjo , ya unchachalaneyo gui chalan taejinecog .

text: Deliver me , O LORD , from the evil man : preserve me from the violent man ;
text2: Y Salmon David . NALIBREYO O Jeova gui taelaye na taotao : adajeyo gui fette na taotao :

text: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart ; continually are they gathered together for war .
text2: Ni y manmanjaso taelaye gui corasonñija : cada jaane mandaña para y guera .

text: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent ; adders ' poison is under their lips . Selah .
text2: Janafanmalagtos y jilañija taegüije y serpiente ; binenon y culebbla guaja gui jalom y labiosñija . Sila .

text: Keep me , O LORD , from the hands of the wicked ; preserve me from the violent man ; who have purposed to overthrow my goings .
text2: Adajeyo O Jeova , gui canae y taelaye ; adajeyo gui fette na taotao : ni y manmadetetmina para unasuja y pinecatto .

text: The proud have hid a snare for me , and cords ; they have spread a net by the wayside ; they have set gins for me . Selah .
text2: Y sobetbio sija janaatog y laso yan y cuetdas para guajo : matiende y lagua gui oriyan chalan ; manmanplanta ocodo para guajo . Sila .

text: I said unto the LORD , Thou art my God : hear the voice of my supplications , O LORD .
text2: Ilegco as Jeova : Jago y Yuusso : ecungog y inagang y tinayuyutto , O Jeova .

text: O GOD the Lord , the strength of my salvation , thou hast covered my head in the day of battle .
text2: O Yuus , Jeova , ni y minetgot y satbasionjo , jago tumampe y ilujo gui jaanin y guera .

text: Grant not , O LORD , the desires of the wicked : further not his wicked device ; lest they exalt themselves . Selah .
text2: Chamo numanae y taelaye ni y dineseaña , O Jeova ; chamo umayuyuda y taelaye jinasoña ; na noseaja unafannaquilo maesa sija . Sila .

text: As for the head of those that compass me about , let the mischief of their own lips cover them .
text2: Ya y ilun ayo sija y umoriyayeyo , polo ya utinampe sija ni y taelayen labiosñija .

text: Let burning coals fall upon them : let them be cast into the fire ; into deep pits , that they rise not up again .
text2: Polo ya ufamodog y pinigan guafe gui jiloñija : polo ya ufanmayute sija guato gui jalom guafe ; y jalom y tadong na joyo ya chañija fangajujulo talo .

text: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth : evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him .
text2: Ti ufitme gui tano y cumuecuentos ni y taelaye : y tinaelaye jaaliligao y taelaye na taotao para uninaatlibes güe .

text: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted , and the right of the poor .
text2: Jutungo na si Jeova umantiene y causan y manpinite , yan y tininas y pebble .

text: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name : the upright shall dwell in thy presence .
text2: Magajet na umanae grasia y naanmo , ni y manunas : y manunas ufañaga gui menamo .

text: LORD , I cry unto thee : make haste unto me ; give ear unto my voice , when I cry unto thee .
text2: Y Salmon David . JEOVA jagasja juaagangjao ; chadig para iya guajo : ecungog y inagangjo , yanguin juagang jao .

text: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense ; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice .
text2: Polo y tinayuyutto ya umaplanta gui menamo taegüije y insensio ; ya y jinatsaco julo ni y canaejo utaegüije y inefresen pupuenge .

text: Set a watch , O LORD , before my mouth ; keep the door of my lips .
text2: Polo y guatdia O Jeova gui menan pachotjo ; adaje y pettan y labiosso .

text: Incline not my heart to any evil thing , to practise wicked works with men that work iniquity : and let me not eat of their dainties .
text2: Chamo nafalag y tataelaye na güinaja y corasonjo , ya ufatinas y taelaye na chocho yan ayo sija na taotao y chumogüe tinaelaye : ya chamo na jucanoyo ni y mannge na nañija .

text: Let the righteous smite me ; it shall be a kindness : and let him reprove me ; it shall be an excellent oil , which shall not break my head : for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities .
text2: Polo y tininas ya unalamenyo , este y minauleg ; ya ureprendeyo , ya utaegüije y laña gui jilo y ilujo : chamo na ilujo urechasa : sa asta anae manaelaye sija , y tinayuyutto ugagaegueja .

text: When their judges are overthrown in stony places , they shall hear my words ; for they are sweet .
text2: Manmayute papa y juesñija gui anae acho na lugat ; ya ujajungog y sinanganjo sija , sa manmames .

text: Our bones are scattered at the grave ' s mouth , as when one cutteth and cleaveth wood upon the earth .
text2: Y telangmame manmachalapon gui pachot y naftan ; taegüije anae un taotao jaalado ya japuta y tano .

text: But mine eyes are unto thee , O GOD the Lord : in thee is my trust ; leave not my soul destitute .
text2: Lao y atadogco , mangaegue guiya jago , O Yuus Jeova : iya jago nae gagaegueja y inangococo : chamo dumidingo y antijo namaesa .

text: Keep me from the snares which they have laid for me , and the gins of the workers of iniquity .
text2: Adajeyo gui laso ni y maplanta para guajo , yan y ecodon y chumagüe y taelaye .

text: Let the wicked fall into their own nets , whilst that I withal escape .
text2: Polo ya ufamodong y manaelaye gui jalom y laguañija , mientras umescacapayo .

text: I cried unto the LORD with my voice ; with my voice unto the LORD did I make my supplication .
text2: Cantan David anae Gagaegue gue gui Liyang ; un Tinayuyut . JUAGANG si Jeova gui inagangjo ; gui inagangjo si Jeova nae jutayuyut .

text: I poured out my complaint before him ; I shewed before him my trouble .
text2: Jubasia y quejaco gui menaña , jufanue gui menaña ni y chinatsagaco .

text: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me , then thou knewest my path . In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me .
text2: Yanguin y espiritujo lalango gui sumanjalomjo , untungoja y finaposso . Y chalan gui anae mamocatyo , manaatog y laso para guajo .

text: I looked on my right hand , and beheld , but there was no man that would know me : refuge failed me ; no man cared for my soul .
text2: Atan y agapa na canaejo ya lie ; lao taya ni un taotao tumungoyo : y guine güeco esta malingo ; taya ni un taotao umadaje y antijo .

text: I cried unto thee , O LORD : I said , Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living .
text2: Juagang jao O Jeova ; ilegco : Jago guinegüeco yan y patteco gui tano y manlalâlâ .

text: Attend unto my cry ; for I am brought very low : deliver me from my persecutors ; for they are stronger than I .
text2: Atituye y inagangjo ; sa sen lumalagpapayo ; nalibreyo gui pumetsisigueyo , sa manmetgotña qui guajo .

text: Bring my soul out of prison , that I may praise thy name : the righteous shall compass me about ; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me .
text2: Najuyong y antijo gui calaboso , ya junae grasias y naanmo : ujaoriyayeyo y manunas ; sa unfatinas pot guajo gosmegae .

text: Hear my prayer , O LORD , give ear to my supplications : in thy faithfulness answer me , and in thy righteousness .
text2: Y Salmon David . JUNGOG y tinayuyutto , O Jeova ; ecungog y guinagaojo sija : opeyo pot y minagajetmo yan y tininasmo .

text: And enter not into judgment with thy servant : for in thy sight shall no man living be justified .
text2: Ya chamo jumajalom gui juisio yan y tentagomo : sa taya taotao lalâlâ umajustifica gui menamo .

text: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul ; he hath smitten my life down to the ground ; he hath made me to dwell in darkness , as those that have been long dead .
text2: Sa y enimigo guinin japetsigue y antijo ; guinin jasaulag papa gui jilo oda y jaanijo : janasagayo gui anae jomjom na lugat sija , taegüije sija y guinin apmam na manmatae .

text: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me ; my heart within me is desolate .
text2: Enaomina y espiritujo , lalango gui sumanjalomjo : y corasonjo gui sumanjalomjo triste .

text: I remember the days of old ; I meditate on all thy works ; I muse on the work of thy hands .
text2: Jujaso sija y apmam na jaane ; jujaso todo y chechomo ; jujajaso y checho y canaemo .

text: I stretch forth my hands unto thee : my soul thirsteth after thee , as a thirsty land . Selah .
text2: Jujuto mona y canaejo guiya jago : y antijo majo nu jago , taegüije y anglo na tano . Sila .

text: Hear me speedily , O LORD : my spirit faileth : hide not thy face from me , lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit .
text2: Jungogyo enseguidas , O Jeova : sa malayo y antijo : chamo na naaatog y matamo guiya guajo ; sa noseaja juparejo yan ayo sija y mannunog gui jalom joyo .

text: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning ; for in thee do I trust : cause me to know the way wherein I should walk ; for I lift up my soul unto thee .
text2: Na jungogyo ni y cariñoso na güinaeyamo gui egaan ; sa jagoja nae juangocoyo : natungoyo ni y chalan anae para jufamocat ; sa jujatsa julo y antijo guiya jago .

text: Deliver me , O LORD , from mine enemies : I flee unto thee to hide me .
text2: Nalibreyo , O Jeova , gui enemigujo sija : jufalagüe jao , ya unnaatogyo .

text: Teach me to do thy will ; for thou art my God : thy spirit is good ; lead me into the land of uprightness .
text2: Fanagüeyo ya jufatinas y minalagomo : sa jago y Yuusso : y espiritumo mauleg ; osgaejonyo gui tano y manunas .

text: Quicken me , O LORD , for thy name ' s sake : for thy righteousness ' sake bring my soul out of trouble .
text2: Nalâlâyo , O Jeova , pot y naanmo : pot y tininasmo , chule y antijo gui chinatsaga .

text: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies , and destroy all them that afflict my soul : for I am thy servant .
text2: Yan pot y cariñoso na güinaeyamo utut y enemigujo sija , ya unyulang todo sija y munapinite y antijo : sa guajo tentagomo .

text: Blessed be the LORD my strength , which teacheth my hands to war , and my fingers to fight :
text2: Y Salmon David . BENDITO si Yuus y achojo , ni y jafanagüe y canaejo para uguera , yan y calalotjo para umumo .

text: My goodness , and my fortress ; my high tower , and my deliverer ; my shield , and he in whom I trust ; who subdueth my people under me .
text2: Y minaaseco yan y guimegüeco y iyoco tore na taquilo , yan y munalibreyo ; y patangjo , yan y anae juangocoyo ; ni y pumolo y taotaojo gui papajo .

text: LORD , what is man , that thou takest knowledge of him ! or the son of man , that thou makest account of him !
