text2: Jeova , jafa y taotao na unatituye y tiningoña ? pat y lajin taotao na uncuecuenta güe ?

text: Man is like to vanity : his days are as a shadow that passeth away .
text2: Y taotao parejoja yan y jinaja ; y jaaniña parejoja yan y anineng ni y malofan .

text: Bow thy heavens , O LORD , and come down : touch the mountains , and they shall smoke .
text2: Natalagpapa , y langetmo , O Yuus , ya tunogjao papa : pacha y egso sija ya ufanaso .

text: Cast forth lightning , and scatter them : shoot out thine arrows , and destroy them .
text2: Fanyute ni y lamlam ya ufanchinalapon sija : nafanogcha y flechamo , ya ufaninestotba sija .

text: Send thine hand from above ; rid me , and deliver me out of great waters , from the hand of strange children ;
text2: Estira y canaemo guinin jilo ; rescatayo yan nalibreyo gui manadan janom , gui canae y manaotao juyong .

text: Whose mouth speaketh vanity , and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood .
text2: Ni y pachotñija manguecuentos banida , ya y agapa na canaeñija , y dacon na canae agapa .

text: I will sing a new song unto thee , O God : upon a psaltery and an instrument of ten strings will I sing praises unto thee .
text2: Jucantaye jao ni y nuebo na canta , O Yuus : y guitala , ni y dies cuetdasña nae jucantaye jao ni y alabansa sija .

text: It is he that giveth salvation unto kings : who delivereth David his servant from the hurtful sword .
text2: Güiya ayo y mannae satbasion gui ray sija : ni janalibre si David ni y tentagoña gui gosnalamen na espada .

text: Rid me , and deliver me from the hand of strange children , whose mouth speaketh vanity , and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood :
text2: Rescatayo ya nalibreyo gui canae y manaotao juyong , ni y pachotñija manguecuentos banida , ya y agapa na canaeñija y dacon na canae agapa .

text: That our sons may be as plants grown up in their youth ; that our daughters may be as corner stones , polished after the similitude of a palace :
text2: Ya y famaguonmame lalaje ufantaegüije y tinanom yanguin mandoco ya mangajulo gui pinatgonñija ; ya y jaganmame ufantaegüije y mapopolo gui punta na acho , ni y malabla taegüije y palasyo .

text: That our garners may be full , affording all manner of store : that our sheep may bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our streets :
text2: Ya y lanchonmame bula , mannae todo clasen güinaja : ya gamame quinilo ufanmañago mit yan dies mit gui fangualuanmame .

text: That our oxen may be strong to labour ; that there be no breaking in , nor going out ; that there be no complaining in our streets .
text2: Ya y gamame nobiyo sija ufanmangotga mauleg ; ya chañija rumorompe jalom ni juyong , ya taya inagang pot pinite gui cayenmame .

text: Happy is that people , that is in such a case : yea , happy is that people , whose God is the LORD .
text2: Mandichoso ayo sija na taotao y manguaja ni este : Junggan , mandichoso ayo sija na taotao ni y Yuusñija si Jeova .

text: I will extol thee , my God , O king ; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever .
text2: Y Salmon Alabansa ; iyon David . JUNADANGCULO jao Yuusso , O Ray ; jubendise y naanmo para taejinecog yan taejinecog .

text: Every day will I bless thee ; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever .
text2: Cada jaane jubendise jao ; ya bae jualaba y naanmo para taejinecog yan taejinecog .

text: Great is the LORD , and greatly to be praised ; and his greatness is unsearchable .
text2: Dangculo si Jeova , ya sumendangculo para umaalaba ; ya y dinangculoña ti comprediyon .

text: One generation shall praise thy works to another , and shall declare thy mighty acts .
text2: Un generasion ualaba y chechomo gui otro generasion , yan ujadeclara y matatnga na finatinasmo sija .

text: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty , and of thy wondrous works .
text2: Jujajaso ni y minalag na minagas y inenramo , yan y mannamanman y chechomo .

text: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts : and I will declare thy greatness .
text2: Ya y taotao sija ujasangan y ninasiñan y namaañao na finatinasmo sija ; ya guajo bae judeclara y dinangculomo .

text: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness , and shall sing of thy righteousness .
text2: Ujasangan y majason dinangculon y minaulegmo , ya ufanganta ni y tininasmo .

text: The LORD is gracious , and full of compassion ; slow to anger , and of great mercy .
text2: Si Jeova , cariñosogüe , yan bula minaase ; ñateng para ulalalo , ya dangculo minaaseña .

text: The LORD is good to all : and his tender mercies are over all his works .
text2: Si Jeova mauleg para todo : ya y cariñoso na minaaseña gui jilo todo y chechoña .

text: All thy works shall praise thee , O LORD ; and thy saints shall bless thee .
text2: Todo y chechomo uninalaba jao , O Jeova ; ya y mañantosmo unmabendise jao .

text: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom , and talk of thy power ;
text2: Ujasangan y minalag y raenomo , yan ufanguentos ni y ninasiñamo .

text: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts , and the glorious majesty of his kingdom .
text2: Para ujanamatungo y matatnga na finatinasña sija gui lalajen taotao , yan y minalag y minagasña gui raenoña .

text: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom , and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations .
text2: Y raenomo , taejinecog na raeno , ya y gobietnomo gagaegueja para todo y generasion .

text: The LORD upholdeth all that fall , and raiseth up all those that be bowed down .
text2: Si Jeova mumantiene todo ayo sija y mamodong , yan jajatsa todo ayo y manetecon .

text: The eyes of all wait upon thee ; and thou givest them their meat in due season .
text2: Todo y atadog sija numanangga jao ; ya jago numae sija nañija gui mauleg na tiempo .

text: Thou openest thine hand , and satisfiest the desire of every living thing .
text2: Unbaba y canaemo , ya unnafannajong todo y minalago y manlâlâlâ na güinaja .

text: The LORD is righteous in all his ways , and holy in all his works .
text2: Si Jeova tunas güe gui todo y chalanña ; ya cariñoso gui todo y chechoña .

text: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him , to all that call upon him in truth .
text2: Si Jeova jijot gui todo ayo sija y umaagang gue ; gui todo ayo y umaagang güe ni y minagajet .

text: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him : he also will hear their cry , and will save them .
text2: Güiya unafanbula y minalago ayo sija y manmaañao nu güiya : ujungog locue y inagangñija , ya usatba sija .

text: The LORD preserveth all them that love him : but all the wicked will he destroy .
text2: Si Jeova jaadadaje todo ayo sija y gumaeya güe : lao todo y manaelaye uyulang .

text: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD : and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever .
text2: Y pachotto usangan y tinina as Jeova : ya polo todo y catne , ya utinina y santos na naanña , para taejinecog yan taejinecog .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Praise the LORD , O my soul .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . O antijo , alaba si Jeova .

text: While I live will I praise the LORD : I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being .
text2: Mientras lalâlâyo , bae jualaba si Jeova : jucantaye alabansa sija gui Yuusso mientras guajayo sustansiaco .

text: Put not your trust in princes , nor in the son of man , in whom there is no help .
text2: Chamo pumopolo y inangocomo gui prinsipe sija , ni y lajin taotao , gui anae taya inayuda .

text: His breath goeth forth , he returneth to his earth ; in that very day his thoughts perish .
text2: Y jinagongña jumanao , ya güiya tumalo guato gui edaña : ayoja na jaane malingo y jinasoña .

text: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help , whose hope is in the LORD his God :
text2: Magof ayo y uguaja ni y Yuus Jacob para innayuda güe , ni y inangocoña gaegue gui as Jeova Yuusña :

text: Which made heaven , and earth , the sea , and all that therein is : which keepeth truth for ever :
text2: Ni y jafatinas y langet yan y tano , yan y tase , yan todo y mangaegue gui sumanjalomñija , ni y jaadaje y minagajet para taejinecog .

text: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed : which giveth food to the hungry . The LORD looseth the prisoners :
text2: Ni y jafatitinas juisio gui manmachiguet ; ni y jananae nengcano y manñalang : si Jeova japupula y manmaprereso :

text: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind : the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down : the LORD loveth the righteous :
text2: Si Jeova bumababa y atadogñija y bachet : si Jeova jumajatsa ayo sija y manetecon ; si Jeova jaguaeguaeya y manunas .

text: The LORD preserveth the strangers ; he relieveth the fatherless and widow : but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down .
text2: Si Jeova jaadadaje y taotao juyong sija ; jamantietiene y taya tatañija yan y manbiuda ; lao y chalan y tinaelaye , janaopop .

text: The LORD shall reign for ever , even thy God , O Zion , unto all generations . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Si Jeova ufangobietna para taejinecog ; y Yuusmo , O Sion , para todo y generasion . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: Praise ye the LORD : for it is good to sing praises unto our God ; for it is pleasant ; and praise is comely .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova : sa mauleg na utacantaye alabansa sija gui Yuusta ; sa magof este ; ya y alabansa respetao .

text: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem : he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel .
text2: Si Jeova jumajatsa Jerusalem : ja fandadaña y manmayute juyong guiya Israel .

text: He healeth the broken in heart , and bindeth up their wounds .
text2: Janafanjomlo y manmayulang na corason , ya jabee y chetnotñija .

text: He telleth the number of the stars ; he calleth them all by their names .
text2: Jasangan y numeron y pution sija ; jafanaan todo sija ni y naanñija .

text: Great is our Lord , and of great power : his understanding is infinite .
text2: Dangculo y Yuusta , yan matatnga gui ninasiña ; tiningoña taeuttimo .

text: The LORD lifteth up the meek : he casteth the wicked down to the ground .
text2: Si Jeova jumajatsa y manmanso : ya jachule papa y manaelaye gui jilo oda .

text: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving ; sing praise upon the harp unto our God :
text2: Cantaye si Jeova ni y finatinas grasias ; cantaye alabansa sija gui atpa , para y Yuusta .

text: Who covereth the heaven with clouds , who prepareth rain for the earth , who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains .
text2: Ni y jatatampe y langet ni y mapagages , ya jalilisto y ichan para y tano , ya janafandodoco y chaguan gui jilo ogso sija .

text: He giveth to the beast his food , and to the young ravens which cry .
text2: Güiya numannae y gâgâ sija nañija , yan y fumaguon y aga sija ni y manaagang .

text: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse : he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man .
text2: Güiya ti ninamamagof ni y ninasiñan y cabayo : ni ti ninamamagof güe ni y adeng y taotao .

text: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him , in those that hope in his mercy .
text2: Si Jeova ninamamagof güe ni y manmaañao nu güiya , ni y umangoco sija gui minaaseña .

text: Praise the LORD , O Jerusalem ; praise thy God , O Zion .
text2: Alaba si Jeova , O Jerusalem ; alaba si Yuusmo , O Sion .

text: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates ; he hath blessed thy children within thee .
text2: Sa janafanfitme y rejas y trangcamo : jabendise y famaguonmo gui sumanjalommo .

text: He maketh peace in thy borders , and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat .
text2: Jafatinas pas gui jalom uttimomo , ya ninabula jao ni y guesmauleg na trigo .

text: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth : his word runneth very swiftly .
text2: Janajanao y tinagoña gui jilo tano : y sinanganña malalago goschadig .

text: He giveth snow like wool : he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes .
text2: Mannae niebe calang pulo : jachalapon y manengjeng na sereno calang apo .

text: He casteth forth his ice like morsels : who can stand before his cold ?
text2: Jayute y aesña calang andesmorona sija : jaye siña tumojgue gui menan y manengjengña ?

text: He sendeth out his word , and melteth them : he causeth his wind to blow , and the waters flow .
text2: Janajanao y sinanganña , ya jadirite : janafanguaefe y mangloña , ya y janom sija manmilalag .

text: He sheweth his word unto Jacob , his statutes and his judgments unto Israel .
text2: Jafanue si Jacob ni y sinanganña , ya y layña sija yan y juisioña sija y Israel .

text: He hath not dealt so with any nation : and as for his judgments , they have not known them . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Ti jafatinas taegüine gui un nasion : ya y juisioña , sija ti manmatungo sija . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Praise ye the LORD from the heavens : praise him in the heights .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova desde y langet : Fanmalaba nu güiya guiya jululo .

text: Praise ye him , all his angels : praise ye him , all his hosts .
text2: Fanmanalaba jamyo nu güiya , todo y angjetña : fanmanalaba jamyo nu güiya todo y inetnon sendaluña .

text: Praise ye him , sun and moon : praise him , all ye stars of light .
text2: Fanmanalaba jamyo nu güiya , atdao an pulan : fanmanalaba jamyo nu güiya todo y pution ni y maniina .

text: Praise him , ye heavens of heavens , and ye waters that be above the heavens .
text2: Fanmanalaba jamyo nu güiya , langet sija y langet sija , yan y janom sija ni y mangaegue gui jilo y langet .

text: Let them praise the name of the LORD : for he commanded , and they were created .
text2: Polo sija ya ujaalaba y naan Jeova : sa manago , ya sija manfatinas .

text: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever : he hath made a decree which shall not pass .
text2: Güiya guinin plumanta sija locue para taejinecog yan taejinecog : jafatinas y tinago na tu ufalofan .

text: Praise the LORD from the earth , ye dragons , and all deeps :
text2: Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova desde y tano , jamyo ni y mandadao gui tinadong tase , yan todo y manadong .

text: Fire , and hail ; snow , and vapour ; stormy wind fulfilling his word :
text2: Y guafe yan graniso ; niebe yan asgon : manglo pagyo ni y cumumple y sinanganña :

text: Mountains , and all hills ; fruitful trees , and all cedars :
text2: Ogso sija yan todo y sabana ; manmanogcha na trongcon jayo yan todo y sedrosija ;

text: Beasts , and all cattle ; creeping things , and flying fowl :
text2: Gâgâ yan todo y guaca ; mangucunanas na gâgâ , yan y mangugupo na pajaro .

text: Kings of the earth , and all people ; princes , and all judges of the earth :
text2: Ray sija y tano yan todo y taotao sija . Prinsipe sija , yan todo y jues y tano :

text: Both young men , and maidens ; old men , and children :
text2: Y manfamaguon na lalaje , yan famalaoan : y manamco na taotao , yan famaguon :

text: Let them praise the name of the LORD : for his name alone is excellent ; his glory is above the earth and heaven .
text2: Polo sija ya ujaalaba y naan Jeova : sa y naanñaja guefmanataquilo : y minalagña gui jilo tano yan y langet .

text: He also exalteth the horn of his people , the praise of all his saints ; even of the children of Israel , a people near unto him . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Jagasja jajatsa julo locue y canggelon taotaoña ; y tininan todo y mañantosña sija ; magajet na sija y famaguon Israel , y taotao sija ni y manjijot guiya güiya . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Sing unto the LORD a new song , and his praise in the congregation of saints .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Cantaye si Jeova ni y nuebo na canta , ya y tininaña gui inetnon y mañantos .

text: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him : let the children of Zion be joyful in their King .
text2: Polo Israel ya umagof ni y fumatinas güe : polo y famaguon Sion ya ufanmagof ni y Rayñija .

text: Let them praise his name in the dance : let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp .
text2: Polo sija ya ujaalaba y naaña ni y dansa : ya umacantaye güe gui atpa yan pandireta .

text: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people : he will beautify the meek with salvation .
text2: Sa si Jeova janamagof güe gui taotaoña : güiya janagatbo y manmanso ni y satbasion .

text: Let the saints be joyful in glory : let them sing aloud upon their beds .
text2: Polo y mañantos y ufanmagof gui minalag ; polo ya ufanganta pot y minagof gui jilo y camañija .

text: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth , and a twoedged sword in their hand ;
text2: Polo y taquilo na alabansa gui as Yuus ya ugaegue gui pachotñija , yan y espada ni y malagtos dos banda gui canaeñija ;

text: To execute vengeance upon the heathen , and punishments upon the people ;
text2: Para ujafatinas y inemog gui nasion sija , yan y castigo gui taotao sija ;

text: To bind their kings with chains , and their nobles with fetters of iron ;
text2: Para ujagode y rayñija , ni y cadena sija ; yan y manmagasñija ni y goden lulug .

text: To execute upon them the judgment written : this honour have all his saints . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Para ujafatinas gui jiloñija y matugue na juisio : este na inenra para todo y mañantosña . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: Praise ye the LORD . Praise God in his sanctuary : praise him in the firmament of his power .
text2: FANMANALABA jamyo as Jeova . Alaba si Yuus gui sinantos na sagaña : alaba gue gui feneda y ninasiñaña .

text: Praise him for his mighty acts : praise him according to his excellent greatness .
text2: Alaba güe ni y matatnga na finatinasña sija : alaba güe jaftaemanoja y minagas dinangculoña .

text: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet : praise him with the psaltery and harp .
text2: Alaba güe ni y sonidon y trompeta : alaba güe ni y guitala yan y atpa .

text: Praise him with the timbrel and dance : praise him with stringed instruments and organs .
text2: Alaba güe ni y pandireta , yan y dansa : alaba güe ni y gaecuetdas na dandan yan y flauta .

text: Praise him upon the loud cymbals : praise him upon the high sounding cymbals .
text2: Alaba güe ni y agang na batingting : alaba güe ni gosagang na sonidon batingting .

text: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD . Praise ye the LORD .
text2: Polo todo y güinaja ni y mangaejinagong ya ujaalaba si Jeova . Fanmanalaba jamyo as Jeova .

text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: LEBLON y rasan Jesucristo lajin David , lajin Abraham .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Si Abraham jalilis si Ysaac ; ya si Ysaac jalilis si Jacob ; ya si Jacob jalilis si Judas yan y mañeluña .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Ya si Judas jalilis , gui as Tamar , si Fares yan si Sara ; ya si Fares jalilis si Esrom ; ya si Esrom jalilis si Aram ;

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Ya si Aram jalilis si Aminadab ; ya si Aminadab jalilis si Naason ; ya si Naason jalilis si Salmon ;

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Ya si Salmon jalilis , gui as Rahab , si Boos ; ya si Boos jalilis , gui as Rut , si Obed ; ya si Obed jalilis si Isai ;

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Ya si Isai jalilis si ray David ; ya si ray David jalilis si Salomon ni guinin güiya nii ampmam palaoan Urias ;

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Ya si Salomon jalilis si Roboam ; ya si Roboam jalilis si Abias ; ya si Abias jalilis si Asa ;

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Ya si Asa jalilis si Josafat ; ya si Josafat jalilis si Joram ; ya si Joram jalilis si Osias ;

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Ya si Osias jalilis si Joatam ; ya si Joatam jalilis si Acas ; ya si Acas jalilis si Esequias ;

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Ya si Esequias jalilis si Manases ; si Manases jalilis si Amon ; ya si Amon jalilis si Josias ;

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Ya si Josias jalilis si Joaquim ; si Joaquim jalilis si Jeconias , yan y mañeluña anae manmacone guiya Babilonia .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Ya mapos y manmacone guiya Babilonia , si Jeconias jalilis si Salatiel ; si Salatiel jalilis si Sorobabel ;

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Ya si Sorobabel jalilis si Abiud ; si Abiud jalilis si Eliaquim ; si Eliaquim jalilis si Asor ;

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Si Asor jalilis si Sadog ; si Sadog jalilis si Achim ; si Achim si Eliud ;

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Si Eliud jalilis si Eleasar ; si Eleasar jalilis si Matan ; si Matan jalilis si Jacob ;

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Si Jacob jalilis si José , asaguan Maria , na finañago si Jesus na mafanaan si Cristo .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Enao mina todo y generasion desde as Abraham asta as David , catotse sija na generasion ; ya desde as David asta manmacone guiya Babilonia , catotse na generasion ; ya desde qui manmacone guiya Babilonia asta as Cristo , catotse na generasion .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: N	1	18		24790	 ¶ Y mafañagon Jesucristo taegüine : Y nanaña as Maria , nobian José , antes de ujadaña , güiya esta masoda mapotgue pot y Espiritu Santo .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Ya si José asaguaña , sa mauleg na taotao , ti malago pinelo güe gui ninamamajlao , lao malagoña upinelo güe gui secreto .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ya anae jajajaso este , mato para güiya y angjet Señot , anae jagüife gui minaegoña , na ilegña : José , lajin David , chamo maañao na unresibe si Maria asaguamo , sa y gaegue guiya güiya y linilis Espiritu Santo .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Ya ufañago un laje ya ufanaan si Jesus ; sa güiya unafanlibre y taotaoña nu y isaoñija .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Todo sija masusede para umacumple y esta jasangan y Señot pot y profeta , ni ilegña :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: Estagüe , un vitgen na umapotgue , ya ufañago un laje ya ufanaan si Emanuel , na comoqueilegña na si Yuus gaegue guiya jita .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Anae magmata si José gui minaegoña , jafatinas taegüije y tinago y angjet , ya jaresibe y asaguaña .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Ya ti matungo asta qui mañago ni lajiña finenana ; ya nae y naanña si Jesus .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: YA mafañago si Jesus guiya Betlehem Judea gui jaanin ray Herodes , estagüe y manfaye na manmato guinin y sancatan para Jerusalem ,

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Ylegñija : mangue y ray Judios , ni mafañago ? Sa y estreyasña inlie gui sancatan ya manmatojam para inadoragüe .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Ya anae jajungog este , si ray Herodes , inistotba yan todo y taotao Jerusalem locue .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Ya anae maagange todo y prinsipen mamale yan y escriba sija güije na tano , manfinaesen mano nae mafañago si Cristo .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Sija ilegñija : Iya Betlehem Judea ; sa taegüine y munjayan matugue pot y profeta :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: Ya jago Betlehem , tano Juda , ada ti sendiquique jao gui entalo y prinsipen Juda , sa iya jago nae ujuyong y magalaje , para upasto y taotaojo , Israel .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Entonses si Herodes , anae jaagang y manfaye gui secreto , jaquequetungo guiya sija , ngaean y estreyas nae malie .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Ya Jatago sija para Betlehem , ilegña : Janao fanmalag ayo guato ya inalula manmamaesen pot y patgon ; yaguin esta inseda , insangane yo ; ya jufato locue ya juadora güe .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jajungog y sinangan ray , manmapos ; ya estagüe y estreyas ni y jalie gui sancatan , na mofona gui menañija asta qui mato ya sumaga gui anae estaba y patgon .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Anae malie y estreyas , gosdangculo minagofñija .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: N	2	11		24970	 ¶ Anae manjalom gui guima , jasoda y patgon yan y nanaña , as Maria , ya mandimo ya maadora ; ya mababa y güinajañija ya manae güe : oro , insenso , yan mira .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Ya manmasangane pot si Yuus gui güinife , na ti ufanmalag as Herodes , manjanao para y tanoñija gui otro chalan .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: N	2	13		24990	 ¶ Ya anae manmapos sija , y angjet y Señot mato gui as José gui güinife , ya ilegña : Cajulo ya uncone y patgon yan si nanaña , ya infanjanao para Egipto , ya infañaga güije , asta qui guajojao sumangane ; sa si Herodes jaaligao y patgon para umapuno .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Ya cajulo güe , ya jacone y patgon yan si nanaña gui puenge ya manjanao para Egipto ;

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Ya sumaga güije asta que matae si Herodes , sa para umacumple y sinangan y Señot pot y profeta , na ilegña : Iya Egipto nae , juagang y Lajijo .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: N	2	16		25020	 ¶ Si Herodes , anae jalie na mamofea güe ni manfaye , gueflalalo ya manago na ufanmapuno todo y famaguon ni guaja guiya Betlehem yan gui todo oriyaña ni dos años sacanñija para papa , jaftaemanoja y tiempo anae ninatungo ni y manfaye .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Ayo nae macumple esta , ni y guinin masangan pot y profeta Jeremias , na ilegña :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: Inagang na majungog guiya Rama umagang , tumangis yan cumasao na dangculo ; si Raquel cumasao pot y famaguonña , ya ti malago maconsuela sa manaegüe .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: N	2	19		25050	 ¶ Anae esta matae si Herodes , mato y angjet y Señot gui as José gui güinife , guiya Egipto ,

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: Ya ilegña : Cajulo , cone y patgon yan si nanaña , ya infanjanao para y tano Israel ; sa matae y cumequepuno y patgon .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Ayo nae cajulo ya jacone y patgon yan si nanaña ya manmalag y tano Israel .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Ya jajungog na si Arquelao , güiya y ray guiya Judea gui sagan tataña as Herodes , maañao malag guato ; lao pot si Yuus ninatungo güe claro gui güinifeña , mapos malag y tanon Galilea .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Ya anae mato , sumaga gui siuda na mafanaan Nasaret ; para ucumple y masanganña pot y profeta sija , na umafanaan taotao Nasaret .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: AYO sija na jaane , mato si Juan Bautista ya sumetmon gui desierton Judea ,

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Ylegña : Fanmañotsot sa y raenon langet jumijijot .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Sa esta güiya uje y guinin jasangan y profeta Isaias , na ilegña : Inagang ni umagang gui desierto : Famauleg y chalan y Señot , natunas y chalanña .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Y magaguña si Juan y pilon cameyo yan y godeña cuero na jachaflileg gui senturaña , ya y naña y apacha sija yan y miet jalom tano .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Ayo nae mapos malag para güiya , Jerusalem yan Judea yan todo y tano gui oriyan Jordan ,

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Ya esta manmatagpange pot güiya , guiya Jordan , jasangan claro y isaoñija .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: N	3	7		25160	 ¶ Ya jalie megae na Fariseo yan Saduseo sija na manmamaela para y tinagpangeña ya ilegña : Rasan culebla , jaye jamyo fumanagüe na insujaye y binibo ni mamaela ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Fanmamatinas tinegcha digno ni y sinetsot .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ya chamiyo jumajaso sumangan gui sanjalommiyo , na si Abraham tatata ; ya guajo sumangane jamyo , na siña si Yuus janacajulo este sija na acho famaguon gui as Abraham .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Pago , esta locue y gachae gaegue na mapolo gui jale y trongcon jayo sija ; ya todo y trongcon jayo ni ti manogcha mauleg , umautut ya umapolo gui guafe .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Guajo magajet jutagpange jamyo nu y janom para minañotsot , lao y mamamaela gui tateco , mas guaja ninasiñaña qui guajo : y sapatosña ti mauleg yo na jupula ; güiya infantinagpange ni Espiritu Santo yan y guafe .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Y abanicoña gaegue gui canaeña , ya unagasgas y tablaña , ya unaetnon y triguña jalom gui jalom camalin , ya usonggue y pajan trigo gui taejinecog na guafe .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: N	3	13		25220	 ¶ Anae mato si Jesus guinin Galilea , malag Jordan gui as Juan para utinagpange .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Lao si Juan ti malago , ilegña : Nesesita yo matagpange pot jago , enaojao na mamaela guiya guajo ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Inepe as Jesus ilegña : Diejaloja , sa taegüenao mauleg para utacumple y todo na tininas . Ayo nae pinelo .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Ya si Jesus , anae munjayan matagpange , cajulo gusisija guine y janom , y langet mababa pot güiya ya malie y Espiritun Yuus tumunog calang paluma y sumaga gui jiloña .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ya estagüe , un vos guinin y langet na ilegña : Estagüiya y lajijo ni y guefyajo .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: AYO nae quinene si Jesus ni Espiritu para y jalomtano para umatienta ni anite ;

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Ya estaba umayunat cuarenta na jaane yan cuarenta na puenge ya despues ñalang .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Ya mato guiya güiya y manienienta , ya ilegña : Yaguin jago lajin Yuus , tago este y acho ya ufamapan .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Güiya manope ilegña : Matugue esta : Ti y panja uninalâlâ y taotao , lao y todo y sinangan ni y jumuyong gui pachot Yuus .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Ayo nae ninamalofan ni anite gui santa na siuda ; pinelo gui jilo torren diquique , iyon y templo .

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Y ilegña : Yaguin jago lajin Yuus , yutejao güine papa , sa matugue esta : Y angjet sija uninadje ya unquinajat ni canaeñija , para chaña y adengmo umatotpe contra y acho .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña : Locue esta matugue , chamo tietienta y Señot , Yuusmo .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Tumalo ninamalofan ni anite gui un sabana na sentáquilo ya jafanue todo y raeno sija gui jilo y tano yan y minagofñija ,

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Ya ilegña : Todo este sija junaejao yaguin dumimojao ya unadora yo .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Ayonae si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Janao Satanas , sa matugue esta , y Señot Yuusmo na güiyaja unadora yan güiyaja unsetbe .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Ayo nae diningo ni anite , ya y angjet sija manmato ya masetbe güe .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: N	4	12		25380	 ¶ Anae jajungog si Jesus na si Juan esta mapongle , tumalo guato Galilea .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Ya jadingo Nasaret , mato Capernaum ya sumaga gui oriyan tase gui oriyan tanon Sabulon yan Neftalim .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Para umacumple y guinin jasangan y profeta Isaias , na ilegña :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: Y tano Sabulon yan y tano Neftalim , chalan tase yan para otro banda guiya Jordan , Galilea y Gentiles .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Ya y taotao sija nu y mañasaga gui jemjom , dangculo na manana liniiñija ; y ayo sija nu y mañasaga tanon anineng y finatae , candet ufaninina .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: N	4	17		25430	 ¶ Desde ayo jatutujon si Jesus sumetmon ya ilegña : Fanmañotsot , sa y raenon langet jijijot .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: N	4	18		25440	 ¶ Ya anae jumajanao si Jesus gui tasen Galilea , jalie dos chumelo ; si Simon mafanaan Pedro yan si Andres cheluña , na janatutunog y lagua gui tase sa manpescadot .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Dalalag yo ya junafanpescadot taotao jamyo .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Sija japolo y lagua sija ya madalalag güe .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Anae jumanao güije , jalie otro dos chumelo , si Santiago lajin Sebedeo , yan si Juan cheluña , gui sajyan yan si tatañija as Sebedeo na jalememenda y laguañija ; ya jaagang .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Sija enseguidas japolo y sajyan yan si tatañija ya madalalag güe .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: N	4	23		25490	 ¶ Ya jalilicue si Jesus iya Galilea mamanagüe gui sinagoga sija ya sumetmetmon ni raenon y evangelio , ya janafanjomlo todo y chetnot yan todo y pinite gui taotao ;

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Ya y matunaña matungo todo guiya Siria ; ya maquenenee güe guato todo manmalango , ni guaja todo clasen chetnot yan pinite ; y maninanite yan y manbababa yan y manparalitico ; ya janafanjomlo .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Ya madalalag güe linajyan taotao , guinin Galilea , yan guinin Decapolis , yan guinin Jerusalem , yan guinin Judea , yan y otro banda guiya Jordan .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: ANAE jalie si Jesus y linajyan taotao , cajulo gui un sabana , ya matachong ; ya y disipuluña manmato guiya güiya .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Ya jababa y pachotña ya jafanagüe , ilegña :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mandichoso y mamoble gui Espiritu , sa uiyonñija y raenon langet .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Mandichoso y mantriste , sa sija umanafanmagof .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Mandichoso y manmanso , sa sija ufanmaereda ni y tano .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Mandichoso y manñalang yan manmajo ni tininas , sa sija umanafanjaspog .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Mandichoso y manyóase , sa sija ufantinaca ni minaase .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Mandichoso y mangasgas corasonñija , sa sija ujalie si Yuus .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Mandichoso y fumatitinas y pas , sa sija ufanmafanaan famaguon Yuus .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mandichoso y manmapetsigue pot causa y tininas ; sa uiyonñija y raenon langet .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: Mandichoso jamyo , yaguin manmamatdise jamyo , yan manmapetsigue jamyo , yan manmasangane jamyo todo taelaye pot y naanjo , ya manmandague .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Fanmagof , ya infansenmagof , sa y premionmiyo gui langet sendangculo : sa taegüenaoja locue manmapetsigueñija y profeta sija ni y antes di jamyo .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: N	5	13		25640	 ¶ Jamyo y asigan y tano ; ya yaguin y asiga malingo y maaseña , jafa taemano manasne ? taya baliña , na umayute juyong ya umagacha ni y taotao .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: Jamyo y candet y tano . Y siuda ni maplanta gui jilo y tano táquilo ti siña umatog .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Taya candet umasonggue ya umapolo gui papa un medida ; lao umapolo gui candelero , ya umanainina todo y mangaegue gui jalom guma .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Polo ya umanina y candetmiyo gui menan y taotao sija , para ujalie y mauleg chechonmiyo , ya innamagof y tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: N	5	17		25680	 ¶ Chamiyo jumajaso na mato yo para juyulang y tinago pat y profeta sija ; ti mato yo para juyulang , lao para jucumple .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Sa magajet jusangane jamyo , nu y langet yan y tano ufalingo ; lao ni un punto ni un pongpong gui tinago ufalingo , asta qui güiya todo macumple .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ya jayeja y yumulang uno güine gui sendiquique na tinago , ya mamanagüe ni taotao , diquique umafanaan gui raenon langet ; lao jayeja y fumatinas ya mamanagüe umafanaan dangculo gui raenon langet .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Sa guajo sumangane jamyo : na y tininasmiyo yaguin ti mudongña qui y tininas y escriba yan y Fariseo sija , ti siña jamyo manjalom gui raenon langet .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: N	5	21		25720	 ¶ Injingogja y munjayan masangane sija gui manmalofan na tiempo : Chamo famumuno , ya jayeja y mamuno , peligroña gui juisio .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo na jayeja y lalalo ni cheluña , peligroña gui juisio , na jayeja y umalog ni cheluña , taetiningo jao , peligroña gui tribunal , lao jayeja y umalog bababa jao , peligroña gui guafen sasalaguan .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: Yaguin unchule y ninaimo guato gui attat , ya ayo nae unjaso na guaja linachimo gui chelumo ;

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: Polo güije y ninaimo gui menan y attat , ya unjanao finena ya inatungo yan y chelumo , ya ayo nae untalo guato ya unnaenñaejon y ninaimo .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: Atungo yan y contrariumo enseguidas , mientros gaegue jamyo gui chalanmiyo , noseaja , y cotrariumo unenentrega gui jues , ya y jues unenentrega gui ofisiat ya unmapolo gui preso .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : Seguro na ti unjuyong güije , asta qui anapase y uttimo na coble .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: N	5	27		25780	 ¶ Injingogja y munjayan masangan : Munga umábale ,

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Ya guajo sumangane jamyo , na jayeja y umatan y palaoan nu ábale na minalagoña , jafatinas yan güiya y ábale gui jalom corasonña .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Yaguin y agapa na atadogmo uninapodong jao , chule ya yute guiya jago ; sa maulegña na ufalingo un pidaso guiya jago , qui todo y tataotaomo umayute guiya sasalaguan .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ya yaguin y agapa na canaemo uninapodong jao , utut ya yute guiya jago ; sa maulegña , na ufalingo un pidaso guiya jago , qui todo y tataotaomo umayute guiya sasalagüan .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: N	5	31		25820	 ¶ Munjayan locue masangan : Jayeja y dumingo y asaguaña , umatugue y papet y inapattan umasagua .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo , na y dumingo y asaguaña ya ti pot inábale , jafatinas y ábale ; ya jayeja y umasagua ayo y umadingo , jafatinas y ábale .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: N	5	33		25840	 ¶ Injingogja locue y munjayan masangane sija gui manmalofan na tiempo : Munga manjula pot namaesa jao ; lao unfatinas ni y Señot gui jinilamo .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo : Chamiyo fanmanjujula pot jafa ; ti pot y langet , sa raenon Yuus ;

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: Ni pot y tano , sa sagan y adengña ; ni pot Jerusalem , sa siuda y dangculo na Ray ;

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Ni pot y ilumo unfanjula ; sa ti siña y gaponulo uno naapaca , ni uno naatulong .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Lao yaguin manguentos jamyo , alog : Junggan , junggan ; Aje , aje ; sa yaguin mas qui este , taelaye jumuyong .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: N	5	38		25890	 ¶ Injingogja y munjayan masangan : Atadog yan atadog , nifen yan nifen ,

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo : Chamiyo fumatinas jafa contra y tinaelaye ; yaguin jayejao pumatmada gui agapa na fasumo , birayeja ni y otro .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Ya jayeja y munaquequemumojao ya jachule y magagomo , nae locue y capamo .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ya jayeja y umafuetsas jao na unjanao yan güiya un miya ; unjanao yan güiya dos .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Y gumagao jao , nae ; ya y mumalago umayao jao , chamo jao rumiuusa .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: N	5	43		25940	 ¶ Injingogja y munjayan masangan : Guaeya y tiguangmo ya chatlie y enemigomo .

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo : Guaeya y enemigonmiyo ; bendise y mumatdidise jamyo ; fantinas mauleg ni y chumatlie jamyo , tayuyute sija as Yuus ni y munamamajlao jamyo yan y pumetsigue jamyo ,

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Para infanfamaguon y tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet , nu y janafanina y atdao gui jilo y manaelaye yan y manmauleg ; ya janauchan gui jilo y manunas yan y timanunas .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Sa yaguin inguaeya ayo y gumaeya jamyo , jafa premionmiyo ? Ada ti jafatinas locue taegüenao y publicano sija ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Yaguin unsaluda y mañelunmiyo , jafa unfatinas mauleg ? Ada ti jafatinas locue taegüenao y ti mangilisyano ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Nafangabales jamyo taegüije y tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet , cabales .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: ADAJE ya chamiyo fumatitinas y limosnanmiyo gui menan y taotao sija , para infanlinie ; sa yaguin ti taegüenao , taya premionmiyo gui tatanmiyo ni gaegue gui langet .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Yaguin unfatitinas y limosnamo , chamo na catitiye trompeta gui menamo taegüije y jafatitinas y hipocrita sija gui sinagoga , yan y plasa para uguaja minalagñija nu y taotao sija . Magajet jusangane jamyo na esta guaja premioñija .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Lao jago , yaguin unfatitinas y limosnamo , chamo natutungo y canaemo acagüe jafa checho y canaemo agapa .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Para ugaegue y limosnamo gui secreto , sa y tatamo ni jalilie gui secreto , güiya umapase jao gui publico .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: N	6	5		26040	 ¶ Ya yaguin manaetaejao , munga taegüije y hipocrita , sa sija yanñija manmanaetae gui sinagoga yan y esquinan chalan manotojgue para ufanmalie nu y taotao sija . Magajet na esta guaja premioñija .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Lao jago , yaguin manaetaejao , jalom gui aposentomo , ya juchum y pettamo , ya taetaye y tatamo ni y gaegue gui secreto ; sa y tatamo ni y jalilie gui secreto , güiya umapase jao gui publico .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: Yan manaetaejao chamo sumasangan un sinangan megae na biaje na taebale , taegüije y Gentiles ; jinasoñija na ufanmajungog pot y megae sinanganñija .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Chamiyo fumatitinas taegüije iya sija ; sa y tatanmiyo jatungoja jafa innesesita antes qui ingagao güe .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Lao an manmanaetae jamyo taegüine : Tatanmame na gaegue jao gui langet : umatuna y naanmo .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Umamaela y raenomo , umafatinas y minalagomo jaftaemano gui langet taegüijija gui tano ;

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Naejam pago nu y cada jaane na agonmame ;

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ya asiijam nu y dibenmame , taegüije yan inasisie y dumidibejam sija ;

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Ya chamojam pumópolo na infanbasnag gui tentasion , lao nafanlibrejam nu y taelaye ; sa iyomo y raeno , yan y ninasiña , yan y minalag para taejinecog na jaane ; Amen .

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: Sa yaguin inasie y umisagüe jamyo : maninasiija locue jamyo as tatanmiyo ni gaegue gui langet .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Lao yaguin ti unasie ayo sija y umisagüe jamyo , ti infaninasie locue ni tatanmiyo nu y isaomiyo .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: N	6	16		26150	 ¶ Yaguin umayuyunatjao , munga taegüije y hipocrita nu y triste na mata , jaago y matañija , para ufanmatungo ni taotao sija na manayunat . Magajet jusangane jamyo , na esta guaja premioñija .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Lao jago , yaguin umayunat jao , palalae y ilumo , ya unfagase y matamo ;

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: Para munga malilie nu y taotao sija na umayuyunat jao , lao si tatamoja ni y gaegue gui secreto ; ya si tatamo , ni jalilie gui secreto , güiya uninapase gui publico .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: N	6	19		26180	 ¶ Chamiyo fannanaetnon güinaja para jamyo gui tano , mano nae y poliya yan y lamas uyinamag , yan y saque sija uyulang yan uchule ;

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Lao fannaetnon güinaja para jamyo gui langet , mano nae ni y poliya ni y lamas ti uyinamag , ya ni y saque sija ti uyulang yan ti uchule .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Sa manoja nae gaegue y güinajanmiyo , ayoja nae gaegue locue y corasonmiyo .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: Y candet y tataotao y atadog ; yaguin y gasgas atadogmo , todo y tataotaomo ubula y manana .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Lao yaguin y taelaye na atadogmo , todo y tataotaomo jomjom , Sa yaguin y manana ni y gaegue guiya jago jomjom , jafa na gosdangculo na jinemjom !

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: N	6	24		26230	 ¶ Taya ni uno siña sumetbe dos amo ; sa jachatlie y uno , ya jaguflie y otro ; pat jadalalag y uno ya jadespresia y otro . Ti siña jamyo insetbe si Yuus yan y güinaja .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: Enao mina jusangane jamyo : Chamiyo fanmanjajaso pot y jaaninmiyo ; jafa para incano , pat jafa para inguimen ; ni pot para innaminagago y tataotaomiyo . Ada ti bale mas y linâlâmo qui y nengcano , yan y tataotaomo qui y magago ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Atanja y pajaro gui langet ; ti manmanananon , ni ti manmangongoco , ni ti manmanrecocoje jalom gui camalin ; sa si tatamoja gui langet munafañochocho . Ada ti mangaebalotña jamyo qui sija ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Ya jaye guiya jamyo , yaguin manjaso , siña jataluye y linecaña un codo ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: Ya jafa jamyo na manmanjajaso pot magago ? Jasoja y lirio sija gui fangualuan , jaftaemano manlâlâñiñija ; ti manmachochocho ya ti manmajijila .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Lao jusangane jamyo , na si Salomon yan todo y minalagña , ti minagago parejo yan uno güine sija .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Yanguin si Yuus janaminagago y chaguan gui fangualuan ; sa pago gaegue , ya agupa machule ya mapolo gui jetno , ada ti mas jamyo inninaminagago , taotao jamyo na didide jinengguenmiyo ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Enao mina , chamiyo jumajaso umalog : Jafajit tacano , pat jafajit taguimen , pat jafajit magaguta ?

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Sa todo este sija na güinaja , jaaliligao y Gentiles ; ya y tatanmiyo gui langet jatungoja na innesesita todo este sija na güinaja .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Lao aligao fenena y raenon Yuus , yan y tininasña ; ya despues todo este sija na güinaja infanmataluye .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Chamiyo jumajaso y para agupa , sa y para agupa güiyaja güe ujaso . Basta para y cada y jaane y inalulaye .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: CHAMIYO fanmanjusga para ti infanmajusga .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Sa taemanoja yan manmajusga yan manmañogne jamyo , taegüijija locue infanmajusga ; ya taemanoja y minedidamiyo , taegüijija locue infanmamediye .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Sa jafa muna unlilie y migo gui atadog y chelumo , ya ti unjajaso y jayo gui atadogmo ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Jafa taemano unalog nu y chelumo : Maela ya junajanao enao y migo gui atadogmo ; ya enagüija y jayo gui atadogmo ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Hipocrita ! Najanao finenana y jayo gui atadogmo ? ya ayo nae siña ungueflie yan para unnajanao y migo gui atadog y chelumo .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: N	7	6		26390	 ¶ Chamiyo numanae y galago nu y santos , ni inpelo y perlasmiyo gui menan y babue ; sa no seaja ujagacha nu y patasñija ya ujabira sija ya infanyenabalag jamyo .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: N	7	7		26400	 ¶ Gagao ya infanmanae ; aligao ya inseda ; yajo ya infanmababaye .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Sa jayeja y mangagao , uresibe ; ya y manaligao , usoda ; ya y manyajo , umababaye .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: Ya jayeja guiya jamyo , yaguin uguinagao nu y lajiña pan , ada unnae acho ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Pat yaguin uguinagao un güijan , ada unnae un serpiente ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Ombre manaelaye jamyo , intingo numae mauleg na ninae y famaguonmiyo ; ada ti mas y tatanmiyo , ni y gaegue gui langet , unnae mauleg na güinaja todo ayo y gumagaogüe ?

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: Enao mina , jaftaemano y malagomiyo na y taotao ufatitinas nu jamyo , taegüijija infatitinas locue nu sija ; sa este y lay yan y profeta sija .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: N	7	13		26460	 ¶ Jalom gui maiot na potta , sa y feda na potta ya micanpo y chalan nu y jumananaogüe y finalingo , ya megae sija y fumapoposgüe .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Sa y maiot na potta ya dalalae na chalan y jumananaogüe y linâlâ , ya didide sija y sumosoda .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: N	7	15		26480	 ¶ Adaje jamyo nu y ti manmagajet na profeta , ni ufanmato guiya jamyo maninagagon quininilo , lao y sanjalomñija mangaegue lobo na mañaque .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Injatingo pot y tinegchañija . Ada y taotao ufañule ubas guine y títucan jayo , pat igos guine y títucan chaguan ?

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Taegüijija todo y mauleg na trongcon jayo , siempre mauleg tinegchaña ; lao y taelaye na trongcon jayo , siempre taelaye tinegchaña .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Ti siña y mauleg na trongcon jayo manogcha taelaye ; ni y taelaye na trongcon jayo manogcha mauleg .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Todo y trongcon jayo ni ti manogcha mauleg , umautut ya umayute gui guafe ,

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Enao mina pot y tinegchañija , injatingo .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: N	7	21		26540	 ¶ Ti todo y umalog nu guajo : Señot ! Señot ! ujalom gui raenon langet ; lao ayo y fumatinas y minalago y tatajo , ni y gaegue gui langet .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Megae , güije na jaane , ualog nu guajo : Señot ! Señot ! ada ti inprofetisa pot y naanmo , yan innajanao y anite pot y naanmo , yan infatinas megae námanman na chocho pot y naanmo ?

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Ya ayo nae jusangane sija , ni y magajet ti jutungo jamyo , fanjanao guiya guajo , jamyo manmamatitinas inechong .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: N	7	24		26570	 ¶ Enao mina jayeja y jumungog este sija y sinanganjo ya fumatinas , güiya parejo yan y méjnalom na taotao , na jafatinas y guimaña gui jilo acho ;

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Ya utunog y ichan , yan ufanmato y sadog , yan ufanmanguaefe y manglo , ya ubinate ayo na guma ya ti upodong , sa mafatinas gui jilo acho .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Lao jayeja y jumungog este sija y sinanganjo , ya ti fumatinas , güiya parejo yan y bábaba na taotao na jafatinas y guimaña gui jilo unae ;

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Ya utunog y ichan yan ufanmato y sadog , yan ufanmanguaefe y manglo ya ubinate ayo na guma , ya upodong ; ya gosdangculo y pinedongña .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Ya susede , anae munjayan este sija jasangan si Jesus , ninafanmanman y linajyan taotao sija nu y doctrinaña .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Sa jafanagüe sija , calang uno ni gaeninasiña , lao ti calang y escriba sija .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: YA anae tumunog güe guinin y sabana , madalalag güe dangculo na linajyan taotao .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ya estagüe na mato un ategtog ya tinayuyut güe ilegña : Señot , yaguin malagojao , siña unnagasgas yo .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Ya jaestira y canaeña ya japacha ya ilegña : malagoyo , gasgasjao ! Ya enseguidas y ategtog gasgas .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña si Jesus : Adaje ya chamo fañangangane ni jaye ; lao falag y pale ya unfanue nu jago , ya unchule y ninae ni manago si Moises para testimonioñija .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: N	8	5		26670	 ¶ Ya anae jumalom si Jesus guiya Capernaum , mato guiya güiya un senturion guinagao güe ,

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: Ya ilegña : Señot , y tentagojo gaegue guiyajame na umaason sa malango paralitico , ya gogosninachatsaga sa adit .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Ya ilegña nui guiya : Bae jufato ya junajomlo .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Lao senturion manope ya ilegña : Señot , ti siña na guajojao junafato gui papa atufjo , lao sanganja un palabra ya ujomlo y tentagojo .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Sa guajo locue un taotao gui papa ninasiña , ya guaja sendalojo gui papa ninasiñajo ; ya yaguin ilegco nu este na taotao : Janao , ya jumanao ; yan ilegco ni otro : Maela , ya mamaela , yan ilegco ni tentagojo : Chogüe este , ya jachogüe .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Jesus , ninamanman , ya ilegña nu y dumadalalag güe : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na tayayo nae mañoda ni este na dangculon jinenggue guiya Israel !

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ya guajo sumangane jamyo , na ufanmato megae guine y sancatan , yan guine y sanlichan ; ya ufanmatachong yan si Abraham yan si Ysaac yan si Jacob gui raenon langet ;

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Lao y famaguon y raeno ufanmayute gui sumanjiyong gui jemjom ; ya ayo nae uguaja cumasao yan checheg nifen .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Entonses si Jesus ilegña nu y senturion : Janao , parejoja y unjonggue , umafatinas guiya jago ; ya y tentagoña jumonlo güije na ora .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: N	8	14		26760	 ¶ Ya anae mato si Jesus gui guiman Pedro , jalie y suegran Pedro na umaason gui cama , sa guaja calenturaña .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Ya japacha canaeña ; ya pinelo ni calentura : ya cajulo ya jasetbe sija .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Ya anae esta pupuenge , maconie güe megae na maninanite , ya janajanao guiya sija todo y anite pot y sinanganña , yan janafanjomlo todo y manmalango .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Para umacumple y esta masangan pot y profeta Isaias , na ilegña : Güiya chumule y chetnotta yan cumacatga y pinitita .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: N	8	18		26800	 ¶ Ya anae jalie si Jesus y linajyan taotao gui oriyaña , manago na ufanmalag y otro banda y sadog .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Ya mato un escriba ya ilegña nu güiya : Maestro , judalalag jao mano y malagomo guato .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Y sora sija guaja liyangñija , ya y pajaro gui langet guaja chenchonñija : lao y Lajin taotao taya mano nae unaason y iluña .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Ya otro uno gui disipuluña ilegña nu güiya : Señot , nae yo lisensia ya jujanao finena ya jujafot y tatajo .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Dalalag yo ; ya polo ya y manmatae ufanjinafot ni y mangaematae .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: N	8	23		26850	 ¶ Ya anae jumalom gui un sajyan , y disipuluña sija madalalag güe .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Ya dangculo na pagyo mato gui tase ya y sajyan tinatampe nu y napo sija ; ya güiya mamaegoja .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Ya manmato guiya güiya y disipuluña ya mayajogüe ilegñija : Señot , nafanlibrejam sa manmalingojam !

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na manmaañao jamyo , taotao na didide jinengguenmiyo ? Ayo nae cajulo ya jachoma y manglo yan y tase , ya dangculo na minalinao guaja .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Ya y taotao sija manmanman , ya ilegñija ; jafa este na taotao na y manglo yan y tase maoosgueja güe ?

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: N	8	28		26900	 ¶ Ya anae mato gui otro banda gui tano y taotao Gadara sija , umasoda yan dos na gaemanganite na manguine y naftan , yan mangosnamaañao y jechurañija ; ya taya siña malofan güije na chalan .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Ya estagüe , na manaagang ilegñija : Para jafajam nu jago Lajin Yuus ? Matojao güine para usapetjam antes di y tiempo ?

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Ya chago guiya sija estaba un manada na gosmegae na babue mañochocho .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Y anite sija matayuyutgüe ilegñija : Yaguin unyutejam juyong , najanaojam na fanmalag ayo y babue sija .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Janao . Ya sija manjuyong ya , manmalag gui jalom y manadan babue ; ya , estagüe , todo y babue manmalago papa gui un didog na lugat , asta y jalom tase , ya manmatae gui janom tase .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Y munafañochocho y babue manmalago ya manmalag y siuda , ya jasangan todo y guaja , ya jafa susede yan y mangaemanganite .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ya , estagüe , todo y siuda manjanao para ufanasoda yan si Jesus , ya anae maliigüe , matayuyutgüe na ujanao gui tanoñija .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: YA jumalom gui un batco , mapos güe , ya malag y otro banda ya mato gui suidaña .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ya , estagüe , sija na manmangongone güe un malango , umaason gui cama sa paralitico ; ya anae jalie si Jesus y jinenggueñija , ilegña nu y paralitico : Angoco lajijo ; y isaomo unmaasie .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Ya estagüe sija palo escriba na ilegñija gui sanjalomñija : Este chumatfino contra si Yuus .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Ya anae jatungo si Jesus y jinasoñija , ilegña : Jafa na manmanjajaso jamyo taelaye gui corasonmiyo ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
