text2: Sa jafa mas guse masangan : Y isaomo unmaasie : pat masangan : Cajulo ya unfamocat ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Lao para intingoja na y Lajin taotao guaja ninasiñaña , gui jilo tano , para umaasie isao ; ( ayo nae ilegña nu y paralitico ) , Cajulo , chule y camamo ya unjanao para iyajamyo .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Ayo nae cajulo ya mapos para iyasija .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Ya anae malie nu y linajyan taotao , ninafanmanman , ya manamalag si Yuus , sa mannae nu ayo na ninasiña gui taotao sija .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: N	9	9		27050	 ¶ Ya anae malofan si Jesus güije , jalie un taotao na matatachong gui bancon y tributo , na y naanña si Mateo , ya ilegña nu güiya , Dalalagyo . Ya cajulo ya dinalalag güe .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Ya susede anae estaba güe , matachong chumochocho gui jalom guma , estagüe , sija megae na publicano yan manisao , manmato ya mañija manmatachong gui lamasa yan si Jesus yan y disipuluña sija .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ya anae malie este nu y Fariseo sija , ilegñija nu y disipuluña : Sa jafa y maestronmiyo na mañisija mañocho yan y publicano yan y manisao ?

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Lao anae jajungog ayo , ilegña : Y manaechetnot ti janesesita medico : lao y manmalango .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Janao ya inquetungo jafa este : Minaase malagojo , ya ti inefrese ; sa ti mato yo para juaagang y manunas , lao y manisao para ufanmañotsot .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: N	9	14		27100	 ¶ Ayo nae y disipulon Juan manmato guiya güiya ya ilegñija : Jafa jame yan y Fariseo sija na manayuyunat megae ; ya y disipulumo ti manayuyunat ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Siña y mangachong y nobio , mantriste yaguin mañisijaja yan y nobio ? Lao ufato y jaane , na y nobio umacone guiya sija , ya ayo nae ufanayunat .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Taya ni un taotao lumimendanñaejon y nuebo na magago gui mamagagonñañajeon ni y bijo ; sa ayo na lemenda usuja gui magago , ya y minatitegña sentaelaye .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Ni umasajguane locue y nuebo na bino gui bijo na boteyan cuero sa y boteyan cuero umafag ya umachuda y bino , ya manmalingo y boteyan cuero ; lao umasajguane y nuebo na bino gui nuebo na boteyan cuero , ya uchamaog y dos .

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: N	9	18		27140	 ¶ Mientras jasangangane sija ni este , estagüe , un magas na mato ya inadoragüe ilegña : Y jagajo matae tiampmanja ; lao nije ya maela ya unpolo y canaemo gui jiloña ya ulâlâ .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Ya cajulo si Jesus ya dinalalag güe , yan y disipuluña locue .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: N	9	20		27160	 ¶ Ya , estagüe , un palaoan na malango nu y minilalag y jâgâ , esta dose años , mato gui tateña ya japacha y madoblan y magaguña ;

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Sa ilegña gui sumanjalomña : Yaguin jupachaja y magaguña , jujomlo .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Lao si Jesus jabiragüe ya anae malie güe ilegña : Jagajo , angoco , y jinengguemo unninajomlo . Ya y palaoan ninajomlo desde ayo na ora .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Ya anae mato si Jesus gui guima ayo na magas , ya jalie y mandadandan nu y flauta yan y taotao sija manboruruca ,

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Ylegña : Fañuja ; sa y patgon palaoan ti mamatae , lao mamaego . Ya mabutleagüe .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Lao y taotao sija anae mañuja , güiya mapos jalom , ya jamantiene canaeña ; ya y patgon palaoan cajulo .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Ya malofan este na fama todo güije na tano .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: N	9	27		27230	 ¶ Anae mafapos si Jesus güije , madalalag güe dos taotao na bachet na umaagang ilegñija : Gaease nu jame , jago , Lajin David .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Ya anae mato guato gui jalom guma , manmato guiya güiya y dos bachet , ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Injenggue na guajo siña jufatinas este ? Ya sija ilegñija : Junggan Señot .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ayo nae japacha y atadogñija ya ilegña : Parejoja y jinengguenmiyo umafatinas .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Ya y atadogñija manmababa . Ya si Jesus jagosencatga ilegña . Adaje ya chamiyo munatutungo ni uno .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Lao anae manmapos sija , manafamta y famaña todo güije na tano .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: N	9	32		27280	 ¶ Ya anae manmapos sija ; estagüe , machule guiya güiya un taotao na udo , na gaeanite .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Anae ninajanao y anite y udo cumuentos . Ya y linajyan taotao ninafanmanman ya ilegñija : Taya este nae malie guiya Israel .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Lao y Fariseo sija ilegñija : Pot y ninasiña y prinsipen anite , janajanao y anite sija .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Ya jalilicue si Jesus todo y siuda sija yan y sengsong , mamananagüe gui guima Yuusñija , ya jasesetmon y ebangelion y raeno , yan janafanmamagong todo y chetnot yan todo y pinite gui taotao sija .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: N	9	36		27320	 ¶ Anae jalie y linajyan taotao , ninamaase nu sija , sa manadingo ya manmachalapon calang y quinilo nu y taya pastotñija .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Ayo nae ilegña nu y disipuluña : Magajet na y cosecha megae : lao y manfáfachocho didide .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Tayuyut y Señot y cosecha ya utago y manfáfachocho gui cosechaña .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: AYO nae jaagang y dose na disipuluña , ya janae ninasiñañija contra y manaplacha na espiritu , para ujayute juyong ; yan unafanmagong todo y chetnot , yan todo y manpinite .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Ya y naan y dose apostoles sija este sija : Y finenana , si Simon na mafanaan si Pedro , yan si Andres cheluña : si Santiago , lajin Sebedeo , yan si Juan cheluña ;

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Si Felipe , yan si Bartolome ; si Tomas , yan si Mateo y publicano ; si Santiago , lajin Alfeo , yan si Lebeo , na y apiyiduña si Tadeo ;

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Si Simon Selote , yan si Judas Iscariote , ni y umintrega güe locue .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Este y dose sija mantinago as Jesus na ufanjanao ya maninencatga ilegña : Chamiyo fanmalag y chalan y Gentiles ; yan y siuda y Samaritano sija chamiyo fanjajalom :

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Lao gosmauleg para ufanmalag y malingo na quinilo gui guima Israel .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Anae manjanao jamyo , setmon ya alog : Y raenon langet mato jijot .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Nafanjomlo y manmalango , nafan gasgas y manategtog , nafangajulo y manmatae , nafanjanao y anite sija : pot grasia na inresibe , fanmannae pot grasia .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Chamiyo fannanaetnon oro ni salape ni coble gui betsanmiyo ;

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Ni tengguang para y chalan , ni dos na magago ni sapatos , ni baston ; sa y fafáchocho jamerese y nengcanoña .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Yan todo na siuda , pat songsong na manjalom jamyo , guesaligao jaye mumerese , ya fañaga güije asta qui para infanjanao .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Yaguin manjalom jamyo gui guima , saluda .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Yaguin y guima jamerese , y pasmiyo usaga guiya güiya ; lao yaguin ti jamerese , y pasmiyo utaloja guato guiya jamyo .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Ya jayeja y ti rumesibe jamyo , yan ti jaecungog y sinanganmiyo , fanjanao güije na guma pat suida , ya insacude contra sija todo y petbos gui adengmiyo .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : Y mas mauleg para y tano Sodoma yan Gomora gui jaanin sentensia , qui para ayo na siuda .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: N	10	16		27500	 ¶ Estagüe , na guajo jamyo tumago , calang quinilo gui entalo lobo sija ; fanmalate calang y serpiente sija , yan y fanmanso calang y paluma sija .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Adaje jamyo nu y taotao sija ; sa infaninentrega gui inetnon ofisiat , ya infanmasaolag gui sinagogañija ;

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Ya infanmacone guato gui menan magalaje yan ray pot y naanjo , para testimonio contra sija yan y Gentiles .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Lao yaguin manmaentrega jamyo , chamiyo jumajaso jafa para insangan ; so ayoja na ora infanmanae jafa para insangan .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Sa ti jamyo infanguentos , lao y Espiritun y Tatanmiyo ni y cumuecuentos gui jalommiyo .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: Y cheloja uinentrega y cheluña para umapuno , ya y tata y lajiña : ya y famaguon ufangajulo contra tatañija , ujanamapuno .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Ya todo infanchinatlie pot y naanjo ; lao y sumigue asta y uttimo , güiya ucajulo gui langet .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Lao yaguin manmapetsigue jamyo gui un suida , fanmalag y otro : sa magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti infanmunjayan manjanao todo gui siudan Israel , asta qui mato y Lajin taotao .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Y disipulo , ti dangculoña qui y maestro , yan y tentago qui y amuña .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Bastaja y disipulo yaguin parejoja y maestruña , ya y tentago yaguin parejoja y amuña . Sa yaguin y tata gui guima mafanaan Beetsebub , cuanto mas y familiana ?

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Chamiyo fanmaañao ; sa taya matatampe , para ti umalie : yan manaatog para ti umatungo .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Todo sija y jusangane jamyo gui jemjom , sanganñaejon gui manana : ya todo sija y injingog gui talanga , sanganñaejon desde y jilo guma .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ya chamiyo fanmaañao ni upinino y tataotao ; sa ti siña japuno y ante : lao fanmaañaoñao ni ayo y siña yumute y tataotao yan y ante guato guiya sasalaguan .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Ada ti mabende dos gorrión na pájaro pot un coble ? yan ni uno guiya sija upodong gui tano sin utungo si tatanmiyo .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Y gaponulonmiyo locue esta todo manmatufong .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Chamiyo fanmaañao ; sa mas manbaliñaja jamyo qui y megae na pájaro .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Jayeja y sumanganyo gui menan taotao , güajo locue jusangangüe gui menam y tatajo ni gaegue gui langet .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ya jayeja y pumuneyo gui menan taotao sija , guajo locue jupune güe gui menan y tatajo ni y gaegue gui langet .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: N	10	34		27680	 ¶ Chamiyo jumajaso na mato yo para jupolo pas gui tano : ti matoyo para jupolo pas , lao espada .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Sa mato yo para jupolo inaguaguat y laje contra y tataña , ya y jaga contra y nanaña , ya y yetna contra y suegraña .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Ya y enemigoñija mangaegueja guiya sija .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Y gumaeya y tataña pat y nanaña mas qui guajo , ti ufanmerese nu guajo ; ya y gumaeya y lajiña pat y jagaña mas qui guajo , ti ufanmerese nu guajo .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Ya , y ti chumule y quiluusña ya udalalagyo , ti ufanmerese nu guajo .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Y sumoda y linâlâña , ufinalingaeguan ; ya y finalingaeguan ni y linâlâña pot y naanjo , güiya usoda .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: N	10	40		27740	 ¶ Y rumisibe jamyo , jaresibeja yo ; ya y rumisibeyo , jaresibeja y tumagoyo .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Y rumesibe un profeta pot y naan profeta , uresibe y premion profeta ; ya y rumesibe y taotao tunas pot y naan y taotao tunas , uresibe y premion y taotao tunas .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Ya masquesea jayeja y numae uno güine nu este sija y mandiquique , unoja bason janom ni y fresco , pot y naan y disipulo , magajet jusangane jamyo na ti ufalingo y premiuña .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: YA anae munjayan jatago si Jesus y dose disipuluña , jumanao para ufamanagüe , yan usetmom gui siudañija .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Anae jajungog si Juan , gui guima presuña , y finatinas Jesucristo ; jatago . dos gui disipuluña ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Ya ilegña : Jago ayo y para ufato pat infanmannanggajam otro ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ilegña : Janao ya innatungo si Juan todo ni y liniimiyo yan y jiningogmiyo .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Y bachet manmanlie , y mancojo manmamocat , y manategtog mangasgas , y mananga manmanjungog : y manmatae manafangajulo ya y mamoble manmasangane ni y evangelio .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Ya dichoso y ti sumasoda lugat para umatompo guiya guajo .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: N	11	7		27830	 ¶ Anae manmapos sija , jatutujon si Jesus sumangan si Juan gui linajyan taotao . Jafa injanagüe jamyo para inlie gui desierto ? un trongcon piao na ninamayeyengyong ni y manglo ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Pat , jafa injanagüe jamyo para inlie ? un taotao na minagagon fino na magago ? Estagüe , sija y manminagagon fino na magago , mangaegue gui guima y ray sija .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Lao pot jafa injanagüe jamyo ? Para inlie un profeta ? Junggan , jusangane jamyo , mas qui y profeta .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Sa este yuje y munjayan matugue : Estagüe na junajanao y taotao y tinagojo gui menan matamo , para ufamauleg y chalanmo gui menamo .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti ucajulo gui entalo y manmafañañago gui famalaoan , uno mas dangculo qui si Juan Bautista ; lao y mas diquique gui raenon langet mas dangculo qui güiya .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Ya desde y jaanin Juan Bautista asta pago , y raenon langet gaeninasiña ; ya y manmatatnga sija uamot .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Sa todo y profeta sija , yan y lay , japrofetisa asta si Juan .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: An manmalago jamyo inresibe ; güiya si Ilias ni y umamaela .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Y gaetalanga para unfanjungog , güiya ujungog .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: N	11	16		27920	 ¶ Lao jaye nae juacompara este na rasa ? Manparejo yan y famaguon ni manmatatachong gui plasa ya jaagang y mangachongñija ,

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Indandane jamyo flauta , ya ti manbaela jamyo , manuugong jamyo lao ti manatanges jamyo .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Sa mato si Juan ya ti chumocho ni gunimen , ya ilegñija : Gaeanite güe .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Ya mato y Lajin taotao ya chumocho yan gumimen , ya ilegñija : Estagüe un taotao na gachumocho , yan gagumimem , amigon y publicano sija yan y manisao ; lao y tiningo manacabales ni y finatinasña .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: N	11	20		27960	 ¶ Ayo nae jatutujon lumalalatde y siuda sija nae guinin jafatinas sumenmegae na namanman Sa ti manmanjonggue , ilegña :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Ayjao , Corasin ! Ayjao , Betsaida ! sa yaguin iya Tiro yan Sidon nae mafatinas ayo y mannamanman ni y mafatinas guiya jamyo , esta jagas manmañotsot gui silisio yan apo .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo , na mas songunon Tiro yan Sidon qui para jamyo gui jaanin y sentensia .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Ya jago , Capernaum , ni y jagas manataquito jao asta y langet ; unmayute jao papa sasalaguan ; sa yaguin iya Sodoma nae mojon mafatinas todo ayo y mannamanman ni jagas mafatinas guiya jago , mangagaegueja mojon asta pago na jaane .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo ; na y mas songunon tano Sodoma , qui para jago gui jaanin y sentensia .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: N	11	25		28010	 ¶ Ayo na tiempo nae , manope si Jesus ilegña : Grasias junaejao , Tata , Señot y langet yan y tano , sa unnafanatog estesija gui manmalate yan manmejnalom , ya unfanue y famaguon .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Taegüenaoja Tata : sa taegüenao y mauleg gui liniimo .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Todo y güinaja jaentrega yo si Tata ; ya taya tumungo y Lajiña na si Tataja : ni taya tumungo , si Tata na y lajiñaja , ya ayoja y lajiña malagoña unafanungo .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: N	11	28		28040	 ¶ Maela guiya guajo todo y manyayas , yan y menoson , ya guajo junafandescansa .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Polo y yugojo gui jilomiyo , ya infaneyag guiya guajo , sa guajo manso yan umitde gui corasonjo ; ya infanmañoda descanso para y antinmiyo .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Sa y yugojo mañana , ya y catgaco ñajlalang .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: AYO na tiempo nae jumajanao si Jesus un sabalo na jaane gui entalo mais ya y disipuluña manñalang , ya jatutujon manmañule ni espiga ya jacano .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Ya anae jalie y Fariseo sija , ilegñija : Estagüe y disipulumo na jafatitinas y ti mauleg para umafatinas gui sabalo na jaane .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Ada ti untaetae , jafa finatinasña si David , anae ñalang yan y mangachogña ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Jaftaemano jumalom gui guimayuus , ya jacano y pan proposision sija , na ti cabales güiya ucano , ni y mangachongña ; lao para y mamaleja ?

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Pat , ada ti untaetae gui lay , na y jaanin y sabado , gui templo y mamale sija japrofana y sabado , ya taya isaoñija ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Guajo sumangane jamyo , uno mas dangculo qui y templo gaegue güine .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Lao yaguin intingo jafa este ilelegña , Minaase malagojo , ti inefrese , ti insangan mojon contra y manaeisao .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Sa y Señot y sabado y Lajin taotao .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: N	12	9		28150	 ¶ Ya anae jumanao güije malag y gumayusñija ;

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Ya estagüe un taotao na majlog y canaeña ; ya mafaesen ilegñija : Ada mauleg para jita na infanamte gui sabado ? para umafaaela güe .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Ya güiya ilegna : Jafa taotao guaja gui entalo miyo yaguin guaja un quinilo na podong gui joyo , gui jaanin sabalo , ada ti uestira y canaeña ya jochule ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Ada ti mas baliña un taotao qui un quinilo ? Pot este , cabales na umafatinas mauleg gui jaanin sabado .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña ni y ayo na taotao : Juto y canaemo ; ya jajuto ya finamauleg talo parejo yan y otro .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: N	12	14		28200	 ¶ Ayo nae y Fariseo sija manjanao , ya manafaesen entre sija contra güiya para umapuno güe .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Lao anae jatungo ai Jesus , mapos güije ; ya madalalag güe linajyan taotao , ya janafanjomlo todosija .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Ya güiya guefmanencatga , na chañija munamatutungo güe .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Para umacumple y esta munjayan masangan pot y profeta Isaias , ilegña :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Estagüiya y tentagojo ni y juayig , y güinaeyaco ni y janamagof y antijo : na jupoluye ni y Espiritujo gui jiloña , ya jasangane Gentiles y juisio .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Ti upotfia , ni uagang ; ya taya ni uno ujiningog y inagangña gui chalan .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Ti umayulang y piao ni mayamag ni umapuno y mechan dangis ni y aasa asta qui machule y juisio para y guinana .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Ya pot y naanña , manmannanangga y Gentiles .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: N	12	22		28280	 ¶ Ya machuliegüe guato un inanite , na bachet yan udo , ya janajomlo ; ayo nae cumuentos y udo yan manlie .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Ya todo y taotao sija ninafanmanman , ya ilegñija : Ada ti este yuje y lajin David ?

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Lao y Fariseo sija jajungog ya ilegñija : Este ti uyute juyong y anite , yaguin ti pot Beetsebub , magas y anite sija .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Ya si Jesus , anae jatungo y jinasoñija , ilegña : Todo y raeno umadibide contra güiyaja uyulang ; ya cada guma , pat siuda , umadibide contra güiyaja , ti usaga .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Yaguin si Satanas jayute juyong si Satanas , güiya umadibide contra güiyaja , ya jaftaemano y raenoña sumaga ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Yanguin guajo pot si Beetsebub juyuyute juyong y anite sija ; pot jaye y famaguonmiyo , fanyinite sija juyong ? Pot ayo , sija ufanjuesmiyo .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Yanguin pot y Espiritun Yuus , juyute juyong y anite sija , magajet na esta mato guiya jamyo y raenon Yuus .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Sajafa ? Jaftaemano siña un taotao jumalom gui guima y matatnga na taotao ya uyulang todo y güinajaña , yanguin ti jagode finenana y matatnga ? Ayo nae siña jayulang y guimaña .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Y ti jumajame , contrariujo güe ; ya y ti rumecoje güe guiya guajo , güiya umachalapon .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: N	12	31		28370	 ¶ Pot enao na jusangane jamyo : Todo isao yan y chatfino contra si Yuus , umasie y taotao sija ; lao y chatfino contra y Espiritu , ti umaasie y taotao .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ya jayeja y cumuentos contra y Lajin taotao , umaasie ; lao jayeja y cumuentos contra y Espiritu Santo , ti umaasie , ni este na tiempo , ni y ayo na mamamaela .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Fatinas mauleg na trongcon jayo , yan y tinegchaña mauleg ; pat fatinas taelaye na trongcon jayo , yan taelaye y tinegchaña ; sa pot y tinegchaña , y jayo esta matungo .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: O rasan culebla ! jafa taemano jamyo na manaelaye siña manguentos mauleg , lo sa gui minegae y guaja gui corason , sinasangan y pachot .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Y mauleg na taotao , nu y mauleg na güinaja gui corasonña , mauleg chinileleña ; lao y taelaye na taotao , nu y taelaye na güinaja gui corasonña , taelaye chinileleña .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo , na todo y finijo na taesetbe ya jasasangan y taotao sija , janesesita ufanmannae cuenta gui jaanin y sentensia .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Sa pot y finomo na unmanatunas jao , yan pot y finomo na unmasentensia jao .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: N	12	38		28440	 ¶ Ayo nae manmanope y escriba yan y Fariseo sija ilegñija : Maestro manmalagojam na inlie un señatmo .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Ya güiya manope ilegña nu sija : y generasion manaelaye yan manábale manmanaliligao y señat , lao taya señat ufanmanae , na y señat Jonas profeta .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Sa taegüenaoja si Jonas sumaga tres na jaane yan tres na puenge gui jalom y tiyan y bayena , ayo locue mina y Lajin taotao , usaga tres na jaane yan tres na puenge gui jalom corason y tano .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Y taotao Ninibe ufangajulo gui juisio yan este na generasion , ya ufanmasentensia , sa sija manmañotsot ni y setmon Jonas ; ya estagüeja , uno güine na lugat na mas dangculo qui si Jonas .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Y raena gui sancatan ucajulo gui juisio yan este na generasion ya ufanmasentensia , sa mato guine y uttimon tano , para uecungog y tiningo Salomon , ya estagüeja uno güine na lugat na mas dangculo qui si Salomon .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Yanguin y áplacha na espiritu jumanao gui taotao , mamomocat gui anglo na lugat , ya jaaliligao nae udescansa , lao ti mañoda .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña : Jutalo guato para y iyajame ni anae guine ayoyo . Ya anae mato guato , jasoda taesinajguan , binale yan maadotna .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Ayo nae mapos , ya mangone talo gachongña siete na espiritu na mas taelaye qui güiya , ya manjalom ya mañaga güije ; ya mas taelaye uttimoña yuje na taotao qui y finenaña . Taegüineja locue ujumuyong este na generasion y manaelaye .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: N	12	46		28520	 ¶ Ya anae estaba güe cumuecuentos yan y taotao sija ; estagüe , si nanaña , yan y mañeluña mangaegue gui sumanjiyong , na manmalago na umacuentuse güe .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Ya ilegña uno : Estagüe , si nanamo , yan y mañelumo gui sumanjiyong , na manmalago na umacuentuse jao .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Ya güiya jaope ayo y sumangan este , ya ilegña : Jaye nanajo yan jaye mañelujo ?

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ya jajuto y canaeña gui disipuluña , ya ilegña : Estagüe , y nanajo yan y mañelujo .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Sa todo ayo y fumatinas y minalago y Tatajo ni y gaegue gui langet , este güiya chelujo laje , yan chelujo palaoan , yan nanajo .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: AYO na jaane , jinanaoña si Jesus gui guima , matachong gui oriyan tase .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Ya mato guiya güiya dangculo na linajyan taotao ; ya jumalom güe gui un batco , ya matachong ; ya todo y linajyan taotao manmatachong gui oriyan unae .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Ya jacuentuse sija megae na acomparasion , ilegña : Estagüe y tátanom na jumuyong para ufananom .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Ya anae manananom , palo gui semiya manpodong gui oriyan chalan , ya manmato y pájaro sija ya macano .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Palo gui semiya manpodong gui jilo acho na lugat , na ti megae odaña ; ya doco ti apmam , sa ti tadong papa gui eda .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Lao anae manina y atdao , mansinenggue sa taejale , ya ninamalayo .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Ya palo mamodong gui entalo títuca sija ya mandoco y títuca ya chiniguet .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Ya palo manpodong gui mauleg na oda , ya manmanogcha ; y uno siento , y otro sesenta , y otro treinta .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Y gaetalanga para ufanjungog , güiya ujungog .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Ayo nae manmato y disipuluña sija ya ilegñija : Jafajao na cumuecuentuse sija pot acomparasion sija ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Ya güiya manope ilegña . Sa esta manmanae jamyo , para intingo y misterion y raenon langet , lao sija ti ufanmanae .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Sa jayeja y guaja , umanae para uguaja mas ; lao ayo y taya iyoña , achog uguaja y iyoña , umachule .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Enaomina jucuentuse sija pot acomparasion ; sa y manmanaatan , ya ti manmanlie , ya manecungog , ya ti manmanjujungog , ni ujatungo .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Y ya sija nae umacumple y sinangan Isaias ni ilegña : Anae manmanjujungog , ujungog ya ti utungo ; ya anae manmanaatan , ufanmanlie , ya ti ujasiente .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Sa y corasonñija este na taotao sija manmacat , ya y talangañija mapot manmanjungog , ya y atadogñija jajujuchom ; para chañija fanmanlilie ni atadogñija , yan ufanmanjungog ni talangañija , ya ujatungo ni corasonñija , ya ujatolaeca sija , ya guajo junajomlo sija .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Lao mandichoso y atadogmiyo , sa manmanlie , yan y talanganmiyo sa manmanjungog .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Sa magajet jusangane jamyo , na megae na profeta , yan manunas na taotao jagasja manmalago na ujalie y liniinmiyo , ya ti jalie ; yan ujajungog y jiningogmiyo , ya ti jajungog .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: N	13	18		28740	 ¶ Ecungog jamyo y acomparision y tátanom .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Jayeja y umecungog y sinangan y raeno , ya ti jatungo , mato y Taelaye ya janajanao y esta matanme gui corasonña . Este yuje semiya ni y pedong gui oriyan chalan .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Ya ayo y matanme gui jilo acho na lugat , este yuje y jumungog y sinangan , ya jaresibe ni y minagofña .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Lao taya jale guiya güiya , ya gaegue un ratoja ; sa anae mato y triniste yan minamajlao pot causan di y sinangan , ti apmam matompo gui isao .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Ya ayo y matanme gui entalo títuca sija ; este yuje y jumungog y sinangan ; lao y inadajiña ni y tano , yan dinague ni güinaja , jañucot y sinangan ya sumaga sin tinegchaña .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Lao ayo y matanme gui mauleg na oda ; este yuje y jumungog y sinangan ya jatungo , ya manogcha locue ; ya y tinegchaña y uno siento , ya y otro sesenta , ya y otro treinta .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: N	13	24		28800	 ¶ Otro acomparasion jasangane sija ilegña : Y raenon langet parejoja yan un taotao ni manananom gui fangualuanña , mauleg na semiya .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Ya y tiempo nae manmamaego y taotao sija , mato y enemigo ya jatanme y taelaye na chaguan gui entalo y trigo , ya mapos .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Ya anae mandoco y trigo ya manmanogcha , y taelaye na chaguan mandoco locue .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Ya manmato y tentago y tatan familia ya ilegñija nu güiya : Señot , ada ti mauleg na semiya tinanommo gui fangualuanmo ? Jafa mina guaja taelaye na chaguan ?

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Ylegña nu sija : Un enemigo fumatinas este . Ya y tentagoña ilegñija nu güiya : Malagojao ya infanjanao ya inchile ?

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Ylegña : Munga , sa no sea yaguin inchile y taelaye na chaguan , innabineog locue y trigo .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Polo ya ufandaña mandoco sija na dos asta y quineco ; an mato y tiempon quineco , bae jualog ni para ufanmangoco : Chile finena y taelaye na chaguan , ya inguede famanojo para umasonggue ; ya y trigo polo gui jalom y camalinjo .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: N	13	31		28870	 ¶ Otro acomparasion sinangane sija ilegña : Y raenon langet parejoja yan y pepitas y mostasa , ni jachule un taotao ya jatanme gui fangualuanña .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Magajet na güiya mas diquique gui todo y semiya sija ; lao anae esta mandoco , güiya mas dangculo gui manmagogulae , ya mamatrongconjayo , ya manmato sija y pájaron y aire , ya manmamatinas y chenchon gui ramasña .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: N	13	33		28890	 ¶ Otro acomparasion sinangane sija ilegña : Y raenon langet , parejoja yan y libadura , ni y un palaoan jachule ya janana gui tres medidan arina , asta qui todo manbolacho .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Todo estesija jasangan si Jesus pot acomparasion gui linajyan taotao ; ya taya jasangane sija sin acomparasion .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Para umacumple y munjayan masangan pot y profeta na ilegña : Jubaba y pachotto pot acomparasion : ya jusangan güinaja sija ni manafanatog desde y plinantan y tano .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Ayo nae jadingo y linajyan taotao ya mapos , ya jumalon gui guima ; ya manmato guiya güiya y disipuluña sija , ya ilegñija : Naclaruyejam ni y acomparasion y taelaye na chaguan gui fangualuan .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Ya manope sija ilegña : Ayo y mananom mauleg na semiya y Lajin taotao yuje .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Y fangualuan , y tano ; y manmauleg na semiya , y famaguon y raeno , ya y taelaye na chaguan y famaguon y Maligno .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Y enemigo , ni y tumanme , y anitegüe ; ya y quineco , y jinecog y siglo ; ya y para ufanmangone , y angjet sija .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Sa taegüenao machule y taelaye na chaguan ya masonggue gui guafe , taegüijija locue y jinecog y siglo .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Ya utago y Lajin taotao y angjetña sija ; ya urecoje todo ayo sija y fumatitinas y tinempo , yan y fumatitinas y tinaelaye ;

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ya uyute gui jetnon guafe ; ya ayo nae uguaja tumanges , yan chegcheg nifen .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ayo nae y manunas , ufanmanina calang y atdao , gui raenon y Tatanñija . Y gaetalanga para ufanjungog , güiya ujungog .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: N	13	44		29000	 ¶ Y raenon langet locue , parejoja yan un senguaguan na güinaja ni y mananana gui un fangualuan , ya un taotao , anae jasoda , janana , ya mapos yan pot y minagofña jabende todo y iyoña ya jafajan ayo na fangualuan .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: N	13	45		29010	 ¶ Y raenon langet parejoja locue yan un taotao ni manbebende , na manaliligao bonito na petlas :

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Ya anae mañoda un petlas na senguaguan , mapos ya jabende todo y güinajaña ya jafajan ayo .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: N	13	47		29030	 ¶ Y raenon langet parejoja locue , yan un lagua ni y mayute guato gui tase , ya mangone todo clase :

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Ya anae esta bula , majala guato gui oriyan unae ; ya manmatachong , ya majoca y manmauleg ya masajguane gui sajguanñija , ya y manaelaye mayute juyong .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Taegüinija locue y jinecog y siglo : ufato y angiet sija ya ujanafanjanao y manaelaye gui entalo y manunas ;

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ya ujayute gui jetnon guafe ; ya ayo nae uguaja güije tumanges , yan chegcheg nifen .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Intingo todo estesija ? Sija ilegñija nu guiya : Junggan .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Pot este todo escriba ni mafatinas disipulo gui raenon langet , parejoja yan y tatan un familia , ni y jachuchule gui güinajaña bijo sija , yan nuebo sija .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: N	13	53		29090	 ¶ Ya anae janafonjayan si Jesus todo este sija na acomparasion , mapos güije .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Ya anae mato gui tanoña , mamanagüe gui guimayuusñija , ya sija ninafanmanman , ya ilegñija : Guine mano nae jumuyong este na tiningoña , ya este sija mandangculo na ninasiña ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Ada ti güiya este y lajin y catpintero ? Ada si nanaña ti mafanaan si Maria ? yan y mañeluña , ti sija si Santiago , si José , si Simon , yan si Judas ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Ya ada ti manjijita yan y mañeluña palaoan ? Guine mano nae uguaja este na taotao todo estesija ? Ya guaja guiya güiya disgusto .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Y profeta taya onraña , gui tanoña yan y guimaña ; lao gaeonraña gui otro lugat .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Ya ti jafatinas güije megae na mannamanman , sa taya jinengguenñija .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: AYO na tiempo si Herodes y tetrarca jajungog y faman Jesus ;

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Ya ilegña nu y tentagoña sija : Este si Juan Bautista : güiya cajulo gui entalo y manmatae , enao mina mandangculo na mannamanman jafatitinas guiya güiya .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: N	14	3		29170	 ¶ Sa si Herodes esta jacone si Juan , ya jagode , ya japolo gui calaboso , pot si Herodias , asaguan Felipe y cheluña .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Sa si Juan ilegña nu güiya : Ti tunas na un guaja jao nu este na palaoan .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Ya anae malago na upinino güe , maañao ni y linajyan taotao ; sa pineloñija na si Juan profeta güe .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Ya anae mato y jaanin y mafañagon Herodes , y jagan Herodias bumaela gui talo , ya ninamagof si Herodes ,

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Ya pot este japromete ya manjula na uninae todo y guinagaoña .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ya güiya guinin umatungo finena an nanaña , ya ilegña : Naeyo güine gui un plato ni y ilon Juan Bautista .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Ayo nae y ray ninatriste ; lao pot causa y juramentoña yan y mangachongña na mangaegue gui lamasa , manago na umanae .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Ya , manago na umautot y ilon Juan gui calaboso .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Ya machule guato y ilo gui un plato , ya manae y patgon palaoan , ya güiya chumule para si nanaña .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Ya y disipuluña sija , manmato ya machule y tataotaoña , ya majafot , ya manmapos , ya masangane si Jesus .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: N	14	13		29270	 ¶ Ya anae jajungog este si Jesus , mapos güije gui un batco para y desierto na lugat na sumajnge : ya anae majungog ni y linajyan taotao sija , madalalague güe , manmamocatja desde siuda sija .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Ya jumanao si Jesus , ya jalie y dangculo na linajyan taotao : ya ninamaase ni ayo sija , ya janafanjomlo y manmalango sija .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: N	14	15		29290	 ¶ Ya anae estaba pupnenge güije na jaane , manmato guiya güiya y disipuluña sija ya ilegñija ; Este na lugat desierto ya y tiempo esta ufalofan ; tago y linajyan taotao ya ufanjanao , ya ufanmalag y sengsong sija , ya ufanmamajan nañija .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Taya nesesida na sija ufanjanao : jamyo innae nañija .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Sija ilegñija nu güiya : Taya güine guaja na sincoja na pan , ya dos na güijan .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Güiya ilegña : Chulieyofan güine mague .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Ya jatago y linajyan taotao na ufanmatachong gui jilo chaguan , jachule y sinco na pan yan dos na güijan ya jaatan julo y langet , ya jabendise : ya jaipe y pan ya janae y disipulo sija , ya y disipulo janae y linajyan taotao .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Ya mañocho todos , ya manjaspog ; ya anae majoca y sebblan pedaso sija na maipe , bula dose na canastra .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Ya y mañocho sija , sinco mit na lalaje , ti matufong y famalaoan yan y famaguon .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: N	14	22		29360	 ¶ Enseguidas si Jesus janafanjalom y disipuluña sija gui un batco , ya manjanao manmofona , manmalag y otro bandan sadog , y tiempo nae güiya janafanjanao y linajyan taotao .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jadespide y linajyan taotao , cajulo gui un ogso na sumajnge , ya manaetae . Ya estaba gui puenge , ya sumasaga güigüiyaja namaesa .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Lao y batco pago estaba gui talo gui tase , pinapada ni napo , sa y manglo contra .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Ya y mina cuatro na guatdia gui puenge , si Jesus jumanao para iyasija mamomocat gui jilo tase .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Ya anae malie ni disipuluña sija na mamomocat gui jilo tase , ninafañatsaga , ya ilegñija : Fafañagüe este ; ya managang ni y minaañaoñija .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Enseguidas si Jesus cumuentos , ilegña nu sija : Angoco jamyo ; guajoyo ; chamiyo fanmaaañao .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Ayo nae manope si Pedro ilegña : Señot , yaguin jago , tago yo ya jufalag iyajago gui jilo janom .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Güiya ilegña : Maela . Ya tumunog si Pedro gui batco , ya mamocat gui jilo janom para uguaguato gui as Jesus .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Lao anae jalie na dangculo na manglo , ninamaañao ; ya anae jatutujon dimafondo , jaagang , ilegña : Señot , nalibreyo .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Ya enseguidas si Jesus jajuto mona y canaeña , ya guiniut güe , ya ilegña nu güiya : Taotao na didide jinengguemo ! Sa jafa ti unjonggue ?

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Ya anae manjalom julo gui batco , y manglo quieto .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ayo nae y mangaegue gui batco , maadora güe ilegñija : Magajet na jago Lajin Yuus .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: N	14	34		29480	 ¶ Ya anae manmalofan gui tase , manmato gui tano Genesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Ya y taotao ayo na lugat anae matungo güe , manmanago y oriyan todo ayo na tano , na umacone guato todo y manmalango .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Ya magagao güe na upolo na umapacha y madobbla y magaguña ; ya todo y pumacha güe , guefjomlo sija .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: AYO nae manmato gui as Jesus escriba yan Fariseo sija , guiya Jerusalem , ya ilegñija :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: Jafa disipulomo na ti jaosgue y tradision y manbijo ? sa ti jafagagase y canaeñija anae mañocho pan ?

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Ya güiya jaope sija ilegña : Jafa locue jamyo na ti inesgue y tinago Yuus pot tradisionmiyo ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Sa si Yuus manago , ilegña : Onra si tatamo , yan si nanamo ; ya y mumatdise si tataña , pat si nanaña , magajet na umatae .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Lao jamyo ilegmiyo : Jayeja y umalog ni tataña , pat si nanaña : Y ninae para si Yuus , ayo na probechonmiyo guiya guajo ;

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Ya ti guaelaye na ujaonra si tataña . Enaomina innataelaye y Sinangan Yuus pot y tradisionmiyo .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Hipocritas ! Cabales y sinangan nu jamyo as Isaias anae ilegña :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Este na taotao sija , nu y labiosñija jaonrayo ; lao y corasonñija chago guiya guajo .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Lao taesetbe y inadodorayo , manmamananagüe y finanagüenñija ni y sinangan taotao .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: N	15	10		29600	 ¶ Ya jaagang y linajyan taotao , ya ilegña nu sija : Ecungog ya intingo .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Ti y jumajalom gui pachot , muna natataelaye y taotao ; na ayo y jumujuyong gui pachot , ayo muna natataelaye y taotao .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Ayo nae manmato y disipuluña sija , ya ilegnija nu güiya : Untungo na y Fariseo sija ninafandisgustao anae jajungog este na sinangan ?

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Lao güiya jaope sija ilegña : Todo tinanom ni y ti jatanom y Tatajo na gaegue gui langet , umajajleg .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Polo sija : y bachet ya uguia y bachet ; yaguin y bachet uguia y bachet , sija na dos uchapodongja gui joyo .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Ya manope si Pedro , ilegña : Sanganejam nu este na acomparasion .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña : Ada locue trabia jamyo ti intitingoja ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Ti intingo na todo y jumalom gui pachot , jumajanao para y tiyan , ya mayuyute gui lugat umatog .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Lao todo y jumuyong gui pachot , estesija guine y corason , ya estesija muna natataelaye y taotao .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Sa gui corason nae manjujuyong y taelaye na jinaso , manpegno taotao , adulterio , inabale , saque , ti manmagajet na testimonio , chatfino contra si Yuus .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Estesija muna fanataelaye y taotao ; lao y chumocho yan y ti mafagase canaeña , ti ninatataelaye y taotao .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Ya jumanao si Jesus güije , malag y oriyan Tiro yan Sidon .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Ya estagüe un palaoan , taotao Cananea , na jumanao gui ayo sija na oriya , ya umaagang , ilegña : Señot , Lajin David , gaemaase nu guajo ; y jagajo ninachatsaga fefman ni anite .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Lao güiya ti jaope sinangan : Ayo nae manmato y disipuluña sija , ya magagao güe ilegñija : Tago güe ya ujanao , sa esta jame jaagang .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Ya güiya jaope ilegña : Ti guajo matago na y manmalingo na quinilo gui guima Israel .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Ayo nae y palaoan mato , ya jaadoro güe , ilegña : Señot , ayudayo .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Ya manope güi ilegña : Ti mauleg na tachule y pan y famaguon ya tayute y galago sija .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Ya y palaoan manope : Magajet Señot ; lao y galago sija , mañochochoja ni andesmorona ni mamopodong gui lamasan y amuñijo .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Ayo nae manope si Jesus , ilegña : Palaoan ! dangculo jinengguemo : umafatinas guiya jago jafa y malagomo . Ya jomlo y jagaña desde ayo na ora .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Ya si Jesus mapos güije , ya mato jijot gui tasen Galilea : ya cajulo gui jilo un finabeca , ya matachong güije .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Ya manmato guiya güiya linajyan taotao , na guaja guiya sija cojo , bachet , udo , mangco , yan palo sija megae na manmalango , ya manmapolo gui adeng Jesus ; ya janafanjomlo .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Pot este mina y linajyan taotao ninafanmanman , anae jalie na y udo manguentos , ya y mangco manjomlo , ya y cojo manmamocat , ya y bachet manmanlie ; ya ninamaonra si Yuus Israel .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Ya si Jesus jaagang y disipuluña sija , ilegña : Janamaaseyo y linajyan taotao , sa esta tres na jaane na manjame , ya taya nañija : ya mungayo munafanjanao sin ufañocho , sa no seaja ufanlalango gui chalan .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Ayo nae y disipuluña sija ilegñija nu güiya : Amano nae uguaja megae na pan güine gui desierto para utanafanjaspog este y dangculo na linajyan taotao .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Cuanto na pan guajata ? Ya sija ilegñija : Siete , yan didide güijan diquique .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Ya jatago y linajyan taotao na ufanmatachong gui jilo oda .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Ya jachule y siete na pan yan y güijan sija , ya janae grasias , ya jaipe , ya janae y disipuluña sija , ya y disipuluña janae y linajyan taotao .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Ya mañocho todos , ya manjaspog ; ya anae majoca y pedaso sija na maipe ni y sebbla ; bula siete na canastra .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Ya y mañocho sija , cuatro mit , ti matufong y famalaoan yan y famaguon .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Ya anae jadespide y linajyan taotao , cajulo gui un batco , ya mato gui origan Magdala .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: YA manmato y Fariseo yan y Saduseo sija , ya matienta güe , magagagao na ufanfinanue un señat gui langet .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Lao güiya jaope ilegña nu sija : Yanguin esta pupnenge y jaane , ilegmiyo : Mauleg na tiempo pago , sa y langet agaga .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Ya y egaan : Pago uguaja pinagyo , sa managaga y langet ya didide na mapagajes . Jamyo tumungo jumusga y matan y langet ; lao y señat y tiempo sija ti innasiña .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Y taelaye yan adulterio na rasa jagueguefaliligao un señat , lao taya ufanmanae atgun señat , na y señat Jonas profeta . Ya jadingo sija , ya mapos .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Ya anae manmato gui otro bandan jagoi y disipuluña sija jajaso na manmalefa ya ti manmañule pan .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Atan , ya inadaje jamyo ni y lebaduran y Fariseo yan y Saduseo sija .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Ya sija manmanjaso gui sanjalomñija , ilegñija : Buente pot y ti manmañulejam pan .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Ya jatungo si Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Jafa jinasonmimiyo gui sanjalommiyo , taotao na didide jinengguenmiyo , pot y ti manmañule jamyo pan ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Ada ti intitingo , ni ti injajaso y sinco na pan , gui sinco mit , ya cuanto na canastra injeca .

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Ni y siete na pan gui cuatro mit , ya cuanto na canastra injeca ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Jafa este na ti intingo , na ti pot y pan na jusangane jamyo ? Lao inadaje jamyo ni y lebaduran y Fariseo yan y Saduseo sija .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Ayo nae jatungo na ti mansinangane sija na ujaadaje sija ni y lebaduran pan ; lao y finanagüen y Fariseo yan y Saduseo sija .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: N	16	13		30020	 ¶ Ya anae mato si Jesus gui Sesarean Filipe , jafaesen y disipuluña sija ilegña : Jaye ilegñiñija y taotao sija nu y Lajin taotao ?

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Ya sija ilegñija : Guaja umalog na jago si Juan Bautista ; ya guaja umalog , si Elias ; ya guaja umalog , si Jeremias , pat uno gui profeta sija .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Ya jamyo , jaye ilegmimiyo nu guajo ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Manope si Simon Pedro ilegña : Jago si Cristojao , y Lajin Yuus ni y lalâlâ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ayo nae inepe as Jesus ilegña : Dichosojao , Simon , lajin Jonas ; sa ti jufanuejao sensen ni jâgâ , na y Tatajo ni y gaegue gui langet .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ya guajo locue sumanganejao , na jago si Pedro ; ya y jilo este na acho , jufatinas y iglesiamo ; ya y pettan sasalaguan taeninasiña contra guiya .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Ya junaejao ni y yaben y raenon langet ; ya todoja y ungode gui tano , umagodeja locue gui langet ; ya todoja y unpula gui tano , umapula locue gui langet .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Ayo nae jatago y disipuluña sija , na chañija fanmañangangane ni jaye na güiya si Jesus y Cristo .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: N	16	21		30100	 ¶ Desde ayo na tiempo jatutujon si Jesus dumeclaraye y disipuluña sija , na guaja nesesidaña na ujanao para Jerusalem , ya upadese megae sija gui manbijo , yan y prinsipen y mamale sija , yan y escriba sija , ya umapuno , ya umanacajulo gui mina tres na jaane .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Ya si Pedro , quinene güe ya tinitujon güe rineprende , ilegña : Señot , maase nu jago : este ti usiña jago .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Ayo nae jabiragüe , ya ilegña as Pedro : Suja gui menajo , Satanas : jago un tropero para guajo ; sa ti untungo y güinaja Yuus , na y güinajan taotaoja sija .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: N	16	24		30130	 ¶ Ayo nae si Jesus , ilegña ni y disipuloña sija : Yanguin jaye malago dumalalag yo , polo ya upune namaesagüe , ya uchule y quiluusña ya udalalag yo .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
