text2: Sa jayeja y malago munalibre y linâlâña , ufinalingaeguan ; ya jayeja y finalingaeguan ni y linâlâña pot guajo , güiya usoda .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Sa jafa probechoña y taotao , yanguin jagana todo y tano , ya y linâlâña malingo ? Pat jafa na apas ufannae y taotao pot y linâlâña .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Sa y Lajin taotao , ufato gui minalog y Tataña yan y angjetna sija ; ya ayo nae uapase cada uno taemano y chechoña .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : na guaja palo gui mangaegue güine , na ti ujachague finatae , asta qui jalie y Lajin taotao na mato gui raenoña .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: DESPUES di y saes na jaane , si Jesus jacone si Pedro , yan si Santiago , yan si Juan cheluña , ya jacone julo gui un taquilo na finabeca , na sumajnge .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Ya jaaggo y jechuraña gui menanñija ; ya y mataña manina calang y atdao ; ya y magaguña apaca calang y manana .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Ya estagüe , na manmato güiya sija si Moises yan si Elias , na manguecuentos yan güiya .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Ya manope si Pedro , ilegña as Jesus : Señot , mauleg na mangaeguejit güine : yaguin malagojao , bae jufatinas güine tres na tabetnaculo ; para jago y uno , para si Moises y uno , yan para si Elias y uno .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Anae cumuecuentos güe , estagüe , un malag na mapagajes jananujong gui jiloñija , ya , estagüe , un inagang gui mapagajes na ilegña ; Estagüiya y Lajijo na maguflie , na guefyajo : ecungog güe .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Ya anae jajungog este y disipulo sija , manpodong gui jilo matañija ya mangosmaañao .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus mato ya manpinacha , ilegña : Fangajulo ya chamiyo fanmaaañao .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Ya anae jajatsa y atadogñija , taya jalie na si Jesusja .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Ya anae manunog papa guine y finabeca , si Jesus mantinago ya ilegña : Chamiyo fanmañangangane ni jaye ni liniimiyo , asta qui y Lajin taotao esta cajulo gui entalo manmatae .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ayo nae y disipuluña sija mafaesen güe ya ilegñija : Jafa nae na ilegñija y escriba sija na si Elias ufato finena ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Ya inepe as Jesus , ilegña : Magajet na si Elias ufato finena , ya ujananalo todo y güinaja .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Lao guajo sumangane jamyo , na si Elias esta mato , ya ti matungogüe : lao mafatinas guiya güiya todo y malagoñija . Taegüenaoja locue y Lajin taotao upadese nu sija .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Ayo nae y disipulo sija jatungo na mansinangane sija as Juan Bautista .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: N	17	14		30310	 ¶ Ya anae manmato sija gui linajyan taotao , mato guiya güiya un taotao na dinimumuye güe ya ilegña :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: Señot , gaease ni lajijo ; sa malango baba , ya gogosjapadese ; sa megae nae podong gui guafe , yan megae nae podong gui janom .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ya guinin juchulie guato y disipulumo , lao tisiña manajomio .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus , ilegña : O generasion na ti manjonggue yan manchatpayon ! asta ngaean nae utafanjijitaja ? asta ngaean nae jususungonja jamyo ? Chulie yo fan mague .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ya jalalatde si Jesus y anite , ya mapos gui malango , ya y patgon jomlo desde ayo na ora .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Ayo nae manmato y disipulo sija gui as Jesus , ya ilegñija : Jafajam mina ti siña inyite juyong ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Pot diquique na jinengguenmiyo : sa magajet jusangane jamyo , na yanguin mangaejinenggue jamyo , calang y pepitas mostasa , injaalog ni este na jalom tano : Janao güine ; ya ujanao , ya taya ti siña para jamyo .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: ( Lao este na classe ti jumanao juyong , yaguin ti y minauleg y tinayuyut . )

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: N	17	22		30390	 ¶ Ya anae manmamocat guiya Galilea , ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Y Lajin taotao umaentrega gui canae y taotao sija ;

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Ya umapuno ; lao y mina tres na jaane , ucajulo . Ya sija ninafangostriste .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: N	17	24		30410	 ¶ Ya anae manmato guiya Capernaum , manmato gui as Pedro ayosija y manmangongobbla y medio siclo , y tributo , ya ilegñija : Ada ti manapapase y maestronmiyo y medio siclo y tributo ?

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Güiya ilegña : Junggan . Ya anae jumalom güe gui jalom guma , si Jesus , cuenentuse güe antes , ilegña : Jafa jinasosomo Simon ? Y ray y tano sija , jaye jacocobbla tributo pat senso ? y famaguonñija , pat y taotaojuyong ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Ya anae ilegña , Y taotaojuyong ; si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Ayo nae y famaguon manlibre .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Lao para mungajit fumatinas y tinempo para sija , Janao falag y tase , ya unyute y jagüet , ya y finenana na güijan na mato , cone ; ya an unbaba y pachotña , unsoda y un siclo ; chule este ya nae para guajo yan para jago .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: AYO na tiempo , manmato y disipulo sija gui as Jesus , ya ilegñija : Jaye mas dangculo gui raenon langet ?

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Ya jaagang si Jesus un patgon , ya japolo gui entaloñija ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ya ilegña : Magajet jusangane jamyo , yaguin ti inbira jamyo , ya ti infanjuyong calang , y diquique na famaguon , sen ti infanjalom gui raenon langet .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ya jayeja y umumitde calang este na patgon , este uguefdangculo gui raenon langet .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Ya jayeja y rumesibe un patgon , parejo yan este , pot y naanjo , jaresibeja yo locue .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Lao jayeja y munamatompo uno güine gui estesija mandiquique ni y jumonggue yo , mas mauleg umagode gui agagaña y dangculo na molinon acho , ya umayute gui anae tadodong y tase .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: N	18	7		30510	 ¶ Ayay y tano pot y tinempo sija ! sa nesesita na ufato y tinempo sija , lao , ayay ayo na taotao , y uminafato y tinempo .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: N	18	8		30520	 ¶ Enao mina yaguin y canaemo , pat y adengmo , unninaquepodongjao , utut ya unnajanao guiya jago : sa maulegña na unqueyaojao , pat mangcojao , ya unjalom gui linâlâmo , qui uguaja dos canaemo , yan dos adengmo , ya unmapolo gui taejinecog na guafe .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Yaguin y atadogmo unninaquepodongjao , chule ya unnajanao guiya jago ; sa maulegña na unjalom gui linâlâmo yan un atadog , qui uguaja dos atadogmo , ya unmapolo gui guafen sasalaguan .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: N	18	10		30540	 ¶ Atan ya chamiyo dumesprenesia uno güine gui estesija y mandiquique ; sa guajo sumangane jamyo , na y angjetñija gui langet , siesiempreja jaliliija y matan y Tatajo ni y gaegue gui langet .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: ( Sa y Lajin taotao mato para usatba y manmalingo . )

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Jafa jinasonmimiyo ? Yaguin guaja un taotao na gaega siento na quinilo , ya finalingaeguan uno : Ada ti upolo y noventa y nueve gui jalomtano , ya ujanao ya ujaligao ayo y malingo ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Yanguin jasoda , magajet jusangane jamyo , na magofña ni ayo , qui y noventa y nueve ni y ti manmalingo .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Taegüineja , ti minalago Tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet , na uguaja malingo uno güine gui estesija y mandiquique .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: N	18	15		30590	 ¶ Yaguin y chelumo inisagüejao , janao , ya unsangane ni y linachiña , jamyoja na dos ; yanguin inecungogjao , ungana y chelumo .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Lao , yaguin ti jaecungogjao , fangone gachongmo uno , pat dos , sa para y pachot dos pat tres na testigo , ucabales todo y sinangan .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Yanguin ti jaecungog sija , sangane y inetnon mangilisyano ; lao yaguin ti malago jaecungog y inetnon mangilisyano , güiya para jago parejo yan un taotaojuyong pat publicano .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na todo y inguede gui tano , ufanmagode locue gui langet : ya todo y inpila gui tano , ufanmapula locue gui langet .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Jusangane jamyo talo , na yaguin dos guiya jamyo inguaja un corason gui jilo tano , pot jafa na güinaja ni ingagao ; umafatinas para sija , pot y Tatajo na gaegue gui langet .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Sa manoja nae guaja dos pat tres , na mandadaña pot y naanjo , gaegue yo güije gui entaloñija .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: N	18	21		30650	 ¶ Ayo nae si Pedro mato guiya güiya ya ilegña : Señot , cuanto biaje juasie y chelujo yaguin jaisagüeyo ? asta siete biaje ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Ti jualog sieteja na biaje , lao , asta setenta na siete .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: N	18	23		30670	 ¶ Enao mina y raenon langet , parejoja yan un ray , na malago na ufatinas cuentas yan y tentagoña sija .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Ya anae jatutujon fumatinas y cuentas sija , maconiegüe guato , uno na mandidibe dies mit talento .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Lao anae güiya ti siña jaapase , y amuña manago na umabende güe , yan y asaguaña , yan y famaguonña , yan todo y güinajaña , ya umaapasegüe .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Ayo na tentago , dumimo papa ya tinayuyutgüe , ilegña : Señot , gaesiningon nu guajo , ya juapasejao todo .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Y amon ayo na tentago , ninagosmaase , ya pinelogüe , ya inasie ni y dibiña .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Ya jumanao ayo na tentago , ya umasoda yan uno gui mangachongña na dinidibegüe cien pesetas ; ya jamantiene güe ya jañucut , ya ilegña : Apaseyo todo ni dibimo .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Ayo nae y gachongña dumimo papa , ya tinayuyutgüe ilegña : Gaesiningon nu guajo , ya juapasejao .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Lao güiya ti malago , ya mapos ya pinelo gui catset asta qui uinapase ni y dibiña .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Ya anae malie ni y mangachongña , jafa y susede , ninafangostriste , ya manmato , ya masangane y amuñija y susede .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Ayo nae y amuña inagang güe , ya ilegña : Taelayejao na tentago . Juasiijao todo ni y dibimo , sa untayuyutyo :

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Ada locue ti ninamaase jao ni y gachongmo , calang y maasejo nu jago ?

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Ayo nae y amuña ninalalalo , ya inentrega güe gui mansasapet , asta qui uapase todo y dinidibegüe .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue ufatinas nu jamyo y Tatajo ni gaegue gui langet , yaguin ti inasie gui corasonmiyo cada uno gui chelonmiyo nu y dibiña .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: YA malofan anae si Jesus munjayan este sija na finanagüeña , jumanao guiya Galilea , ya mato gui oriyan Judea , gui otro bandan Jordan .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Ya madalalag güe ni y dangculo na linajyan taotao , ya janafanjomlo güije .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: N	19	3		30820	 ¶ Ayo nae manmato guiya güiya y Fariseo sija , ya matienta güe ya ilegñija nu güiya : Siña y laje jayute y asaguaña pot jafa na rason ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Güiya jaope ya ilegña : Ada ti intaetae na y fumatinas desde y tutujon , laje yan palaoan jafatinas sija ;

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Ya ilegña : Pot este y laje upolo si tataña yan si nanaña , ya udaña yan y asaguaña , ya sija na dos unoja catneñija ?

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Taegüenao sija ti udos , na unoja na catne . Pot enao mina y ninadaña Yuus , ti mauleg y taotao ujanaadesapatta .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Ylegñija nu güiya : Pot jaf mina si Moises jatago na umatugue y papet umadesapatta , ya umayute ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Güiya ilegña : Pot y manmajetog corasonmiyo , si Moises na japetmite na inyite y asaguanmiyo , lao y tutujonña ti taegüenao .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Guajo jamyo sumangane , na jayeja y yumute y asaguaña ya ti pot y inabale , ya umasagua yan otro , umabale ; ya y umasagua yan y umayute , umabaleja .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: N	19	10		30890	 ¶ Ylegñija y disipuluña sija nu güiya : Yaguin taegüenao nu y laje yan y asaguana , ti mauleg na umasagua .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña : Ti todo siña rumesibe este na sinangan : na ayoja sija y manmanae .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Sa guaja capon sija na y mafañago capon guine y jalom tuyan nanañija ; ya guaja capon na ninafancapon ni y taotao sija ; ya guaja capon na jacapon maesaja sija pot rason di y raenon langet . Y siña rumesibe este , güiya uresibe .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: y manmangongone guato .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña : Polo y famaguon , ya chamiyo chumochoma , na ufanmamaela guiya guajo ; sa iyon este sija y raenon langet .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Ya anea munjayan japolo y canaeña gui jiloñija , mapos güije .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: N	19	16		30950	 ¶ Ya estagüe uno na mato , ya ilegña : Maestro , jafa mauleg jufatinas , para juguaja taejinecog na linala ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Güiya ilegña : Jafa na funaesenyo nu y minauleg ? Guaja unoja mauleg : lao yaguin malagojao jumalom gui linâlâ , adaje y tinago sija .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Ylegña nu güiya : Jafa ? Si Jesus ilegña : Munga mamuno ; munga umabale ; munga mañaque ; munga masangan y ti magajet na testimonio ;

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Onra si tatamo , yan si nanamo ; Ya güaeya y tiguangmo calang jago maesaja .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Y patgon na taotao ilegña nu güiya : Todo este sija juadaje : Jafa trabia fattaco ?

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu güiya : Yaguin malagojao na uncabales , janao , ya unbende todo y güinajamo , ya unnae y mamobble , ya uguaja güinajamo gui langet ; ya maela dalalagyo .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Lao anae jajungog y patgon na taotao , este na sinangan , ninatriste ya mapos ; sa guaja megae iyoña na güinaja .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña ni disipuluña : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na y manrico mapot jumalom gui raenon langet .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo talo , na mas guse un cameyo malofan gui matan jaguja , qui un rico ujalom gui raenon Yuus .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Anae jajungog este sija y disipuluña , ninafangosmanman , ya ilegñija : Jaye nae siña satbo ?

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Maninatan as Jesus , ya ilegña nu sija : Yan y taotao sija , ti siña este ; lao yan si Yuus , todo siña .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Ayo nae manope si Pedro , ilegña nu güiya : Estagüejamja , na inpelo todo , ya indadalalagjao ; jafa nae uguajanmame ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na jamyo ni dumadalalagyo , y tiempon finamauleg , anae matachong y Lajin taotao gui tronon y langetña , jamyo locue infanmatachong gui jilo y dose na trono para injisga y dose na tribu guiya Israel .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ya jayeja y yumute gumaña , pat cheluña laje , pat cheluña palaoan , pat tataña , pat nanaña , pat lajiña , pat tanoña pot y naanjo , ufanresibe cien biaje , ya umaereda ni y taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Lao megae na manfinenana ufanuttimo ; ya y manuttimo ufanfinenana .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: SA y raenon langet parejoja yan un taotao , tatan un familia na jumanao taftaf gui egaan para ufantratos manfáfachocho , para y fangualuanña ubas .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Ya anae esta manatungopara ufanmachocho pot un peseta gui un jaane , jatago na ufanmalag y fangualuanña .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Ya y mina tres na ora , jumajanao ya jalile palo na manotojgue gui plasa manaechoco ,

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Janao locu fanmalag y fangualuanjo , ya junae jamyo ni y cabales . Ya manmapos .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Ya jumanao talo gui mina saes , yan y mina nuebe na ora , ya jafatinasja taegüije .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Jumanao gui mina onse na ora , ya jasoda palo na manaechocho , ya ilegña : Jafa na mañasagaja jamyo güine todo pago na jaane , ya manaechocho jamyo ?

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Sija ilegñija nu güiya : Sa tayajam tumatratos . Güiya ilegña nu sija : Janao locue fanmalag y fangualuanjo .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Ya anae estaba pupuenge güije na jaane , y magas ni y gaiyo ayo y fangualuan ubas , ilegña nu y magas na tentagoña : Agang todo y manfafachocho , ya unapase ni y chechoñija , tutujon desde y uttimo asta y finenana .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Ya anae manmato ayo y jumanao gui mina onse na ora , cada uno jaresibe un peseta .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Anae manmato y jumanao finenana , jinasonñija na ujaresibe mas ; lao manparejoja todo siji cada uno jaresibe un peseta .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Ya anae jaresibe , ninafanadingan contra y tatan y familia ,

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Ilegñija : Este sija y manuttimo , taya chechoñija na un oraja , ya unnafanparejoja yan jame , na jame cumatga y catga yan todo y minaepen y jaane .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Güiya jaope uno guiya sija , ilegña : Amigo , taya ti tunas jufatinas nu jago . Ada ti matungo jit pot un peseta ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Chule y iyomo ya unjanao : guajo malagoyo na junae este y uttimo , parejo yan jago .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Ada ti cabales na jufatinas jafa y malagojo ni y iyoco ? Pat ada taelaye y atadogmo , sa guajo mauleg ?

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Taegüenao y manfinenana ufanuttimo , ya y manuttimo , ufanfinenana .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: N	20	17		31260	 ¶ Ya anae si Jesus cajulo guiya Jerusalem , jacone y dose na disipoluña gui sumajnge ya ilegña nu sija gui chalan :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: Estagüijit na mangajulo guiya Jerusalem , ya y Lajin taotao umaentrega gui magas na mamale sija , yan escriba sija ; ya umasentensia para umapuno ;

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ya umaentrega gui Gentiles sija , para umabutlea , yan umasaulag , yan umaatane gui quiluus ; lao y mina tres na jaane umacajulo .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: N	20	20		31290	 ¶ Ayo nae manmato guiya güiya y nanan y famaguon Sebedeo , yan y famaguonña , ya maadora güe , ya manmangagagao ni un güinaja .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: palaoanilegña nu güiya : Tago este y dos lajijo ya ufatachong , y uno gui agapa na canaemo , ya y otro gui acagüemo , gui raenomo .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Ayo nae inepe as Jesus ilegña : Ti untungo jafa mangagao . Siñajamyo gumimen gui copa anae gumiguimenyo ? Sija ilegñija , siñajam .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Magajet na infanguimen gui copajo ; lao infanmatachong gui agapa na canaejo pat y acagüe , ti guajo jufannae , na para ayo sija y esta manmaprepara pot y Tatajo .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Ya anae majungog este ni y dies , ninafanbubo nu y dos chumelo .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus , inagang sija guiya güiya ya ilegña : Intingo na y magas y taotaojuyong sija , manmamanda gui jiloñija ; ya mandangculo jafatinas ninasiñanñija gui jiloñija .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Lao ti utaegüine guiya jamyo ; ya jayeja y malago dumangculo gui entalonmiyo , güiya ministronmiyo .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Ya y malago ufinenana gui entaloñmiyo , güiya tentagonmiyo .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Sa y Lajin taotao , ti mato para umasetbe , na para ufañetbe , ya para ufannae y jaaniña un rescata para unafanlibre megae .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Ya anae manjanao sija guiya Jerico , madalalague güe dangculo na linajyan taotao .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: N	20	30		31390	 ¶ Ya estagüe dos bachet na matatachong gui oriyan chalan , ya anae jajungog na para ufalofan si Jesus , managang , ilegñija : Señot , Lajin David , gaease nu jame .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao , manlinalatde , para ufanmamatquilo : lao sija mas managang , ilegñija : Señot , Lajin David , gaease nu jame .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Ya sumaga si Jesus , ya maninagang , ilegña : Jafa malagomiyo na jufatinas para jamyo ?

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Ylegñija : Señot , y atadogmame umababa .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ninamaase , ya japacha y atadogñija , ya manmanlie y atadogñija , ya madalalague güe .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: YA anae esta manjijijot guiya Jerusalem , manmato guiya Betfaye , gui egso Olibo , si Jesus jatago dos gui disipuluña ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: Ylegña nu sija : Janao fanmalag y sengsong sa gaegüenao gui menanmiyo , sa enseguidas inseda un bulico na magogode , sumisija yan un poyino : pula ya unchulieyo mague .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Yaguin guaja jamyo sumangane jafa , alog : Y Señot janesesita ; ya infanmanae enseguidas .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Ya todo este jumuyong , para umacumple y sinangan y profeta ni y ilegña :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Sangane y jagan Sion : Estagüe y Raymo na mato guiya jago , mamso , ya matatachong gui jilo un bulico yan un poyino , patgon bulico .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Ya y disipulo sija manmapos , ya jafatinas jaftaemano y mantinago as Jesus .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Ya machule y bulico , yan y poyino , ya japolo y magagunija gui jiloñija , ya matachong gui jiloñija .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ya un gosdangculo na linajyan taotao jajuto y magaguñija gui chalan ; yan palo manmanutot ramas jayo , ya jajuto gui chalan ;

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao ni y manmofona , yan y manatate , manaagang , ilegñiñija : Hosana y Lajin David : Dichoso y mato pot y naan y Señot ; Hosana guiya jilulo .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Anae jumalomgüe guiya Jerusalem , todo y siuda manatborotao , ya ilegñija : Jaye este ?

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao ilegñija : Este si Jesus , y profetan Nasaret yan Galilea .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: N	21	12		31550	 ¶ Ya jumalom si Jesus gui guimayuus , ya jayute juyong todo y manmanbebende , yan y manmamamajan gui guimayuus , ya janaalinquin y lamasan y manmanulalaeca salape , yan y tachong y manmanbebende paluma ;

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Esta matugue , y guimajo , guma manaetae umafanaan ; lao jamyo fumatinas y liyang y mañaque .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Ya manmato guiya güiya manbachet yan mancojo , gui guimayuus , ya janafanjomlo .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Lao y magas na mamale sija , yan y escriba sija , ninafalalalo anae jalie y mannamanman sija ni y jafatitinas , yan y famaguon sija ni y manaagang gui guimayuus , ya ilegñija : Hosana y Lajin David ;

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Ti unjungog jafa este ilegñiñija ? Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Junggan . Taya nae untaetae : Guinin pachot y famaguon yan y mañususo , unnacabales y tinina ?

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Ya jadingo sija , jumuyong gui siuda asta Betania ; ya sumaga güije .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: N	21	18		31610	 ¶ Y egaan , anae tumalo guato gui siuda , ñalang .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Ya jalie un trongcon igos jijot gui chalan , ya malag ayo , lao taya sinedaña na jagonja ; ya ilegña : Ti unfanogcha asta ni ngaean . Ya ti apmam y igos anglo .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Anae malie este ni y disipulo sija , ninafanmanman , ya ilegñija : Nachinadeg y igos anglo !

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Ya maninepe as Jesus , ilegña : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na yaguin guaja jinengguenmiyo , ya ti buebuente jamyo , infatinas ti esteja ni y mafatinas gui y igos ; lao yaguin insangane este na ogso ya ilegmiyo : Janao ya unyutejao gui tase , umafatinas .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Sa todosija y ingagao an manmanaetae jamyo ya injenggue , infanmanresibe .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ya anae jumalom gui guimayuus , y magas na mamale sija , yan manamco na taotao sija , manmato guiya güiya , anae estaba mamananagüe , ya ilegñija : Jafa na ninasiña na unfatinas estesija ? ya jayejao numae nu este na ninasiñamo ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ya maninepe as Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Guajo locue jufaesen jamyo un sinangan ; yaguin insangane yo , guajo locue jusangane jamyo jafa na ninasiña muna jufatitinas este .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Y tinagpangen Juan , guine mano ? Guine y langet , pat y taotao sija ? Ayo nae sija jajajaso gui sumanjalomñija ilegñija : Yaguin ilegmame , guine y langet ; ualog nu jame : jafa nae na ti injenggue ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Yaguin ilegmame : Y taotao sija ; manmaañaojam ni y taotao sija ; sa pineloñija todo na profeta si Juan .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ya manope ilegñija as Jesus : Ti intingo . Si Jesus locue ilegña nu sija : Ni guajo ti jusangane jamyo , pot jafa na ninasiña na jufatinas este .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: N	21	28		31710	 ¶ Lao jafa pinelonmimiyo ? Un taotao guaja dos lajiña , ya mato guiya y finena ya ilegña : Lajijo , janao fachocho gui fangualuan ubas .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Ya manope , ilegña : Munga yo ; lao despues mañotsot ya mapos .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Mato guiya y otro , ya jasanganeja talo taegüije : Ya inepe ilegña : Guajo , señot , bae jujanao , lao ti jumanao .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Jaye guiya sija na dos fumatinas y minalago y tata ? Sija ilegñija : y finenena . Ylegña si Jesus nu sija : magajet jusangane jamyo , na y publicano sija , yan y manputa sija , ufanjalom gui raenon Yuus gui menanmiyo .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Sa mato si Juan guiya jamyo gui chalan tininas , ya ti injenggue güe ; ya y publicano sija , yan y manputa sija majonggue güe : lao jamyo , anae inlie , ti manmañotsot jamyo para injenggue güe .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: N	21	33		31760	 ¶ Ecungog otro acomparasion : Un taotao , tatan un familia , japlanta un fangualuan ubas , y jacolat nu y trongco ni y tituca , ya jaguadog gui entalo un lagat , ya jafatinas un tore , ya janamaatquila gui manfafachocho , ya maposgüe malag otro tano .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Ya anae esta jijot y tiempon y tinegcha , jatago y tentagoña sija para ayo y manfafachocho , para ujaresibe y tinegcha sija .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Lao y manfafachocho jacone y tentago sija , y japanag y uno , japuno y otro , ya jatagas nu y acho y otro .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Jatago talo y palo tentagoña sija , mas qui y finenana : ya manmafatinasja talo taegüije .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Y uttimo jatago y lajiña , ilegña : Ufangaerespeto ni y lajijo .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Lao anae malie ni y manfafachocho , na y lajiña , ilegñija gui sumanjalomñija : Estagüiya y eredero , maela ya tapuno , ya tachule y fangualuanña .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Ya macone ya mayute juyong gui fangualuan , ubas , y mapuno .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Anae mato y señot y fangualuan ubas , jafa umafatinas contra ayo y manfafachocho ?

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Sija ilegñija uguefyulang y manaelaye : ya y fangualuan ubas unamaatquila gui otro manfafachocho na umapasegüe ni tinegcha gui tiempo .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Se Jesus ilegña nu sija : Taya nae intaetae y Tinigue sija : Y acho ni y jarechasa y manmamatitinas y guima , esteja mapolo cuentan ulo gui esquina : este finatinas y Señot ya janafanmanman y atadogta ?

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Enao mina jusangane jamyo , na y raenon Yuus umanajanao guiya jamyo , ya ufanmanae ayo sija na taotao y fumatinas para umegae y tinegchaña .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Ya y pedong gui jilo este na acho , umayulang ; ya , yaguin y jiloña nae podong , umapedasitos .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Ya anae majungog ni y magas na mamale sija yan y Fariseo sija , y acomparasionña sija , jinasonñija na pot sija na jasasangan .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Ya anae maaligao para umaconegüe , manmaañao ni taotao sija , sa maatangüe pot profeta .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: SI Jesus manope ya jacuentuse sija talo y acomparasion sija ilegña ,

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: Y raenon langet , parejo yan un ray , na jafatinas gupot umasagua para y lajiña .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Ya jatago y tentagoña sija , na ujaagange y manmaconbida gui guipot ; lao ti manmalago manmato .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Jatago talo palo tentagoña , ilegña : Sangane y manmaconbida : Esta jufamauleg y na taloane , y gajo toro yan y manyomog na gajo , esta manmapuno , ya todo esta listo : fanmamaela gui guipot umasagua .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Lao sija ti jaatituye , ya manmapos , y uno para y fangualuaña , y otro para y cometsioña .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Y palo macone y tentagoña ya manamamajlao , ya manmapuno .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Lao y ray ninalalalo ; ya jatago y sendaluña sija na ujapuno todo ayo y mamuno sija , ya ujasonggue y siudaña .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña ni y tentagoña sija : Y guipot umasagua esta listo ; lao ayo sija y manmaconbida ti mandigno .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Janao fanmalag y mafapoposgüe na chalan , ya inagange para y guipot umasagua todo y inseda .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Ya manmapos y tentago sija para y chalan , ya janafandaña todo y jasoda , parejo y taelaye yan y mauleg ; ya y guipot umasagua bula ni manmaconbida .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: N	22	11		32000	 ¶ Ya anae jumalom y ray para ulie y manmaconbida , jalie güije un taotao na ti minagago ni y magagon gupot .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Ya ilelegña nu guiya : Amigo , jafa na jumalomjao güine ya taya magagumo magagon gupot ? Lao güiya ti cumuentos .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ayo nae y ray ilegña ni y manmañeñetbe : Gode y adengña , yan y canaeña , ya inchile , ya inyite juyong gui jalom jomjom : ayo nae uguaja tumanges , yan chegcheg nifen .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Sa megae manmaagang ; lao didide manmaayig .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: N	22	15		32040	 ¶ Ayo nae manmapos y Fariseo sija , ya manacuentuse jafa taemano ninagadon güe ni y cuentosña .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Ya jatago guato guiya güiya y disipuloñija yan iyon Herodes , ilegñija : Maestro , intingo na jago magajetjao , ya mamananagüejao na magajet y chalan Yuus ; ya taya unadadaje ni jaye ; sa ti uno na guaelaye guiya jago y finaboresen taotao .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Sangane jam nae , jafa jinasosomo ? Tunas na infanmanaejam tributo as Sesat , pat aje ?

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Lao si Jesus jatungo y tinaelayeñija , ya ilegña : Jafa muna intientayo , hipocritas ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Fanueyofan ni y salape y tributo . Ya sija machuliegüe un dinario .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Ayo nae ilegña nu sija : Jaye iyo este na imagen yan y tinigue ni y gaigue gui jiloña ?

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Sija ilegñija nu güiya : Iyon Sesat . Ayo nae ilegña nu sija : Nae si Sesat ni iyon Sesat , ya si Yuus ni iyon Yuus .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Ya anae sija jajungog este na sinangan , ninafanmanman , ya madingo güe ya manmapos .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: N	22	23		32120	 ¶ Ayo na jaane , manmato guiya güiya y Saduseo sija , ni y ilegñija na taya quinajulo y manmatae , ya mafaesen güe ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Ylegñija : Maestro , si Moises ilegña , Yaguin jaye na taotao matae ya taya patgonña , y cheluña uasagua yan y asaguaña , ya unacajulo semiya gui cheluña .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Guaja guiya jame siete na lalaje mañelo ; ya y finena umasagua ya matae , ya taya patgonña , japolo y asaguaña gui cheluña .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Parejoja talo y mina dos , yan y mina tres , asta y mina siete .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Anae munjayan manmatae todosija , matae y palaoan locue .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Y quinajulo y manmatae , jaye gui siete ugaeasagua y palaoan ? sa todosija maninasagua .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Ayo nae maninepe as Jesus , ilegña : Manabag jamyo sa ti intingo y Tinigue sija , ni y ninasiñan Yuus .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Sa y quinajulo y manmatae , ni manasagua ni umanafanasagua , sa manparejoja yan y angjet sija gui langet .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Ya y quinajulo y manmatae , ada ti intaetae y esta masangan pot si Yuus nu jamyo na ilegña :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: Guajo si Yuus Abraham , yan si Yuus Ysaac , yan si Yuus Jacob ? Ti güiya si Yuus y manmatae , na Yuus y manlâlâlâ .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Anae majungog este nu y linajyan taotao , ninafanmanman ni y finanagüeña .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: N	22	34		32230	 ¶ Lao anae y Fariseo sija majungog na janafanmamatquilo y Saduseo sija , mandaña gui un lugat .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Ya mafaesen güe , uno guiya sija , ni y magas y lay , tinienta güe , ilegña :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: Maestro , jafa y mas dangculo na tinago gui lay ?

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Guaeya y Señot Yuusmo con todo y corasonmo , yan todo y antimo , yan todo y jinasomo .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Este y finenana yan y dangculo na tinago .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ya y mina dos parejoja yan este : Guaeya y tiguangmo parejo yan jago .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Este y dos na tinago chinileja todo y lay yan y profeta .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: N	22	41		32300	 ¶ Ya enae estaba y Fariseo sija mandadaña , si Jesus manfinaesen sija ;

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Ylegña : Jafa jinasonmiyo as Cristo ? jaye gaelaje güe ? Sija ilegñija : Lajin David .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na si David gui Espiritu finanaan güe Señot , ilegña :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Y Señot jasangane y Señotjo , fatachong gui agapa na canaejo , asta qui jupolo y enemigumo gui papâ adengmo .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Yaguin si David finanaan güe Señot , jafa taemano lajiña ?

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Ya taya siña ni uno umope güe . Ya desde ayo na jaane taya umatrebe güe para umafaesesen güe ni jafa .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: AYO nae si Jesus , jacuentuse y linajyan taotao , yan y disipuluña sija ,

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: Ylegña : Y escriba yan y Fariseo sija manmatatachong gui tachong Moises ;

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Todo y mansinangane jamyo na inadaje , fatinas yan adaje ; lao chamiyo fumatitinas taegüije y finatinasñiñija , sa sija jasasangan , lao ti jafatitinas .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Sa manmangogode catga sija na manmacat ya mapot machule , ya japolo gui jilo y apagan y taotao sija ; lao sija ni y calalotñija ti manmalago janacalamten .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Lao todo y chechoñija , jafatinas para umalie ni y taotao sija sa janaancho y filacteriañija , ya jajujuto y madoblan y magagonñija .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Ya yañija y finenana na saga gui guipot , yan y finenana na tachong gui sinagoga ;

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Yan y manmasaluda gui plasa , yan ufanmafanaan ni y taotao sija , Rabi .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Lao jamyo chamiyo fanmalalago manmafanaan . Rabi ; sa unoja Maestronmiyo , ya todo jamyo mañelo .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Chamiyo fanmamananaan ni uno tatanmiyo gui tano ; sa unoja Tatanmiyo , na gaegue gui langet .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Ni infanmamanaan uno amunmiyo ; sa unoja amunmiyo , si Cristo .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Lao y mas dangculo guiya jamyo , güiya utentagonmiyo .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Sa jayeja y munadangculon namae sagüe , umumitde ; ya jayeja y munaumitden namaesagüe , güiya udangculo .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: N	23	13		32480	 ¶ Lao ay ay para jamyo escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa injichom y raenon langet gui menan y taotao sija ; ya ni jamyo ti manjalom , ni y para ufanjalom ti inpelo na ufanjalom .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ( Ay ay para jamyo , escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa inticho y guima y biuda sija yan inagó y tinaetae ; pot este inresibe dangculo na sentensia . )

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Ay ay para jamyo , escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa inlilicue y tase yan y tano para infatinas un prosélito , ya anae esta infatinas , infatitinas güe lalajin sasalaguan dosbiaje mas qui jamyo .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: N	23	16		32510	 ¶ Ay ay para jamyo , bachet na guia sija ni y ilegmiyo : Jayeja y manjula pot templo , taya este ; lao jayeja y manjula pot y oron y templo , gaeisao güe .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Manbababa yan manbachet ! Jafa mas dangculo , y oro pat y templo , ni y munasantos y oro ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ya jayeja y manjula pot y attat , taya este ; lao jayeja y manjula pot y ninae ni gaegue gui jiloña , gaeisao güe .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Manbachet jamyo ! Jafa mas dangculo , y ninae pat y attat ni munasantos y ninae ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Enao mina y manjula pot y attat , manjula pot ayo yan todo y guaja gui jiloña .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Ya y manjula pot y templo , manjula pot ayo yan pot güiya y sumaga gui jinalomña .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Ya y manjula pot y langet , manjula pot y trono Yuus , yan pot güiya ni gaegue na matatachong gui jiloña .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: N	23	23		32580	 ¶ Ay ay para jamyo , escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa manmanapase jamyo diesmo y yetba buena , yan anis yan comino , ya inpelo y mas dangculo gui lay ; y juisio , y minaase , yan y jinenggue . Este nesesita umafatinas , ya munga mapolo na ti infatinas y otro sija .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Bachet jamyo na guia sija ! sa inguicula y ñamo , ya inpapañot y cameyo .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: N	23	25		32600	 ¶ Ay ay para jamyo , escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa infagagase y sumanjiyeng y posuelo yan y plato ; lao y sumanjalom bula inamot yan minampos .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Fariseo bachet jao ! fagase finena y sumanjalom gui posuelo yan y plato , ya despues y sumanjiyong ugasgas locue .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: N	23	27		32620	 ¶ Ay ay para jamyo , escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa manparejo jamyo yan y manmablanquea na naftan na y sanjiyongña magajet na mauleg malie : lao y sumanjalomña bula tolang manmatae , yan todo y ináplacha .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Taegüenao locue jamyo y sumanjiyong magajet na manunas malie jamyo ni taotao sija ; lao y sumanjalom bula hipocresia yan inechong .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: N	23	29		32640	 ¶ Ay ay para jamyo escriba yan Fariseo sija , hipocrita ! sa infatinas naftan y profeta sija , ya inadotna y naftan y manunas ,

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Ya ilegmiyo : Yaguin mangaeguejam gui jaanin y tatanmame sija , ti infangachong yan sija gui jâgâ y profeta sija .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Ayo mina jamyo mismo innae testimonio contra jamyo , na jamyo famaguon ayo sija y pumuno y profeta sija .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Jamyo locue innabula y medidan y tatanmiyo .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Colebla sija , rasan colebla sija ! Jaf taemano jamyo insujaye gui sentensian sasalaguan ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: N	23	34		32690	 ¶ Enaomina estagüeyo na junae jamyo profeta sija , yan manmalate yan escribasija ; ya palo guiya sija inpino ya inatane gui quiluus ; ya y palo guiya sija , inpanag gui sinagoganmiyo , ya inpetsigue sija guinin siuda asta siuda ;

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Para ufato gui jilomiyo todo y tunas na jâgâ ni y machuda gui jilo y tano , desde y jâgân Abel y tinas , asta y jâgâ Sacharias , lajin Barachias , ni inpino gui entalo templo yan y attat .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Magajet jusagane jamyo , na todo estesija ufanmato gui jilo este na generasion .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: N	23	37		32720	 ¶ Jerusalem ! Jerusalem ! ni y pumuno y profeta sija , ni infagas ni acho todo y manmatago para jago , cuanto biaje malagoyo na jurecoje y famaguonmo , calang y ponedera yan jarecoje y poyitasña sija gui papa papaña , lao ti manmalago jamyo !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Estagüe na madingo guiya jamyo y guimanmiyo na ti mataotagüe .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Sa guajo jamyo sumangane , na desde pago , ti inliiyo , asta qui ilegmiyo : Dichoso güe y mato . pot y naan y Señot .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: YA si Jesus jumuyong gui templo ya mapos ; manmato y disipuluña sija , para umafanue ni y mafatinas y templo .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Si Jesus jaope sija , ilegña : Ti inlie todo estesija ? Magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti umapolo güine un acho gui jilo otro acho , na ti umayulang .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Ya anae matatachong güe gui sabana Olibo , manmato guiya güiya y disipulo sija , ya ilegñija : Sangane jam ngaean ufanjuyong estesija na güinaja , yan jafa taemano na señat y finatomo , yan y jinecog y tiempo ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Ya maninepe as Jesus , ilegña : Adaje ya chamiyo fanmadadague ni jaye .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Sa megae ufanmato pot y naanjo , ya ujaalog : Guajo si Cristo ; ya megae ujadague .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ya infanmanjungog guera yan sinangan nu y guera ; atan ya chamiyo ninafañachatsaga ; sa nesesita na todo este ufanjuyong , lao trabia ti y jinecog .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Sa ufangajulo nasion contra nasion , yan raeno contra raeno ; ya uguaja ñinalang yan linao gui lugat sija .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Ya todo este sija na güinaja y tutujon y pininite .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ayo nae infanmaentrega para infanmanapute , ya infanmapuno ; ya infanmachatlie gui todo nasion pot y naanjo .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Ya megae innafanmatompo ; ya ufanaentrega unos y otros , ya ufanachatlie unos y otros .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Ya megae ti manmagajet na profeta ufangajulo , ya ujadague megae .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Ya pot y janamegae y tinaelaye , y güinaeyan y megae janamanenggeng .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Lao y sumungon asta y jinecog , este usatba .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Ya umapredica este y ebangelion y raeno gui todo y tano , para testimonio gui todo y nasion , ya ayo nae ufato y jinecog .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: N	24	15		32890	 ¶ Enaomina an inlie y chinatlie y inginon na yinilang , ni y jasangan si Daniel profeta ni tumotojgue gui santos na lugat ; ( y tumataetae güiya utungo ) .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Ayo nae y mangaegue guiya Judea , manmalago para y taquilo na jalomtano ;

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ya y gaegue gui jilo atof , ti ufanunog ya ujachule jafa gui guimaña ;

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Ya y gaegue gui fangualuan , ti ufanalo tate ya ujachule y magagoña .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Lao ay ay para y manmapotgue , yan y mannanasuso , güije na jaane !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Fanmanaetae , sa y jinanaonmiyo , munga gui tiempon manenggeng ni y sabado .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Sa ayo na tiempo uguaja dangculo na pininite , ya desde y tutujon y tano asta pago , taya nae guaja ; ya taya mas na uguaja asta jinecog .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Yaguin ayo na jaane sija ti manafangadada , ni un catne usiña ninalibre ; lao pot y manmaayig , ayo sija na jaane umanafangadada .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Yaguin jaye na taotao umalog nu jago : Estagüe si Cristo , pat ayo ; chamo jumojonggue .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Sa ufangajulo y ti manmagajet na Cristo yan ti manmagajet na profeta sija ; ya ufanmamanue dangculo na señat sija , yan mannamanman , ya , yaguin siña , ujadagueja asta y manmaayig .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Estagüe na jusangane jamyo antes .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Yaguin ilegñija nu jamyo : Estagüe na gaegue güi desierto , chamo jumajanao ; pat , Estagüe , na gaegue gui sanjalom gui cuatto , chamo jumojonggue .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Sa calang y lamlam ni y jumuyong gui sancatan , ya manina gui sanlichan , taegüijija locue y minamaela y Lajin taotao .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Sa manoja nae mañaga y tataotao y matae , ayo locue nae ufandaña y aguila sija .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: N	24	29		33030	 ¶ Ti apmam despues di y pininiten ayo sija na jaane , y atdao ujomjom , ya y pilan ti ufanina ; ya y pution sija ufamodong guine y langet ; ya y nina siñan y langet ufanmayengyong .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Ayo nae uanog señat y Lajin taotao gui langet ; yan ayo nae ufanugung todo y tribu sija gui tano ; ya ujalie y Lajin taotao na mamamaela gui jilo y mapagajes sija gui langet , yan y ninasiñaña yan y dangculon minalagña .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Ya utago y angetña sija yan y dangculo na catin y trompeta ya ujanadaña y inayigñija guine y cuatro manglo , desde y un punta gui langet asta y otro .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: N	24	32		33060	 ¶ Tingo y acomparasion y trongcon igos . Yanguin y ramasña mañaña ya manjagon , intingo na jijot y fañomnagan .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue jamyo , yaguin inlie todo este sija na güinaja , intingoja na esta jijot gui petta sija .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti ufanmalofan este na generasion , asta qui todo este sija na güinaja manmacumple .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Y langet yan y tano ufanmalofan ; lao y sinanganjo sija ti ufanmalofan .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: N	24	36		33100	 ¶ Lao ayo na jaane yan ayo na ora , taya tumungo , ni y angjet sija gui langet ni y Lajiña , na y Tatajoja .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Lao calang y jaanin Noe , taegüijija locue y minamaela y Lajin taotao .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Sa ayo na jaane sija y antes di y dilubio , estaba mañochocho yan manguiguimen , ya manasagua , yan manafanaasagua , asta ayo na jaane anae jumalom si Noe gui atca ,

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ya ti jatungo asta qui mato y dilubio , ya manchinile todos sija ; taegüijija locue y minamaelan y Lajin taotao .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ya ayo na jaane uguaja dos gui fangualuan ; y uno umacone , ya y otro umapolo :

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dos palaoan manguguleg gui mitate ; y uno umacone , y ya otro umapolo .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: N	24	42		33160	 ¶ Fanbela sa ti intingo jafa na jaane nae ufato y Señotmiyo .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Tingo este na yaguin y gaeguima jatungo ngaean nae ufato y saque , ubelagüe , sa ti upolo na umayulangguan ni iyasija .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Enao mina jamyo locue fanlisto , sa y Lajin taotao ufato güije na ora gui anae ti injajaso .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Jaye y tifáfababa yan y malate na tentago , ni y señotña ninamagasgüe gui guimaña , para uninanae sija nañija gui tiempo ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Dichoso ayo na tentago , yaguin mato y amuña ya sineda jafatitinas taegüije .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na uninamagasgüe todo gui iyoña .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Lao yaguin ayo y taelaye na tentago ilegña gui corasonña : Y amujo ufato atrasao ;

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Ya sigue di janafanlamen y mangachongña , y chumochocho yan gumiguimen yan y manbeglacho :

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Y señot ayo na tentago ufato güije na jaane gui anae ti jananangga yan y ora ni ti jatungo ,

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ya uyenajo güe ni latigo yan ufinanue ni y patteña yan hipocrita sija ayo nae uguaja tumanges , yan chegcheg nifen .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: AYO nae y raenon langet parejo yan dies na bitgen , ni jachule y lamparañija ya manmapos para ujatagam y nobio .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Ya y sinco guiya sija manmejnalom , ya y sinco manaetiningo .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Y manaetiningo , jachule y lamparañija , ya ti manmañule laña .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Lao y manmejnalom manmañule laña gui baso , yan y lamparañija .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Ya anae atrasasao y nobio , manmatujog todo sija , ya manmaego .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
