text2: Ya y tatalopuenge majungog un inagang , na ilegña : Estagüe y nobio na mamamaela ! fanjuyong ya inresibe !

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Ayo nae todo y bitgen sija mangajulo ya jafamauleg y lamparañija .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Ya y manaetiningo ilegñija ni manmejnalom : Naejam gui lañanmiyo sa y lamparanmame manmatae .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Ya y manmejnalom manmanope ilegñija : Munga sa ti mannajongjit ; lao janao fanmalag y manmanbebende ya infanmamajan para jamyo namaesa .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Ya anae manmapos sija para ufanmamajan , mato y nobio ; ya y estaba manlisto manjalom yan güiya gui guipot umasagua ; ya majuchom y petta .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Despues manmato y palo na bitgen ya ilegñija : Señot , Señot , babayejam .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Lao güiya manope , ilegna ; Magajet jusangane jamyo na ti jutungo jamyo .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Fanmagmata sa ti intingo y jaane ni y ora .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: N	25	14		33390	 ¶ Sa uguaja parejo yan un taotao ni jumanao chago na tano , ya jaagang antes y tentagoña sija , ya jaentrega sija ni güinajaña .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Ya y uno janae sinco talento , ya y otro dos , ya y otro uno ; ya cada uno taemano y guinefuloña ; ya enseguidas mapos .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Ya y rumesibe y sinco na talento , janacometsio , ya jagana talo sinco na talento .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Parejo locue yan y rumesibe dos , mangana talo dos .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Lao y rumesibe y uno , jumuyong ya jaguadog y eda , ya janaatog y salape y senotña .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Despues di apmam na tiempo , mato y señot ayo sija na tentago , ya manacuentas yan sija .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Ya mato ayo y rumesibe sinco na talento , yan mañuñule talo sinco talento , ya ilegña : Señot , sinco na talento unnaeyo ; estagüe talo sinco na junafangana .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Y senotña ilegña nu güiya : Mauleg chechomo , jago mauleg na tentago yan guesmanosguejao : guine unfatinas mauleg gui didide , bae jupoluyejao megae : jalom gui minagof y señotmo .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Mato locue ayo y rumesibe dos na talento , ya ilegña : Señot , dos na talento unnaeyo ; estagüe talo dos talento na junafangana .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Y señotña ilegña nu güiya : Mauleg chechomo , jago mauleg na tentago yan guesmanosguejao : guine unfatinas mauleg gui didide , bae jupoluyejao megae ; jalom gui minagof y señotmo .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Mato locue ayo y rumesibe un talento , ya ilegña : Señot , guajo jutungo na jago majetogjao na taotao ; sa mangongoco jao gui anae ti mananom jao , ya manrecocoje jao gui anae ti mañalapon jao ;

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Ya maañaoyo , ya maposyo ya junaatog y talentomo gui jalom y tano : estagüe ni iyomo .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Lao y señotña inepe güe ilegña : Taelayejao na tentago yan gago . Untungoja na mangongoco yo gui anae ti mananom yo , ya manrecocoje yo gui anae ti mañalapon yo ;

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Enao mina jago nesesita unnae y banquero sija ni salapejo , ya yaguin matoyo , juresibe y iyoco yan ganansia .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Enao mina umanajanao ayo na talento guiya güiya , ya umannae ayo y guaja dies na talento .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Sa jayeja y guaja , umannae güe , ya uguaja megae ; lao y taya iyoña , achogja guaja güinajaña umanajanao .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ya y taebalenña na tentago , yute juyong gui jalom jomjom , ayo nae uguaja tumanges yan chegcheg nifen .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: N	25	31		33560	 ¶ Yaguin y Lajin taotao mato gui minalagña , yan todo y angjetña sija , ayo nae ufatachong gui jilo y tachong y minalagña ;

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Ya umanafandaña gui menaña todo y nasion sija ; ya umanafañajnge y uno gui otro , calang y pastot yan janasajnge y quinilo sija gui chiba ;

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Ya japolo y quinilo sija gui agapaña , ya y chiba gui acagüeña .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Ayo nae y ray ualog ni mangaegue gui agapaña : Maela jamyo mandichoso gui Tatajo , ya inereda y raeno ni esta listo para jamyo desde y mafatinas y tano ;

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Sa anae ñalangyo , innachocho yo ; anae majoyo , innaguimen yo ; anae taotaojuyong yo , innajalom yo ;

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Anae taya magagojo , innaminagago yo . Anae malangoyo , inbesita yo ; anae gaegue yo gui calaboso , manmato jamyo guiya guajo .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Ayo nae y manunas manmanope güe ilegñija : Señot , ngaean nae inliijao ñalang , ya innachocho jao ? pat majo , ya innaguimen jao ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Ngaean nae inliijao taotaojuyong , ya innajalom jao ? pat anae taya magagomo , ya innaminagago jao ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Pat ñgaean nae inliijao malango , pat y calaboso , ya manmatojam guiya jago ?

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Y ray ujaope ilegña nu sija : Magajet jusangane jamyo , taemanoja na y infatinas ni uno güine gui mandiquique na mañelujo , infatinasja locue nu guajo .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Ayo nae ilegña locue ni y mangaegue gui acagüeña : Fanjanao guiya guajo , jamyo matdito , fanmalag y taejinecog na guafe , ni esta manalisto ni anite yan y anjetña sija ;

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Sa anae ñalangyo , ti innachocho yo ; anae majoyo , ti innaguimen yo ;

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Anae taotaojuyong yo , ti innajalom yo ; anae taya magagojo , ti innaminagago yo ; malangoyo , yan gaegue yo gui calaboso , lao ti inbesita yo .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Ayo nae ufanmanope locue sija , ilegñija : Señot , ngaean nae inliijao ñalang , pat majo , pat taotaojuyong , pat taya magagomo , pat malango , pat gui calaboso , ya ti insetbejao ?

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Ayo nae ujaope sija , ilegña : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na taemanoja ti infatinas nu uno güine gui mas mandiquique , ti infatinas nu guajo .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Ya esta sija manmapos para y taejinecog na minasapet ; lao y manunas para y taejinecog na linala .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: YA susede anae munjayan si Jesus jasangan este sija na sinangan , ilegña ni disipuluña sija ;

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: Intingo na dos na jaane talo umafatinas y guipot ; ya y Lajin taotao umaentrega para umatane gui quiluus .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Ayo nae y prinsipen y mamale sija , yan y manbijo na taotao sija , mandaña gui palasyon y magas na pale , y naanña si Caefas :

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Ya manaconseja entresija para ujacone si Jesus pot dinague , ya ujapuno .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Lao ilegñija : Munga gui jaanin y guipot , sa munga na umafatinas yinaoyao gui taotao sija .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Ya anae estaba si Jesus guiya Betania , gui guima Simon y ategtog ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Mato guiya güiya un palaoan , na guaja un boteya alabastron ungüento na dangculo baliña , ya jachuda gui jilo iluña , anae estaba gui lamasa na matatachong :

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Lao anae malie ni disipuluña sija , ninafanlalalo , ya ilegñija : Jafa na jagagasta este ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Sa este na ungüento siña mabende pot dangculo na presio , ya ufanmanae y mamoble .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Anae jatungo si Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Jafa na innachatsaga y palaoan ? sa jafatinas mauleg na chocho para guajo .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Sa jamyo guaja siempre mamoble manjajamyo , lao guajo , siempre taya .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Sa jachuda este na ungüento gui tataotaojo , jafatinas para majafotjo .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : Mano nae este na ebangelio na umapredica gui todo y tano , uguajaja locue este y finatinasña este na palaoan , masangan para memoriasña .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: N	26	14		33850	 ¶ Ayo nae y uno gui dose , y naanña si Judas Iscariote , mapos malag y prinsipen y mamale sija ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jafa malagomiyo innaeyo , ya juentrega jamyo nu güiya ? Ya manmapesa para güiya treinta pidason salape .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Ya desde ayo , manmanaliligao lugat para umaentrega güe .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: N	26	17		33880	 ¶ Ya y finenana na jaanin gupot pan sin lebadura , manmato y disipulo gui as Jesus , ya ilegñija : Mano nae malagojao ya infamaulequejao namo gui guipot ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Ya ilegña : Janao fanmalag y siuda , gui guima ayo na taotao , y insangane : Y Maestro ilegña , y tiempoco esta jijot , iyajamyo nae jufatinas y guipot Pascua yan y disipulojo sija .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ya y disipulo sija jafatinas y mantinago as Jesus , ya manalisto y guipot pascua .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Ya anae pupuenge güije na jaane , matachong gui lamasa yan y dose na disipulo ;

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Ya anae mañochocho güiya ilegña : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na uno guiya jamyo uentregayo .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Sija ninafangostriste , ya sigue di ilegñija cada uno nu güiya : Buente guajo , Señot ?

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Ayo nae manope ilegña : Y munajalom y canaeña yan guajo gui plato , güiya uentregayo .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Magajet na y Lajin taotao ujanao , calang y esta matugue nu güiya ; lao ay ay para ayo na taotao ni y jaentrega y Lajin taotao ! maulegña mojon ayo na taotao na ti umafañago .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Ayo nae manope si Judas , ni umentrega güe , ilegña : Guajo buente Rabi ? Ylegña nu güiya : Jago guinin sumangan .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: N	26	26		33970	 ¶ Ya mientras mañochocho , jachule si Jesus y pan , ya jabendise , ya jaipe , ya janae y disipoluña sija , ya ilegña : Chule , ya cano ; este y tataotaojo .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Jachule y copa , ya janae si Yuus grasias , ya janae sija ni y copa , ilegña : Fanguimen jamyo todo .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Sa este y jâgâjo gui Nuevo Testamento , ni y machuda para megae , para inasiin y isao .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo , na desde pago ti juguimen mas y tinegcha ubas , asta ayo na jaane anae para juguimen nuebo yan jamyo gui raenon Tata .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: N	26	30		34010	 ¶ Ya anae munjayan jacanta un himno , manmapos para sabana Olibo ,

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Todos jamyo ufanmañoda guiya guajo ocasion inale pago na puenge ; sa matugue esta : Junafañetnot y pastot , ya y quinilo sija manmachalapon gui manada .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Lao despues di unacajuloyo talo gui entalo manmatae , jujanao gui menanmiyo guiyo Galilea .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Si Pedro manope , ilegña nu güiya : Yaguin todos ufanmañoda guiya jago ocasion inale lao guajo ti jusoda para siempre ocasion inale .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Si Jesus , ilegña : Magajet jusanganejao : na pago na puenge , antes di ucanta y gayo , undagueyo tres biaje .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Ylegña nu guiya si Pedro : Achogaja junesesita matae yan jago , lao ti judaguejao . Yan todo y palo disipulo sija , taegüenaoja ilegñija locue .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Ayo nae mato si Jesus yan sija gui güetta na mafanaan Gethsemane , ya ilegña ni disipuluña sija : Fanmatachong güine , ya jumanaoyo ya j ufanaetae güije guato .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ya jacone gachongña si Pedro yan y dos lajin Sebedeo , ya jatutujon mantriste yan manmajalang .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Y antijo gostriste asta qui matae : fañaga güine , ya infanbela yan guajo .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Ya mamocat mona didide , tumecon ya manaetae , ilegña : Tatajo , yaguin siña , nafalofan este na copa guiya guajo : lao ti según y minalagojo , na según y minalagomo .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Ya mato gui disipuluña sija , ya jasoda sija na manmamaego : ya ilegña as Pedro : Jafa , ada ti siña jamyo infanbela yan guajo una ora ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Fanbela ya infanmanaetae , para chamiyo fanjajalom gui tentasion : y espiritu magajet na malago lao y catne echecho .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Mapos talo gui segundo biaje ya manaetae , ilegña : Tatajo , yaguin ti siña este na copa malofan guiya guajo , yaguin ti juguimen , ufatinas y minalagomo .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Ya mato , ya jasoda talo sija na manmamaego ; sa y atadogñija manmacat .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Ya jadingo sija , mapos talo ya manaetae gui mina tres biaje , jasangan ayoja na sinangan .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ayo nae mato gui disipuluña sija , ya ilegña : Infanmamaegoja , pago , yan infandescacansaja ; estagüe na mato y ora , ya y Lajin taotao esta maentrega gui canae y manisao sija .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Fangajulo na nije tafanjanao ; estagüe esta mato y umentregayo .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: N	26	47		34180	 ¶ Ya y tiempoja anae cumuecuentos güe , estagüe si Judas , uno gui dose , mato mañisija yan un dangculon linajyan taotao , manmañuñule espada yan galute , tinago y prinsipen y mamale sija yan y manamco na taotao sija .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Yan umentrega güe , mannae esta señat , ilegña : Y juchico , güiya ; guesguot .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Ya enseguidas matogüe gui as Jesus , ya ilegña nu güiya : Minagof , Maestro ! ya jachico .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Ya si Jesus , ilegña nu güiya : Amigo , jafajao na mato ? Ayo nae manmato sija ya maguot si Jesus , ya macone .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Ya , estagüe , uno gui mangachong si Jesus , jajuto y canaeña , ya jalagnos y espadaña , y janalamen uno gui tentago y prinsipen y mamale sija , janajanao un talanga .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Natalo guato y espadamo gui sagaña ; sa todo y manmañuñule espada , nu y espadaja ufanpinino .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Ada jinasomo na ti siñayo jutayuyut si Tata pago , ya güiya unaeyo enseguidas mas di dose legion na angjet sija ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Lao jaftaemano macumple y Tinigue sija ; sa matugue na taegüenao nesesita umafatinas este ?

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Ayo na ora ilegña si Jesus ni linajyan taotao : Manmato jamyo parejo yan contra y saque , na manmañuñule jamyo espada yan galute para inqueneyo ? Cada jaane manjijitaja guajo matachong gui templo , mamnanagüe nu jamyo , ya ti inqueneyo .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Lao todo este umafatinas , para umacumple y Tinigue sija ni y profeta sija . Ayo nae todo y disipuluña sija madingo güe , ya manmalago .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: N	26	57		34280	 ¶ Ya ayo sija y cumone si Jesus , macone güe guato gui as Caefas , magas na pale , anae manestaba y escriba sija yan y manamco na mandadaña .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Lao si Pedro , dinalalag güe chago asta qui mato gui colat y magas na pale ; ya jumalom ya manmatachong yan y tentago sija , para ulie y uttimo .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Ya y prinsipen y mamale sija yan todo y inetnon ofisiat , manmanaliligao ni ti magajet na testimonio contra si Jesus , para umapuno .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Lao ni uno mañoda ; achogja mato megae na ti manmagajet na testigo . Lao y uttimo manmato dos ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: Na ilegñija , Este na taotao ilegña : Guajo siña juyulang papa este na gumayuus , ya junacajulo gui tres na jaane .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ya cajulo y magas y mamale , ya ilegña nu güiya : Ti unfanope ni jafa ? Jafa este na testimonio contra jago ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Lao si Jesus mamatquiloja . Ya y magas y mamale ilegña nu güiya : Jutayuyutjao pot y lalâlâ na Yuus , na unsanganejam cao jago si Cristo , Lajin Yuus .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Jago guinin sumangan . Ya jusangane jamyo na desde pago inlie y Lajin taotao na matatachong gui agapa y ugaeninasiña na canae , ya umamaela gui jalom y mapagajes sija gui langet .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Ayo nae y magas y mamale , jatiteg y magaguña , ya ilegña : Cumuentos chatfino contra si Yuus : jafa mas na utanesesita testigo sija ? Estagüe esta pago na injingog y chinatfino contra si Yuus .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Jafa pinelonmimiyo ? Sija manmanope ilegñija : Jamerese y finatae .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Ayo nae matolae y mataña yan patmada güe ; ya y palo manafañetnot nu y dinemo ;

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: Ya ilegñija : Profetisayejam , O Cristo ! jayejao munafañetnot ?

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: N	26	69		34400	 ¶ Ya ayo na tiempo si Pedro estaba matatachong gui sumanjiyong gui guelat ; ya mato guija güiya un palaoan tentago , ya ilegña : Manjajamjo locue yan si Jesus y Galileo .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Lao güiya jadague gui menan todos , ilegña : Ti jutungo jafa ilelegmo .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ya anae jumuyong gui petta ; linie ni otro palaoan , ya ilegña ni ayo y manestaba güije : Este locue mañisija yan si Jesus Nasareno .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Ya jadague talo ya manjula ilegña : Ti jutungo ayo na taotao .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Ti apmam despues manmato sija y mangaegue güije , ya ilegñija as Pedro : Magajet na jago locue uno guiya sija ; sa y sinanganmo dumiclalara jao .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ayo nae jatutujon mumatdise , yan manjula , ilegña : Ti jutungo ayo na taotao . Ya enseguidas cumanta y gayo .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ya jajaso si Pedro y sinangan Jesus ni ilegña : Antes di ucanta y gayo , undagueyo tres biaje . Ya mapos juyong ya gueftumanges .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: YA mato y egaan , todo y prinsipen y mamale , yan y manamco na taotao sija , mandaña y manaconseja entre sija contra si Jesus , para umapuno güe .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Ya anae munjayan magode güe , macone ya maentrega gui as Ponsio Pilato y magalaje .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: N	27	3		34490	 ¶ Ayo nae si Judas , y umentrega güe , jalie na esta umayogua , ya mañotsot ya jachule talo guato y treinta pidason salape gui prinsipen y mamale yan y manamco na taotao sija ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Ya ilegña : Guajo isaoyo , juentrega y taeisao na jâgâ . Lao sija ilegñija : Jafa ayo guiyajame ? Jagoja adaje .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Ya jayute y pidason salape jalom gui jalom y templo , ya mapos ya jañaca güe .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Ya y prinsipen y mamale sija , jachule y salape ya ilegñija : Ti tunas na tapolo gui tesoro sa baliña y jâgâ .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Ya manaconseja entre sija , ya mafajan y fangualuan oyero , para y naftan y taotaojuyong .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Ayo mina mafanaan ayo na fangualuan : Fangualuan jâgâ , asta pago na jaane .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Ayo nae macumple y sinangan na pot y profeta Jeremias , ni ilegña : Ya sija jachule y treinta pidason salape , presio ayo y gaebale , y presio na mapolo gui jiloña y famaguon Israel ;

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Ya manmanae sija , para ujafajan y fangualuan y oyero taegüenao , na jatagoyo y Señot .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: N	27	11		34570	 ¶ Ya si Jesus estaba tomotojgue gui menan y magalaje , ya y magalaje finaesen güe , ilegña : Jago y Ray Judio sija ? Si Jesus ilegña : Jago umalog .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Ya anae mafaaela ni y prinsipen y mamale , yan y manamco sija , ti manope ni jafa .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Ayo nae si Pilato ilegña nu güiya : Ti unjujungog cuanto na güinaja nae manmadeclara contra jago ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Ya ti manope ni un sinangan ; ya ninagosmanman y magalaje .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Ya y jaanin y guipot , costumbreña y magalaje na usotta pot y taotao sija un preso , jaye y malagoñija .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Ya guaja presoñija uno na afamao , na y naanña si Barabas .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Ya anae mandaña ilegña si Pilato nu sija : Jaye malagonmiyo jusottaye jamyo ? Si Barabas pat si Jesus , ni mafanaan Cristo ?

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Sa jatungoja na pot embidiañija muna maentrega güe .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: N	27	19		34650	 ¶ Ya anae estaba güe na matatachong gui tribuna , y asaguaña manago nu güiya , ilegña : Chamo umeentalo nu enao tunas na taotao ; sa pago jupadedese megae sija gui güinife pot güiya .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Lao y prisipen y mamale sija , yan y manamco sija jasoyo y taotao sija , na ujagagao si Barabas , ya si Jesus , umapuno .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Ya y magalaje manope , ilegña nu sija : Jaye gui dos malagonmiyo jusottaye jamyo ? Sija ilegñija : Si Barabas .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Si Pilato ilegña nu sija : Ya jafa jufatinas as Jesus ni mafanaan Cristo ? Todos sija ilegñija : Umatane gui quiluus .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jafa na taelaye finatinasña ? Lao sija managang mas duro , ilegñija : Umatane gui quiluus .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: N	27	24		34700	 ¶ Anae jalie si Pilato na taya jafa na probecho , lao mas y ninafanyaoyao , mañule janom ya jafagase y canaeña gui menan y taotao sija , ya ilegña : Taeisaoyo gui jâgâ este y tunas na taotao : lie jamyo .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Ya manmanope todo y taotao sija ilegñija : Y jâgâña usaga guiya jame , yan y famaguonmame .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Ayo nae masotta si Barabas , ya an munjayan mapanag si Jesus , maentrega para umaatane gui quiluus .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Ayo nae y sendalon y magalaje macone si Jesus gui pretorio , ya mandaña guiya güiya todo y manadan sendalo sija .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Ya mapula y magaguña , ya manaminagago agaga na magagon anaco .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Ya mapolo gui iluña un corona na mafatinas ni títuca sija , yan un piao gui agapa na canaeña ; ya mandimo gui menaña , ya mamofefea , ilegñija : Jafa talatmanu jao Ray Judio sija !

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Ya matolae güe , ya machule y piao ya mapanag y iluña .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Ya anae munjayan mamofefea , mapula y magagon anaco , ya manaminagago ni magaguña , ya macone para umaatane gui quiluus .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: N	27	32		34780	 ¶ Ya anae jumajanao manasoda yan un taotao Sirene na y naanña si Simon : este maobliga para uchinilie ni quiluusña .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: N	27	33		34790	 ¶ Ya anae manmato gui un lugat na mafanaan Golgota , cumequeilegña , y sagan calabera ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Mannae para uguimen binagle , manadaña yan lalaet ; ya anae jachague , ti malago jaguimen .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Anae munjayan maatane gui quiluus , mandesapatta y magaguña , mayute suette sija gui jiloña ; ( para umacumple y mumayan masangan pot y profeta : Ujanaadesapatta y magagujo , ya y jilo y magagujo ufanmayute suette sija . )

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Ya manmatachong , ya maadadaje güe güije .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ya mapolo gui iluña y mafaelaña , matugue : ESTE SI JESUS RAY Y JUDIO SIJA .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Ayo nae maatane yan güiya gui quiluus yan y dos na saque ; y uno gui agapaña ya y otro gui acagüeña .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: N	27	39		34850	 ¶ Ya y taotao na manmalolofan , masangane güe innataelaye , ya jayeyengyong y iluñija ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Jago y yumute papa y templo , ya y mina tres na jaane unnacajulo ; libre maesajao ; yaguin jago Lajin Yuus , tunog papa güenao gui quiluus .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Taegüinija locue mamofefea güe y prisipen mamale sija , yan y escriba sija , yan y Fariseo sija , yan y manamco na taotao sija , ilegñija :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: Janalibre y palo , ya ti siñagüe janalibre na maesa . Güiya y Ray y Israel ; polo ya utunog papa pago gui quiluus , ya ayo nae utajonggue güe .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Jaangoco si Yuus ; polo ya ulinibre pago , yaguin malago nu güiya , sa ilegña : Güajo Lajin Yuus .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Y mañaque locue , ni y manmaatane yan güiya gui quiluus , manajuyonge güe locue .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: N	27	45		34910	 ¶ Ya desde y mina saes na ora guaja jinemjom todo y jilo y tano , asta y mina nuebe na ora .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ya y mina nuebe na ora , si Jesus umagang nu y dangculon inagang ilegña : Eli , Eli , lama sabactani ! cumequeilegña : Yuusso , Yuusso , jafa na undingo yo ?

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Ya y palo ni manestaba güije , majungog güe , ya ilegñija : Si Elias este jaaagang .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ya enseguidas malago uno guiya sija , ya jachule y espongja y janafañopchop binagle , ya japolo gui un piao , ya janae güe para uguimen .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Y palo ilegñija : Polo ya talie cao ufato si Elias ya uninalibre .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: N	27	50		34960	 ¶ Ayo nae si Jesus , anae munjayan umagang talo otro biaje nu y dangculon inagang jaentrega y espiritu .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Ya estagüe y cottinan y templo na masise y dos pedaso , guinin sumanjilo asta y sumanpapa ; ya y tano mayengyong , ya y acho sija mangoca .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Ya y naftan sija manmababa ya megae na tataotao mañantos sija ni manmamaego , mangajulo ;

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Ya jumanao gui naftan , despues di quinajiloña , ya mato gui santos na siuda , ya manalie ya megae .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ya y senturion , yan y mangaegue yan güiya na maadadaje si Jesus , anae malie y linao yan todo ayo sija y manmafatinas , mangosmaañao ya ilegñija : Sumen magajet na Lajin Yuus este .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Ya mangaegue güije megae na famalaoan na manmanaatan gui chago , ni jadalalag si Jesus guine Galilea ya jasesetbe .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Gui entalo ayo sija si Maria Magdalena , yan si Maria nanan Santiago yan José , yan y nanan y famaguon Sebedeo .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: N	27	57		35030	 ¶ Ya anae este pupuenge güije na jaane , mato un taotao Arimatea , na rico , na y naanña si José , na güiya locue disipulon Jesus .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Güiya mato gui as Pilato , ya jagagao y tataotao Jesus . Ayo nae si Pilato manago na umanae .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Ya jachule si José y tataotao , ya jabalutan ni un sabanas na gasgas ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Ya japolo gui nuebo na naftanña , ni y finatinasñaja gui acho ni sacapico ; ya janagalileque guato un dangculon acho y pettan y naftan , ya mapos .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: N	27	61		35070	 ¶ Ya manestaba güije si Maria Magdalena , yan y otro Maria , na manmatatachong gui menan y naftan .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: N	27	62		35080	 ¶ Ya y inagpaña na jaane , despues di y jaanen finamauleg , mandaña y prinsipen y mamale sija , yan y Fariseo sija gui as Pilato ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Señot , injaso na ayo y dacon ilegña , anae estaba lalâlâ : Despues di tres na jaane , jucajulo talo .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Enao mina fanago , ya umaasegura y naftan , asta y mina tres na jaane ; sa noseaja ufanmato y disipulo sija an puenge ya ujasaque ; ya ujaalog ni taotao sija : Cajulo esta gui entalo manmatae : ya y uttimo na linache udangculoña qui y finenana .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Ilegña si Pilato nu sija : Inguaja un guatdianmiyo ; janao , ya inasegura todo manu y ninasiñanmiyo .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Ayo nae manmapos sija , ya maadaje y naftan para umaasegura , ya maseyo y acho .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: YUTTIMO na ora y sabalo , gui egaan anae mumanánaná y finénana na jaane gui semana , mato si Maria Magdalena yan y otro Maria , para ujalie y naftan .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ya , estagüe un dangculon linao ; sa y angjet y Señot tumunog guine y langet , ya janagalileg y acho gui petta , ya matachong gui sumanjilo .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Ya y jechuraña parejo yan y lamlam , ya y magaguña apaca calang niebe .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Ya pot y minaañao nu güiya , y guatdia sija mayengyong ya sumaga calang manmatae .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Ya manope y angjet , ilegña ni famalaoan sija : Chamiyo fanmaaañao jamyo ; sa jutungoja na inaliligao si Jesus , ni guinin maatane gui quiluus .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Taegüe güine ; sa esta cajulo , taegüine guinin jasangan . Maela ya inlie y lugat anae guinin umaason y Señot ;

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Ya janao fanlagoguse , ya sangane y disipuluña sija , na esta cajulo gui entalo y manmatae , ya infanninanangga Galilea : ya ayo nae inlie güe ; estagüe , na esta jusangane jamyo .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Ayo nae sija manapos gui naftan , manmaañao yan mangosmagof , yan manmalalago para umannae notisia y disipuluña sija .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: N	28	9		35210	 ¶ Ya estagüe si Jesus na manasoda ya ilegña nu sija : Fanmagof todos ! Ya sija manmato , ya manmagote y adengña ya maadora güe .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo fanmaañao ; janao ya sangane mañelujo na ufanjanao para Galilea ; ya ayo nae ujaliiyo güije .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: N	28	11		35230	 ¶ Anae manmapos sija , estagüe palo gui guatdia sija na manmato gui siuda , ya janatungo y prinsipen y mamale sija , todo y munjayan manmafatinas .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Ya anae mandaña yan y manamco na taotao ya manaconseja entre sija , mannae y sendalo sija megae na salape ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Alog , y disipuluña sija manmato gui anae puenge , ya masaque güe , anae manmamaegojam .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Yaguin jaecungog este y magalaje , jame innamalago güe ya infanseguro .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Ayo nae sija jachule y salape ya jafatinas jafa y manmafanagüe sija : ya esta na sinangan mapublilica ni Judio sija asta pago na jaane .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: N	28	16		35280	 ¶ Ya y onse na disipulo sija manmapos para Galilea , gui un ogso anae guinin mantinago as Jesus .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Ya anae malie , maadoragüe ; lao y palo buebuente .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: N	28	18		35300	 ¶ Ya mato guiya sija si Jesus ya jasangane sija , ilegña : Todo y ninasiña manaeyo , gui langet yan y tano .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Fanjanao , ya fannaquilisyano todo y nasion sija , tagpange sija pot y naan y Tata , yan y Lajiña , yan y Espiritu Santo :

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Fanagüe sija , na ujaadaje todosija ni jutago jamyo ; sa estagüe jugagaegueja guiya jamyo todo y jaane , asta y jinecog y tano . Amen .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: TUTUJON y ibangelion Jesucristo , Lajin Yuus .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Jaftaemano esta matugue gui profeta Isaias : Estagüe , guajo tumago y tentagojo gui menan matamo , para ufamauleg y chalanmo gui menamo .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Ynagang ni umaagang gui desierto : Fanmauleg y chalan y Señot : natunas y cayejonña .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Si Juan managpange gui desierto , ya jasetmon y tinagpangen minañotsot para inasiin isao sija .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Ya manjanao guiya güiya guato todo y tano Judea , yan todo sija guiya Jerusalem ; ya todo sija mantinagpange gui sadog Jordan , ya jaconfesatñaejon y isaoñija .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Ya si Juan minagagon pulon cameyo , yan sinturon cuero gui senturaña ; ya y naña , apacha yan miet monte .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Ya mansesetmon , ilegña : Ufato gui tateco uno na masgaeninasiña qui guajo , y coreas y sapatosña , ti digno yo nu jutecon ya jupula .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Guajo magajet na jutagpange jamyo yan janom ; lao güiya infantinagpange ni Espiritu Santo .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: N	1	9		35410	 ¶ Ya susede ayo sija na jaane , na si Jesus mato guine Nasaret Galilea , ya tinagpange as Juan gui Jordan .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Ya enseguidas nae cajulo gui janom , jalie na mababa y langet , ya y Espiritu , calang paluma tumunog gui jiloña ,

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ya mato un inagang guine y langet na ilegña : Jago y lajijo ni yajo , iya jago nae gosmagof yo .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Ya enseguidas ninafalag y desierto ni Espiritu .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Ya sumaga güije cuarenta na jaane , ya tinienta as Satanas ; yan mañisija y manmachaleg na gâgâ sija ; ya y angjet sija masetbe güe .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: N	1	14		35460	 ¶ Anae munjayan si Juan mapreso , mato si Jesus guiya Galilea , jasesetmon y ibangelion Yuus .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Ya ilegña : Y tiempo esta macumple ; ya y raenon Yuus esta jijot : fanmañotsot , ya injenggue y ibangelio .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: N	1	16		35480	 ¶ Ya mamomocat gui oriyan tasen Galilea , jalie si Simon , yan si Andres chelun Simon , na jayuyute y lagua gui tase , sa sija manpescadot .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Maela dalalagyo , ya junafanpescadot taotao jamyo .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Enseguidas japolo y laguañija ya madalalag güe .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Anae malofan talo didide mona , jalie si Santiago , lajin Sebedeo , yan si Juan cheluña , na manestaba locue gui batco na jalememenda y laguañija .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Ya enseguidas jaagang ; ya jadingo si tatanñija as Sebedeo gui batco yan y manmachocho sija , ya madalalag güe .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: N	1	21		35530	 ¶ Ya manjalom Capernaum ; ya enseguidas , gui sábado na jaane , jumalom gui sinagoga ya mamanagüe .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Ya sija ninafanmanman ni finanagüeña ; sa jafananagüe sija calang uno ni gaeninasiña , ya ti calang y escriba sija .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Ya enseguidas guaja güije gui sinagogañija un taotao na guaja áplacha na espiritu , ya güiya umagang ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: Ylegña : Parajafa jam nu jago , Jesus taotao Nasaret ? Matojao para unnafanaelayejam ? Jutungoja jayejao , jago y Santos guine as Yuus .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Ya si Jesus jalalatde ilegña : Pacaca , ya maela juyong guiya güiya .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Ya anae y áplacha na espiritu tiniteg güe , ya ninaagang gosdangculo na inagang , jumuyong guiya güiya .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Ya todo sija ninafanmanman , pot este manafaesen entre sija , ilegñija : Jafa este ? Jafa na nuebo finanagüe este ! yan ninasiña jatago y manáplacha na espiritu , ya maosgueja güe ?

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Enseguidas y famaña manamamta todo gui tano oriyan Galilea .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: N	1	29		35610	 ¶ Ya enseguidas anae jumuyong gui sinagoga , mato gui guima Simon yan si Andres , yan si Santiago yan si Juan .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Ya y suegran Simon estaba na umaason sa malango yan calentura : ya masangane güe enseguidas nu y palaoan .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Ayo nae mato güe , ya jamantiene canaeña , ya jajatsa julo ; ya pinelo ni calentura , ya güiya sumetbe sija .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: N	1	32		35640	 ¶ Ya anae estaba esta pupuenge , anae machom y atdao , maconiigüe todo ni manmañetnot yan y maninanite .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Ya todo y siuda mandaña gui petta .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Ya janafanjomlo megae ni manestaba manmalango todo clasen chetnot sija ; ya jayute juyong megae na anite sija ; ya ti japolo nu y anite sija cumuentos sa matungo güe .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: N	1	35		35670	 ¶ Ya y egaan güije , cajulo gostaftaf , jojomjomja trabia , ya jumuyong , ya malag y un lugat desierto , ya manaetae güije .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Ya tinatiye güe as Simon , yan y mangachochongña .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Ya anae masoda güe , ilegñija nu güiya : Todo umaliligaojao .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Nije tafanmalag y otro lugat gui sengsong ni jijot , ya jufansetmon locue güije ; sa pot este na matoyo .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Ya jumalom gui sinagogañija todo Galilea , sesetmon ya jayuyute juyong y anite sija .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: N	1	40		35720	 ¶ Ya un ategtog mato guiya güiya , tinayuyut güi ya dumimo , ya ilegña : Yaguin malagojao , siña unnagasgasyo .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: si Jesusninamaase ya jaestira y canaeña , ya japacha , ya ilegña : Malagoyo , ungasgas .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Ya enseguidas y chetnot y ategtog mapos guiya güiya ya gasgas güe .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Ya jagosencatga , ya jatago na ujanao ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Atan ya chamo sumangangane ni jaye jafa ; lao sigueja gui jinanaomo ya unfanue y pale nu jago , ya unofrese ni guinasgasmo ni si Moises manago , para testimonioñija .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Lao güiya mapos , ya jatutujon munamatungo , yan janagosmamta y checho ; pot este , si Jesus ti siña jumalom matungo nu güiya gui siuda ; lao sumasagaja gui sumanjiyong gui lugat desierto sija , ya manmato guiya güiya guinin todo y patte sija .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: YA otro biaje güiya jumalom guiya Capernaum , despues di malofan ti megae na jaane sija ; ya majungog na gaegue güe gui jalom guma .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Ya mandaña megae , ya ti manulag , ni gui oriyan y petta ; ya jasetmon y sinangan guiya sija .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Ayo nae manmato guiya güiya manmangongone un paralitico , na macocone ni cuatro .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Ya anae ti siña manmato guiya güiya pot y linajyan taotao , manajanao y atof anae estaba güe , ya anae munjayan mababa , manatunog y cama anae mapopolo y paralitico .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus y jinenggueñija , ilegña ni paralitico : Lajijo , y isaomo unmaasie .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Ya estaba güije manmatatachong palo escriba sija , ya manmanjajaso gui corasonñija , ilegñija :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: Jafa na cumuecuentos este na taotao chatfino contra si Yuus ? Jaye siña manasie isao , solo si Yuusja ?

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Ya jatungo si Jesus enseguidas gui espirituña na manmanjajaso gui sumanjalomñija , ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa muna injajaso este sija gui corasonmiyo ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Jafa mas guse taalog y paralitico : Y isaomo unmaasie ; pat taalog : Cajulo , chule y camamo , ya unjanao ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Lao para intingo na y Lajin taotao guaja ninasiñaña gui jilo tano manasie isao ( ilegña ni paralitico ) ,

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: Jualog nu jago : Cajulo , ya unchule y camamo ya janao falag iyajamyo .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Ayo nae cajulo güe enseguidas , ya jachule y camaña , ya mapos gui menan todo ; enao muna todo ninafanmanman , ya manamalag si Yuus , ilegñija : Taya nae inlie ayo .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: N	2	13		35900	 ¶ Ya jumanao talo gui oriyan tase , ya todo y linajyan taotao manmato guiya güiya , ya jafanagüe sija .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Ya anae malofan jalie si Levi , lajin Alfeo , na matatachong gui bancon y tributo sija , ya ilegña nu güiya : Dalalagyo . Ya cajulo ya dinalalag güe .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Ya susede na estaba güe matachong para uchocho gui lamasa gui guima ayo , ya megae sija na publicano yan manisao sija manmatatachong mañisija locue yan si Jesus , yan y disipoluña sija ; sa guaja megae dumadalalag güe .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ya y escriba sija gui entalo y Fariseo sija , anae jalie na mañochocho yan y manisao yan y publicano sija , ilegñija ni disipoluña sija : Jafa este na güiya chomocho yan gumiguimen , yan y publicano sija yan y manisao ?

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Y manjomlo ti janesesita medico , na y manmalango . Ti matoyo para juagang y manunas , na y manisao sija .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: N	2	18		35950	 ¶ Ya y disipulon Juan , yan y disipulon Fariseo sija manayunat : ya manmato , ya ilegñija nu güiya : Jafa muna y disipulon Juan yan y disipulon Fariseo sija manayuyunat ; ya y disipulumo ti manayuyunat ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Siña manayunat y mangaegue gui guipot umasagua , yaguin mañisija yan y nobio ? Y tiempo nae mañisijaja yan y nobio , ti siña manayunat .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Lao ufato y jaane sija , na y nobio umanajanao guiya sija ; ya ayo sija na jaane nae ufanayunat .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Taya ni uno lumimendanñañaejon y nuebo na magago gui bijo na bestido ; sa ayo y nuebo na limenda ujanao gui bijo , ya mas taelaye y matiteg .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Ya taya ni uno umasajguane y nuebo na bino gui bijo na boteyan cuero : sa y nuebo na bino uyamag y boteyan cuero sija , ya umachuda y bino , ya y boteyan cuero manmalingo ; lao y nuebo na bino , y nuebo na boteyan cuero nae umasajguane .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: N	2	23		36000	 ¶ Ya manmapos este , malolofan güe gui jalom fangualuan trigo gui sabado na jaane ; ya y disipoluña sijas igue di manmanjala ni espiga sija .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Ya y Fariseo sija , ilegñija : Atanja , jafa na jafatitinas gui sabado na jaane y ti mauleg para umafatinas ?

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Taya nae intaetae jafa checho David anae janesesita , ya ñalang yan y mangachongña ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Jafa taemano jalomña gui guimayuus anae si Abiatar magas na pale , ya jacano y pan ni inefrese , ni ti para macano , na para y pale sija ; ya janae locue y mangachongña sija ?

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Ylegña talo nu sija : Y sabado pot y taotao na mafatinas : ti y taotao pot y sabado .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Enaomina y Lajin taotao Señot locue gui sabado .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: YA jumalom talo gui sinagoga ; ya guaja güije un taotao na anglo un canaeña .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Ya sija maaatanja güe cao unajomlo gui sabado na jaane ; para umafaaela .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña ni ayo na taotao y anglo un canaeña : Tojgue julo gui entalo .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Siña tafatinas mauleg gui sabado na jaane pat taelaye ? nalibre y linâlâ pat puno ? Lao sija manmamatquiquiloja .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Ya anae jaatan gui oriya sija yan y linalalo , ninapinite pot y majetog corasoññija , ya ilegña nu y taotao : Estira mona y canaemo . Ya jaestira , ya y canaeña tumalo mauleg parejo yan y otro .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Ayo nae manmapos y Fariseo sija , ya manaconseja yan y taotao Herodes sija , contra güiya , para umapuno .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Lao si Jesus sumuja para y tase yan y disipuluña sija ; ya madalalag un dangculon linajyan taotao guine Galilea , yan guine Judea ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Yan guine Jerusalem , yan guine Idumea , yan y otro bandan Jordan , yan guine oriyan Tiro yan Sidon , dangculo na linajyan taotao anae majungog y dangculon finatinasña sija , manmato guiya güiya .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Ya jasangane y disipoluña sija , na un diquique na batco uninananggaja güe , pot y linajyan taotao para munga güe manachatsaga ,

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Sa guaja megae janafanjomlo ; ya pot ayo na manpodong gui jiloña , todo y mangaechetnot para umapacha ,

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ya y manáplacha sija na espiritu locue , anae malie güe , manpodong papa gui menaña , ya managang , ilegñija : Jago y Lajin Yuus .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Lao guiya jagosencatga sija , na chañija munamatutungo güe .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: N	3	13		36180	 ¶ Ya cajulo gui egso , ya jaagang guiya güiya ayo sija y malagoña , ya sija manmato guiya güiya .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Ya jaayig y dose , na ufañisijaja , yan para unafanjanao ya ujafanmansetmon ;

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Yan ufangaeninasiña para ujayute juyong y anite sija .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Sija si Simon , ni japolo sobrenaaña si Pedro ;

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Yan si Santiago , lajin Sebedeo , yan si Juan chelun Santiago ; ni japolo sobrenaañija si Boanerges ni comoqueilegña lalajin julo .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Yan si Andres , yan si Felipe , yan si Bartolome , yan si Mateo , yan si Tomas yan si Santiago , lajin Alfeo , yan si Tadeo , yan si Simon y Cananeo ;

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Yan si Judas Iscariote ni y locue umentrega güe : ya manjalom talo gui guima .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: N	3	20		36250	 ¶ Ya y linajyan taotao mandaña talo , ya pot este sija ti siña ni ufañochocho pan .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Ya anae majungog na familiaña sija , manmato para umaguot ; sa ilegñija : Esta ti guiya güe .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Ya y escriba sija ni manmato guine Jerusalem , ilegñija , na guaja güe as Beetsebub , ya pot y prinsipen anite na manyuyute juyong anite sija .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Lao güiya umagang sija , ya ilegña nu sija pot acomparasion : Jafataemano siña si Satanas jayute juyong si Satanas ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Yaguin un raeno madibide contra güiyaja , ayo na raeno ti siña sumaga .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Yaguin un guma madibide contra güiyaja , ayo na guma ti siña sumaga .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Yaguin si Satanas cajulo contra güiyaja , ya madibide ti siña sumaga : lao gae jinecog .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Taya ni un taotao siña jumalom gui guima y matatnga na taotao , ya unataelaye y güinajaña sija , yaguin ti jagode finena y matatnga na taotao ; ya ayo nae unataelaye y güinajaña .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na todo y isao sija ufanmaasie gui lalajin taotao sija , yan y chinatfino contra cuatquieraja sija na chinatfinue .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Lao jayeja y chumatfino contra y Espiritu Santo , taemaasie ni ngaean ; ya peligroña y taejinecog na isao :

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Sa ilegñija , güiya guaja áplacha na espiritu .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Ya manmato si nanaña , yan y mañeluña , ya manestaba gui sumanjiyong , manmanago na umaagang güe .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao estaba manmatatachong gui oriyaña ; ya ilegñija nu güiya : Estagüe si nanamo yan y mañelumo gui sumanjiyong na maaliligaojao .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Ya güiya jaope sija , ilegña : Jaye nanajo yan jaye mañelujo ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ya manaatan gui oriya anae manestaba manmatatachong gui oriyaña , ya ilegña : Estagüe y nanajo , yan y mañelujo !

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Sa jayeja y fumatinas y minalago Yuus , güiya chelujo laje , yan chelujo palaoan , yan nanajo .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: YA jatutujon otro biaje mananagüe gui oriyan tase ; ya mandaña guiya güiya dangculo na linajyan taotao , enao mina jumalom gui un batco , ya matachong gui tase ; ya todo y linajyan taotao manestaba gui jilo tano gui oriyan tase .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Ya jafanagüe sija megae pot acomparasion , ya ilegña nu sija gui finanagüeña .

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: Ecungog : Estagüe y tatanom na jumuyong para ufananom .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Ya anae manananom , palo mamodong gui oriyan chalan ; ya mato y pajaron y aire ya macano .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Ya y palo mamodong gui jilo acho , anae ti megae na oda ; ya enseguidas mandoco , sa ti tadong gui eda .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Lao anae cajulo y atdao , sinenggue , sa taejaleñija manmalayo .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Ya y palo mamodong gui entalo tituca sija ; ya mandoco y tituca sija , ya chiniguet , ya ti manogcha .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ya y palo mamodong gui mauleg na tano , ya manmanogcha , ya mangajulo ya manmegae ; ya uno manogcha treinta , y otro sesenta , y otro ciento .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña nu sija : Y gae talanga para ufanjungog , güiya uecungog .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: N	4	10		36500	 ¶ Ya anae estaba güe güiyaja , y manestaba gue oriyaña yan y dose , mafaesen güi ni y acomparasion sija .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jamyo manmanae y misterion raenon Yuus ; lao y mangaegue gui sumanjiyong , pot acomparasion nae umafatinas todo estesija ;

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Para y manlilie , jalie ya ti jasiente ; ya y manecungog , manmanjungog , lao ti jatungo ; sa no sea ufanmabra talo , ya ufanmmaasie ni isaoñija .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Ti intingo este na acomparasion ? Jafa taemano nae , tungonmiyo todo ni acomparasion sija ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
