text2: Y tatanom jatanme y finijo .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Ya este yuje sija y oriyan chalan , anae manmatanme y finijo ; lao despues di jajungog , mato si Satanas , enseguidas , ya janajanao y finijo ni matanme gui corasonñija .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Parejoja locue yan este sija y manmatanme gui jilo acho ; anae majungog y finijo , enseguidas maresibe todo ni y minagofñija ;

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Lao taya jaleñija , ya ti jadura apmam ; sa anae cajulo y triniste , pat y pinetsigue pot y finijo , enseguidas maninefende .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Ya este yuje sija y manmatanme gui entalo tituca sija ; y jumungog y finijo ;

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Lao y inadajen este y tano , yan y dinaguen y güinaja sija , yan y minalago ni guaja gui palo güinaja sija , manjalom ya machiguet y finijo ya jumuyong ti manogcha .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ya este yuje sija y manmatanme gui mauleg na tano ; y jumungog y finijo ya maresibe , ya manmanogcha , ya uno treinta y otro sesenta , y otro siento .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: N	4	21		36610	 ¶ Ylegña nu sija locue : Esta machule y candet para umapolo gui papa medida , pat gui papa cama ? Ya ti para umapolo gui jilo lamasa ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Sa taya na manaatog , ti umafatanñaejon ; ni gae gui secreto ya ti umababa .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yaguin guaja gaetalanga para ufanjungog , güiya uecungog .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Ylegña nu sija locue : Adaje jafa y jiningogmiyo . Y medida anae inmediye sija , ayoja nae infanmamidiye jamyo ; ya infanmanae jamyo mas .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Sa y guaja , umanae : ya y taya , esta y güinajaña , unajanao .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: N	4	26		36660	 ¶ Ya ilegña : Taegüine y raenon Yuus , yaguin un taotao manyute semiya gui jalom oda ;

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Ya maego , ya cajulo gui puenge yan jaane , ya semiya mapta ya doco , ti jatungo jafataemano .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Sa y tano güiyaja manogcha , finena jagon , enseguidas y espiga , despues y grano bula gui espiga .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Ya yaguin y tinegcha dumangculo , enseguidas mapolo y sese para mangoco , sa mato y cosecha .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: N	4	30		36700	 ¶ Ya ilegña : Jafajit nae tanaparejo y raenon Yuus ? pat jafa na acomparasion nae taacompara ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Parejo yan un granon mostasa , ni y anae matanme gui tano , achogja güiya mas diquique gui entalo todo y semiya sija ni y guaja gui jilo y tano .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Lao anae matanme , doco , ya güiya mas dangculo qui todo na golae , ya manramas ni mandangculo na ramasña ; ya pot este y pajaron y aire siña mañaga gui papa y nijongña .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: N	4	33		36730	 ¶ Yan megae sija na acomparasion parejo yan este sija , jasangane sija finijo , jaftaemano y siña jajungog .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Ya sin acomparasion ti jasangane sija ; lao y disipoluña sija anae mañisijaja janaclaruye todo .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija güijija na jaane , anae esta pupuenge : Nije tafanmalofan gui otro banda .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Ya jadingo y linajyan taotao , ya macone güe mañija , anae gaegue güe sui jalom batco . Ya guaja locue palo diquique na batco mañisija .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Ya cajulo un dangculon pagyon manglo , ya jinatme ni napo sija y jalom batco , ya ninabula .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Ya güiya gaegue gui popa na mamaego gui jilo alunan ; ya mayajo , ya ilegñija nu güiya : Maestro , taya unadadaje na infanmatae ?

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Ya cajulo güe , ya jalalatde y manglo , ya ilegña ni tase : Pacaca famatquilo . Ya bumasta y manglo , ya guaja dangculo na catma .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa jamyo na gosmanmaañao ? Taye jinengguenmiyo trabia ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Ya mangosmanmaañao , ya ilegñija entre sija : Jaye este , na asta y manglo yan y tase maosgue güe ?

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: YA manmato gui otro bandan tase gui tano y taotao Gadara sija .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Ya anae jumuyong güe gui batco , enseguidas umasoda yan un taotao gui naftan sija ni guaja un áplacha na espiritu .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Ya guaja sagaña gui jalom naftan sija , ya taya siña gumode güe nu y cadenaja :

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Sa megae na biaje nae magode nu y tale sija yan cadena sija , lao y cadena sija esta manmayamag pot guiya ; ya y tale sija manmagtos , ya taya siña munamanso güe .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Ya siempre yan puenge yan jaane , jumajanao ya umaagang gui entalo naftan sija , yan gui jalomtano sija , ya janalalamen güe ni acho sija .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus gui chago , malago , ya jaadora güe .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Ya umagang gosdangculo na inagang , ilegña : Para jafayo ni jago , Jesus , Lajin y Gueftaquilo na Yuus ? Jufanjula nu jago pot si Yuus na chamoyo munachachatsaga .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Sa ilegña nu güiya : Juyong güine na taotao , áplacha na espiritu .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Ya jafaesen : Jaye naanmo ? Ya inepe , ilegña : Linajyan naanjo : sa manmegaejam .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Ya jatayuyut megae , para chaña yiniyite juyong güije na tano .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Ya gaegue güije , jijot gui jalomtano sija , un dangculo na manadan babue na mañochocho .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Ya matayuyut güe ni ayo todo sija na anite , ilegñija : Tagojam para y babue sija para infanjalom guiya sija .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Ya manpinetmite as Jesus . Ya manjuyong ayo sija y manáplacha na espiritu , ya manjalom gui babue sija ; ya y manada manmalago papa gui un didog na lugat asta y jalom tase , ya guaja sija dos mit ; ya manmatmos gui tase .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Ya y munafañochocho y babue sija manmalago ya manmañangane gui siuda yan y fangualuan sija . Ya manjanao sija para ujalie jafa ayo y guinin mafatinas .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ya manmato gui as Jesus , ya malie y guinin ninachatsaga ni anite , matatachong , ya minagagago , ya jatungo ayo y guaja ni linajyan ; ya manmaañao .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Ya mansinagane ni ayo sija y lumie ; jafa taemano matoña ayo y guinin guaja anite , yan y babue sija .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ya matutujon matayuyut güe na ujanao gui tanoñija .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Ya anae jumalom güe gui batco , tinayuyut güe ni ayo y guinin guaja anite , para ujasija .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Ya si Jesus ti pinetmite , lao ilegña un güiya : Janao falag iyajamyo gui amigumo sija ; ya unsangane sija na dangculon güinaja y Señot finatinasña nu jago , yan guaja minaaseña nu jago .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Ya maposgüe ya jatutujon sumanganñaejon guiya Decapolis na dangculon güinaja y finatinas Jesus nu güiya : ya todo ninafanmanman .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Ya anae malofan otro biaje si Jesus gui un batco para y otro banda , mandaña guiya güiya un dangculo na linajyan taotao ; ya gaegue güe gui oriyan tase .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Ya mato uno gui prinsipe sija gui sinagoga , y naanña si Jairo ; ya anae linie güe , podong gui adengña ;

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: Ya tinayuyut güe megae , ilegña : Y jagajo cumequematae . Nije ya unpolo y canaemo gui jiloña , para ujomlo , yan ulâlâ .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Ya jumanao yan Jesus , ya megae na taotao sija madalalag güe , ya machiguet güe .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Ya un palaoan na numanajuyong jâgâ esta dose años .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Ya japadese megae medico , ya jagasta todo y güinajaña , ya taya jaaprobecha ; lao lumala adid ,

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Ya anae jajungog ayosija na cumuentos si Jesus , jumalom gui entalo y taotao sija gui sumantate , ya japacha y magaguña .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Sa ilegña : Yaguin jupacha y magaguñaja , uguajayo jinemlo .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Ya enseguidas y menegae y jâgâña umanglo , ya jasiente y tataotaoña na esta jomlo ni ayo na chetnot .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Ya si Jesus enseguidas jatungo guiya güiyaja , na ninasiña jumuyong guiya güiya , jabira güe guato gui linajyan taotao , ya ilegña : Jaye pumacha y magagujo ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ya y disipuluña sija ilegñija nu güiya : Unlie y linayan taotao na machichiguetjao , ya ilegmo : Jaye pumachayo ?

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Ya güiya manatan gui oriya para ulie y fumatinas este .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Lao ayo nae y palaoan maañao ya manlaloalao , jatungo na iyagüiya nae mafatinas , mato ya podong gui menaña , ya jasangane todo ni magajet .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña : Jagajo , y jinengguemo unninajomlo ; janao yan minagof , ya unjomio ni chetnotmo .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: N	5	35		37160	 ¶ Y tiempo nae cumuecuentos güe , manmato guine y guima y prinsipen sinagoga ya ilegñija : Y jagamo matae : para jafa di unnachachatsaga mas y Maestro ?

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Lao si Jesus , anae jajungog este na sinangan , ilegña ni prinsipen sinagoga : Chamo maaañao ; jonggueja .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Ya ti japetmite ni uno na událalag güe , solo si Pedro , yan si Santiago , yan si Juan , chelun Santiago .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Ya mato gui guima y prinsipen y sinagoga , ya jalie y atboroto yan y manatanges yan y manugung .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ya anae jumalom , ilegña nu sija : Jafa na manatborotao jamyo , yan manatanges jamyo ? Y patgon na palaoan ti matae , na mamaego .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Ya mamofea güe . Lao güiya janafanjuyong todo , ya jacone y tata yan y nanan y patgon na palaoan , yan y mangachochongña , ya manjalom anae gaegue y patgon na palaoan .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Ya jamantiene y canae y patgon palaoan , ya ilegña : Talitha cumi ; cumequeilegña : Patgon palaoan , jago jucuentutuse , cajulo .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Ya enseguidas ayo na patgon palaoan cajulo , ya mamocat ; sa sacaña y dose años . Ya enseguidas ninafanmanman ni gosdangculo na namanman .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Lao güiya jagosencatga sija na taya ujanatungo : ya manago na umanachocho y patgon palaoan .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: YA anae jumanao güije mato gui tanoña ; ya y disipuluña sija madalalag güe .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Ya anae mato y sábado na jaane , jatutujon mamanagüe gui sinagoga ; ya megae ni jumungog güe ninafanmanman , ya ilegñija : Mano nae guaja este taotao este sija na güinaja ? Yan jafa este na tiningo y esta manae güe ? ya jaftaemano este sija na ninámanman ni mafatinas ni canaeña ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Ada ti este y catpintero , lajin Maria , chelun Santiago , yan si Joses , yan si Juda , yan si Simon ? Ada ti manjijita yan y mañeluña famalaoan güine ? Ya maninefefende nu güiya .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Taya profeta sin onraña lao y tanoñaja , yan entre y parientesña sija , ya y guimaña .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Ya ti siña jafatinas güije jafa na námanman , na japolo y canaeña gui jilo palo manmalango sija , ya janajomlo .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Ya güiya ninámanman ni ti manmanjongguenñija ; ya malilicue gui y sengsong sija mananagüe .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: N	6	7		37310	 ¶ Ya jaagang y dose sija , y jatutujon tumago dos en dos , ya janae ninasiñañija gui jilo manáplacha na espiritu sija ;

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Ya jatago sija na chañija fanmañuñule ni jafa para y chalan , na un bastoñija ; ni costat , ni pan , ni salape gui betsanñija ;

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Lao ufanchenancleta ; ya munga manminagago dos na magago .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Manoja na guma nae manjalom jamyo ; fañaga güije , asta gui manjanao jamyo güije na lugat .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Ya todo ayo sija y ti rumesibe jamyo , ni ti maninecungog jamyo , fanjanao güije , sacude y petbos ni gaegue gui papa adengmiyo para testimonio contra sija . Magajet jusangane jamyo , na mas sungunon na castigon Sodoma , yan Gomora gui jaanin y sentensia , qui ayo na sidua .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Ya manmapos jasetmon na y taotao sija ufanmañotsot .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Ya jayute juyong megae na anite sija , ya japapalae laña megae na manmalango sija , ya janafanjomlo .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: N	6	14		37380	 ¶ Ya jajungog y ray Herodes y faman Jesus ( sa afamao y naanña ) , ya ilegña : Si Juan Bautista cajulo guine y manmatae sija ; ya pot este mangaeninasiña na chocho , esta fumatinas nu güiya .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Palo ilegñija : Si Elias . Y palo ilegñija : Profeta güe , pat uno gui profeta sija .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Herodes , ilegña : Este si Juan ni guine judegüeya : güiya cajulo guine y manmatae sija .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Sa güiyaja si Herodes manago na umamantiene si Juan , ya umapreso gui catset pot si Herodias , asaguan y cheluña as Felipe , sa jacone para asaguaña .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Sa si Juan ilegña as Herodes : Ti cabales na uncone y asaguan y chelumo .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Ya pot este si Herodias uninaguaguat contra güiya , ya jadesesao na upuno , lao ti janasiña .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Sa si Herodes maañao as Juan , jatungo na tunas yan Santos na taotao ya jaguefadaje . Ya anae jajungog , gosbumuebuente gui corasonña ; ya jaecungogjao ni minagofña .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Ya anae mato un jaane na si Herodes gumupot ni mafañaguña , ya mamatinas sena para y prinsipeña sija yan y capitan sija , yan y manmagas sija guiya Galilea ;

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Ya jumalom y jagan Herodias , ya bumaela , ya janamagof si Herodes , yan ayo sija y mangachochongña gui lamasa ; ya y ray ilegña ni patgon na palaoan : Gagaoyo ni malagomo , ya junaejao .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Ya manjula : Todo y ungagaoyo , junae asta lamita gui raenoco .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Ya mapos güe , ya ilegña as nanaña : Jafa jugagao ? Si nanaña ilegña : Y ilun Juan Bautista .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Ayo nae jumalom enseguidas gui ray ya jagagao , ilegña : Malagoyo pago na unnaeyo gui un plato ni ilun Juan Bautista .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Ya y ray ninagostriste ; lao pot y juramentoña , yan ayo sija y mangachongña gui lamasa , ti malago japune .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Ya enseguidas y ray manago uno gui guatdia , jatago na ujanao ya uchinilie ni iluña . Ya mapos , ya jadegüeya gui jalom catset .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Ya machule guato y iluña gui un plato , ya manae y patgon palaoan , ya y patgon palaoan janae y nanaña .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Ya anae majungog ni disipuluña sija , manmato , ya machule y tataotaoña , ya mapolo gui un naftan .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: N	6	30		37540	 ¶ Ya y apostoles mandaña gui as Jesus , ya masangane güe todo ni chechoñija , yan y finanagüenñija .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña su sija : Maela jamyo apatte gui un lugat desierto , ya infandescansa didide ; sa megae sija manjajanao , yan manmafato , ya manaelugat mañocho .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Ya manmapos gui un batco gui un lugat desierto apatte .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Ya y lumie sija na manjanao megae , ya matungo güe ; ya manmalalago para ayo megae manmamomocat gui siuda sija , ya manmato antes qui sija , ya mandaña guiya güiya .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Ya anae jumuyong si Jesus jalie y linajyan taotao ya ninamaase nu sija , sa manparejoja yan y quinilo sija ni taya pastotñija ; ya jatutujon fumanagüe megae na güinaja .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Ya anae estaba pupuenge , y disipuluña sija manmato guiya güiya , ilegñija : Y lugat desierto este , ya esta pupuenge .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Najanao sija para ufanmalag y campo yan y sengsong sija gui oriya , ya ujafanmamajan pan para sija .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Lao manope , ilegña nu sija : Nae sija mañija . Ya sija ilegñija nu güiya : Infanjanao ya infanmamajan pan pot dosientos na denario , para innae sija nañija ?

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Cuanto na pan guaja jamyo ? Janao , ya inlie . Ya anae jatungo sija , ilegñija : Sinco , yan dos na güijan .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Ya jatago , sija na ujanafanmatachong todos pot mangachong gui jilo y manbetde na chaguan .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Ya manmatachong pot mangachong , siento yan siento , yan sincuenta yan sincuenta .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Ya jachule y sinco na pan yan y dos na güijan , ya manatan julo gui langet , ya jabendise , ya jaipe y pan sija ; ya janae y disipuluña sija para ujaplanta gui sanmenañija ; ya y dos na güiyan manmapatte todos .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Ya mañocho todos , ya manjaspog .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Ya jajatsa y pedaso sija dose na canastra manbula ; yan pedaso y güijan sija locue .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Ya ayo sija y mañocho ni pan , sinco mit na lalaje sija .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: N	6	45		37690	 ¶ Ya enseguidas jaapura y disipuluña sija na ufangajulo gui batco , ya ufanjanao gui menaña gui otro banda guiya Betsaida , mientras janajanao y linajyan taotao .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Ya despues , anae munjayan janajanao sija , mapos malag y egso para ufanaetae .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Ya anae esta pupuenge , y batco estaba gui talo gui tase , ya güiyaja namaesa gui tano .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Ya jalie sija na manmachochocho mapot manmamómogsae , sa y manglo contrario para sija ; ya jijot gui mina cuatro na guatdia gui puenge , mato güe guiya sija , mamómocat gui jilo tase ; ya malago na ufalofan gui oriyañija .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Ya anae malie nu sija , na mamómocat gui jilo tase , jinasoñija na pantasma , ya managang ;

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Sa todos lumie güe , ya ninafañatsaga . Lao enseguidas jacuentuse sija , ya ilegña nu sija : Angoco jamyo , guajoyo ; chamiyo fanmaaañao .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Ya cajulo guiya sija gui batco , ya y manglo mapos : ya sija ninafangosmanman ;

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Sa sija ti jatungo y milagron y pan sija ; sa y corasonñija estaba mangosmajetog .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: N	6	53		37770	 ¶ Ya anae manmalofan para y otro banda , manmato gui tano Genesaret , ya manmalag y puetto .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Ya anae manjuyong sija gui batco , enseguidas matungo güe .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Ya manmalago gui oriyan todo ayo na tano , ya matutujon mañule gui todo y patte , manmalango sija gui cama , mano nae majungog na estaba güije .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Ya manuja nae jumalom , songsong , pat suida , pat fangualuan , mapolo papa y malango sija gui chalan , y matayuyut güe na upacha y canton y magaguña , ya todo ayo sija y japacha , manjomlo .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: YA mandaña guiya güiya y Fariseo sija , yan palo gui escriba sija ni manmato guine Jerusalem ,

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Ya malie palo gui disipuluña na mañochocho pan yan áplacha na canae , ni comequeilegña na pot ti jafagase .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Sa y Fariseo sija , yan toda y Judio sija , jaadadaje y tradision manamco sija , yaguin megae nae ti jafagase y canaeñija , ti ufañocho .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ya anae manmato guine y metcado , yaguin ti jafagase sija , ti ufañocho ; yan megae sija na güinaja rinesibeñija para ujaadaje , parejoja yan mafagase y copa sija , yan y jara sija , yan y bason coble sija .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Ya mafaesen ni Fariseo sija yan y escriba sija : Jafa y disipulumo sija na ti manmamómocat taemano y tradision manamco sija ; mañochochoja pan yan aplacha y canaeñija ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Hipocrita jamyo ; mauleg sinanganña si Isaias , ni y esta matugue : Este sija na taotao y labiosñija nae maonrayo , lao y corasonñija chago guiya guajo .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Lao taebale jaadorayo , manmamananagüe ni finanagüe ni tinago taotao sija .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Sa inpelo jamyo y tinago Yuus , ya mantietiene fitme y tradision taotao sija : ( ni y mafagase y jara sija , yan y copa sija , yan infatinas megae sija na güinaja parejo yan este . )

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Magajet jamyo yumute y tinago Yuus para inadaje y tradisionmiyo .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Sa si Moises ilegña : Onra si tatamo yan si nanamo ; ya y mumatdise y tata pat y nana , seguro na umatae .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Lao jamyo ilegmiyo : Yaguin y taotao ilegña ni tataña pat nanaña : Y Cotban ( cumequeilegña y ninae ) na jago umaprobecha pot guajo , güiya sumaga libre .

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: Ya inpelo güe na ufatinas taya para si tataña pat si nanaña ;

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Inrechasa y sinangan Yuus ni ninaenmiyo na tradision ; yan megae sija na güinaja finatinasmiyo parejo yan este .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: N	7	14		37940	 ¶ Ya jaagang talo guiya güiya todo y linajyan taotao ya ilegña : Ecungog jamyo todos , ya intingo .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Taya gui sumanjiyong gui taotao ni y janajalom , siña numataelaye , lao y janajujuyong gui jinalomña , ayo sija munatataelaye y taotao

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: ( Yaguin guaja gaetalanga para ufanjungog , uecungog )

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Ya anae jumalom gui guima , jadingo y linajyan taotao , y disipuluña sija mafaesen güe ni acomparasion .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Taegüenaja jamyo locue manaetiningo ? Ti intingo na todo y guine jiyong ni jumajalom y taotao ti siña ninataelaye ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Sa ti jumajalom gui corasonña na y tiyanña ya malolofan gui secreto ; taegüenao janagasgas todo y nengcano .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Yan ilegña : Y jumujuyong gui taotao , ayo munatataelaye y taotao .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Sa y gui jinalomña gui corason y taotao sija nae , manjujuyong y manaelaye na jinaso sija , y manadulterio , y manábale yan y manpegno ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: Y mañaque sija , y manlatga , y manaelaye , y dinague , y inábale , y taelaye na atadog , y chinatfino contra si Yuus , y sobetbio , y bababa :

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Todo este sija na tinaelaye , manguine jalom ya janatataelaye y taotao .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: N	7	24		38040	 ¶ Ya cajulo güije , mapos para y oriyan Tiro yan Sidon ; ya jumalom gui guima , malagoña na taya utiningo ; lao ti siña unatog .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Sa jajungog masasangan güe un palaoan na y diquique na jagaña , guaja un áplacha na espiritu , mato ya jatomba güe gui adengña :

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Ya y palaoan Griega , gui tano Sirofenisa , y tinayuyut güe na uyute juyong gui jagaña y anite .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Lao ilegña nu guiya : Polo finena ya ufanjaspog y famaguon sija ; sa ti mauleg machule y pan y famaguon , ya ufanmayotte y galago sija .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Ya manope y palaoan , ilegña : Junggan , Señot ; lao y galago sija , gui papa lamasa , jacacanoja y andesmoronan y famaguon sija .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña ni palaoan : Pot este na sinangan , janao y anite jumanao gui jagamo .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Ya anae jumanao para iyasija , jasoda na y jagaña umaason gui jilo cama , ya y anite esta jumanao .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: N	7	31		38110	 ¶ Ya tumalo jumanao gui oriyan Tiro yan malofan guiya Sidon , ya mato gui tasen Galilea ; ya malofan gui entalo y oriyan Decapolis .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Ya maconie güe un tanga ya udo , ya matayuyut güe na upolo y canaeña gui jiloña .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Ya janasajnge güe gui linajyan taotao , ya japolo y calolotña gui talangan y tanga , ya tumola ya japacha y jilaña ;

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Ya jaatan julo y langet sumospiros , ya ilegña : Efatha , cumequeilegña , mababa !

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Ya mababa y talangaña ; ya mapula y gumogode y jilaña , ya cumuentos mauleg .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Ya jaencatga sija , na chañija sumangangane ni jaye ; lao mientras mas jaencatga , mas manamamto ;

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Ya ninafangosmanman , ilegñija : Mauleg finatinasña todo : janafanmanjungog y mananga , ya y manudo janafanguentos .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: si Jesusjaagang y disipuluña sija , ya ilegña nu sija :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: Maase yo ni linajyan taotao sa esta tres jaane na manjame ; ya taya jafa nañija .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Yaguin junafanjanao sin mañocho para iyasija , ufanlalango gui chalan ; sa palo guiya sija manmato guine y chago .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Ya y disipuluña sija , maope güe : Guine mano nae siña manafanjaspog este taotao sija pan , güine gui desierto ?

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Guiya jafaesen sija : Cuanto na pan guaja jamyo ? Ylegñija , siete .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Ayo nae jatago y linajyan taotao na ufanason gui jilo oda ; ya jachule y siete na pan , ya janae Yuus maase ya jaipe , ya janae y disipuluña sija para ujaplanta gui menanñija ; ya sija japlanta gui menan y linajyan taotao .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Yan guaja locue palo mandiquique na güijan sija ; ya anae jabendise , jatago na ujaplanta locue gui menanñija .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Pues mañocho , ya manjaspog ; ya majatsa y pidaso sija ni sebbla , siete canastra .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Ya y mañocho sija , buente cuatro mit ; ya jadespide .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: Ya enseguidas jumalom gui batco yan y disipuluña sija , ya manmato gui oriyan Dalmanuta .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: N	8	11		38280	 ¶ Ya manmato y Fariseo sija , ya matutujon manafaesen yan güiya , manmanaliligao guiya güiya un señat guine y langet , matietienta güe .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Ya sumospiros gostadong gui espirituña , ya ilegña : Jafa na mangagagao señat este na generasion ? Magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti umanae señat este na generasion .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Ya jadingo sija , ya jumalom talo gui batco , ya mapos para y otro banda .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: N	8	14		38310	 ¶ Ya manmalefa ti manmañule pan , ya taya na unoja na pan gui batco .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Ya jaencatga sija , ilegña : Atan , adaje jamyo ni lebaduran y Fariseo sija , yan y lebaduran Herodes .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Ya manafaesen gui entalo sija , ilegña : Pot y taya panta .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Ya anae jatungo si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Jafa manafaesen gui entalomiyo pot y taya panmiyo ? Ti injaso ni ti intingo ? Majejetogja trabia y corasonmiyo ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Guaja atadogmiyo , lao ti manmanlilie jamyo ? Guaja talanganmiyo , ya ti manmanjujungogja jamyo ? Ya ti injajasoja ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: Anae juipe y sinco na pan sija entalo y sinco mit , cuanto na canastra injatsa bula ni pidaso sija ni sebbla ? Ylegñija : Dose .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Ya anae y siete na pan sija entalo y cuatro mit , cuanto na canastra injatsa bula ni pidaso sija ni sebbla ? Ylegñija : Siete .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Güiya ilegña nu sija : Ti intingo asta pago ?

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: N	8	22		38390	 ¶ Ya mato guiya Betsaida ; ya maconie güe guato un bachet , ya matayuyut güe na upacha güe .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Ayo nae jamantiene y canae y bachet , ya jacone asta y jiyong y siuda ; ya anae jatolae y atadogña , japolo y canaeña gui jiloña , ya jafaesen : Unlie jafa ?

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Ya güiya manatan ya , ilegña : Julie taotao sija ; lao julie sija calang trongconjayo na manmamómocat .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Entonses japolo ya canaeña talo gui atadogña ya jaguefatan ; ya jomlo , ya manlie claro todo .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Ya jatago para iyasija , ilegña : Chamo jumajalom gui sengsong ( ni usangane jaye gui siuda ) .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: N	8	27		38440	 ¶ Ya mapos si Jesus yan y disipuluña sija gui sensong sija y Cesarean Felipe : ya y chalan jafaesen y disipuluña sija , ilegña nu sija : Jaye ilegñija y taotao sija nu guajo ?

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Ya sija masangane güe , ilegñija : Si Juan Bautista ; y palo ilegñija : Si Elias ; y palo ilegñija : Uno gui profeta sija .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Ayo nae jafaesen sija : Ya jamyo , jaye ilegmiyo nu guajo ? Inepe as Pedro ilegña : Jago si Cristo jao .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Ya jaencatga sija na chañija sumangangane ni jaye pot güiya .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Ya jatutujon fumanagüe sija na y Lajin taotao janesesita upadese megae , ya umarechasa ni manamco sija , yan y prinsipen y mamale sija , yan y escriba sija , ya umapuno ; ya ucajulo talo gui mina tres na jaane .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Ya claroja nae jasangan este na sinangan . Ayo nae si Pedro quinene güe , ya tinitujon güe rineprende .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Lao anae jabira güe , ya jaatan y disipuluña sija , jalalatde si Pedro ilegña : Suja guiya guajo , Satanas ; sa ti unadadaje y güinaja sija ni para si Yuus , na y güinajan taotao sija .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Ya jaagang y linajyan taotao yan y disipuluña sija , ya ilegña nu sija ; Jaye y malago tumatiye yo , upune maesa güe , ya uchule y quiluusña ya udalalagyo .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Sa y malago sumatba y linâlâña , ufinalingaeguan ; lao y finalingaeguan ni linâlâña pot guajo , yan y ibangelio , este usatba y linâlâña .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Sa , jafa uaprobecha y taotao , yaguin jagana todo y tano , ya finalingaeguan ni linâlâña ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Pat jafa na apas ufannae y taotao pot y linâlâña ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Sa y mamajlao nu guajo yan y sinaganjo , gui sanmenan este y generasion ábale yan gaeisao , unimamajlaogüe locue ni Lajin taotao y tiempo nae mato gui minalag y Tataña , yan y mañantos na angjetña sija .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: YA ilegña nu sija : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na guaja palo sija ni mangaegue güine na ti ujaguaeya finatae , asta que jalie y raenon Yuus na mato yan ninasiña .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: N	9	2		38570	 ¶ Anae esta malofan y sais na jaane , si Jesus jacone si Pedro , yan si Santiago , yan si Juan , janafañajnge sijaja gui un taquilo na ogso ; ya jaago güe gui menanñija .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Ya y magaguña manmañila , gosapaca calang niebe , taya ni un fafagas gui tano siña munaapaca taegüine .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Ya manalie na mato guiya güiya si Elias yan Moises , na manguecuentos yan si Jesus .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Ayo nae manope si Pedro , ilegña as Jesus : Maestro mauleg utafañagajit güine , ya tafanmamatinas tres tabetnáculo ; para jago y uno , para si Moises y otro , yan para si Elias y otro .

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Si ti jatungo jafa usangan , sa estaba mangosmaañao .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ya mato un mapagajes y manjineme sija , ya un inagang gui mapagajes , ilegña : Este y güinaeyaco na Lajijo , jingog güe .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Ya derepente jaatan gui oriyañija , ti manmanlie ni jaye , na si Jesusja yan sija .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Ya anae manunog sija guine y egso , jaencatga sija na chañija sumangangane ni jaye ni liniiñija , asta que y Lajin taotao esta cajulo guine entalo y manmatae .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ya sija jaadaje ayo na sinangan guiya sijaja , manafaesen gui entaloñija : Jafa ayo y cajulo guine entalo y manmatae cumequeilegña .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ya mafaesen güe , ilegñija : Y escriba sija ilegñija , si Elias nesesita ufato finenana .

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Güiya manope ilegña nu sija : Si Elias magajet nesesita ufato finenana , ya jafatinas talo todo y güinaja : Jafa esta matugue gui Lajin taotao na upadese megae ya manataya guaelayeña ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Lao jusangane jamyo na si Elias esta mato ya esta mafatinas guiya güiya todo y malagoñija , taegüine esta matugue nu güiya .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: N	9	14		38690	 ¶ Ya anae mato gui disipuluña sija , jalie un dangculon linajyan taotao gui oriyañija , yan y escriba sija ni manafaesen yan sija .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Ya enseguidas todo y linajyan taotao , anae malie güe , ninafangosmanman , ya manmalago guato guiya güiya ya masaluda güe .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Ya jafaesen sija , ilegña ! Jafana manafaesen jamyo yan sija ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Ya manope uno gui linajyan taotao , ilegña : Maestro juconie jao mague na lajijo , na guaja un espiritun udo ;

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ya manoja nae quinene güe , japedadasos ; ya bóboan , ya janachechegcheg y nifenña , ya ninayafae ; ya jusangane y disipulumo sija , na ujayute juyong , lao ti manasiña .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Manope güe , ilegña nu sija : O generasion ni ti manjonggue ! asta ngaean nae utafanjijitaja ? asta ngaean nae jususungonja jamyo ? maelayofan mague .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Ya maconie guato guiya güiya ; ya anae jalie , enseguidas y espiritu manlálaolao güe ; ya güiya podong gui jilo oda gumagalileg ya bóboan .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Ya jafaesen y tataña ; cuanto tiempo esta desde qui mato este guiya güiya ? Güiya ilegña : Desde qui diquique :

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Ya megae na biaje nae yinite gui jalom guafe , yan y jalom janom para upinino ; lao yaguin siña jao ayudajam , gaemaase nu jame .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Si Jesus , ilegña nu güiya : Yaguin siña jao , todo siña para y manjonggue .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Enseguidas y tatan y patgon , jaagang yan y lagoña , ya elegña : Jujonggue ; ayuda y taejinenggueco .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Ya anae si Jesus jalie na manmalalago y linajyan taotao , jalalatde y áplacha na espiritu , ilegña : Espiritun udo yan tanga , guajo jao tumago , juyong guiya güiya , ya chamo jumajalom talo guiya güiya .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Ayo nae y espiritu umagang , ya manlalaolao güe megae , ya jumuyong ; ya güiya sumaga calang matae , enaomina megae ilegñija , na esta matae .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Lao si Jesus jamantiene canaeña , ya jinatsa güe ; ya cajulo .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Ya anae jumalom güe gui jalom guma , y disipuluña sija mafaesen güe en secreto , ilegñija : Jafajam na ti innasiña yumute juyong ?

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Este na rasan anite sija , taya siña munajanao , na y tinayuyut .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: N	9	30		38850	 ¶ Ya manmapos güije , manmalofan inanaco Galilea ; ya ti malago na guaja utiningo güe .

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: Sa jafanagüe y disipuluña sija ya ilegña nu sija : Y Lajin taotao umaentrega gui canae taotao sija , ya umapuno ; lao yaguin este matae , ucajulo talo despues di tres na jaane .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Lao sija ti jatungo este na sinangan , ya manmaañao na ujafaesen güe .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: N	9	33		38880	 ¶ Ya mato guiya Capernaum ; ya anae mato gui guima , jafaesen sija : Jafa jamyo na manafaesen entalomiyoja gui chalan ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Lao sija manmamatquiquiloja ; sa guine manafaesen gui chalan uno y otro , jaye guiya sija udangculo .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Ayo nae manmatachong , ya jaagang y dose ya ilegña nu sija : Y malago fuminenana , uuttimon gui tododos , yan utentagon tododos .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Ya jacone un patgon , ya japolo gui entaloñija ; ya jajogüe gui canaeña , ya ilegña nu sija :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: Y rumesibe pot y naanjo uno ni manaegüine na famaguon , jaresibe yo , ya y rumesibe yo , ti guajo jaresibe , na y tumago yo .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Si Juan , ilegña nu güiya : Maestro , inlie uno na manyute juyong anite sija pot y naanmo , ya inchema , sa ti jadadalalagjit .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña : Chamiyo chumochoma ; sa ni uno ni fumatinas milagro pot y naanjo , siña gusisija jasangan taelaye guiya guajo .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Sa ayo y ti contra jita , manjijitaja .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Sa jayeja y numae jamyo un copan janom , sa iyon Cristo jamyo , magajet jusangane jamyo , na sen ti ufalingo y apasña .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Ya jayeja y ninaquepodong uno guine sija gui mandiquique ni jumonggue yo ; mauleg para güiya , umagode gui agagaña un acho atutong , ya umayute gui jalom tase .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Lao yaguin y canaemo ninaquepodong jao , utut ; maulegña na unjalom gui linâlâ mangco , qui uguaja dos canaemo , ya unjanao para sasalaguan , y guafe ni ti siña mapuno .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: ( Anae y iloñija ti ufanmatae ; ya y guafe taejinecog nae umapuno . )

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ya yaguin y adengmo ninaquepodong jao , utut : maulegña na unjalom gui linâlâ cojo , qui uguaja dos adengmo ya unyenite para sasalaguan ;

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: ( Anae y iloñija ti ufanmatae , ya y guafe taejinecog nae umapuno . )

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ya yaguin y atadogmo ninaquepodong jao , lagnos ; maulegña na unjalom gui raenon Yuus , yan un atadogja , qui uguaja dos atadogmo ya unyenite para sasalaguan .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: ( Anae y iloñija ti ufanmatae , ya y guafe taejinecog na umapuno . )

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Sa todos ufanmaasne yan guafe ; ( ya todo y inefrese ufanmaasne yan asiga ) .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Mauleg y asiga ; lao yaguin y asiga malingo y maasenña , jaftaemano numamaasen ? Guaja asiganmiyo guiya jamyoja ; yan guaja pas gui entalomiyo .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: YA cajulo güije , mato qui oriyan Judea , gui otro bandan Jordan ; ya manalo y linajyan taotao mandaña guiya güiya ; ya jatalo fumanagüe , taegüije , y costumbreña .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Ya manmato y Fariseo sija guiya güiya , ya mafaesen güe cao tunas y laje uyute y asaguaña ? matietienta güe .

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Lao güiya manope , ilegña nu sija : Jafa mantinago jamyo as Moises ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Ya sija ilegñija : Si Moises japetmite na umatugue papet inapattan umasagua ya uyute .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Ya si Jesus manope , ilegña nu sija : Pot y majetog corasonmiyo na mantiniguie jamyo ni este na tinago .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Yuus .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Pot este na rason y laje udingo si tataña yan si nanaña , ya udaña yan y asaguaña .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Ya y este y dos , umana unoja na catne ; ya esta ti udos mas , na unoja na catne .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Jafaja si Yuus munadaña , y taotao ti unadesapatta .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Ya y jalom guma , y disipulo sija mafaesen güe talo ni ayoja .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jayeja y yumute y asaguaña , ya umasagua yan otro , jafatinas y adulterio contra y palaoan .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Ya yaguin y palaoan yumute y asaguaña , ya umasagua yan otro , jafatinas adulterio .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: N	10	13		39180	 ¶ Ya machulie guato guiya güiya diquique na famaguon para upacha : ya y disipulo sija jalalatde ayo sija .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus , sen ti ninamagof ya ilegña nu sija : Polo y diquique na famaguon ya ufanmamaela guiya guajo ; chamiyo chumochoma ; sa iyon este sija y raenon Yuus .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na y ti rumesibe y raenon Yuus calang un patgon , ti ujalom gui jalom ayo .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Ya jajogüe sija ya japolo y canaeña gui jiloñija , ya jabendise sija .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: N	10	17		39220	 ¶ Ya anae jumanao gui chalan , mato uno malalago ya dinimuye güe gui menaña ya finaesen güe : Mauleg na Maestro , jafa jufatinas para juereda y taejinecog na linâlâ ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Jafa na ilegmo nu guajo mauleg ? Taya mauleg , na unoja , si Yuus .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Untungo y tinago sija : Chamofamumuno ; chamo fumatinas adulterio ; chamo fañañaque ; chamo sumanganñaejon y ti magajet na testimonio ; chamo chumu y ti iyomo ; onra si tatamo yan si nanamo .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Güiya manope ilegña : Maestro , todo este juadadaje desde nae patgonyo .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Ayo nae matan güe as Jesus , güinaeya güe , ya ilegña nu güiya : Fatta jao uno : Janao ya ufajan todo y güinajamo , ya unnae y mamobble sija , ya uguaja güinajamo gui langet : ya maela , ya undalalag yo .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Lao güiya ninamatolaeca y mataña ni este na sinangan ya mapos ninatriste ; sa guaja megae güinajaña .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus manatan gui oriya , ya ilegña ni disipuluña sija : Na minapot manjalom gui raenon Yuus ayo sija y mangaegüinaja !

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ya y disipulo sija ninafanmanman ni sinanganña : Lao si Jesus manope ilegña talo : Famaguon , na minapot manjalom , gui raenon Yuus y umangongoco sija gui güinaja !

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Mas guse malofan un cameyo gui matan un jaguja , qui y gaegüinaja ujalom gui raenon Yuus .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ya sija ninagos fanmanmanman , ya ilegñija nu güiya : Ayo nae , jaye siña satbo ?

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus jaatan sija , ya ilegña : Para y taotao sija , este ti siña , lao para si Yuus ti taegüine ; sa para si Yuus todo ninasiña .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Ayonae si Pedro jatutujon ilegña nu güiya : Estagüejamja na indingo todo , ya indadalalagjao .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Inepe as Jesus ilegña . Magajet jusanganejao : Taya ni un taotao ni y dumingo gumaña , pat mañeluña lalaje , pat mañeluña famalaoan , pat nanaña , pat tataña , pat famaguonña , pat fangualuaña , pot guajo , yan y ibangelio ;

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: Na ti uresibe pagoja sienbiaje : guma sija , yan mañeluña lalaje , yan mañeluña famalaoan , yan nanaña , yan famaguonña , yan fangualuan sija , yan umapetsigue ; ya y mámamaela na siglo , taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Lao megae na manfinenana , ufanuttimo , ya y manuttimo , ufanfinenana .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: N	10	32		39370	 ¶ Ya anae mangaegue gui chalan , mangajulo guiya Jerusalem ; ya si Jesus malag y menañija ; ya ninafanmanman : ya y dumadalalag mangosmaañao . Ya jacone talo y dose , ya jatutujon sumangane sija jafa ususede güe .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Ylegña : Estagüejit na mangajulo guiya Jerusalem , ya y Lajin taotao umaentrega gui magas mamale , yan y escriba sija , ya umasentensia para umapuno , ya umaentrega gui Gentiles .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ya umamofea , yan umatolae , yan umasaulag , yan umapuno ; ya y despues di tres na jaane ucajulo talo .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: N	10	35		39400	 ¶ Ya si Santiago yan si Juan , lalajin Sebedeo , manmato jijot guiya güiya ya ilegñija nu güiya : Maestro , manmalagojam na unfatinas guiyajame jafa y malagomame .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa malagonmiyo na jufatinas guiya jamyo ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Ilegñija nu güiya : Nafanmatachongjam , y uno gui agapamo , ya y otro gui acagüemo , gui minalagmo .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Ti intingo jafa ingagagao . Siña jamyo manguimen gui copa anae gumiguimenyo ? yan infanmatagpange ni y matagpangeco ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Mansiñajam . Ayonae ilegña si Jesus nu sija : infanguimen gui copa anae gumiguimenyo , yan infanmatagpange ni y ma tagpangeco ;

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Lao y infanmatachong gui agapajo , yan y acagüeco ; ti guajo jufannae ; lao para ayo sija ufanmanae y manmapreparaye .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Ya anae majungog este ni y dies , ninafanlalalo as Santiago yan Juan .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Lao maninagang as Jesus ya ilegña nu sija : Intingo na ayo y manmanafanmagas gui Gentiles , jafatinas minagas gui jiloñija ; ya y manmagas , jafatinas ninasiña gui jiloñija .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Lao ti utaegüenao guiya jamyo ; sa jaye y malago dumangculo guiya jamyo ; güiya ufañeñetbe .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Ya jaye guiya jamyo y malago mumagas ; utentago para todo .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Sa magajet ni y Lajin taotao ti mato para umasetbe , lao para ufañetbe , ya para ufannae y jaaniña ni un rescate para unafanlibre megae .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: N	10	46		39510	 ¶ Ya manmato Jerico . Ya anae manjanao gui Jerico , yan y disipuluña yan un dangculon linajyan taotao , si Bartimeo lajin Timeo , na bachet , matatachong gui oriyan chalan , ya umegagao .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ya anae jajungog na si Jesus Nasareno , jatutujon umagang ilegña : Jesus , Lajin David , gaease nu guajo .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ya megae mumomye para ufamatquilo : lao mas umagang gosagang : Jago ni y Lajin David , gaease nu guajo .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Ya si Jesus tumojgüe ya ilegña : Agang güe . Ya maagang y bachet ilegñija nu güiya : Magofjao ; cajulo sa inaagangjao .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Ya janasuja y capaña , y cajulo , ya malag as Jesus .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Ya si Jesus manopegüe ya ilegña : Jafa malagomo jufatinas guiya jago ? Y bachet ilegña nu güiya : Raboni , nafanliiyo .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: si Jesusgui jinanaoña .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: YA anae esta manjijijot Jerusalem , yan Betfage , yan Betania , gui egso Olibo , jatago dos gui disipuluña ,

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Janao fanmalag y sengsong gui menanmiyo : ya enseguidas qui manjalom jamyo , inseda un patgon bulico , na magogode , na taya nae matachonge ; pila ya inquene mague .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ya yanguin jaye na taotao umalog nu jamyo ; Jafa na infatinas este ? Sangane : Señot janesesita : ya enseguidas umanajanao mague .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Ya manmapos , ya masoda nu patgon bulico gui caye na magogode gui jiyong potta ya mapula güe .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Ya palo ni y mangaegue güije ilegñija nu sija : Jafa na inpila enao y patgon bulico ?

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Ya masangane jaftaemano y mansinangane as Jesus : ya japolo na ufanjanao .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: si Jesus .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ya megae jajuto magagoñija gui chalan : yan palo y ramas jayo na manmanuutot gui fangualuan .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: ilegñija : Hosana ; Bendito ayo y mato pot y naan y Señot :

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Bendito y raeno na mamamaela , y raenon y tatata as David , Hosana guiyajululu .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Ya si Jesus jumalom Jerusalem , ya jumalom gui templo ; ya anae munjayan jalie todo y güinaja , ya y pupuenge , mapos yan y dose , manmalag Betania .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
