text2: N	11	12		39690	 ¶ Ya y inagpaña anae manmato guinen Betania , ñalang .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Ya anae jalie mona un trongcon igos na gagaejagonja , malag ayo jinasoña na ufañoda jafa ; lao anae mato guato , taya sinedaña na jagonja ; sa ti tiempopoña y igos trabia .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Ayonae manope ya ilegña nu güiya : Taya ni un taotao uquinano y tinegchamo para siempre . Ya majungog ni y disipuluña .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: N	11	15		39720	 ¶ Ya manmato Jerusalem ; ya jumalom y templo , ya sigue di jayute juyong todo ayo sija y manmanbebende , yan y manmamamajan gui templo , yan janafanalinquin y lamasan salape y manmanulalaeca , yan y tachong y man manbebende paluma :

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Ya taya ni uno jaconsiente na ufañule baso gui templo .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ya mamanagüe , ilegña nu sija : Ada ti matugue na y guimajo umafanaan guma manaetae ni y todo nasion sija ? lao jamyo fumatinas y liyang mañañaque .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Ya majungog ni y magas mamale yan y escriba sija , ya maaliligao jaftaemano para umapuno ; sa mamaañao nu güiya , sa janafanmamanman y linajyan taotao ni y finanagüeña .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Ya cada pupuenge , jumanao juyong gui siuda .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Ya y egaan anae manmalolofan , malie y trongcon igos na anglo desde y jale .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Ayonae jajaso si Pedro ya ilegña nu güiya : Rabi , estagüe y trongcon igos ni y unmatdise na anglo todo .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Jenggue si Yuus .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Sa magajet jusangane jamyo : Jayeja y umalog ni este y egso , janao ya unyutejao gui tase ; ya ti bumuebuente gui corasonña , lao jajonggue na umafatinas ayo y sinanganña ; uguaja .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Enaomina jusangane jamyo : Na todo sija ingagao , anae manmanaetae jamyo , jenggue na esta inresibe , ya infanmannae .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Ya an manojgue ya mananaetaejamyo , asie yanguin guajajao jafa contra jaye ; sa y Tatanmiyo locue ni y gaegue gui langet , uninasie ni y isaomiyo .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Lao yanguin ti manasiijamyo , y Tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet ti uninasie ni y isaomiyo .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: N	11	27		39840	 ¶ Ya manmato talo Jerusalem , ya anae mamomocat gui templo , manmato y magas mamale , yan y escriba , yan y manamco sija ;

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Pot jafa na ninasiña na unfatitinas estesija ? yan jayejao numae ni este na ninasiña , para unfatinas estesija ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Bae jufaesen locue jamyo un finaesen ya inepeyo , ayonae jusangane jamyo pot jafa na ninasiña na jufatitinas este sija .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Y tinagpangen Juan , guinen y langet , pat guinen y taotao sija ? epeyo .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Ya jajajaso gui sumanjalomñija , ilegñija : Yanguin ilegmame , Guinen y langet ; ualog : Jafanae na ti injenggue güe ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Yanguin ilegmame guinen y taotao sija - - manmaañao ni y taotao , sa pineloñija todo na magajet na profeta si Juan .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ya manmanope , ilegñija as Jesus : Ti intingo . Ayonae si Jesus ilegña nu sija ; ni guajo locue ti jusangane jamyo pot jafa naninasiña , na jufatitinas estesija .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: YA sigue di jacuentuse sija acomparasion sija . Un taotao mananom gui fangualuan ubas , ya jacolat nu trongcon tituca , ya manguadog un joyo para un lagat ya jafatinas un tore , ya jaatquila y manfafachocho , ya mapos güe malag otro tano .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Ya anae esta tiempo , jatago uno gui tentagoña para ayo y manmachochocho , para ujaresibe guinen manmachochocho y tinegcha y fangualuan ubas .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ya macone y tentago , ya masaulag , ya manajanao taesinajguan .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Ya jatago talo y otro tentagoña ; ya mapoca y iluña , ya manataelaye güe gosdangculo .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Ya jatalo tumago y otro , ya mapuno ; yan otro megae ya palo manmasaulag yan palo manmapuno .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Ya guaja unoja lajiña na sumenyaña ; ya güiya uttimo jatago , ilegña : Ufangaerespeto ni y lajijo .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Ya ayo sija y manmachochocho , ilegñija gui sumanjalomñija . Estagüe y eredero ; nije tapuno , ya y fangualuan uiyota .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Ya macone güe , ya mapuno , ya mayute juyong gui fangualuan .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: Jafa pago ufatinas y magas y fangualuan ? Ufato , ya uyulang todo y manmachochocho , ya ufannae otro ni y fangualuan .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Taya nae intaetae este na tinigue : Y acho , ni y jarechasa y manmanmatitinas ni y guima , esteja mapolo cuentan ulo gui esquina .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Este finatinas y Señot , ya janafanmanman gui menan atadogta .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Ya maaliligao para umagote lao manmaañao ni y linajyan taotao ; sa matungo na jasasangan y acomparasion contra sija : ya madingo , ya manmapos gui jinanaoñija .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: N	12	13		40030	 ¶ Ya manmatago guato guiya güiya palo gui Fariseo sija yan taotao Herodes ; para umaquegacha gui sinanganña .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Ya anae manmato , ilegñija nu güiya : Maestro , intingo na jago magajetjao ; ya taya unadadaje ni un taotao ; sa ti guaelaye nu jago y finaboresen taotao , lao mamananagüejao ni y magajet na chalan Yuus . Tunas na infanmanaejam tributo as Sesat , pat aje ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Innae , pat mungajam numae ? Lao si Jesus jatungoja y quinadoñija , ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa muna na intietientayo ? maela un denarion salape ya julie .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Ya anae machulie guato , ilegña nu sija : Iyon jaye este na imagen yan tinigue ? Ylegñija nu güiya : Iyon Sesat .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Ayonae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Nae si Sesat ni y iyon Sesat , ya si Yuus ni y iyon Yuus . Ya ninafangosmanman nu güiya .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: N	12	18		40080	 ¶ Ya manmato guiya güiya y Saduseo sija ni y ilegñija , na taya quinajulo y mannatae ; ya mafaesen güe , ilegñija :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Maestro , jatuguiejam si Moises : Yanguin y chelun un taotao matae , ya y palaoan ni y asaguaña sumaga ya taya patgonña , ayo y laje ni y chelun y matae , uasagua talo y palaoan , ya ufamasemiya gui cheluña .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Ya guaja seite lalaje na mañelu : y finenana umasagua , ya matae ti mapolo semiya :

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Inasagua talo y palaoan ni y mina dos , ya matae talo taya pineloña semiya : ya y mina tres taegüijeja talo .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ya y siete , ti mapolo semiyañijo ; despues di todos , matae y palaoan locue .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Y quinajulo y manmatae , jaye guiya sija ugae asagua y palaoan ? sa todo y siete manmasagua .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Ada ti manlache jamyo , sa ti intingo y tinigue , ni y ninasiñan Yuus ?

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Sa y mangajulo guinen manmatae , ni ufanasagua , ni umanafanasagua ; lao manparejoja yan y angjet sija gui langet .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Ya y manmatae ni y ufannacajulo ; ti untaetae gui leblon Moises , jaftaemano si Yuus gui jalomtano guiya trongcon jayo ni y ilegña as Moises : Guajo si Yuus Abraham , yan si Yuus Ysaac , yan si Yuus Jacob ?

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Ti güiya si Yuus y manmatae , na si Yuus y manlâlâlâ ; enaomina ninafangoslache jamyo .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: N	12	28		40180	 ¶ Ya uno gui escriba mato , ya jajungog na manafaesen entresija , ya jatungo na mauleg inepeña nu sija , finaesen güe : Jafa y finenana qui todo na tinago ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Si Jesus manope : Este y finenana na tinago : Jingog O Israel : Y Señot Yuusta , unoja na Señot :

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Ya guaeya jamyo y Señot , Yuusmiyo , contodo y corasonmiyo , yan contodo y antenmiyo , yan contodo y jinasonmiyo , yan contodo y minetgotmiyo .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Ya este y segundo : Guaeya y tiguangmo parejo yan jago . Taya otro tinago mas , mandangculo qui estesija .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Ya y escriba ilegña nu güiya . Magajet Maestro , mauleg na unsangan na güiya unoja ; ya taya otro na güiyaja .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Ya ugumaeya güe contodo y corason , yan contodo y tiningo , yan contodo y minetgot , yan ugumaeya y tiguangña parejo yan güiya , mas qui todo y inefrese , yan y ninae sija .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus ni y minejnalom inepeña , ilegña nu güiya : Ti chagojao gui raenon Yuus . Ya taya ni un taotao fumaesen güe talo desde ayo .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: N	12	35		40250	 ¶ Ya maninepe as Jesus gui anae mamananagüe gui templo , ilegña : Jafa na ilegñija y escriba sija , na si Cristo Lajin David ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Sa si David mismo ilegña gui Espiritu Santo : Y Señot ilegña ni y Señotto : Fatachong gui agapa na canaejo , asta qui jupolo y enemigumo sija gui papa y fañajangan adengmo .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: N	12	37		40270	 ¶ David jafanaan güe Señot ; ya jaftaemano na y lajiña ? Ya manmagof y dangculon linajyan taotao sija anae majungog .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: N	12	38		40280	 ¶ Ya ilegña gui finanagüeña : Adaje jamyo ni y escriba sija , sa yanñija manjanao yan y anaco magagoñija , yan yanñija manmasaluda gui metcado ,

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Yan y manmagas na tachong gui sinagoga , yan y ya jululo na tachong gui guipot ;

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ni y jatucho y guima y biuda sija , ya janafananaco tinaetaeñija ni y dinague : este sija ujaresibe dangculo na sentensia .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: N	12	41		40310	 ¶ Ya anae matachong si Jesus gui menan y cajon ni y para y ninae ; megae na taotao manmato , ya manmanyute jalom salape gui cajon ; ya y megae na manrico sija , megae yiniteñija jalom .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Ya mato un pobble na buida ; ya manyute jalom dos cobble na bale buente un centavos .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Ya si Jesus jaagang y disipuluña , ya ilegña nu sija : Magajet jusangane jamyo : Este y pebble na biuda , mas megae yiniteña jalom qui ni todo ayo sija y guinen manmanyute jalom gui cajon .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Sa todo y manmanyute jalom , pot y minegaeñijaja ; lao güiya pot y minalagoñaja na jayute jalom todo y güinajaña ; asta y sustentoña todo .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: YA anae jumuyong gui templo ; ilegña nu güiya uno gui disipuluña : Maestro , liija na jechuran acho , yan guma sija .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Ya si Jesus manope ilegña nu sija : Unlie este sija na mandangculon guma ? taya usobbla ni un acho gui jilo y otro , na ti umayute papa .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: N	13	3		40370	 ¶ Ya anae matachong gui jilo y finabeca na y naanña Olibo , gui menan y templo , finaesen gui secreto as Pedro , yan Santiago , yan si Juan , yan si Andres ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Ilegñija : Sanganejam , ngaean estesija ufanmato ? yan jafa na señat yanguin para todo estesija nae ufanmacumple ?

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Si Jesus jatutujon ilegña nu sija : Adaje jamyo , ya chamiyo fanmafabababa .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Sa megae ufanmato pot y naanjo , ya ualog : Guajo güiya Jesucristo , ya ufababa megae .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Yanguin injingog y guera , yan y masangan y guera : chamiyo ninafañachatsaga : sa nesesita estesija jumuyong : lao trabia ti y jinecog .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Sa y nasion sija ufangajulo contra y nasion , yan y raeno contra raeno : ya uguaja linao gui megae na lugat ya uguaja ñinalang : estesija tutujon y pinite .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: N	13	9		40430	 ¶ Lao adaje jamyo : sa infanmaentrega gui tribunal sija ; ya infanmasaulag gui sinagoga : yan infanojgue gui menan y manmagas sija yan y ray sija , pot causa de guajo para un testimonio contra sija .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Ya y ibangelio nesesita umapredica finenana gui entre todo y nasion .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Lao anae maconejamyo , ya maentregajamyo , chamiyo jumajaso jafa para insangan , ni injasuye jafa : sa jafaja y manaejamyo güije na ora , ayoja insangan : sa ti jamyo infangcuentos , na y Espiritu Santo .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Pago y laje uentrega y cheluña laje , para umapuno ; ya y tata y lajiña : ya y famaguon ufangajulo contra y mañaenanñija : ya uuafanmapuno .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ya jamyo infanmachatlie ni todo y taotao sija , pot y naanjo : lao jaye y sumungon asta y uttimo , umasatba .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Lao anae inlie y chinatlie y inginon na yinilang tumotojgue gui anae ti para utojgue , ( y mananaetae utungo ) ayo sija y mangaegue guiya Judea ufanmalago para y jalomtano :

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ya y gaegue gui jilo guma , chaña tumutunog ni ujalom ya ufañule jafa na güinaja gui jalom gumaña .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Ya y gaegue gui fangualuan , chaña tumatalo tate para uchule y magaguña .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Lao mannamaase ayo sija y manmapotgue yan y mannanasusu , güije sija na jaane !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: jinanaomiyogui tiempon y manenggeng .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Sa ayo sija na jaane , uguaja pininite , ni y taya nae guaja desde y matutujon y tano , anae jafatinas si Yuus , asta pago ; ni uguaja asta jinecog .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Lao yaguin ti janacadada y Señot ayo sija na jaane , taya catne usatba : lao pot y rason y manmaayigja , ni y inayigña , janacadada ayo sija na jaane .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Ya yanguin guaja umalog nu jago : Estagüe si Cristo : pat ayogüe guato ; chamiyo jumojonggue .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Sa ufangajulo sija ti manmagajet na Cristo sija , yan ti manmagajet na profeta sija , ya ufanmamanue sija señat yan mannamanman , para ufanmamababa , yanguin janasiña , asta y manmaayig .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Lao adaje jamyo : Sa estagüeja , na jusangane jamyo todos antes .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: N	13	24		40580	 ¶ Lao ayo sija na jaane an munjayan y pininite sija ; ujomjom y atdao , ya y pilan ti ufanina ,

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ya y pution sija gui langet ufamodong , ya y ninasifia sija gui langet ufanmayengyong .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Ya ayo nae ujalie y Lajin taotao na mamamaela gui sanjalom mapagajes , yan y dangculon ninasiñaña yan y minalagña .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Ya ayonae utago y angjetña sija na ujarecoje y inayigña sija , guinen y cuatro na manglo , guinen y uttimon y tano asta y uttimon y langet .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: N	13	28		40620	 ¶ Tingo y acomparasion y trongcon igos ; Anae mamaulegja trabia y ramasña , ya manjajagonja , intingoja na esta jijijot y tiempon maepe .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Jamyo locue anae inlie estesija , na manmato , tingoja na güiya esta jijijot , parejoja yan esta gaegue gui petta .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : Este na generasion ti ufanmalofan , asta que todo estesija munjayan manmachogüe .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Y langet yan y tano , ufanmalofan , lao y sinanganjo ti ufalofan .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Lao ayo na jaane pat ayo na ora , taya ni un taotao tumungo ; ni y angjet sija ni mangaegue gui langet , ni y Laje ; na y Tata güiyaja .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Adaje jamyo : fanbela , ya infanmanaetae : sa ti intingo ngaean y tiempo .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Say y Lajin taotao , parejoja yan un taotao ni y jumajanao chago ya jadingo y gumaña ; ya janae y tentagoña ninasiñañija yan cada uno y chechoña , ya jatago y pottero na ufanbela .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Fanbela , sa ti intingo ngaean nae ufato y magas y guima ; cao y pupuenge , pat y tatalopuenge , pat y oogayo , pat y egaan ;

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Na , noseaja derepente ufato , ya infansineda manmamaego .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ya jafa y jusangane jamyo , jusanganeja todos : Fanbela .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: GUAJA dos na jaane antes di guipot y pascua yan y taelibadura na pan : ya y magas mamale sija , yan y escriba sija , maaliligao jaftaemano para umafababa , ya umacone , ya umapuno .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Lao ilegñija : Munga gui guipot na jaane , sa noseaja uguaja atboroto ni y taotao sija .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: N	14	3		40740	 ¶ Ya anae estaba guiya Betania , gui guima Simon y ategtog , ya matachong gui lamasa para uchocho ; mato un palaoan mañuñule un alabastro na boteyan inggüenten puro nardo , na gosguaguan ; ya mafag y boteya , ya jachuda gui jilo y ilon Jesus .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Ya guaja sija ninafanbubo sanjalomñija , ya ilegñija : Jafa este na inggüente na manalalastimaja ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Maulegña umabende pot tresientos peseta , ya ufanmanae y mamobble : ya malalatde y palaoan .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña : Pologüe namaesa . Jafaja na inatbororota güe ? Mauleg finatinasña nu guajo .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Sa manjajamyoja yan y mamobble siempre ; ya ngaeanja nae manmalago jamyo , infatinasja mauleg guiya sija : lao guajo ti tafanjijitaja siempre .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Güiya jafatinas taemanoja y ninasiñaña : güiya mato antes , para uinggüentiye y tataotaojo , para y naftan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo : Manoja este na ebangelio nae mapredica , gui todo y tano , este locue y finatinasña umasangan , para memoriasña .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: N	14	10		40810	 ¶ Ya si Judas Iscariote , uno gui dose , mapos malag y magas mamale , para umentrega güe guiya sija .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Ya anae majungog , ninafansenmagof , ya mapromete manae güe salape . Ya jaaliligao jaftaemano para uinentrega .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: N	14	12		40830	 ¶ Ya y finenana na jaane y taelibadura na pan , anae maofrese y pascua , y disipuluña ilegñija nu güiya ; Manojam malagomo guato ya infamauleg nae para unchocho gui pascua ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Ya jatago y dos gui disipuluña , ya ilegña nu sija : Janao fanmalag y siuda , sa infanasoda güije yan un taotao na mangangatga un jarran janom : dalalag güe .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Ya amanoja nae jumalom , alog ni y taotao guma : Y Maestro , ilegña : Mangue y aposento ni y anae para infañocho gui pascua yan y disipulujo ?

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Ya güiya infanfinanue un dangculo na cuatto ; esta mafamauleg yan listo ; ayo nae famauleg para jita .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ya y disipuluña sija manmapos , ya manmato gui siuda , ya jasoda jaftaemano y mansinangane sija : ya mafamauleg para y pascua .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: N	14	17		40880	 ¶ Ya y pupuenge mato yan y dose .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Ya anae manmatatachong ya mañochocho , si Jesus ilegña : Magajet jusangane jamyo : Uno guiya jamyo umentregayo ; güiyaja uchumocho yan guajo .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Ayo nae ninafangostriste , ya ilegñija nu güiya uno yan otro : Guajo ? y otro ilegña : Guajo ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Ayo nae manope ilegña nu sija : Uno gui dose ni y jumajame manotche gui tason .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Y Lajin taotao magajet na mapos , ni y esta matugue pot güiya : lao namaase ayo na taotao ni y jaentrega y Lajin taotao . Maulegña ayo na taotao na ti umafañago .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: N	14	22		40930	 ¶ Ya anae mañochocho , jachule si Jesus y pan , ya jabendise , ya jaipe , ya janae sija , ilegña : Chile ya incano , sa este y tataotaojo .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Ya jachule y posuelo , ya anae munjayan janae grasia , janae sija : ya todos manguimen .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Este y jâgâjo , gui nuebo na testamento , ni machuda pot y megae .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti juguimen talo ni y tinegcha ubas , asta ayo na jaane , na juguimen nuebo gui raenon Yuus .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Ya anae munjayan macanta un himno , manmapos manmalag y finabeca Olibo .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: N	14	27		40980	 ¶ Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Todos jamyo infaninefende pot guajo ; sa esta matugue : Bae jupanag y pastot , ya y quinilo sija ufanmachalapon .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Lao despues di lâlâyo talo , ya cumajuloyo , jujanao esta y menanmiyo guiya Galilea .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Ayo nae si Pedro ilegña : Achogja todos maninefende ; lao guajo aje .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ya sinangane as Jesus ilegña : Magajet jusanganejao na jago pagoja na puenge , antes qui uoo dos biaje y gayo , unpuneyo tres biaje .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Lao guiya janaguefchadeg y cuentosña , ilegña : Yanguin jumitamatae , ti jupunejao ni jaftaemano . Taegüineja locue sinanganñija todos .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: N	14	32		41030	 ¶ Ya manmato un lugat na y naaña Gethsemane : ya ilegña ni y disipuluña sija : Fanmatatachong güine , mientras mananaetaeyo .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Ya jacone gachongña si Pedro , yan si Santiago , yan si Juan , ya jatutujon manmajalang , yan mangostriste ,

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Y antijo sentriste asta qui jumatae ; fañaga güine , ya iafanmamulan .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ya jumanao mona didide , dumimo papa gui jilo oda , ya manaetae , na yanguin siña , ufalofan y ora guiya güiya .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Ya ilegña : Abba , Tata : todo y güinaja mansiña para jago ; nasuja este y posuelo guiya guajo : lao ti taemanoja minalagojo , na y minalagomo .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Ya mato talo guato ya jasoda sija manmaego , ya ilegña as Pedro : Simon mamaegojao ? ti siñajao bumela un oraja ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Fanbela , yan infanmanaetae ; para chamiyo fanjajalom gui tentasion : Y Espiritu magajet na malago ; lao y catne echecho .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ya jumanao talo ya manaetae ya ayoja mismo na sinangan .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Ya anae tumalo guato jasoda talo sija na manmamaego : sa y atadogñija mangosmacat , ya ti ujatungo jafa umaope güe .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ya mato talo gui mina tres biaje , ya ilegña nu sija : Fanmaego pago , ya infandescansa : esta najong ; y ora esta mato ; lie y Lajin taotao na maentrega gui canae y manisao sija .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Fangajulo ya nije tafanjanao ; sa esta y umentregayo jijot .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Ya enseguidas , mientras cumuecuentos , mato si Judas , uno gui dose , ya mañisija yan un linajyan taotao , manmañuñule espada , yan galute guinen y magas mamale , yan y escriba , yan y manamco sija .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Ya ayo y umentrega güe , mannae señat , ilegña : Jaye y juchico , güiya ayo : guiot ya inquene na seguro .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Ya enseguidas nae matogüe , jumajanaoja guato guiya güiya , ya ilegña : Maestro ; ya jachico .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Ya ayonae mapolo canae sija gui jiloña ya macone .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Ya uno guiya sija ni y tumotojgue gui oriya , jalagnos y espadaña , ya jataga y tentago y magas mamale , ya jautut talangaña .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Ada manmato jamyo calang contra y saque , na manmañuñule jamyo espada , yan galute para inguiotyo ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Guinen manjijitaja todo y jaane gui templo manmamananagüe , ya ti inquequeneyo ? lao mafatinas este para umacumple y tinigue .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Ya madingo , ya manmalago todos .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: N	14	51		41220	 ¶ Ya dinalalaggüe un patgon na taotao , na jatatampe güe un sábanas , sa taya magagago : ya y mamatgon sija na taotao , maguot güe .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Lao güiya japolo y sábanas , ya malago sin magago .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: N	14	53		41240	 ¶ Ya macone si Jesus para y magas na pale : ya mandaña y manmagas mamale yan y manamco , yan y escriba sija .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Ya si Pedro dinalalag güe , lao chago , asta gui sanjalom , sanjalom y palasyon y magas na pale : ya matachong yan y tentago sija , ya janama maope güe gui guafe .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ya y magas mamale , yan todo y inetnon ofisiat , manmanaliligao testimonio contra si Jesus para umapuno ; lao taya masoda .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Sa megae manmannae ti manmagajet na testimonio contra güiya : lao y testimonioñija ti manparejo .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Ya mangajulo palo ni manmannae contra güiya y testimonio na ti manmagajet , ilegñija :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Injingog y ilegña : Juyulang este na templo , ni y mafatinas nu canae , ya y tres na jaane , janacajulo talo otro na ti finatinas canae .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Lao este na testimonioñija , locue ti manparejo .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ya y magas na pale tumojgue julo gui talolo , ya jafaesen si Jesus ilegña : Ti unfanope ni jafa ? Jafa este sija na testimonioñija contra jago ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Lao mamatquiquiloja , taya inepeña . Tumalo y magas na pale finaesen ilegña : Jago si Jesucristo Lajin y Bendito ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña : Guajo ; ya umamaela y tiempo anae inlie y Lajin taotao matatachong gui agapa y gaeninasiña na canae , ya umamaela gui jalom y mapagajes y langet .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Ayonae y magas na pale , jatiteg y magaguña , ya ilegña : Para jafajit palo testigo sija ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Injingogja y chinatfinoña contra si Yuus : Jafa jinasonmimiyo ? Ya todos manmañentensia para umapuno .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Ya y palo matutujon matolae , yan matatampe mataña , yan mapatmada , ya ilegñija nu güiya : Profetisa : ya y ofisiat sija rumesibe güe ya japatmada ni y canaeñija .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: N	14	66		41370	 ¶ Ya anae si Pedro gaegue gue sanpapa gui palasyo , mato un palaoan tentago y magas na pale :

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ya anae jalie si Pedro na janamamaepe güe , jaatan ya ilegña : Jago locue manjajamyo yan si Jesus Nasareno ?

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Lao jadague ilegña : Ti jutungo , ni jutungo jafa ilelegmo . Ya mapos juyong gui cajida ; ya umoo y gayo .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Ya linie talo ni y palaoan , ya jatutujon sumangane ayo sija y manotojgue gui oriyaña : Este uno guiya sija .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Ya jadague talo . Ti apmam ayo y manotojgue gui oriya ilegñija as Pedro : Magajet na jago uno guiya sija ? sa jago taotao Galileajao .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Lao jatutujon mamatdise yan manjula ya ilegña : Ti jutungo este na taotao y insasangan .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Ya enseguidas y mina dos biaje umoo y gayo . Jajaso si Pedro y sinangan , jaftaemano si Jesus nu güiya ilegña : Antes que uoo y gayo dos biaje , undagueyo tres biaje . Ya anae jajaso , tumanges .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: YA enseguidas y egaan güije , y magas mamale yan y manamco , yan y escriba sija , yan todo y inetnon ofisiat manaconseja entaloñija , ya magode si Jesus , ya macone , ya maentrega si Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ya finaesen as Pilato , ilegña nu güiya : Jago y Ray Judios ? Ya manope ilegña : Jago sumangan .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Ya mafaaela ni y magas mamale , megae sija na güinaja .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Ya finaesen güe talo as Pilato , ilegña : Ti unfanope ni jafa ? liija na minegae finaela contra jago .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Lao si Jesus ti manope ni jafa ; ayo mina ninamanman si Pilato .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: N	15	6		41490	 ¶ Ya ayo na gupot , y costumbre masosotta un preso , yanguin jagagao jaye y malagoñija .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Ya guaja güije uno , y naanña si Barabas , na mapreso yan y mangachongña gui un jatsamiento ; sija manmamuno anae mangajulo gui jatsamiento .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao manmato jijot , ya jatutujon manmangaogao na ufatinas taegüije y guinen jafatinas guiya sija ,

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Lao si Pilato manope sija , ilegña : Manmalago jamyo na jusottaye jamyo y Ray Judios ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Sa jatungo , na ayo na maentrega ni y magas mamale , pot y embidia .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Lao y magas mamale jatago y taotao sija , na ujagagao na si Barabas umasotta .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ya si Pilato manope ilegña talo nu sija : Jafanae malagomiyo jufatinas ayo y infananaan Ray Judios ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Ya managang talo ilegñija : Atane gui quiluus .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Ayonae si Pilato , ilegña nu sija : Jafa na taelaye finatinasña ? Ya mas managang , ilegñija : Atane gui quiluus .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Ya si Pilato , malago na ufanmagof y taotao sija , jasottaye sija si Barabas , ya maentrega si Jesus , anae munjayan masaulag , para umaatane gui quiluus .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: N	15	16		41590	 ¶ Ya maosgaejon ni y sendalo sija , guato gui patio mafanaan Pretorio ; ya madaña todo y mangachong .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ya manaminagago púrpura , ya matufog un coronan tituca .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Ya matutujon masaluda , ilegñija : Jafa tatatmanojao Ray Judios !

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Ya mapanag y iluña ni y piao , ya matolae güe , yan mandidimo , ya maadodora güe .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Ya anae munjayan mamofeagüe , manajanao y púrpura , ya manaminagago ni y magaguñaja . Ya macone güe para umaatane gui quiluus .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Jesus .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ya macone guato gui un lugat na y naanña Golgota : cumequeilegña , Sagan calabera .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Ya manae guimenña , bino manadaña yan mira , lao ti jaresibe .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Ya maatane güe gui quiluus , manafacae ni magaguña ; ya manrifa jaye uchinile cada uno .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ya y mina tres na ora , anae maatane güe gui quiluus .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ya y tinigue y fumaaelagüe , matugue gui sanjilo . Y RAY JUDIOS .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ya maatane dos na saque yan güiya : y uno gui agapaña , ya y otro gui acagüeña .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: ( Ya macumple y tinigue ni y ilegña : Güiya , usaouao matufong yan y manisao . )

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Ya macacase todo ni y manmalolofan , ya jayeyengyong y ilonñija , ya ilegñija : Ay ! jago ni y unyulang y templo , ya unjatsa talo gui mina tres na jaane ;

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Satba maesajao , ya maela tunog papa güenao gui quiluus .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue y magas mamale , manmanbotlelea gui entaloñija , ya ilegñija yan y escriba sija : Jasatba y palo , ya güiya na maesa ti siña güe jasatba .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Si Cristo y Ray Israel , polo ya utunog pago gui quiluus , para utafanlie , ya utafanjonggue güe . Yan ayo y mangachochongña manmaatane gui quiluus madespresia güe .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: N	15	33		41760	 ¶ Ya anae mato y mina saes na ora , jomjom todo y tano asta y mina nuebe na ora .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ya y mina nuebe na ora , janagosagang si Jesus ilegña : Eli , Eli , lama sabactani ? cumequeilegña : Yuusso , Yuusso , jafa muna undingoyo ?

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Ya palo ni y manotojgue gui oriyaña , anae majungog güe , ilegñija : Estagüe na jaaagang si Elias .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Ya malago uno , ya jasupog y espongja gui binagle , ya japolo gui puntan y piao , ya janae para uguimen , ya ilegña : Poloja güe namaesa ; ya utafanlie cao ufato si Elias , ya uninatunog .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ya si Jesus umagang goságang , ya jaentrega y espiritu .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ya y cottinan y templo , masisen dos pedaso , y sanjilo asta y sanpapa .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ya anae y senturion ni y tumotojgue gui menaña , linie , na taegüenao jaentrega y espiritu , ilegña : Magajet na este na taotao Lajin Yuus .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Ya mangaegue locue sija famalaoan , na maaatan gui chago , ya entre sija estaba si Maria Magdalena , yan si Maria nanan Santiago y patgon , yan si José , yan si Salome ;

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ni y anae estaba güe guiya Galilea , madalalag güe , ya masetbe güe ; yan megae sija na famalaoan mangachochongña julo guiya Jerusalem .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: N	15	42		41850	 ¶ Ya anae estaba pupuenge , sa ayo na jaane y Preparasion , cumequeilegña y jaane antes di y sábado ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Mato si José , taotao Arimatea , mauleg na taotao na pápagat , ni y jananangga locue y raenon Yuus ; ya mapos yan atrebe malag as Pilato , ya jagagao y tataotao Jesus .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Ya ninamanman si Pilato , cao esta matae ; ya jaagang y senturion , ya jafaesen cao esta matae algun tiempo .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Ya anae jatungo gui senturion ; janae si José ni y tataotao .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: tataotaoñaya jabalutan ni y fino na magago , ya japolo gui un naftan ni maguadog gui acho , ya janagaliligue guato un acho , gui pettan y naftan .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Ya si Maria Magdalena , yan si Maria nanan José , jalie amano nae mapolo .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: YA anae esta malofan y sabado , si Maria Magdalena , yan si Maria nanan Santiago , yan si Salome , manmamajan paopao , para ufato ya umapalalae güe .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Ya taftataf gui egaan , gui finenana na jaane gui semana , manmato gui naftan gui quinajulo y atdao .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Ya ilegñija entre sija : Jaye uninagalileg y acho gui pettan y naftan ?

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Ya anae maaatan , malie na esta managalileg y acho , sa gosdangculo .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Ya manjalom gui naftan , malie un patgon na taotao , na matatachong gui agapa na banda , minagagon apaca na anaco ; ya ninafangosmaañao .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo fanmaaañao : inaliligao si Jesus Nasareno , ni y maatane gui quiluus : esta cajulo ; taegüe güine ; liija y lugat anae mapopolo güe .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Janao infanjanao , ya insangane y disipuluña , yan si Pedro : Güiya jumanao gui menanmiyo guiya Galilea ; ayo nae inlie güe , ni y guinin mansinangane jamyo .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Ya manmapos juyong , ya manmalago gui naftan , sa jumuyong manlalaolao yan manmanman ; ya ti ufanmanangane jafa ni y taotao ; sa mangosmanmaañao .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: N	16	9		41990	 ¶ Lao anae cajulo si Jesus , taftataf gui egaan gui finenana na jaane gui semana , umalie finena , yan Maria Magdalena , ni y guinin janajuyong siete na anite .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Ya mapos güe , ya jasangane ayo y guinin mangachochongña , ni y mantriste , yan manatanges .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Ya sija , anae jajungog na esta lâlâ ya umalie yan Mana , ti majonggue .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Ya anae manmalofan estesija , manmalie talo yan dos , lao otro jechuraña ; gui anae manjajanao gui fangualuan .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Ya manmapos , ya manmasangane y palo disipulo : lao ti majonggue .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: N	16	14		42040	 ¶ Despues di ayo , manmalie yan y onse gui anae mañochocho , ya jalalatde ni y ti manjengguenñija , yan y majetog corasonñija , sa ti majonggue ayo sija y lumie güe despues di cumajulo .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija ; Janao fanmalag todo y tano , ya predica y ibangelio todo y ninajuyong sija .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Jaye y manjonggue ya matagpange , usatba ; lao ayo y ti manjonggue ; umasentensia .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Ya este sija na señat ufantinattitiye ayo sija y manmanjonggue : Pot y naanjo ujayute juyong y anite sija ; ufanguentos ni y nuebo na finijo ;

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Ufanmangajat culebla sija , ya , yanguin manguimen jafa na beneno ; ti uninafanlamen : ya ujapolo y canaeñija gui manmalango sija , ya ujanafanjomlo .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: N	16	19		42090	 ¶ Enao y Señot , despues di mansinangane sija , rinisibe ni y langet , ya matachong gui agapa Yuus .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ya manmapos , ya mapredica y sinangan gui todo y lugat , mañisija manmachocho yan y Señot , ya manafitme y sinangan ni y umatitiye na señat . Amen .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: POT y guaja megae y umapolo y canaeñija para ufannaregla y cuentos nu y ayo na güinaja na esta guefmaasegura gui entalo jame ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Jaftaemanoja ninaejam ni guine y tutujoña y testigojam ni y malie , nu y yan y ministrojam y sinangan ;

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Y jinasoco mauleg locue nu guajo , sa juguefegaga sinengcabales todo y güinaja guine y tutujonña , na jutuguie jao pot y inaregla , jago guesmagas na Teofilo ;

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Para untungo sija y magajet ayosija mano nae unresibe y finanagüe .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: N	1	5		42150	 ¶ Guaja gui jaanin Herodes , ray guiya Judea , un pale , naanña si Sacharias , y clasen Abias ; y asaguaña guinin sija jagan Aaron ya y naaña si Elisabet .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Este na dos mauleg gui sanmenan Yuus , jajananao gui todo y lay yan y tinago Señot , ti lalatdiyon .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Ya taya patgonñija ; sa si Elisabet tifáfañago ; yan y dos megae jaaniñija .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: N	1	8		42180	 ¶ Ya jumuyong , anae mañeñetbe si Sacharias , gui ofisio y pale gui menan Yuus , gui chechon y clasiña ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Jaftaemanoja y costumbren y ofisio y pale , y chechoña na jumalom gui guimayuus ya jasonggue y paopao .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Ya todo y linajyan taotao mangaegue gui sanjiyong manmananaetae gui oran paopao .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Ya mato guiya güiya y angjet y Señot , na gaegue gui agapa y attat y paopao .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Ya inestotba si Sacharias anae jalie , ya mato minaañao gui jiloña .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Lao y angjet ilegña nu güiya : Sacharias , chamo maaañao ; sa y tinaetaemo este majungog ; ya y asaguamo as Elisabet ufañago y patgon laje , ya umafanaan naanña si Juan .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Ya uguaja jao minagof yan alegria ; ya y megae umagof nu y mafañaguña .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Sa udangculo güe gui menan Señot ; ya ti uguimen bino ni metgot na guinem ya ubulagüe Espiritu Santo , guinin y tiyan nanaña .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Ya megae gui famaguon Israel , ujabira nu y Señot , Yuusñija .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Ya ujanaogüe gui menan y mataña nu y espiritu yan y ninasiñan Elias , para unanalo y corasonñija y mañaena guiya y famaguon , yan y manchátmatago ni y tiningo y manunas ; para ufamauleg nu y Señot y taotao , ni y esta fanmauleg para güiya .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Ya ilegña si Sacharias nu y angjet : Jaftaemano jutungo este ? sa guajo bijoyo ya y asaguajo megae jaaniña .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Ya manope y angjet ya ilegña nu güiya : Guajo si Gabriel , na gaegue yo tumotojgue gui menan Yuus ; ya guajo esta matago na jucuentusejao , ya junaejao ni este mauleg na sinangan .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Ya estagüe , na jago udojao ya ti siña uncuentos , asta y jaane nae este macumple estesija ; sa y ti unjongue y sinanganjo , ni umacumple y tiempoña .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Ya y taotao sija manmannanangga as Sacharias , ya ninafanmanman ni y inapmamña gui guimayuus .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Ya anae jumuyong , ti siña umadingane sija ; ya matungo na manlie un linie gui guimayuus ; lao güiya sigue di fumatinas y señatja ; ya sumaga udo .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Ya anae esta munjayan y jaanin y ministroña , jumanao para y guimaña .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: N	1	24		42340	 ¶ Ya despues di ayo sija na jaane mapotgue y asaguaña as Elisabet , ya janana sinco na meses , ya ilegña :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Taemanoja y Señot jafatinas para guajo , este sija na jaane nae jaatanyo para unajanao y mamajlaojo gui entalo taotao sija .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Y mina saes na mes , y angjet Gabriel esta tumago guine as Yuus , para un siuda guiya Galilea , ni y naanña y Nasaret ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Guiya un bitgen , nobia y un laje naanña si José , familian David ; ya y naan y bitgen si Maria .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Ya jumalom manu nae estaba güe , ya ilegña : Jafa tatatmana jao na guefmaborese jao ; y Señot gaegue guiya

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Lao pot este na sinangan , ninaestotba güe , ya jajajaso na jaftaemano este na sinaluda .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Entonses y angjet ilegña nu güiya : Maria , chamo maaañao ; sa unsoda y finaborese gui menan Yuus .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Ya estagüe , na unmapotgue gui tiyanmo ya unfañago un patgon laje , ya umafanaan y naaaña si Jesus .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Ya udangculo güe , ya umafanaan Lajin Gueftaquilo : ya y Señot Yuus ufannae güe y tronon David tataña .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Ya ugobietna gui guima Jacob siesiempreja ; ya y raenoña ugagaegue taejinecog .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Entonses si Maria ilegña ni y angjet : Jafa jumuyong este ? sa ti jutungo laje .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Ya manope y angjet , ya ilegña nu güiya : Y Espiritu Santo umamaela guiya jago , ya y ninasiña y Gueftaquilo jafatinas y anineng gui jilomo ; enaomina ayo na Santos na umafañago , umafanaan Lajin Yuus .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Ya , estagüe , si Elisabet , parentesmo , locue güiya mapotgue un laje gui inamcoña ; ya este y mina saes na mes nu güiya na mafanaan tifáfañago .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Sa y sinangan Yuus , taya uno na taeninasiña .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Entonses si Maria ilegña : Estagüe y tentagon Señot ; ufatinas guiya guajo taemanoja y sinanganmo . Ya y angjet mapos guiya güiya .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: N	1	39		42490	 ¶ Ya ayo na jaane sija , cajulo si Maria ya jumanao gusise para un tano taquilo , guiya un siudan Juda ;

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Ya jumalom gui guima Sacharias ya jasaluda si Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ya jumuyong taegüije na anae jajungog si Elisabet y sinaludan Maria , y patgon tumayog gui jalom tiyanña ; si Elisabet bula Espiritu Santo ,

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Ya umagang ni dangculo na inagang ya ilegña : Dichosojao gui entalo y famalaoan , ya dichoso y tinegchan tiyanmo .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Ya guine manu este guiya guajo , na mato guiya guajo y nanan y Señotto .

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Sa estagüe , na anae mato y inagang y sinaludamo gui talangajo , y patgon , gui jalom tiyanjo , tumayog ni minagofña .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Ya dichosogüe y jumonggue ; sa uguaja y quinimple gui güinaja , ni esta masangane güe ni guinin y Señot .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: N	1	46		42560	 ¶ Entonses ilegña si Maria : Janadangculo y antijo y Señot ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Ya y espiritujo ninamagof gui as Yuus y Satbadotto .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Sa jaatan y dinespresiaoña y tentgoña ; sa estagüe na desde pago jumafanaan dichosa ni todo y generasion .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Sa ayo na guaja ninasiña , jafatinas guiya guajo dangculo na güinaja ; ya santos y naanña .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Ya y minaaseña gaegue gui generasion taotao sija , gui jiloñija ni manmaañao nu güiya .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Ya pot y canaeña jafanue minetgot ; janafañuja y sobetbio sija gui jinason y corasonñija .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Ya jayute papa y magas gui tronoñija , ya jajatsa y manumitde .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Ya y manñalang janafanbula ni y minauleg ; ya y manmigüinaja janafanjanao yan y tae sinajguan .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Ya jaayuda si Israel tentagoña , para ufanjaso y miñaase ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: ( Taemano y jasangane y mañaenata ) , as Abraham yan y semiyaña para todo y tiempo .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Si Maria sumaga yan güiya calang tres meses ya despues jumanao asto iyasija .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: N	1	57		42670	 ¶ Ya si Elisabet jacumple y tiempo nae para ufañago ; ya mañago un patgon laje .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Ya anae majungog ni tiguangña yan y parientesña , na si Yuus janadangculo y minaaseña guiya güiya ; ya manmagof yan güiya .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Ya susede na y mina ocho na jaane manmato para umasircunsida y patgon : ya malagoñija umafanaan ni y naan tataña as Sacharias .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Ya manope y nanaña ya ilegña : Aje , sa umafanaan si Juan .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Taya gui manparientesmo mafanaan nu este na naan .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Ya maseñat y tataña , ya mafaesen jafa malagoña umafanaan .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Ya mangagao un diquique na tabla ya jatugue ilegña : Si Juan naanña . Ya todo sija ninafanmanman .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Ya enseguidas mababa y pachotña , ya mapula y jilaña , ya cumuentos , jabendise si Yuus .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Ya guaja minaañao gui jiloñija todo y mañasaga gui oriyañija : ya gui todo y tano taquilo guiya Judea , masasangan este sija na sinangan .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Ya todosija y jumujungog jaadaje gui corasonñija ya ilegñija : Jafa jumuyong este na patgon ? Sa y canae Yuus gaegue guiya güiya .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: N	1	67		42770	 ¶ Ya si Sacharias , tataña , bula Espiritu Santo ya japrofetisa , ilegña :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Bendito y Señot , y Yuus y Israel ; sa jabisita ya jafatinas y redension , para taotaoña ,

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Ya janacajulo para jita un canggelon y satbasion , gui guima y tentagoña as David ,

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: ( Taegüijija na jasasangan gui pachot y mañantos na profetaña , ni esta gaegue guinin tutujonña y tano ) ,

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Satbasion gui y enemiguta yan gui canae todo y chumatliijit ;

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Para umafanue y minaaseña gui mañaenata , ya umajaso y santos na tratoña ;

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Y juramento ni manjula as Abraham ni tatata ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Na güiya unaejit linibreta gui canae y enemiguta ya utasetbe güe sin minaañao ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Y sinantos yan y tinunas gui menaña todo y jaanita .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Ya , jago , patgon , unmafanaan profetan y Gueftaquilo ; sa unjanao gui menan y Señot para unfamauleg y chalanña ;

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Para ufanamatungo y satbasion gui taotaoña ni y maasiin y isaoñija ,

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Pot causa y corason y minaaseña y Yuusta , anae y candit ogaan guinin taquilo , jabisitajit ,

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Para junae inina y manmatatachong gui jemjom yan y anineng y finatae ; para ufanue y patasta gui chalan y pas .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Ya y patgon lumala ya mumetgot gui espiritu ya sumaga gui desierto asta y jaane anae esta matungo guiya Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: YA susede na ayo sija na jaane , jumuyong un bando guinen as Augusto Sesat , para todo y tano na mataotagüe , na y naanñija ufanmatugue gui padron .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Este finenana na padron esta fumatinas , anae si Sirenio y magalaje guiya Siria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Ya manjanao todo y taotao para ninatugue y naanñija gui padron , cada uno gui siudaña .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Ya jumanao si José guinin Galilea , guinin un siuda na naanña Nasaret , para ufalag Judea , gui siudan David , na mafanaan Betlehem , sa güiya y guima y familian David ;

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
