text2: Para ufanmatugue gui padron yan si Maria , asaguaña umacamo yan güiya , anae estaba dangculo sa mapotgue ,

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Ya susede , anae gaegue sija güije , y jaaniña ni para ufañago esta macumple ;

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Ya mañago un laje finenana na patgon ; ya mabalutan ni y pañales , ya manaason qui cajon sacate ; sa taya sagañija gui guima .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: N	2	8		42980	 ¶ Ya guaja pastot sija güije na tano , na mañaga gui fangualuan , ya jaadadaje y manadan quinilo gui puenge .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Ya estagüe y angjet y señot tumotojgue guiya sija ; y minalag Yuus jaina gui oriyañija ; ya guaja dangculo na minaañao .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Lao y angjet ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo fanmaañao ; sa , estagüe , na juchule para jamyo mauleg na sinangan dangculo na minagof , para todo y taotao :

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Sa esta mafañago para jamyo gui siudan David , pago na jaane , un Satbadot , na güiya si Cristo , y Señot .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Ya este y señatmiyo : Inseda y patgon mabalutan ni y pañales , ya umaason gui cajon sacate .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Ya enseguidas anog yan y angjet y linajyan y sendalo gui langet , na manmantutuna as Yuus , ya ilegñija :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: Minalag gui y Gueftaquilo as Yuus , ya y tano pas gui entalo taotao ni y minagofña dangculo .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Ya jumuyong anae y angjet sija manmamapos guiya sija para y langet , y pastot sija manasangane . uno yan otro : Nije tafanmalag pues , asta Betlehem , ya talie este na güinaja ni esta jumuyong , na si Yuus jafanuejit .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Ya manmato chadeg , ya jasoda si Maria yan José , yan y diquique na patgon umaason gui cajon sacate .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ya anae esta malie , janatungo y sinangan na mansinangane sija nu y diquique na patgon .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Ya todo y manmanjungog , ninafanmanman pot y pastot sija , ni y sinanganñija .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Lao si Maria jananana todo este sija na sinangan , jajasosoye gui corasonña .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Ya manato guato y pastot sija yan manmagof ya matuna si Yuus pot todo y güinaja ni munjayan jajungog yan jalie , jaftaemano y esta jasangane sija .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: N	2	21		43110	 ¶ Ya anae esta macumple y ocho na jaane , para umasirconsida güe mafanaan naanña si Jesus , taegüije y finanaan nu y angjet antes qui umamapotgueñaejon gui tiyan nanaña .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Ya anae esta macumple y jaanin y guinasgas , jaftaemanoja y lay Moises , sija macone güe guiya Jerusalem para umanae gui Señot .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: ( Jaftaemanoja y matuque gui lay y Señot : todo laje na jababa y tiyan , umafanaan santos para y Señot ) ;

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Ya para umanae inefrese jaftaemanoja y masangan y lay y Señot , un pares na tortola pat dos patgon na paluma .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Ya , estagüe , guaja un taotao guiya Jerusalem , na naanña si Simeon , ya este na taotao , cabales ya guefmanjonggue na jananangga y quinensuela y Israel : ya y Espiritu Santo gaegue gui jiloña .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Ya esta mafanue güe nu y Espiritu Santo , na ti ulie finatae , antes na ulie Cristo , y Señot .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Ya mato güe pot y Espiritu gui templo , ya anae machule , nu si tataña , y patgon Jesus gui templo para umafatinas pot guiya , taemanoja y costumbren y lay ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Ayo nae güiya jajogue gui canaeña ya jabendise si Yuus ya ilegña :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: Pago polo , Señot , y tentagomo ya jumanao yan pas , taemanoja y sinanganmo .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Sa jalie y matajo y satbasionmo ,

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Ni esta unfamauleg gui menan todo y taotao ;

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Y candit para ufanmatungo y nasion sija , yan y minalag para y taotaomo , Israel .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: N	2	33		43230	 ¶ Ya si José yan y nanaña ninafanmanman nu ayo sija y jasasangan nu güiya ;

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Ya jabendise si Simeon ya ilegña ni nanaña as Maria : Estagüe na patgon esta mapolo para pinedong yan para ufanjinatsa y megae guiya Israel ; yan para y señat ni y ninachatsaga ,

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: Yan y jago locue , sa y antimo na umadotgan nu y espada , ya para jinasoñija y megae na corason nae umatungo .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Gaegue locue güije , si Ana y profeta palaoan , jagan Fanuel gui tribun Aser ( na güiya guaja megae na jaaniña , yan sumaga yan y asaguaña siete años desde y binitgenña ;

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: si Yuus , puenge yan jaane nu y umayuyunat yan manaenaetae .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Ya este mato güijija na ora ya janae si Yuus maase , ya jacumuentuse pot güiya todo sija y manmannangga ni linibre guiya Jerusalem .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Lao anae esta jacumple todo sija , taemanoja y gaegue gui lay y Señot , manalo guato Galilea gui siudañija guiya Nasaret .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Ya y patgon dumangculo yan ninamatatnga ya bulagüe tiningo : ya y grasian Yuus gaegue gui jiloña .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: N	2	41		43310	 ¶ Ya manjajanao sija tataña todo y sacan asta Jerusalem gui guipot y pascua .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Ya anae guaja esta dose na años , sija mangajulo guiya Jerusalem taemanoja y costumbren y guipot .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Ya anae jocog y jaane sija , manalo sija , ya sumaga y patgon , Jesus , guiya Jerusalem taetiningo nu y tataña sija .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Ya jinasoñija na gaegue gui mangachongñija , ya un jaane na manjajanaoja ; ya maaliligao güe gui entalo y parientesñija yan y manatungoñija .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Lao anae ti masoda güe , manalo guato Jerusalem maaliligao güe .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Ya susede anae esta malofan tres na jaane , inseda güe gui templo matatachong gui entalo y manfaye maecungog yan mafafaesen .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Ya todo sija y jumujungog ninafanmanman ni tiningoña yan y inepeña .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Ya anae malie manmajngan ya ilegña nu güiya si nanaña : Patgon , jafa na unfatinasjam taeguenao ? Estagüe si tatamo yan guajo na inaliligao jao yan y pinitinmame !

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Ayo nae ilegña nu sija : Pot jafa yo na inaliligao ? Ti intingo na y checho y tatajo nesesita yo na fatinas ?

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Lao sija ti jatungo ayo na sinangan y mansinangane .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Ya tumunog yan sija ya manjanao . guato Nasaret ya mansinejeta sija . Ya si nanaña jaadaje este todo sija gui corasoña .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Ya si Jesus lumálamodong gui tiningoña yan y linecaña yan y grasia gui as Yuus yan y taotao sija .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Y mina quinse na año gui tiempo anae si Tiberio Sesat jagobietna , ya si Ponsio Pilato , güiya magalaje guiya Judea ; ya si Herodes , güiya magalaje tetrarca guiya Galilea ; ya y cheluña as Felipe , güiya magalaje tetrarca guiya Iturea yan y ya tanon Traconite ; ya si Lisanias , güiya magalaje tetrarca guiya Abilinia ;

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: este na tiempo , mato y sinangan Yuus gui as Juan , lajin Sacharias , gui jalomtano .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Ya güiya mato gui todo y tano gui oriyan Jordan , jasesetmon y managpang en sinetsot para y maasiin isao .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Taegüije esta matugue gui leblo ni y sinangan y profeta Isaias , na ilegña : Inagangña ni y umaagang gui jalomtano : Famauleg y chalan y Señot , y cayejonña natutunas .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Todo y finacañada umanafanbula , yan todo y tano boca yan y manloca na ogso umanafanagpapa ; yan y manechong umanafanunas , yan y chalan farangca unamafanyano .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Ya todo y catne ulie y satbasion Yuus .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Enaomina ilegña ni y linajyan taotao na manmato para ufanmatagpange pot güiya : Rasan culebla , jaye jamyo fumanagüe na insuaye y binibo ni y mamamaela ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Chile tinegchanmiyo ni y magajet na sinetsot , ya chamiyo insigue di sumasangan nu jamyoja : Guaja tatanmame si Abraham ; sa jusanganejamyo na siña , si Yuus güine gui acho janafangajulo y famaguon Abraham .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ya pagoja y gachae gaegueja gui jale y trongcon jayo sija : todo y trongcon jayo na ti mauleg tinegchañija , umautut ya umayute gui guafe .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao mafaesen güe ya ilegñija : Pues jafajam infatinas ?

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Ya manope , ilegña nu sija : Y guaja dos magaguña , unae y taya iyoña : ya y guaja naña ufatinas taegüijija .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Ya manmato locue y publicano sija para ufanmatatagpange , ya ilegñija : Maestro jafa infatinasjam ?

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo gumagagao mas ni y esta jamyo manmatago .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Ya mafaesen güe locue nu y sendalo sija , ilegñija : Ya jame , jafajam infatinas ? Ya mansinangane : Chamiyo mumatratrata ni jaye ni infanmanchiguit , ya magof jamyo nu y apasmiyo .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: N	3	15		43570	 ¶ Ya y taotao sija jananangga ya manmanjajajaso todo sija as Juan gui corasonñija , cao güiya si Jesucristo .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Manope si Juan ya ilegña nu todosija : Guajo magajet managpapange jamyo an janom ; lao mamamaela uno na mas gaeninasiña qui guajo , ya ti siña yo manmerese na jupula y coreas y sapatosña : güiya managpapange an Espiritu Santo yan guafe .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Ya abanicuña gaegueja gui canaeña para unagasgas y guinecoña , ya janafandaña y trigo gui camalenña ; lao usonggue y ngasan gui guafe ni ti siña upuno .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: N	3	18		43600	 ¶ Ya mamagat megae na sinangan ya japredica y taotao sija ni ibangelio .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Lao si Herodes , ayo magalaje tetrarca , linalatde as Juan , pot si Herodias , asaguan y cheluña as Felipe , yan pot todo y tinaelaye sija ni jafatinas si Herodes ,

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: taelayequi todo , ya maponggle si Juan gui catset .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: N	3	21		43630	 ¶ Ya susede , anae todo y taotao manmatagpange , si Jesus locue matagpange ; ya anae manaetaegüe , mababa y langet ;

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: na ilegña : Jago y lajijo ni juguaeya ; iyajago nae gaegue minagofjo .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Ya si Jesus namaesa anae jatutujon sumetnon , güiya treinta años , ya güiya lajin José ( calang jinason taotao ) , nu y lajin Eli ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Nu y lajin Matat nu y lajin Levi , nu y lajin Metqui , nu y lajin Jané , nu y lajin José ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Nu y lajin Matatias nu y lajin Amos , nu y lajin Nalum , nu y lajin Eslí , nu y lajin Nagé ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nu y lajin Maat , nu y lajin Matatias , nu y lajin Simei , nu y lajin José , nu y lajin Juda ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Nu y lajin Joana , nu y lajin Resa , nu y lajin Sorobabel , nu y lajin Salatiel , nu y lajin Neri ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Nu y lajin Metqui , nu y lajin Adí , nu y lajin Cosam , nu y lajin Elmodan , nu y lajin Er ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Nu y lajin Jesus , nu y lajin Elieser , nu y lajin Jorim , nu y lajin Mata , nu y lajin Levi ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Nu y lajin Simeon , nu y lajin Juda , nu y lajin José , nu y lajin Jonan , nu y lajin Eliaquim ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Nu y lajin Melea , nu y lajin Mena , nu y lajin Matata , nu y lajin Natan , nu y lajin David ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: Nu y lajin Jesse , nu y lajin Obed , nu y lajin Boos , nu y lajin Salmon , nu y lajin Naason ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nu y lajin Aminadab , nu y lajin Aram , nu y lajin Esrom , nu y lajin Fares , nu y lajin Juda ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Nu y lajin Jacob , nu y lajin Ysaac , nu y lajin Abraham , nu y lajin Taré , nu y lajin Nacor ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nu y lajin Serug , nu y lajin Ragau , nu y lajin Peleg , nu y lajin Heber , nu y lajin Sela ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Nu y lajin Cainan , nu y lajin Arfaxat , nu y lajin Sem , nu y lajin Noe , nu y lajin Lameg ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Nu y lajin Matusalem , nu y lajin Enog , nu y lajin Jared , nu y lajin Mahalaleel , nu y lajin Cainan ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Nu y lajin Enos , nu y lajin Set , nu y lajin Adam , nu y lajin Yuus .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: YA si Jesus , bula Espirita Santo , tumato guato gui Jordan , ya quinene ni Espiritu asta y desierto .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Ya sumaga güije cuarenta na jaane ya tinienta nu y anite . Ya ti chumocho ni jafa , güije sija na jaane ; ya anae esta macumple , ñalang güe .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya y anite : Yaguin jago Lajin Yuus , tago este y acho ya ufamapan .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Ya si Jesus manope qüe : Esta mamatugue , na ti y panja munalâlâ y taotao .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Ya jacone güe quinene julo , ya finanue güe todo y raeno gui jilo y tano gui un momento y tiempo ,

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Ya y anite ilegña nu güiya : Bae junae jao ni este na ninasiña todo , yan y minalagñija ; sa guajo maentrega , ya jaye y malagojo , junae .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Enaomina jago , yaguin unadora gui menajo , todosija iyomo .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus , ya ilegña : Esta matugue na y Señot Yuusmo unadora , ya güiyaja unsetbe .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Ya quinene talo guiya Jerusalem ya pinelo gui sumanjilo y templo , ya ilegña nu güiya : Yaguin jago Lajin Yuus , yutejao güine papa :

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Sa esta matugue , na y angjetña sija jaencatga nu jago para unmaadaje ,

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Ya y canaeñija unquilile sa chamo matompo y adengmo gui acho .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Manope si Jesus ya ilegña : Esta masangan : Chamo tietienta y Señot Yuusmo .

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Anae esta munjayan todo y tentasionña y anite mapos guiya güiya un rato .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: N	4	14		43940	 ¶ Si Jesus tumato gui ninasiñan y Espiritu asta Galilea : ya jumanao y famaña guiya todo y tano gui oriyaña .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Ya güiya mamananagüe gui guimayuusñija , ya ninafanonra nu y todo .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: N	4	16		43960	 ¶ Ya mato guiya Nasaret anae jagas mapogsae : ya jumalom taemanoja y costumbreña gui jaanin sabado , gui guimayuus ya cajulo para utaetae .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Ya manaegüe y leblon y profeta Isaias . Ya anae jababa y leblo , jasoda anae esta matugue :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: Y Espiritun y Señot gaegue gui jilojo , sa japalae yo para jupredica y mauleg na sinangan gui mamobble : ya matago yo para jusangane mancautibo , linibre , ya para y manbachet ufanmanlie , ya para junafanlibre y manchiguit ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: Para jusaganñaejon y guaeyayon na año y Señot .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: N	4	20		44000	 ¶ Ya jajuchom y leblo ya anae janatalo y ministro , matachong ; ya todo y mangaegue gui guimayuus , güiyaja manatan .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Ya jatutujon sumangane sija : Pago esta macumple este na tinigue gui talanganmiyo .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Ya todoja manmannae testimonio ya esta ninafanmanman nu minauleg sinangan ni manjujuyong , gui pachotña ; ya ilegñija : Ti güiya ini y lajin José .

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Magajet insanganeyo nu este na sinangan : Medico , amte namaesajaoja : todo sija injingog na unfatinas guiya Capernaum , fatinas locue güine gui tanomo .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Ya ilegña : Magajet na jusangane jamyo , na ni un profeta guaegayon gui tanoña .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Lao magajet jusangane jamyo : Megae na biuda sija guaja gui Israel gui jaanin Elias , anae y langet majuchom tres años yan saes mesas , anae guaja dangculo na ñinalang gui todo y tano ;

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Lao ni uno guiya sija nae , esta matago si Elias , na as Sarepta , guiya tanon Sidon , guiya un palaoan biuda .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Ya megae na ategtog locue guaja guiya Israel gui tiempon y profeta Eliseo ; lao taya guiya sija esta magasgas , na si Naaman taotao Siro .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Ayo nae todo y taotao gui guimayuus manbula y linalalo , anae jajungog estesija ;

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Ya mangajulo , ya chumulegüe gui sanjiyong y siuda , ya macone asta gui sanjilo y egso , anae esta maplanta y siudañija , para ufanyute gui papa .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Lao güiya , malofan gui entaloñija , ya mapos .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: N	4	31		44110	 ¶ Ya mato papa guiya Capernaum , siudan Galilea , ya ayo nae mamananagüe gui sabado na jaane :

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Ya sija ninafanmanman nu y finanagüeña ; sa y sinanganña gaeninasiña .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Ya gaegue gui guimayuus un taotao na guaja anite ináplacha ; ya umagang dangculo na inagang .

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: Jei ! pelojam ! para jafajam nu jago , Jesus Nasareno ? Matojao para unyulangjam ? jutungojao jayejao ; jago ayo na Santos gui as Yuus !

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Ya si Jesus jalalatde ya ilegña : Pacaca ya maela juyong guiya güiya . Ya anae y anite mayute güe gui entaloñija , jumuyong guiya güiya ; ya taya ninalamen .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Ya minamanman mato gui jilo todo sija , ya manadingan uno yan otro , ilegñija : Jafa na cuentos este ? Sa nu y gobietnaña yan y ninasiñaña jatago y áplacha na anite sija ya unfanjuyong ?

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Ya y famaña masanganñaejon todo y lugat sija gui oriyaña ayona .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: N	4	38		44180	 ¶ Ya jacajulo jumanao juyong gui guimayuus ya jumalom gui guiman Simon ; ya y suegran Simon esta umaason , malingo nu y dangculo na calenturaña ; ya matayuyutgüe pot güiya .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Ya jatojgue gui jijutña , ya jalalatde y calentura ya y calentura pinelo ; ya güiya cajulo ensiguidas ya jasetbe .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: N	4	40		44200	 ¶ Ya y tiempo y minachom y atdao nae , todo y mangaemalango ni y megae na chetnot , manmaconie guiya güiya ; ya japolo y canaeña gui jilo cada uno guiya sija , ya janafanjomlo sija .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Ya anite sija manjuyong locue guiya megae , na manaagang ya ilegñija : Jago , y Lajin Yuus ! Lao güiya jalalatde ya ti japolo ya ufanguentos , sa matungo güe na güiya si Cristo .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: N	4	42		44220	 ¶ Ya anae esta taftaf y jaane , jumanao para un jalomtano : ya y linajyan taotao sija maaliligao güe ya manmafato guiya güiya ya manmalago sija ufanmantiene güe para munga mapos guiya sija .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Nesesitayo locue gui palo siuda umapredica y raenon Yuus : sa para este na matagoyo .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Ya japredidica gui guimayuus sija guiya Galilea .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: YA susede anae y linajyan taotao manoriya yan machichiguet güe ya jaecungog y sinangan Yuus , na güiya gaegue tumotojgue gui oriyan jagoe Genesaret .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Ya jalie dos batco na estaba jijot gui oriyan y jagoe ; ya y manpescadot manunog güije , ya jafagase y laguañija .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Ya jumalom güine gui un batco ya y iyon Simon ; ya jagagao na unafalag y tano didide . Ya matachong ya mamanagüe desde y batco ni linajyan taotao .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Ya anae munjayan cumuentos , ilegña as Simon : Juyong gui tadong na tase ya innatunog y laguanmiyo para un quinene .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Ya manope si Simon ya ilegña : Maestro estajam manmachocho todo puenge ya taya quinenemame ; lao pot y sinanganmo bae innatunog y lagua .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Ya anae manmatinas este , japongle un dangculo na quinenen güijan ; ya esta tiniteg y laguanñija .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Ayo nae jaseñat y mangachongñija ni mangaegue gui otro batco , para ufanmato ya ufaninayuda . Ya manmato , ya janabulaja y dos batco , ya jatutujon manmañoñogñog .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Ya anae jalie este si Simon Pedro , dumimo papa gui as Jesus ya ilegña : Suja guiya guajo , Señot ; sa taotao isaoyo .

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Sa ninamaañao yan todos y mangaegue guiya güiya , pot causa de y quinenen güijan ni y inquene ;

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Ya taegüije ja locue as Santiago yan si Juan , famaguon Sebedeo , ya sija mangachong Simon . Ya ilegña si Jesus as Simon : Chamo maaaño : sa desde pago ufangone jao y taotao .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Ya anae esta mañule gui tano y batcoñija ; todo jayute ya madalaggüe .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: N	5	12		44360	 ¶ Ya susede anae gaegue güe gui uno gui siuda sija , estagüe un taotao na bula ategtog : güiya anae jalie si Jesus , podong gui mataña gui menaña ya jagagao , ilegña : Señot , yaguin malagojao , siñajao unnagasgasyo ?

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Ya jaestira y canaeña ya japacha , ilegña : Malagoyo , gasgasjao ; ya enseguidas y ategtog jumanao guiya güiya .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Ya tinago güe , na chaña sangangane ni jaye : lao janao , unfanue y pale nu jago ya unofrese ni y guinasgasmo , taemanoja y tinagon Moises para testimonio nu sija .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Lao y masanganña jumanao megae ; ya mandaña y dangculon linajyan taotao para umajungog yan para ufanmagong y chetnotñija .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Lao güiya jaapatta güe asta y jalomtano ya manaetae .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: N	5	17		44410	 ¶ Ya susede gui un jaane na estabagüe mamanagüe ; ya mangaegue y Fariseo sija yan y magas y lay , manmatatachong , sa sija manmato guinen y sengsong Galilea , yan Judea , yan y ya Jerusalem ; ya y ninasiñan y Señot gaegue güije para unamagong .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Ya estagüe sija taotao na macocone un taotao gui jilo un cama na paralitico ; ya maaliligao mano nae mañule jalom para umapolo gui menaña .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Ya anae ti masoda mano nae umapolo pot causa y linajyan taotao , mangajulo gui jilo guma ya guinin y atof nae manatunog yan camaña gui entalo , asta y gui menan Jesus .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Ya anae jalie y jinengguenñija yuje sija , ilegña : Taotao , y isaomo umaasie .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Ya y escriba yan y Fariseo sija jatutujon manmanjaso , ya ilegñija : Jaye güe este na usangan chatfino contra si Yuus ? Jaye siña manasie isao , na si Yuusja ?

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Lao si Jesus jatungo y jinasonñija ; manope ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa injajaso gui corasonmiyo ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Jafa sen taeminapot masangan : Y isaomo unmaasie ; pat masangan : Cajulo ya unfanmocat ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Lao para intingoja na y Lajin taotao guaja ninasiñaña gui tano para umasie isao ( ilegña nu y paralitico ) , jusanganejao : Cajulo , chule y camamo ya unjanao para iyajamyo .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Ya enseguidas güiya cajulo gui menanñija , ya jachule ayo anae umaasongüe ya jumanao para y guimaña , ya jatuna si Yuus ,

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Ya ninafanmanman todosija , ya matuna si Yuus ; ya manbula y minaañao , ilegñija : Inlie námanman sija pago .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: N	5	27		44510	 ¶ Ya despues di estesija , jumanao , ya jalie un publicano na y naanña si Levi , matatachong gui bancon y tributo ya ilegña : Dalalagyo .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Ya japolo todo y güinajaña ya cajulo ya jadalalaggüe .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Ya jafatinas si Levi un dangculon gupot gui guimaña : ya guaja un dangculon linajyan publicano sija , yan otro sija manmatachong gui lamasa yan sija .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ya y Fariseo sija yan y escribañija , mangogonggong contra y disipuluña sija , ilegñija : Sajafa na manjajamyo mañocho yan manguimen yan y publicanosija yan y manisao ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ya ilegña nu sija : Y manaechetnot ti janesesita medico ; lao y manmalango .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ti matoyo para juagang y manunas , lao y manisao para ufanmañotsot .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: N	5	33		44570	 ¶ Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Y disipulon Juan manayuyunat megae na biaje , ya jafatitinas tinayuyut ; parejoja yan y disipulon Fariseo sija ; ya iyoco mañochocho yan manguiguimen ?

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Siña innaayunat y mangaegue gui guipot uma sagua anae mañisijaja yan y nobio ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Lao ufato jaane na y nobio umana suja ; ayo nae ufanayunat güije na jaane sija .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Ya mansinangane sija locue un acomparasion : Taya taotao janajanao pidason magago gui nuebo na bestido ya japolo gui bijo na bestido ; no sea ujatiteg y nuebo ya locue y magago guinin nuebo ti parejo yan y bijo .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Ya taya mananaye nuebo na bino gui bijo na boteyan cuero : ya no sea , y bino ni nuebo uyinamag y boteyan cuero , ya y bino umachuda , ya y boteyan cuero ufalingo .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Lao y nuebo bino na nasesita y nuebo na boteyan cuero nae umapolo .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Ya ni un taotao ni gumimen y bijo na bino umalago ni nuebo ; sa ualog : Y bijo maulegña .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: YA susede y un sabado , jumajanao si Jesus gui fangualuan maies ; ya y disipuluña sija , manmanjajala ni y masotcan maies , ya jacano , jagugugan ni y canaeñija .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Ya y Fariseo sija ilegñija : Jafa na infatitinas y ti tunas na umafatinas gui sabado na jaane :

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Ya maninepe as Jesus iligña : Taya nae intaetae este y finatinas David anae ñalang yan y mangachongña ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Anae jumalom gui guimayuus , ya jachule ya jacano y pan ni y mafamamauleg , yan janae locue y mangachongña : ni y ti tunas na ucano na para y mamaleja ?

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Y Lajin Taotao locue Señot y sabado .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: N	6	6		44690	 ¶ Ya susede y otro sabado , na jumalom gui guimayuus ya mamanagüe : ya estaba güije un taotao na anglo y agapa na canaeña .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Ya y escriba yan y Fariseo sija maaatan güe , cao unajomlo gui sabado na jaane ; para uquefanmañoda jafa ya umafaaela .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Lao jatungoja y jinasonñija ; ya ilegña ni ayo na taotao y anglo canaeña : Cajulo ya untojgue gui tálolo ! ya tumojgue julo .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Jufafaesen jamyo uno . Tunas gui sabado na umafatinas y mauleg pat y taelaye ? numalibre linâlâ pat mamuno ?

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Ya jaatan todos y oriyañija ya ilegña nu güiya : Estira mona y canaemo . Ya guiya jafatinas taegüije , ya y canaeña numalo ya magong taegüije y otro .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Ya sija mansénbubo , ya manguecuentos uno yan otro , jafa mojon ujafatinas gui as Jesus .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: N	6	12		44750	 ¶ Ya susede gui ayo sija na jaane , jumanao para ufanaetae gui un ogso ya todo y puenge jasigue di manaetaeja para as Yuus .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Ya anae manana , jaagang y disipuluña sija ; ya jaayig dose guiya sija , ni manmafanaan locue apostoles .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Si Simon ni jafanaan locue Pedro , yan si Andres cheluña , yan si Santiago , yan si Juan , si Felipe , yan si Bartolome ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Yan si Mateo , yan si Tomas , yan si Santiago , lajin Alfeo , yan si Simon ni mafanaan Selote ,

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Yan si Judas chelun Santiago , yan si Judas Iscariote ni y traidot ;

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Ya manunog yan sija ya tumojgue gui un lugat ni yano ; yan y dangculon linajyan disipuluña sija , yan y dangculon linajyan taotao , guinin todo yya Judea , yan yya Jerusalem , yan y tano Tiro yan yya Sidon , ni manmato para umaecungog , yan para uninafanmagong y chetnotñija ;

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Yan manafanmagong ayo sija y munafanachatsaga ni y espiritun áplacha .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Ya manmalago pumapacha güe y linajyan taotao : sa manjujuyong guiya güiya ninasiña ya janafanmamagong todo sija .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: N	6	20		44830	 ¶ Ya güiya manatan julo gui disipuluña , ya ilegña : Mandichoso jamyo ni mamobble ; sa iyonmiyo y raenon Yuus .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Mandichoso jamyo ni y manñalang pago : sa ufanjaspog . Mandichoso y manatanges : sa ufañaleg .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Mandichoso jamyo yaguin y taotao sija infanchinatlie , yan ujaapatta sija guiya jamyo ya ujalalatde jamyo ya ujayute juyong y naanmiyo pot taelaye pot causa y Lajin taotao .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Fansenmagof güije na jaane ; yan infanayog ni minagofmiyo : sa , estagüe , y premionmiyo dangculo gui langet ; sa taegüenaoja jafatitinas y tatañija ni y profeta sija .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: Lao ay jamyo ni manrico ! sa esta guaja consuelonmiyo .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Ay jamyo ni esta manjaspog pago ! sa infanñalang . Ay jamyo ni mañachaleg pago ! sa jamyo infanugong yan infananges .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Ay jamyo yaguin todo y taotao sija manguecuentos mauleg nu jamyo ! sa taegüenaoja ujafatinas y tatañija ni y manfatso na profeta .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: N	6	27		44900	 ¶ Lao jusangangane jamyo ni jumujungog : Güaeya y enemigonmiyo ; fatinas mauleg ni y chumatlie jamyo ,

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Bendise y mumatdise jamyo , ya infanmanaetae pot y namamajlao jamyo .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Ya pumatmada y un banda fasumo , naeja locue ni y otro , ya y chumule y capamo , chamo chumochoma na uchule y chininamo locue .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Ya cada uno ni y gumagaojao , nae ; ya y chumule y güinajamo , chamo tumalulugua gumagao .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Ya jafa y malagomiyo ni y taotao jafatinas nu jamyo ; taegüijija fatinas locue nu sija :

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: Sa yaguin inguaeya y gumaeya jamyo , jafa na grasia guajanmiyo ? sa y manisao locue jaguaeya y gumaeya sija .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Yaguin infatinas mauleg ni y fumamamauleg jamyo , jafa na grasia guajanmiyo ? sa y manisao locue jafatitinasja taegüenao .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Yanguin innaayao na ayo sija ni y guaja ninanggamo para infanresibe , jafa na grasia guajanmiyo : sa y manisao janaayao y manisao para ufanmanresibe taegüije talo .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Lao guaeya jamyo y enimigunmiyo ya infatinas mauleg nu sija : ya innaaayao , ya chamiyo fantataeninangga , ya udangculo y premionmiyo yan infanfamaguon y Gueftaguilo : sa güiya cariñoso nu y ingrato sija , yan y taelaye .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Jamyo locue fanyóase , taegüije y tatanmiyo ni y gaegue gui langet yóase .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: Chamiyo jumusga , sa ti infanjinisga : chamiyo sumetetensia , sa ti infansinentensia : nafanlibre , ya y ninafanlibre :

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Fanmanae , ya infanmanae ; mauleg na medida y majoño papa , ya umachaochao ya umachúchuda , ufanmannae y taotao sija gui jalom pechonmiyo ; sa ayoja na medida y anae manmide jamyo : infanmamediye talo jamyo .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: N	6	39		45020	 ¶ Ya jasangane sija un acomparasion ilegña : Siña y bachet jaosgaejon y otro bachet ? ti ujaachapodong y dos gui joyo ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Y disipulo ti taquiloña qui y maestro : lao cada uno ni y cabales , güiya utaegüijija y maestroña .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ya jafa muna unlilie y migo gui atadog y chelumo ; ya ti unlilie y jayo gui atadogmo ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ya jafa muna siña unalog ni y chelumo : Chelujo , maela ya junajanao y migo gui atadogmo , yanguin jago ti unlilie y jayo gui atadogmo ? Hipocrita jao , yute juyong finena y jayo gui atadogmo , ya ayo nae unlie claro para unnajanao y migo gui atadog y chelumo .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Sa taya mauleg na trongco , ni y fanogcha taelaye , ni y taelaye na trongco ni y fanogcha mauleg .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Sa cada trongco matungoja pot y tinegchaña . Sa ti ufanmanrecoje y taotao sija igos gui manituca ni ufanmanrecoje ubas gui jalom gadon .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Y mauleg na taotao , ni y mauleg na guinaja gui corasonña , mañuñule mauleg ; ya y taelaye na taotao , ni y taelaye na güinaja gui corasonña , mañuñule taelaye : sa y minegae y corason jasasangan y pachotña .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: N	6	46		45090	 ¶ Ya jafa na infananaanyo Señot , Señot , ya ti infatitinas y jusangangane jamyo ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Jaye y mato guiya guajo ya jaecungog y sinanganjo ya jafatinas ; jufanue jaye parejuña :

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Parejo yan un taotao ni y manjatsa guma , ya jaguadog tadong ya japolo y simiento gui jilo y fitme na acho ; ya yanguin cajulo y manadan janom , ya milag y sadog chineneg ayo na guma ; lao ti umayengyong , sa maplanta gui jilo y acho .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Lao ayo y umeecungog ya ti jafatinas ; parejo yan y taotao ni y manjatsa guma gui jilo oda ya ti janaye simiento ; ya anae milag y sadog ya chineneg , enseguidas upodong ; ya dangculo y yinilang ayo na guma .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: YA despues di munjayan todo y finanagüeña si Jesucristo gui talangan taotao sija , güiya jumalom guiya Capernaum .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Ya y tentago un senturion ni y guefyaña , estaba malango , ya esta para umatae .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Lao anae y senturion jajungog na masasangan si Jesus , jatago y manamco na Judios , para umagagao na ufato ya unajomlo y tentagoña .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Ya anae manmato as Jesus , guefmagagao ilegñija : Dignogüe na unfatinas este pot güiya :

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Sa jagüaeya y nasionmame ya japlantaye jam sinagoganmame .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Ya manjanao yan si Jesus . Ya anae esta manjijot gui guima y senturion jatago y amiguña sija para ualog as Jesus : Señot chamo ninachachatsaga ; sa ti dignoyo na junajalom jao gui papa atofjo ;

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Pot este ti jujaso na dignoyo na jufato guiya jago ; lao sanganja ya ujomlo y tentagojo .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Sa guajo locue na taotao gaegeuyo gui papa y ninasiña , ya guaja gui papajo sendalo sija ; yan ileco nu este : Janao , ya mapos ; ya y otro : Maela , ya mato ; ya y tentagojo : Fatinas este , ya jafatinas .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Jesus este , ninamanman nu güiya , ya jabiragüe ilegña ni y linajyan taotao ni y dumalalag güe : Jusangane jamyo na ti jusoda taegüije na dinangculon jinenggue ni iya Israel .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Ya anae manalo sija guato gui guima y manmanago , jasoda na jomlo y tentago ni estaba malango .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: N	7	11		45230	 ¶ Ya susede un rato despues di este na , si Jesus jumanao asta un siuda ni mafanaan Nain ; ya mañisija yan y disipuluña yan y dangculon manadan taotao .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Ya anae esta jijot gui pettan y siuda , estagüe na macocone un matae , güiyaja lajin nanaña , ya biuda locue , ya linajyan taotao siuda mangachongchongña .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Ya anae linie ni y Señot ninamaase nu güiya , ya ilegña nu güiya : Chamo cumacasao .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Ya lumatguato ya japacha y andas ; ya y chumuchule mañaga . Ya ilegña : Patgon , guajo jao sumangane , cajulo .

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Ya y estaba matae matachong ya jatutujon cumuentos , ya inentrega as Jesus gui as nanaña .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Ya ninafanmaaañao todosija , ya maalaba si Yuus ilegñija : Dangculo na profeta esta cajulo entre yya jita : ya , si Yuus jagas jabisita taotaoña .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Ya jumanao este na famaña gui todo yya Judea yan todo oriya y tano .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: N	7	18		45300	 ¶ Ya y disipulon Juan masangane güe todo estesija .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Ya jaagang si Juan dos gui disipuluña ya jatago para as Jesus , ilegña : Cao jago yuje y para ufato pat infanmannangga jam otro ?

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Ya anae manmato y taotao sija guiya güiya , ilegñija : Si Juan Bautista tumagojam para yya jago , ilegña : Cao jago yuje y para ufato pat infanmannangga jam otro ?

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Ya ayo mismo na ora , janafanjomlo megae ni y manmalango yan y mangaechetnotsija yan espiritun manaelaye ; yan megae na manbachet ninafanmanlie .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Ya maninepe as Jesus ya ilegña nu sija : Janao yan sangane si Juan ni y liniimiyo yan y jiningogmiyo ; sa y manbachet manmanlie , ya y mangojo manmamocat , ya y manategtog mangasgas , ya y mananga manmanjungog , y manmatae manafangajulo , ya umapredica y ibangelio gui mamobble .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Ya dichoso ayo y ti sumosoda y lugat para umatompo guiya guajo .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: N	7	24		45360	 ¶ Ya anae manmapos y mantinago as Juan , jatutujon cumuentuse y taotao sija pot si Juan : Jafa injanagüe jamyo para inlie gui desierto ? un piao ni y yinengyong ni y manglo ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Lao jafa injanagüe jamyo para inlie ? un taotao na puru suabe magaguña ? Estagüe , ayo sija y manminagagago ni y malagno magago yan manlalâlâ gui guinatbo , gui palasyon y ray nae mañasaga .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Lao jafa injanagüe para inlie ? un profeta ? magajet , jusangane jamyo na mas que un profeta .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Este yuje y esta matugue : Estagüe na jatago y tentagojo gui menan matamo , ni para ufamauleg y chalanmo gui menamo .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Jusangane jamyo , na entre ayo sija y manmafañago gui famalaoan , taya dangculoña qui si Juan ; lao y diquiqueja gui raenon Yuus dangculoña qui güiya .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Ya todo y taotao anae majungog güe , yan y publicano sija , jajustifica si Yuus ya manmatagpange ni y tinagpangen Juan .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Lao y Fariseo yan y manmagas y lay , jarechasa y consejon Yuus contra sijaja ; sa ti manmatagpange pot güiya .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Ya ilegña : Jafa nae juacompara y taotao este na generasion ? ya jafa parejonñija ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Manparejo yan y famaguon ni manmatatachong gui plasa ya manaagang uno yan otro ya ilegñija : Indadane jamyo flauta , y ti manbaela jamyo , manuugonge jamyo , ya ti manatanges jamyo .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Sa mato si Juan Bautista ni uchocho pan ni uguimen bino , ya ilelegmiyo : Guaja anitiña .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Mato y Lajin taotao , ya chumocho yan gumimen , ya ilelegmiyo : Estagüe , un taotao na gachumocho yan gagumimen bino , yan amigon y publicano sija , yan y manisao .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Lao y tiningo manacabales ni y todo famaguonña .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: N	7	36		45480	 ¶ Ya malago uno gui Fariseo sija na ufañija mañocho . Ya jumalom gui guima y Fariseo ya matachong gui lamasa .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Ya estagüe , un palaoan gui siuda , na miisao , ya anae jatungo na gaegue si Jesus matatachong gui lamasa gui guima y Fariseo , mañule un boteyan alabastro na ingüente .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Ya tumojgue gui taten Jesus , ya cumasao ; ya jatutujon munafotgon ni lagoña y adeng Jesus , ya jasaosao ni y gapuniluña ; ya jachichico y adengña ya japapalae ni y inggüente .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Ya anae jalie este y Fariseo ni y umagange güe , cumuentos gui sumanjalomña , ilelegña : Este na taotao yaguin profeta güe , jatungo jafa este na palaoan y pumapacha güe sa güiya miisao .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Simon , guaja para jasangane jao . Ya güiya ilegña : Sangan Maestro .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Un taotao guaja dos dumídibe : ya y uno mandidibe quinientos monedan denario , ya y otro sincuenta .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Ya anae taya apasñija , inasie todo y dos . Enao mina , jaye guiya sija mas güinaeya ?

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Manope si Simon , ya ilegña : Y pineloco na ayo y mas maasie ; ya güiya ilegña : Tunas jinisgamo .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Ya jabira güe guato gui palaoan , ya ilegña as Simon : Unlilie este na palaoan ? Jumalomyo gui guimamo , ti unnaeyo janom para y adengjo ; lao este janafotgon y adengjo ni lagoña , ya jasaosao ni y gapuniluña .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Jago ti unnaeyo un chico : lao este na palaoan desde que jumalomyo ti pumapara jachico y adengjo .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Ti unpalae y ilujo ni laña , lao este japalae y adengjom inggüente .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Enao mina jusangane jao , na y isaoña , ni y megae , umaasie ; sa güiya megae maguaeyaña ; lao y didide maasiiña , didide maguaeyaña .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Y isaomo maasie .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Ya y mangachochongña manmatachong gui lamasa , jatutujon sumangan gui sumanjalomñija : Jaye este na ufanasie locue isao ?

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Ya ilegña ni palaoan : Y jinengguemo unsinatba ; janao yan pas .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: YA susede un rato despues na jajanaogüe y siuda sija yan y sengsong sija manpredidica , yan numanafanungo nu y ibangelion y raenon Yuus ; ya mañisija yan y dose ,

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Ya palo sija famalaoan ni guinin nanafanmagong ni manaelayen espiritu yan y chetnot sija ; si Maria ni mafanaan magdalena ni jumuyong guiya güiya siete na manganite ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: Ya si Juana , asaguan Chusa , mayetdomon Herodes ; yan si Susana yan megae ni pumalo ni jasesetbe ni güinajañija :

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: N	8	4		45660	 ¶ Ya anae mandaña y dangculon linajyan taotao , yan y manestaba cada siuda manmato guiya güiya , jacuentuse pot un acomparasion .

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: Un tátanom jumanao para ufananom y semiyaña ; ya anae manmananom , palo podong gui oriyan chalan ; ya todo magacha , ya manmato sija y pajaro gui langet ya macano .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Yan palo mamodong gui jilo acho ; ya anae lachog , ninamalayo sa ti fofotgon .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Yan palo mamodong gui jalom tituca ; ya mandoco mañija y tituca , ya chiniguit .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yan palo mamodong gui mauleg y tano ; ya mandoco , ya manogcha siento pot uno . Ya anae esta jasangan estesija umagang : Y gaetalanga para ufanjungog , uecungog .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: N	8	9		45710	 ¶ Ya y disipuluña sija mafaesen güe : Jafa este na acomparasion ?

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Ya guiya ilegña : Esta manmannae jamyo para intingo y misterion y raenon Yuus lao y pumalo pot acomparasion ; para ujaaatanja ya ti ujalie , yan ujaecungogja ya ti ujatungo .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: Pues este ayo na acomparasion : Y semiya y sinangan Yuus .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Y gui oriyan chalan ayo sija y jagas jumungog ; ya despues mato y manganite ya janasuja y sinangan gui corasonñija sa ti mojon ufanmanjonggue ya ufanmasatba .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Ya y jilo acho , ayo sija y anae jajungog , jaresibe y sinangan nu y minagof ; lao estesija manaejale ; sa jajonggue un ratoja , lao anae mato tentasion mamodong .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Ya y pedong gui jalom tituca , este sija y jumungog ; ya mientras jumanao gui chalanñija , manchiniguit ni inadajeñiñija , yan y güinaja , yan y minagof tano gui este linâlâ , ya ti jumuyong tinegchañija cabales .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Lao ayo y mangaegue gui mauleg na tano , este sija na guinin jumungog y sinangan gui corason ni mauleg yan tunas , jamantietiene , ya manogcha yan manpasensia .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: N	8	16		45780	 ¶ Ni uno ni mañoñonggue candet , utampe nu y batde pat upolo gui papa catre , lao upolo gui jilo lamasa para y jumajalom ulie y manana .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Sa taya manaatog ya ti umafatanñaejon ; ni gae gui secreto ya ti umatungo , ujuyong gui manana .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Guesadaje jaftaemano y jiningogmiyo : sa masquesea jaye y guaja , umanae ; lao masquesea jaye y taya , unajanao ayo y pineloña na uguaja .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: N	8	19		45810	 ¶ Ayonae manmato guiya güiya si nanaña yan y mañeluña , lao tisiña manlatguato guiya güiya pot y linajyan taotao .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Ya masangane , ilegñija nu güiya : Si nanamo yan y mañelumo manmatotojgue gui sanjiyong na manmalago na unmalie .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Ya manope ya ilegña nu sija : Y nanajo yan y mañelujo , ayosija y jumungog y sinangan Yuus ya jafatinas .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: N	8	22		45840	 ¶ Ya susede y uno gui ayosija jaane nae , na jumalom gui un batco , güiya yan y disipoluña sija ; ya ilegña nu sija : Nije tafanjanao y otro banda jagoe ; ya manjanao .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Ya anae mumamayama sija , güiya maego ; ya manguaefe un dangculon , pagyo y manglo gui jagoe ; ya bula y batco janom ya mangaegue sija gui peligro .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Ya manmato guiya güiya , ya mapangon , ilegñija : Maestro , maestro , tafanmalingo . Ya magmata , ya jalalatde y manglo yan y chaochao y janom ; ya pumara , ya jumuyong malinao .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Mano nae gaegue jinengguenmiyo ? Ya sija manmaañao ya ninafanmanman , ilegñija uno yan otro : Jaye este , na asta y manglo yan y janom jatago ya maoosgueja ?

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: N	8	26		45880	 ¶ Ya manmato asta , y tano y taotao Gadara sija , ni gaegue gui sanmenan y Galilea .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Ya anae jumanao para y tano , umasoda yan un taotao gui jiyong y siuda na gaemanganite ; ya apmam na tiempo ti minagagago ni usaga gui guima , na y naftanja .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus , umagang , ya jatombagüe gui menaña ya ilegña ni dangculo na inagang : Para jafayo nu jago Jesus , Lajin Yuus Gueftaquilo ? Jusuplica jao na chamoyo sumasapet .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Sa jatago y espiritun áplacha na ufanjanao gui taotao ; sa apmam na tiempo na maguot güe : mamantiene güe preso ya magode nu y cadena yan tale sija ; ya jayamag y guinede ya quinene ni y manganite asta y desierto sija .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Ya finaesen as Jesus : Jaye naanmo ? Ya güiya ilegña : Linajyan ; sa megae na manganite manjalom guiya güiya .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Ya masuplica güe na chaña tumatago na ufanjanao para y tadong na joyo .
