text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Ya estaba güije un inetnon babue na lajyan na mañochocho gui jalom tano : ya masuplica güe na ufanpinelo ya ufanjalom güije sija . Ya manpinelo .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Ya anae manjuyong y manganite gui taotao , manjalom gui babue ya y inetnon manmanunugo sajyao guato gui un didog gui jagoe ya manmatmos .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Ya ayo sija munafañochocho y babue anae jalie y mafatinas , manmapos ya jasangane y taotao siuda yan gui fangualuan .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ya manjanao para ujalie y mafatinas ; ya manmato gui as Jesus ; ya masoda y taotao ni anae guinin jumuyong y manganite , na minagagago ya guaja jinasoña cabales , ya matatachong gui adeng Jesus ; ya ninafanmaañao .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Ya mansinangane ni lumie , jafa taemano manamagongña ayo y guinin jinatme manganite .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: N	8	37		45990	 ¶ Ayonae todo y taotao gui tano y Gadarenos yan todo y oriyan , magagao na ujanao guiya sija ; sa mansenmaañao ; ya güiya cajulo gui batco ya tumalo tate .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Lao ayo na taotao anae guinun manjuyong y manganite , siniplica güe para usaga guiya güiya ; lao janajanao ya ilegña :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: Talo guato guiya jamyo ya unfañangane jaftaemano na dangculon güinaja finatinasña si Yuus nu jago . Ya guiña jumanao , ya jasanganñaejon todo gui siuda jaftaemano finatinasña si Jesus nu güiya .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: N	8	40		46020	 ¶ Ya anae tumalo guato si Jesus maresibe ni y linajyan taotao sija ya mangosmagof ; sa todoja numananggaja .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Ya estagüe , un taotao na y naanña si Jairo , ya güiya locue magas y sinagoga ; mato ya jatombagüe papa gui adeng Jesus , ya jagagao na ujalom gui guimaña .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Sa guaja unoja jagaña na esta guaja dose años , ya estaba jijot na umatae . Ya anae jumanao maapupura güe ni linajyan taotao sija .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: N	8	43		46050	 ¶ Ya un palaoan na numanajuyong jâgâ esta dose años , esta jalachae gumasta todo y güinajaña ni jaapaseñaejon medico , lao taya siña munamagong ,

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Mato gui tateña ya japacha y madoblan magaguña , ya enseguidas esta bumasta y jâgâña .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ayonae si Jesus ilegña : Jayeyo pumacha ? Lao anae todos japune ilegña si Pedro yan y mangachongña : Maestro , y linajyan taotao umanoriya jao yan machichiguit jao ,

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Lao si Jesus ilegña : Guajayo pumacha ; sa guajo jutungo na guaja ninasiña jumuyong guiya guajo .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Ayonae y palaoan anae jalie na ti siña janaatog , mato ya manlalaolao , ya jatombagüe gui menaña , ya jasangan gui menan y taotao sija todos , pot jafa na japacha , yan jaftaemano na ninajomlo enseguidas .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Hija , y jinengguemo unninajomlo ; janao ya upas .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: N	8	49		46110	 ¶ Ya mientras cumuecuentos , mato uno ni taotao y magas y sinagoga ya ilegña : Y jagamo matae , chamo umestototba y Maestro .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Jesus manopegüe : Chamo maaañao ; jonggueja sa güiya ujomlo .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Ya anae mato gui guima , taya japolo na ujalom yan güiya na si Pedro , si Juan , yan si Santiago , yan y tatan y patgon , yan y nanaña .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ya todos mangacasao , yan malamementagüe ; lao ilegña : Chamiyo fangacasao ; sa ti matae , lao mamaego .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Ya macháchatgue güe , sa matungoja na esta matae .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Lao güiya jamantiene y canaeña ya jaagang ilegña : Patgon palaoan , cajulo .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Ya mato y espirituña talo , ya enseguidas cajulo ; ya manago na umanachocho .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Ya ninafanmanman y mañaenaña : lao jaencatga na chañija sumangangane ni un taotao jafa y mafatinas .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: YA jaagang ya mandaña y dose disipuluña ya janae ninasiña gui jilo y manganite todo , yan para ufanmanamte nu y chetnot sija .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Ya jatago na ujapredica y raenon Yuus , yan unafanjomlo y manmalango .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo fanmañuñule ni jafa para y chalan , ni baston , ni botsa , ni pan , ni salape ; ni infangaemagago dos .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Ya cuatquiera na guma nae manjalom jamyo , fañaga güije asta que manjanao jamyo .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Ya todo ayo sija y ti rumesibe jamyo , anae manjanao jamyo güije na siuda , sacude y petbos gui adengmiyo para testimonio contra sija .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Ya manjanao sija , ya manmalofan sija gui sengsong , mapredidica y ibangelio , yan mannanajomlo gui todo y lugat .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Lao si Herodes tetrarca jajungog masangan este sija na finatinas , ya estaba guefinestotba ni y sinañgan palo na si Juan esta cumajulo guinin manmatae .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Ya y pumalo ilegñija : Si Elias jumuyong talo ; ya otros umalog ; na uno gui manamco na profeta lâlâ talo .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Ya ilegña si Herodes : Si Juan guajo dumegüeya ; ya jaye este nae jujungog sija na güinaja ? Ya japrocura lumie güe .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: N	9	10		46280	 ¶ Ya anae manalo guato y apostoles sija , masangane güe todo ni y finatinasñija . Ya jacone sija ya mañuja asta un banda , gui un siuda ni mafanaan Betsaida .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Ya anae esta matungo ni y linajyan taotao sija , madálalag güe ; ya güiya jaresibe , ya jasangane ni y raenon Yuus ; ya janafanjomlo y numesesita manmaamte .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Ya y jaane jatutujon pumuenge ; ya mafatoigüe nu y dose ya ilegñija nu güiya : Nafanjanao , y linajyan taotao , para ufanjanao asta y sengsong yan y fangualuan gui oriya , ya ufañaga ya ufanmanaligao nañija ; sa mangaeguejit güine gui desierto na lugat .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jamyo innafañocho . Ya ilegñija : Taya guajata na sincoja na pan yan dos güijan , patsino nije tafanjanao tafanmamajan nengcano para todo este sija na taotao .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Ya guaja buente sinco mit na taotao . Ya ilegña ni disipuluña : Nafanmatachong pot compania , cada compania sincuenta .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Ya taegüije mafatinas , ya mannafamatachong todos .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Ya jachule y sinco na pan yan y dos güijan , ya jaatan julo y langet ya jabendise ya jaipe ; ya janae y disipoluña para upolo gui menan y linajyan taotao .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Ya mañocho ya manjaspog todos ; ya esta majatsa y sebla y pedaso sija , dose canastra .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: N	9	18		46360	 ¶ Ya susede , anae mananaetae güiyaja namaesa , estabaja mangaegue guiya güiya y disipuluña , ya jafaesensija , ilegña : Jaye ilegñiñija y taotao nu guajo ?

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: umalog : Si Elias ; yan palo umalog na uno gui manamco na profeta lâlâ talo .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Lao jamyo , jaye ilegmimiyo nu guajo ? Ya manope si Simon Pedro ya ilegña : Si Cristo , gui as Yuus .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Ya manguenesencatga sija ya jatago na chañija sumangangane ni jaye nu este ;

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Ilegña : Y Lajin taotao nesesita ufamadese megae , ya umarechasa ni y manamco sija , yan y manmagas y mamale yan y escriba sija , ya umapuno ya umanacajulo gui mina tres na jaane .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija todos : Yaguin guaja y malago tumatiyego , upunenaesa güe , ya uchule y quiluusña cada jaane ya udalalagyo .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Sa masqueseaja jaye y malago na usatba y linâlâña , ufinalingaeguan ; ya masquesea jaye y malingo y linâlâña pot y naanjo , güiya usatba .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: maesa gue ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Sa masqueseaja jaye pot y mamajlao guajo yan pot y sinanganjo , mamajlao locue nu este y Lajin taotao , yaguin mato gui minalagña yan y minalag tata yan y mañantos na angjet sija .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Lao magajet jusangane jamyo : Na guaja palo gui mangaegue güine , na ti uchague y finatae asta que ujalie y raenon Yuus .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: N	9	28		46460	 ¶ Ya susede mina ocho na jaane , despues di estesija na sinangan , jacone mañija yan Pedro , yan si Juan , yan si Santiago , ya cajulo gui egso ni taquilo para ufanaetae .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Ya mientras mananaetae güe , y jechuran mataña tolaeca ; ya y magaguña jumuyong apaca ya malag .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Ya , estagüe , dos taotao na cumuecuentos yan güiya ; ya si Moises , yan Elias ,

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Ya manjuyong yan y minalagñija , ya manguecuentos pot y jinanaoña , na para ucumple guiya Jerusalem .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Lao si Pedro yan y mangachogña , mansenmatujog ; ya anae manmagmata , malie y minalagña yan ayo na dos taotao ni mangachongña .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Ya susede , mientras sumusuja sija guiya güiya , si Pedro ilegña as Jesus : Maestro , maulegñaja tafañaga güine ; ya nije tafanmamatinas tres na tabetnaculo ; uno para jago , uno para si Moises , yan uno para si Elias ; ti jatungo jafa jasasangan .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Ya mientras jasasangan este , mato un mapagajes ya mantinampe ; ya ninafanguefmaañao anae manjalom gui mapagajes .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ya mato un inagang gui mapagajes na ilegña : Este y lajijo , inayigco ; ecungog güe .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Ya anae malofan ayo na inagang , esta masoda si Jesucristo güigüiyaja namaesa ; ya sija manmamatquiloja , ya güije sija na jaane , taya jasangane ni jaye pot y liniiñija .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: N	9	37		46550	 ¶ Ya susede inagpaña güije na jaane , anae manunog guinin y egso , ya y dangculon linajyan taotao masoda güe .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ya , estagüe , un taotao gui entalo y linajyan , na umagang ilegña : Maestro jutayuyut jao na unlie y lajijo ; sa y unoja patgonjo :

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Sa , estagüe , un espiritu na quinene , ya enseguidas umagang ; ya ninalaolao güe ya numanajuyong buo , ya aapmam na pinadese na sumuja guiya güiya , na ninalalamenja ,

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ya guinin jutayuyut y disipulumo na ujayute juyong ; ya ti manasiña .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Ya manope si Jesus ya ilegña : O generasion na ti manjonggue , yan manchatpayon ! asta ngaean nae utafanjijita , ya jujasusungon jamyo ? conieyo fan mague ni y lajimo .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Lao anae mámamamaela , y anite yinite papa ya guefninalaolao . Lao si Jesus jalalatde y espiritun áplacha ya janajomlo y patgon ya janatalo guato as tataña .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ya todos ninafanman nu y minagas Yuus , lao mientras manmamanman todos pot todo estesija ni y jafatinas , ilegña ni disipuluña ;

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: Polo ya utatcalon gui talanganmiyo este sija na sinangan : sa umaentrega y Lajin taotao gui canae taotao sija .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Lao sija ti jatungo este na sinangan , ya manafaninatogüe para chañija tumutungo : ya manmaañao mafaesen güe ni ayo na sinangan .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: N	9	46		46640	 ¶ Ya jumuyong manafaesen entre sija , jaye guiya sija udangculoña .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Lao si Jesus anae jaliija y jinason y corasonñija , jacone un patgon ya japolo gui bandaña ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jaye y rumesibe este na patgon pot naanjo jaresibeyo ; ya y rumesibeyo , jaresibe y tumagoyo ; sa jaye y mas diquique guiya jamyo , ayo dangculo .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: N	9	49		46670	 ¶ Ya manope si Juan ya ilegña : Maestro inlie uno na manyuyute juyong y manganite pot y naanmo ; ya inchema sa ti jadadalalagjit .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus ni sija ; chamiyo chumochoma , sa ayo ni ti contra jamyo , guiya para jamyo .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: N	9	51		46690	 ¶ Ya susede , anae mato y jaane nae jijot para umaresibe gui sanjilo ; janameton y mataña para ujanao para Jerusalem ,

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Ya manago tentago sija na ufanmofona gui menaña ; ya majanao manjalom gui un songsong Samaritano , para umanalistuye güe güije .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Ya ti maresibe güe , sa y mataña meton para ujananao para Jerusalem .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Ya anae malie este ni disipuluña , si Santiago , yan si Juan , ilegñija : Señot , malago jao ya utafanmanago ya utunog guafe guinin y langet , ya ufanlinachae ?

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Ayonae jabira güe ya manlinalatde .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Ya manjanao para y otro songsong .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: N	9	57		46750	 ¶ Ya anae manjajanao sija , un taotao ilegña nu güiya gui chalan : Señot , bae judalalagjao manoja y unjanao guato .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu güiya : Y sora sija mangaeliyang , ya y pajaro sija gui langet mangaechenchon ; lao y Lajin taotao taya sangaña ni anae para upolo y iluña .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Ya ilegña ni otro : Dalalagyo . Ya güiya ilegña ; Señot , sottayo naya ya finenana jujanao ya jujafot si tatamo .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Lao ilegña nu güiya : Polo y manmatae ya ufanajafot y manmataeñija ; lao jago janao ya unpredica y raenon Yuus .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Ya ilegña locue otro ; judalalagja jao Señot ; lao sottayo naya ya judespideyo ni y mangaegue guiya jame .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus : Ni uno ni pumopolo y canae gui alado ya uatan tateña ni y digno para y raenon Yuus .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: ANAE munjayan este sija na güinaja , jaayig y Señot otro setenta , ya jatago dos en dos gui menaña para todo y siuda yan ayo na lugat anae para ufato güe .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Y cosecha megae , lao y manmachochocho didide ; enaomina gagao y Señot y cosecha , ya ufanago ni manmachochocho para y cosechaña .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Fanjanao gui chalanmiyo ; estagüe na jutago jamyo taegüije quinilo gui entalo y lobo sija .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Chamiyo fanmañuñule botsa ni maleta , ni sapatos : ni jaye insaluda gui jinanaonmiyo .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Masqueseaja mano na guma nae manjalom jamyo , finenana in alog : Pas para este na guma .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Yaguin guaja güije patgon y pas , y pasmiyo usaga guiya güiya ; yaguin taya , utalo guato guiya jamyo .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Fañaga güije na guma , fañocho yan infanguimen todo y manmanaenmiyo ; sa y machochoeho ufanmerese nu y apasña . Chamiyo fanjajanao guma pot guma .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Ya masquesea mano na siuda nae manjalom jamyo , ya manmaresibe jamyo , cano jafa y manmasajyane jamyo .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Ya nafanjomlo y manmalango ni guaja güije , ya inalog nu sija : y raenon Yuus esta mato guiya jamyo .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Lao masqueseaja mano na suida nae manjalom jamyo , ya ti manmaresibe jamyo , fanjanao gui cayeñija , ya inalog :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Asta y petbos ni jachetune y adengmame güine gui siudanmiyo , insacude contra jamyo ; lao tingo este na y raenon Yuus mato jijot guiya jamyo .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo : mas sungunon Sodoma güije na jaane qui ayo na siuda .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Ay ! ay ! jao Corasin : ay ! ay ! jao Betsaida ! sa yaguin guiya Tiro yan Sidon nae manmafatinas este sija na mannamanman y manmafatinas guiya jamyo , jagas sen amco manmañotsot , infanmatachong gui silisio yan y apo .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Enaomina mas sungunon Tiro yan Sidon qui para jamyo gui jaanin y sentensia .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Ya jago Capernaum , unacajulo jao asta y langet ? umachule papa asta sasalaguan .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Y jumungog jamyo , jajungogyo ; ya y dumesecha jamyo , jadesechayo ; ya y dumesechayo , jadesecha y tumagoyo .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: N	10	17		46970	 ¶ Ya manalo guato y setenta yan y minagofñija , ya ilegñija : Señot , asta y manganite insujejeta pot y naanmo .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Julie si Satanas taegüije y lamlam ni y pedong guinin y langet .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Estagüe , na junae jamyo ninasiña para ingacha y culebla , yan y alacran , yan y jilo todo y ninasiñan y enemigo , ya taya siña munafanlamen jamyo .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Lao chamiyo ninafanmamagof pot este , pot y espiritu sija ni insujejeta ; lao fanmagof jamyo pot y naanmiyo ni esta matugue gui langet .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: N	10	21		47010	 ¶ Ya ayoja na ora magof si Jesus gui Espiritu Santo ya ilegña : Junae jao grasia , O Tata , Señot y langet yan y tano , sa unana este sija na güinaja gui manmejnalom yan manmanungo , ya unfanue gui mandiquique ; junggan Tata , sa taegüine nae senmagof gui menamo .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Todo y güinaja sija jagasja jaentregayo y Tatajo ; ya taya tumungo jaye y Lajiña , na y Tataja ; ya jaye y Tata , na y Lajiñaja , yan ayo y minalago y lajiña ufinanue .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Ya jabiragüe guato gui disipulo sija , ya ilegña : Mandichoso y atadog ni manmanlie nu estesija ni y liniinmiyo :

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Sa jusangane jamyo , na megae na profeta yan ray sija , dumesesea na ulie nu estesija ni y liniinmiyo , ya ti malie ; yan ujajungog nu estesija ni y jiningogmiyo ya ti jajungog .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: N	10	25		47050	 ¶ Ya , estagüe , un magas y lay na tumojgue julo ya tinietientagüe , ya ilegña : Maestro , jafa jufatinas para juereda y taejinecog na linâlâ ?

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Jafa matugue gui tinago ? jafa untataetae ?

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ya güiya manope , ilegña : Guaeya y Señot Yuosmo contodo gui corasonmo , yan contodo y antimo , yan contodo y minetgotmo , yan contodo y tiningomo ; yan y tiguangmo taegüije iya jago namaesa .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Mauleg inepemo : fatinas este , ya unlâlâ .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Lao güiya , malago na unatunas maesa güe , ilegña as Jesus : Ya jaye tiguangjo ?

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Ya inepe as Jesus ya ilegña : Un taotao tumunog guinin Jerusalem asta Jerico , ya podong gui entalo y manaque ; y machule y magaguña ya manachetnudan güe , ya manjanao ya mapolo cana matae .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Ya susede na un pale tumunog güijeja na chalan ; ya anae jalie malofanja gui otro banda .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Taegüijeja locue un Lebita , anae mato jijot güije na lugat , ya jaatanja , ya malofanja gui otro banda .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Ya un Samaritano , anae jumajanao güije na chalan , mato lugat nae gaegue güe , ya anae jalie , ninamaase ,

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Ya mato guato guiya güiya jabee y chetnot sija ya janaye laña yan bino ; ya janamaudae gui gaña gâgâ , ya jacone asta y guima publico ya jaadaje .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: anae para ujanaojachule dos denarion salape ya janae y magas y guima , ya ilegña nu güiya : Guesadaje güe ; ya todo y palo na gastomo despues , yaguin tumaloyo mague , juapase jao .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Ya jaye y tiguang entre y tres , pot ayo y pedong gui entalo y manaque ?

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña : Ayo y maase nu güiya . Ayonae ilegña Janao ya unfatinas locue taegüije .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: N	10	38		47180	 ¶ Ya anae jumajanao , jumalom gui un songsong ; ya un palaoan na y naanña si Marta rinesibegüe gui guimaña .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Ya guaja uno cheluña palaoan na y naanña si Maria , na locue matatachongja gui adeng Jesus , ya jaecungogja y sinanganña .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Lao si Marta esta inestotba pot megae sinetbeña , ya mato guiya güiya , ya ilegña : Señot , ada ti unlie y chelujo na upaloyo ya jufañeñetbeja na maesa ? Tago ya uayudayo .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Ya inepe as Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Marta , Marta , esta jago inestotba ya guesmanadaje jao , pot megae na güinaja :

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Lao unoja manesesita ; ya si Maria jaayig ayo mauleg na patte ni ti umachule guiya güiya .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: YA susede anae mananaetae güe gui un lugat , ya magpo , uno gui disipuluña ilegña nu güiya : Señot , fanagüejam manmanaetae , taegüije locue as Juan ni jafanagüe y disipuluña !

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Ya ilegña na sija : Yaguin manmanaetae jamyo alog : Tata , Umatuna y naanmo . Umamaela y raenomo ,

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Naejam pago cada jaane ni y nengcanomame .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ya unasiijam ni isaomame ; sa jame locue inasisie todo ayo y dumidibe jam . Ya chamojam pumopolo gui tentasion .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: N	11	5		47270	 ¶ Ya ilegña nu sija : Jaye guiya jamyo y gaeamigo uno , ya ufinatoigüe gui tatalopuenge , ya ualog nu güiya : Amigo naayaoyo tres pan ;

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Sa un amigojo mato guiya guajo guinin bumiaje , ya taya ni jafa para juplantaye gui menaña ;

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Ya ayo y gaegue gui sumanjalom ufanope , ya ualog : Chamo umatbororotayo ; sa esta majuchom y petta , ya estagüejam gui cama yan y famaguonjo ; ti siñayo cajulo ya junae jao .

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo : Achogja ti ucajulo ya uninae pot y amiguña : lao pot y magagaoña , ucajulo ya unae jaftaemano y janesesita .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo : Gagao , ya infanmanae ; aligao ya inseda ; yajo , ya infanmababaye .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Sa jayeja y mangagao uresibe ; ya y manaligao usoda ; ya y manayajo , umababaye .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Pat jaye guiya jamyo na tata , yan uguinagao ni y lajiña un pan , ya unnae un acho ? pat un güijan ya enbes di güijan unnae culebla ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Pat yan guinagao un chada , ada unnae un alacran ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Pues ombre jamyo , ni y manaelaye , intingo numae mauleg na ninae y famaguonmiyo , cuanto mas y Tatanmiyo gui langet unae ni y Espiritu Santo todo ayo y gumagao güe ?

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: N	11	14		47360	 ¶ Ya jayute juyong un anite na udo . Ya susede anae jumuyong este y anite , y ido cumuentos , ya y linajyan taotao sija ninafanmanman .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Ya palo guiya sija ilegñija : Pot si Beetsebub , ni magas y manganite , na jayuyuteja juyong y manganite sija .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Lao y pumalo matietientagüe , magagagao un señat gui langet .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Lao güiya jatungo y jinason ayo sija ya ilegña nu sija : Todo y raeno umadibide contra güiyaja , uyulang ; ya y guima umadibide contra guma , upodong .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Yaguin si Satanas locue madibide contra güiya namaesa , jaftaemano y raenoña sumaga ? Sa ilegmiyo na juyuyute juyong y manganite pot si Beetsebub .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Lao yaguin junajujuyong y manganite pot si Beetsebub , pot jaye y famaguonmiyo ufanyinite sija juyong ? Enaomina sija ufanjues para jamyo .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Lao yaguin pot y calulot Yuus nae , juyuyute juyong y manganite , magajet na y raenon Yuus mato guiya jamyo .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Yaguin un taotao ni matatnga , ya jafamauleg y atmasña , ya japulan y guimaña : todo güinajaña , manseguro .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Lao anae mato otro na matatngaña qui güiya ya inañao , inamot ni atmasña anae jaangoco güe ya jafacae y güinajaña .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Ayo y ti jumujame , contra guajo yuje ; ya ayo y ti rumecocoge guiya guajo machalapon .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Ya y espiritun áplacha , anae jumuyong gui taotao , jumajanao gui anglo na lugat , manaliligao dinescansa ; ya anae ti mañoda , ilegña : Bae talo guato gui guimajo anae jumanaoyo .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Ya anae mato , jasoda mabale yan maadotna .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Ya jumanao ya mangone yan güiya otro siete espiritu mas manaelayeña qui güiya , ya jumalom ya sumaga güije : ya taelayeña y uttimoña ayo na taotao qui y finena .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: N	11	27		47490	 ¶ Ya susede anae jasangan estesija , un palaoan gui linajyan taotao , umagang ilegña nu güiya : Dichoso ayo na tuyan y chumuchulejao , yan ayo na pecho y anae sumususo jao .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Lao güiya ilegña : junggan , lao dichosuña ayo y jumungog y sinangan Yuus , ya jaadaje .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: N	11	29		47510	 ¶ Ya anae manetnon y linajyan taotao guiya güiya , jatutujon sumangan : Este na generasion manaelaye : manmanaliligao señat ; lao ti ufanmannae nu señat mas na ayoja y señat Jonas .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Sa taegüije si Jonas y señat para y taotao Ninibe taegüijeja locue y Lajin taotao para güine na generasion .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Y raenan sanjaya cumajulo gui jaanin juisio yan y taotao este na generasion ya manquinendena ; sa mato guinin y uttimon y tano para uecungog y minalate Salomon ; ya estagüeja uno dangculoña qui si Salomon gaegue guine na lugat .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Y taotao sija guiya Ninibe , ufangajulo gui jaanin juisio yan este na generasion ya manquinendena ; sa manmañotsot pot y prenedican Jonas ; ya estagüe uno mas dangculoña qui si Jonas gaegue güine na lugat .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: N	11	33		47550	 ¶ Taya ni un taotao munaaatog gui bedega y candet ni esta masonggue , ni upolo gui papa ganta , sino y candelero para todo y manjajalom ujalie y manana .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Y candet y taotao , y atadog ; yaguin y atadogmo sensiyo todo y tataotaomo maninina ; lao yaguin taelaye , y tataotaomo locue bula jomjom .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Atan pues sa y manana ni y gaegue guiya jago , munga jomjom .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Enao mina yaguin todo y tataotaomo bula manana , ni mano na lugat nae guaja jomjom , cabales na ubula manana , taegüije y yanguin malag ininaña y candet ya inina jao .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: N	11	37		47590	 ¶ Ya mientras cumuecuentos , un Fariseo siniplicagüe na usija chumocho , ya jumalom ya matachong gui lamasa .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Lao y Fariseo ninamanman anae jalie este , pot y ti jafagase güe finena antes di uchocho .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña nu güiya : Pago jamyo ni Fariseo , y sumanjiyongja gui copa yan plato innagagasgas , lao y sumanjalommiyo bula inamot an tinaelaye .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Manaejinaso jamyo , ada ayo y fumatinas gui sumanjiyong , ti güiya locue y fumatinas gui sumanjalom ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Lao todo y guajanmiyo naenñaejon limosña ; ya estagüe na todo ufangasgas para jamyo .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: N	11	42		47640	 ¶ Lao ay , ay jamyo Fariseo ! ni infanmannae diesmos nu y yetba buena yan laruda yan todo golae ; ya innafapos y tininas yan y güinaeyan Yuus . Estesija nesesita infatinas , sin pelo y pumalo .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: Ay , ay jamyo Fariseo ! sa ingüaeya etmas manaquilo na tachong gui sinagoga , yan y sinaluda sija gui metcado .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Ay ay jamyo ! sa calang jamyo naftan ni ti malilie ; ya y taotao sija manmalolofanja gui sumanjilo ya ti matungo .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: N	11	45		47670	 ¶ Ya manope un magas y lay , ilegña nu güiya : Maestro , yaguin unsangan estesija unlatdejam locue .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Lao güiya ilegña : Ay ay jamyo locue y manmagas y lay ! sa innafanmangangatga y taotao sija ni ayo na catga y macat para uchule , ya ni un calolotmiyo innainete para inayuda .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: Ay , ay jamyo ! sa infatinas y naftan , y profeta sija , ya y tatanmiyo pumuno .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Taegüine mantestigo jamyo , ya inconsienteja y checho y tatanmiyo ; sa sija magajet pumuno , ya jamyo fumatinas y naftanñija .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Enaomina ilegña y minalate Yuus : Bae managoyo profeta yan apostoles para sija ; ya megae guiya sija inpino yan inpetsigue :

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Sa guinin este na generasion manesesita machule y jâgâ todo y profeta , ni manmachuda desde y tutujon y tano ;

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Desde jâgâ Abel , asta y jâgâ Sacharias , ni y matae gui entalo y attat yan y templo ; magajet , jusangane jamyo na umanesesita machule guinin este na generasion .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: Ay ay jamyo y manmagas y lay ! sa innajanao y yaben tiningo ; ya ti infanjalom jamyo yan y mangequejalom inchechema .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: N	11	53		47750	 ¶ Ya anae jumuyong güije , y escribas yan y Fariseos sija , matutujon ma afuefuetsas ya macacase para usigue cumuentos megae ;

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: Maespipia , para umaquechule jafa guinin y pachotña .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: YA ayo na tiempo , anae mandaña megae na mit na linajyan taotao , asta managacha uno yan otro ; ya jatutujon sumangane y disipuluña sija finenana : Adaje jamyo ni y libaduran y Fariseo sija ni y hipocresia .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Sa taya na matatampe na ti umababa ; pat mananana , na ti umatungo .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Enaomina jafa guinin sinanganmiyo gui jemjom , umajungog gui manana ; ya jafa y incuentuse gui talanga gui jalom aposento , umaagangnaejon gui jilo guma .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo ni y amigujo sija : Chamiyo fanmaaañao ni ayo sija y pumuno y tataotao , sa an munjayan ayo , taya jafa siña ujafatinas .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Lao jusangane jamyo jaye inmaañagüe : Fanmaañao jamyo ni ayo y yanguin munjayan japuno , guaja ninasiñaña na uyute asta sasalaguan : Junggan , jusangañe jamyo : Fanmaañao jamyo nu güiya .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: Ada ti mabende sinco na pajaro , pot dos na octabo ? ya ni uno guiya sija mamalefañaejon gui menan Yuus ?

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Lao asta y gaponulonmiyo esta manmatufong . Chamiyo fanmaaañao : sa manbaliña jamyo qui y megae pajaro .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: N	12	8		47840	 ¶ Ya jusangane jamyo : Jayeja y comonfesatñaejonyo gui menan y taotao sija ; uquinenfesatñaejon locue ni y Lajin taotao gui menan y angjet Yuus .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Lao ayo y pumuneyo gui menan taotao sija , siempre pune güe gui menan y angjet Yuus .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: Ya jayeja y cumuentos contra y Lajin taotao , umaasie ; lao y chumatfino contra Espiritu Santo , ti umaasie .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: Ya anae manmacone jamyo gui menan y sinagoga sija , yan y manmagas , yan y gaesisiña , chamiyo madadaje jaftaemano yan jafa para inepe , ni jafa para insangan ;

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Sa y Espiritu Santo infanfinanagüe güije na ora jafa para insangan .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: N	12	13		47890	 ¶ Ya uno gui linajyan taotao ilegña nu güiya : Maestro , tayo y chelujo ya ufacaeyo ni y erensia .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Lao ilegña nu güiya : Taotao , jaye pumoloyo gui jilomo para jues , pat para mamacae ?

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Atan , ya inguesadaje jamyo ni y linagga : sa y linâlâ y taotao , ti guinin y manadan güinaja sija ni y jasagagaye .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Ya mansinangane un parabola , ilegña : y fangualuan un taotao na rico , jumujuyong megae na quineco .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Ya manjaso gui sumanjalomña , ilegña : Jafa jufatinas , sa taya mano nae jupolo y quinecojo .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Ya ilegña : Este bae jufatinas : bae jujala papa y lanchoco , ya jujatsa y mas dangculo ; ya ayo nae jupolo todo y maiisso yan y güinajajo .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Ya jualog ni y antijo : Ante , megae güinajamo , para megae na sacan ; descansa , ya unchocho , yan unguimen , yan unmagof .

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Lao si Yuus ilegña nu güiya : Taejinaso jao ! pago na puenge nesesita umachule y antimo : ya para jaye ayo sija na güinaja ni unnaetnon ?

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Taegüenaoja y manaetnon y güinaja para güiyaja , ya ti urico para si Yuus .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: N	12	22		47980	 ¶ Ya ilegña ni y disipoluña sija : Enaomina jusangane jamyo , Chamiyo madadaje pot y linâlânmiyo , jafa para incano ; ni y tataotaonmiyo , jafa para innaminagago .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Sa y linâlâ mas qui y nengcano , ya y tataotao mas qui y magago .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Jaso y aga sija , na ti manmanananom , ni ufanmangoco ; ni uguaja sagannengcanoñija ni lancho ; ya si Yuus janachocho sija ; ya cuanto mas manmauleg jamyo qui y pajaro !

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Yan jaye guiya jamyo pot inadaje siña uaumenta un codo y linecaña ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Yanguin ti siña inchegüe y mas diquique , para jafa inadadaje y pumalo ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Jaso y lirio sija , jaftaemano mandocoñiñija ! ti manmachochocho , ni ufanmanjila ; ya jusangane jamyo na si Salomon contodo y minalagña , ti minagago parejo yan uno guiya sija .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Yanguin si Yuus janafanminagago y chaguan qui fangualuan ni y gaegue pago , ya agupa esta mayute guato gui jetno ; ti mas magajet na inninafanminagago jamyo , O jamyo didide na jinenggue ?

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Ya chamiyo umaliligao jafa para incano , ni jafa para inguimen , ni infanbuébuente gui jinasonmiyo .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Sa todo este sija na güinaja manmaaliligao ni y nasion sija gui tano : lao y tatanmiyo jatungoja na innesesita estesija na güinaja .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Lao aligao finena y raenoña ; ya todo este sija na güinaja umanafandaña para jamyo .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: Chamiyo fanmaaañao , jamyo diquique na manada ; sa este minagof y tatanmiyo , na infanninae ni y raeno .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Bende y güinajamo , ya unfannae . limosna ; fanmamamauleg botsa ni ti ubijo , un güinaja gui langet na ti ufatta , anae ti usineda ni y saque , ni ti upotliya .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Sa manoja nae gaegue y güinajamo , ayoja nae gaegue locue y corasonmo .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: N	12	35		48110	 ¶ Polo ya esta madudog y senturanmiyo , ya esta masonggue y candet miyo ;

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: Ya infanparejo yan ayo na taotao sija y jananangga y señotñija , yanguin tumalo guato guinin y guipot umasagua ; sa para yanguin mato ya manyajo , umababaye enseguidas .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Mandichoso ayo sija na tentago , yanguin mato y señot , mansineda manbebela ; magajet jusangane jamyo , na ududog güe , ya unafanmatachong para ufañocho , ya ufalag y sumanmena ya usetbe sija .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Ya yanguin ufato gui segundo na bela ya gui tetsero , ya mansineda sija taegüijeja , mandichoso ayo sija na tentago .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Este tingo na yanguin y tata gui guima mojon jatungo jafa na ora nae ufato y saque , upulan ya ti upolo na umayulang y guimaña .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Enaomina nafanlisto jamyo locue , sa ufato y Lajin taotao , güije na ora gui anae ti injajaso .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: N	12	41		48170	 ¶ Ayonae ilegña si Pedro : Señot , unsangan este na acomparasion para jame , pat para todos ?

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña : Jaye nae ayo y mauleg yan mejnalom na mayetdomo , ni y ninamagas ni y señotña gui güinajana , para uninanae naña gui tiempoña ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Dichoso ayo na tentago y yanguin mato y señotña , sineda na jachochogüe taegüije .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo ; na uninamagas gui jilo y güinajaña , todo .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Lao yanguin ayo na tentago y ilegña gui jalom corasonña : Y señotjo caeja mato ; ya jatutujon pumanag y famalaoan na tentago , yan y lalaje ; ya chumocho , yan gumimen , ya bumolacho ;

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: Y señot ayo na tentago , ufato güije na jaane gui anae ti jananangga , yan gui ora anae ti jatungo , ya uninasuja , ya uninafandaña y patteña yan y ti manmanjonggue .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: Ya ayo na tentago y jatungo y minalago y señotña ; ya ti jalisto güe , ni jafatinas jaftaemano y minalagoña , umasaulag megae .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Lao ayo y ti jatungo , ya jafatinas digno na umasauleg , lao didide masaulagña . Sa jayeja y megae manaiña , siempre megae uchule , ya jaye y megae catgoña , mas megae magagaoña .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: N	12	49		48250	 ¶ Matoyo para juyute y guafe gui jilo tano : ya jafa malagojo yanguin esta todo mañiñila ?

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Lao guaja tagpangeco para jumatagpange ; ya jafa chachatsagajayo asta qui umacumple !

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Injajaso jamyo na matoyo para junae pas y tano ? Jusangane jamyo , na aje ; lao mas para inaguaguat .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Sa desde pago sigue mona , uguaja gui un guma sinco na ti manparejo , y tres contra y dos , ya y dos contra y tres .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Y tata uaguaguat contra y lajiña , ya y laje contra y tata ; ya y nana contra y jagaña , ya y jaga contra y nana ; y suegra contra y yetna , ya y yetna contra y suegraña .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: N	12	54		48300	 ¶ Ya ilegña locue ni y taotao sija : Yanguin inlilie y mapagajes na cajulo gui sumanlichan , siempre ilelegmiyo : Mamamaela y ichan ; ya magajet .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Ya yanguin manguaefe y manglo sanjaya , ilelegmiyo : Uguaja maepe ; ya ufato .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Manhipocrita jamyo ; intingo umegsamina y langet , yan y tano ; ya jafa na ti intingo umegsamina y tiempo pago ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: Ya jafa na ni jamyo ti injisga jafa y tinas ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Ya mientras jumanao jao yan y enemigumo para y magas , procura munaquelibre jao gui jinanaomo ; na noseaja uninarastra guato gui jues , ya y jues uninentrega gui ofisiat , ya y ofisiat unpinelo gui calaboso .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Jusangane jao : Ti unjanao juyong güije , asta qui unapase y uttimo na marabidi .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: YA mangaegue güije na tiempo taotao sija , ni masangane güe pot y Galileo sija , ni si Pilatos janadaña y jâgâñija yan y inefresenñija .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Ya si Jesus manope ya ilegña nu sija : Jinasonmiyo na este sija na Galileo , mas manisao qui todo Galileo sija na japadese ayo sija ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Jusangane jamyo na aje ; sa yanguin ti manmañotsot jamyo , manparejoja jamyo manáchamalingo .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Pat ayo sija y diesiocho ni y podong y tore gui jiloñija guiya Siloe ya manpinino , jinasonmiyo na mas manisao ayo sija qui todo y taotao ni y mañasaga Jerusalem ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Jusangane jamyo na aje ; sa yanguin ti manmañotsot jamyo , manparejoja jamyo manáchamalingo .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: N	13	6		48410	 ¶ Ya jasangan este na acomparasion : Un taotao guaja y trongcon igos na matanme gui fangualuanña ; ya anae mato para uegaga cao guaja tinegchaña , ti mañoda .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Ya ilegña ni y lancheruña : Esta guaja tres años ni matoyo güine na trongcon igos , manegagayo tinegcha , ya taya nae mañodayo ; utut papa ; para jafa na jaocucupa y tano ?

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Ya manope ilelegña nu güiya : Señot , polo pago na año ya juguadog y oriyaña , ya junaye estietcot :

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Ya yanguin ufanogcha , mauleg ; yanguin aje , siempre , unutut .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: N	13	10		48450	 ¶ Ya estaba na mamananagüe gui un sinagoga , gui sabado na jaane .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Ya estagüe un palaoan , na guaja un espiritun malango guiya güiya esta diesiocho años , ya esta ninaojlo , ya tisiña tumacho .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Ya anae linie as Jesus , inagang ya ilegña nu güiya : Palaoan , libre jao gui malangumo .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Ya japolo y canaeña gui jiloña ; ya enseguidas ninatunas , ya jaalaba si Yuus .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Lao y magas sinagoga lalalo sa si Jesus , numanajomlo gui sabado na jaane , ya manope ilegña nu y linajyan taotao sija : Guaja saes na jaane para ufanmachocho y taotao sija : ya este nae mauleg mato para numajomlo ; lao ti y sabado na jaane .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Ayonae inepe ni y Señot , ya ilegña : Hipocrita jamyo , ada ti siña cada uno guiya jamyo upula y gaña guaca , pat asno gui pesebre , ya ucone ya unaguimen gui sabado na jaane ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ya ti siña este na palaoan , ni y jagan Abraham , ni guinede as Satanas diesiocho años , manalibre gui magodeña , gui sabado na jaane ?

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Ya anae jasangan estesija , todo y enemiguña ninafan mamajlao ; ya todo y taotao sija ninafanmagof , pot todo y sennamagof na güinaja ni y machogüe pot güiya .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: N	13	18		48530	 ¶ Pot enao ilegña : Jafa parejuña y raenon Yuus ? yan jafa nae juacompara ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Parejo yan y granon y semiyan mustasa , ni y jachule y taotao , ya jatanme gui jalom jardinña ; ya docó , ya jumuyong trongcon jayo ; ya esta y pajaro sija gui langet mañaga gui ramasña .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Ya ilegña talo : Jafa nae juacompara y raenon Yuus .

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Parejo yan y libadura , ni jachule un palaoan , ya janaatog gui tres medidan arina , asta qui todo manespongja .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: N	13	22		48570	 ¶ Ya jumajanao gin chalaña , malag y siuda sija , yan y sengsong mamananagüe , ya jumajananao para Jerusalem .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ya ilegña uno nu güiya : Señot , didide manmasatba ? si Jesus ilegña nu sija ,

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Guefprocura mangejalom gui maiot na potta ; sa jusangane jamyo na megae prumocucura mangejalom , lao ti mansiña .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Yanguin y magas y guima jayasja cajulo ya jajuchom y petta , ya intitujon jamyo manmanojgue gui sumanjiyong ya inyajo y petta , ya ilegmi miyo : Señot , babayejam : ya ufanope ya ualog nu jamyo : Ti jutungo manguinemano jamyo :

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Ya intitujon umalog : Guinin mañochojam yan manguimenjam gui menamo , yan mamanagüe jam gui cayenmame .

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Lao güiya ualog : Jusangane jamyo , na ti jutungo manguinemano jamyo : fañuja guiya guajo , todos jamyo ni y chumogüe y tinaelaye .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Ya ayonae uguaja cumasao , yan chegcheg nifen , yanguin inlie si Abraham , yan si Ysaac , yan si Jacob , yan todo y profeta sija , gui raenon Yuus ; ya jamyo infanmachoneg juyong .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ya ufanmato manguinen y sancatan yan y sanlichan , yan y sanlago yan y sanjaya ; ya ufanmatachong gui raenon Yuus .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Ya estagüe na guaja manuttimo ya ufanfinenana , y guaja manfinenana ya ufanuttimo .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: N	13	31		48660	 ¶ Ya ayo na ora , manmato Fariseo sija ya ilegñija nu güiya : Janao ya unsuja güine ; sa malago si Herodes na unpinino .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Janao , sangane ayo na sora , na estagüe , na juyute juyong y anite sija , yan manaamteyo pago na jaane yan agupa , ya y mina tres na jaane ufonjayanyo .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Lao nesesita jufamocat pago yan agupa yan y inagpaña , sa ti siña na ufalingo y profeta gui Jerusalem .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: O Jerusalem ! Jerusalem ! ni y unpuno y profeta sija , yan unfagas ni acho ayo sija y manmatago para güiya ! cuanto biaje malagoyo na junafandaña y famaguonmo , taegüije y ponidera janafandaña y poyitasña gui papa papaña , ya timalago jamyo !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Estagüe na manmapoluye jamyo ni y guimanmiyo taetaotao ; ya jusangane jamyo : Ti inliiyo , asta qui mato ayo na tiempo anae inalog : Dichoso ayo y mamamaela ni y naan y Señot .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: YA susede na anae jumalom gui guima un magas Fariseo , para uchocho pan , gui sabado na jaane , ya sija maespipiaja .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Ya , estagüe , un taotao gaegue gui menaña na malango binaya .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ya manope si Jesus , ya jacuentuse manmagas y lay , yan y Fariseo sija , ilegña : Tunas numajomlo gui sabado na jaane pat aje ?

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Ya sija manmamatquiquiloja . Ayonae jacone güe , ya janajomlo , ya jasotta na ujanao .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ya jaope sija ilegña : Jaye guiya jamyo , yanguin guaja gaña asno pat guaca , podong gui jalom tupo , ada ti enseguidas ujatsa gui sabado na jaane ?

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Ya ti siña talo manmanope ni estesija .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: N	14	7		48770	 ¶ Ya jasangan un acomparasion ni y manmaconbida , anae jaatituye ni y jaayig y mas managquilo na tachong gui lamasa ; ya ilegña nu sija :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: Yanguin quinenbida jao ni un taotao para y guipot , chamo fatatachong gui mas tagquilo na tachong ; sa ufato otro na mas onrao qui jago , ni y quinenbidaña locue ;

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Ya ufato y cumonbida jao ya ualog nu jago : Nae este lugat y este taotao ; ya ayonae untutujon mumamajlao yanguin sumaga jao gui mas uttimo na lugat .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Lao yanguin quinenbida jao , janao ya fatachong gui mas tagpapa na lugat ; sa yanguin mato y cumonbida jao , ualog nu jago : Amigo , janao falag iya jululo ; ya ayonae unguaja inenra gui menan ayo sija y mangachongmo ni y manmatachong gui lamasa .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Sa jayeja y manataquilo maesa güe , unaumitde güe ya y umunaumitde güe , umanataquilo .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: N	14	12		48820	 ¶ Ya ilegña nu ayo y guinin cumonbida güe : Yanguin mamatinas jao nataloane pat sena , chamo umagagange y manamigumo sija , ni y mañelumo , ni y manparientesmo , ni y manrico na tiguangmo ; sa noseaja unmaconbida locue talo , ya unmaapase .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Lao yanguin gumupot jao , agange y mamoble , yan y manmanco yan y mancojo , yan y manbachet ;

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Ya undichoso ; sa ti siña maapase jao ; lao unmaapase gui quinajulo y manunas .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: N	14	15		48850	 ¶ Ya anae jajungog este , uno gui mangachongña ni y manmatachong gui lamasa , ilegña nu güiya : Dichoso ayo y uchocho pan gui raenon Yuus .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Lao ilegña nu güiya : un taotao jafatinas un dangculon sena , ya mangonbida megae :

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Ya jatago y tentagoña gui oran sena , na ualog ni ayo sija y manmaconbida : Nije ; sa esta todo listo .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Ya jatutujon cada uno umescusa güe . Y fenenana ilegña : Mamajanyo un pidason tano , ya nesesitayo jujanao ya julie ; jugagao jao na unescusayo .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Ya y otro ilegña : Mamajanyo sinco pares na nobiyo para mancareta , ya bae jujanao ya juchague : jugagao jao na unescusayo .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Ya y otro ilegña : Umasaguayo , ya enaomina ti siñayo mato .
