text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Ya tumalo guato y tentago , ya janatungo y senotña nu este sija . Ayo nae y magas y guima ninagoslalalo , ya ilegña ni y tentagoña : Janao , lasajyao falag y caye sija yan y chalan gui siudad , ya uncone mague y mamoble , yan y mancojo , yan y manbachet , yan y manmanco .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Ya ilegña y tentago : Señot , esta mafatinas y tinagomo , ya trabia guaguajaja lugat .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Ya y señot ilegña ni y tentagoña : Janao falag y dangculo na chalan yan y lugat ni y guaja ngangao , ya unafuetsas sija , ya ufanjalom para ubula y guimajo .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Sa jusangane jamyo , na ni uno güije sija gui guinin manmaconbida , uchague y senajo .

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: N	14	25		48950	 ¶ Ya mañisija mangaegue yan un dangculon manadan taotao ; ya jabira güe , ya ilegña nu sija :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Achogja un taotao mato guiya guajo , ya ti jachatlie si tataña , yan si nanaña , yan y asaguaña , yan y famaguonña , yan mañeluña lalaje , yan y mañeluña famalaoan , yan y linâlâña locue , ti siñagüe disipulujo .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ya jayeja y ti cumatga y quiluusña , ya dumalalag yo ; ti siñagüe disipulojo .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: Sa jaye guiya jamyo , ujaso manjatsa un tore , ya ti ufatachong finena ya utufong y para gastoña cao siña uninafunjayan ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Sa noseaja yanguin esta japolo y simiento , ya ti siña janafunjayan ; todo y lumie jatutujon manmanbotlea nu güiya ,

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: Ylegñija : Este na taotao jatutujon manjatsa , ya ti siña janafunjayan .

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: Pat jaye y ray , anae jajanao para uguera contra y otro ray , ti ufatachong finena , ya ufañangane cao siña güe yan y dies mit , utagam y mamamaela yan veinte mit contra güiya ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Patseno , mientras chachagoja y otro trabia , janajanao un compañia , ya ufangagao pas .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue ; masquesea jaye guiya jamyo y ti rumechasa todo y güinajaña ; ti siñagüe disipulujo .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: Y asiga mauleg ; lao yanguin malingo y asiga maasenña , jaftaemano manasne ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ti mauleg para y tano , ni para fanyútian basula ; masenyuteja ni y taotao . Jaye y gaetalanga para ufanjungog , güiya uecungog .

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: YA manjijijot guato guiya güiya , todo y publicano , yan y manisao , para umaecungog güe .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Ya mangogonggong y Fariseo sija , yan y escriba ilelegñija : Este na taotao , jaresisibeja y manisao , ya mañisijaja mañocho .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Ya jasangane sija ni este na acomparasion , ilegña :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: Jaye na taotao guiya jamyo , y yanguin guaja gaña siento na quinilo , ya ufinalingaeguan ni y uno , ada ti ujanao ya udingo y nobentainuebe gui desierto asta qui jasoda ayo y malingo ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Ya anae jasoda , jaapagaye ya jamagogofgüe .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Ya anae mato gui guimaña , jaagange todo y manamiguña , yan y tignangña , ya ilelegña nu sija : Nije tafanmagof , sa jagasja jusoda y gajo quinilo ni y guinin malingo .

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Jusangane jamyo , na taegüenaoja locue uguaja gui langet , minagof yanguin un taotao na isao mañotsot , mas qui y nobentainuebe manunas na taotao ni y ti janesesita manmañotsot .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: N	15	8		49130	 ¶ Pat , jaye na palaoan , y yanguin uguaja iyoña dies na pidason salape , ya ufinalingaeguan ni y uno ; ada ti usonggue y candet ya ubale y jalom guma , ya uguesaligao asta qui usoda ?

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Ya yanguin esta jasoda , jaagange y manamigaña , yan y tiguangña ya mandaña , ya ilelegña : Nije tafanmagof , sa jagasja jusoda y pidason salape ni y guinin malingo .

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue jusangane jamyo , na uguaja minagof gui menan y angjet Yuus , pot y un taotao na isao ni y mañotsot .

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: N	15	11		49160	 ¶ Ya ilegña : Un taotao guaja dos lajiña :

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Ya y mas patgon , ilegña as tataña : Tata , naeyo ni y patteco gui güinaja ni y para guajo . Ya jafacae para sija ni y güinajaña .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Ya ti megae na jaane malofan , anae y mas patgon janafandaña todo , ya mapos asta y chago na tano ; ya jagasta todo y güinajaña güije gui guipot yan bisio di gula .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Ya anae jagasta todo esta : mato un dangculon ñinalang güije na tano , ya jatutujon taena .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Ya jumanao , ya jatituye gui un taotao güije na tano : ya tinago para y fangualuanña , para unachocho babue sija .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Ya jatatanga na unabula tiyanña ni y lasas frijoles ni y jacacano y babue sija ; ya taya ni un taotao numanaegüe .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Ya anae numalo y jinasoña , ilegña : Cuanto na jotnaleron tata , mangaena pan , ya manmañoñobblaja , ya guajo güine jumatae ñalang !

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Bae jucajulo ya jujanao para as tata , ya jualog nu güiya : Tata , umisaoyo contra y langet , yan contra jago ,

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Ti dignoyo mas na jumafanaan lajimo : naparejoyo yan y jotnalerumo sija .

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Ya cajulo , ya mapos para as tataña . Lao chagoja trabia , si tataña linie güe , ya ninamaase , ya finalagüe , ya tinegtog , ya chinicogüe .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Ya y patgon ilegña as tataña : Tata , umisaoyo contra y langet , yan contra jago ; ti dignoyo mas na jumafanaan lajimo .

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Lao y tata ilegña ni y tentagoña sija : Chule y mas mauleg na magago ya umanaminagago ; ya umapolo y aniyu gui calolotña , yan y sapatos gui adengña :

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Ya umacone mague un tatnero ni y mas yomog , ya umapuno ya tafañocho ya tafanmagof ;

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Sa este y lajijo guinin matae , ya lâlâ talo ; guinin malingo , ya masoda . Ya jatutujon sija manmagof .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: Ya y lajiña ni y mas amco estaba gui fangualuan ; ya anae guaguato ya esta jijot gui guima , jajungog y dandan yan y manbabaila :

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Ya jaagang uno gui tentago sija , ya jafaesen jafa ayo sija .

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Y chelumo mato ; ya si tatamo japuno y tatnero ni y mas yomog , sa jaresibe gae seguro yan sano .

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Ya ninagoslalalo , ya ti malago jumalom : ayonae jumuyong si tataña , ya siniplica na ujalom .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Ya manope ilegña as tataña : Estagüe , megae na año nae jusesetbe jao , ya taya nae ti jaosgue jafa na tinagomo : lao taya nae unnaeyo un patgon chiba para infanmagof yan y manamigujo sija :

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Lao anae mato este na lajimo ni y jalachae todo y güinajamo gui manputa sija ; unpunueja ni y mas yomog na tatnero .

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Lajijo , siempre jumijitaja ; ya todo y güinajajo iyomo .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Lao mauleg para utafanmagof ya utafanalegria : sa este y chelumo guinin matae , ya lâlâ talo ; yan guinin malingo , ya esta masoda .

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: YA ilegña locue ni y disipuluña sija : Guaja un taotao na rico , ya guaja mayetdomuña ; ya este mafaaela guiya güiya na jagasta y güinajaña .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Ya janamaagange , ya ilegña nu güiya : Jafa este y jujujungog guiya jago ? Fannae cuenta pot y mayetdomumo , sa ti siña jao mumayetdomo mas .

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Ayonae y mayetdomo , ilegña gui sumanjalomña : Jafa jufatinas ? sa y señotjo unajanaoyo gui mayetdomujo : Taya minetgotto para ufanguadog ; mamajlaojo umogagao .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Jutungo esta jafa jufatinas , para yanguin manajanaoyo gui mayetdomujo , jumaresibeyo gui guimañija .

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Ya jaagang cada uno gui manmadidibe ni y señotña , ya ilegña ni y finenana : Cuanto undidibe y señotjo ?

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Ya ilegña : Siento na medidan laña . Ayonae ilegña nu güiya : Chule y cuentamo ya unfatachong guse ya untugue sincuenta .

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Ya ilegña talo ni y otro : Ya jago , cuanto dibimo ? Ilegña : Siento na medidan trigo . Ylegña talo : Chule y cuentamo ya untugue ochenta .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Ya jaalaba y señot y taelaye na mayetdomo ; sa pot y jagostungo chumogüe : sa y famaguon este na tano , manmejnalomña y generasionñija , qui y famaguon y manana .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: Ya jusangane jamyo : Fanmamamauleg amigonmiyo pot y güinajan y timanunas ; sa yanguin manfatta jamyo , infanrinesibe gui taejinecog na saganñija .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Ya y tunas gui didide , tunasja locue gui megae ; ya y ti tunas gui didide , ti tunasja locue gui megae .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Yanguin ti guinin manunas jamyo gui ti magajet na güinaja , jaye infaninangoco gui magajet na güinaja ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Ya yanguin ti guinin manunas fiet jamyo gui iyon y otro taotao , jaye infanninae ni y iyonmiyo ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Ni un tentago siña jasetbe dos na señot : sa uchatlie y uno , ya uguaeya y otro ; pat atituye gui uno , ya udespresia y otro . Ti siña jamyo insetbe si Yuus , yan y güinaja .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: N	16	14		49510	 ¶ Ya y Fariseo sija locue , ni y mangasalape , majungog este sija ; ya mabotlea güe .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Jamyo yuje sija y innafanunas maesa jamyo gui menan y taotao sija ; lao si Yuus jatungoja y corasonmiyo : sa ayo y guesmaguaeya gui entalo y taotao sija y chinatlie para y menan Yuus .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: Y lay , yan y profeta sija , mangaegue asta as Juan : ya desde ayo na tiempo y raenon Yuus mapredicañaejon , ya todoja jumalom nu y finijon .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Lao guseña malofan y langet yan y tano , qui na un pidasito gui lay ufatta .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: Todo ayo y dumingo y asaguaña , ya umasagua yan otro , jafatinas y abale ; ya y umasagua ayo na palaoan ni y diningo ni y asaguañalaje , jafatinas y abale .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: N	16	19		49560	 ¶ Guaja un taotao na rico , na minagagagoja putpura , yan y guesmauleg na magago apaca , ya cada jaane gumupupot .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Ya guaja locue un pobble na umógagao limosna , y naanña si Lasaro , na bula chetnot , ni y estaba mapolo gui pettan y rico .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Ya malagogüe na umanachocho ni ayo y andesmoronan ni y mamopodong gui lamasan y rico ; ya asta y galago manmato ya manmanjójoflag y chetnotña .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Ya despues , matae y pebble ni y umógagao limosna , ya macone ni y angjet sija asta y pechon Abraham ; matae locue y rico na taotao , ya majafot ;

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Ya y ya sasalaguan , jajatsa y atadogña , anae estaba gui sinapet , ya jalie si Abraham na chago , yan si Lasaro gui pechoña .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Ya umagang ilegña : Tata Abraham , gaease nu guajo , ya tago si Lasaro , para usupog y puntan calolotña gui janom ya unafresco y jilajo ; sa estagüe na masasapetyo güine na mañila .

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Lao si Abraham ilegña : Laje , jaso na anae lalâlâ jao unresibe todo y manmauleg na güinajamo ; taegüenaoja locue si Lasaro jaresibe y manaelaye na güinaja : lao pago , güiya mamagof güine , ya jago masasapet .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Ya gui todo estesija ; esta mapolo fitme gui entalota un dangculon joyo na chojfe , para todo y manmalago manmalofan güine asta iya jamyo ti ufansiña ; ni ufanmalofan y manmalago güenao manmalag iya jamyo .

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Ayonae ilegña : Pues jutayuyut jao tata , tago güe para y guima tata ;

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: Sa guajayo sinco mañelujo lalaje ; para usangane sija testimonio ; ni noseaja ufanmamaela locue güine gui sinapet na lugat .

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Lao si Abraham ilegña : Gaegueja si Moises yan y profeta sija , polo ya ujaecungogja .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Ya ilegña : Aje , tata Abraham ; sa yanguin uno ni y guinin manmatae jumanao para iya sija , ufanmañotsot .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Yanguin ti maecungog si Moises , yan y profeta sija ; ti ufanmaosgon achogja uguaja cajulo guinin y manmatae .

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: YA ilegña ni y disipuluña sija : Ti siña ti ufato y escandalo ; lao ay , ay ayo y munafato !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Maulegña na umagode gui agagaña un alutong , ya umayute gui tase , antes qui uninaquepodong uno güine gui mandiquique sija .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Adaje jamyo : Yanguin umisao y chelumo contra jago , reprende : y yanguin mañotsot , asie .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Yanguin siete biaje gui un jaane umisao contra jago , ya siete biaje mafato guiya jago , ya ilelegña : Mañotsotyo , un asie .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: N	17	5		49730	 ¶ Ya y apostoles , ilegñija nu y Señot : Aumenta , y jinengguenmame .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña : Yanguin mangaejinenggue jamyo taegüije y granon mostasa , ya mojon ilegmiyo nu este na sicómoro trongcon jayo : Chapag jao güenao , ya unplanta jao gui tase ; ya mojon infaninesgueja .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: Lao jaye guiya jamyo y guaja tentagoña , na manalalado , pat mamamasto quinilo , y yanguin mato guinin y fangualuan , ualog nu güiya ; maela enseguidas y fatachong , ya unchocho ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ya ti ualog nu güiya finena : Nalisto y senajo para juchocho , ya undudog jao , ya unsetbeyo asta qui munjayanyo chumocho , yan gumimen : ya despues nae unchocho , ya unguimen ?

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Numae grasias ayo na tentago , sa jafatinas y matagoña ? Jinasoco na aje .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Taegüineja locue jamyo , yanguin esta inchegüe todo ayo sija y jutago jamyo , ualog : Maninutil jam na tentago ; sa ayoja y para y chechomame inchegüe .

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: N	17	11		49790	 ¶ Ya susede anae jumanao para Jerusalem , ya malofan gui inanaco Samaria , yan Galilea .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Ya anae jumalom gui un songsong , manasoda güije yan dies na taotao na manategtog ; ya manojgue desde y chago .

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: Ya jajatsa y inagangñija , ya ilegñija : Jesus , Maestro , gaease nu jame .

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Ya anae jalie , ilegña nu sija : Janao ya infanue y mamale nu jamyo . Ya susede anae manjajanao , manjuyong mangasgas .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Ya y uno guiya sija , anae jalie na jomlo güe , jabira güe tate , ya janaagagang mannae si Yuus minalag .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Ya jatomba güe papa gui fion adeng si Jesus , ya janae grasias : este na taotao , Samaritano .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Ya manope si Jesus , ilegña : Ada ti dies y mangasgas ? ya manmangue y nuebe ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Taya masoda tumalo mague para unae si Yuus grasias , na esteja y taotao juyong .

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Ya ilegña bu güiya : Cajulo ya unjanao ; y jinengguemo munajomlo jao .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: N	17	20		49880	 ¶ Ya anae mafaesen ni y Fariseo sija , ngaean nae ufato y raenon Yuus , jaope ilegña : Y raenon Yuus , ti matungo finatoña .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Ni ujaalog : Estagüe ! pat ayogüe ! sa y raenon Yuus , gaegueja gui sumanjalommiyo .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: N	17	22		49900	 ¶ Ya ilegña ni y disipuluña sija : Ufato y jaane sija , na infanmalago na inlie uno gui jaanin y Lajin taotao , ya ti inlie .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Ya ujaalog nu jamyo : Estagüe , pat ayogüe ; chamiyo tumatitiye , ni indalalaque sija .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Sa taegüijeja y lamlam , yan mañila gui un lugat gui papa y langet , ya inina y otro banda gui papa y langet ; taegüineja locue y Lajin taotao , gui jaaniña .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Lao nesesita na ufamadese finena megae , ya umarechasa ni este na generasion .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Sa jaftaemanoja y jaanin Noe , taegüijeja locue y jaanin y Lajin taotao .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Mañocho , yan manguimen , yan manasagua , yan manafanasagua , asta ayo na jaane anae jumalom si Noe gui atca , ya mato y dilubio ya manyinilang sija todo .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Taegüineja locue jasusede gui jaanin Lot : mañocho , manguimen , manmamajan , manmanbende , manmananom , yan manmanjatsa guma ;

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Lao ayoja na jaane anae jumanao si Lot guiya Sodoma , janauchan guafe , yan asufre guinin y langet , ya manyinilang todo sija .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Taegüijeja uguaja güije na jaane yanguin ufamanue y Lajin taotao .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: Ayo na jaane , ayo y gaegue gui jilo guma ya y güinajaña gaegue gui jalom guma , chaña tumutunog ya uchule ; parejoja locue yan y gaegue gui fangualuan , chaña tumatalo tate .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Jaso y asaguan Lot .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: liânâlñaumasatba .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Jusangane jamyo , na ayo na puenge uguaja dos na taotao gui un catre ; y uno umacone ya y otro umapolo .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dos na palaoan dumadaña manguleg ; y uno umacone , ya y otro umapolo .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dos na taotao ugaegue gui fangualuan ; y uno umacone , ya y otro umapolo .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ya manmanope ilegñija nu güiya : Manggue Señot ? Ya jaope ilegña : Manoja nae gaegue y tataotao , ayoja nae mandaña y pojaro aguila sija .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: YA jasangane un acomparasion , na y taotao sija janesesita ufanmanayuyut , ya chañija fanataeanima .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Ilelegña : Guaja gui un siuda un jues , na ti maañao as Yuus , ni urespeta ni jaye na taotao :

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Ya guaja locue güije na siuda un biuda ni y mato guiya güiya ya ilelegña : Areglajam yan y enemigujo .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Ya ti malago finena ; lao despues ilegña gui sumanjalomña : Achogja ti maañaoyo as Yuus , ni jufanrespeta taotao ;

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: Lao pot y jarorobayo este na palaoan , bae juaregla sija , sa noseaja pot y sisigueja mague , uestotbayo .

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña : Ecungog jafa y ti tunas na jues ilelegña .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Ada ti unalibre si Yuus y inayigña , ni y maaagang güe jaane , yan puenge , ya apmam na jasungon pot sija ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Jusangane jamyo , na enseguidas unafanlibre . Lao anae ufato y Lajin taotao , ufañoda jinenggue gui jilo tano ?

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: N	18	9		50140	 ¶ Ya jasangan este na acomparasion ni ayo sija y umangocon maesa sija na manunas , ya jadespresia y pumalo :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: Dos na taotao jumanao julo gui templo para ujafanaetae : Y un Fariseo , ya y otro publicano .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Y Fariseo tumojgue , ya taegüine tinaetaeña gui sumanjalomña : Junae jao grasias Yuus , sa ti parejoyo yan y pumalo na taotao , ni y manáplacha , yan manábale , ni y este publicano .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Umayuyunatyo dos biaje gui semana ; mannanaeyo diesmos ni y todo güinajajo .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Lao y publicano gaegue na tumotojgue gui chago ; ya ti jaguesjatsa y atadogña julo gui langet ; lao jaseseco y pechoña , ya ilelegña : Yuus , gaease nu guajo , sa taotao isaoyo .

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Jusangane jamyo , na , este na taotao jumanao papa y guimaña , ya maasie y isaoña , mas mauleg qui y otro ; sa cada uno y minadangculo güe , uninaumitde ; ya y munamitde güe , umanadangculo .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: N	18	15		50200	 ¶ Ya maconie guato guiya güiya ni y diquique na famaguonñija , para upacha ; ya anae manlinie ni y disipulo sija , manmalalatde .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Lao si Jesus jaagang sija , ya ilegña : Polo y diquique na famaguon ya ufanmamaela guiya guajo , ya chamiyo chumochoma ; sa iyon este sija y raenon Yuus .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Magajet jusangane jamyo , na y ti rumesibe y raenon Yuus taegüije y diquique na patgon , ti ujalom güije .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: N	18	18		50230	 ¶ Ya un taotao na magas , finaesen güe ilelegña : Mauleg na Maestro , jafa jufatinas para juereda y taejinecog na linâlâ ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Jafa na ilegmo nu guajo mauleg ? taya mauleg na unoja , si Yuus .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Utungo y tinago sija : Chamo umábale , Chamo famumuno , Chamo fañañaque , Chamo sumasangan y ti magajet na sinangan , Onra si tatamo , yan nanamo .

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Ya ilegña : Todo este sija juadaje desde y pinatgonjo .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Anae jajungog este sija si Jesus , ilegña nu güiya : Guaja uno fattamo trabia : bende todo y güinajamo , ya unfacae y mamobble , ya uguaja güinajamo gui langet , ya maela dalalagyo .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Lao anae jajungog estesija , ninágostriste ; sa gosrico güe .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ya anae linie as Jesus , ilegña : Namanminapot ayo sija y mangaegüinaja manjalom gui raenon Yuus !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Sa guseña malofan un cameyo gui matan y jaguja , qui ujalom un rico gui raenon Yuus .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ya ayo y jumungog , ilegñija : Jaye nae siña satbo ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Ya ilegña : Y güinaja ni y ti mansiña para y taotao sija ; mansiña para as Yuus .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Ayonae ilegña si Pedro : Estagüeja na indingo y iyonmame , ya indalalag jao .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Magajet jusangane jamyo , na taya ni un taotao ni y dumingo guma , pat asagua , pat mañelu , pat mañaena , pat famaguon , pot y raenon Yuus ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: Ya ti uresibe mas megae pago na tiempo , lao y mamamaela na tiempo , taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: N	18	31		50360	 ¶ Ya jacone y dose , ya ilegña nu sija : Estagüe , na manjajanaojit julo Jerusalem , ya todosija y tinigue y profeta sija pot y Lajin taotao , ufanmacumple .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Sa nesesita na umaentrega gui taotao juyong , ya umabotlea , yan umafaesegnane , yan umatolae :

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ya umasaulag , ya umapuno ; ya y mina tres na jaane , ucajulo talo .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Lao sija ti jatungo ni uno gui este sija : ya este na sinangan manaatog guiya sija , ya ni ti jatungo jafa sija y masangan .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: N	18	35		50400	 ¶ Ya susede anae esta jijijot Jerico , estaba un taotao bachet gui oriyan chalan na matatachong , ya umógagao :

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ya anae jajungog y linajyan taotao na manmalolofan , mamaesen jafa ayo .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Ya masangane güe , na si Jesus Nasareno malolofan .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ya umagang ilelegña : Jesus , jago ni y Lajin David , gaease nu guajo .

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ya machoma ni y manmofona para ufamatquilo : lao mas umagang megae : Jago ni y Lajin David , gaease nu guajo .

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Ya tumojgue si Jesus , ya manago na umaconie guato guiya güiya : ya anae esta jijijot , finaesen :

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: Jafa malagomo jufatinas guiya jago ? Ya güiya ilegña : Señot , para jufanlie .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu güiya : Fanlie : y jinengguemo unsinatba .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Ya enseguidas jaresibe y liniiña , ya jadalalag güe , yan janamalag si Yuus ; yan todo y taotao sija , anae malie , maalaba si Yuus .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: YA jumalom si Jesus , ya malofan inanaco Jerico .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Ya , estagüe , güije un taotao na y naanña si Saqueo , magas y publicano , na rico güe .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Ya jaquequeliija jaye si Jesus ; lao ti siña , pot y linajyan taotao , yan pot y etigo güe .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Ya malago mona , ya umeculo gui trongcon sicomoro para ulie : sa nesesita na ufapos güije .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Ya anae mato si Jesus güije na lugat , manatan julo , ya ilegña nu güiya : Saqueo , tunog lasajyao , sa pago na , jaane nesesita na jusaga gui guimamo .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Ya sumajyao papa , ya jaresibe güe yan y minagofña .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ya anae malie este , todos mangonggong , ilegñija : Mapos , para usaga gui isao na taotao .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Ya si Saqueo tumojgue ya ilegña ni y Señot : Estagüe , Señot , y lamita gui güinajajo junae y mamobble sija ; ya yanguin guaja chinelejo pot finababa bae junae cuatro talo .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu güiya : Pago na jaane mato y satbasion güine na guma ; sa güiya locue Lajin Abraham .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Sa y Lajin taotao mato para ualigao , yan usatba y manmalingo .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: N	19	11		50590	 ¶ Ya mientras majujungog este sija , jaaumenta ya jasangan un acomparasion , sa pot y esta jijijot Jerusalem , yan pot y jinasonñija na enseguidas ufato y raenon Yuus .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Pot este na ilegña : Un taotao na magas , jumanao para y chago na tano para uresibe y raeno , yan para utaloja guato .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ya jaagang y dies na tentagoña , ya jaentrega dies na minan moneda , ya ilegña nu sija : Nafangagana asta qui ufato .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Lao y taotaoña gui güije na tano machatlie güe , ya manmanago un compañia guato guiya güiya , ilegñija : Mungajam na ufangobietna este na taotao gui jilo mame .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Ya susede anae esta jaresibe y raeno , tumalo guato , ya manago na ufanmaagange y tentago sija ni y janae ni y salape , para utungo cuanto cada uno güinanaña .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Ya anae mato y finenana , ilegña : Señot , y minamo mangana dies na mina mas .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Mauleg na finatinasmo , mauleg jao na tentago . Pot y tunas jao gui didide , guaja ninasiñamo gui jilo y dies na siuda .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Ya anae mato y mina dos , ilegña : Señot , y minamo mangana sinco na mina .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Ya locue ilegña nu güiya : Jago gui jilo sinco na siuda .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Ya mato y otro ilegña : Señot , estagüe y minamo na juadaje ya jupolo gui jalom y setbiyetas :

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Sa maañaoyo nu jago , sa recto jao na taotao : unchuchule y ti unpolo , ya uncococo y ti untanom .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Taelaye jao na tentago , y guinin y pachotmo nae jujusga jao . Untungoja na recto yo na taotao , juchuchuleja y ti jupolo , ya jucococoja y ti jutanme :

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Jafa na ti unpolo y salapejo gui banco ; sa para yanguin matoyo jugagao yan y ganansia ?

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Ya ilegña nu ayo sija y manotojgue gui oriya : Nasuja guiya güiya y minan moneda ya umanae ayo y guaja dies na mina .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Señot , guajaja güe dies na mina .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Sa jusangane jamyo , na masqueseaja jaye y guaja iyoña , umanae ; lao y taya iyoña , achogja y guajaña umanasuja guiya guiya .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Lao aya sija y enemigujo , ni y ti manmalago na jufangobietna gui jiloñija , cone mague , ya ufanmadegüeya gui menajo .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: N	19	28		50760	 ¶ Ya anae munjayan jasangan este , malag y sumanmena , ya cajulo Jerusalem .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: N	19	29		50770	 ¶ Ya susede anae esta jijot Betfage , yan Betania , gui egso ni y mafanaan ogso Olibo , jatago dos gui disipuluña ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Ilegña : Janao fanmalag esta mona y sengsong ; ya an manjalom jamyo güije , inseda un patgon bulico na magogode , na taya ni un taotao tumachojnge : pula ya inquene mague .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ya yanguin jaye na taotao fumaesen jamyo : Jafa miña inpila ? Sangane taegüine : Sa janesesita y Señot .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Ya manjanao ayo sija y manmatago , ya jasoda jaftaemano y mansinangane sija .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Ya anae mapupula y patgon bulico , ilegña y gaega nu sija : Jafa muna inpípila y patgon bulico .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Janesesita y Señot .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Ya macone guato gui as Jesus : ya japolo y magagoñija gui jilo y patgon bulico , ya manmaudae si Jesus ,

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Ya anae jumajanao , jababa y magagoñija gui chalan .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Ya anae esta jijijot , esta tumutunog gui egso Olibo , todo y manadan disipulo matutujon manmagof ya maalaba si Yuus , yan dangculo inagang , pot y liniiñija todo ni y finatinas namanman .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Ylegñija : Dichoso y Ray ni y mato pot y naan y Señot : pas gui langet , yan minalag guiya jululo .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Ya palo gui Fariseo sija , manestaba gui entalo y linajyan taotao ilegñija nu güiya : Maestro , reprende y disipulumo sija .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Ya manope ilegña : Jusangane jamyo , na yanguin manmamatquilo este sija , y acho enseguidas ufanagang .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: N	19	41		50890	 ¶ Ya anae esta jijot , ya jalile y siuda , ninacasao pot güiya .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Ylegña : Yanguin untungo , pago gui jaanimo , jagoja , y güinaja ni y iyon y pas ! lao pago esta maatogüe y atadogmo .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Sa ufanmato jaane guiya jago , na y enemigumo sija utanmancolat oda gui oriyamo , ya unmaoriyaye , ya unmaadaje cada banda ,

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Ya umayute papa gui jilo oda yan y famaguonmo ni y mangaegue gui sumanjalommo ; ya ti unmapoluye un acho gui jilo y otro ; sa ti untungo y tiempon y mabisitamo .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: N	19	45		50930	 ¶ Ya jumalom gui templo , ya jatutujon yumute juyong todo ayo sija y manmanbebende güije ;

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Esta matugue : Y gumajo , uguma manaetae ; lao jamyo infaliyang saque .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: N	19	47		50950	 ¶ Ya mamanagüe gui templo cada jaane . Lao y magas mamale sija , yan y escriba , yan y manmagas y taotao sija , maaliligao para umaqueyulang .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Ya ti jajulat sumoda jafa ujachogüe : sa todo y taotao gumeguesecungog güe .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: YA susede uno gui güije sija na jaane , anae jafananagüe y taotao sija gui templo , ya japredidica y ibangelio ; manmato guiya güiya y magas mamale , yan y escriba , yan y manamco sija ;

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ya macuentuse , ilegñija nu güiya : Sangane jam , jafa na ninasiña na unfatitinas este sija na güinaja ? Pat jaye numae jao ni este na ninasiña ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Ya manope si Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Jufaesen locue jamyo un finaesen , ya sanganeyo ;

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Y tagpangen Juan , guinin y langet , pat guinin y taotao sija ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Ya sija , jajaso gui sumanjalomñija , ilegñija : Yanguin ilegmame : Guinin y langet ; ualog , jafa nae na ti injenggue güe ?

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Lao yanguin ilegmame : Guinin y taotao sija ; infanmamagas nu y acho ni y taotao , sa pineloñija na profeta si Juan .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Ya manmanope na ti jatungo guine mano .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ayonae ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Ni guajo locue ti jusangane jamyo , jafa na ninasiña na jufatitinas este sija na güinaja .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: N	20	9		51050	 ¶ Ya jatutujon sumangane sija ni este na acomparasion ; Un taotao , manplanta un fangualuan ubas , ya japoluye ni manfáfachocho , ya jumanao para y chago na tano , apmam na tiempo .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ya y tiempon mangoco , jatago un tentago para y manmachóchocho , para umanae ni y tinegcha y gualo ; lao masaulag ni y manmachóchocho , ya manajanao taesinajguan .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ya jatago talo y otro tentago : ya masaulag locue talo , ya manamamajlao , ya manajanao taesinajguan .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Ya jatalo tumago y mina tres na tentago : ya manaerida , ya mayute juyong .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Ayonae ilegña y señot y fangualuan : Jafa jufatinas ? Bae jutago y guefyajo na lajijo , sa buente ufangaerespeto nu güiya .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Lao anae malie ni y manmachóchocho , manasangane ilegñija : Estagüe y heredero ; nije tapuno , ya usaga y inereda guiya jita .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ya mayute juyong gui jiyong y fangualuan , ya mapuno . Jafa pago ufatinas y señot y fangualuan nu sija ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Ufato , ya uyulang este sija y manmachóchocho , ya ufannae otro ni y fangualuan . Ya anae majungog ayo , ilegñija : Munga este .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Lao jaatan sija ya ilegña : Jafa nae este y esta matugue : Y acho ni y jarechasa y manmamatitinas y guima , esteja mapolo cuentan ulo gui esquina ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Jayeja y pedong gui jilo ayo na acho , umayamag pedasitos ; lao jayeja y jinegse , ufinapetbos .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: N	20	19		51150	 ¶ Ya y magas mamale , yan y escriba sija , maaliligao para umaqueguot güije na ora ; lao manmaañao nu y taotao sija , sa matungoja na jasangan este na acomparasion , contra sija .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Ya mapupulanja yan manmanago na umaespipia , para ujafaquemanunas sija na taotao , ya uquefanmañule ni y sinanganña , ya umaqueentrega güe gui inaregla yan ninasiñan y gobietno .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Ya mafaesen güe , ilegñija : Maestro , intingo na unsasangan yan mamananagüe jao tunas , ya ti numanasajnge jao taotao , lao mamananagüe jao ni y magajet na chalan Yuus .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Tunas na infanmanaejam si Sesat tributo , pat aje ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Lao jatungoja y mañañija , ya ilegña nu sija :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Fanueyo nu y salape . Jaye gaeimagen este yan este na tinigue ? Ya manmanope ilegñija : Iyon Sesat .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Nae si Sesat ni y iyon Sesat , ya innae si Yuus nu y iyon Yuus .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Ya ti siña maguot pot y sinanganña gui menan y taotao sija ; ya ninafanmanman ni y inepeña ya manmamatquilo .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: N	20	27		51230	 ¶ Ya manmato guiya güiya Saduseo sija , ni y sumangan na taya quinajulon manmatae ; ya mafaesen güe ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Ylegñija : Maestro , si Moises jatuguiejam , na yanguin dos chumelo na laje , ya y uno guaja asaguaña , ya matae taya patgonña ; ayo y cheluña uniasagua y palaoan , ya unacajulo semiya gui cheluña .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Ya guaja siete na lalaje na mañelu : ya y finenana umasagua , ya matae taya patgonña .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: inasagua y palaoanni y miná dos ;

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Ya inasagua talo ni y miná tres ; yan taegüenaoja locue todo y siete manmatae ya taya famaguonñija .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ya y palaoan uttimo matae locue .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Ya y quinajulon manmatae , jaye gaeasagua y palaoan ? sa inasagua todo ni y siete .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Y famaguon este na tiempo manásagua yan manafanásagua :

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Lao ayo sija y ufanmanmerese güije na tiempo , yan y quinajulon manmatae , ni ufanasagua , ni umanafanasagua :

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Ni ti siña manmatae talo : sa manparejoja yan y angjet sija ; yan manfamaguon Yuus , sa manfamaguon y quinajulon . manmatae .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Ya pot y manmatae ni umanafangajulo , asta si Moises mamanue gui finajalomtano , anae jafanaan y Señot , Yuus Abraham yan Yuus Ysaac yan Yuus Jacob .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Sa ti güiya Yuus manmatae , na manlâlâ : sa todosija manlala guiya güiya .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Ya manmanope palo gui escriba sija ilegñija : Maestro , mauleg sinanganmo .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ya desde ayo , ti matatnga mafaesen güe talo jafa .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: N	20	41		51370	 ¶ Ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na ilegñija na si Cristo lajin David ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Ya güiyaja si David umalog gui leblon y Salmos : Y Señot ilegña ni y Señotjo , Fatáchong gui agapa na canaejo ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Asta qui jupolo y enemigumo sija para fañajangan y adengmo .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Enao muna si David finanaan güe Señot , ya jaftaemano mina ulajiña ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: N	20	45		51410	 ¶ Ya majujungogja ni y taotao sija , anae ilegña ni y disipuluña :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Adaje jamyo ni y escriba sija , sa yanñija manmamocat yan y anaco na magago , yan yanñija manmasaluda gui plasa , yan y finénana na tachong gui sinagoga sija ; yan y finénana na saga gui guipot ;

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Yan jalachae y guima y biuda sija , yan manmamanunue ni y anaco tinaetaeñija pot taya ; estesija ujaresibe mandangculo na sinentensia .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: YA anae manatan julo , jalie y manrico na taotao sija , na jayuyute jalom y ninaenñija gui cajon salape .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Ya jalie locue un pobble na biuda , na manyute jalom güije dos coble .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Ya ilegña : Jusangane jamyo ni y magajet . Este y pebble na biuda , manyute jalom mas qui todo sija :

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Sa todo estesija , y sebblanñijaja manmayute jalom minaeñija : lao este yan y pinebbleña , jayute todo jalom y güinajaña .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: N	21	5		51480	 ¶ Yan pot y manguecuentos palo pot y templo , ni y maadotna manbonito na acho sija yan ninae sija , ilegña :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Este sija na güinaja y inlie , estagüe , ufanmato jaane sija , na taya usobbla güine un acho gui jilo y otro , na ti umayute papa .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: N	21	7		51500	 ¶ Ya mafaesen güe , ilegñija : Maestro , ngaean nae ujuyong estesija ? yan jafa na señat uguaja , yanguin jijot para ufanmato este sija na güinaja ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Ayonae ilegña : Guesadaje jamyo ya chamiyo fanmafabábaba : sa megae ufanmato pot y naanjo , ya ujaalog : Güiya yo ya y tiempo esta jijijot ; chamiyo dumalálalaque sija .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Lao yanguin injingog y guera sija , yan y atboroto , chamiyo faninespápanta : sa nesesita ufanmato este sija finena ; lao y uttimo ti enseguidas .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: N	21	10		51530	 ¶ Ayo nae ilegña nu sija : Y nasion sija ufangajulo contra y nasion , ya y raeno contra raeno :

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Ya uguaja dangculon linao , ya y cada lugat ñinalang yan peste ; yan uguaja minaañao sija , yan mandangculo na señat guinin y langet .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Lao antes di todo este sija , ujapolo y canaeñija gui jilomiyo , ya infanmapetsigue , yan infanmaentrega gui sinagoga sija , yan y catset , yan infanmacone guato gui ray sija , yan y manmagas pot y naanjo .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Ya ujuyong este guiya jamyo para testimonio .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Polo gui corason miyo , na chamiyo jumajaso finena jafa para inepe :

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Sa guajo junae jamyo pachot yan tiningo , ni todo y enimigunmiyo ti siña macontra ni umachaba .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Ya infanenentrega ni y mañaenanmiyo , yan y mañelunmiyo , yan y parientesmiyo , yan y amigonmiyo ; yan guaja guiya jamyo umanamapuno .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ya infanmachatlie ni todo y taotao pot y naanjo .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Lao ni uno gui gaponulonmiyo ufalingo .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Ya y manpasensianmiyo nae , inganaye y antenmiyo .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Ya anae inlie Jerusalem , na esta ineriyaye ni y sendalo sija , intingoja na esta jijijot y mayulangña .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Ya ayonae y mangaegue guiya Judea , ufanmalago para y egso sija ; ya ayo sija y mangaegue gui entaloña ufanjuyong ; ya y mangaegue gui fangualuan , chañija fanjajalom güije .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Sa este sija y jaanin inemog , sa para umacumple todo y güinaja ni y esta manmatugue .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Lao mannamaase ayo sija y manmapotgue , yan y mannanasusu güije sija na jaane ! sa uguaja dangculon chinatsaga gui jilo tano , yan binibo gui jilo este taotao sija .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Ya ufamodong gui jilo y filon y espada , ya ufanmacone preso gui todo y nasion : ya Jerusalem umagacha papa ni y Gentiles , asta qui umacumple y tiempon y Gentiles .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: N	21	25		51680	 ¶ Ya uguaja señat sija gui atdao yan y pilan , yan y pution sija ; yan chinatsagan nasion sija gui jilo tano pot y guinadon pangpang y tase yan y napo .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Manlalalango y taotao sija , pot y manmaañaoñija , yan pot y ninanangga ni ayo sija y manmamamaela para y tano : sa manmayengyong y ninasiñan y langet sija .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Ya ayonae ujalie y Lajin taotao na mamamaela gui y mapagajes yan y ninasiña yan y dangculon minalag .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Ya anae esta jatutujon sumesede este sija , ayonae infanalag jilo , ya injatsa julo y ilunmiyo ; sa esta jijijot y para inmanafanlibre .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: N	21	29		51720	 ¶ Ya jasangane sija un acomparasion , ilegña : Atanja y trongcon igos , yan todo y trongcon jayo sija .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Yanguin esta manmañúñuso , inlie ya intingoja maesa jamyo na esta jijijot y verano .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Taegüenaoja locue jamyo yanguin inlie esta sija na masusede , tingo na esta jijijot y raenon Yuus .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Sa , estagüe , na ufato sija jaane nae umaalog : Mandichoso sa y manmachora , yan y tiyan sija ni ti manmamañago , yan y pecho sija ni ti manmamómogsae .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Ayonae matutujon maalog ni egso sija : Famodong gui jilonmame ; ya y sabana sija : Tampe jam .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Sa yaguin y betde na jayo jafatinas estesija , y anglo , jafa uchogüe ?

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: N	23	32		52840	 ¶ Ya macone locue dos palo na taelaye finatinasñija para ufanmapuno yan güiya .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Ya anae manmato güije na lugat ni mafanaan Calabera , maatane gui quiluus güije yan ayo y dos ni y taelaye finatinasñija , uno gui agapa ya y otro gui acagüe .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña : Tata , asie estesija ; sa ti jatungo jafa jachochogüe . Ya manafacae entre sija y magaguña , ya marifa .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Ya y taotao sija manotojgue ya maaatanja . Ya mabotlelea ni y magas sija locue , ya ilelegñija : Ufañatba otrosija : palo ya usatban maesagüe , yaguin este si Cristo , ni guine as Yuus .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Ya mamofefea ni y sendalo sija , manmato guiya güiya , ya mafanunue ni y binagle .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Ya ilegñija : Yaguin jago Ray y Judio sija , satban maesa jao .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ya guaja locue un tinigue gui jiloña : ESTE GUIYA Y RAY Y JUDIO SIJA .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Ya uno gui ayo y taelaye finatinasñija ilegna : Yaguin jago si Cristojao ? Satban maesajao yan jame .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Lao inepe ni otro , ya linalatde ilegña : Ti maañao jao as Yuus , sa gaegue jao gui mismo sinentensia ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Lao jita magajet na tunas ; sa utafanresibe pot y finatinasta : lao este na taotao , taya taelaye finatinasña .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jesus , jajaso yo yaguin matojao gui raenomo .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Ayonae ilegña nu güiya : Magajet jusangane jao : Pago mismo na jaane utajita na dos guiya Paraiso .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Ya anae buente y oran a las sais , jumuyong jomjom todo y jilo y tano asta y oran a las nuebe ,

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Ya y atdao jomjom , ya y cottinan templo maipe gui talo .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Ya anae umagang si Jesus , ni dangculo na inagang , ilegña : Tata , y canaemo nae jupolo y espiritujo ; ya anae munjayan jasangan este , jaentrega y espiritu .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: N	23	47		52990	 ¶ Ya anae jalie y senturion estesija y manmalofan , janamalag si Yuus , ilegña : Sen magajet este na taotao na tunas .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Ya todo y linajyan taotao ni mandaña anae manmalofan este sija , anae malie y jagas sinesede , natumalo guato ya jaseco pechonñija .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Lao todo y atungoña yan y famalaoan ni tumatitiye güe desde Galilea , manestaba manlachago maatanja este sija .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: N	23	50		53020	 ¶ Ya estagüe , un taotao na y naanña si José , un taotao na pápagat , mauleg na taotao yan tunas :

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: ( Ti jaconsiente y pinagatñija ni y finatinasñija : ) Taotao Arimatea , gui Siuda y Judiosija , ya güiya locue jananangga y raenon Yuus .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Este mato gui as Pilatos , ya jagagao y tataotao Jesus .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Ya janatunog gui quiluus , ya jabalutan gui un sabanas , ya japolo gui un naftan ni maguadog gui acho , ya taya ni uno mapolo güije antes .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Ya ayo na jaane y inaregla y pascua , ya pago manana gui sabado .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Ya manmato locue y famalaoan ni y tumatitiye desde Galilea , ya malie y naftan yan jaftaemano mapoloña y tataotaoña .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Ya tumalo guato sija , ya manmamamauleg paopao yan inggüente sija : ya mandescansa gui sabado na jaane jaftaemanoja y tinago .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: LAO y finenana na jaane gui semana , gui taftataf gui egaan , manmato gui naftan , mapmañuñule guato paopao ni y finamaulegñija .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Ya masoda y acho na esta managalileg gui pettan y naftan .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ya anae manjalom ti masoda y tataotao y Señot Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Ya anae manmajngang nu este , dos taotao tumotojgue gui oriyanñija , na minagagago ni y lamlam na magago .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Ya anae ninafanmaañao ya manecon papa gui eda , ilegñija nu sija : Jafa muna inaliligao y lâlâ gui entalo y manmatae ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Taegüe güine , lao esta cajulo : jaso y mansinangane jamyo , anae estataba Galilea ,

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Ylegña : Na nesesita na y Lajin taotao umaentrega gui canae y taotao sija ni manisao , y umaatane gui quiluus , ya ucajulo talo gui mina tres na jaane .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Ayonae jajaso sija y sinanganña ,

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Ya manalo guato gui naftan ya jasangane y onse nu este sija , yan todo y pumalo .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Ya sija si Maria Magdalena yan si Juana , yan si Maria nanan Santiago ; yan y pumalo palaoan ni mangachongñija , sumangane y apostoles nu estesija .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Lao sija japolo na taetiningo , y sinanganñija ya ti majonggue .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: N	24	12		53200	 ¶ Ayonae cajulo si Pedro , ya malago asta y naftan : ya anae ñumejon ya jaatan jalom , jalilie y sabanasja gui un lugat , ya mapos güe iyasija ya ninamanman nu este y manmalofan .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: N	24	13		53210	 ¶ Ya , estagüe , dos guiya sija na jumajanao , güijeja na jaane , para un songsong ni naanña Emmaus , sesenta estadios desde Jerusalem .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Ya cumuecuentos y dos mona pot todo estesija y masusede .
