text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Ya susede anae cumuecuentos y dos , ya manafaesen entre sija , mato si Jesus ya mañisija manjanao .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Lao y atadogñija calang manmatampe , para chañija tumutungo güe .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na cuentosmimiyo uno yan otro , anae manajanao jamyo , ya mañaga ya ninafantriste ?

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Inepe ni ayo y uno ni y naanña si Cleofas ya ilegña nu güiya : Ada sumagaja jao guiya Jerusalem , ya ti untungo jafa manmalofan güine sija na jaane ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Ayonae ilegña nu sija : Jafa sija ? Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Ayo sija iyon si Jesus Nasareno , ni profeta güe ni gaeninasiña gui checho yan y sinangan gui menan Yuus yan todo y taotao sija ;

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Ya maentrega , gui magas mamale yan y magalajenmame para umasentensia ni y finatae , ya maatane gui quiluus .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Lao jame innanangga sa güiya y para unafanlibre y Israel . Junggan , yan mas qui todo este , pago esta mina tres na jaane desde que masusede estesija .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Yan locue palo famalaoan ni mangachongmame janamanman jam sa manmato gui naftan gui taftataf gui egaan ;

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Ya anae ti masoda y tataotaoña , manmato guiya jame ilegñija na manmanlie sija y liniin angjet sija , ni y jasnangane na lâlâgüe .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Ya mamjanao guato gui naftan palo gui mangachongmame ya masoda taemanoja y sinangan y famalaoan ; lao ti malie güe .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : O taotao manaetiningo jamyo , yan y ñateng y corasonmiyo para injenggue todo y sinangan y profeta sija !

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Ada ti nesesita na si Cristo ufamadese nu este sija ya taegüine nae ujalom gui minalagña ?

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ya jatutujon desde as Moises , yan y profeta sija , y jasangangane claro todo ni tinigue ni y pot güiya .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Ya manmato gui sengsong ni jajananagüe güije ; ya jasigue para mas chago jinanaoña .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Lao sija janasaga fuetsao , ilegñija : Maela tafañaga sa este puenge ya jocog y jaane ; ya jumalom para usaga mañisija .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Ya susede , anae matachong gui lamasa yan sija , jachule y pan ya jabendise , ya jaipe ya manninae .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Ayonae manmababa atadogñija ya matungo güe ; lao güiya jamalingoja gui inatanñija .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Ya ilegñija entre y dos : Ada ti sinenggue y corasonta gui sumanjalomta mientras jacuentutusejit gui chalan , yan anae jababayejit ni y tinigue ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Ya cumajulo y dos güije na ora , ya tumalo guato Jerusalem : ya masoda y onse mandadaña , yan y manestaba mangachongñiñija ,

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Ya ilelegñija : Magajet , esta cajulo y Señot , na umalie yan si Simon .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Ayonae sija jasangane nu este sija y masusede gui chalan ; yan jafa taemano , tungoñija anae jaipe y pan .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: N	24	36		53440	 ¶ Ya mientras manguecuentos nu este sija , güiya tumojgueja gui entaloñija , y ilegña nu sija : Pas guiya jamyo .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Ayonae manmaañao ya manmajngang ya jinasonñija na manmanlie sija un espiritu .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Lao güiya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na ninafanestotba jamyo ? Ya jafa na cumajulo y jinasonmiyo gui corasonmiyo ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Atanja y canaejo yan y adengjo , sa guajo mismoyo : pacha yan inlie sa y espiritu taecatne ni tolang , taegüije inliija na guajayo ,

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Ya anae jasangan este , manfinanue ni y canaeña yan y adengña .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Ya anae ti jajonggue sija pot minagofñija , ya ninafanmanman , güiya ilegña nu sija : Guaja güine jafa para utacano ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Ya sija janae un pedason güijan na mapeja .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Ya jachule ya jacano gui menanñija .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: N	24	44		53520	 ¶ Ya ilegña nu sija : Este sija na sinangan ni y jusangangane jamyo anae manjijita : taemanoja na nesesita na umacumple todo y esta matugue gui lay Moises yan y profeta sija , yan y Salmos pot guajo .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Ayonae manbinaba y jinasoñija para ujatungo y tinigue ;

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Taegüine esta matugue , na si Cristo ufamadese ya ucajulo talo guinin y manmatae gui mina tres na jaane ;

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Ya umapredica gui naanña y sinetsot yan inasiin isao , gui todo y nasion sija , umatutujon desde Jerusalem .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ya jamyo testigo nu estesija na güinaja .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Ya , estagüe , na bae jutago y promesan y Tatajo gui jilo miyo : lao jamyo fañaga gui siuda guiya Jerusalem , asta que manminagago jamyo ni y ninasiña guinin iya jululo .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: N	24	50		53580	 ¶ Ya manquinene juyong asta Betania ; ya jajatsa y canaeña ya manbinendise sija .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Ya susede anae manbinendise , jaapatte güe guiya sija ya machule julo gui Langet .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Ya sija jaadora ya manalo guato Jerusalem yan y dangculon minagofñija ;

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Ya mangaegue siempre gui templo , manmanbendidise as Yuus . Amen .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Y tutujonña gaegue y Finijo , ya y Finijo güiya yan si Yuus ; ya y Finijo güiya si Yuus .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Güiya gaegue gui tutujonña yan si Yuus .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Todo y güinaja sija manmafatinas pot güiya ; yaguin ti pot güiya , taya ni esta mafatinas , nu y gaegue gui finatinas sija .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Y linâlâ gaegue guiya güiya , ya y linâlâ , güiya y candet y taotao sija .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Ya y candet gui jalom jomjom maniina , ya y jemjom ti matungo .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Y un taotao ni manafato guine as Yuus , y naanña si Juan .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Güiya mamaela para testimonio , para ufannae testimonio nu y candet , para ufanmanjonggue todo y taotao pot güiya .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Güiya ti y candet , lao mamaela para ufannae testimonio nu y candet .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Ayo y magajet na candet ni maniina y todo taotao , na mamamaela güine gui tano .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Güiya gaegue gui tano , ya y tano mafatinas pot güiya , ya y tano ti matungo güe .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Güiya mato gui iyoña ya iyoña ti marisibe güe .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Lao todo y rumesibe güe , güiya janae ninasiñanñija para ufamaguon Yuus ; junggan , para todo ni y jumonggue y naanña .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Sija manmalilis ti guinin y jâgâ , ya ti guinin y minagof y catne , ya ti guinin minagof y taotao , lao guinin as Yuus .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Ya ayo na Finijo mamacatne ya sumaga guiya jita ( ya talie y minalagña , ayo na minalag taegüije y linilisja gui tata ) , bula y grasia yan y minagajet .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Si Juan manae testimonio nu güiya ya umagang ya ilegña : Güiya ayo y jusasangan : y mamaela gui tateco , güiya dangculoña qui guajo , sa güiya finenena qui guajo .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Gui binilaña manmañulijit todo , yan y grasia pot y grasia .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Sa y tinago sija pot si Moises esta manae , lao y grasia yan y minagajet , pot si Jesucristo namanmato .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Si Yuus , taya taotao lumie , taya na tiempo , ayo na Lajiña , y linilisja , na gaegue san jalom y pechon tata , güiya jafanue jit nu güiya .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Ya este y testimonien Juan , anae y Judio sija manafanmato nu y mamale yan Lebita sija , guine Jerusalem , ni manmafasen : Jago , jaye jao ?

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Güiya jaconfesatñaejon ya ti japune , lao jaconfesatñaejon , ilegña : Guajo ti Jesucristo yo .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Ya mafaesen : Jafa nae ? Jago si Elias ? Ya ilegña : Ti guajo yo . Jago ayo na profeta ? Ya manope : Aje .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Enaomina ilegñija nu güiya : Jaye jao ? para siñajam infanmanope ni y tumago jam . Jafa ilelegmo nu jago namaesa ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Ylegña : Guajo inagang yo nu y umaagang gui desierto ; natunas y chalan señot , taegüije ilegña si Esaias profeta .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Ya ayo sija ni namanmato ni y guinin Fariseo sija .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Ya mafafaesen güe ya ilegñija nu güiya : Sajafa na managpangejao , yaguin ti jago si Jesucristo , ni si Elias , ni y ayo na profeta ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Si Juan manope ilelegña : Guajo managpagpange an janom ; mas y entalo miyo , guaja uno na ti intingo .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Este uje y mamaela gui tateco , y mas dangculo qui guajo , ya guajo ti dignoyo na jupula ni y coreas y sapatosña .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Este sija finatinas guiya Betania y otra banda gui Jordan , anae managpagpange si Juan .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: N	1	29		53900	 ¶ Y siguiente na jaane jalie si Juan si Jesus na mamaela para iya güiya ya ilegña : Estagüe y corderon Yuus na janajanao y isao gui tano .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Este yuje ileo , na y tateco mamamaela un laje y dangculoña qui guajo , sa güiya finenena qui guajo .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Ya guajo ti jutungo ; lao para umafanue y Israel nu güiya , enao mina mato yo yan managpagpange yo an janom .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Si Juan manae testiomonio ilegña : Julie y Espiritu ni tumutunog guinin y langet , taegüije y paluma ya sumaga gui jiloña .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ya guajo ti jutungo güe , lao y munamamaela yo para ufanagpange an janom , ayo sumangane yo : Sobre ayo na unlie na tumunog y Espiritu ya sumaga guiya güiya , este uje y managpagpange ni Espiritu Santo .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Ya guajo julie ya manae yo testimonio nu y güiya y Lajin Yuus .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: N	1	35		53960	 ¶ Y siguiente na jaane tumalo manmatojgue si Juan yan dos gui disipuluña .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: N	1	36		53970	 ¶ Ya Jaatan si Jesus ni mamomocat güije , ya ilegña : Estagüe y Corderon Yuus .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Ya majungog ni dos na disipuluña comequentosña yan madalalag si Jesus .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Ya jabira güe si Jesus ya jalie na madadalalag güe nu sija ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa inaliligao ? Ya sija ilegñija : Rabi ( este finijo comequeilegña , gui chamorro , Maestro ) manu sagamo ?

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Ylegña : mamaela ya unlie . Manmamaela ya jalie manu nae sumaga ya mañagaja yan güiya , güije na jaane , sa jijut y ora y mina dies .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Si Andres y chelun Simon Pedro , güiya uno gui dos y jumungog umadingan an Juan , yan madalalag güe .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Güiya jasoda finena y cheluña as Simon , ya ilegña nu güiya : Tasoda y Mesias ( ni y cumequeilegña : güiya si Cristo ) .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Ya macone guato as Jesus ; anae inatan as Jesus ilegña : Jago Simon , patgon Jonas : jago mafanaan Sefas ( cumequeilegña : acho ) .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Y siguiente na jaane , malago si Jesus malag Galilea , ya jasoda si Felipe , taotao Betsaida , gui siudan Andres yan Pedro .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Si Felipe jasoda si Nataniel ya ilegña nu güiya : Esta tasoda ayo y jatugue si Moises gui tinago yan y profeta , Jesus , taotao Nasaret y patgon José .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Ya ilegña si Nataniel : Guinin Nasaret siña jumuyong minauleg ? Ylegña si Felipe : maela ya unlie .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Si Jesus jalie mamaela para iya güiya , si Nataniel , ya ilegña nu güiya : Estagüe senmagajet iyon Israel , na taya finababa guiya güiya .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Nataniel : Guine manu na untungo yo ? Manope si Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Antes di si Felipe uninagang , na gaegue jao gui papa y ygos , guajo julie jao .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Manope si Nataniel ya ilegña : Rabi , jago uje y lajin Yuus , jago uje y ray guiya Israel .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Manope si Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Sa jusangane jao , na julie jao gui papa y ygos , ya unjonggue ? Jago unlie mandangculoña na güinaja qui este .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jao , y mamaela na tiempo nae unlie y langet mababa ya y angjet sija guine as Yuus mangajujulo yan manututunog gui jilo y Lajin taotao .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Y mina tres na jaane , mafatinas y guipot umasagua , gui Cana , siudan Galilea , ya y nanaña si Jesus gaegue güije .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Ya si Jesus yan y disipuluña maagange locue para y guipot umasagua .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Anae taya y bino , y nanaña si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Taya binoñija .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya si Jesus : Pot jafayo na juentalo nu jago , palaoan ? trabia ti mafato y orajo .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Si nanaña ilegña ni manmañeñetbe : Fatinas todo y tinagoña .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Y estaba güije saes lauyan acho , parejoja yan y guinasgasñija y Judios , na manulat , cada uno , dos pat tres cantaro .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu sija : Nafanbula este sija lauyan janom . Ya manafanbula asta y pachot .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Chile pago ya innae y maestrosala ; ya machule .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Ya anae y maestrosala jachague y janom na mafatimas bino , ya ti jatungo guine mano : ( lao y manmañeñetbe tumungo , na jachule y janom ) , y maestrosala jaagange y nobio ;

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Todo y taotao janafofona y mauleg na bino ; ya yaguin esta manjaspog , ayo nae y mas manaelaye : lao jago unnanana y mauleg na bino asta pago .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Este na tutujon y señatña sija , jafatinas si Jesus , guiya Cana suidan Galilea , ya janamatungo y minalagña ; ya y disipuluña sija majonggue güe .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Despues di este tumunog guiya Capernaum , güiya yan y mañeluña yan y disipuluña sija , ya mañaga güije ti megae na jaane .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: N	2	13		54240	 ¶ Y estaba güije jijot y pascuan y Judios , ya si Jesus cajulo guiya Jerusalem .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Ya jasoda gui guimayuus manmanbebende y nubiyo yan y quinilo , yan y paluma , yan y manmanulalaeca manmatatachong :

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Ya mañaolag ni tale , ya janafanmalago todo gui guimayuus , yan y quinilo , yan y nubiyo ; yan y machapon y salape y manmanulalaeca , yan manaalinquin y lamasa ,

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Ya ilegña ni manmanbebende ni paluma : Nafanjanao güine este sija na güinaja , ya chamiyo fumatitinas y guima tata , guima namajan .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Entonses manmanjaso y disipuluña ni estaba matugue : Ynigo y guimamo cumano yo .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: N	2	18		54290	 ¶ Y Judio sija manmanope ya ilegñija ; Jafa na señat unfanuejam taegüije ayo , sa jago unfatinas este sija na güinaja ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Si Jesus manope ya ilegña : Yulang este na gumayuus , ya y tres na jaane ; junacajulo talo .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Ayonae y Judio sija ilegñija : Gui cuarentaisaes años manacajulo este na gumayuus , ya jago , gui tres na jaane , unacajulo ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Lao güiya umadingan ni guima tataotaoña .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Enao mina anae cajulo guine manmatae , y disipuluña jajaso na munjayan jasangane este , ya manmanjonggue ni tinigue sija yan y sinangan ni jasangan si Jesus .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: N	2	23		54340	 ¶ Ya , güiya gaegue guiya Jerusalem gui pascua , y jaane ni guipot , ya megae manmanjonggue ni naanña , anae malie sija y señatña sija ni jafatinas .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Lao si Jesus namaesa , ti jaangoco güe guiya sija , sa güiya jatungo todo taotao ,

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Ya taya nesesida na jaye unae testimonio ni taotao , sa güiya tumungo y guaja gui jalom taotao .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: YA guaja un taotao Fariseo na naanña si Nicodemo , prinsipe y Judiosija .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Este mato gui as Jesus gui puenge ya ilegna nu güiya : Rabi , jame intingo na jago maestro guine as Yuus , sa taya siña fumatinas este sija na señat , ni unfatitinas , yaguin ti sumisija yan Yuus .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Ynepe as Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Magajet ya magajet y jusangane jao , na y ti mafañago talo , ti siña jalie y raenon Yuus .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Nicodemo : Jafa muna siña y taotao mafañago yaguin este biju ; siña güe jumalom dos biaje , talo gui jalom y tiyan nanaña ya umafañago ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ynepe as Jesus : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jao , na y ti mafañago ni janom yan ni iyon Espiritu , ti siña jumalom gui raenon Yuus .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Todo y mafañago ni guine catne , catneja güe ; ya y mafañago guine Espiritu , espirituja güe .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Chamo ninamamanman ni jusangane jao : Y nesesita jamyo na mafañago talo .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Y manglo manguaefe mano malagoña , ya unjungog y bengbengña , lao ti untungo guine manu mague , ni tampoco para manu guato . Taegüenao todo ayo y manmafañago guine Espiritu .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Si Nicodemo manope ya ilegña : Jafa muna siña este ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Ynepe as Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Jago un maestro guiya Israel ya ti untungo este ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jao , Y tatungo , tasangan ; ya y talie tadeclara , ya ti inresibe y testimoniota .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Yaguin jusangane jao güinajan tano , ya ti unjonggue , jafa taemano unjonggue yaguin jusangane jao güinajan langet ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Ya taya cajulo gui langet , güiyaja y tumunog guine y langet , güiya matungo , y Lajin taotao ni y gaegue gui langet ,

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Ya jaf taemanoja si Moises janacajulo y serpiente gui desierto , taegüijeja na nesesita na y Lajin taotao umanacajulo .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Para todo ayo y jumonggue güe , ti siña malingo , ya guaja linâlâña na taejinecog .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: N	3	16		54520	 ¶ Sa taegüenao na jaguaeya si Yuus y tano , janae ni linilisja Lajiña y para todo ayo y jumonggue güe , ti siña malingo , ya guaja linâlâña na taejinecog .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Sa ti jatago si Yuus y Lajiña guato gui tano , para usapit y tano , lao para y tano unalibre pot güiya .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Y jumonggue güe , ti umasapit ; ayo y ti jumonggue güe ayo umasapit , sa ti manjonggue ni naan unoja na Lajin Yuus .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Ya este na sinapit , na y inina malag y tano , ya y taotao sija gaonñija y jemjom qui y inina , sa y finatinasñija taelaye .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Sa todo ayo y fumatinas y taelaye , chatlie y inina , ya ti malag y inina , sa y chechoña no sea umareprende .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Ayo y fumatinas y magajet , malag y inina , para y unamatungo finatinasña , sa y finatinasña guine as Yuus .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: N	3	22		54580	 ¶ Despues di estesija , mato si Jesus yan y disipuluña sija , gui un tano Judea ya gaegue güije yan sija managpange .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Managpapange locue si Juan , guiya Enon , jijot guiya Salim , sa gaegue güije megae na janom : ya sija manmamaela , ya manmatagpange .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Sa si Juan trabia ti mapopolo gui catset .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Ya guaja un inaguaguat entre sija yan y disipulon Juan yan y Judio sija pot y guinasgas .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Ya manmato gui as Juan , ya ilegñija nu güiya : Rabi , ayo y gaegue güije guinin iya jago , gui otro banda Jordan ni unnae testimonio , estagüe ! na jatagpange , yan y todo y taotao manmato guiya güiya .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Manope si Juan ilegña : Ti siña y taotao manresibe jafa , yaguin ti manae guine y langet .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Jamyoja innae testimonio na guinin jusangan : Ti guajo si Jesucristo , lao guajo matago gui menaña .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Ya guaja asaguaña , güiya y nobio locue ; lao amigon nobio , ni y tomotojgue ya jajujungogja , ya magof dangculo pot y sinangan y nobio . Taegüine pues este minagofjo esta macumple .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Güiya siempre , lumálamodong ; ya guajo manaladiquique .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: N	3	31		54670	 ¶ Y guinin jila mague , güiya mas taquilo qui todo ; ya y iyon y tano , tanoja güe , ya iyon y tanoja jasasangan ; ya y mamaela guine langet , güiya iyajululo .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Tanae testimonio , nu y lumie ya jajungog , ya taya rumesibe y testimonioña .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Ya y rumesibe y testimonioña , este sumeyo na si Yuus , güiya magajet .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Sa y tinago as Yuus , y fino Yuus jasangan ; sa si Yuus ti mannanae güe ni y Espiritu pot medida .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Sa y tata yaña y Lajiña ya todo y güinaja japolo gui canaeña .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Y jumonggue y Lajiña guaja taejinecog na linâlâ ; ya ayo y ti manjonggue y Lajiña , ti ulie linâlâ , lao y binibon Yuus gaegue gui jiloña .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: ANAE y Señot jatungo , na Fariseo sija manmanjungog , na si Jesus jafatinas disipuluña ya jatagpange megaeña qui si Juan .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Achogja ti si Jesus namaesa matagpange , lao y disipuluñaja ) ,

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Jadingo guiya Judea , ya mapos talo malag Galilea .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Ya janesesita na umalofan inanaco Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Mato pues gui un siudan Samaria , na mafanaan Sicar , jijot gui fangualuan na si Jacob janae si José , lagiña .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Ya gaegue güine y tipo Jacob . Enaomina si Jesus , sa yayas güe guinin y chalan , matachong gui oriyan y tipo . Güenao na ora cana a las saes .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Mato un palaoan Samaria para ufanlupog janom ; ya si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Naeyo ya juguinem .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Sa y disipuluña manmapos para y siuda , para ufanmamajan nengcano .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya y palaoan Samaria : Jaftaemano na jago y Judio jao , ya untagojit najunaguinemjao , ya guajo palaoan Samaria ? ( Sa y Judio sija ti manatungo yan y taotao Samaria ) .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Manope si Jesus , ya ilegña nu güiya : Yaguin untungo y ninaeña si Yuus yan jaye güe y sumangane jao , naeyo ya juguinem : jago ungagao güe ya güiya unninae janom lalâlâ .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Ya y palaoan ilegña nu güiya : Señot , taya siña unlupog , sa y tipo tadong : amano pues nae guaja jao ni y janom lalâlâ .

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ada dangculoña jao qui y tatanmame as Jacob , ni y numaejam nu este na tupo , ya güiya gumiguinem yan famaguonña , yan y gaña gâgâ sija ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Manope si Jesus , ya ilegña nu güiya : Jaye y guminem nu este na janom , güiya umajo talo .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Lao ayo y guminem uje na janom y junae güe , para todo y tiempo ti umajo ; ya ayo na janom y guajo junae güe , güiya y janom tupo , ni jumuyong para linâlâ na taejinecog .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya y palaoan : Señot , naeyo nu este na janom para ti siñayo majo , ni jutalo mague para jufanlupog .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Janao agange y asaguamo , ya unmamaela güine mague .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Manope y palaoan ya ilegña nu güiya : Taya asaguajo . Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Mauleg sinanganmo na ilegmo . Taya asaguajo .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Sa sinco jagas asaguamo ; ya pago y gaegue guiya jago , ti güiya y asaguamo : este unsangan pot minagajet .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya y palaoan : Señot , pineloco nu jago , profeta jao .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Y tatanmame manmanadodora güine gui jalomtano , ya jamyo ilegmiyo , na iya Jerusalem , ayo na lugat , siempre nae umafatinas y adorasion .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Palaoan , jonggue yo sa ufato y ora , na ti este na jalomtano , ni iya Jerusalem , inadora jamyo si Yuus Tata .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Jamyo inadora ti intingo . Jame inadora y tiningomame , sa y satbasion y Judio sija güiya .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Lao y jaane umamaela , ya güiya güe pago , nae y magajet na manmanadododora , uje adodora si Yuus Tata gui espiritu yan y minagajet ; sa si Yuus Tata , locue jaaliligao ayo sija y umadodora güe .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Si Yuus , güiya Espiritu , ya y umadora güe , siempre jaadora güe y espiritu yan y minagajet .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya y palaoan : Guajo jutungo na y Mesias umamaela ( ayo y naanña si Cristo ) ; yaguin mato güe , güiya ufanagüejit todo .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Guajoyo , ni umadingangane jao .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: N	4	27		54990	 ¶ Ya pot este manmato y disipuluña ya ninafanmanman pot y umadingan yan y palaoan : ya ni uno siña umalog : Jafa finaesesenmo ? pat , pot jafa uncuentutuse güe ?

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Taegüenao y palaoan japolo y batdeña , ya mapos malag y siuda , jasangane y taotao sija ya ilegña :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: Fanmamaela ya inlie un taotao ni sumangane yo todo y finatinaso ! Güiya buente si Cristo ?

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Manmapos gui siuda , ya manmalag as Jesus .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Ayo na tiempo magagagao güe ni disipulo sija , ilegñija : Rabi , chocho !

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña na sija : Guaja najo nengcano na jamyo ti intingo .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Enaomina y disipulo sija ilegñija entre sija : Buente guaja chumulilie naña ?

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Y nengcanojo y jufatinas y minalago ayo y tumago yo , ya magpo chechoña .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Ya ti ilegmiyo : Guaja trabia cuatro na meses nae ufato y quineco ? Estagüe na jusangane jamyo : Fanalagquilo y matanmiyo ya inatan y fangualuan sija , sa esta manapaca para quineco .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Ya y mangoco uresibe y apasña , ya uchule y tinegcha para taejinecog na linâlâ ; para ayo y mangoco , ya ayo y manananom mandaña gui minagof .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Ya pot este macumple y sinangan : uno manananom ya y otro mangongoco .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Guajo jamyo tumago para infanmangoco ya ti jamyo chumogüe ; otro manmachocho ya jamyo manjalom gui chechoñija .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: N	4	39		55110	 ¶ Ya megae na taotao Samaria , taotao güije na siuda , manmanjonggue nu güiya pot y sinangan y palaoan , sa manae testimonio na ilegña : Jasangane yo todo ni y finatinasjo .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Enao mina anae y taotao Samaria manmato guiya güiya , magagao na usaga ya ufandaña ; ya güiya sumaga güije dos na jaane .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Ya y manmanjonggue nu güiya gofmegae pot y sinanganña .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu y palaoan : Pago ti pot y finomo na injenggue ; sa jame mismo injingog güe , ya intingo na este , güiya y magajet na Salvadot y tano .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: N	4	43		55150	 ¶ Ya depues di dos na jaane , jumanao güije ya malag Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Potjafa na si Jesus mismo manae testimonio , na y profeta gui tanoña taya onraña .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Ya pot este anae malag Galilea , y taotao Galilea maresibe güe sa malie todo y finatinasña guiya Jerusalem , na jafatinas gui tiempo y guipot ; sa sija locue manmalag y guipot .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: N	4	46		55180	 ¶ Mato , otro biaje , si Jesus , guiya Cana siuda guiya Galilea , nae y jafatinas bino y janom : ya guaja güije un magalaje na y lajiña malango guiya Capernaum .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Ya anae jajungog na si Jesus , jumanao gui Juda ya tumunog para Galilea , mapos güe malag as Jesus , ya jagagao na utunog guiya Capernaum , ya uamte y lajiña , sa esta cumequematae .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Enao mina si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Yaguin ti inlie señat sija , yan y ninamanman sija , ti injenggue .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Ya ilegña y magalage nu güiya : Señot , tunog lasajyao , antes qui umatae y lajijo !

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu güiya : Janao , sa y lajimo lâlâ ! Jajonggue y taotao y sinangan Jesus ni y sinangane güe , ya mapos .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Ya anae güiya tumutunog , y familiaña matagam güe ya masangane na ilegñija , Na y lajimo lâlâ !

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Mamaesen jafa na ora y lajiña na mumauleg , ya ilegñija : Nigap gui las siete na ora pinelo ni calenturaña .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Jatungo y tataña enao na ora nae sinangane güe as Jesus , Y lajimo lâlâ ; ya güiya namaesa jajonggue yan todo y familiaña !

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Este y mina dos na señat , na jafatinas si Jesus , anae jinanaoña guiya Judea , para Galilea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: DESPUES di manmalofan este sija , guaja gupot y Judio sija ya si Jesus cajulo guiya Jerusalem .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Ya iya Jerusalem , jijot gui petta quinilo sija , guaja un tangque janom na mafananaan gui fino Hebreo , Betesda , na guaja sinco potta .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Ya manestaba güije megagae na manmalango : bachet , mangojo , yan mansogsog .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Ya gaegue güije un taotao na esta malofan treinta y ocho años na malango .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Linie as Jesus na umaason , ya anae jatungo na amam na tiempo , ilegña nu güiya : Malago jao na umagong ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Ynepe güe ni y malango : Señot , taya jaye yo unninajalom gui tangque y tiempo nae y janom sigue ni calalamten , ya anae jumajanaoyo , otro tumunog antes qui guajo .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Sinanangane as Jesus : Cajulojao , jatsa y camamo ya unjanao !

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Ya enseguidas magong y chetnot ayo na taotao , ya jajatsa y camaña ya mapos . Lao ayo na jaane sabado .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: N	5	10		55350	 ¶ Ylegñija y Judio sija nu y manamagong : Sabado , este na jaane , ti tunas unchule y camamo !

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Manope güe : Ayo y munamagong yo , güiya namaesa sumangane yo : jatsa y camamo ya unjanao .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Entonses mafaesen güe : Jaye enao na taotao y sumangane jao , na unjatsa y camamo yan unjanao ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Ayo y guinin minamagong güe , ti jatungo jaye ; sa si Jesus esta mapos , sa gaegue güije na lugat , un linajyan taotao .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Sineda güe despues as Jesus , gui templo , ya ilegña : Estagüe esta magong jao ; chamo umiisao talo no sea na taelayeña qui este ufato guiya jago .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Ayo na taotao mapos , ya jasangane Judio sija na si Jesus ninamagong y chetnotña .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Ya pot este na rason , y Judio sija madulalag si Jesus , sa y jafatinas este na güinaja gui sabado na jaane .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Entonses si Jesus maninepe : Si tatajo jafatitinas asta pago , yan guajo locue jufatitinas .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Ya pot este na rason y Judio sija japrocura mas dangculo para ujapuno , say ti janainaleja y sabado na jaane , lao pot y jasangan locue na si Yuus güiya y tataña ; jafatitinas güiyaja parejo yan si Yuus .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: N	5	19		55440	 ¶ Entonses si Jesus manope ilegña nu sija : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Ti siña y Lajiña jafatinas jafa pot güiya namaesa , lao jafa y jalie finatinas y tata ; sa todo y finatinasña , taemanoja y Lajiña locue fumatinas .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Sa y Tata yaña y Lajiña ya jafanue nu güiya todo ni jafatitinas ; ya jafanue nu güiya y checho ni mandangculo , ya jamyo unfanmanman .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Sa taegüenao si Tata janafangajulo y manmatae ya jananae linâlâñija , taegüije locue y Lajiña janae y linâlâ , jaye malagoña .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Sa y Tata taya jaye jajujusga , lao todo y juisio , janae y Lajiña .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Para todo ufanmanonra ni Lajiña jaf taemanoja jaonra y Tata . Ya y ti umonra y Lajiña , ti jaonra si Tata ni tumago güe .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Y jumungog y sinanganjo , ya jumonggue ayo y tumago yo , guaja linâlâfia taejinecog ; ya ti ufato gui sinapet ; lao esta malofan guine y finatae para y linâlâ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Y ora mamamaela , ya pago esta ; na y manmatae sija ujajungog y inagang Lajin Yuus ; ya ayo sija y jumungog , ufanlâlâ .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Sa taegüine y Tata guaja linâlâfia guiya güiyaja ; taegüineja janae locue y Lajiña , para uguaja linâlâña guiya güiyaja :

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Ya janae locue ninasiñaña para ufatinas juisio , sa güiya y Lajin taotao .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Chamiyo ninafanmamanman ni este : sa y ora mamamaela , na todo ayo sija y mangaegue gui naftan , umajungog y inagangña ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Ya jumanao juyong ; y fumatinas mauleg , ufanjuyong gui quinajulo para linâlâ ; ya ayo sija y fumatinas taelaye , y quinajulo para sinapit .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: N	5	30		55550	 ¶ Ti siña yo namaesa mamatinas jafa : taemanoja y jiningogco , ayoja jujusga , sa y juisioco tunas , sa ti jualiligao y minalagojo ; lao y minalago y tata ni tumago yo .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Yaguin mannae yo testimonio nu guajo namaesa , y testimoniojo ti magajet .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Guaja otro na mannanae testimonio . nu guajo ; ya guajo jutungo na y testimonioña , ni y ninaiña pot guajo , magajet .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Jamyo manmatago para as Juan , ya güiya mannae testimonio ni magajet ;

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Lao y testimonio ni juresibe , ti guinin y taotao : lao jusangane estesija , para jamyo infanlibre .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Güiya y lámpara ni masonggue ya maniina ; ya jamyo infanmalago manmagof didide na tiempo gui candetña .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Ya y testimonio ni gaegue guiya guajo mas dangculo qui y gaegue gui as Juan ; sa y finatinas ni y Tata numaeyo para umacumple , ayo na finatinas na guajo jufatinas ; este jatestifica nu guajo , nu y Tata tumago yo .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Si Tata locue ni y tumago yo , güiya namaesa mannae y testimonio nu guajo . Jamyo tat nae injingog bosña , ni locue ti inlie jechuraña .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Ya taya sinanganña sumaga guiya jamyo ; sa ti injenggue na güiya manago .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Aligao y tinigue sija sa y jinasonmiyo iya güiya nae inguaja y linâlâ na taejinecog ; ya sija todo ufanmannae testimonio nu guajo ,

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Ti manmalago jamyo manmamaela guiya guajo , para uguaja linâlâ .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Ynenra y taotao sija , guajo ti juresibe .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Lao guajo jutungo jamyo na taya y güinaeyan Yuus ni y gaegueja guiya jamyo .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Guajo mato yo pot y naan Tatajo , ya ti inresibe yo ; yaguin otro mato pot y naanña namaesa , ayo inresibe .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Jafa muna siña injenggue jamyo ni y rumesibe inenra uno sija yan otro , ya ti inaligao y inenraja na mato guine as Yuus na unoja ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ti injaso na jufaaela jamyo gui as Tata : ya y fumaaela jamyo si y Moises , ayo nae gaegue ininangganmiyo .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: si Moises .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Lao yaguin tinigueña sija ti injenggue , jafa muna injenggue y sinanganjo ?

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: DESPUES di manmalofan estesija , mapos si Jesus malag y otro banda y tasen Galilea , na ayo y tasen Tiberias .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Ya madalalag güe ni y dangculo na linajyan taotao sa jalie sija y megaegae na señat ni jafatinas gui manmalango .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Ya cajulo si Jesus gui un ogso , ya matachong güije yan y disipuluña sija .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Ya jijot y guipot pascua , guipot y Judio sija .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Ya anae tumalag jilo si Jesus , jalie na guaja mamamaela para iya güiya , un linajyan na taotao , ilegña as Felipe : Manu nae tafanmamajan pan para ufañocho este sija ?

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Jasangan este para uchague güe ; sa güiya tumungo jafa ufatinas .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Manope si Felipe : Dosiento na denario na pan , ti ufannajong para cada uno guiya sija ufañule didide .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ylegña nu güiya , uno gui disipuluña sija , Andres , chelun Simon Pedro :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: Un patgon gaegue güine na guaja sinco pan sebada yan dos güijan na diquique : Lao jafa na estesija , gui entalo y este na minegae ?

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus : Nafanason y taotao . Ya megae na chaguan gaegue güije na lugat , ya manason y taotao , cana sinco mil na lalaje .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Ya jachule si Jesus ayo sija na pan ya anae janae si Yuus grasias , jaipie todo ayo y manaason ; taegüijija locue ni y güijan sija , jaf taemanoja y minalagoñija .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Ya anae manjaspog ilegña ni disipuluña sija : Joca todo y dinidide ni y tetenjan , sa munga guaja malingo .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Ya jajoca todo , ya janabula dose na canastran dangculo ni y dinidide , dinididin y sincoja na pan sebada , y tejnan ayo sija y mañocho .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Ayo sija na taotao , anae jalie y señat ni jafatinas si Jesus , ilegñija : Este senmagajet na güiya y profeta ni para umamaela gui tano .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: N	6	15		55870	 ¶ Ayo na tiempo jatungo si Jesus , na ufanmamaela para umacone pot minetgot , ya jafatinas y ray , tumalo guato gui un jalomtano güigüiyaja namaesa .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Anae esta pupuenge manunog y disipuluña sija gui tase .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Ya manjalom gui un sajyan , ya manchinichile ni tase para Capernaum . Ya pago jomjom , ya si Jesus ti manfinatotoe sija .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ya cajulo dangculo na napon pot rason un dangculo na manglo na manguaefe .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Ya anae esta manmamogsae gui tase calang bente sinco pot trenta estadio , malie si Jesus na mamomocat gui jilo y tase ya lumalajijot guato gui sajyan : ya manmaañao sija .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Lao güiya ilegña nu sija : Guajoyo ; chamiyo fanmaañao !

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Manmagof anae maresibe gui sajyan ; ya ensiguidas mato y sajyan gui tano ni y jajananao güe .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: N	6	22		55940	 ¶ Y inagpaña na jaane , y linajyan taotao ni gaegue gui otro bandan tase , jalilie na taya güije mas na unoja na sajyan diquique , ya jatungo na si Jesus ti jumalom gui sajyan yan y disipuloña sija , lao y disipuloña sija esta manmapos sijaja ;

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: ( Ya manmato sija y sajyan diquique guine Tiberias , jijot güije na lugat anae mañocho ni pan , despues di y Señot janae si Yuus grasias . )

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Ya anae jalie y linajyan taotao sija na si Jesus taegüe güije , ni y disipuluña sija ; manjalom sija locue gui sajyan diquique , ya manmapos para Capernaum , maaliligao si Jesus .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Ya anae masoda gui otro bandan tase , ilegñija nu güiya : Rabi Ngaean nae mato jao güine ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Maninepe as Jesus ilegña : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo ; na inaliligao yo , ti pot y liniimiyo ni señat sija ; lao pot y quinanomiyo ni pan , y ninafanjaspog jamyo .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Fanmachocho , munga para ayo y fafalingo na nengcano , lao ayo na nengcano y sumaga taejinecog na linâlâ , ni y Lajin taotao numae jamyo ; sa güiya sineyo ni Tata , si Yuus .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Enao mina ilegñija nu güiya : Jafa tafatinas , para utafatinas y checho Yuus ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Si Jesus manope ilegña nu sija : Este y checho Yuus , na injenggue ayo y jatago .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Entonses ilegñija nu güiya : Jafa na señat unfatinas para inlie , ya injenggue jao ? Jafa chechomo ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Si tatanmame jacano y mana gui desierto , taemanoja y munjayan matugue ; pan guine y langet manmanae para u jacano .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Ya ilegña si Jesus nu sija : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo , na ti si Moises numae jamyo ni pan guine y langet , si Tatajo janae jamyo ni magajet na pan guine y langet .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Sa y pan Yuus ayo y tumunog guine y langet , ya jananae linâlâ y tano .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Ayo nae ilegñija nu güiya : Señot naejam siempre ni este na pan !

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Guajo y pan lalâlâ ; y mato guiya guajo , ti uñalang ; ya y jumonggue yo , ti umajo para taejinecog .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Lao jusangane jamyo ; na este inlie yo ya ti injenggue .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Todo y janae yo si Tata , ufato guiya guajo ; ya ayo y ufanmato guiya guajo , gosmagajet na guajo ti siña juyute güe juyong .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Sa tumunog yo guine y langet ti para jufatinas y minalagojo , lao y minalagoña ayo y tumago yo .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Ya este y minalagoña ayo y tumago yo , na todo y janae yo ti siña junafalingo taya , lao junacajulo güe gui uttimo na jaane .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ya este y minalagon Tata , na todo ayo y jalie y Lajiña ya jinenggue guiya güiya , uguaja linâlâña taejinecog ; ya junacajulo güe gui uttimo na jaane .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: N	6	41		56130	 ¶ Enaomina y Judio sija mamofea güe anae jasangan : Guajo y pan ni tumunog guine y langet .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Ya ilegñija : Ada ti güiya este as Jesus lajin José ? si tataña , yan nanaña tatungoja ? Jafa pues muna ilegña : Guajo tumunog guine y langet ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Si Jesus manope ya ilegña nu sija : Chamiyo fanmanmofefea entre jamyo .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Taya siña mato guiya guajo yaguin si Tata , ni tumago yo , ti quinene güe ; ya guajo junacajulo güe gui uttimo na jaane .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Matugue esta gui profeta sija : Ya todo ayo sija ufanmafanagüe finanagüen Yuus . Enaomina cada uno ni jumungog y Tata ya jatungo y mafanagüeña , ufato guiya guajo .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Munga yo na jusanganna guaja na taotao y esta jalie si Tata , lao ayo y mamaela guinin as Yuus , güiyaja jalie si Tata .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Ayo y jumonggue yo guaja linâlâña na taejinecog ,

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Guajo y pan y linâlâ .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Si tatanmiyo , jacano y mana gui jalomtano ya manmatae .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Estagüiya y pan ni tumunog guine y langet , para jaye y cumano güe , ti umatae .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Guajo y lalâlâ na pan ni tumunog guine y langet : yaguin guaja cumano este na pan , ulâlâ para todo y tiempo ; junggan ya y pan ni guajo mannae , guiya mismo catneco , na junae para linâlâ y tano .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: N	6	52		56240	 ¶ Managuaguat entre sija y Judio sija , ilegñija : Jafa muna usiña este na taotao unaejit ni catneña para utacano ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Si Jesus pot anão ilegña nu sija : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Yaguin ti incano y catnen y Lajin taotao , ya ti inguimen y jâgâña , taya linâlâ guiya jamyo .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Y cumano y catneco , ya jaguimen y jâgâjo , guaja linâlâña taejinecog , ya junacajulo güe gui uttimo na jaane .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Sa y catneco , güiya y magajet na nengcano ; ya y jâgâjo , güiya y magajet na guimen .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Ayo y cumano y catneco , y jaguimen y jâgâjo , sumaga guiya guajo , ya guajo guiya güiya .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Taegüine y Tata , ni lalâlâ , janamamaela yo , ya guajo lalâlâ pot si Tata ; taegüineja locue y cumano yo , güiya locue ulâlâ pot guajo .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Estagüiya y pan ni tumunog guine y langet ; ti parejo yan y tatanmiyo ni cumano y mana ya manmatae : y cumano este na pan ulâlâ para taejinecog .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Este sija jasangan guiya sunagoga , parejoja yan anae mamanagüe guiya Capernaum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: N	6	60		56320	 ¶ Enaomina megae gui disipuluña sija anae majungog este , ilegñija : Majetog na sinangan este ; jaye siña umecungog ?

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: potgüiyaja namaesa , na y disipuluña sija mangogonggong pot este , ya ilegña nu sija : Ninafañatsaga jamyo nu este ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Jafa yaguin inlie y Lajin taotao cajulo anae gaegue antes ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Y espiritu mannanae linâlâ ; y catne taya probechoña : y sinangan sija ni jusangane jamyo , ayo espiritu , yan ayo linâlâ .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Lao guajo palo guiya jamyo na ti manmanjonggue . Sa si Jesus desde y finenana jatungoja jaye sija y ti ufanmanjonggue , yan jaye y uinentrega güe .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Ya ilegña : Pot este na rason jusangane jamyo : na taya siña mato guiya guajo , yaguin ti ninae ni Tatajo .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: N	6	66		56380	 ¶ Ayo nae , megae gui disipoluña sija manalo tate , ya ti mañija talo manjanao yan güiya .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Ayo nae ilegña si Jesus ni dose : Manmalago jamyo manjanao locue ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Ynepe as Simon Pedro : Señot , jayejam injanao güe ? Jago nae guaja sija y sinangan ni taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ya jame injenggue , ya intingo na jago Ayo na Santos na guine as Yuus .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Si Jesus jaope sija : Ti juayig jamyo dose , ya y uno guiya jamyo anite ?

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Ya jasangan pot si Judas Iscariote , lajin Simon : sa este y para uinentrega gae , uno gui dose .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: YA despues di manmalofan estesija , si Jesus jumanao para Galilea : ya ti malago mamocat guiya Judea , sa y Judio sija maaliligao güe para umapuno .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Ya estaba jijot y guipot y Judio sija , na mafanaan gupot tabetnaculo .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Y mañeluña sija pot este na rason ilegñija nu güiya : Falofan güine , ya unjanao para Judea , para y disipulumo sija locue ujalie y chechomo sija ni unfatitinas .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Sa taya ni uno , mamatitinas jafa na güinaja gui secreto , ya güiyaja mismo ualigao na umatungo gui publico . Yaguin unfatitinas este sija na güinaja , fanuejao gui tano .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Sa mañeluña sija locue ti majonggue güe .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Y tiempoco ti mafato trabia , lao y tiemponmiyo siempre esta listo .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Y tano ti siña manchinatlie jamyo ; lao guajo jachatlie , sa mannae yo testimonio pot güiya , na y chechoña manaelaye .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Jamyo infangajulo güine na gupot ; guajo ti jucajulo güine na gupot ; sa y tiempoco trabia ti macumple .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jasangane estesija , sumaga trabia guiya Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: N	7	10		56530	 ¶ Lao anae y mañeluña sija mangajulo ; ayo nae güiya locue cumajulo gui guipot ; ti gui publico , lao calang gui secreto .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Ayo nae y Judio sija maaliligao güe gui guipot ; ya ilegñija : Manggue güe ?

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Ya guaja un dangculon gonggong entalo y linajyan taotao sija pot güiya ; sa guaja ilegñija : Güiya mauleg na taotao ; palo , ilegñija : Aje , lao jadadague y taotao sija .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Lao ni uno umadingan gui publico pot güiya , sa manmaañao ni Judio sija .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: N	7	14		56570	 ¶ Anae y entalo y guipot , cajulo si Jesus gui templo ya mamanagüe .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Enao muna y Judio sija manamanman ya ilegñija : Jafa muna jatungo este letra na ti umeeyag ?

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Maninepe as Jesus ilegña : Y finanagüeco , ti iyoco lao iyon ayo y tumago yo .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Yaguin guaja y mumalago fumatitinas y minalagoña , güiya utumungo y finanagüeco , cao güiya iyon Yuus , pat jusangan estesija na güinaja pot guajo namaesa .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
