text2: Y umadingan pot güiyaja , ualiligao y minalagña namaesa ; lao y umaligao y minalag iyon ayo y tumago güe , güiya magajet ya taya tinaelaye gaegue guiya güiya .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Ti manninae jamyo as Moises y tinago sija , ya taya uno guiya jamyo cumumple ya tinago sija ? Sajafa na inprocucura para inpino yo ?

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Y linajyan taotao manmanope : Anite guaja guiya jago ! Jaye promucucuraja pumano jao ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Manope si Jesus ya ilegña : Un chocho guajo fumatinas , ya todo jamyo ninafanmanman .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Pot este si Moises manninae jamyo ni y circunsision ( na ti guine as Moises lao iyon y tata sija ) , ya asta pago gui sabado incircunsida y taotao .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yaguin y taotao resibe gui sabado y circunsision , para ti umapoca y tinagon Moises ; manbubo jamyo nu guajo , sa junasenguefjomlo un taotao gui sabado na jaane ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Chamiyo injisga taemanoja y liniinmiyo , lao injisga taemanoja y cabales na juisio .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: N	7	25		56680	 ¶ Ylegñija locue palo gui taotao Jerusalem : Ti güiya este y manmaliligao para upuno .

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ya lie na umadingan jafa malagoña , ya taya sumangan jafa nu güiya . Siña na y magalaje sija jatungo magajet , na este si Cristo ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Lao jita tumungo este na taotao , guine mano güe : ya anae mato si Jesucristo , taya uno tumungo taotao mano .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Si Jesus entonses umagang gui . templo anae mamananagüe ilegña : Jamyo intingo yo , jaye yo , yan intingo locue taotao mano yo ; ya guajo mamaela ti pot guajoja : lao y tumago yo , güiya magajet , ya jamyo ti intingo güe .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Guajo tumungo güe , sa guine güiya yo , ya güiya tumago yo !

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Japrocura sija para macone güe , lao taya uno mato canaeña guiya güiya , sa y oraña trabia ti mafato .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Ya megae gui linajyan taotao jumonggue güe , ya ilegñija : Ada yaguin si Cristo mamaela , ujafatinas mas megae na señat qui y fumatiñas este na taotao ?

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Y Fariseo sija jumungog na y linajyan taotao manafaesen pot estesija , ya y manmagas mamale yan y Fariseo sija manmanago ni ofisiatñija para umacone .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Enaomina si Jesus ilegña : Trabia didide na tiempo gaegue yo guiya jamyo , ya despues bae falag ayo y tumago yo .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Ynaligao yo , ya ti inseda yo ; ya mano nae gaegue yo , jamyo ti siña manmamaela .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Entonses y Judio sija ilegñija entre sijaja : Para mano este , para ti siñajit tasoda güe ? Mapos buente para y manmachapon sija anae mangaegue sija gui entalo y Griego sija , ya mamnanagüe ni y Griego sija ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Jafa na sinangan na ayo y esta masangan : Inaligao yo ya ti inseda yo , ya mano nae gaegue yo , jamyo ti siña manmamaela .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: N	7	37		56800	 ¶ Y uttimo na jaane , dangculo na jaanin gupot , si Jesus tumojgue , ya umagang ilegña : Yaguin y taotao guaja minajo umamaela guiya guajo , ya uguinem .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Ya y jumonggueyo , taegüije y sinangan y Tinigue : y sanjalomña manmimilalag y sadog janom na lalâlâ .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Jasangan este na sinangan pot y Espiritu , ni para uresibe ayo sija y manmanjonggue guiya güiya : sa trabia taya mananae ni Espiritu Santo , sa si Jesus ti rumesibe y minalagña ,

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Entonses palo gui linajyan taotao , manmanjungog nu este na sinangan , ilegñija : Sumenmagajet na este güiya y ayo na profeta .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Y palo ilegñija : Este güiya si ayo na Cristo : Y palo despues ilegñija : Jafa ? guinin Galilea umamaela si Cristo ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Ti ilelegña y Tinigue , na si Cristo mamaela gui semiyan David , yan guinin y sengsong iya Betlehem anae sumaga si David ?

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Ya guaja inaguguat gui entalo linajyan taotao pot güiya .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Ya guaja guiya sija y manmalago na ujacone , lao taya uno siña minajalom canaeña guiya güiya .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: N	7	45		56880	 ¶ Ayonae y ofisiat sija manmalag y magas na mamale yan y Fariseo sija ; ya ilegñija nu sija : Sajafa muna ti inchile güe mague ?

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Y ofisiat sija manmanope : Taya na taotao umadingan taegüine .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Entonses y Fariseo sija maninepe : Jamyo locue manabag gui chalan ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Ada guaja palo y jumonggue güe gui magalaje sija pat y Fariseo sija ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Este sija na linajyan taotao ni ti jatungo y tinago sija , manmatdito .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Ylegña nu sija si Nicodemo ( ayo y mato gui as Jesus antes güiya uno guiya sija ) ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: Manjujusga un taotao y iyota na tinago , yaguin y finenana ti majungog guiya güiya ya matungo jafa y finatinasña ?

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Manmanope ya ilegñija nu güiya : Jago locue taotao Galilea ? Aligao , ya unlie , cao guine Galilea taya nae cajulo profeta .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Manalo guato cada uno gui guimañija .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: SI Jesus malag y egso Olibo .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Ya y taftaf gui egaan , tumalo guato gui templo ya todo y taotao sija manmato guiya güiya ; ya güiya matachong güije ya mamanagüe nu sija .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Entonses y escriba yan y Fariseo sija , macocona un palaoan na masoda gui adulterio , ya mapolo güe gui entalo ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Ylegñija nu güiya : Maestro , estagüe na palaoan , guine masoda gui adulterio , anae jafatinasja .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Y tinago Moises jatagojam na infagas ni y acho enao sija . Jago , jafa unsangan ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Este ilegñija , intienta güe para siña mafaaelagüe . Lao si Jesus dumilog papa , manugue gui tano ni y calolotña .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Ya como sisigue mafaesen , manatunasgüe ya ilegña nu sija : Yaguin uno guiya jamyo taeisao , fumagas nu y güiya , y finenana na acho .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Ya dumilog talo papa ya manugue gui tano ni y calolotña .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Ya anae manjungog sija , manjajanao juyong uno yan uno , matutujon gui mansenbijo asta y manuttimo ; ya si Jesus sumaga yan y palaoan ni y gaegue gui entalo .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Ya cajulo si Jesus , ya ilegña nu güiya : Palaoan , mano nae mangaegue sija ? taya ni uno nientensia jao ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Ya ilegña : Taya uno Señot . Ya ilegña si Jesus : Guajo locue ti jusentensia jao : janao ya chamo unisao talo .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: N	8	12		57080	 ¶ Mansinangane as Jesus talo ilegña nu sija : Guajo candet y tano : y dumalalag yo ti ufamocat gui jemjon ; ya guajaja candet y linâlâ .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Enaomina y Fariseo sija ilegñija nu güiya : Jago guiya jagoja mananae testimonio lao ti magajet na testimoniomo .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Manope si Jesus , ilegña nu sija : Achoja guajoja manae testimonio nu guajo , magajet na testimoniojo ; sa jutungo guine mano yo , yan para mano yo ; lao jamyo ti intingo guine mano yo , yan para mano yo .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Jamyo pot y catne injisga ; lao guajo ti jumusga ni jaye .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Yaguin guajo jumusga , y juisioco , güiya magajet ; sa ti guajoja ; lao guajo yan Tata ni tumago yo .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Junggan , ya esta matugue gui tinagomiyo na y testimonio y dos taotao , güiya magajet .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Guajo manae testimomio pot guajoja , yan manae yo testimonio si Tata ni tumago yo .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Entonses ilegñija nu guiya : Mano nae gaegue si Tatamo ? Manope si Jesus : Ti intingo yo yan ti intingo y Tatajo ; yaguin intingo yo , y Tatajo locue intingo .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Este na finijo jasangan si Jesus gui tesoro mamanagüe gui templo ; ya taya cumone güe ; sa asta pago ti mafato y oraño .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: N	8	21		57170	 ¶ Ya ilegña talo nu sija si Jesus : Guajo bae janao , ya inaligao yo , ya y isaomiyo nae infanmatae ; mano yo guato , jamyo ti siña manmamaela .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ylegñija entonses y Judio sija ; Upuno maesa güe ? sa ilegña mano yo guato , jamyo ti siña manmamaela .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jamyo iyon sampapa , guajo iyon sanjilo ; jamyo iyon este na tano ; guajo ti iyon este na tano .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Pot enao jusangane jamyo na infanmatae gui isaomiyo ; sa yaguin ti injenggue na guajo yo ; y isaomiyo nae infanmatae .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Enao muna ilegñija nu güiya ? Jago , jayejao ? Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Nae matutujon jusangane jamyo locue .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Megae na güinaja yo , para jusangane jamyo ya injisga jamyo : ya y tumago yo , güiya magajet ; ya jafa y jiningogco guiya güiya , ayo sija jusangan gui tano .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Lao sija ti matungo na güiya y jacuentuse sija ni pot Tata .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Enaomina ilegña si Jesus : Ngaean nae infangajulo jamyo y Lajin taotao , ayo nae intingo na guajo yo , ya taya jufatitinas pot guajoja ; lao jaftaemano si Tata fumanagüe yo taegüine jusangan .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Ya y tumagoyo , güiya gaegue guiya guajo ; ti jadingo yo maesaja sa jufatitinas siempre minagofña .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Anae jasasangan este sija na güinaja megae jumongguegüe .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: N	8	31		57270	 ¶ Ayo nae ilegña si Jesus ni Judio sija ni y jumonggue güe : Yaguin jamyo insisique y sumaga gui sinanganjo , jamyo manmagajet disipulujo ;

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Ya intingo y minagajet ya y minagajet inninafanlibre jamyo .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Manmanope as Jesus : Jame semiyan Abraham , ya ti infanmañetbe ni jaye ; jafa muna ilegmo : Jamyo unafanlibre ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Maninepe as Jesus : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo , na todo ayo y fumatinas y isao , güiya tentago y isao .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Ya y tentago ti usago gui guima para todo tiempo ; lao y lajiña sumaga para todo y tiempo .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Yaguin y Lajin Yuus munafanlibre jamyo , entonses magajet na manlibre jamyo .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Guajo jutungo na jamyo semiyan Abraham ; lao manmalago jamyo para inpino yo ; sa y sinanganjo ti omlat guiya jamyo .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Guajo y liniijo gui as Tata jusasangan , ya jamyo y jiningogmiyo gui as tatanmiyo infatitinas .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Manmanope ya ilegñija nu güiya : Si Abraham tatata . Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Yaguin famaguon Abraham jamyo ; y chechon Abraham infatinas jamyo .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Lao manmalago jamyo pago para inpino yo , taotao na jagas jusangane jamyo ni magajet , ayo y jujungog gui as Yuus ; si Abraham ti fumatinas este .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Jamyo infatitinas y finatinas tatanmiyo . Ylegñija nu güiya : Jame ti finañagon ábale ; un tataja guajajit , si Yuusja .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu sija : Yaguin si Yuus tatanmiyo , magajet na inguflie yo ; sa guajo jumuyong yan mato yo guinin as Yuus ; ti jumuyong yo guinin guajoja , lao güiya tumago yo .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Jafa muna ti intingo y sinanganjo ? Sa ti siña injingog y finojo .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Jamyo iyon tatanmiyo anite : jamyo ya y guinâumabale y tatanmiyo intatanga na infatinas . Güiya y mamuno desde y tutujoña ; ya ti sumaga gui minagajet , sa taya minagajet gaegue guiya güiya . Yaguin jasangan mandague , y iyoña jasangan ; sa dacon güe , ya tatan dacon güe .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Ya ti injenggue yo , sa jusangane jamyo ni magajet .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Jaye guiya jamyo ucombense yo ni y isao ? Yaguin jusangan y magajet , pot jafa muna jamyo ti injenggue yo ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Y iyon Yuus , y sinangan Yuus jajungog ; ya pot este na rason jamyo ti injijingog , sa ti iyon Yuus jamyo .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Manmanope entonses y Judio sija , ya ilegñija nu guiya : Ti mauleg y sinanganmame , na jago taotao Samaria , ya gaeanite jao ?

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Manope si Jesus : Guajo tae anite yo ; lao juonra si Tata , ya jamyo indesonra yo .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Ya guajo ti umaliligao inenrajo ; guaja ayo na umaliligao ya jajujusga .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Magajet y magajet jusangane jamyo : Yaguin y taotao jaadaje y sinanganjo , ti ulie finatae para taejinecog .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Entonses y Judio sija ilegñija nu güiya . Pago nae intingo na gaeanite jao . Si Abraham matae yan y profeta sija ; ya jago sumangan : Yanguin y taotao jaadaje y sinanganjo , ti ulie finatae para taejinecog .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Jago dangculoña qui si tatanmame as Abraham ni esta matae ? Yan y profeta manmatae . Jaye jao fumatinas namaesa ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Manope si Jesus : Yaguin junamalagyo maesa , y minalagjo taya guaja ; güiya si Tata y numanamalag yo : ya ilegmiyo na güiya si Yuusmiyo .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Ya ti intingo güe , lao guajo tumungo güe ; yaguin ilegco na ti jutungo güe , dacon yo parejo yan jamyo mandacon : lao jutungo güe yan juadaje y sinanganña .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Si Abraham , tatanmiyo mumagof sa jalie y jaanijo ; ya anae jalie ninamagof .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Pot este ilegñija nu güiya y Judio sija : Asta pago taya jao sincuenta años , ya unlie si Abraham ?

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Ylegña nu sija si Jesus : Magajet ya magajet jusagane jamyo , antes qui si Abraham , esta guajo .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Manmañule entonses acho , para umadagas güe : lao si Jesus mapos gui templo , ti matungo .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: ANAE malofan gui sanmenan , jalie un taotao na bachet desde y mafañagoña .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ya mafaesen güe ni y disipuloña ilegñija : Rabi , jaye umisao , este na taotao pat y mañaenaña , para que umafañago bachet ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Manope si Jesus : Ti umisao este na taotao ni sija manaenaña lao para y finatinas Yuus ya ufafanue guiya güiya .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Tanesesita na infatitinas y checho ayo y tumago yo mientras y jaane ; sa an mato y puenge , taya siña machocho .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Anae gagaegue yo gui jilo y tano , y candet y tano guajoja .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Munjayan jasangan este , tumola gui tano , ya jafatinas fache nu y tela , ya y fache japalae y atadog y bachet ,

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Janao fagase jao gui estanque Siloe ( Ya cumequeilegña , tinago ) . Enao mina maposgüe ya fagase güe , ya anae tumalo guato este manlie .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Pot este y tiguangña sija yan ayo y guinin manmalie antes , ya matungo na ampmam na mangagagao limosña , ilegñija : Ada ti este güiya ayo y matatachong ya gagao ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Guaja sija sumangan : Güiya este ; ya guaja palo sija sumangan : Ale , lao parejo yan güiya . Lao güiyaja ilegña : Guajo yo .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Jaf taemano mababaña y atadogmo ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Manope ya ilegña : Ayo na taotao , naanña si Jesus , güiya fumatinas y fachae ya palae y atadogco , ya ilegña nu guajo : Janao falag y estanque Siloe ya unfagase jao ! Mapos yo ya jufagase yo ya juresibe y liniijo .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Manggue yuje ? Ylegña : Ti jutungo .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: N	9	13		57680	 ¶ Macone guato gui Fariseo sija y guinin manbachet .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Ya ayo na jaane sabado anae si Jesus jafatinas y fachae , ya jababa y atadogña sija .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Y Fariseo sija locue mafaesen güe talo : Jafa muna manlie güe . Ya ilegña nu sija : Janaye ni fachae y sanjilo gui atadogco , ya jufagase yo , ya manlie yo .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Ya palo gui Fariseo sija ilegñija : Este na taotao ti güiya guinin as Yuus , sa ti jaadaje y sabado . Lao palo sija ilegñija : Jafa muna siña un taotao ni gaeisao , jafatitinas taemanoja y señat sija ? Ya guaja dibision gui entaloñija .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Ylegñija talo ni bachet : Jago , jafa ilegmo nu güiya , ya esta mababa pot güiya y atadogmo sija ? Ya ilegña : Profetagüe .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Ayo nae y Judio sija , ti majonggue y esta masangan na güiya , y guinin bachet , ya esta jarisibe y liniiña , asta que nae maagange y mañaena y bachet ni esta jarisibe liniiña .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Ya manmafaesen ilegñija : Este patgonmiyo ni ilegmiyo bachet guinin y mafañagoña ? Ya jafa pago ninamanlie ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Manope y tata ya , ilegñija : Yntingo na este patgonmame , ya bachet guinin y mafañagoña :

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Lao jaftaemano pago na manliigüe , ti intingo ; pat jaye bumaba y atadogña , ti intingo ; faesen güe ; guaja sacanña : Güiya usangan pot güiyaja namaesa .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Este sija ilegñija si mañaenaña , sa manmaañao ni y Judio sija : sa unoja na jinaso gui entalo y Judio sija , na yaguin guaja sumangan na güiya si Cristo , umayute güe gui sanjiyong y sinagoga .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Pot este ilegñija sija mañaenaña : Gauja sacaña ; faesen güe .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Enao mina sija maagange talo y taotao ni y guinin bachet , ya ilegñija nu guiya : Nae minalag si Yuus : Jita tumungo na este na taotao güiya taotao isao güe .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Entonses manope yuje : Cao taotao isao güe , ti jutungo ; unoja jugoftungo ; na guajo , guinin bachet yo , ya pago manlie yo .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Entonses ilegñija talo : Jafa finatinasña nu jago ? Jaftaemano jababa y atadogmo ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Maninepe sija : Jusangane jamyo esta , ya ti injingog : Jafa muna manmalago jamyo injingog talo ? Ada manmalago jamyo buente locue disipuluña ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Entonses janafanmamajlao ya ilegñija : Jago disipuluña ; ya jame disipulon Moises !

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Jame intingo na si Yuus guinin jasangan pot si Moises ; lao este na taotao ti intingo taotao mano güe .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Manope y taotao ya ilegña nu sija : Jafa na namanman este , ya ti intingo jamyo taotao mano ; ya güiya bumaba y atadogco !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Jame intingo na si Yuus ti jajungog y manisao ; yaguin guaja maañao as Yuus ya jaosgue y minalagoña , este jiningog .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Guinin y tutujon y tano , taya nae majungog , ni uno mababa atadogña ni mafañago bachet .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Yaguin este ti guine as Yuus , ti siña jafatinas jafa .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Sija manmanope ilegñija nu güiya : Jago mafañago jao gui isao sija ! Ada jago fumanagüe jam ? Ya mayute juyong .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: N	9	35		57900	 ¶ Jajungog si Jesus na mayute juyong , ya anae jasoda , ilegña : Unjonggue y Lagin Yuus ?

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Manope güe ya ilegña : Jaye enao Señot , para guajo umajonggue güe ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Esta unlie güe ya ayo y umadingangange jao , güiya güe .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jujonggue , Señot . Ya jaadora güe .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus : Guajo pot juisio mamaela yo güine gui jilo y tano , para y ti manmanlilie , ufanmanlie ; ya y manmanlie , ayo sija ufanbachet .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Ya manmanjungog y ayo na Fariseo sija ni y mangaegue guiya güiya ya ilegñija nu güiya : Jame locue , manbachet jam ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Ylegña nu sija si Jesus : An mojon manbachet jamyo , taya isaomiyo ; pago nae insasangan , talie ; enao mina isaomiyo gagaegue .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: MAGAJET ya magajet y jusangane jamyo , na ti jumalon gui pettan y guelat y quinilo sija , lao ucajulo gui otro lugat , ayo y ladron yan saque .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Ya y jumalom gui petta , güiya y pastot y quinilo .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Ya pot guiya güiya y magas y petta ; ya y quinilo sija jajungog y inagangña : ya y gaña quinilo sija jaagang pot y naana , ya jacone sija gui san jiyong .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Anae jacone mapos y todo iyoña sija , güiya jumanao gui sanmenañija : ya quinilo sija madalalag güe , sa matungo y inagangña .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Lao y taotao juyong , sija ti madalalag güe , lao manmalago guato guinin menaña : sa ti jatungo y inagangña ni taotaoj uyong sija .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Este na acomparasion mansinangane as Jesus : lao sija ti jatungo jafa sija mansingane sija .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: N	10	7		58030	 ¶ Mantinalugua as Jesus ya ilegña nu sija : Magajet ya magajet y jusangane jamyo , na guajo pottan y quinilo sija .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Todo y manmamaela antes que guajo , ladron yan saque sija : ya ti manmanjungog y quinilo sija .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Guajo y petta : ya y jumalom guiya guajo , güiya umasatba , y ujalom yan ujuyong ya usoda y pasto .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: linâlâñija .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Guajo y mauleg na pastot : ya y mauleg na pastot y linâlâña japolo pot y quinilo sija .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Ya y taotao nii maapapase , ya ti pastot ; ya ti gaña y quinilo sija , an jalie y lobo ni y mamaela , japolo y quinilo sija ya malago guato ; ya y lobo maquinene ya manchinalapon sija quinilo :

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Malago guato güe sa güiya taotao nii maapapase ya taya inadajiña ni y quinilo sija .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Guajo y mauleg na pastot : sa jutungo y iyoco , ya y iyoco matungo yo .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Taegüije y Tata jatungo yo , taegüijija locue guajo jutungo y tata ; ya jupolo y linâlâjo pot y quinilo sija .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Ya guajayo palo quinilo locue ni taegüe güine na colat , ayo sija locue nesesita yo juchule , ya sija ujajungog y inagangjo ; ya uguaja un manadanquinilo yan un pastot .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Pot enao na jaguaeya yo si Tata , sa jupolo y linâlâjo , para uchule talo .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Taya munajanao guiya guajo , lao jupolo pot guajo na maesa . Guaja yo ninasiñajo para jupolo yan guajayo ninasiñajo para jutalo chumule . Este na tinago juresibe guine y Tatajo .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: N	10	19		58150	 ¶ Ya guaja inaguaguat gui entalo y Judio sija pot este na sinagan sija .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Ya megae sija ilegñija : Biju guaja güe , ya babagüe ; sa jafa inicungog güe ?

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Ylegñija y palo : Este na sinagan ti sija iyon y biju : Ada siña y biju ubaba y atadog y manbachet ?

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: N	10	22		58180	 ¶ Ya anae mafatitnas y guipot y inefresengumayuus , guiya Jerusalem , ya ayo na tiempo manenggeng .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Ya si Jesus mapos malag y templo , gui corredot Salomon .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Ya manetnon guato guiya güiya y Judio sija ya ilegñija nu güiya : Asta ngaean nae unnabuebuente y antita ? Yaguin jago yuje na Cristo , sangan ni claro .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Maninepe as Jesus : Guajo jagas jusangane jamyo ya ti injenggue : y checho ni y jufatinas gui naan Tata , estesija manmannanae testimonio nu guajo .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Lao jamyo ti injenggue , sa ti jamyo quinilojo ; ( taegüine guinin jusangane jamyo ) .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Y gajo quinilo sija jajungog y inagangjo ; ya jutungo sija ; ya sija madalalag yo .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Ya guajo junae sija linâlâñija taejinecog ; ya para todo y tiempo taya nae ufanmalingo ya ni jaye ufaninamot sija gui canaejo .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Si Tata ni unaeyo , dangculoña qui todo ; ya taya gaesisiña para uamot sija gui canae y Tatajo .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Guajo yan si Tata , jame unoja .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: N	10	31		58270	 ¶ Tumalo manmañule acho y Judio sija , para umafagas güe .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Maninepe as Jesus : Megae manmauleg na finatinas jufanue jamyo guine as Tatajo ; pot jafa na chechoña inquequefagas yo ni y acho ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Maope güe ni Judio sija ilegñija : Pot y mauleg na chechomo ti infagas jao ; lao pot ayo y chatfino contra si Yuus ; sa jago , taotaojao , mama Yuusjao .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Maninepe as Jesus : Taegüe güi tinigue gui tinagonmiyo , Guajo umalog : Yuus jamyo ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Yaguin manmafanaan Yuus , sija na mamaela gui jiloñija y finijo Yuus ( ya y tinigue ti siña maipe ) ;

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Ylegmiyo ni ayo y jaconsagra y Tata ya matgo guato gui tano : Jago chumatfino as Yuus , sa jusangan : Guajo Lajin Yuus ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Yaguin jufatitinas y ti iyon Tata , munga injenggue yo .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Lao yaguin jufatinas , achogja ti injenggue yo , jenggue y checho sija : para siña jamyo intingo ya injenggue na si Tata gaegue guiya guajo , ya guajo gaegue guiya Tata .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Ya japrocucura talo para umaconegüe : lao güiya mapos gui canaeñija .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Tumalo guato talo gui otro bandan Jordan , ayo na lugat nae finenana managpapange si Juan ; ya sumaga güije .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Ya megae manmato guiya güiya ya ilegñija : Si Juan magajet na ni un señat jafatinas ; ya magajet todo y sinangan Juan nu este na taotao jumuyong magajet .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Ya megae manmanjonggue güije nu güiya .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: ESTABA entonses malango un taotao , naanña si Lasaro , taotao Betania , un songsong iyon Maria yan si Marta cheluña .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Si Maria uje y pumalae inggüente y Señot , ya jasaosao y adengña ni y gaponiluña , ya y cheluña , as Lasaro , estaba malango .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Manmanago y mañeluña famalaoan guiya güiya ilegñija : Señot , estagüe , ayo y unguaeya esta malango .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Ya jajungog si Jesus , ilegña : Este na chetnot ti güiya y para matae , lao para minalag gui as Yuus , para y Lajin Yuus umaonra pot güiya .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Ya jaguaeya si Jesus si Marta yan y cheluña yan si Lasaro .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Anae jajungog , na estaba malango , ayo na tiempo sumagagüe dos dias güije na lugat anae gaegue .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Ya despues di este ilegña ni y disipuluña : Nije tafanmalag Judea talo .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Ylegñija nu güiya y disipulo sija : Rabi , pago didide nae maquequechague jao ni Judio sija na unmafagas ni y acho : Ada untalo guato güije ?

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Manope si Jesus : Taya y un jaane dose ora ? y jumajanao gui jaane , ti siña matompo , sa manlilie y candet este na tano .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Ya y jumajanao an puenge , matompo , sa taya candet guiya güiya .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Jasangan estesija , ya despues di este ilegña nu sija : Lasaro , amigonmame maego : ya bae janao para uyayajo gui maegoña .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Entonses ilegñija nu güiya y disipulosija : Señot , yaguin maego , mauleg jumuyong .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Ya jasangan este si Jesus gui tinataeña : sija jajaso na umadingan na dumescansañaeñaejon gui maegoña .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña claro nu sija : Lasaro , güiya matae .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Magof yo sa taegüe yo güije , pot causa y jamyo , para injenggue ; nitafanmalag y ya güiya .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Si Tomas , ayo y naanña si Didimo , ilegña nu y otro disipulo sija : ufanmalagjit locue , nije tafanmatae yan güiya .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Mato si Jesus ya jasoda na estaba cuatro na jaane gui naftan .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Y Betania jijot guiya Jerusalem , buente quince na estadio .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Ya megae na Judio sija manmato gui as Marta ya si Maria para uconsuela pot y cheluñija .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Entonses si Marta , anae jajungog na si Jesus mamamaela , jajanao güe para urisibe : ya estaba si Maria matatachong gui guima .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Pot enao si Marta ilegña as Jesus : Señot yaguin mojon gaeguejao güine y chelujo ti umatae .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Lao jutungo pago , todo y ungagao si Yuus , ninaejao as Yuus .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu güiya : Ucajulo talo y chelumo .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Si Marta ilegña nu güiya : Guajo jutungo na ucajulo gui quinajulon manmatae gui uttimo na jaane .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Guajo y quinajulon manmatae yan y linâlâ ; ayo y jumonggue yo , achogja esta matae , ulâlâ talo ;

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Ya todo ayo y lâlâ ya jumonggue yo , ti umatae para todo y tiempo . Unjonggue este ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya : Si Señot , guinin jujonggue na jago ayo na Cristo , Lajin Yuus , güiya na para umamaela gui tano .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Anae munjayan jasangan este , mapos ya jaagang gui secreto si Maria cheluña , ilegña : Si Maestro estagüe ya inagagangejao .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Anae jajungog , cajulo gusisija ya jumanao asta guiya güiya .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: ( Ya asta pago ti mafato si Jesus gui sengsong , lao gaegue güije na lugat anae si Marta jagas sineda güe . )

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Entonces y Judiosija na manestaba gui guima yan güiya , y maconsuela güe , anae jalie si Maria cajulo gusisija ya mapos , madalalag güe , pineloñija na ufalag y naftan para utanges güije .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Ya si Maria anae mato gui lugat anae estaba si Jesus ya jalie , japodong gui adengña , ya ilegña : Señot yaguin gaeguejao güine ti umatae y chelujo .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Anae si Jesus jalie na tumatanges , yan y Judio sija ni manamamamaela yan güiya manatanges , umugong gui espiritu , ya inestotba ,

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Ya ilegña : Mano nae unpolo güe ? Ilegñija nu güiya : Señot , maela ya unlie .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Si Jesus tumanges .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Ylegñija entonses y Judio sija : Estagüe , taegüenao jaguflie güe !

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Lao palo guiya sija ilegñija : Ti siña este na ubaba y atadog y bachet , fatinas ni este ti umatae ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ya si Jesus jaumugong talo guiya güiya , ya mato gui naftan . Güiya un liyang ya mapoluye un acho gui sanjiloña .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus : Najanao y acho . Si Marta , chelun y matae , ilegña nu güiya : Señot , mutong esta , sa finatae cuatro na jaane .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Ti guinin jusangane jao na guin manjonggue jao , unlie y minalag Yuus .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Ayo nae sija janajanao y acho , Ya si Jesus tumalag julo ya ilegña : Tata , grasias junaejao sa guinin unjungog yo .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ya guajo jutungo na siempre unjungungog yo ; lao pot y linajyan taotao ni gaegue gui oriyajo , jusangan este , para ujajonggue na jagoyo tumago .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Anae munjayan jasangan este , umaagang ni dangculo na inagang : Lasaro maela juyong .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Entonses ayo y guine matae , jumuyong , magogode dos canaeña yan y adeng nu y bendas ; ya y mataña mafalulutan nu y sudario . Ylegña nu sija si Jesus : Pula ya inpilo ya ujanao .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: N	11	45		58830	 ¶ Pot este megae na Judio sija na manmato gui as Maria ya jalie y finatinas Jesus , majonggue güe .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Lao guajo guiya sija na manmapos para Fariseo sija , ya jasangane sija y finatinas Jesus .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: N	11	47		58850	 ¶ Ayo nae y manmagas y mamale yan y Fariseo sija , mandaña ya janaetnon y sinedrio ya ilegñija : Jafa tafatinas ? Sa este na taotao mamatitinas megae na señat sija ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Yaguin tapolo taegüenao , todo y taotao manmanjonggue guiya güiya : ya ufanmamaela y Romano sija ya u janajanao y sagata yan y tanota .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Lao si Caefas uno guiya sija , güiya magas na pale güije na sacan , mansinangane : Jamyo ti intingo jafa !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Ni injaso na mauleg para jita sa un taotao matae pot y taotao sija , para munga na todo y nasion ufanmalingo .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Lao este ti jasangan guine güiyaja ; lao güiya y magas na pale güije na sacan ya japrofetisa na si Jesus umatae pot y nasion .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Ya ti pot ayoja na nasion ; lao locue para ufandaña gui unoja y famaguon Yuus ni y jagas manmachalapon .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Ya desde ayo na jaane manafaesen entre para sija umapuno .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Ya si Jesus ti jumajanao gui publico gui entalo Judio sija ; lao mapos güije para y tano na jijot gui jalomtano , guiya un siuda na mafananaan Efraim ; ya sumaga güe güije yan y disipuluña .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: N	11	55		58930	 ¶ Ya y pascuan Judio sija estaba jijot ; ya megae gui tano mangajulo guiya Jerusalem antes di pascua para ujanagasgas sija .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Ya manmanaligao as Jesus , ya manadingan entre sija gui templo , ya ilegñija : Jafa jinasonmiyo , nu güiya , ti umamaela gui guipot .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Ya y prinsipin y mamale sija yan y Fariseo manmanae tinago na yaguin jaye tumungo mano nae gaegue , umasangan para inquene güe .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: AYO na tiempo , saes na jaane antes de pascua , si Jesus malag Betania anae estaba si Lasaro , ayo y guinin matee , ya si Jesus munacajulo guine y entelo manmatae .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Ya manmanmatinas güije un sena , ya si Marta mañeñetbe ; ya si Lasaro , güiya uno gui entalo sija na manmatatachong gui lamasa yan güiya .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Ayo nae si Maria jachule un libra na inggüente , gasgas na natda , guefguaguan , ya japalae y adeng Jesus , ya jasaosao y adengña nu gaponuluña ; ya bula y guima ni pao inggüente .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Ayo nae ilegña uno gui disipuluña , si Judas Iscariote lajin Simon , ayo y umintrega güe ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: Jafa mina ti mabende este na inggüente pot tres siento denario na salape , ya unumae y mamobble ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Este ilegña , ti pot inadajiña ni mamobble ; lao pot guiya y saque , ya guaja y betsaña , ya jachuchule ayo y sinajguanña .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Enaomina ilegña si Jesus , Polo güe , para ayo na jaane nae majafot yo , na uadaje este .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Sa y mamobble siempre gagaegue guiya jamyo ; lao guajo taegüeyo guiya jamyo .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: N	12	9		59040	 ¶ Entonses , dangculo na linajyan taotao , gui Judio sija , jatungo na gaegue güe güije , ya manmato , ti pot causan si Jesusja , lao locue para umalie si Lasaro ni guinin janacajulo guine y entelo manmatae .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Ya manafaesen entre sija , manmagas y mamale sija , para umapuno locue si Lasaro .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Sa pot causa di güiya , megae na Judio sija manmalag ayo ya manmanjonggue gui as Jesus .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: N	12	12		59070	 ¶ Ynagpaña na jaane , dangculo na linajyan taotao , y manmato gui guipot , anae majungog na si Jesus mato guiya Jerusalem ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Manmañule ni y ramas y trongcon palma ya manmapos para umaresibe güe ya manaagang : Osana ! Dichoso güe ni mamamaela ni y naan y Señot , y Ray Israel !

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Ya anae jasoda si Jesus un patgon na bulico , matachong gui jiloña ; taegüije y matugue :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Chamo maañao , jago jagan Sion ! estagüe y Raymo na mato , matatachong gui jilo un patgon bulico .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Y finenana , y disipuloña ti jatungo estesija ; lao y tiempo anae si Jesus esta cumajulo gui langet , entonses manmajaso na estesija este matugue nu güiya , ya sija guinin manmafatinas este sija yan güiya .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Y linajyan taotao na estaba mañisija , anae jaagang juyong si Lasaro gui naftan , ya janacajulo gui entalo manmatae , janae testimonio nu güiya .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Pot enao locue y linajyan taotao manmato ya maresibe güe , sa majungog na munjayan jafatinas este na señat .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Pot enao Fariseo sija ilegñija entre sija : Lie na taya probechonmiyo : Estagüe na todo gui jilo y tano manjanao ya dalalag güe .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: N	12	20		59150	 ¶ Ya guaja sija na taotao Griego ni gui ayo sija na mangajulo para uadodora gui guipot :

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Ayo sija manmato gui as Felipe taotao Betsaida guiya Galilea , ya magagao güe , ilegñija : Señot , manmalagojam inlie si Jesus !

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Mato si Felipe ya jasangane si Andres ; ya mamaela si Andres yan si Felipe masangane si Jesus .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: N	12	23		59180	 ¶ Ya si Jesus maninepe ilegña : Y ora mato na y Lajin taotao uresibe y minalagña .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo , na y granon trigo ni ti upodong gui tano , ya umatae , güiya namaesa sumaga ; yaguin matae megae na tinegcha uchule .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Y gumaeya y linâlâña ufinalaguaejon ; y chumatlie y linâlâña güine gui tano , pinipilanja y taejinecog na jaane .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Yaguin guaja y somesetbe yo , udalalag yo ; ya mano nae gaegue yo , ayo locue nae ugaegue y somesetbe yo . Yaguin guaja y somesetbe yo , si Tata uenenra güe .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Pago lebog y antijo : Ya jafa quentosjo ? Tata nalibre yo pago na ora ! Lao pot este mato yo güine na ora .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Tata , namalag y naanmo ! Pot enao mato guine y langet un inagang , ilegña : Estaba junamalag , ya bae junamalag otro biaje .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Y linajyan taotao na mangaegue ya injingog ilegñija : guinin julo este . Palo ilegñija : Un angjet sumangane güe .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Ynepe as Jesus ya ilegña : Ti mato este na inagang pot y causaco lao pot y causanmiyo .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Pago gaegue y juisio nu este na tano . Pago y magas este na tano umayute juyong .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Ya guajo , yaguin guajo umajatsayo guine y tano , jucone todo para guajoja .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Ya este masangan para umatungo jafa na finatae nae umatae .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ynepeña y linajyan taotao : Jame injingog y lay na si Cristo ugaegue para todo y tiempo . Jafa mina unsangan : Na y Lajin taotao nesesita umajatsa ? Jaye güe este Lajin taotao ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Ayo nae si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Didide na tiempo y candet ugaegue gui entalonmiyo . Fanmamocat mientras guaguaja y candet para jamyo , sa no sea infanguinacha ni y jemjom ; sa y jumajanao gui jemjom , ti jatungo para mano nae y jinanaoña .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Mientras guaguaja y candet para jamyo , fanmanjonggue ni y candet , para unfamaguon y candet jamyo . Estesija jasangan si Jesus , ya mapos ya umatog pot sija .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: N	12	37		59320	 ¶ Lao achogja jafatinas megae na señat gui menanñija ti majonggue güe .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Para umacumple y sinangan ni ilegña si Isaias profeta : Señot , jaye jumonggue y sinanganta ? Ya y canae y Señot , jaye guinin munamalie ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Pot este mina ti siña sija majonggue , sa tomalo jasangan si Isaias :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Janafanbachet y atadogñija , ya janamajetog y corasoñija : Sa ti manmalie ni y atadogñija , ni ujatungo ni y corasonñija , ya sigue mamañotsot , ya guajo juamte sija .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Estesija jasangan si Isaias , anae jalie minalagña ya inadingane .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: N	12	42		59370	 ¶ Pago na tiempo achogja megae na taotao senmagas , jumonggue gue ; lao pot causa y Fariseo sija , ti masangan claro , na no sea mayute gui sinagoga .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Pot jafa muna manmalago sija y inenra y taotao , qui y inenra guine as Yuus .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: N	12	44		59390	 ¶ Si Jesus umagang ilegña : Y jumonggue yo , guajoja , ti jajonggue lao ayo y tumago yo .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Y umatan yo , güiya umatan y tumago yo .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Mato yo gui jilo y tano parejoja y candet , para todo ayo y jumonggue yo , ti sumaga gui jemjom .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Y jumungog y sinanganjo ya ti jajonggue , guajo ti jujusga ; sa ti mato yo para jufanjusga gui tano , lao para junafanlibre y tano .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Ya y rumechasa yo ya ti rumesibe y sinanganjo , guaja ujinisga güe : Y sinangan ni jusangan , güiya ufanjusga güije uttimo na jaane .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Sa ti guinin juadingan namaesa ; lao si Tata ni tumago yo , güiya numae yo tinago ni para jusangan yan y para jucuentos .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Ya jutungo na y tinagoña , güiya linâlâ taejinecog : enaomina ayo sija jusangan ; taegüije si Tata guinin jasangane yo , taegüijeja jusasangan .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: YA antes di y guipot pascua , jatungo si Jesus na y oraña esta mato para ujanao güine na tano para y Tata , esta jaguaeya y iyoña sija ni mangaegue güine gui tano , ya jaguaeya sija asta y jinecog .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Y sena munjayan ya y anite esta jumalom gui corason Judas Iscariote , lajin Simon , ni umentrega güe ;

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Ya jatungo si Jesus na y Tata jagasja janae todo ni güinaja gui canaeña , ya mato güe guinin as Yuus , ya as Yuus guaguato ;

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Cajulo gui sena ya janajanao y magagoña , ya jachule un toaya , ya jaafuyut güiya namaesa .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Anae esta munjayan este , janaye y janom gui palangana diquique , ya jatutujon fumagase y adeng y disipulo sija , ya jasaosao nu y toaya na jaafuyut güe .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Ayo nae malag as Simon Pedro ; ya este ilegña nu güiya : Señot jago fumagase y adengjo ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Manope si Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Y jufatitinas ti untungo pago ; lao ti ampmam untungo .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Si Pedro ilegña nu güiya : Ti unfagase y adengjo ni ngaean ! Ynepe as Jesus : Yaguin ti jufagase jao taepattemo guiya guajo .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Simon Pedro : Señot , ti adengjoja , lao locue asta y canaejo yan y ilujo .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Si Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Y esta mafagase , ti guaelaye yaguin adengña esta mafagase , lao esta gasgas todo . Ya jamyo mangasgas pago , achogja ti todos .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Sa esta matungo jaye uje y umentrega güe ; pot enao ilegña : Ti mangasgas jamyo todos .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: N	13	12		59570	 ¶ Anae munjayan manfinagase y adengñija , jachule y magagoña ya tumalo matachong otro biaje , ya mansinangane : Yntingo y finatinasjo ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Jamyo infanaan yo Maestro yan Señot : ya y sinanganmiyo mauleg ; sa guajo yo .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Yaguin guajo Señotmiyo yan Maestronmiyo , guinin jufagase y adengmiyo , debe jamyo locue infanafagase y adengmiyo uno yan otro .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Sa un ejemplo junae jamyo , sa taemanoja guajo jufatinase jamyo , jamyo locue infatitinas .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo : Y tintago ti güiya magasña na y senotña ; ni y matago , ti güiya magasña na y tumago güe .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Yaguin intingo este sija na güinaja , mandichoso jamyo yaguin infatitinas ,

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: N	13	18		59630	 ¶ Ti umadingan yo nu jamyo todo : guajo tumungo sija y inayigco ; lao para umacumple y tinigue sija : Y chumocho pan yan guajo , güiya cumajulo contra guajo y dedegoña .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Desde pago jusangane jamyo antes di ujuyong , para yaguin jumujuyong , injenggue na guajo yo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo , na y rumesibe y tinagojo , jaresibe yo ; ya y rumesibe yo , jaresibe y tumago yo .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: si Jesuseste , inigongña si Jesus jinalomña , ya janae testimonio ya ilegña : Magajet ya magajet jusangane jamyo , na uno guiya jamyo unintrega yo .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Y disipulo sija manaatan entre sija uno yan otro ya ti matungo jaye umadingan .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Y uno gui disipuluña na guiniflie as Jesus , estaba umaason gui pechon Jesus .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Ayo nae si Simon Pedro fumatinas señat nu este , para umafaesen jaye uje na umadingan .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Ayo nae , y umaason gui jilo pechon Jesus ilegña nu güiya : Señot jaye uje ?

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Enaomina manope si Jesus : Ayo uje ni junafotgue ni pan ya junae güe . Ya janafotgon y pan , ya janae si Judas Iscariote , lajin Simon .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Anae munjayan y quinanoña ni y pan fotgon , si Satanas jumalom guiya güiya . Entonses si Jesus sinangane : Fatinas guse y finatinasmo .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Ni uno , guiya sija na mangaegue gui lamasa , tumungo pot jafa na umasangane .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Pineloñija y palo guiya sija , sa si Judas na gaebetsa , na si Jesus sumangane : Fajan y güinaja na mannesesitajit para y guipot ; pat ufanmanae y mamobble .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Ya güiya , guinin mañule y pan fotgon , enseguidas mapos ; ya esta puenge .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: N	13	31		59760	 ¶ Pot enao , anae esta mapos güe , ilegña si Jesus : Pago y Lajin taotao rumesisibe y minalagña , ya si Yuus rumesibe y minalagña guiya güiya .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Ya si Yuus minamalag güe guiya güiya ; ya enseguidas unamalag güe .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Mandiquique na fumaguon , ti juapmam guiya jamyo ; ya inaligao yo ; ya taegüenoja jusangane y Judio sija : Mano yo guato , jamyo ti siña manmamaela ; taemanoja pago jusangane jamyo .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Un tinago nuebo junae jamyo , na infanguaeya uno yan otro entre jamyo ; taegüije yan guajo juguaeya jamyo , ya jamyo locue infanguaeya uno yan otro entre jamyo .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Ya pot este todo y taotao ufanmatungo na jamyo disipulujo , yaguin infanguaeya uno yan otro entre jamyo .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Si Simon Pedro ilegña nu güiya : Señot , para mano jao ? Ynepe as Jesus : Mano yo guato , ti siña jao pago undalalag yo , lao ti apmam undalalag yo .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Pedro : Señot , sa jafa na ti siña judalalag jao pago ? jupolo y linâlâjo guiya jago .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Ynepe as Jesus : Unpolo y linâlâmo guiya guajo ? Magajet ya magajet jusangane jao , na ti uoo y gayo asta tiempo na undague yo tres biaje !

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: CHAMIYO ninafañachatsaga corasonmiyo : injenggue si Yuus , jenggue yo locue .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Y guima Tatajo nae guaja megae na sagayan : yaguin ti utaegüine mojon jagas jusagane jamyo . Bae jujanao ya jufamauleg y saga para jamyo .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Yaguin jumanao yo ya jufamauleg y saga para jamyo , jumamaela talo mague ya jucone jamyo yan guajo ; sa manoja yo nae sumaga , ayoja locue jamyo .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ya mano yo guato , intingo y chalan .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Tomas : Señot , ti intingo para mano jao ; ya jafa taemano tungomame nu y chalan ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Guajo y chalan , yan y minagajet , yan y linâlâ ; taya malag y Tata , yan ti pot guajo .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Yaguin guinin intingoyo , mojon intingo locue y Tatajo ; ya desde pago intingo güe ya inlie güe .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Ylegña nu guiya si Felipe : Señot , fanue jam nu y Tata ya basta para jame .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Megae na tiempo na manjita , ya asta pago ti untungo yo Felipe ? Y lumiiyo , jaliija y Tata . Ya jafa muna ilegmo : Fanue jam nu y Tata ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Ti unjonggue na guajo gaegue gui as Tata , ya y Tata gaegue guiya guajo ? Sa y finijo nu y jusasangan , ti jusasangan pot guajoja ; lao y Tata nu y sumasasaga guiya guajo , ayo fumatinas y chechoña sija .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Jenggue na gaegue yo gui as Tata , ya y Tata gaegue guiya guajo : yaguin ti pot este , jenggueyo pot y checho sija .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Magajet ya magajet y jusangane jamyo : Y jumonggueyo , y checo nu y juchogüe , güiya chumogüe locue ; ya mas dangculo na chocho qui este jachogüe ; sa jujanao para as Tata .
