text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ya todo y ingagao pot y naanjo , bae jufatinas , sa y Tata uresibe minalagña nu y Lajiña .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Jafaja y ingagaoyo pot y naanjo , bae jufatinas ayo .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: Yaguin inguaeya yo , inadaje y tinagojo .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Sa bae jutayuyut si Tata ya infanninae otro Consoladot para ugaegue guiya jamyo na taejinecog .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Güiya y Espiritun minagajet nu y tano ti siña umaresibe ; sa ti malie güe , ya ti matungo güe ; lao jamyo intingo güe ; sa sumaga yan jamyo , ya ugaegue guiya jamyo .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Ti judingo jamyo güetfano : jumamaela guiya jamyo .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Dididija talo , y tano ti uliiyo ; lao jamyo inliija yo ; sa lâlâyo , ya infanlâlâja locue .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Güije na jaane umasusede na intingo na gaegueyo gui as Tata , ya jamyo guiya guajo ya guajo guiya jamyo .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Y guaja y tinagojo ya jaadadaje , ayo yo gumaeya ; ya y gumaeya yo , ugüinaeya as Tata , ya juguaeya güe ; ya jufanuegüe nu guajo mamaesa .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Judas , ti si Iscariote : Señot , jafa muna unfanue jam nu jago namaesa ya ti unfanue y tano ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Inepe as Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Jaye yo y gumaeya , uadaje y sinanganjo ; ya ugüinaeya as Tata , ya jame infatoigüe güe ya insagaye güe .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Y ti gumaeya yo , ti jaadaje y sinanganjo ; ya y sinangan nu y injingog , ti sinanganjo , lao iyon y Tata ni tumago yo .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Estesija jusagane jamyo anae manjijita .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Lao ayo y Consoladat y Espiritu Santo ; nu si Tata utinago pot y naanjo , güiya infanfinanagüe todosija , ya inninafanjajasoja todo y jusangane jamyo .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Pas jupoluye jamyo ; y pasjo junae jamyo ; ti taegüine y ninaen y tano na ninaejo . Chamiyo ninafañachatsaga corasonmiyo ni infanmaañao .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Jamyo jagas injingogja jafa y jusagane jamyo , bae jujano , ya jutalo güine mague guiya jamyo . Yaguin inguaeya yo , magajet infanmagof , sa bae jujanao ya jufalag as Tata ; sa si Tata dangculoña qui guajo .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Pago jagas jusangane jamyo antes qui umasusede , para yanguin jasusede , jamyo injenggue .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Desde pago na tiempo ti jucuentuse jamyo megae , sa y magalagen este na tano ufato , ya taya iyoña guiya guajo ;

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Lao y tano ujatungo na juguaeya si Tata , ya jaftaemanoja si Tata jasangane yo , ayo muna jufatinas . Fangajulo ya nije tafanjanao .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: GUAJO y magajet na trongconubas ya si Tatajo güiya y magas y fangualuan .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Todo y ramas guiya guajo nu y taetinegcha , janajanao ; ya todo ayo y ramas nu y gaetinegcha , janagasgas , para umegae tinegchaña .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Pago nae jamyo mangasgas pot y finijo nu y jusangane jamyo .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Fañaga guiya guajo , ya guajo guiya jamyo . Taegüije y ramas ti siña mañogcha güiya namaesa , yaguin ti sumaga gui trongconubas , parejoja yan jamyo yaguin ti infañaga guiya guajo .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Guajo y trongconubas , jamyo y ramas . Y sumaga guiya guajo , ya guajo guiya güiya , güiya ufañogcha megae ; sa apatte di guajo taya siña infatinas .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Yaguin un taotao ti sumaga guiya guajo , umanajanao güe parejoja yan y ramas , ya umalayo , ya jajojoca , ya japopolo gui guafe , ya ufanmasonggue .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Yaguin mañaga jamyo guiya guajo , ya y finojo sumaga guiya jamyo , infanmangagao todo y malagomiyo ya jufatinas para jamyo .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Este uninamalag si Tatajo , ya infanmanogcha megae ; ya taegüenao jamyo y udisipulojo .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Taegüenao si Tata jaguaeya yo , guajo parejoja juguaeya jamyo locue ; ya fañaga jamyo gui güinaeyaco .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Yaguin inadadaje y tinagojo sija , jamyo infañañaga gui güinaeyaco ; parejoja yan guajo juadadaje y tinago y Tatajo ya sumasasaga yo gui güinaeyaña .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Estesija jusangane jamyo , para minagofjo usaga guiya jamyo , ya y minagofmiyo ubula .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Este y tinagojo , na infanguaeya entre jamyo uno yan otro , calang y juguaeya jamyo .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Taya uno guaja güinaeyaña mas dangculo qui este , na y taotao japolo y linâlâfia pot y amiguña sija .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Jamyo y amigujo sija , yaguin infatinas jafa y jutago jamyo .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Ti jagasja jufanaan jamyo tentago sija , sa y tentago ti jatungo jafa checho y magasña ; lao jufanaan jamyo amigo sija ; sa todosija ni jujungog gui as Tata , junatungoja jamyo .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Ti jamyo umayig yo , lao guajo jamyo umayig ya jutago jamyo , na infanjanao ya infanmanogcha , ya y tinegchanmiyo usaga ; sa todosija y ingagao si Tata pot y naanjo , güiya infanninae .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Estesija jutago jamyo , na infanaguaeya entre jamyo uno yan otro .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Yaguin manchinatlie jamyo nu y tano , intingoja na guajo finena chinatlie antes qui jamyo .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Yaguin iyon y tano jamyo y tano uguaeya iyoña : lao ti iyon y tano jamyo , ya guajo jamyo umayig gui tano , ayo muna manchinatlie jamyo nu y tano .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Jaso jamyo y sinangan ni munjayan jusangane jamyo : Y tentago ti dangculoña qui y magasña . Yaguin mapetsigue yo , infanmapetsigue jamyo locue ; yaguin manadaje y sinanganjo , umanadaje y sinanganmiyo locue .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Lao todo estesija umafatinas guiya jamyo pot causan y naanjo ; sa ti matungo ayo y tumagoyo .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Yaguin ti matoyo , ya ti jusangane sija , taya isaoñija ; lao pago taya escusañija pot y isaoñija .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Ayo y chumatlie yo , güiya chumatlie si Tata locue .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Yaguin ti jufatinas gui entaloñija chochosija na taya ni uno fumatinas , taya isaoñija ; lao pago esta jalie ya jachatlie yo yan si Tata .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Lao este ususede , sa para umacumple y sinangan nu y matugue gui tinagoñija : sija chumatlie yo , sin jafa .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Lao yaguin mato y Consoladot , ni y junamamaela guinin as Tata , y Espiritu y minagajet nu y mamaela guinin as Tata , güiya infanninae testimonio pot guajo .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Ya jamyo locue infanmannae testimonio , sa guinin manjijita desde y tutujonña .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: ESTESIJA jusangane jamyo para chamiyo , fanmatotompo .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Infanmayute juyong gui sinagoga sija ; junggan , y tiempo ufato nae jayeja y pumuno jamyo , jinasoña na jafatinas y checho Yuus .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Ya estesija infanfinatinas , sa ti jatungo y Tata , ni guajo .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Ya estesija guinin jusangane jamyo , na yaguin ufato ayo na ora , injaso estesija , jaftaemanoja y jusangane jamyo .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Lao pago bae jujanao para ayo y tumago yo ; ya taya uno guiya jamyo ufaesen yo : Para mano jao ?

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Lao pot y jusangane jamyo nu estesija y pinite esta bula y corasonmiyo .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Lao jusangane jamyo ni minagajet , na maulegñaja para jamyo na jujanao ; sa yaguin ti jumanao yo , y Consoladot ti umamaela guiya jamyo ; lao yaguin jumanao yo , junamamaela güe guiya jamyo .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Sa yaguin ufato güe , ujusga y tano ni isao yan y tininas yan y juisio :

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Y isao sa sija ti majonggue yo ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Y tininas sa bae jujanao para y Tata , ya jocog nae inliiyo ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Y juisio sa y magas este y tano esta jajusga .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Guaja yo megae na güinaja trabia para jusangane jamyo ; lao ti siña jamyo insingon pago .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Lao yaguin ufato ayo y Espiritun minagajet , güiya infanfinanue jamyo todo y minagajet ; sa ti usangan pot güiyaja , lao todosija , jiningogña , ayosija usangan : yan ayosija y umasusede despues , inninafanmanatungo jamyo .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Güiya ufannae yo minalag sa mañuñule y güinaja na guiya guajo ya ujasangane jamyo .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Todosija y güinajan Tata , iyoco ; ayo mina , jusangan na mañuñule y güinaja na guiya guajo ya ujasangane jamyo .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Trabia dididija na tiempo , ti inlie yo talo ; ya y otro biaje dididija na tiempo inlie yo .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Ya y palo disipulo ilegñija entre sija uno yan otro : Jafa muna ilegña este nu jita ? Dididija na tiempo ti inlie yo ; ya y otro biaje , dididija na tiempo inlie yo : sa bae jujanao para as Tata ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Ayo nae ilegñija : Jafa este muna ilegña ? Dididija na tiempo ? Ti tatungo jafa ilegña .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Lao jatungoja si Jesus na manmalago na umafaesen güe , ya ilegña nu sija : Manafaesen entre jamyo jafa y ilelegco : Dididija na tiempo ya ti inlie yo ; ya otro biaje , dididija na tiempo inlie yo ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Magajet ya magajet y jusangane jamyo : infananges yan infanugungñaejon , lao y tano umagof ; ya jamyo infantriste , lao y tristenmiyo umabira para minagof .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Y palaoan yaguin para ufañago guaja pinitiña , sa mato y oraña ; lao yaguin munjayan jafañago y patgon , mafeta nu y pinitiña , pot y minagofña na esta mañago un taotao gui tano .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Pago jamyo locue magajet na infantriste ; lao yaguin manaliijit talo , ufanmagof corasonmiyo , ya taya siña munajanao y minagofmiyo guiya jamyo .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Ayo na jaane ti infaesen yo ni jafa . Magajet y magajet y jusangane jamyo , todosija y ingagao y Tata , infanninae pot y naanjo .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Asta pago taya ingagagao pot y naanjo : gagao ya inresibi , ya ubula y minagofmiyo .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: N	16	25		60660	 ¶ Estesija guinin jusangane jamyo gui acomparasion sija ; lao ufato y ora na ti jusangane jamyo gui acomparasion sija , lao jusangane jamyo claro y güinajan Tata .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Ayo na jaane infanmangagao pot y naanjo : lao ada ti jusangane jamyo na guajo jutayuyute jamyo gui Tata ;

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Sa y Tata mangüinaeya jamyo , sa esta inguaeya yo , ya injenggue na mamaela yo guinin as Yuus .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Mamaela yo guinin as Tata , ya matoyo gui tano : lao judingo talo y tano , sa bae janao para as Tata .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Y disipuluña ilegñija : Estagüe , pago na unsangan claro , ya taya acomparasion unsangan .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Pago intingo na jago untungo todosija ; ya ti unnesesita ni jaye unfinaesenjao : pot este injenggue na jago mamaela guinin as Yuus .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Maninepe sija as Jesus : Injenggue pago ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Estagüe na ufato y ora , ya esta mato pago , na cada uno ujanao para y iyoña , ya indingo yo namaesaja ; lao trabia ti guajoja namaesaja sa jumajame an Tata .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Estesija jusangane jamyo , para infangaepas guiya guajo . Infangaemasâpet gui tano ; lao mantiene y minatatnganmiyo , sa guajo esta jugana y tano .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: ESTESIJA jasangan si Jesus ya tumalag jilo gui langet , ya ilegña : Tata , esta mato y ora ; namalag y Lajimo , sa y Lajimo unninamalag locue .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Parejaja unnae güe ninasiñaña para todo y catne ; ya para todosija y unnae güe , güiya numae sija taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ya este yuje y taejinecog la linâlâ , na intingo jao , na unoja y magajet na Yuus ; yan si Jesuscristo nu y jago tumago .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Esta junamalag jao gui tano , ya munjayan y chechojo nu y unnaeyo na juchogüe .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Pago , jagoja Tata , unnamalag yo yan jago na maesa ni ayo na minalag anae estaba jumijita antes di y tano .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Esta jufanue nu y naanmo y taotao nu y unnae yo gui tano ; sa iyomo , ya unnae yo ; ya sija maadaje y sinanganmo .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Pago sija matungo na todosija y unnae yo , sija iyomo .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Sa y finijo sija ni y unnae yo , jusangane sija ; ya jaresibe , yan jatungo magajet na mamaela yo guinin jago ; ya jajonggue na jagoyo tumago .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Guajo jutayuyute sija ; ti y tano jutayuyute , lao sija y unnaeyo , sa sija iyomo .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ya todosija y iyomo , iyoco ; ya y iyoco , iyomo ; ya guajayo minalag guiya sija .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Pago taegüe yo gui tano , ya este sija mangaegue gui tano ; ya mato yo guiya jago . Tata Santo adaje pot y naanmo , ayo sija y unnaeyo , para ufanunoja , parejo an jita .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Anae estaba yo manjajame gui tano , juadadajeja sija pot y naanmo ; ayo sija ni y unnaeyo ya juadadajeja ya taya ni uno malilingo , lao unoja esta malingo , güiya patgon yinilang ; para ujacumple y tinigue sija .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Lao pago mato yo iya jago ; ya estesija jusasangan gui tano para y minagofjo ubula guiya sija .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Guajo guinin numae sija ni y sinanganmo ; ya y tano manchinatlie sija ; sa sija ti iyon y tano , parejoja yan guajo ti iyon y tano .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Ti jutayuyut jao na unnajanao gui tano , lao unadaje sija gui tinaelaye .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Sija ti iyon y tano , parejo yan guajo ti iyon y tano .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Nagasgas sija pot y minagajetmo ; y sinanganmo güiya minagajet .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Taegüenao jago tumago yo gui tano , parejoja guajo locue munajutago sija gui tano .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Ya pot sija , juconsagra yo namaesa , para sija locue ufangasgas pot y minagajet .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Ta ti sijaja jutayuyute , lao ayo sija locue y jumonggue yo pot y sinanganñija .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Sa para todo sija ufanunoja ; parejoja yan jago , Tata , gaegue jao guiya guajo , ya guajo gaegue guiya jago ; sija locue ufanunoja guiya jita ; para ujonggue y tano na jago tumago yo .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Ya y minalag nu y unnae yo , junae sija : para ufanunoja parejo yan jita unoja .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Guajo guiya sija , ya jago guiya guajo , para ufancabales gui unoja ; ya para utungo y tano , na jago tumago yo , ya ungüaeya sija , parejoja yan güinaeyamo nu guajo .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Tata ! ayosija y unnae yo , malago yo na manoyo nae gaegue , sija ufangaegue locue ; para ujalie y minalagjo ni y unnae yo ; sa unguaeya yo antes di jiniyong y tano .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Tata tunas jao , y tano ti jatungo jao ; lao guajo tumungo jao , ya estesija jatungo na jago tumagoyo .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Ya guajo minamatungo sija y naanmo ya bae junatungo : na ayo na güinaeya ni y ungüaeya yo , ayo gaegue guiya sija , yan guajo guiya sija .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: ANAE si Jesus munjayan jasangan este sija na sinangan , mapos yan y disipuluña para otro banda y sadog Sidron , anae guaja un güetta , ya jumalom güe yan y disipuluña .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Ya si Judas locue , ni y umentrega güe , jatungo ayo na lugat ; sa megae na biaje si Jesus jumanao güije yan y disipuluña .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Ayo nae si Judas mañule y inetnon sendalo , yan y ofisiat sija ni manmagas na mamale yan y Fariseo , mamalag ayo na lugat , manmañuñule falot , yan candet , yan atmas .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Enao mina si Jesus jatungo todosija na ufanmato guiya güiya , ya jumuyong güe gui menanñija , ya ilegña nu sija : Jaye inaliligao ?

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Inepeñija : Si Jesus Nasareno . Si Jesus ilegña nu sija : Guajo yo . Gaegue güije locue mañisija yan Judas y umentrega güe .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Anae munjayan jasangan : Guajo yo ; manalo guato ya mamodong gui tano .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Tomalo jafaesen sija : Jaye inaliligao ? Ya ilegñija : Si Jesus Nasareno .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Manope si Jesus ; Munjayanyo jusangane jamyo na guajo yo : Yaguin guajo inaliligao , polo ya ufanjanao este sija :

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Para ucumple y sinangan na esta jasangan : Ayo sija ni unnae yo , ni uno junafalingo .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Ayo nae si Simon Pedro guaja espadaña , jachule ya janachetnudan un tentago mamale , ya jautut un talagaña gui agapa . Ya y tentago naanña si Malco .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Enao mina si Jesus elegña as Pedro : Na jalom y espadamo gui baena ; y copa ni janaeyo si tata , ada taya para juguimen ?

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Ayo na tiempo y inetnon sendalo , yan y magas sendalo , yan y ofisiat y Judio sija , macone si Jesus ya magode .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Ya finenana machule guato as Annas ; sa güiya y suegron Caefas , na magasja na pale güije na año .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Ya si Caefas manae consejo ni y Judio sija , na janesisita un taotao para umatae pot y taotao sija .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: N	18	15		61150	 ¶ Ya madalalag si Jesus si Simon Pedro , taegüenao yan otro disipulo . Ya ayo y otro disipulo atungo y magas na pale ; ya jumalom yan si Jesus ; gui quelat y palasyon y magas na pale .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Lao si Pedro gaegue gui sanjiyong y petta . Entonses ayo y otro disipulo ni y atungo y magas na pale jumuyong , ya jasangane y pottera , ya janajalom si Pedro .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Entonses ayo na palaoan ni y jaadaje y petta ilegña as Pedro : Ti jago locue disipulon este na taotao ? Güiya ilegña : Aje , ti guajo .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Mangaegue güije y tentago sija yan y ofisiat , sija , manotojgue , ya jafatinas y guafin pinigan ; sa manenggeng ; ya janafanmamaepe sija : ya esta tomotojgue mañisija yan Pedro janamamaepe güe .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: N	18	19		61190	 ¶ Ya y magas na pale jafaesen si Jesus jaftaemano y disipuluña yan y doctrinaña .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Inepeña si Jesus : Guajo sumangan claro gui tano ; guajo siempre mamanagüe guiya sinagogo yan y templo anae manetnon todo y Judio sija ; ya taya jucuentuse gui secreto .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Sajafa mina unfafaesen yo ? Faesen y manmanjungog ni y jusangane sija . Estagüe , sija y tumungo y sinanganjo .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Ya anae güiya esta sumangan este , uno gui ofisiat sija na mangaegue güije , japatmada si Jesus ya ilegña : Taegüenao unope y magas na pale ?

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Ynepe güe as Jesus : Yaguin jusangan taelaye , nae testimonio nu y taelaye ; yaguin mauleg , pot jafa mina innachinudan yo ?

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Ayo nae si Annas ninamacone güe mangode para as Caefas , magas na pale .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: N	18	25		61250	 ¶ Ayo nae si Simon Pedro estaba tomotojgue janamamaepe güe . Entonses ilegñija nu güiya : Ada ti güiya jao uno gui disipuluña ? Güiya mandague ya ilegña : Ti guajo yo .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Uno gui tentagon magas na pale , parientes ayo y jautut si Pedro y talagaña , ya sinangane : Ti julie jao gui güetta yan güiya ?

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Luego mandague talo si Pedro . Y enseguidas y gayo umoo .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: N	18	28		61280	 ¶ Ayo nae macone si Jesus güine as Caefas gui jalom palasyo : ya ogaan güije ; ya sija ti manjalom gui palasyo , pot no sea infanninaale , lao para usiña mañocho gui pascua .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Entonses mapos juyong si Pilato guiya sija ya ilegña : Jafa na finaaela inchichile contra este na taotao ?

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Manmanope ya ilegñija nu güiya : Yaguin ti taelaye finatinasña , ti inentregao .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Enaomina si Pilato ilegña nu sija : Chile güe jamyo ya injisga jaftaemano y laymiyo . Ylegñija y Judio sija nu güiya : Ti tunas na jame , infanmannae finatae ni jaye .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Para umacumple y sinangan Jesus ni jasangan , janamatungo jafa na finataeña nae umatae .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: N	18	33		61330	 ¶ Entonses si Pilato tumalo jumalom gui palasyo ya jaagang si Jesus ya ilegña nu güiya : Jago jao y Ray Judio sija ?

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Ynepe as Jesus : Unsasangan este pot jagoja namaesa , pat otro sija sumangangane jao pot guajo ?

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Si Pilato manope : Guajo Judio yo ? Nasionmo , ya y manmagas na mamale , maentrega yo nu jago : Jafa finatinasmo ?

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Ynepe as Jesus : Y raenoco , ti ujuyong gui sanjilo este na tano : Yaguin y raenoco ujuyong gui sanjilo este na tano , y tentagojo sija ufanmumo , pot guajo , ya ti jumaentrega gui Judio sija : lao pago y raenoco ti ujuyong güine .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Entonses si Pilato ilegña nu güiya : Jago pues un ray jao ? Ynepe as Jesus : Jago umalog na guajo un ray . Guajo minamafañago yo , pot este , yan minamamaela yo gui tano pot este , para umanae testimonio ni minagajet . Todo ayo y iyon minagajet , jajungog y inagangjo .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Si Pilato ilegña nu güiya : Jafa na güinaja y minagajet ? Anae munjayan jasangan este , tumalo guato gui Judio sija ya ilegña nu sija : Guajo ti mañoda yo guiya güiya jafa na isao .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Lao jamyo guaja costumbrenmiyo na junalibre uno para jamyo gui pascua . Manmalago jamyo na junalibre y Ray Judio sija ?

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Entonses managang talo ya ilegñija : Ti este ; lao si Barabas . Ya si Barabas güiya un saque .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: AYO nae si Pilato jachule si Jesus , ya jasaulag .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Ya y sendalo sija jadufog tituca para un corona , ya japolo gui iluña ya manaminagago güe ni magagon agaga .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Manmato jijot ya ilegñija : Jafa tatatmano jao , Ray Judio sija ? Ya manae patmada .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Entonses si Pilato jumuyong talo , ya ilegña nu sija : Estagüe na jachule guiya jamyo juyong , para intingo na ni un isao jusoda guiya güiya .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Ayo anae si Jesus mapos juyong , jachuchule y coronan tituca yan y magagon agaga . Ya ilegña nu sija si Pilato : Estagüe y taotao !

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Anae malie güe ni y magas mamale yan y ofisiat sija , manaagang ilegñija : Atane gui quiluus , atane gui quiluus . Si Pilato ilegña nu sija : Chile jamyo ya inatane gui quiluus ; sa guajo ti mañoda yo jafa na isao guiya güiya .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Maope güe ni y Judio sija : Jame guaja laymame , ya segun y laymame , debe umatae , sa jafa na güiya jafatinas maesa güe Lajin Yuus .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Si Pilato anae jajungog este na sinangan , guaja güe mas dangculo na minaañao ;

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Ya jumalom talo gui palasyo ya ilegña as Jesus : Jago , taotao mano jao ? Ya si Jesus taya inepeña .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Si Pilato pues ilegña nu güiya : Jago ti umadingane yo ? Ti untungo na guaja yo ninasiñajo para junalibre jao , ya para juatane jao gui quiluus ?

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Manope güe si Jesus : Ti siña y ninasiñamo contra guajo , yaguin ti manaejao gui sanjilo ; enao mina y umentrega yo guiya jago , guaja mas dangculo na isao .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Guinin este , si Pilato jaaligao y lugat para unalibre gue : lao y Judio sija managang ilegñija : Yaguin unnalibre este na taotao , ti amigon Sesat jao ; sa ayo y umanaray , jasangan contra si Sesat .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Anae si Pilato jajungog este na sinangan , jachule si Jesus juyong ya matachong gui tribuna , gui lugat na mafanaan Piso , ya y Hebreo na finojo Gábbatta .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Ayo nae y tiempo para ufamauleg y pascua : jijot y ora gui las saes . Entonses ilegña ni y Judio sija : Estagüe y Raymiyo !

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Entonses manaagang , ilegñija : Najanao ! najanao ! Atane gui quiluus ! Ylegña nu sija si Pilato : Juatane y Raymiyo ? Magas na mamale manmanope : Taya raymame na si Sesatja .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Entonses maentrega güe guiya sija para umatane gui quiluus . Ya sija cumone si Jesus !

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: N	19	17		61570	 ¶ Ya güiya chumuchuchule y quiluusña , jumanao para ayo na lugat na mafanaan y sagan calabera , cumequeilegña gui Hebreo na finijo , Golgota ;

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Anae maatane gui quiluus ; yan y gachongña otro dos , gui dos banda Jesus ya si Jesus gui talo .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ya manugue si Pilato un tinigue ya mapolo gui sanjilo y quiluus . Ya y tinigue : SI JESUS NASARENO , RAY Y JUDIO SIJA .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Ya megae na Judio sija tumaetae este na tinigue , sa y lugat anae maatane si Jesus , jijot gui siuda , ya esta matugue gui Hebreo , yan Griega , yan Lating .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Ayo nae elegñija as Pilato y manmagas na mamale yan y Judio sija : Chamo titigue : Ray y Judio sija : lao güiya umalog : Guajo y Ray y Judio sija .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Manope si Pilato : Jafa y jutugue esta jutugue .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: N	19	23		61630	 ¶ Entonses y sendalo sija , anae munjayan maatane gui quiluus si Jesus , machule y magaguña , ya mafatinas cuatro patte , cada sendalo un patte ; yan y tunico na magago locue ; güiya taya malagseña , lao todo matufog desde y sanjilo asta y sanpapa .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Pot enao ilegñija entre sija : Mungajit umipe , lao tapolo suette gui jiloña , jaye gaeyo güe : para umacumple y tinigue na ilegña : Mapatte entre sija y magagujo , ya y tunico na magagojo mafatinas y suette . Estesija y sendalo fumatinas .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: N	19	25		61650	 ¶ Ya manotojgue gui fiun quiluus Jesus , si nanaña , yan y chelun nanaña as Maria , yan si Maria palaoan Cleopas , yan si Maria Magdalena .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Ya anae jalie si Jesus si nanaña , yan y disipuluña ni jaguaeya na tomotojgue jijot , ilegña as nanaña : Palaoan , enaogüe y lajimo !

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Despues , ilegña ni disipulo : Enaogüe si nanamo . Desde ayo na ora y disipulo inadaje güe gui guimaña .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: N	19	28		61680	 ¶ Despues di este , jatungo si Jesus na todosija esta manmacumple , para y tinigue umacumple , ilegña : Majoyo .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Ya gaegue güije un nayan na bula y binagle : Ya sija nabula y espongja y binagle ya mapolo gui jilo un jayo na naanña y hisopo , ya manafalag y pachotña .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Anae si Jesus jaguinem y binagle , elegña : Jocog esta : ya janaeguen y iluña ya jaentrega y espiritu .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: N	19	31		61710	 ¶ Entonses y Judio sija , sa ayo na jaane y jaanen Preparasion ; para y tataotao sija taya usaga gui quiluus gui sabado na jaane ( sa dangculo ayo na jaane y sabado ) , manmangagao as Pilato na ufanmajulog y adengñija ya umanafanjanao güije .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Manmanmato sija y sendalo ya majulog y adengña y finenana , yan y otro , ayo dos y guinin y matane gui quiluus yan guiya ;

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Ya anae manmato gui as Jesus , ya malie na güiya esta matae , ti julog y adengña :

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Lao uno gui sendalo sija , janaadotgan gui calaguagña y lansaña , ya jumuyong y jâgâ yan janom .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Ya güiya y lumie mannae testimonio , ya y testimonioña , güiya magajet : ya güiya tumungo na jafa , ilegña magajet , para jamyo locue injenggue .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Sa este na güinaja jumuyong esta para umacumple y tinigue na ilegña : Ni un tolang guiya güiya umajulog .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Yan locue otro tinigue ilegña : Umaatan ayo ni janaadotgan .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: N	19	38		61780	 ¶ Despues di malofan estesija , si José taotao Arimatea , ya disipulon Jesus , lao gui secreto sa maañao ni Judio sija , jagagao si Pilato na güiya unajanao y tataotao Jesus : entonses si Pilato japolo . Ya mato güe ya janajanao y tataotaoña .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Mato locue si Nicodemo , na jagas mato gui as Jesus gui puenge , mañuñule un dinañan mira yan chaguan na jajatot , na y minacatña sien libra .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Ayo nae jachule y tataotao Jesus , ya maafuyut magago yan paopao , taemanoja y costumbre y Judio sija an manmanjafot .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Ya ayo na lugat nae maatane gui quiluus , guaja un güetta , ya y güetta nae guaja un naftan nuebo , ya asta pago taya nae mapoluye .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Ayo nae mapolo si Jesus , sa ayo na jaane y jaanin Preparasion y Judio sija ( sa ayo na naftan estaba jijot ) .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Y finenana na jaane gui semana , gui egaan anae ti claro , si Maria Magdalena mato gui naftan , ya jalie y acho na manajanao gui naftan .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Entonses malago ya malag as Simon Pedro , yan y otro disipulo ni güinaeya as Jesus , ya ilegña nu sija : Jachule y Señot gui naftan ya jame ti intingo mano nae japolo .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Manmapos si Pedro yan y otro disipulo , ya manmato gui naftan .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Ya manmalago sija y dos umetnon : ya y otro disipulo malago chadigña qui si Pedro , ya mato finenana gui naftan .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Ya ñumejon ya jaatan , ya jalie y magago lenso na mapolo ; lao ti jumalom .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Entonses mato si Simon Pedro ni dumadalalag güe , ya jumalom gui naftan , ya jalie y magago lenso na mapolo ,

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Ya y magago sudario na gaegue gui jilo y iluña , ti mapolo yan y palo magago , lao y otro lugat na mabalulutan .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Entonses jumalom locue ayo y otro disipulo , ni guine mato finenana gui naftan ; ya jalie yan jajonggue .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Sa ti matutungo trabia y tinigue , na janesesita na güiya ucajulo guine entalo manmatae .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Ayo nae manalo y disipulo sija guato gui guimañija .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: N	20	11		61930	 ¶ Ya si Maria gaegue güije gui san jiyong , jijot y naftan ya tumatanges ; ya tumanges , ñumejon papa y jaatan y sanjalom y naftan ;

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Ya jalie dos angjet na minagagon apaca , na manmatatachong , y uno gui para y ilo , y otro para y adeng , anae y tataotao Jesus guine mapolo .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya : Palaoan , jafa na tumatanges jao ? Ylegña nu sija : Sa jafa muna jachule y Señotjo , ya ti jutungo mano nae japolo .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Anae jasangan este , tumalo tate , ya jalie si Jesus , güije na tomotojgue , lao ti jatungo cao güiya si Jesus .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Palaoan , jafa na tumatanges jao ? Jaye unaliligao ? Pineloña na ayo na taotao y taotao y güetta , ilegña nu guiya : Señot , yaguin jago chumule , sangane yo mano nae unpolo , ya juchule güe .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Maria ! Jabira guiya güiya ya , ilegña gui Hebreo na finijo : Raboni ! cumequeilegña , Maestro ;

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Chamo yo pumapacha ; sa asta pago ti cajulo yo gui as Tata ; lao janao para y mañelujo ya unsangane sija , na jucajulo gui Tatajo ya yan Tatamiyo , y Yuusjo yan y Yuusmiyo .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Mato si Maria Magdalena ya jasangane y disipulo sija : Esta julie y Señot ; ya jaftaemano sinangane güe nu este na güinaja .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: N	20	19		62010	 ¶ Ya anae esta pupuenge , güije mismo na jaane , y finenana gui semana , ya y petta manmajujuchom , güije nae mangaegue y disipulo sija manetnon sa manmaañao ni Judio sija , mato si Jesus , ya tumojgue güe gui talo ya ilegña nu sija : Pas ugaegue guiya jamyo .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jasangan este , manfinanue ni canaeña yan y calaguagña . Ayo nae manmagof y disipulo sija anae malie y Señot .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Ya si Jesus ilegña nu sija talo : Pas ugaegue guiya jamyo ; taemanoja si Tata ni tumago yo , taegüije locue jutago jamyo .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ya anae munjayan jasangan este , manguaefe gui jiloñija ya ilegña nu sija : Resibe jamyo y Espirito Santo .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Y inasie ni y isaoñija , sija ufanmaasie ; ya iyonñija y indetiene sija ufanmadetiene .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: N	20	24		62060	 ¶ Ya si Tomas , uno gui dose , na mafananaan si Didimo , taegüe guiya sija anae mato si Jesus .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu güiya y palo disipulo : Y Señot guinin talie . Lao ilegña nu sija : Yaguin ti julie gui canaeña y señat y lilog sija , ya junajalom y calalotjo gui señat y lilog , yan ti junajalom y canaejo gui calaguagña , ti jujonggue .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: N	20	26		62080	 ¶ Ya despues di manmalofan ocho na jaane , anae disipulo sija mangaegue talo gui sanjalom , mañisija yan si Tomas . Mato si Jesus , macandalo y petta , ya sumaga gui entalo ya ilegña : Pas ugaegue guiya jamyo .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña as Tomas : Namamaela güine mague y calolotmo , ya unlie y canaejo ; ya namamaela güine mague y canaemo , ya unnajalom gui calaguagmo ; ya chamo tataeinangoco , lao unjonggue .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Entonses si Tomas manope ya ilegña nu güiya : Señotjo yan Yuusjo .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Pot y unlie yo , Tomas , na unjonggue yo : mandichoso ayo sija y ti manmanlie , lao manmanjonggue .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: N	20	30		62120	 ¶ Magajet , megae sija na señat palo na jafatinas si Jesus gui menan y disipuluña na ti matugue güine na leblo :

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Lao este sija manmatugue para injenggue na si Jesus , güiya si Cristo , Lajin Yuus ; ya anae injenggue , guaja jamyo taejinecog la linâlâ pot y naanña .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: DESPUES di manmalofan estesija , jafanue gue si Jesus otro biaje y disipulo sija gui oriyan tasen Tiberias ; ya taegüine jafanue güe namaesa .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Mangaegue mandadaña si Simon Pedro yan si Tomas , na mafananaan si Didimo , yan si Nataniel , taotao Cana guiya Galilea , yan y famaguon Sebedeo , yan otro dos disipuluña .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Ylegña nu sija si Simon Pedro : Jujanao para jucone y güijan . Ylegñija nu güiya : Jame indalalag jao . Manmapos ya manjalom gui un sajyan ; ya ayo na puenge , taya quineneñija .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Anae manana gui egaan si Jesus sumaga tomotojgue gui oriyan tase ; ya y disipulo ti matungo cao güiya si Jesus .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Ayo nae ilegña nu sija si Jesus : Famaguon , guaja jamyo jafa para incano ? Manope güe : Taya .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Yute y lagua gui agapan y sajyan , ya inseda . Mayute ya ti manasiña machule gui tase pot y minegae y güijan .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Ayo na disipulo y güinaeya as Jesus , umadingane si Pedro : Güiya y Señot . Entonses si Simon Pedro anae jajungog na güiya y Señot jadudog güe nu y magagon pescadot ( sa taemagago güe ) , ya tumayog gui tase .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Ya y palo disipulo sija manmato yan y sajyan ( sa ti chago gui tano , lao guaja dosientos codo ) machule y lagua , na bula ni güijan .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Ya anae manmato gui tano manmanlie guafe y pinigan na mapolo esta y güijan gui jiloña , yan pan .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Ylegña si Jesus nu sija : Chule mague y güijan ni inquene pago .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Ayo anae cajulo si Simon Pedro ya jajala y lagua para y tano , bula dangculon güijan sija , siento y sincuenta y tres ; ya achogja taegüenao y minegaeña , y lagua ti matitig .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Ylegña nu sija si Jesus : Fanmamaela ya infañocho . Ya ni uno gui disipulo sija fumaesen güe : Jago , jaye jao ? matungo na güiya y Señot .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Entonses mamaela si Jesus , ya jachule y pan ya manninae , ya y güijan taegüenao .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Esta güiya y mina tres na biaje na si Jesus jafanue güe y disipuluña desde tiempo nae cajulo güe guine entalo manmatae .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: N	21	15		62280	 ¶ Anae munjayan mañocho , si Jesus ilegña as Simon Pedro : Simon lajin Juan , unguaeya yo mas qui este sija ? Sinangane güe : Si Señot , jago tumungo na juguaeya jao . Ylegña nu güiya : Pasto y gajo patgon quinilo .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Tumalo ilegña nu güiya y mina dos biaje : Simon , lajin Juan , unguaeya yo ? Ylegña nu güiya : Si Señot , untungoja na juguflie jao . Ylegña nu güiya : Adaje y gajo quinilo .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ylegña nu güiya y mina tres na biaje : Simon , lajin Juan , unguflie yo ? Ninatriste si Pedro na sinangane güe asta tres biaje : Unguflie yo ? ya ilegña nu güiya : Señot , jago tumungo todosija : jago tumungo na juguflie jao . Ylegña nu güiya si Jesus : Pasto y gajo quinilo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Magajet ya magajet jusangane jao , anae patgon jao , undudog jao nu y sentura ya malag y malagomoja : ya anae bijo jao unjuto y canaemo , ya guinede jao ni y otro , ya unquinene guato gui ti malagomo .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Ya este ilegña , janatungo jafa na finatae nae siña namalag si Yuus . Ya anae jasangan este , ilegña nu güiya : Dalalag yo .

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Entonses jabira güe si Pedro ya jalie ayo na disipulo na güinaeya as Jesus dinalalag güe ; ya locue umason gui pichon gui sena , ya sinangane , Señot jaye uje y umentregao ?

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Anae si Pedro jalie este , ilegña as Jesus : Señot , jafa jumuyong para este ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Yegña nu güiya si Jesus : Yaguin malagojo na güiya ugagaegue asta qui mato yo , jafa y uguaja guiya jago ? Dalalag yo .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Jumuyong este na sinangan entre y mañelo na ayo na disipulo ti umatae : lao si Jesus sinangane , na ti umatae ; lao yaguin malagoyo na güiya ugagaegue asta qui mato yo , jafa y uguaja guiya jago ?

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: N	21	24		62370	 ¶ Este güiya y disipulo ni manae testimonio nu este sija na güinaja , ya jatugue este sija na güinaja : ya tatungo na y testimonioña , güiya magajet .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: N	21	25		62380	 ¶ Ya guaja locue palo megae na güinaja na jafatinas si Jesus , yaguin ufanmangue cada uno , jujaso na todo y tano ti omlat y leblo sija y ufanmatugue . Amen .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Y finenana na sinangan , jutugue , O Teofilo , pot todo ayo sija , na si Jesus jatutujon fumatinas , yan mamanagüe .

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: Asta y jaane anae maresibe gui sanjilo , despues di munjayan jatago pot y Espiritu Santo y apostoles sija ni y inayegña :

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Ni ayo locue y jafanue nu güiya lalâlâ , anae munjayan mapinito pot y megae na señat , liniiñija cuarenta na jaane yan manguecuentos güinaja sija ni y mangaegue gui raenon Yuus :

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Ya mandaña yan sija , ya jatago sija na chañija fanjajanao Jerusalem , lao ujanangga y promesan y Tata ni y , ilegña , injingog guiya guajo :

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Sa si Juan magajet na managpapange ni y janom : lao jamyo infanmatagpange ni y Espiritu Santo ti megae na jaane desde pago .

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: N	1	6		62440	 ¶ Enao mina , ayo sija y mandaña , finaesen güe , ilegñija : Señot , malago jao unnatalo guato y raeno guiya Israel ?

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Ya güiya ilegña nu sija : Ti para jamyo intingo y jaane yan y tiempo sija , ni y pinelon y Tata gui ninasiñañaja .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Lao jamyo infanmanresibe y ninasiña anae si Espiritu Santo ufato gui jilo miyo : yan jamyo utestigojo sija , iya Jerusalem yan todo iya Judea yan Samaria , yan asta y uttimon y tano .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jasangan este na güinaja , mientras maaatan güe , machule güe gui sanjilo ; ya y mapagajes rinesibe güe , guinen liniiñija .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Ya anae maaatan fitme y langet , anae mapos güe , estagüe dos taotao na minagagon ápaca , manotojgue jijot guiya sija .

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: Ni y ilegñija locue : Jamyo taotao Galilea , jafa na manotojgue jamyo ya inaatan julo y langet ? este mismo si Jesus ni y maresibe gui sanjilo guinen iya jamyo para y langet , umamaela talo taegüijeja anae inlie güe jumanao para y langet .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: N	1	12		62500	 ¶ Ayo nae sija manalo guato Jerusalem guinen y egso Olibo , ni y jijot Jerusalem , gui sabado na jaana na jinanao .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Ya anae sija manjalom , manjanao julo gui sanjilo na cuarto anae mañasaga todos , si Pedro yan si Juan yan si Santiago yan si Andres yan si Felipe yan si Tomas yan si Bartolome yan si Mateo yan si Santiago lajin Alfeo yan si Simon Selote yan si Judas chelun Santiago .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Estesija todo mañasagaja gui un jinasoja na tinaetae , yan manmangagagao fitme , yan y palo famalaoan sija yan si Maria nanan Jesus , yan y mañeluña lalaje sija .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: N	1	15		62530	 ¶ Ya ayo sija na jaane , si Pedro tumojgue julo gui entalo y mañelo , ya y numeron y mandaña guaja siento y bente . Ya ilegña :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: Lalaje an mañelo , nesesita umacumple este na tinigue ni y jasangan antes y Espiritu Santo gui pachot David pot si Judas ni umesgaejon ayo sija y cumone si Jesus .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Sa güiya estaba matufong guiya jita , yan guaja patteña güine na sinetbe .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Este na taotao , mamajan un fangualuan ni y apas y tinaelayeña ; ya japodong papa y mapta tiyanña , ya malagnos todo tilipasña .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Ya este matungo todo ni y mañasaga guiya Jerusalem ; ya pot enao na mafanaan ayo na fangualuan ni y finoñija : Aqueldama , comequeilegña , Fangualuan jâgâ .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Sa esta matugue gui leblon y Salmos : Polo ya y sagaña umayulang ya taya taotao sumagaye : ya y ofisioña otro chumule .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: Gui entalo estesija na taotao y mangachochongta todo y tiempo anae y Señot Jesus jumalom yan jumuyong guiya jita ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: Matutujon guinen y tinagpangen Juan asta ayo na jaane anae maresibe gui sanjilo guinen iya jita , nesesita uno gui entalo sija umatancho testigo yan jita ni y quinajuluña .

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Ya matancho dos , si José ni y mafanaan Barsabas ni y apiyiduña Justo , yan si Matias .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Ya manmanaetae ilegñija : Jago Señot ni y tumungo y corason y taotao todo , famanue jaye güine gui dos unayeg .

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: Para usaouao güine na sinetbe , yan y chechon apostoles anae si Judas ni y podong pot y tinaelayeña , ya güiya ujanao para y sagaña .

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Ya manmanae ni y suertenñija ; ya y suerte podong gui as Matias ; ya güiya matufong gui onse na apostoles .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: YA anae mato y jaanen y Pentecostes , estaba todos na mandadaña gui un sagayan .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Ya enseguidas mato y boruca guinen y langet , taegüije y güinaefen y dangculo na manglo , ya ninabula todo y guima anae manmatatachong sija .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Ya ayo nae manmato gui jiloñija dinga na jula sija , taegüije y guafe , ya sumaga gui jilo cada uno guiya sija .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Ya sija todo manbula ni y Espiritu Santo , yan jatutujon sumangan y otro na finijo , taegüijija y Espiritu numae sija na ujasangan .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Ya mañasaga güije guiya Jerusalem , Judio sija , na mandeboto na taotao , guinen todo y nasion ni y mangaegue gui papa y langet .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Ya anae majungog esta na boruca , mandaña y linajyan taotao , ya sija manyinalaca , sa cada taotao jajungog sija na manguecuentos ni y finoñijaja .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Ya sija todos ninafanlujan , yan ninafanmanman , ilegñija y uno ni y otro : Ada ti todo Galileo estesija y manguecuentos ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Ya jafa muna tajujungog cada taotao ni y finotaja gui anae manmafañagojit ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Partos , yan Medos , yan Elamitas , yan sija y mañasaga guiya Mesopotamia , yan Judea , yan Capadosia , yan Ponto , yan Asia ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Yan Phrygia , yan Pamfilia , yan Egipto , yan iya Libia ni y gaegue gui otro bandan Sirene , yan y manaotao juyong guiya Roma , Judio sija yan proselitos ,

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: Cretensija , yan Arabsija : tajujungog sija manguecuentos ni y finota , y namanman na checho Yuus sija .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Ya sija todos ninafanmanman , ya manbuebuenteja ilegñija uno yan y otro : Jafa este na taegüine ?

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Lao y palo sija manmanbotlelea ilegñija : Estesija na taotao manbula nuebo na bino .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: N	2	14		62780	 ¶ Lao si Pedro tumojgue julo gui entalo onse , ya jajatsa julo y inagangña , ya ilegña nu sija : Jamyo taotao Judea , yan todo y mañasaga guiya Jerusalem , polo ya este umatungo guiya jamyo , yan ecungog y sinanganjo .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Sa estesija ti manbulacho , taegüenao y pinelonmiyo , sa pago y mina tresja na ora gui jaane .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Lao este ayo y guinen masangan pot y profeta Joel :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: Na umasusede gui uttimo jaane sija , ilegña si Yuus , juchuda y Espiritujo gui jilo todo y catne ; ya y famaguonmiyo lalaje yan famaguonmiyo famalaoan ufanmanprofetisa , ya patgonmiyo lalaje ujalie y liniiñija , ya y manbijo sija guiya jamyo , ufanmangüife ni y güinife sija ;

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Magajet na y jilo y tentagojo lalaje , yan y tentagojo famalaoan nae bae juchuda güije na jaane y Espiritujo ; ya sija ujaprofetisa .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Ya bae jufanue ni y na manman gui sanjilo gui langet , yan señat gui sanpapa gui tano ; jâgâ yan guafe yan y asgon y aso :

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Y atdao umatolaeca mafajomjom , ya y pilan mafajâgâ ; antes di ufato y jaanin y Señot , ayo na jaane dangculo yan magas .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ya umasusede na masquesea jaye ni y umagang y naan y Señot , ufansatbo .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: N	2	22		62860	 ¶ Jamyo taotao Israel sija , jingog estesija finojo ; si Jesus , taotao Nasaret , un taotao maasegura na güinaeyan Yuus güe guiya jamyo pot y ninasiña sija yan y namanman , yan y señat ni y finatinas Yuus pot güiya gui entalo miyo , taegüijeja jamyo locue intingoja ;

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Güiya manaenñaejon pot tinancho pinagat yan antes na tiningo Yuus , jamyo inquene , ni y manaelaye sija na canae ya inatane gui quiluus ya inpino .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Ya si Yuus janacajulo , ya japula y piniten finatae ; sa ayo ti siña maguut güe .
