text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Sa si David sumangan pot güiya : Guajo julie siempre y Señot gui menan matajo ; sa güiya gaegue agapa na canaejo , para ti siña junacalamten :

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Enao mina y corasonjo mumagof , yan y jilajo senmagof ; yan y catneco locue usaga gui ninangga .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Sa ti undingo y antijo gui naftan , ni ti unnae y Santosmo para ulie y minitong .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Jago guinen munatungoyo ni y chalan linâlâ : yan unnabulayo minagof gui menamo .

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: Mañelujo lalaje , siñayo libre na jusangane jamyo ni y patriarca David , na matae ya majafot , ya y naftanña gaegue guiya jita asta pago na jaane .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Taegüine , na güiya profeta , ya jatungo na si Yuus manjula ni y juramento pot güiya , na y tinegcha y lomoña ya unafatachong Uno gui tronuña .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Sa guinen jalie este antes , na jasangan y quinajulo Cristo , na y antiña ti mapolo gui naftan ; ni y catneña ulie y minitong .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Este y as Jesus ni y ninacajulo as Yuus , ya enaomina jita todos mantestigo .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Taegüine na majatsa gui agapa na canae Yuus , ya guinen jaresibe guine y Tata y promesan Espiritu Santo , güiya chumuda este y inlie pago yan y injingog .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Sa si David ti cajulo gui langet ; lao ilegña nu güiyaja : Y Señot ilegña ni y Señotjo , fatachong gui agapa na canaejo ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: Asta que jupolo y enemigumo para fañajangan y adengmo .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: Polo ya todo y guima Israel ujatungo magajet , na si Yuus fumatinas güe y Señot yan Cristo ; este uje y inatane gui quiluus .

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Ya anae sija jajungog este , manmañiente gui corasonñija , ya ilegñija as Pedro yan y palo na apostoles sija : Mañelujo lalaje , jafajam infatinas ?

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ayo nae si Pedro ilegña nu sija : Fanmañotsot , ya infanmatagpange cada uno guiya jamyo , ni y naan Jesucristo , para inasiin y isaomiyo , yan inresibe y ninaen y Espiritu Santo .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Sa y promesa para jamyo , yan para y famaguonmiyo , yan para todos , asta ayo sija y mangaegue gui chago , jayeja y inagang ni y Señot Yuusta .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Yan megae otro na finijo janae testimonio , yan jasangane ilegña : Satba jamyo güine gui managuaguat na generasion .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: N	2	41		63050	 ¶ Ya ayo sija y manmagof rumesibe y finoña , manmatagpange : ya ayo na jaane , maaumenta guiya sija buente tres mit na taotao .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Ya sija sisigueja fitme gui finanagüen y apostoles sija , yan mandadañaja yan maipe y pan , yan an manmaetae .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Ya minaañao mato gui jilo todo y ante : yan megae na namanman yan señat manmafatinas pot y apostoles sija .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Ya todo ayo sija y manmanjonggue , mandadañaja , yan manguaja todo güinaja para uiyon todo ;

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Ya jabende iyonñija y güinajañija , yan ya manmapapatte y taotao sija cada uno taemanoja y nesesitaoña .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Ya sija sisigueja fitme , yan unoja corasonñija todo y jaane , gui guimayuus , yan an maipe y pan sija gui iyasija , ya jacano nañija ni y mainagof , yan sensiyo y corasonñija .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Manmanalaba as Yuus , yan mangaefabot ni y todo y taotao sija . Ya y Señot jaaumenta sija cada jaane , ni ayo sija y mansasatbo .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: SI Pedro yan Juan , dumaña jumanao julo gui guimayuus para ujafanaetae , gui oran a las nuebe .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Ya un taotao na coja desde y jalom y tiyan nanaña , ya machuchule , ya mapopolo cada jaane gui pettan y guimayuus , ni y mafanaan Bonita , para ufangagao limosna ni y manjajalom gui guimayuus .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Ya jalie si Pedro yan Juan na jumajalom gui guimayuus , ya jagagao limosna .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Ya inataugüe as Pedro yan Juan , ya ilegñija : Atanjam .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Ya güiya jaecungog sija , yan jananangga na uresibe jafa na güinaja guiya sija .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Ayo nae si Pedro ilegña : Salape yan oro , tayayo ; lao jafa y güinajajo junae jao . Pot y naan Jesucristo Nasareno , cajulo ya unfamocat .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Ya jamantiene y agapa na canaeña , ya jajatsa julo ; ya enseguidas y adengña yan y telang y bayoguña mumetgot .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Ya güiya tumayog julo , ya tumojgue , ya jatutujon mamocat ; ya jumalom yan sija gui jalom y guimayuus , mamomocat yan tumatayog , yan jaalalaba si Yuus ;

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Ya todo y taotao lumie güi na mamomocat , yan jaalalaba si Yuus ;

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Ya sija matungoja na güiya ayo y matatachong , ni y umogagao limosna gui Bonita na Petta gui guimayuus : ya sija manbula ni y namanman , yan minaañao , ni ayo y jumuyong guiya güiya .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: N	3	11		63220	 ¶ Ya y anae güiya quinequene as Pedro yan Juan , todo y taotao manmalago ya mandaña guiya sija gui coridot ni y mafanaan Salomon ya dangculo na ninamanmanñija .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Ya anae si Pedro jalie ayo , jaope y taotao sija ilegña : Taotao Israel , sa jafa na ninafanmanman jamyo ni este ? pat jafa na ingueguesatanjam taegüije y pot ninasiñanmameja , pat pot y dinebotonmameja na innafamocat este na taotao ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Si Yuus Abraham , yan Ysaac , yan Jacob , y Yuus y tatata ni y janamalago y Tentagoña as Jesus ; ni y inentrega yan inpine gui menan Pilatos , anae jadetetmina ya japolo güe na ujanao .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Lao jamyo inpine Ayo y Santos yan Tunas , yan ingagagao na infanmanae un taotao ni y pegno ;

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Yan inpino y prinsipen linâlâ , ni y si Yuus janacajulo guinen y manmatae ; ni y jame mantestigo .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Ya y naanña , pot y jinenggue y naanña , janametgot este na taotao ni y liniimiyo , yan y tiningomiyo ; junggan , y jinenggue , ni y pot güiya , mannae güe ni este na cabales na jinemlo gui menan miyo todos .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: Lao pago , mañelujo , nae jutungo na pot y taya tiningomiyo na infatinas ayo , taegüije y finatinas y magalajenmiyo locue .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Lao ayo na güinaja y janamatungo si Yuus antes , pot y pachot todo sija y profeta , na si Cristoña ufamadese , ya taegüije ucumple .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Enaomina fanmañotsot , ya inbira talo jamyo , ya y isaomiyo ufanmafunas , para siña ufato y tiempon y refresco guinen menan Yuus ;

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Ya para güiya umatago ayo Cristo , ni y esta matancho antes para jamyo ; güiya si Jesus .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Ni y langet nesesita uresibe asta y tiempo sija anae todo y güinaja mannanalo mauleg talo , ni y jasangan si Yuus gui pachot y santos na profetaña sija , ni jagas mangaegue desde qui matutujon y tano .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Sa magajet na si Moises ilegña : Y Señot Yuus , unacajulo un profeta guiya jamyo , gui entalo mañelunmiyo , taegüine iya guajo ; iya guiya nae injingog todo y güinaja ni y mansinangane jamyo .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Ya umasusede na todo y ante ni y ti malago umecungog ayo na profeta , umaguefyulang gui entalo y taotao sija .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Magajet na todo sija y profeta desde as Samuel yan ayo sija y manatate , todos ni y manmañangan , taegüine masangan güine sija na jaane .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Ya jamyo sija y famaguon y profeta sija , yan y trato ni y si Yuus jafatinas gui mañaenata , ilegña as Abraham : Ya y semiyamo nae todo y familia sija gui tano ufanbendise .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Iya jamyo nae finena , si Yuus , janacajulo y Tentagoña , ya jatago na infanbinendise , ya ubira cada uno guiya jamyo guinin y tinaelayenmiyo .

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: YA anae manguecuentos yan y taotao sija , y magas na mamale yan y magas y templo , yan y Saduseosija , manmato guiya sija ,

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Ya guesinestotba , sa sija jafananagüe y taotao sija , ya japredidica y quinajulo guinin y manmatae , pot si Jesus .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Ya manmapolo canae gui jiloñija , ya manmapreso asta y inagpaña , sa estaba esta pupuenge .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Lao megae sija y jumungog y sinangan majonggue ; ya y numeron y taotao sija , buente sinco mit .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: N	4	5		63420	 ¶ Ya y inagpaña güije , y magasñija yan y manamco , yan y escriba sija mandaña guiya Jerusalem ;

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Yan mangaegue si Annas , magas y mamale , yan si Caefas , yan si Juan , yan si Alejandro , yan ayosija parientes y magas mamale ,

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Ya anae munjayan japlanta sija gui talo , jafaesen : Pot jafa na ninasiña , pat jaye na naan na infatinas este ?

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Ya si Pedro , bula ni y Espiritu Santo , ilegña nu sija : Jamyo ni y magas y taotao , yan y manamco guiya Israel ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: Yaguin manmachaguejam pago na jaane pot y mauleg finatinas para y malango na taotao , sa jafa muna manajomlo ;

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: Intingo todo jamyo , yan todo y taotao guiya Israel , na pot y naan Jesucristo , y Nasareno , ni y inatane gui quiluus , ni y ninacajulo as Yuus guinin y manmatae ; pot güiyaja este na taotao na tumojgue gui menan miyo ya jomlo .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Güiya yuje na acho y innataebale jamyo ni y manmanjatsa , na jumuyong cabesan esquina .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Ya ni uguaja satbasion gui otro ; sa taya otro naan gui papa y langet , manmanae y taotao sija , para usiña utafansatbo .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: N	4	13		63500	 ¶ Ya anae malie y minatatngan Pedro yan Juan , ya jinasonñija na manaetiningo ya manlanga na taotao , ninafanmanman , ya ayonae matungo na guinin mañisija yan si Jesus .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Ya anae malie y taotao ni y manajomlo na mañisija manojgue , taya jafa siña ujasangan contra ayo .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Lao anae jatago sija na ufanjuyong gui dinaña , manasangane entre sija ,

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Ilegñija : Jafa tafatinas ni este sija na taotao ? sa magajet na afamao na milagro mafatinas pot sija , ya manmamatungo esta ni todo ayo sija y mañasaga Jerusalem ; ya ti siña tapune .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Lao trabia mientras ti chachago matalaña gui entalo y taotao sija ; nije taencatga sija , ya chañija fanmañangangane ni este na naan desde pago .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Ya jaagang sija , ya jaencatga na senchañija sumasangan , ni ufanmamanagüe ni y naan Jesus .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Lao si Pedro yan Juan manope ilegñija : Jusga , cao tunas gui menan Yuus na inosgueña jamyo qui si Yuus ;

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Sa tisiña inpelo na ti insangan y liniimame yan y jiningogmame .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Ya anae esta jaencatga sija mas , jasotta , sa taya siña jafa ujasoda para ujacastiga , pot causa y taotaosija ; sa todo mumalag si Yuus pot ayo y mafatinas .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Sa y taotao ni y anae mafatinas este y milagron y jinelo , mas di cuarenta años inamcoña .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: N	4	23		63600	 ¶ Ya anae masotta na ujanao , manjanao para y mangachongñija , ya jasangane todo ni y mansinangane sija ni y magas mamale yan y manamco .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Ya anae jajungog sija ayo , jajatsa y inagangñija para as Yuus , ilegñija : O Señot , jago Yuus , ni y fumatinas y langet , yan y tano , yan y tase , yan todo y mangae gui sanjalomñija ;

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Ni y pot Espiritu Santo ni y pachot y tentagomo as David ilegmo : Sa jafa y Gentiles na manlalalo , ya y taotao sija manmanjaso ni y taebale na güinaja ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Y ray sija gui tano manotojgue julo , ya y magalaje sija mandaña contra y Señot , yan contra si Cristoña .

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: Sa magajet na gui este siuda contra y santos na Tentagomo as Jesus , ni y unpalalae ; todo si Herodes , yan Poncio Pilato , yan y Gentiles yan y taotao guiya Israel , mandaña ,

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Para ujafatinas jafa y tinancho antes y canaemo , yan y consejumo para ususede .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Ya pago , O Señot , lie y amenasoñija : ya unnae y tentagomo sija , na contodo y minatatnga ujasangan y sinanganmo ,

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Mientras unjujuto mona y canaemo para umajomlo ; ya para y señat yan mannamanman umafatinas pot y naan y santos na Tentagomo as Jesus .

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Ya anae munjayan manmanaetae , y lugat anae mandadaña mayengyong ; ya todos manbula ni y Espiritu Santo , ya manmatatnga jasangan y sinangan Yuus .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: N	4	32		63690	 ¶ Ya y inetnon güije sija ni y manmanjonggue , manunoja na corason yan unoja na ante : ni uno guiya sija ualog iyoña ayo y jasagagaye ; lao todo y güinaja manparejo iyonñija .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Yan dangculo na ninasiña na manmannae y apostoles testimonio ni y quinajulo y Señot Jesus : ya megae na grasia gaegue gui jiloñija todos .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Ya ni uno guiya sija nesesitao ; sa todo ayo sija y mangaeiyo tano pat guma , jabende ya jachule y balen ayo y binendenñija ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: Ya japolo gui adeng y apostoles sija : ya manmapapatte cada taotao jafataemano y janesesita .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: N	4	36		63730	 ¶ Ayonae si José , ni y mafanaan ni y apostoles Barnabé ( ni y comoqueilegña , lajin consuelo ) ni y Lebita , taotao Chipre ,

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Guaja tanoña , ya jabende , ya jachule y salape , ya japolo gui adeng apostoles sija .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: LAO un taotao naanña si Ananias , yan si Safira asaguaña , na jabende güinajanñija ,

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Ya janana palo gui baliña , ya y asaguaña jatungo ja locue ayo , ya jachule un patteja ya japolo gui adeng y apostoles .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Lao si Pedro ilegña : Ananias , sa jafa na janabula si Satanas y corasonmo para undague y Espiritu Santo , yan unnana palo gui balen y tano ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Mientras sumasaga , ada ti iyomo ? ya anae munjayan mabende , ada taegüe gui ninasiñamo ? sa jafa na unjaso este gui corasonmo ? ti y taotao undague , na si Yuus .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Ya anae jajungog si Ananias este na finijo , podong papa ya matae : ya dangculon minaañao mato gui jilo ayo sija todo y jumujungog este na güinaja .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Ya mabalutan ni y manfamaguon na lalaje , ya machule juyong y majafot .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: N	5	7		63810	 ¶ Ya anae malofan buente tres oras , jumalom y asaguaña , ti jatungo jafa guinin mafatinas .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Ya si Pedro ilegña nu güiya : Sanganeyo cao inbende y tanomiyo pot un tanto . Ya güiya ilegña : Junggan pot ayo na tanto .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Ayonae si Pedro ilegña : Jafa na umatungo jamyo para intienta y Espiritu y Señot ! estagüiyaja gui petta y adeng ayo sija y jumafot y asaguamo , ya umachule jaojuyong .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Ayonae enseguidas podong papa gui adengña ya matae ; ya y manfamaguon na lalaje manjalom ya masoda güe na matae , ya machule ya majafot gui oriyan y asaguaña .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Ya mato dangculon minaañao gui jilo todo y iglesia , yan y jilo todo ayo sija y jumujungog estesija .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: N	5	12		63860	 ¶ Ya pot y canae y apostoles sija , megae na señat yan mannamanman manmafatinas gui entalo taotao ; ya sija todos mandaña gui un jinasoja gui coridot Salomon .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Ya y palo sija , ni un taotao malago dumañae sija ; lao y taotao manafandangculo sija .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Ya y manmanjonggue gui Señot , mas maaumenta y linajyan parejoja y lalaje yan y famalaoan ;

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Ya enao na sija manmangongone malango gui chalan sija , ya manmapopolo gui cama yan y camiya , na para , yaguin malofan si Pedro , y aninengña ufanjinemeja palo guiya sija .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Ya ayonae manmato locue linajyan taotao guinin y siuda , gui oriyan Jerusalem , manmangongone megae na manmalango , yan ayo sija y ninafañachatsaga ni y manáplacha na espiritu : yan manafanjomlo sija .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: N	5	17		63910	 ¶ Ya anae y magas na pale tomojgue julo , yan todo ayo sija y mangachochongña ( ni y inetnon Saduseo ) ya manbula inigo .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Ya japolo canae gui jilo y apostoles , ya jacone gui calaboson y publico .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Lao y angjet y Señot anae esta puenge , jababa y pettan y calaboso ya manquinene sija , ya ilegña :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: Janao fanojgue gui jalom y guimayuus , ya insangane y taotao todo y sinangan este na Linâlâ .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Ya anae jajungog sija ayo , manjalom gui guimayuus , taftataf gui egaan , ya manmamanagüe . Lao anae mato y magas mamale , yan ayo sija y mangachochongña , janafanmaagange y sinedrio yan todo y compañia ni mamapagot ni y famaguon Israel , ya jatago para y calaboso para ujacone sija .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Lao anae manmato y ofisiat sija gui calaboso , ti manmasoda sija ; ya manalo tate ya manmañangane ,

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: Ilegñija : Y calaboso , magajet na inseda majujuchomja todo , ya y manmamamumulan manestabaja na manotojgue gui jiyong potta : lao anae inbaba , taya taotao inseda gui sanjalom .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Anae y capitan y guimayuus , yan y manmagas mamale , jajungog este na sinangan ninafanestotba sa ti jatungo manonae ufanjuyong .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Lao mato uno ya mansinangane sija , ilegña : Ayo sija na taotao y inpelo gui calaboso , mangaegue gui guimayuus na manmamananagüe ni y taotao sija .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Ayonae jumanao y capitan yan y manmagas sija , ya manmacone sija , ti manmaafuetsas , sa manmaañao ni y taotao sija , sa noseaja ufanmadago ni acho .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Ya anae manmacone sija , manmapolo gui menan y sinedrio ya manfinaesen ni y magas na pale ,

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: Ilegña : Inguesencatga jamyo na chamiyo fanmamananagüe ni este na naan . Ya estagüe inbula Jerusalem ni y finanagüenmiyo . Ya jinasonmiyo na inchile y jâgân este taotao gui jilomame .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Ya manope si Pedro , yan y palo na apostoles , ilegñija : Nesesita na taosgueña si Yuus finena qui y taotao sija .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Y Yuus y mañaenata sija , janacajulo si Jesus ni ayo y inpino , yan incana gui trongcon jayo .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Guiya jinatsa as Yuus gui agapa na canaeña , para u - Prinsipe yan u - Satbadot , para unae sinetsot iya Israel , yan inasiin y isao .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Ya jame testigo ni este sija na güinaja ; yan y Espiritu Santo locue , ni y si Yuus numae ayo sija y umosgue gue .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: N	5	33		64070	 ¶ Ya anae jajungog sija ayo , manchinachat asta y corasonñija , ya manaseyo para ufanmapuno sija .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Ayonae tumojgue julo uno gui sinedrio , un Fariseo , ni y naanña si Gamaliel , na magas y lay , ya maonra ni y taotao todo ; ya manago na umanafanlasuja didide ayo sija taotao .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Ya ilegña nu sija : Jamyo lalajen , Israel , adaje jamyo jafa jinasonmimiyo para infatinas ni este sija na taotao .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Sa antes di este sija na jaane cajulo si Teudas , janabanidoso güi taegüije y jaye na taotao ; ya iya guiya nae manguaguato un manadan lalaje , guaja buente cuatro sientos mandaña sijaja ; ni y mapuno ; yan todo ayo sija y umosgue güe manmachalapon ya manjuyong sin jafa .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Ya despues di este na taotao , cajulo si Judas na taotao Galileo , gui jaanen y manmaempadrona ; ya jacone un manada gui tateña : ya güiya locue malingo ; yan todo ayo sija y umosgue güe manmachalapon .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Lao pago jusangane jamyo : Insetta este sija na taotao , ya inpelo sijaja ; sa este na pinagat , pat este na chocho , yaguin guinin y taotao , ufanmayute ,

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Lao yaguin as Yuus , ti siña inyilang , sa noseaja infanmumo contra si Yuus .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Ya manafamaulegja , ya anae manmaagang y apostoles guiya sija , manmasaulag ya manmatago na chañija sumasangan y naan Jesus , ya manmapolo na ujafanjanao .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Enao mina manjanao gui menan y sinedrio , mansenmagof sa japolo na ujamerese pumadese y minamajlao pot y naan Jesus .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Ya todo y jaane sija , ti mandescacansa manmamanagüe yan manmañangane as Jesus ni y Cristogüe , gui guimayuus , yan y iyasija .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: YA ayo sija na jaane anae lumamegae y disipulo sija , mangogonggong y Helenitas sija contra y Hebreo sija , sa y manbiuda guiya sija , ti manmaatiende gui sinetbeñija cada jaane .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Ayonae y dose , jaagang y manadan disipulo guato guiya sija , ya ilegñija : Ti tunas na tapolo y sinangan Yuus , ya tasetbe y lamasa sija .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Enaomina mañelo , aligao entre jamyo siete na taotao ni y manmauleg , ni y manbula Espiritu , yan minejnalom , ya tapolo para este na chocho .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Lao jita , tasigueja fitme y manmanaetae , yan y sinetbe y sinangan .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Ya ayo na sinangan , ninafanmagof y manada todo ; ya maayeg si Esteban , un taotao na bula jinenggue yan Espiritu Santo , yan si Felipe , yan si Prócoro , yan si Nicanor , yan si Timón , yan si Parmenas , yan si Nicolás proseliton Antioquia .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Ya manmaplanta gui menan y apostoles : ya anae munjayan manmanaetae , japolo y canaeñija gui jiloñija .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Ya y sinangan Yuus lumalamegae ; ya y disipulo megae manmaumentaña guiya Jerusalem ; ya dangculon manadan mamale locue , manmanosgue ni y jinenggue .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: N	6	8		64240	 ¶ Ya si Esteban , bula y grasia yan ninasifia , jafatinas namanman na milagro yan señat gui entalo y taotao sija .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Lao guaja mangajulo güije gui sinagoga ni y manmafanaan sinagogan Libertinos , yan Sireneo sija , yan Alejandrino sija , yan ayo sija iya Silisia , yan Asia , managuaguat yan si Esteban .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Lao tisiña macontra y tiningo , yan y Espiritu ni y jasangan .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Ya manmasusuug y taotao sija na ujaalog : Injingogja güe na jasangan y chinatfino contra si Moises , yan contra si Yuus .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Ya manafangalamten y taotao sija , yan y manamco , yan y escribasija ; ya manmato guiya güiya , ya macone güe guato gui sinedrio ,

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Ya manmamalo testigo na ti magajet , ni ilegñija : Este na taotao ti malago bumasta cumuentos chinatfino contra este y santos na lugat , yan contra y tinago :

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Sa injingogja gue ilegña , na este y as Jesus taotao Nasaret uyulang este na lugat , yan utulaeca , y costumbre ni y jaentregajit si Moises .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Ya todo ayo sija y manmatatachong gui sinedrio , maaatan güe , ya malie y mataña na calang matan angjet .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: AYONAE ilegña y magas mamale : Taegüine este sija ?

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Ya güiya ilegña : Mañelujo lalaje yan mañaena , ecungog . Si Yuus y minalag fumatoigüe y tatata as Abraham anae estatabaja guiya Mesopotamia , antes di usaga Charran .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Ya ilegña nu güiya : Suja gui tanomo yan y manparientesmo , ya maela jalom gui tano ni y finanuejo nu jago .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Ya güiya jumanao juyong gui tano y Chaldeosija , ya sumaga Charran : ya desde ayo , anae matae si tataña , ninamalofangüe as Yuus güine mague na tano anae mañasaga jamyo pago .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Ya ti ninae güe jafa na erensiaña güije , aje , taya ni para upolo y adengña gui jiloña : lao prinemete güe na uninae para güinajaña , yan y semiyaña despues di güiya , sa güiyaja trabia tataepatgon .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Ya si Yuus jasangan taegüine , Na y semiyaña utaotao juyong gui ti tanoña ; yan manmacone ya manmancautiba , ya manmatrata taelaye cuatro sientes años .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Ya y nasion ni y manmancautiba , bae jujusga , ilegña si Yuus ; na despues di ayo , ufanmamaela juyong ya guajo jumasetbe güine na lugat .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Yan manae güe ni y traton sirconsision : ya si Abraham jalilis si Ysaac , ya masirconsida güe gui mina ocho na jaane ; ya si Ysaac jalilis si Jacob ; ya si Jacob jalilis y dose na patriarcasija .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: Ya y patriarca sija pot y inigoñija , mabende si José guiya Egipto : lao si Yuus estaba guiya güiya ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: Ya ninalibre güe todo gui chinatsaga , yan ninae güe finaborese yan tiningo , gui menan Faraon , ray guiya Egipto ; yan ninamagalaje güe guiya Egipto , yan todo y guimaña .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: Ayonae mato niñalang todo gui tano Egipto yan Charran , yan dangculon chinatsaga : ya y mañaenata ti manmañoda nengcanoñija .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Lao anae si Jacob jajungog na guaja trigo guiya Egipto , jatago y mañaenata finenana na biaje .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Ya y mina dos biaje , matungo si José ni y mañeluña : ya y parientes José janatungo si Faraon .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Ya manago si José na umaagange si tataña as Jacob para iya güiya , yan todo y manparientesña , setentaisinco na taotao .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Ya si Jacob jumanao papa Egipto , ya matae güije yan y mañaenata sija .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Ya manmachule guato Siquem , ya manmapolo gui naftan , ni y finajan Abraham pot salape , gui famaguon Emmor guiya Siquem .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: Lao anae esta jijot y tiempon y promesa , ni y si Yuus manjula as Abraham , ya y taotao lumamegae , yan manlajyan guiya Egipto ,

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Asta qui y otro ray cajulo , ya ti jatungo si José .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Este jausa y malamañaña gui manparientesta , yan jatrata taelaye y mañaenata , sa janafanmayute y famaguonñija ni y pago finañago para chañija fanlalâlâ .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Ya ayo na tiempo nae mafañago si Moises , ya sumenbonito ; ya mapogsae gui guima tataña tres meses .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Ya anae mayute , y jagan Faraon jumoca , ya pinegsae para lajiña .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Ya si Moises , maeyag ni y todo y tiningo y taotao Egipto , ya mangaeninasiñaña y finoña yan y chechoña sija .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: Ya anae cana jacumple cuarenta años y sacaña , mato gui corasonña na ubisita y mañeluña ni y famaguon Israel .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Ya jalie uno guiya sija ni y japadese y maltrato , ya jadefiende y mumatrata , ya japuno y taotao Egipto .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Sa pineluña na jatungo y mañeluña na uninafanlibre as Yuus ni y canaeña ; lao ti jatungo sija .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Ya y inagpaña na jaane , jafanue sija nu güiya anae managuaguat , ya malago na unaunoja talo sija , ilegña : Señores , jamyo mañelo ; jafa na mananataelaye y uno yan y otro ?

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Lao ayo y minalalamen y tiguangña , jachonegñaejon , ilegña : Jaye munamagas jao gui jilo mame ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Malago jao unpunoyo taegüije anae unpuno nigap y taotao Egipto ?

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Ya ninafalago si Moises ni este na sinangan , ya tumaotao juyong gui tano Madian , gui anae jalilis y dos na lajiña .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: Ya anae jacumple cuarenta años , mato guiya güiya un angjet gui jalomtano gui egso Sinae , gui mañila y guafe gui jalom y trongcon chaguan .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Ya anae jalie ayo si Moises , ninagosmanman ni y liniiña ; ya anae lumajijot para ugueslie , y inagang y Señot mato guiya güiya ,

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: Ilegña : Guajo y Yuus y mañaenamo , y Yuus Abraham , yan y Yuus Ysaac , yan y Yuus Jacob . Lao si Moises manlalaolao , ya ti siña jaatan .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña nu güiya : Pula y sapatosmo gui adengmo ; sa y lugat anae tumotojgue jao , santos na oda .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Sa seguro julie , y manmasapet y taotaojo guiya Egipto , yan jujungog y inigongñiñija , ya tumunogyo para junafanlibre sija . Ya pago maela jao , sa jutago jao guato Egipto .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: Este y as Moises ni y jarechasa ilegñija : Jaye munamagas jao yan unjues ? Güiya tinago as Yuus na umagas yan uninafanlibre pot y canae y angjet ni y mafato guiya güiya gui jalomtano .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Güiya chumule sija juyong , ya despues manfinanue ni y namanman , yan señat sija gui tano Egipto , yan y Tasen Agaga , yan y jalomtano cuarenta anos .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Este ayo y as Moises , ni y ilegña ni y famaguon Israel : Y Yuusmiyo janacajulo un profeta guiya jamyo gui mañelunmiyo taegüine iya guajo .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Este ayo y estaba gui inetnon , gui jalomtano , yan y angjet ni y cumuentuse güe gui egso Sinae , yan y mañaenata ; ni y rumesibe y nalâlâ na tinago para ufanmanaejit .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: Ni y mañaenata ti manmalago jaosgue lao mayute juyong guiya sija , ya y corasonñija manalo tate Egipto ,

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Ilegñija as Aaron : Fatinasejam Yuus para ujanao gui menanmame , as este y as Moises ni y cumonejam juyong gui tano Egipto , ti intingo jafa ujuyong .

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Ya sija manmamatinas un tatnero , ya machule y inefrese para idolo sija , güije sija na jaane , ya ninafansenmagof ni y checho y canaeñija .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Ayonae jabira si Yuus , ya japolo na ujaadora y inetnon y langet ; taegüije esta matugue gui leblon y profeta : O jamyo ni y guima Israel , inofreseyo pinino gâgâ sija yan inefrese sija gui cuarenta años gui jalomtano ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Yan injatsa y tabemaculon Moloc , yan y estreyas y Yuus Refán , jechura sija ni y infatinas para inadora sija ; ya guajo juchule jamyo mas chago qui Babilonia .

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: Y mañaenata , guaja ni y tabernaculon y testimonio gui jalomtano , taegüije tinanchoña ni ilegña as Moises na ufatinas taemanoja na jechura y liniiña .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Ni y mañaenata locue gui tiempoñija a machule jalom yan si Josué anae jumalom gui erensian y Gentiles , ni y si Yuus yumute juyong gui menan y mañaenata , asta y jaanen David ;

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Ni y sumoda finaborese gui menan Yuus , yan jagagao na ualiligao tabernaculo para si Yuus Jacob .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Lao si Salomon fumatinase güe un guma .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: Sa y Gueftaquilo , ti sumasaga gui guima sija ni y finatinas canae ; taegüije y sinangan y profeta .

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: Y langet tronujo , ya y tano fañajangan y papa adengjo ; jafa na guma injatsayeyo ? ilegña y Señot ; pat jafa na sagayan nae jusaga ?

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: Ada ti y canaejo fumatinas todo este sija na güinaja ?

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: Jamyo ni y gaetongjo tiso , yan ti manmasirconsida y corason yan y talanga , sa siempre incontra y Espiritu Santo ; taegüije y checho y mañaenanmiyo inchechegüe .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: Jaye gui profeta ti japetsigue y mañaenanmiyo ? ya japuno ayo sija y manmañangangane antes ni y mamamaela Uno na Tunas ; ya jamyo pago inentrega , yan inpino ;

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Ni y inresibe y tinago pot y inareglan y angjet , ya ti inadaje .

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: N	7	54		64850	 ¶ Ya anae jajungog estesija , manchinachat asta y corasonñija , ya janafañegcheg y nifenñija guiya güiya .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Lao güiya , bula ni y Espiritu Santo , ya jaatan meton y langet , ya jalie y minalag Yuus , yan si Jesus na tumotojgue gui agapa na canae Yuus .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Ya ilegña , Estagüe na julie y langet na mababa , ya y Lajin taotao tumotojgue gui agapa na canae Yuus .

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Ayonae sija managang ni y dangculo na inagangñija , yan jatampe y talanganñija , ya manmalago guato guiya güiya ;

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: Ya mayute juyong gui siuda , ya mafagas ni y acho : ya y testigo sija , japolo papa y magagoñija gui adeng un patgon na taotao na y naanña si Saulo .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Ya mafagas ni y acho si Esteban , ya jaaagang ni Yuus , ilegña : Señot , Jesus , resibe y Espiritujo .

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Ya dumimo papa , ya umagang ni y dangculo na inagangña , ilegña : Señot , chamo pumopolo este na isao gui cuentanñija ; ya anae munjayan jasangan este , maego .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: YA si Saulo jaconsiente gui finataeña . Ya ayo ni tiempo , guaja dangculon pinetsigue contra y iglesia guiya Jerusalem ; ya todo sija , ni ti apostoles , manmachalapon gui tano Judea , yan Samaria ;

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Ya y mandeboto na taotao , macatga si Esteban para umajafot , ya dangculo inigungñija pot güiya .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Ya si Saulo jayulang y inetnon mangilisyano , ya jumalom gui cada guma , ya jabatatangga y lalaje yan y famalaoan para ufanmapreso .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Enaomina ayo sija y manmachalapon , manjanao para todo y lugat , ya japredidica y sinangan .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Ayonae si Felipe mapos papa gui siuda Samaria , ya japredica guiya sija si Cristo .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao sija , manunoja , ya maatituye ayo sija y sinangan Felipe , anae malie yan majungog y señat ni y finatinasña .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Sa megae y manáplacha na espiritu , manaagang ni y dangculo na inagang , yan manjujuyong güije todo gui anae mañasaga ; yan megae na manparalitico , yan mancojo , manafanjomlo .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Ya guaja un dangculon minagof güije na siuda .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: jaencantayan jafababa y taotao sija ni y magicaña guiya Samaria , japolo güe na güiya uno dangculo .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Ya todo umatituye , desde y diquique asta y dangculo , ilegñija : Este na taotao , y dangculo na ninasiñan Yuus .

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Ya mantituye , sa apmam na tiempo na numamanman ni y magicaña .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Lao anae manmanjonggue as Felipe ni y japredica y ebangelio y raenon Yuus , yan y naan Jesucristo , manmatagpange todo , lalaje yan famalaoan .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Ya si Simon manjonggue locue ; ya anae matagpange , sumisijaja yan Felipe , ya ninamanman anae jalie y milagro yan y señat sija ni y manmafatinas .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: N	8	14		65050	 ¶ Ya y apostoles , ni y manestataba Jerusalem anae majungog na iya Samaria jaresibe y sinangan Yuus , matago guato si Pedro yan si Juan ;

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ya anae manmato guato , jatayuyute sija , para ujaresibe y Espiritu Santo :

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: ( Sa trabia ti tumutunog gui jilo una guiya sija ; sa manmatagpangeja pot y naan y Señot Jesus ) .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ayonae japolo y canaeñija gui jiloñija , ya maresibe y Espiritu Santo .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Ya anae jalie si Simon na pot y japolo y canaeñija y apostoles , manmannae ni y Espiritu Santo , jaofrese sija salape ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ilegña : Naeyo locue ni este na ninasiña , ya masqueseaja jaye nae jupolo y canaejo , uresibe y Espiritu Santo .

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Lao si Pedro , ilegña nu güiya : Y salapemo ufalingo yan jago , sa jinasomo na y ninaen Yuus mafafajan salape .

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Taya pattemo ni suertemo güine , sa y corasonmo ti tunas gui menan Yuus .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Enaomina fañotsot ni este y tinaelayemo , ya untayuyute si Yuus , yaguin siña maasie jao ni y jinason y corasonmo .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Sa julie na gaegue jao gui lalaet y minalaet , yan y guineden y tinaelaye .

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Ayonae manope si Simon , ya ilegña : Tayuyuteyo gui Señot , ya chañija fanmafato guiya guajo ni uno gui este sija sinanganmiyo .

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: N	8	25		65160	 ¶ Enao mina sija , anae guinin janae testimonio yan jasangan y sinangan y Señot , manalo guato Jerusalem , y japredica y ebangelio gui megae na sengsong y taotao Samaria sija .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Ya y angjet y Señot jacuentuse si Felipe ilegña : Cajulo , ya unjanao guato gui sanjaya gui chalan ni y jumajanao desde Jerusalem , asta Gasa ni y desierto .

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Ya cajulo , ya mapos ; ya estagüe un taotao Etiopia na eunuco na gaeninasiña na dangculo gui papa Candase raynan taotao Etiopia sija , ya güiya encatgao todo ni y güinajan y ray na , ya mato Jerusalem para ufanadora .

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Ya tumalo guato , ya matachong gui jilo y iyoña carruaje ya jataetae y profeta Isaias .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Ya y Espiritu ilegña as Felipe : Janao jijot ya undañae y carruaje .

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Ya malago guato guiya güiya si Felipe , ya anae jajungog na jatataetae y profeta Isaias , ilegña : Untungo jafa tinaetataemo ?

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jafa taemano siñayo yaguin taya fumanagüeyo ? ya jagaogao na ucajulo ya ujasija matachong .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Ya y lugat gui Tinigue ni y jatataetae , taegüine : Macone taegüije y quinilo yaguin macone para umapuno ; yan parejo yan y cotdero ni y ti cumecuentos gui menan y dumadasae , taegüejeja ti jabababa y pachotña .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Ya y inimitdeña nae y juisioña munajanao ; ya jaye usinangan claro y generasionña ? sa y linâlâfia machule gui tano .

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: N	8	34		65250	 ¶ Ya y eunuco jaope si Felipe ilegña : Jutayuyut jao , jaye jasangangane y profeta ni este ? güiyaja , pat otro taotao ?

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Ayonae jababa si Felipe y pachotña , ya jatutujon gui este na tinigue sigue di mapredica güe si Jesus .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Ya mientras jumajanao gui jinanaoñija , manmato gui un janom ; ya ilegña y eunuco : Estagüe janom ; jafa uchomayo para jumatagpange ?

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Ilegña si Felipe : Yaguin unjonggue contodo y corasonmo , siñaja jao . Ya manope ilegña : Jujonggue na si Jesucristo y Lajin Yuus .

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Ya manago na umanasaga y carruaje ; ya tumunog y dos gui jalom janom , si Felipe yan y eunuco ; ya tinagpange güe .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Ya anae jumuyong guinin y janom , quinene si Felipe ni y Espiritun y Señot , ya ti linie ni y eunuco mas , lao jasigue y jinanaoña sumenmagof .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Lao si Felipe esta masoda guiya Asoto ; ya malofan inanaco todo manpredidica ebangelio gui siuda todos , asta qui mato güe guiya Sesarea .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: YA si Saulo , sisigueja di jumagong juyong y amenaso yan matadura contra y disipulon y Señot , ya mapos para y magas mamale ,

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ya jagagao catta , para Damasco gui sinagoga , para yaguin jasoda jaye güine na Jinanaoña , masqueseaja , laje pat palaoan , siña ucone preso para Jerusalem .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Ya y jinanaoña , susede na matogüe jijot Damasco ; ya enseguidas manina gui oriyaña y candet guinen y langet ;

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Ya podonggüe gui jilo oda , ya jajungog y inagang na ilegña nu güiya : Saulo , Saulo , sa jafa na unpetsisiguejayo ?

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Ya ilegña : Jaye jao Señot ? ya ilegña : Guajo si Jesus ni y unpetsisigue :

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Lao cajulo ya janao falag y siuda , ya ayonae unmasangane jafa unfatinas .

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Ya y taotao sija ni y mangachochongña manojgue ya taya cuentosñija ; jajujungogja y inagang , lao taya taotao liniiñija .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Ya si Saulo cajulo guinin y jilo oda ; ya anae mababa y atadogña taya jalie , lao mamantiene canaeña , ya macone guato Damasco .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Ya sumaga güije tres na jaane , ni manatan , yan ni chumocho , yan ni gumimen .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: N	9	10		65410	 ¶ Ya estaba güije un disipulo guiya Damasco , na y naanña si Ananias ; sa güiya sinangane ni y Señot gui vision , ilegña : Ananias ; ya güiya ilegña : Estagüiyajayo Señot .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Ya y Señot ilegña nu güiya : Cajulo ya janao falag y caye ni y mafanaan tunas , ya unaligao y guima Judas , uno na y naanña Saulo , taotao Tarso , sa estagüe na mananaetae ,

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: Ya guinin jalie gui vision un taotao na y naanña si Ananias , na mato ya japolo y canaeña guiya güiya para uninafanlie .

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Ya si Ananias , manope ilegña : Señot , megae jujungog ni este na taotao , na megae na taelaye finatinasña gui mañantosmo guiya Jerusalem .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Ya güine na gaeninasiña guinin y magas mamale , para ugode todo ayo sija y umaagang y naanmo .

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Lao y Señot ilegña nu güiya : Janao unjanao ; sa güiya y inayeg na nayan guiya guajo , para uchule y naanjo gui menan y Gentiles , yan y ray sija , yan y famaguon Israel :

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Sa guajo fumanue güe cuanto mandangculon güinaja , na janesesita umasapet pot y naanjo .

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ya si Ananias jumanao , ya jumalom gui guima ; ya japolo y canaeña guiya güiya , ilegña : Chelujo Saulo , y Señot as Jesus ni y mato guiya jago gui chalan anae mamamaela jao , jatagoyo para usiña unlie , yan unbula ni y Espiritu Santo .

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Ya enseguidas manbasnag guinin y mataña taegüije y guenaf sija : ya manlie , ya cajulo ya matagpange .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Ya anae chumocho ninametgot . Ya si Saulo güije sija na jaane dumisipulo guiya Damasco .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: N	9	20		65510	 ¶ Ya enseguidas japredica gui sinagoga na si Jesus güiya y Lajin Yuus .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Lao todo y jumungog güe , ninafanmanman ya ilegñija : Ada ti este ayo y yumulang ayo sija y umagang este na naan guiya Jerusalem ? ya guinin mato güine pot enao na jinaso , para ucone ya ugode guato gui magas mamale .

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Lao si Saulo lumalametgotja , yan janafangadon y Judio sija ni y mañasaga Damasco , sa jafanue na este si Cristo .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: N	9	23		65540	 ¶ Ya anae manmalofan megae na jaane , mandaña y Judio sija para umapuno güe .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Lao y ninanggañiñija , matungo gui as Saulo . Ya sija japupulanja y trangcasija , jaane yan puenge para umaquepuno güi .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Ayonae macone puenge ni y disipulo , ya masajguane gui un canastra , ya manatunog gui quelat .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: N	9	26		65570	 ¶ Ya anae mato güe Jerusalem , malago na udañae y disipulo sija ; lao sija manmaañao nu güiya , ya ti majonggue na disipulo güe .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: si Saulogüiya Damasco ni y naan Jesus .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Ya mañisijaja manjuyong yan manjalom guiya Jerusalem .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Ya japredica matatnga ni y naan Señot Jesus : ya jasangan managuaguat yan y Helenista sija ; lao maquequepunoja güe nu sija .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Ya anae matungo ni y mañelo , macone güe para Sesarea , ya matago para Tarso .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: N	9	31		65620	 ¶ Ya mangaepas todo y iglesia sija guiya Judea , yan Galilea , yan Samaria , ya manmamanagüe , ya manmamomocat gui minaañao as Señot , yan y minagof y Espiritu Santo , lumamegae .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: N	9	32		65630	 ¶ Ya susede anae malofan si Pedro gui todo y lugat , na matogüe locue gui mañantos ni y mañasaga Lydda .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Ya mañoda güije un taotao na y naanña si Eneas , na esta ocho años gui cama , sa malango paralitico .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Ya ilegña si Pedro nu güiya : Eneas , si Jesucristo unninajomlo : cajulo ya unfamauleg y camamo . Ya enseguidas cajulo .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Ya todo y mañasaga guiya Lyyda yan . Saron , malie güe ; ya jabira sija para y Señot .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: N	9	36		65670	 ¶ Ya guaja un disipulo guiya Joppe , na y naanña Tabita : na comequeilegña Dorcas ; este na palaoan bula manmauleg na chocho , yan limosna sija ni y finatinasña .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Ya ayo sija na jaane , mumalango , ya matae ; ya anae munjayan mafagase , mapolo gui aposento gui san jilo .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Ya como jijot Lydda guiya Joppe , ya majungog ni y disipulo sija na gaegue güije si Pedro , matago dos taotao para iya güiya , para umagagao : munga atrasao na ufato guiya jame .

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Ayonae cajulo si Pedro , ya jumanao mañisija . Ya anae matogüe , macone guato gui aposento gui san jilo ; ya todo y manbiuda manotojgue gui oriyaña ya manatanges ya mafanue ni y magago sija ni y finatinas Dorcas anae manisija .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Lao ninafañuja as Pedro , ya dumimo ya manaetae ; ya jabira güe guato gui tataotao , ya ilegña : Tabita , cajulo . Ya jababa y atadogña : ya anae jalie si Pedro matachong julo .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Ya janae si Pedro ni y canaeña , ya jinatsa güe julo ; ya si Pedro jaagang todo y mañantos yan y manbiuda , ya japresenta na lâlâ .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Ya matungo todo guiya Joppe ; ya megae manmanjonggue ni y Señot .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Ya susede na sumaga si Pedro guiya Joppe megae na jaane gui guima un taotao na y naanña si Simon titumo .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: YA estaba güije un taotao guiya Sesarea na y naanña si Cornelio , ya senturion y inetnon sendalo na mafanaan , inetnon Italiano .

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Deboto na taotao , yan maañao as Yuus contodo y guimaña , ni y janae limosna gui taotao , yan jatatayuyutja siempre si Yuus .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Jalie gui vision claroja y angjet Yuus na mamamaela guiya güiya gui mina nuebe na ora gui jaane , ya ilelegña nu güiya : Cornelio .

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Ya anae jaatan , ninamaañao , ya ilegña : Jafa Señot ? Ya ilegña nu güiya : Y tinayuyutmo yan y limosnamo , manmato julo para umajaso gui menan Yuus .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Ya pago , fanago lalaje para Joppe , ya umacone mague si Simon ni y apeyiduña Pedro :

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Güiya sumasaga yan un Simon titumo , na y guimaña gaegue gui oriyan tase .

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Ya anae mapos y augjet ni y cumuentutuse güe jaagang dos gui tentagoña gui guimaña yan un sendalo na deboto guiya sija , ni y maayuyuda güe siempre ;

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: Ya anae jasangane sija todo ni este na güinaja , jatago sija para Joppe .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
