text2: N	10	9		65830	 ¶ Ya y inagpaña anae manjajanao gui jinanaoñija , ya manjijot gui siuda , cajulo si Pedro gui jilo guma para ufanaetae , gui mina saes na ora .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Ya mato y niñalangña , ya malago na uchocho : ya mientras mafamaulilique naña nu sija , malingo y jinasoña .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Ya jalie y langet na mababa , yan un nayan na tumunog para iya güiya , taegüije y dangculon sabanas na magogode y cuatro punta ya mapolo papa , gui jilo tano ;

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Ya mañañajguan todo clasen gâgâ ni y cuatro patasñija , yan y gâgâ ni y mangucunanaf gui jilo y tano , yan y pajaro sija gui aire .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Ya mato un inagang guiya güiya , ilegña : Cajulo Pedro : puno ya uncano .

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Lao si Pedro ilegña : Aje Señot ; sa guajo ti guinen juchocho ni jafa na güinaja ni y comun pat áplacha .

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: ilegña : Jafa y janagasgas si Yuus , chamo fumatitinas comun .

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Ya este mafatinas pot tres biaje ; ya enseguidas y nayan machule julo talo gui langet .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: N	10	17		65910	 ¶ Ya mientras bumuebuente gui sumenjalom si Pedro ni y jafa liniiña na vision , estagüiya sija y taotao ni y manmatago guinin as Cornelio , na manmamamaesen ni y guima Simon ya manotojgue gui trangca .

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Ya managang , ya manmamaesen cao sumasaga güije si Simon ni y apiyiduña Pedro .

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Ya mientras jajajaso si Pedro y vision , y Espiritu ilegña nu güiya : Estagüe tres taotao na maaliligao jao .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Cajulo ya tunog papa , chamo bumuebuente na unjanao yan sija , sa guajo tumago sija .

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Ya si Pedro tumunog papa para ayo taotao sija ya ilegña : Estagüiyayo ni y inaliligao ; jafa guaja na inaliligaoyo ?

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Ya sija ilegñija : Si Cornelio ni y senturion , un taotao na tunas yan maañao as Yuus , yan guaja mauleg na testimonio gui entalo todo y nasion y Judio sija , sa ninatungo as Yuus pot y Santos na angjet ni y tinago jao na unjalom gui guimaña , ya ufanjungog finijo guiya jago .

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: N	10	23		65970	 ¶ Ya jaagang sija na ufanjalom , ya ufañaga . Ya y inagpaña jumanao si Pedro yan sija , yan palo gui mañelo ni y manguinin Joppe maosgaejon güe ,

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Ya y inagpaña talo na jaane , manjalom Sesarea . Ya manninanangga as Cornelio , ya jaagange y manparientesña yan y amiguña sija ni y guesmanatungo .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Ya susede anae jumalom si Pedro , na tinagam as Cornelio , ya dumimo papa ya inadora güe .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Lao jinatsa as Pedro , ya ilegña : Tojgue julo , sa guajo taotaojayo locue .

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Ya anae cumuecuentos y dos , jumalom , ya jasoda megae ni y manmato ya mandaña ;

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: si Pedroilegña nu sija : Intingoja na ti combiene y Judios na taotao na udaña patseno ufato gui otro na nasion ; lao jasanganeyo si Yuus na chajo umaalog ni jaye na taotao na áplacha , pat comun :

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Enaomina matoyo guiya jamyo , sin jafa na sinangan , enseguidas qui matagoyo . Ya jufaesen jamyo jafa malagonmiyo na innamaagangeyo ?

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Ya si Cornelio ilegña : Cuatro na jaane asta este na ora , estabayo juadadaje y mina nuebe na oran tinayuyut gui jalom gumajo , ya estaba un taotao na tumotojgue gui menajo na malag magaguña .

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: Ya ilelegña : Cornelio , y tinayuyutmo majungog , yan y limosnamo manmajaso gui menan Yuus .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Fanago para Joppe , ya umaagange si Simon , ni y apiyiduña Pedro : na sumasaga gui guima un Simon titumo , gui oriyan tase ;

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Enaomina enseguidas junamaagange jao ; ya mauleg finatinasmo sa mato jao . Pago estagüejit todos gui menan Yuus , para injingog todo y tinago jao as Señot .

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: N	10	34		66080	 ¶ Ayonae si Pedro , jababa y pachotña , ya ilegña : Jutungo magajet na si Yuus taya janasasajnge taotao .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Lao gui todo na nasion masqueseaja jaye ni y maaañao nu güiya , yan jafatitinas y tininas , ayo jaguaeya .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Y sinangan ni y janamanajanao si Yuus para y famaguon Israel , mapredica y pas pot si Jesucristo : ( güiya y Señot para todo ) - -

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Ayo na sinangan , jamyo intingoja y masanganñaejon todo guiya Judea , ya matutujon guiya Galilea , despues di y tinagpange ni y japredica si Juan :

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Güiya si Jesus Nasareno ; jaftaemano si Yuus japalae ni y Espiritu Santo yan y ninasiña : ya jumajanao ya jafatitinas y mauleg , yan janafanjomlo todo ayo sija y manchinichiguet ni y anite ; sa sumisija yan Yuus .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Ya jame mantestigo todo y güinaja ni y finatinasña gui tano Judios , yan iya Jerusalem ; ayo y japuno sija , ya jacana gui trongcon jayo :

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: Güiya ninacajulo as Yuus gui mina tres na jaane , ya japolo ya ufinanue güe senclaroja ,

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: Ti para todo y taotao , lao para y testigo sija ni y manmaayeg antes as Yuus ; junggan , para jita , ni y guinin manjita mañocho yan manguimen despues di cajulo guinin y manmatae .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Ya jatagojit na tapredica gui taotao sija , yan tanamatungo na güiya tinancho as Yuus para ujuyong Jues y manlalâlâ yan y manmatae .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Pot güiya na manmannae todo y profeta testimonio , na pot y naanña , jayeja y jumongue güe uresibe inasiin y isao .

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: N	10	44		66180	 ¶ Ya mientras jasanganja trabia si Pedro este sija na sinangan , y Espiritu Santo podong gui jilo ayo sija todo y jumujungog y sinangan .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ya ayo sija y manmasirconsida ni y manmanjonggue , ninafanmanman , ya megae manmato as Pedro , sa asta y Gentiles locue manmachudae ni y ninaen y Espiritu Santo .

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: Sa jajungog na manguecuentos ni y jilañija , ya manadangculo si Yuus . Ayonae manope si Pedro , ilegña :

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: Jaye siña na taotao chumoma y janom para ti ufanmatagpange este sija y rumesibe y Espiritu Santo taegüine iya jita ?

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Ya jatago sija na ujafanmatagpange ni y naan Jesucristo . Ya matayuyut güe na ufañaga unos cuantos na jaane .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: YA y apostoles yan y mañelo ni y manestaba Judea , jajungog na y Gentiles jaresibe locue y sinangan Yuus .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Ya anae mato si Pedro Jerusalem , managuaguat yan ayo sija y manmansirconsisida ,

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: Ilegñija : Jago jumajalom jao gui ti manmasirconsida , yan manjajamyo mañocho .

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Lao si Pedro jasigue sumangane sija claro y sinesede , ilegña :

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: Estabayo gui siuda guiya Joppe na mananaetae ; ya anae lalangoyo , julie y vision , un nayan tumunog , taegüije y dangculo na sabanas , ni mapolo pot cuatro punta ni y tumunog guinin y langet ; ya mato guiya guajo :

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Ya anae juatan ayo , ya jujaso , julie y cuatro patasña na gâgâ gui tano , yan manmachaleg sija na gâgâ , yan y mangucunanaf na gâgâ , yan y pajaro sija gui aire .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Ya jujungog locue y inagang na ilegña nu guajo : Cajulo Pedro ; puno ya uncano .

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: Lao ilegco : Aje , Señot : sa taya comun , pat áplacha guinin jumalom gui jalom pachotjo .

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Lao jaopeyo talo y inagang guinin y langet , ilegña : Jafa y janagasgas si Yuus , chamo fumatitinas comun .

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Ya este mafatinas tres biaje : ya todo manmachule talo guato gui langet .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Ya estagüe enseguidas manotojgue güije gui menan guma anae sumasagayo , tres na taotao , manmatago guinin Sesarea para iya guajo .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Ya jatagoyo na judalalag sija ya chajo fumatitinas dinesparejo . Ya manjame yan este sija y saes na mañelo , ya manjalomjam gui guima y taotao :

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Ya jasanganejam ni y liniiña ni y angjet ni y tumotojgue gui jalom gumaña , ya jaftaemano ilegña nu güiya : Fanago taotao para Joppe , ya uncone si Simon ni y apiyiduña Pedro ;

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Ya unsinangane sinangan sija anae unsatbo ; jago , yan todo y guimamo .

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: Ya anae sigue di cumuentosyo , podong y Espiritu Santo gui jiloñija , taegüijeja gui jilota gui tutujonña .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ayonae jujaso y sinangan y Señot , ni y ilegña : Si Juan , magajet na managpapange ni y janom ; lao jamyo infanmatagpange ni y Espiritu Santo .

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Sa yaguin manninae sija locue as Yuus y ninae , taegüije y janaejit anae jumongguejit y Señot Jesucristo , ya jayeyo na siña jucontra si Yuus ?

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Ya anae jajungog sija estesija , manmamatquilo , ya manamalag si Yuus , ilegñija : Magajet na janae locue si Yuus y Gentiles sinetsot para linâlâ .

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: N	11	19		66410	 ¶ Ya ayo sija y manmachalapon pot y mapetsiguen ni y Esteban , manjanao asta Finesia , yan Chipre , yan Antioquia , ya taya nae japredica y sinangan na ayoja sija y Judios .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ya palo guiya sija taotao Chipre , yan Sirene , ya anae manmato Antioquia , manguentos yan y Griegosija , ya japredica y Señot Jesus .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Ya mañisijaja yan y canae y Señot ; ya megae manmanjonggue ya jabira sija para y Señot .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Ya mato este sija na notisia gui iglesia ni y estaba Jerusalem : ya matago si Barnabé , na ujanao asta Antioquia ;

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Ya anae mato , ya jalie y grasian Yuus , magof güe ; ya jasangane sija todo , na nu sinasuyen y corasonñija , unafanmeton sija gui Señot :

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Sa güiya mauleg na taotao , ya bula ni y Espiritu Santo , yan jinenggue : ya megae na taotao manmafato gui Señot .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Ayonae mapos güe para Tarso , para ualigao si Saulo :

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Ya anae jasoda , jacone guato Antioquia . Ya un año di mandadañaja güije yan iglesia , ya manmamananagüe megae na taotao ; ya y disipulo sija manmafanaan finena mangilisyano guiya Antioquia .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: N	11	27		66490	 ¶ Ya este sija na jaane , manmato profeta sija guinin Jerusalem para Antioquia ,

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Sesat .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Ayonae y disipulo sija , cada uno jaftaemano y güinajaña , jadetetmina para umanamamaela inayuda para y mañelo ni y mañasaga Judea :

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Ya sija locue jafatinas , janamaela para y manamco pot y canae Barnabé yan Saulo .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: YA ayoja na tiempo , y ray Herodes jaestira y canaeña para unafanlamen palo gui taotao iglesia .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Ya japuno si Santiago chelun Juan ni y espada .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Ya anae jalie na ninafanmagof y Judios , jasigue para ucone si Pedro locue . Ya ayo y jaanen y pan sin lebadura ?

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Ya anae macone güe , japolo gui calaboso , ya jaentrega y diesisaes na sendalo para upinilan ; majasusuye na despues di y pascua umaconie y taotao sija .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Enao mina si Pedro mapongle gui calaboso : lao y iglesia ti pumapara manmanayuyut as Yuus pot güiya .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Ya anae si Herodes canaja quinene gue , güijeja na puenge anae estaba si Pedro na mamaego gui entalo y dos sendalo , ya magogode ni dos na cadena : ya y manmamumulan gui menan y petta , mapupulan y calaboso :

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Ya estagüe , un angjet y Señot tumotojgue gui oriyaña , ya y candet manina gui jalom y cuatton calaboso : ya japanag si Pedro gui calaguagña ya yinajo , ilegña : Cajulo laguse , ya y cadenaña manbasnag guinin y canaeña .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Ya y angjet ilegña nu güiya : Dudog jao ya gode y dogamo : ya taegüenao finatinasña . Ya y angjet ilegña nu güiya : Polo y magagumo guiya jago , ya dalalagyo .

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Ya jumanao juyong ya jadalalag , ya ti jatungo ayo cao magajet y finatinas y angjet ; lao jinasoña na manlie güe vision .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Ya anae manmalofan gui finenana yan y mina dos na guatdia , manmato gui trangcan lulug ni y dumalalalaque y siuda ; ni y mababa para sija sin jafa ; ya manjanao juyong ya manmalofan gui inanaco un chalan ; ya enseguidas jumanao y angjet guiya güiya .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Ya anae esta manungo talo si Pedro , ilegña : Pago nae jutungo na magajet na y Señot jatago y angjetna , na unalibreyo gui canae Herodes , yan todo y ninanggan y taotao y Judios .

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Ya anae jajaso este na güinaja , mato gui guima Maria nanan Juan , ni y apiyiduña Marcos ; anae megae mandadaña ya manmananayuyut .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Ya anae manyajo si Pedro gui pettan y trangca , un patgon na palaoan mato para umaope , na y naanña si Rode .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Ya anae jatungo na y inagang Pedro , ti jababa y trangca pot y minagofña , lao malago jalom ya mansinangane na tumotojgue si Pedro gui menan y trangca .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Ya ilegñija nu guiya : Esta jao caduca . Lao güiya ilelegñaja : Junggan , magajet taegüenao . Ayonae sija ilegñija : Ayo y angjetña .

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Lao si Pedro , sisigueja di manyajo : ya anae jababa malie güe , ya ninafansenlujan .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Lao mansineñas as Pedro ni y canaeña na ufamacaca , ya mansinangane jaftaemano y Señot anae quinene güe juyong gui calaboso . Ya ilegña : Janao ya unsangane si Santiago ni este sija na güinaja , yan y mañelo . Ya mapos ya malag y otro lugat .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Ya enseguidas qui manana , ti didide na atboroto gui sendalo sija , manggue si Pedro .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Ya anae jaaligao si Herodes si Pedro ya ti jasoda , janafanmaegsamina y manmanmamumulan ya manago na ufanmapuno . Ya jumanao papa guinin Judea para Sesarea , ya sumaga güije .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: si Herodesgosdangculo binibuña ni y taotao Tiro yan Sidon : lao si ja mandaña un jinasoja para iya güiya , ya manatungo yan Blasto ni y camareron y ray , sa amigonñija , ya manmangagao pas ; sa y tanoñija manminantietiene ni y tano y ray .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Ya un tinancho na jaane , minagago si Herodes ni y magagon ray , ya matachong gui tronuña , ya jacuentuse sija un sinangan .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Ya managang y taotao sija , ilegñija : Inagang un yuus , ti inagang taotao .

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ya enseguidas pinada ni y angjet y Señot , sa ti janae si Yuus minalag : ya quinano ni ilo ya matae .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Lao y sinangan Yuus lumadangculo yan mumemegae .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Ya si Barnabé yan Saulo , tumalo guato guinin Jerusalem , anae munjayan y ministroñija , yan jacocone mañisija si Juan y apiyiduña Marcos .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: YA estaba güije gui ilesia guiya Antioquia , profeta sija yan maestro , sija : Barnabé , yan si Simeon ni y mafanaan Niger , yan si Lucio , taotao Sirene , yan si Manaen , ni y chamapogsae yan Herodes tetrarca , yan si Saulo .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Ya mientras sija sumesetbe y Señot , yan manayuyunat , y Espiritu Santo ilegña : Abatta guiya guajo Barnabé yan Saulo para y checho anae guinin juagange sija .

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Ayonae anae esta manayunat yan manmanayuyut yan japolo y canaeñija gui jilo ayo sija , jatago sija na ufanjanao .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: N	13	4		66810	 ¶ Ya manmatago sija pot y Espiritu Santo , ya manunog para Seleusia ; ya desde ayo mumamaya para Chipre .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Ya anae mangaegue gui Salamina , japredica y sinangan Yuus gui sinagogan y Judiosija : ya mañisijaja locue yan si Juan ni y sumesetbe sija .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Ya anae jajanagüe todo inanaco y isla asta Pafo , jasoda un taotao na cacana , fatso na profeta , Judio , na y naanña si Bar - Jesus :

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: Ni y estaba yan y magalajen y tano , si Sergio Paulo , gaetiningo na taotao ; ya jaaagang si Barnabé yan Saulo , sa malago na ujungog y sinangan Yuus .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Lao manquinentra as Elymas , taotao na cacana ( taegüine nae comequilegña y naanña ) , jaaliligao na unamabira guinin jinenggue y magalaje .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Ayonae si Saulo ni y naanña locue Pablo , bula ni y Espiritu Santo , inaatanja güe ,

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: Ya ilegña : O bula jao todo dinague , yan tinaelaye , jago lajin anite , jago enemigun todo y tininas , ada ti pumapara jao unnataelaye y tinas na chalan y Señot ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: Ya pago estagüiya y canae y Señot gui jilomo , ya unbachet ya ti unlie y atdao pot un tiempo . Ya enseguidas podong gui jiloña y nublado ya jomjom , ya jumanao manaligao jaye uminantiene y canaeña para uinesgaejongüe .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: Ya anae jalie y magalaje jafa y mafatinas , jajonggue ya ninasenmanman ni y finanagüen y Señot .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: N	13	13		66900	 ¶ Ya anae si Pablo yan y mangachongña jadingo Pafo , ya mumamaya ya manmato Petga guiya Pamfilia , ya si Juan jumanao guiya sija ya tumalo guato Jerusalem .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: Lao sija manmalofan inanaco guinin Petga , manmato Antioquia guiya Pisidia ; ya manjalom gui sinagoga gui sabado na jaane ya manmatachong .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jataetae y lay yan y profeta sija , y magas y sinagoga ninafamnaagange sija ilegñija : Jamyo mañelo , yaguin guaja jafa na finijo para insangane y taotao sija , sangan .

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: Ayonae si Pablo tumojgue julo ya mañeñas ni y canaeña , ilegña : Taotao Israel , yan jamyo ni y manmaañao as Yuus , ecungog .

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Y Yuus este na taotao iya Israel , jaayeg y mañaenata , yan jajatsa y taotao sija anae mañasaga taegüije y taotao juyong guiya Egipto , ya ni y taquilo na canaeña jacone sija juyong güije .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Ya y cuarenta años ni tiempo , jasungon ni y costumbreñija gui jalomtano .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Ya guinin mujayan jayulang siete na nasion gui tano Cananea , ya japatte y tanoñija guiya sija para y erensiañija nae mañasaga , como cuatro siento y sincuenta años ;

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Ya despues di ayo sija , manninae sija jues sija asta qui mato y profeta Samuel .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Ya despues manmalago ray : ya manninae as Yuus as Saulo lajin Sis , un taotao gui tribon Benjamin para cuarenta años .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Yaanae jarechasa si Saulo , janacajulo guiya sija si David para rayñija . Sa si Yuus numae güe locue testimonio , ilegña : Guajo jusoda si David lajin Isai , un taotao na parejoja yan y corasonjo , ya güiya ucumple todo y malagojo .

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: Ya y semiyan este na taotao nae , unacajulo si Yuus guiya Israel y Satbadot Jesus jaftaemanoja y promesa :

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Ya si Juan finena prumedica , antes di y finatoña , y tinagpangen sinetsot para todo y taotao guiya Israel .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Ya anae jacumple si Juan y chechoña , ilegña : Jayeyo jinasonmimiyo ? Ti guajo güe . Lao estagüe na mamamaela uno gui tateco , na ni y sapatos gui adengña ti dignoyo na jupula .

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: Mañelo lalaje , fumaguon y rasan Abraham , yan jayeja guiya jamyo y maañao as Yuus , sa para jamyo na matago y sinangan este na satbasion .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Pot ayo sija y mañasaga Jerusalem , yan y magasñija sa ti matungo si Yuus , ni y sinangan y profeta ni y jatataetaeja cada sabado , anae masentensia güe jacumple sija .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Ya achogja ti jasoda sija jafa na causa guiya güiya na umapuno , lao magagao si Pilatos na umapuno .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: Ya anae macumple todo ayo y esta matugue pot güiya , machule papa guinin y jayo , ya mapolo gui jalom y naftan .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: Lao si Yuus munacajulo guinen y manmatae :

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Ya malie megae na jaane ni ayo sija y mangachochongña mangajulo guinin Galilea para Jerusalem , ni y pago testiguña sija gui taotao .

text: And we declare unto you glad tidings , how that the promise which was made unto the fathers ,
text2: Ya jame chumule guiya jamyo y mauleg na notisia , ni ayo na promesa y mafatinas gui mañaena ,

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: Jaftaemano si Yuus cumunple guiya jita , ni y famaguonñija , sa ayonae janacajulo si Jesus talo ; taegüije locue y esta matugue gui mina dos gui Salmos : Jago y Lajijo ya pago na jaane nae julilis jao .

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Ya ninacajulo guinin y manmatae , ya pago ti utalo guato gui minitong guinin jasangan taegüine : Guajo junae jao ni y santos yan magajet na bendisjon David .

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Enaomina ilegña locue y otro Salmo : Na chamo pumopolo y Santosmo na ulie y minitong .

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Sa si David anae munjayan jasetbe y generasionña pot y pinagat Yuus , maego ya mapolo manafandaña yan y mañaenaña , ya jalie y minitong .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: Lao ayo y ninacajulo as Yuus talo ti jalie minitong .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ya umatungo guiya jamyo mañelo lalaje , na pot este na taotao na mapredidica guiya jamyo y inasiin y isao :

text: And by him all that believe are justified from all things , from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses .
text2: Ya pot güiya na todo ayo y jumonggue manunas ni todo y güinaja , sa ti siña jamyo manunas , pot y lay Moises .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: Adaje na nosea ufato guiya jamyo , y masangan gui profeta sija ;

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: Estagüe , jamyo ni y manmañatlilie , yan infanmanman , yan infanmalingo . Sa machochochoyo ni y checho y jaanemniyo , ayo na chocho y ti injengue , ni jaye na taotao unaclaro guiya jamyo .

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: Ya anae manjuyong gui sinagoga , jagagao na umapredica este na sinangan guiya sija gui siguiente sabado .

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: Ya anae manadingo y inetnon gui sinagoga , megae na Judios yan y deboto na proselito sija dumalalag si Pablo yan Barnabé ; ni y sumangangane siga yan jaeepogna ufañaga gui grasian Yuus .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: N	13	44		67210	 ¶ Ya y siguiente sabado canaja todo y taotao y siuda mandaña para ujajungog y sinangan Yuus .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: Lao anae jalie y Judios y linajyan taotao , manbula linatga , ya manguentos contra ayo y sinangan Pablo ya jachatfino contra si Yuus .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: Ayonae si Pablo yan Barnabé jausa y minatatngañija , ilegñija : Nesesita ayo y sinangan Yuus ni y esta manmasangane jamyo finena , lao pot innasuja guiya jamyo , injisganmaesa jamyo na ti dignojamyo y taejinecog na linâlâ , ya estagüe na tabirajit para y Gentiles .

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Sa taegüenao tinagoña si Yuus nu jita , ilegña : Jupolo jamyo para candet y Gentiles , na jamyo siña para satbasion asta y uttimon patte y tano .

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Ya anae jajungog este y Gentiles , ninafansenmagof , ya maalaba y sinangan Yuus : ya megae manmanjonggue ni ayo sija y manmatancho para y taejinecog na linâlâ .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Ya machalapon y sinangan Yuus todo güije na tano .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: N	13	50		67270	 ¶ Lao y Judio sija , janafangalamten y mandebota yan y manonra na famalaoan , yan y manmagas na taotao sija gui siuda , ya janafangajulo pinetsigue contra si Pablo yan Barnabé , ya janafanmayute juyong gui tanoñija .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: Lao sija , jasacude y petbos gui adengñija contra sija , ya manjanao para Iconio .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ya y disipulo sija , manbula minagof yan y Espiritu Santo .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: YA susede na manjalom gui sinagogan y Judios guiya Iconio , ya taegüenao manguentos na un dangculo na linajyan Judios yan Griegos manman jonggue .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: Lao ayo sija na Judios y ti manmanosgue , jasuug y anten y Gentil sija , para ufanmanjaso taelaye contra y mañelo .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Lao mañagaja apmam , manguecuentos matatnga ni y Señot , ni y mannae testimonio ni y sinangan y grasiaña , yan mannae señat sija , yan mannamanman sija para ujafatinas ni y canaeñija .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: Ya y linajyan taotao gui siuda manmadibide ; y un banda mañija yan y Judios , ya y otro banda mañija yan y apostoles .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Lao anae manmamatinas insulto y Judios yan y Gentiles , yan y magasñija , para ufanmacase sija , yan ufanmafagas ni y ocho ,

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Esta matungo nu sija ; ya manmalago guato Listra yan Derbe , siuda iya Licaonia , yan y tano gui oriya .

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: Ya güije japredica sija y ibangelio .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: N	14	8		67370	 ¶ Ya estaba güije guiya Listra un taotao na taeninasiña y adengña , sa cojo desde y jalom tuyan nanaña ; ya taya nae mamocat :

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: Ayo na taotao jajungog si Pablo na cumuentos : ya enseguidas na inatan , tiningo na guaja jinenggueña para umanajomlo ,

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: Jaagang dangculo na inagang ilegña : Tojgue julo tunas ni y adengmo . Ya guiya mangope julo , ya mamocat .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: Ya anae malie ni y linajyan taotao sija y finatinas Pablo , jajatsa y inagangñija ilegñija gui cuentos Licaonia : Y yuus sija ni manparejo yan taotao , manunog guiya jita .

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Ya mafanaan si Barnabé Jupiter ; ya si Pablo mafanaan Mercurio , sa güiya magas na cuecuentos .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Ayonae y pale y Jupiter ni y temploña estaba gui menan y siuda , mangone toro sija , yan mañule coronan flores guato gui pettan y trangca , ya malago na ufanmamatinas inefrese , yan y linajyan taotao sija .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: Lao anae majungog ni y apostoles , si Barnabé yan si Pablo , jatiteg y magagoñija , ya manmalago gui entalo y linajyan taotao ya manaagang ,

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: Ilegñija : Señot sija , jafa na infatinas este sija ? Jame locue manaotaojam , manparejojajit , ya insangane jamyo na inbira jamyo güine gui este sija manaesetbe , ya infanmalag y lalâlâ na Yuus , ni y jafatinas y langet , yan y tano , yan y tase , yan todo y sinajguanña :

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: Ni y manmalofan na generasion sija , japolo todo y nasion na ufanjanao gui minalagoñija .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Masquesea güiya ti jadingo güe sin testigo , sa mauleg finatinasña , ya janaejit uchan guinin y langet , yan megae na tinegcha , janafanbula y corasonta nengcano yan minagof .

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Ya este sija na sinangan , canamapot jaafuetsas y linajyan taotao na chañija fumatitinas inefrese guiya sija .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: N	14	19		67480	 ¶ Ya manmato güije Judios guinin Antioquia , yan Iconio , ni y manafanmañaña y linajyan ; ya anae munjayan mafagas ni y acho si Pablo , mabatsala juyong gui siuda , jinasoñija na matae .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: Ya mientras manotojgue y disipulo sija gui oriyaña , cumajulo ya jumalom gui siuda ; ya y inagpaña güije , jumanao yan si Barnabé manmalag Derbe .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Ya anae munjayan japredica y ibangelio güije na siuda , yan mamadisipulo megae ; tumalo guato Listra , yan Iconio , yan Antioquia ,

text: Confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to continue in the faith , and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ya janafanfitme y anten y disipulo sija , ya jaaconseja na ujasigueja gui jinenggue ; sa nesesita megae na pinite sija , ya ayonae siñajit manjalom gui raenon Yuus ,

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jatancho y manamco gui cada guimayuus , yan manaetae , yan umayunat , yan jatayuyute sija gui as Yuus ni manmanjonggue .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
text2: Ya manmalofan y inanaco Pisidia , ya manmato Pamfilia .

text: And when they had preached the word in Perga , they went down into Attalia :
text2: Ya anae munjayan mapredica y sinangan guiya Petga , manunog guiya Atalia ;

text: And thence sailed to Antioch , from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled .
text2: Ya desde ayo mangagama asta Antioquia , anae manmanae ni y grasian Yuus , para y checho ni y mafatinas .

text: And when they were come , and had gathered the church together , they rehearsed all that God had done with them , and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles .
text2: Ya anae manmato ya mandaña iglesia gui guimayuus , masangan todo sija y finatinas Yuus pot sija ; yan jaftaemano jababaye y Gentiles ni y pettan y jinenggue .

text: And there they abode long time with the disciples .
text2: Ya mañaga güije yan y disipulo sija , apmam na tiempo .

text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren , and said , Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses , ye cannot be saved .
text2: YA manmato palo taotao sija guinin Judea , ya jafanagüe y mañelo ilegñija : Yaguin ti manmasirconsida jamyo taemano y costumbren Moises , ti siña jamyo mansatbo .

text: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them , they determined that Paul and Barnabas , and certain other of them , should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question .
text2: Ya anae megae na inaguaguat yan finaesen as Pablo yan Barnabé yan sija , y maneio jaayeg si Pablo yan si Barnabé , yan palo guiya sija , para ujafanjanao julo Jerusalem guiya apostoles yan manamco pot este na finaesen .

text: And being brought on their way by the church , they passed through Phenice and Samaria , declaring the conversion of the Gentiles : and they caused great joy unto all the brethren .
text2: Enao mina anae manmaesgaejon ni y iglesia gui jinanaoñija , manmalofan y inanaco Finesia , yan Samaria , ya masasangan claro y manmañotsot y Gentiles ; ya ninafangosmagof y mañelo todos .

text: And when they were come to Jerusalem , they were received of the church , and of the apostles and elders , and they declared all things that God had done with them .
text2: Ya anae manmato Jerusalem , manmaresibe gui iglesia yan y apostoles , yan y manamco ; ya jadeclara todo y finatinas Yuus pot sija .

text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed , saying , That it was needful to circumcise them , and to command them to keep the law of Moses .
text2: Lao mangajulo güije palo sija y inetnon Fariseo ni y manmanjonggue , ya ilegnija : Nesesita ufanmasirconsida sija , yan ufanmatago ya ujaadaje y tinago Moises .

text: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter .
text2: Ya mandaña y apostoles yan y manamco para ujajasuye este .

text: And when there had been much disputing , Peter rose up , and said unto them , Men and brethren , ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us , that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel , and believe .
text2: Ya anae esta megae na finaesen , cumajulo si Pedro ya ilegña nu sija : Mañelo lalaje , intingoja jafa na manayeg si Yuus guiya jamyo , apmam na tiempo , na y Gentiles ujajungog y sinangan y ibangelio pot y pachotjo , ya ujajonggue .

text: And God , which knoweth the hearts , bare them witness , giving them the Holy Ghost , even as he did unto us ;
text2: Yan si Yuus , ni y tumungo y corason , janafantestigo sija , yan janae ni y Espiritu Santo , jaftaemanoja y jafatinas guiya jita ;

text: And put no difference between us and them , purifying their hearts by faith .
text2: Ya taya japolo dinesparejo entre sija yan jita , janafangasgas y corasonñija ni y jinenggue .

text: Now therefore why tempt ye God , to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples , which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear ?
text2: Ya jafa pago mina intietienta si Yuus , para inpelo y yugo gui agaga y disipulo sija , na ni y mañaenata ni jita tisiña jacatga ?

text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved , even as they .
text2: Lao tajonggue na pot y grasian y Señot Jesus utafansatbo , taegüije iya sija .

text: Then all the multitude kept silence , and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul , declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them .
text2: N	15	12		67690	 ¶ Ayonae manmamatquilo todo y linajyan taotao , ya maatituye si Pablo yan Barnabé ni y jasasangan y señot sija yan y mannamanman jafatinas si Yuus gui entalo Gentiles pot sija .

text: And after they had held their peace , James answered , saying , Men and brethren , hearken unto me :
text2: Ya anae manmamatquilo , manope si Santiago ilegña : Mañelo lalaje , ecungogyo .

text: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles , to take out of them a people for his name .
text2: Jasangan si Simeon jaftaemano si Yuus ni y jabisita finena y Gentiles , para ufangone guiya sija taotao para y naanña .

text: And to this agree the words of the prophets ; as it is written ,
text2: Yan pot este na manparejo y sinangan y profeta sija , ni y esta manmatugue :

text: After this I will return , and will build again the tabernacle of David , which is fallen down ; and I will build again the ruins thereof , and I will set it up :
text2: Anae esta munjayan estesija , jutalo mague , ya jujatsa y tabernaculon David , ni y podong ; yan jujatsa talo y manmayulang güije , yan juplanta julo ;

text: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord , and all the Gentiles , upon whom my name is called , saith the Lord , who doeth all these things .
text2: Para y manetenjan na taotao , ujaaligao yi Señot , yan todo y Gentiles ni y umafanaan y naanjo .

text: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world .
text2: Ilegña y Señot ni y janamatungo estesija desde y tutujon y tano .

text: Wherefore my sentence is , that we trouble not them , which from among the Gentiles are turned to God :
text2: Enaomina y jinasoco taegüine , na mungajit umatborota ayo sija y manguinin y entalo y Gentiles , ya jabira sija para as Yuus .

text: But that we write unto them , that they abstain from pollutions of idols , and from fornication , and from things strangled , and from blood .
text2: Lao utatuguie sija , ya ujafañuja gui pinetlilon y idolos , yan y inábale , yan y neñicot na gâgâ , yan y jâgâ .

text: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him , being read in the synagogues every sabbath day .
text2: layñagui sinagoga cada sabado na jaane .

text: Then pleased it the apostles and elders , with the whole church , to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas ; namely , Judas surnamed Barsabas , and Silas , chief men among the brethren :
text2: Ayonae yañija y apostoles yan y manamco yan todo y iglesia , na umanafanjanao y manmaayeg na taotao gui inetnonñija para Antioquia para ufañija yan si Pablo yan Barnabé ; y naanñija , si Judas y apiyiduña Barsabas , yan si Silas , manmagas na taotao sija gui entre y mañelo :

text: And they wrote letters by them after this manner ; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia :
text2: Ya manmangue carta pot sija , taegüine : Y apostoles yan manamco na mañelo , jasaluda y mañelo na Gentiles ni y mangaegue guiya Antioquia yan Siria yan Silisia :

text: Forasmuch as we have heard , that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words , subverting your souls , saying , Ye must be circumcised , and keep the law : to whom we gave no such commandment :
text2: Sa injingog na palo ni y manjanao guinin iya jame , maninatborota jamyo ni y sinangan , janataelaye y antenmiyo ; lao ti manmannae jam ni enao na tinago :

text: It seemed good unto us , being assembled with one accord , to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul ,
text2: Jinasonmame na mandañajam unoja , para innafanjanao y manmaayeg na taotao para jamyo , yan y güinaeyanmame as Pablo yan Barnabé ,

text: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Taotao sija na janapeligro y jaanenñija pot y naan y Señot Jesucristo .

text: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas , who shall also tell you the same things by mouth .
text2: Enaomina innajanao si Judas yan Silas , ni y infansinangane locue ni y pachotñija taegüineja .

text: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost , and to us , to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things ;
text2: Sa y jinason y Espiritu Santo , yan jame , na munga mapolo gui jilomiyo mas dangculo na catga qui y manesesita .

text: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols , and from blood , and from things strangled , and from fornication : from which if ye keep yourselves , ye shall do well . Fare ye well .
text2: Na infañuja gui nengcano ni y manmaofrese y idolos , yan y jâgâ , yan y neñicot na gâgâ , yan y inábale ; ya yaguin inadaje jamyo estesija , infatinas mauleg . Adios jamyo todos .

text: So when they were dismissed , they came to Antioch : and when they had gathered the multitude together , they delivered the epistle :
text2: N	15	30		67870	 ¶ Ya anae manajanao , manmato Antioquia : ya janafandaña y linajyan taotao , maentrega y catta ;

text: Which when they had read , they rejoiced for the consolation .
text2: Ni y anae munjayan mataetae , ninafansenmagof , pot y consuelo .

text: And Judas and Silas , being prophets also themselves , exhorted the brethren with many words , and confirmed them .
text2: Ya si Judas yan Silas manprofeta locue , ya japagat y mañelo ni y megae na sinangan , yan janafitme sija .

text: And after they had tarried there a space , they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles .
text2: Ya mañaga güije didide na tiempo , despues manafanjanao en pas ni y mañelo , para y manmatago sija .

text: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still .
text2: Lao si Silas ninamagof na ufañasagaja güije .

text: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch , teaching and preaching the word of the Lord , with many others also .
text2: Si Pablo yan si Barnabé mañasaga gui Antioquia , na mamananagüe , yan manpredidica ni y sinangan y Señot ; yan megae palo locue .

text: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas , Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord , and see how they do .
text2: N	15	36		67930	 ¶ Ya anae malofan palo jaane , ilegña si Pablo as Barnabé : Nije tajanao talo ya tabisita ya mañeluta gui cada siuda anae y guinin tapredica y sinangan y Señot , ya utalie jafa chechoñija .

text: And Barnabas determined to take with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Ya si Barnabé malago na ujacone gachongñija si Juan , ni y apiyiduña Marcos .

text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them , who departed from them from Pamphylia , and went not with them to the work .
text2: Lao y jinasoña si Pablo , na ti mauleg na ufañija , sa sumuja guiya sija desde Pamfilia , ya ti mandinalalag sija gui checho .

text: And the contention was so sharp between them , that they departed asunder one from the other : and so Barnabas took Mark , and sailed unto Cyprus ;
text2: Ya jumuyong dangculon minaguaguat , ya manadisapatta ; ya si Barnabé jacone si Marcos , ya mangama gui batco para Chipre ;

text: And Paul chose Silas , and departed , being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God .
text2: Ya si Pablo jayeg si Silas ya mapos , manmaencatga ni y mañelo ni y grasian Yuus .

text: And he went through Syria and Cilicia , confirming the churches .
text2: Ya jumanao todo inanco Siria yan Silisia , janafanfitme y inetnon mangilisyano sija .

text: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra : and , behold , a certain disciple was there , named Timotheus , the son of a certain woman , which was a Jewess , and believed ; but his father was a Greek :
text2: YA mato güe locue Derbe yan Lystra : Ya estagüe , estaba güije un disipulo na y naanña si Timoteo , lajin un palaoan Judio , ni y manjonggue ; lao y tataña Griego .

text: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium .
text2: Ya gosmauleg y famaña gui mañelo ni y mangaegue Lystra yan Iconio .

text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him ; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters : for they knew all that his father was a Greek .
text2: Güiya malago Pablo na ujasija jumanao : ya quinene ya ninamasirconsida , sa pot y Judio sija ni y mangaegue güije na lugat : sa todoja tumungo na y tataña Griego .

text: And as they went through the cities , they delivered them the decrees for to keep , that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem .
text2: Ya anae jajanagüe todo y siuda sija , manmanae para ujaadaje , y tinago sija , ni y tinago y apostoles yan y manamco ni y mangaegue guiya Jerusalem .

text: And so were the churches established in the faith , and increased in number daily .
text2: Ayonae y iglesia sija nae mumemetgot y jinenggue , ya lumalamegae y numero cada jaane .

text: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia , and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia ,
text2: N	16	6		68040	 ¶ Ya anae jajanagüe todo inanacon tanon Frygia , yan Galasia , ya manchinema ni y Espiritu Santo na ujapredica y sinangan guiya Asia ;

text: After they were come to Mysia , they assayed to go into Bithynia : but the Spirit suffered them not .
text2: Ya anae manmato jijot y Misia , manmalago na ufanjanao para Bitinia : lao ti manpinelo ni y Espiritun Jesus na ufanjanao ;

text: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas .
text2: Ya manmalofan oriyan Misia , ya manunog Troas .

text: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night ; There stood a man of Macedonia , and prayed him , saying , Come over into Macedonia , and help us .
text2: Ya anae puenge , jalie si Pablo un vision , na un taotao Masedonia , tumotojgue güije ya gumagagao güe ilegña : Mamaela mague guiya Masedonia ya unayudajam .

text: And after he had seen the vision , immediately we endeavored to go into Macedonia , assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them .
text2: Ya anae munjayan jalie y vision , enseguidas manmalagojam na manjanao para Masedonia , ya pinelonmame na y Señot umagangjam para inpredica y ibangelio guiya sija .

text: Therefore loosing from Troas , we came with a straight course to Samothracia , and the next day to Neapolis ;
text2: N	16	11		68090	 ¶ Ya anae mangagamajam guinin Troas , manmatojam gui tunas na chalan para Samotrasia , ya y inagpaña na jaane manmatojam Neapolis ;

text: And from thence to Philippi , which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia , and a colony : and we were in that city abiding certain days .
text2: Ya desde ayo asta Filipos , ni y mas dangculo na siuda güije na patte guiya Masedonia , yan un colonia romana : ya mañagajam güije na siuda unos cuantos na jaane .

text: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side , where prayer was wont to be made ; and we sat down , and spake unto the women which resorted thither .
text2: Ya y sabado na jaane , manjanaojam juyong gui siuda gui oriyan sadog , anae pinelonmame un lugat tinayuyut : ya manmatachongjam ya incuentuse y famalaoan sija ni y mandaña güije .

text: And a certain woman named Lydia , a seller of purple , of the city of Thyatira , which worshipped God , heard us : whose heart the Lord opened , that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul .
text2: Ya un palaoan na y naanña si Lydia , na manbebende purpura gui siudad Tiatira , ni y jaadodora si Yuus , jajungogjam ; sa binaba y corasonña ni y Señot para uatituye y jasasangan si Pablo .

text: And when she was baptized , and her household , she besought us , saying , If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord , come into my house , and abide there . And she constrained us .
text2: palaoan , yan y guimaña , jagagaojam ilegña : Yaguin injisga na fiet yo gui Señot , fanjalom gui guimajo , ya infañaga güije . Ya jaafuetsasjam .

text: And it came to pass , as we went to prayer , a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us , which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying :
text2: N	16	16		68140	 ¶ Ya susede anae manjanaojam para lugat tinayuyut , na manasodajam yan un patgon na palaoan na gae espiritu Pitonico , ni y janafangana megae y amuña pot y manadibibina :

text: The same followed Paul and us , and cried , saying , These men are the servants of the most high God , which shew unto us the way of salvation .
text2: Ya jadadalag si Pablo yan jame , ya umaagang ilegña : Este sija na taotao y tentago y Gueftaquilo na Yuus ni y fumanuejit ni y chalan y satbasion .

text: And this did she many days . But Paul , being grieved , turned and said to the spirit , I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her . And he came out the same hour .
text2: Ya este finatinasña y palaoan megae na jaane . Lao si Pablo gosninaestotba ya jabira güe ya ilegña ni y espiritu : Jutago jao pot y naan Jesucristo na unjuyong guiya güiya . Ya jumuyong güijeja na ora .

text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone , they caught Paul and Silas , and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers ,
text2: N	16	19		68170	 ¶ Ya anae jalie y amuña na mapos y ninanggaña para ufangana , maguut si Pablo yan Silas , ya macone guato gui plasa gui menan manmagas ,

text: And brought them to the magistrates , saying , These men , being Jews , do exceedingly trouble our city ,
text2: Ya anae manmacone guato gui manmagas y lay , ilegña : Este sija na taotao . Judios ya jaatbororota y siudata ,

text: And teach customs , which are not lawful for us to receive , neither to observe , being Romans .
text2: Ya manmamananagüe costumbre ni y ti combiene para jita na utaresibe , ni utaadaje , sa jita taotao Roma .

text: And the multitude rose up together against them : and the magistrates rent off their clothes , and commanded to beat them .
text2: Ya mangajulo y linajyan taotao ya mandaña contra sija : ya y manmagas sija jatiteg guiya sija y magaguñija , ya manmanago na ufanmasaulag .

text: And when they had laid many stripes upon them , they cast them into prison , charging the jailor to keep them safely :
text2: Ya anae esta megae na sinaulag ni y manmasaulagñija , manmapolo gui jalom calaboso , ya maencatga y atcaede na uguesadje sija .

text: Who , having received such a charge , thrust them into the inner prison , and made their feet fast in the stocks .
text2: Ya ayo y rumesibe este na tinago , manpinelo sija guiya jalolom na calaboso , ya jaguesgode y adengñija gui sipo .

text: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed , and sang praises unto God : and the prisoners heard them .
text2: Ya y tatalo puenge manaetae si Pablo yan Silas , yan jacantaye si Yuus alabansa sija : ya manjiningog ni ayo sija y manmaprereso .

text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake , so that the foundations of the prison were shaken : and immediately all the doors were opened , and every one ' s bands were loosed .
text2: Ya derepente guaja güije un dangculon linao , ya asta y simienton y calaboso yinengyong : ya enseguidas manmababa todo y petta , ya todo y preso manmapula y guedenñija .

text: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep , and seeing the prison doors open , he drew out his sword , and would have killed himself , supposing that the prisoners had been fled .
text2: Ya anae magmata y atcaede , ya jalie na mababa y pettan y calaboso , jalagnos y espadaña ya malago na upuno maesa güe , sa pineloña na manmalago y preso sija .

text: But Paul cried with a loud voice , saying , Do thyself no harm : for we are all here .
text2: Lao si Pablo umagang ni y dangculo na inagang , ilegña : Chamo munalalamen jao : sa estagüejamja todos .

text: Then he called for a light , and sprang in , and came trembling , and fell down before Paul and Silas ,
text2: Ayonae mangagao candet sija , ya tumayog jalom , ya mato manlalaolao ni y minaañao , ya podong gui menan Pablo yan Silas ,

text: And brought them out , and said , Sirs , what must I do to be saved ?
text2: Ya jacone sija juyong , ya ilegña : Señores , jafa jufatinas para jusatbo ?

text: And they said , Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ , and thou shalt be saved , and thy house .
text2: Ya sija ilegñija : Jenggue y Señot Jesus ya unsatbo yan y iya guimamo .

text: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord , and to all that were in his house .
text2: Ya masangane güe ni y sinangan y Señot , yan todo y mañasaga gui guimaña .

text: And he took them the same hour of the night , and washed their stripes ; and was baptized , he and all his , straightway .
text2: Ya ayoja na ora gui puenge nae jacone ya jafagase y sinaulagñija : ya matagpange güe enseguidas yan todo y iyoña .

text: And when he had brought them into his house , he set meat before them , and rejoiced , believing in God with all his house .
text2: Ya jacone sija guato gui guimaña ya japlantaye nañija gui menañija , ya ninasenmagof sa jajonggue si Yuus yan todo y iya guimaña .

text: And when it was day , the magistrates sent the serjeants , saying , Let those men go .
text2: N	16	35		68330	 ¶ Ya anae egaan na jaane , manmanago y manmagas sargento sija ilegñija : Setta ayo sija na taotao ya ufanjanao .

text: And the keeper of the prison told this saying to Paul , The magistrates have sent to let you go : now therefore depart , and go in peace .
text2: Ya y atcaede jasangane si Pablo ni este na sinangan , ilegña : Manmanago y manmagas na infanmasotta : ya pago fañuja ya infanjanao en pas .

text: But Paul said unto them , They have beaten us openly uncondemned , being Romans , and have cast us into prison ; and now do they thrust us out privily ? nay verily ; but let them come themselves and fetch us out .
text2: Lao si Pablo ilegña nu sija : Janafanmasaulagjam sin infanmaecungog , yan manmapresojam , ya taotao Roma jamja : ya pago inmanafanjuyong sin infanatungo ? Aje : lao nafanmato ya sija unafanjuyongjam .

text: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates : and they feared , when they heard that they were Romans .
text2: Ya y sargento sija jasangane y manmagas ni este na sinangan : ya ninafanmaañao anae jajungog na taotao Roma sija .

text: And they came and besought them , and brought them out , and desired them to depart out of the city .
text2: Ya manmato ya manmagagao sija , ya anae manatanjuyong , manmagagao na ufanjuyong gui siuda .

text: And they went out of the prison , and entered into the house of Lydia and when they had seen the brethren , they comforted them , and departed .
text2: Ya anae manjuyong gui calaboso , manjalom gui guima Lydia ; ya anae jalie y mañelo , jaconsuela ya manjanao .

text: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia , they came to Thessalonica , where was a synagogue of the Jews :
text2: YA anae guinen manmalofan inanaco Amfipolis yan Apolonia , manmato Tesalónica , anae guaja sinagogan Judios ,

text: And Paul , as his manner was , went in unto them , and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures ,
text2: Ya si Pablo segun costumbreña , jumalom güije sija , ya tres sabado jaadingane sija ni y Tinigue .

text: Opening and alleging , that Christ must needs have suffered , and risen again from the dead ; and that this Jesus , whom I preach unto you , is Christ .
text2: Jadeclararayeja sija , na si Cristo nesesita ufamadese , ya ucajulo talo guinin y manmatae : ya este na Jesus ni y jusangane jamyo , güiya y Cristo .

text: And some of them believed , and consorted with Paul and Silas ; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude , and of the chief women not a few .
text2: Ya palo guiya sija manmanjonggue , ya mandaña yan si Pablo yan Silas : yan y mandeboto na Griego un dangculon manada ; ya ti didide na manmagas na famalaoan .

text: But the Jews which believed not , moved with envy , took unto them certain lewd fellows of the baser sort , and gathered a company , and set all the city on an uproar , and assaulted the house of Jason , and sought to bring them out to the people .
text2: Lao y Judio sija pot y inigoñija , palo manaelaye na taotao gui mancanaya ; ya mandaña un linajyan taotao jaatborota y siuda ; ya maataca y guima Jason , ya maprocura manmaquecone sija juyong gui menan taotao .

text: And when they found them not , they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city , crying , These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also ;
text2: Ya anae ti manmasoda , macone si Jason yan palo gui mañelo guato gui manmagas y siuda , ya managang ilegñija : Este yuje sija y munafanaatlibes y tano , ya manmato güine locue ;

text: Whom Jason hath received : and these all do contrary to the decrees of Caesar , saying that there is another king , one Jesus .
text2: Ni y jaresibe si Jason ; ya todo este sija cumocontra y tinago Sesat ; ilegñija na guaja otro ray , si Jesus .

text: And they troubled the people and the rulers of the city , when they heard these things .
text2: Ya jaatborota todo y taotao yan y manmagas y siuda anae majungog este sija .

text: And when they had taken security of Jason , and of the other , they let them go .
text2: Ya anae manmañule segurida gui as Jason yan y pumalo , manmasotta .

text: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea : who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews .
text2: N	17	10		68480	 ¶ Ya anae puenge enseguidas matago ni y mañelo si Pablo yan Silas para Berea ; ya anae manmato , manjalom gui sinagogan y Judios .

text: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica , in that they received the word with all readiness of mind , and searched the scriptures daily , whether those things were so .
text2: Este sija mas manmauleg qui ayo iya Tesalónica , sa rumesibe y sinangan contodo y minalagoñija , yan matataetae y Tinigue cada jaane , para umalie cao magajet ayo sija .

text: Therefore many of them believed ; also of honourable women which were Greeks , and of men , not a few .
text2: Enaomina megae guiya sija manmanjonggue ; yan y manjulon locue na famalaoan Griego , yan y lalaje ti didide .

text: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea , they came thither also , and stirred up the people .
text2: Lao y Judios Tesalónica anae jatungo na japredidica si Pablo y sinangan Yuus guiya Berea , manmato locue güije , ya manafangalamten yan manafaninestotba y linajyan taotao sija .

text: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea : but Silas and Timotheus abode there still .
text2: Ya enseguidas matago ni y mañelo si Pablo na ujanao asta y tase ; lao si Silas yan Timoteo mañagaja güije .

text: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens : and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed , they departed .
text2: Ya ayo y umadadaje si Pablo , macone asta Atenas ; ya manresibe tinago para si Silas yan Timoteo , na ujalaguse guato guiya güiya , ya manmapos .

text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens , his spirit was stirred in him , when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry .
text2: N	17	16		68540	 ¶ Ya mientras manninanangga as Pablo guiya Atenas , calamten y espirituña gui sanjalomña anae jalie y siuda na bula y idolos .

text: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews , and with the devout persons , and in the market daily with them that met with him .
text2: Enaomina gui sinagoga jaadingane y Judio sija , yan y mandeboto na taotao sija , yan todo y asodaña gui plasa todo y jaane .

text: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans , and of the Stoicks , encountered him . And some said , What will this babbler say ? other some , He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods : because he preached unto them Jesus , and the resurrection .
text2: Ya palo ni y manmalate gui finanagüe y Epicureo yan Estoicosija , managuaguat yan güiya , ya palo ilegñija : Jafa cumequeilegña este na caducon cuicuentos ? Otro palo ilegñija : Buente mannae notisia y nuebo na yuus ; sa jasangane sija as Jesus , yan y quinajulo talo .

text: And they took him , and brought him unto Areopagus , saying , May we know what this new doctrine , whereof thou speakest , is ?
text2: Ya macone güe guato gui as Areopago , ilegñija . Siñajam intingo este y nuebo na finanagüe ni y unsasangan ?

text: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears : we would know therefore what these things mean .
text2: Sa uunafanmanjujungogjam ni y güinaja ni tatnae injingog , enaomina manmalagojam intingo jafa estesija .

text: ( For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else , but either to tell , or to hear some new thing . )
text2: ( Sa todo iya Atenas , yan y manaotao juyong ni y mañasaga güije , taya chechoñiñija na para ufanguentosja , yan para ufanecungog ni y nuebo na güinaja . )

text: Then Paul stood in the midst of Mars ' hill , and said , Ye men of Athens , I perceive that in all things ye are too superstitious .
text2: Ayonae tumojgue si Pablo gui talo gui Areopago , ya ilegña ; Jamyo ni y lalajen Atenas , julie na guefdeboto jamyo .

text: For as I passed by , and beheld your devotions , I found an altar with this inscription , TO THE UNKNOWN GOD . Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship , him declare I unto you .
text2: Sa anae malofanyo , ya juatan jafa y inadoranmimiyo , jusoda gui un attat este na tinigue : PARA Y TI MATUNGO NA YUUS . Ayo y inadodoraja ni y ti intingo ; güiya jusangangane jamyo .

text: God that made the world and all things therein , seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth , dwelleth not in temples made with hands ;
text2: Si Yuus ni y fumatinas y tano yan todo y güinaja ni y mangaegue gui sumanjalomña ; güiya Señot gui langet yan y tano , ti sumasaga gui templo ni y finatinas canae ;

text: Neither is worshipped with men ' s hands , as though he needed any thing , seeing he giveth to all life , and breath , and all things ;
text2: Ni umasetbe ni y canae taotao sija , taegüije y guaja janesesita ; sa güiya mannae todo linâlâ , yan jinagong , yan todo y güinaja ;

text: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth , and hath determined the times before appointed , and the bounds of their habitation ;
text2: na jâgâtodo y nasion y taotao sija para ufañaga gui jilo y tano , jadetetmina tinancha y tiempoñija , yan y uttimon y saganñija ;

text: That they should seek the Lord , if haply they might feel after him , and find him , though he be not far from every one of us :
text2: Para ujaaligao y Señot , yaguin siña buente masiente ya umasoda güe , sa ti chago güe cada uno guiya jita .

text: For in him we live , and move , and have our being ; as certain also of your own poets have said , For we are also his offspring .
text2: Sa iya güiya nae utafanlâlâ yan utafangalamten , yan utafanguaja sustansiata ; taegüije y palo gui poetan miyo , ilegñija : Sa jita locue y rasaña .

text: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God , we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold , or silver , or stone , graven by art and man ' s device .
text2: Yaguin jita y rasan Yuus , mungajit jumaso na y yiniusan Yuus parejo yan oro , pat salape , pat acho , pat y finatinas y jinason y taotao .

text: And the times of this ignorance God winked at ; but now commandeth all men every where to repent :
text2: Ya ti jaconsidera si Yuus y tiempo anae manaetiningo ; lao pago , manago na todo y taotao ufanmañotsot ;

text: Because he hath appointed a day , in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained ; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men , in that he hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Sa jatancho un jaane , ni y anae para ujusga ni y tininas , y tano , ni ayo na taotao y jatago ; ni y mannae testimonio todo y taotao , sa janacajulo guinin y manmatae .

text: And when they heard of the resurrection of the dead , some mocked : and others said , We will hear thee again of this matter .
text2: Ya anae jajungog sija y quinajulo talo guinin y manmatae , palo manmanbotlea ; ya y palo ilegñija : Injingog jao talo otro biaje , pot este .

text: So Paul departed from among them .
text2: Ya ayonae mapos si Pablo gui entaloñija .
